review: my elderly father my aunt my late mothers sister and i departed from jakarta to san francisco via tokyo on th may to visit my sisters and the family in northern america this would be my th visit to northern america the last previous visit was in whereas my first trip with japan airlines to northern america was in we took the am flight from jakarta jl which was approximately on time and arrived safely in narita airport at roundabout pm tokyo time transit was less than hours as scheduled and the duration of the jl flight from tokyo to san francisco was approximately hours the plane from jakarta to tokyo was not fully occupied in contrast there was hardly a vacant seat for the tokyo to san francisco flight one thing i noticed from the flight tracker was that the plane flew directly above the pacific ocean from tokyo to san francisco whereas in the past japan airlines would fly north to be near the alaska and canadian shores that really explained why the flight duration was shorter than in the past which would take between hours furthermore both the cabin crew and ground staff were polite and professional in particular by providing excellent wheelchair service for my yearold father right from the checkin process in jakarta until arrival in san francisco international airport highly recommended for senior passengers for northern america bound flight from jakarta
dunno how people rate this airline as good each flight we did was subpar service from staff when theres an issue is completely useless

i flew japan airlines from bangkok to osaka and its my first time flying full service airlines after stuck flying low cost carriers and from my experience its phenomenal check in process was fast cant believe i got nice legroom space on economy the flight attendants were friendly and polite as soon i seated seat was actually comfortable and there was pillow and blanket included as well headphones and also the seat has leg rest in flight entertainment since its the all seat came with dimmable windows the flight attendant gave everyone a bottle of water to drink and at that time i was thirsty all because the security wont allow water through now guess what delayed departed from suvarnabhumi at in the morning during cruising flight attendants offered me variety choices of drinks of course i choose apple juice but guess what free snacks napkins as well wet wipes now of course i went to the bathroom and its clean speaking of cleanliness seats were a bit exposed but thats fine the seats still comfortable the in flight entertainment has a lot of movies and games hours later the meal was served i got some kind of salmon porridge a salad strawberry yogurt fruits and another salad then flight attendant offered me the same variety of drinks but i choose orange juice this time but guess what silverware in economy its supposed to be plastic but the airline was very nice and gave me silverware then i enjoyed the meal after all its delicious and tasty then i watched some movies in the remaining time then guess what landed early overall i would recommend this airline since the meal is good plenty of legroom great seats and friendly service

in a way jal reminds me of my entire japan experience great service nice people but subpar websites trying to figure things out on their site is a bit of a maze forget the app and trying to sign up for their rewards otherwise awesome flight great attendants

great maybe best flight experience always on time or even early food is conveniently served hours after takeoff so passengers can get some sleep seat had a good amount of recline and the biggest amount of legroom ever im only around foot and i can stretch my legs out in my seat flight attendants were very helpful as i have accidentally dropped something into the seat structure whilst i was asleep table was averagely large i havent used in flight entertainment but it is worth noting that if you are flying from or to europe you should never pay for the wifi because it wouldnt connect to the satellite overall i would fly japan airlines again
deceiving baggage information prior and after making payment terrible customer service agent on line keeps cutting me off had me waited too long when asked to transfer the call

would highly recommend jal service great staff wonderful inflight service excellent kind friendly helpful staff all the way through go out of their way to help provide assistance for people with mobility issues all round service top notch would highly recommend

nice flight attendants one of the worst online experiences i have every had with an airline the site was totally impossible to figure out and the app never worked for us the premium economy cabin was not worth it and the food was the worst i have ever experienced in the air we love to travel pe and it is usually worth it but not in this case never again

i am glad i choose japan airline from la to osaka on their business class about hours none stop for me matter to me most when i travel long haul flight to asian i all way travel in premium economy or business class cabin comfort professionalism of the crews and on time flight was only delay about half hours seats spacious and comfortable not over crowd fight attendant all way have the can do attuite very professional understand english really well they all surprised my japanese not too bad excellent tasty western menu beef is so delicious top ingredients and lovely flavors must try their light meal snake curry potato is out of this world i am so relax and sleep like a baby all most all the way to osaka ps also in lax for international flight best arrived airport less to hour it is busy airport best come early morning no long line up so peaceful and fast moving for security screening so take my word remember early bird do gets the worm you will get pleasant happy journey
worst company ever they broke up of suitcases and gave us less than euros the suitcases costs more t han euros never flight with them

they are too much into their culture neither they speak proper english nor they have any indian food available even when the flight departed from delhi not even any bakery item or readymade food or any packed item is available this even applies to nonvegetarians also the worst thing was that they dont converse in english they speak only japnese language the inflight entertainment tv is also playing japnese items a very few old english movies forget about any hindi indian movies or shows being in the business class we suffered a lot i cant imagine the condition of economy class passengers i will highly recommend that if you are travelling to japan then please take indian airlines complete no no no to japan airlines

on th sept i took the jl flight from hong kong international airport tokyo narita international airport i was so impressed by the highly outstanding and professional customer service provided by the team particularly the cabin crews they were very polite i can truely feel the sincerity from the cabin crews particularly those i interacted with onetoone most frequently with including the cantonesespeaking cabin crew that i also met on my return flight on th sept jl thank you so much japan airline cabin crew team i wish the team all the best a fulfilling and happy career life

flew on jals from heathrow to haneda in july i arrived at the airport and had a bit of a wait until the check desks opened but once they opened check in was quick and i was soon on my way to the lounge jal direct you to the ba lounge in terminal but as they are a oneworld member you can you any of the oneworld lounges including the cathay which is probably the best and the qantas lounge which is a close second and the aa lounge which is a distant last if they re open which they all were for my flight which departed at pm my flight left about minutes late but arrived about minutes early which to me is an on tome flight the service onboard was fine but like previous jal flights i dont think the staff feel that confident when dealing with english speaking passengers but all the staff were great the meals were all nice as was the midflight ice cream which for a change on a flight wasnt rock hard i am not a huge fan of their business class seat as while it is very private it does lack storage but is comfortable and i did get some sleep on the hour flight the ife when compared to emirates lacks a lot of choice but was ok but i thought the amenity kit was a bit on the lacking side with no lip balm or moisturizer but it did come with a handy stand for your mobile phone overall an enjoyable and on time flight and i would fly them again plus they have a very generous luggage allowance which is helpful after a few months away

i would like to express my sincere gratitude to the jals registration and flight service team of the flight jl tokyo haneda to helsinki finland on sep to my surprise my seat was upgraded from economy to premium economy just before arrival at the counter desk some minutes before boarding the flight was smooth and the flight service team did excellent job

the customer service is trash like just look at other reviews and they are rightflight itself was fine i guess bt next time i think ill book ana instead overall basically just like american airlines but a little bit better

worst air company experience ive ever had in my life they cancelled my flight and said they would get in contact with me to rearrange the flights which never happened when i called back and asked what happened they said they would return with options and guess what that never happened as well what happened if that they changed my flight and asked me to accept or decline in their website which guess what doesnt work im not able to see or manage my bookings its like theyre stuck on the s the worst air company website ive seen in my life you cant do anything there except to buy tickets i suppose if you have any problem with your booking dont expect to be able to solve it through the website its useless want a refund youll get it but take your chair and wait for a good months for the money to be back in your account dont have money to buy replacement tickets thats your problem i suppose all in all i havent even started my trip to japan and japan airlines has managed to make everything stressful and troublesome thanks japan airlines

flights are good but the worst website app and customer service in the entire travel industry and thats really saying something not remotely possible to find your booking on the app or online the chatbot is laughable customer service not available on weekends what you simply cant access your reservation period we will see if anyone actually answers the phone at any point sure any product is unless you have a problem then you find out what the corporation is really like

had booked a flight to japan with transfer in finland in finland the flight got cancelled and we sat there waiting for six hours before we got the final call about the flight being cancelled they mainly gave the messages in japanese and didnt seem to care too much about notifying the other passengers in english they also gave snacks and drinks to everyone else waiting but not to us probably because we were not japanese our trip was delayed two days but they gave us accommodation and euros for food those days on the plane they could also have been better at bringing drinks during a hour flight in this time we only got offered drinks about two times other than when we got food other airlines are a lot better at this the worst part of this whole case is the requesting of compensation since we are under the passengers rights regulated by ec we are eligible for compensation for this two days delay you cannot reach them by email you have to call they will make you wait for hours before they pick up the phone and their phone line is terrible so you cant even hear what they say this combined with poorly english makes this whole situation quite frustrating its doesnt even seem like they know the rules so they keep putting you on hold declining our rights or avoid giving answers ive never experienced this poor service its probably a good airline when everythings goes according to plan and when you dont have to reach them though

i had a fantastic experience flying with japan airlines jal the staff were courteous the seats were comfortable and the inflight service was exceptional for any assistance you can reach their tollfree number at or visit their office tokyo highly recommend japan airlines for a pleasant journey
the best flight i ever had the seat was comfortable food was decent the flight attendants are friendly the aircraft was very clean great airline

i am deeply unsatisfied with the service provided to me by jal for a flight change my family has been faithfully flying jal since the late s and have always used jal for trips to japan to see family in the future this will not be the case we intend to fly on one of their competitors that also offer non stop flights and far more reasonable pricing and that does not charge exorbitant prices for a change in flight plans the cost quoted to me to change the first leg of my round trip airfare is more than the original round trip airfare this makes no sense the flight i wanted to change to has many empty seats and will most likely have empty seats when it departs jal needs to examine the level of service it is providing it would be cheaper for me to walk away from my original booking and book a new round trip travel additionally my daughter and wife recently traveled to japan and the food they were served on that flight was abysmal jal had been riding on old positive reviews and ratings from its customers the jal of today is not the jal of previous times and one other thing the website and the app are both absolutely abysmal neither of them perform well and the website does not allow you to search fir a round trip airfare now

they scratched my luggage really bad with two big dents when i talked to their cs at the airport they just showed the careless attitude by pointing to a board and told me thats a small scratch they never say a sorry to me in the whole conversation unbelievable careless

this is the second time i flown on jal last time was from hk to narita this time my flight wasnt delayed just an hour by a freaking ine and half hour i am writing this review on ground as i cant get on plane yet but i hope it is the same experience as last time which was amazing only stars thi still bad duh when im home its gonna be am or am

if you are travelling with a baby avoid jal at all costs unlike other airlines jal has this bizarre practice of allowing only one adult per baby to sit at bassinet seats this means you will be separated from the rest of the family on the plane and have to sit alone with the baby call centres or service counter refused to let my mother sit next to me to help me with the baby i had two empty bassinet seats next to me and still they refused to let my mother sit next to me to help me also for some bizarre reason i was not able to book the bassinet seats when i purchased the tickets so had to rely on call centre and service counter do not trust the message on their website that says priority will be given to passenger with baby they literally mean passenger in the singular form

japan airlines inflight service stands head and shoulders above any us based carrier we had problems with my inflight display and the flight attendants went out of their way to fix the issue they were also extremely apologetic the seat is amazing k and the interior noise level was very low you didnt have to yell to be heard
i love how they gave a menu for food and how tasty the food was the drinks were really good too i like how they have the latest movies and shows for entertainment

i was so excited about my next trip to visit japan and this made me dread ever coming back to the country i arrived hours early as i had a medical letter to get an upgrade hours later i had no upgrade missed my flight and they want me to pay for changing my flight they need to fix their customer service i got bounced around to so many agents only to be told there is nothing to be done and i missed my flight worst flying experience in my life

im never flying japan airlines again my new york to tokyo flight was torture with american airlines operated by jal no headphones for entertainment for hr flight food was so so bad now theyre telling me my flight from tokyo to manila that my assigned seat doesnt have entertainment a total of hrs flying time staring at nothing

worst customer service ever called them to ask if i can appeal for my nonrefundable ticket to get a full refund due to visa complications they said to submit a refund form and they will get back to me submitted the refund form like they asked and they proceeded to cancel the ticket with no refund i emailed them to say that i did not want my ticket to be cancelled if i cannot get a full refund and they told me that theres nothing they can do because the cancellation has been processed so now i am left with no ticket and no refund

whenever you wanna travel japan this airlane is in my humble opinion your best option their staff is kind and the amenities on the service make it worth it i have traveled times and the last two of them where on this airlane every single time we had a great time all the service was incredible and we had no problems at all

a year dream come true in september i am going to japan i am chef by trade and worked years ago in the hotel nikko a jal owned hotel in d√ºsseldorf i learned a bit about the japanese culture being friendly with the japanese chefs had a brush of japanese cuisine this experience actually gave me the urge to travel which i actually did i worked in israel saudi arabia china hong kong and indonesia but never made it to japan i am really looking forward to experience a one in a lifetime experience jal business class

friendly staff ok food interior of the airplane looks nice the entertainment system barely has english subtitles which is inconvenient because of all the engine noise in economy class english spoken movies are not always easy to follow however we had booking months ahead with family but they did not give us seats next to each other they sell the window seats for extra money so only people can sit together as result dad was sitting rows behind the rest of the family and they were not willing to change it because window seats are paid tried to change it upfront by phone by the seat reservation system in the airport and onboard no luck very sad daughter was crying for an hour weve seen other families being spread over the economy class as well so we were not the only ones so i would not recommend flying with them if you expect the free seats from bookingfamily to always end up next to each other

jal is always late they start boarding minutes to the scheduled flight and they end up delaying the flight pilots have chance to make up the lost time in flight but they choose not to upon arriving they apologize for the delays with excuses such as winds heavy airport trafic etc but these are not true assume about hour delay if you fly with jal domestic

we flew from bangkok to tokyo and to dallas in july the ground officer at bkk was nice and helpful the air hostesses were helpful for getting medication for my wife the food was delicious the airplane was nice and clean the movies were good

this is the first time my wife and i have travelled with jal business class and having got a great deal for travel to the uk we decided to tryout their premium service firstly i want to stress that the cabin staff are absolutely brilliant and although their english is average they do their very best to communicate with you the seats across each row in business is in my opinion too many the seats are only slightly larger than premium economy and as a flat bed turning from side to side is difficult their pricing makes them an ideal choice for value seekers but if you are looking for a true business class experience then perhaps singapore would be far better if a lot more expensive the food on the flights was good especially the steak but the selection was only average lastly the entertainment available to english speaking customers is very poor and well below that of comparable airlines i would recommend them for value and customer service but lacking in the refinements of some of their competitors

jal has long passed its peak as a business guest i had to accept a downgrade to economy on a feeder flight i then had to spend hours at the counter in tokyo i had to spend the night in front of the counter the employees were incompetent and just kept apologising i was not given any compensation on the alternative flight then in business the tv did not work i was brought the wrong menu the crew only realised this when the things i had ordered were not available there was no apology all in all i have never been so disappointed with a flight and an airline jals staff are friendly but incompetent in exceptional situations
after experiencing a six hour layover my scheduled flight was delayed eight more hours due to mechanical issues they said they could not put me on another flight will not use this airline again

i chose japan airlines to take my daughter to school in australia rather than opt for a shorter trip as i read the seats reclined more than most this was true and in addition to very comfy seats the staff and food were outstanding i also managed to get us an upgrade to business class on one leg of our journey and the lie flat seats were something special we were on a newer aircraft from jfk to tokyo and it felt like first class i will def be flying with japan airlines again

flew jal years ago and remember it was fine this time around i can see airline has really gone downhill first on the flight to japan our seats were changed without notice i wanted an aisle seat so this was disappointing on the flight the left side bathrooms werent working so only the set on the right could be used the toilet seats also looked like they havent been changed in a long time given how clean the public bathrooms are in japan the fact that the airlines toilets were old and nasty is gross for flight back home minutes before scheduled boarding received notice of a hour delay due to aircraft rotation what the heck does that even mean and if that was the case why not notify us earlier so we could have spent more time in tokyo instead of at the airport i really very disappointed in jal will fly ana next time

flew first class on boeing from haneda to chicago overall great experience with hard and soft product lounge at airport amazing as well not much to fault and expectations were met given first class service with a japanese carrier pros amazing multicourse meals and food selection which would give top restaurants a run for their money same with alcohol great amenity kit unbeatable service from checkin at airport to staff on board royal treatment at every and any point in your journey where jal is in charge and has control cons seats show signs of wear and tear given their age also when it comes to style privacy and ergonomics jal seats in first falling behind the times when compared to newer first class seats with other airlines however jal a have newer seats tv monitors on board are not of highest resolution behind when it comes to its competitors bathrooms are nothing special and fall behind competitor first class offerings overall great experience highly recommended

the inflight experience was mostly enjoyable with friendly staff and good food and beverage options the premium economy is pretty comfortable for longhaul flights the inflight entertainment had some great selections but i was somewhat disappointed the volume of movies and shows to select from the biggest disappointment came in japan airlines handling of my personal items one of my larger bags was severely damaged during travel to the point that my large suitcase is no longer functional the handle was crushed and no longer extendssee photos when i submitted a claim i was only offered a reimbursement for a suitcase worth close to not to mention the cost of the airline ticket for premium economy the handling of this situation will directly impact my thinking around future flight purchases with ja

i wanted to cancel my flight because my wife is pregnant and i want to be there for the birth after numerous back and forth they are still adamant about me paying a usd cancellation fee despite me having a legitimate reason cancelling months in advance tickets being sgd more expensive now than when i booked japan airlines has truly disappointed me with their inflexible and uncompassionate disposition dont you have expecting fathers or mothers among your employees i guess compassion doesnt translate well to japanese no wonder your suicide rates are so high

great economy seats service food and entertainment what really stood out was during our rare delay in bangkok jal staff were helpful in rebooking onto a flight that i found while waiting in line that would get us back home in time and give us a layover in tokyo to explore for a while not only did they rebook us without question our bags arrived as normal in tokyo and they even paid for our transportation into the city and a nice hotel room very happy with their service and would fly with jal anywhere possible

jal were absolutely fantastic i have flown on the big etihademirates and qatar and i can say with confidence i feel jal were better than all professionalism and service even in economy the flight crew could not do enough for you exceptionally polite and respectful and the kind of service normally reserved for business and first class the inflight meal was delicious hearty and sizeably larger than most other economy sized meals on other airlines seat configuration on the and were which i also prefer as it does feel there is more legroom and individual space compared to most other major airlines all in all long gruelling flights were made much easier and comfortable due to jals excellence in my opinion unrivaled in economy from all other major airlines in europe middle east and usa thank you jal

a complete zero terrible experience with customer service today a complete mess and rude customer service i was trying to book the same flight as my family at the same time they were booking but the jal website was showing an error after refreshing the page for an hour and a half i decided to book it the next morning and the price went up although it shows seats are available at the original price through a rd party i called the customer service rep i wish i got her name and she was so rude i told her my name multiple times after she called me the wrong name and then she laughed at me they refuse to match the price even though it was their error on their website my family has booked other tickets and this customer service representative was so unhelpful and rude we are all never flying with jal my family is cancelling all tickets and booking on a different airline i was on the call for close to an hour if i could leave a minus rating i would

its efficient but functional theres no personal touch the language barrier was difficult for me as a hidden disabilities traveller the plane was ok but seats uncomfortable food mediocre the vegetarian snack on boarding was a bread roll with a slice of lettuce and a slice of tomato in it jal did get our luggage transferred to a connecting flight efficiently

never ever again i had a very miserable experience from their business class everything is old and dirty i flew in many airline companies including qatar airlines and this one cant even come close to qatar and dubai and even lufthansa upgrade your airplanes its nasty

this is the worst business class experience i have ever had the planes are old the food is average at best they made me check in timeseach airport they didnt even have an amenity pouch so no eye mask for sleeping the lay down seats are hard and old and the blankets are thin and no you cant have two no online check inso no getting your seat or food chosen ahead of time it was awful

lost my luggage during transition flight spent few hours at the airport try to figure that out got to hotel at midnight with no clean clothes and no store open found it two days after and found the luggage was badly damaged with the case cant close completely they offer my us for compensation said because my luggage only damaged one side and its not total lost wtf back and forth with jal in email wasting time and energy jal sucks

i bought business class tickets for my wife and me to go to chicago from delhi via tokyo and return via honolulu as such nothing is terribly wrong but overall it is a very poor quality of experience right from check in through to in flight service is okay but soulless the seats are good the television does not really work and is very glitchy very few movies relative to something like united and movies have poor prints and keep stopping or being erratic but the worst part is the cabin service while the cabin attendants are very polite they are politely ineffective a meal service takes hours and in a hour flight lights are barely dimmed and if so then hardly so for hour or so i buy business class tickets mainly for the flat bed and ability to sleep through a red eye flight but jal makes that impossible i would not recommend it to anyone

i have chosen jalfor trips to asia and i find that the comfort food and service is one of the best of all airlines i flew on june th on flight from singapore to narita then on flight from narita to sfo on both flights the food is beyond excellent my wife judy ng believes it is michelin star fine dining quality the effort and planning of the food shows excellent work by the chefs and staff secondly i would like to commend the stewardess staff on both flight jal flight and jal flight on june on business class they did such a wonderful job i wrote their names down first names were kondo and handa on flight business class and ms aoki and ms seto on flight business class both on june th i believe me and my wife spoke to each stewardess and were overjoyed with their kindness and service on flight we spoke to the manager of the crew i believe thirdly id like to commend the jal organization for their ability to switch my wifes nonwindow seat to an locked window seat on business and they were able to move me so that we were togeather this request started in singapore jal check in i have a photo of both the ticket agent lady and her manager who took the matter and contacted narita airport staff to execute the seat change what fantastic coordination and service thank you we were met at the gate by jal staff person and she had a sign for ms judy ng wife and escorted to the transfer desksekura first class lounge for reticketing every thing was so quickly professionally done what a overall professional organization and staff thank you judyhippofantyahoocom and richjohnleeyahoocom

on june we flew from hkd to nrt on flight jal ms yamanouchi went above and beyond to assist us with our luggage checkin and boarding passes she even included a heartfelt thankyou note making our experience with japan airlines truly memorable we were deeply touched by this personalized gesture thank you ms yamanouchi
one of the best airlines out there the flight attendants were super nice the food was great the seats were comfy the plane was clean overall a great experience

comparison of the first class services of japan airlines jal and all nippon airways ana service in terms of service japan airlines jal clearly has the upper hand jals cabin crew is renowned for their friendliness professionalism and meticulous attention to detail whether addressing passenger needs or handling unexpected situations jal staff respond quickly and gracefully making passengers feel warmly welcomed while anas service is also excellent it falls slightly short in the finer details compared to jal food jal also excels in the food department the firstclass meals on jal are designed by michelinstarred chefs offering a diverse and delicious selection especially in japanese cuisine the ingredients are fresh and the presentation is exquisite reflecting the chefs dedication in every dish although anas food is also good it is somewhat less impressive in terms of taste and refinement compared to jal hardware facilities when it comes to hardware facilities ana takes the lead anas firstclass seats are more spacious and comfortable providing better privacy and entertainment options the seat design is more modern and comes with a more advanced entertainment system and seat control features however it is worth noting that jal is continually improving its hardware facilities although their latest firstclass equipment has not been widely implemented yet it is expected to catch up with or even surpass ana in the future amenity kits pajamas and slippers in terms of amenity kits pajamas and slippers ana is more thoughtful ana provides highquality skincare products and comfortable pajamas in their amenity kits and the slippers are designed with great care ensuring passengers feel more comfortable and relaxed during long flights in comparison while jals amenity kits are also quite good they are slightly less impressive in terms of detail and material quality conclusion overall jal outperforms in service and food offering passengers a superior experience on the other hand ana excels in hardware facilities and amenity kits focusing more on passenger comfort if you prioritize inflight service and food quality jal is a great choice if you value seat comfort and privacy more ana would be the better option ultimately the choice between the two airlines depends on personal preferences and needs

purchased business class route trips for my family vacation from jfkhnd the flight was delayed for a day due to jals own fault and airline promised reimburstment for a single day during the check in following their instruction i submitted the documentations via email to jaljfklljalcom after waiting or weeks i finally called jal upon confirming my information they refused to reimburst for my lost of hotel use which is only relative to the cost of business flights this amount of money is not too significant but morally this feels wrong jal is dishonest and will look to scam you every chance they get

i recently booked a flight from san francisco through jals website and was incredibly impressed with the experience the website has a clean userfriendly design that made it easy to navigate and find the best flight options the booking process was straightforward and i appreciated how seamlessly everything worked checking in online was also a breeze allowing me to avoid long lines at the airportthe flight attendants were friendly and attentive if you are flying to japan take this airline if i had to find any drawback it was that there were not as many entertainment options as other airlines but still had plenty of choices

exceptional staff attitude from check in onboard up to my arrival in tokyo haneda proactive client orientated and a perfect example for japanese know how of service and respect next time hopefully on a long distance flight

we had to fly from osaka to tokyo and then on to sydney our first flight was late leaving osaka because of bad weather so only had hour to get from terminal to in tokyo the staff were very helpful with one staff member walking us and then onto shuttle bus to terminal then another took over through security and waited until we boarded we found them so helpful and the seats in economy were roomy

japan airlines is constantly surprising me how poorly they communicate in english one airport has a same day check in while the other is hours before only leaving me and my family stranded in the airport waiting to check in with over degrees outside in delhi airport where there are no restaurants before security they didnt even have a specific check in counter and we had to deal with the unhelpful information desk because of their lack of communication my family has now been put in a difficult situation times on this one trip i was told they have amazing service but only if you know how to find information hidden away on their website good luck if you travel with them

awful service unorganized asked for a glass of water and got a rude reply to wait till food is served since there will be water on the food tray such a terrible flight attendant behaviour also there was a question to choose beef or chicken and when i said chicken she replied we run out of chicken so what is the point of asking then and how can you run out of food when you just strated from your base airport terrible service rude attendant probably not all flight attendants just this one i was unfortunate to have serving my row she influenced negativly the whole jal experience can not beleive who they employ

worst checkin experience ive every had via self checkin took long time and so many steps and wasnt even seated next to partner online booking managing dificult to use as well and staff at counter coulsnt help to fix

jal is my favourite airline if i am crossing the pacific it will be my first choice firstly the cabin crew are superb they go out of their way to serve i was impressed food top notch wines was excellent seat very comfortable a mattress was helpful love the cardigan that they gave the plane was sleek

i enjoyed this trip i had paid seating upgrade which made the trip a lot better cm tall the food is excellent and the flight crew are amazing do not buy the wifi it is a complete scam across the pacific and down the coast of china and japan and it never worked nor did they try hard to get it working when asked for help also the plane was in incredible shape the other airlines could learn from jal no duct tape anywhere the plane looked like it was new

think carefully about premium economy not the greatest most disappointing is they are part of the one world alliance being a sapphire member youd think they would not disappoint on my return i checked in at least hours earlier i found i couldnt get my preference of an aisle seat what happens is you have couples taking both aisle seat in the centre arrangements and abuse the system they put in in the j seat with is the front seating the problem is that you share both tray an tv screen instead of independently living the arm rest you could only lift one wat between two the person next to me continually ripped open with such force i could not sleep or get comfortable not only that the seat i was assigned to was not comfortable i saw at least four hours to go and i contemplated sitting on the floor eventually i sat on the pillow and blanket to make it less stressful and relieve the pain from sitting not only that they were happy to take other customers meal tray and refused to take mine anyway they blamed the travel agent and ignores the one world alliance sapphire membership thus couples booked both aisle seats and paid for two seat and got three in return while i booked a seat which was nothing more than economy and paid premium prices

first my wife and i tried to call jal on the phone the day before travelling they were useless on the phone they could not upgrade us over the phone like every other airline could then they couldnt even seat us together via either the crappy app or on the phone next when checking in at the airport after several failed attempts via phone we were able to upgrade they told us the price would be yen each and we agreed then when they took us to another counter to pay they said the price is yen each we told them the first check in ppl told us the k but they didnt have a clue and we just paid the k so already feeling ripped off next the lounge situation what a joke if i had checked in on the app i was able to purchase entry to the sakura lounge for us both and was happy to pay but then guess what if you pay to upgrade your seat you are not allowed to even pay to get into the lounge seriously wow next im disabled and had registered for mobility assistance i cant walk far or stand for long so i need a wheelchair to the gate i have been travelling all over the world registering as needing mobility assistance and never was asked why until today the counter assistant asked me why i needed the wheelchair and if i was on medication just wow no other airline or country has ever asked these things so right after explaining that she went back behind the counter said something to her coworker the jal employees all seem to work one job in pairs for some unknown reason and they literally laughed out loud at whatever she said now i can only assume that was at my expense so so rude so much for japanese hospitality next it takes two people to take us through security and customs one to push the wheelchair and one to do nothing but supervise the whole thing very weird so they say we cannot access any lounge and leave us our gate as soon as they leave us my wife goes to an information desk and they direct us straight to one of the lounges where we were able to pay and access again seriously what a joke of customer service

i was traveling for business and booked my husband as well despite calling jal to connect our bookings over a month before departure they are now saying we cant sit together terrible for the airline meant to be a leader in customer experience

i fly all the time and jal is by far the worst airline i have ever flown i booked business class tickets but when i checked in i found out they didnt offer business class on my flight they called it like business class because they offered water and juice but they charged a business class price and listed it as business class false advertising they would only let me carry on my computer and a couple other things that weighed a total of pounds i had to check everything they kept weighing and reweighing until it was exactly pounds we were also in the last group to board the plane i will never fly jal again what a shady airline in the same class as spirit airlines in the usa

i took a return flight on th apr from singapore to san francisco on jl and jl and on th may on jl and jl my experience with jal on those flights has been fantastic cabin crews professionalism had been exemplary they were courteous attentive smart and incredibly efficient cabin and toilets were clean well maintained and quiet they were also equipped with automatic bidet illumination and dimming of lights of the cabin were graceful and gentle to the eyes adjustable windows tint instead of the pulldown one excellent foods in the economy class with wide variety of choices of beverages juices red and white wines green tea water soft drinks jal is by far the most customercentric airline i have been on i absolutely recommend jal and look forward to fly jal again

it was the worst experience ive ever had on any airline in business class i was seated in a center aisle seat and it was awful i feel they should not charge regular fares for those seats i felt like i was in a coffin the service was almost non existent and the food was yucky it was my first flight with them and certainly my last

i have been flying jal for few years now from boston to jakarta and by far the best airline compare to other choices out of bos every single staff from check in to fa are super friendly foods on board are also good

terrible service website is useless you cant check in online so when you get to the airport you find out your entire family is split all across the plane and they cant do anything about it avoid this airline

i flew from sfo to tokyo on jl then on the same day i caught a connector to kagoshima with my year old father who has issues walking all of the flight attendants were professional and very pleasant they took the time to make sure my elderly father was comfortable and safe i fly alot on business domestically and our domestic airlines could learn alot from jal

good seat good food good entertainment jal delivers top class service even in the cheap seats in flight entertainment had one of the better selections ive seen on an asian carrier and more logically arranged an entire season of kimichika kazama kyojo zero was on offer and soaked up flight time much better than scattered episodes of multiple tv shows all the while plenty of drinks and snacks were served a paid exclusive meal is available on flights from japan and i had kabayaki eel for the first time one of the friendly flight attendants explained each of the dishes and how to best enjoy them im not an adventurous diner but everything was tops was very nice to have someone guide me through the menu jal customer service is aces as for the price a bit on the high side at a comparable paid meal on ana is only or just under usd at todays rates impossible to choose between jal and ana theyre both very very good at making long haul flights bearable even enjoyable

we flew to japan in both premium economy and regular economy this is one of the best premium products that we have experienced good seating trademark exceptional service and fun food even the economy class seats are newer and feature a better leg support that actually slides forward producing way more comfort will fly again and worth it
first time trying jal because i got switched to jal from cathay pacific the food was nice best part was the ice cream and the coca cola nice seats

supposed to leave today for a day trip to tokyo to be told my flight is delayed hours due to aircraft rotation i now paid for car services that have to be rebooked and a non refundable night in a hotel that i wont be using my only option cancel entire trip or agree to change no offer to reimburse expenses voucher for future flights and even refused to let me change my return flight to give me my day back

spent a lot on business class no internet the entire flight seat would not go flat like it was supposed to so couldnt sleep everyone from jal is very nice but couldnt fix the problem i flew on a boeing on flight home on an airbus plane internet was also terrible working less than of the time thats pathetic for business class on a wide body next time i will fly a different airline

first time traveling on jal they were exceptional great layout of the a largest k screen i have seen in any business classto top it off curated business class menu by top chefs and amazing hospitality definitely not my last time flying jal

we have visited japan three times our favorite trip was to hokkaido the major city sapporo is a large energetic capital we visited everything from restaurants to sapporos opera house the islands culture is memorable the national park and museum was wonderful we had marvelous passenger treatment on japan airlines we were served with ramen noodles followed up with a halfbottle of french champagne taking japan airlines was a rewarding selection for our family

i first time travelled with this airline and the experience was halal food courteous staff best service making the long tiresome flights amazing and beautiful meal and snack times are amazing plus ample legspace and comfortable seats behind business class

we were so excited about our trip to japan that we decided to splurge and fly jal instead of the cheaper options i ended up paying k for a round trip flight more than ive paid for any other international flight i was told the experience was great and it was worth the price but that was not the case the person im flying with has status on alaska air and was able to choose seats when i booked the flight i wasnt given the option to choose seats fast forward to trying to checkin and i still didnt have a seat assigned for an international flight that i spent k on the person working at the counter was able to help me pick a nonmiddle seat but the experience was still stressful also trying to find your reservation on their app is a nightmare on my return flight i was never able to access it i am a vegetarian option and picked this as a special meal option the meals they served leaned vegan i basically got mushrooms and rice on my way there x meals and some vegetarian stew and rice x meals on the way home which i didnt even finish the person i was flying with got margherita pizza for his nd meal and ice cream on the way there which are both vegetarian and much better options than what i was served i love airplane food and its usually my favorite part of the flight all the meals and snacks i had on jal were disappointing i tried to sleep on the way home since it was essentially an overnight flight but kept getting woken up by the flight attendants this was also odd to me lastly the plane felt old and nothing special i was hoping to be wowed here as well as i have been with other airlines i will never be flying jal again and would never recommend it what a bummer

security immigration there wasnt any separate queue for first business class passengers at haneda then which led to a long waiting time i believe this has changed in recent months lounge instead of jals own lounge we went to the cathay pacific lounge one floor above very plush excellent views of the tarmac and much better fb options boarding zonewise boarding was implemented religiously expect slight delays in boarding time at haneda though seating layout same reverse herringbone seats that were there on our other flights comfortable yes but might be a bit tight for some also the headrest tends to oscillate with turbulence while in lieflat position service kudos to the senior cabin crew members handling business class who were exceptional at their job thoroughly impressed food beverage the best out of the flights we took the japanese fare was topnotch arrival dedicated first business immigration counter at del luggage came on a priority basis as well

checkin very courteous staff one of the business class counters got busy handling a premium economy passengers ticket issues and it was temporarily closed thus this led to a long queue for just active counter ie slower clearance than even the regular counters lounge japan airlines has its own lounge at hnl in partnership with american airlines the food was great and so were the garden views boarding streamlimed process with zonewise boarding being implemented seating layout reverse herringbone seats with a pattern comfortable for the flight to tokyo service very good chief purser who ensured that everything was immaculate some of her team members were not up to the mark though food beverage both the japanese western options were horrid as expected from exusa flights arrival we were parked at the very last gate of haneda leading to a long walk to immigration no separate queue for business class passengers

i flew from hong kong to osaka taking cathay pacific from hk to bangkok and then connecting to japan airlines jl from bangkok to osaka kansai after arriving at my hotel hilton osaka in osaka i discovered that one of the wheels on my suitcase had been damaged such that it would not roll in certain directions having been rammed in towards the suitcase and scraping the bottom of the suitcase when rolled i initially contacted cathay since my luggage tag was issued by cathay but they explained that airline rules dictate the last carrier in connecting flights is responsible for luggage i then contacted japan airlines and was initially told that any damage had to be reported at the airport before i left the arrivals area or jal would not be responsible i reasoned with jal that as kansai airport provided luggage carts i simply took my suitcase off the luggage carousel and put it on a luggage cart and never had to wheel it around until i arrived at my hotel initially jal staff stuck to their policy but thanks to some assistance in japanese from the staff at hilton osaka highly recommend and my pointing out that jals own website and the conditions of carriage shown on their website only indicate damage has to be reported to a jal office within days jal referred the matter to a manager and i was generously offered a replacement suitcase as a special favour in fact when staff initially contacted me and offered a replacement suitcase that was a zippered suitcase and i indicated my damaged suitcase was a hard frame suitcase and i would prefer that staff actually worked hard to find me two other options that were hard frame suitcases to see if they suited my needs better i had hoped jal could simply fix the damaged wheel on my suitcase but jal explained that repairs would take months in their normal procedures and so was not practical hilton osaka confirmed the same for me by calling local luggage repair companies jal also arranged to have my damaged suitcase sent back to them so that they could have parts of it recycled rather than simply thrown away by me a very green step it started as a frustrating run in with inflexible and what to me seemed like unreasonable policy but it ended on a very kind and generous note with jal going above and beyond to provide me with a usable replacement suitcase in a very quick timeframe as for the flight itself i had a couple of hours connection time and used the jal sakura lounge at kansai the lounge is quite large with lots of seating areas and a dining area where largely food is ordered from staff from the displayed menu and then prepared by staff and placed on a tray to be taken away by the guest the menu items look simple but the quality of the food is always very good and delicious the flight was delayed about minutes due to the incoming flight being late due to bad weather the flight is an overnight flight scheduled to depart am and arrive at am unfortunately this overnight flight has always been operated with a b in a xx configuration in business class with the shell flat neo seat an angled flat seat rather than a fully horizontal flat seat like the sky suite seat on other jal long haul flights i had an aisle seat but as the cabin appeared to be about empty was fortunate to have no one sit at the window seat beside me and so could shift over to the window seat for more privacy when sleeping prior to take off breakfast orders are taken after take off there is a quick service of a snack but most passengers opted to immediately go to sleep about hours before arrival breakfast is served passengers have the option to skip breakfast and not to be woken up by the flight attendants but i think that is fairly useless as the lights are turned up and there is noise anyway from breakfast service to other passengers therefore overall for an overnight flight it is difficult to get much good sleep on this flight particularly due to the angled flat seat rather than a fully flat bed seat nevertheless as always with japan airlines the service onboard is superb and the food is very good the toilets are always clean because the cabin attendants constantly clean and then neatly fold the toilet paper tip into a triangle this is a good solid overnight flight and a good use of time but it is not an ideal flight to sleep on due to the older angled flat seats and the configuration that requires the window seat passenger to step over the aisle passenger for access

i asked for isle seat they said no problem i was assigned to middle seat the food also sucks ive had better canned food then that crap for dessert the ice cream was so hard you couldnt chip it with knife so i trashed it never again

we had never taken japan airlines boarding jal in sapporo was smooth the stewardesses were very helpful service was marvelous the young lady asked if we would like noodles so she bought ramen noodles she asked us if we woud like

daylight flight from haneda airport in tokyo direct to jfk in new york city am takeoff but cabin lights dimmed after first meal for people to sleep premium economy allows you access to the sakura lounge at haneda take advantage its spacious clean and supplied with multiple food and beverages the flight on an airbus was full so nice that premium economy gave you access to a spacious dedicated bathroom dedicated except when the attendants were serving beverages and food in economy bathroom even has a bidet seat checkin went smoothly once you realized that you get your baggage tag from a kiosk before going to the dedicated premium economy line seats reclined within a shell so they do not lean into the space behind or in front of you motorized recline and leg rest controls with a foot rest spacious unless you have a lot of things in the foot well entertainment system was efficient but i found the selections a bit limited as i am current on most movies and am not japanese and so do not follow their tv series ended up listening to soft music to sleep to airline provides noisecancelling ontheear headphones which did a fair job of masking plane noises meals were similar to what i would expect in economy although you were able to request small servings of instant ramen noodles and they handed out steamed buns red bean filling during the flight flight attendants came by often and were very pleasant as i was able to pay with alaska airlines miles at a very good rate this flight was a great value thanks pointme based on a suggested rate in a review of this flight segment by someone else

we flew to and from japan with japan airlines and internally to sapporo and were very happy with the flights all of which left on time the planes were in excellent condition with comfortable seating excellent attentive and very friendly service and reasonable meals our only complaint was that the inflight entertainment had only a small selection of films with no recent releases

on this occasion our family would like to express our gratitude for the work of the japan air line crew and especially goto san at narita airport who have helped a lot in an incident that we did not want to happen to one of our family members on march
excellent service and great staff made for an enjoyable flight meal menu had good selection to choose from good selection of inflight entertainment seat comfortable

phenomenal i mean it i was flying jl onboard one of their bs this was the first time i flew food was good legroom was good the ife had so many options crew was very nice be sure to choose this airline

flight attendants need better training passengers dont need to be woken up for every little thing if passengers are resting it would be best to let them sleep instead of waking them up to ask them to wear their seat belts even though it was not during a take off nor during landing if they are asleep it would be better not to wake them up to ask them if they want a drink or to eat excessive disturbance of passengers can be very stressful as sometimes what passengers need is a good rest during a long haul flight please train your staff better

appealing airline to work with they promised a sky suite for business class and then moved to a smaller aircraft and downgraded to regional business sloping hard old seats advised this was done to save full and that a visa compensation voucher would be provided they even provided a form to claim then refuses to issue it first and last time to fly with them as they outright lie about their business product and it is nothing better them a premium economy half the time as they swap you to a smaller craft with no notice deceitful airline and appalling service

yuzuka sonobe and mahiro ito cannot praise these two members of staff the airline should promote these ladies went beyond what was needed and worked through the issues and me and my friend made it to our destination thanks ladies we love you

it took nearly hours to serve dinner by time my main course arrived i was so tired i didnt even care about dessert the food was not good at all hospital cafeteria options they did not bother to serve bread with the butter they gave me we had several unnecessary announcements the seats were rudimentary compared to other airlines they did lay flat but i felt like i was in a very awkward coffin i couldnt wait to get off that flight definitely not worth the price poor food uncomfortable and annoying announcements

we took this flight from sapporo to tokyo the baggage check took over an hour waiting in line with no direction from any of the staff our flight was delayed an hour and a half due to a late arrival of the incoming aircraft due to this we missed our connecting flight to san francisco jal moved our flight to the next day the only available but did not offer hotel or meal vouchers even though the delay and missed flight was entirely their fault we ended up having to spend an extra usd to stay the night in tokyo when asked if we could get vouchers or even an upgraded seat they said the delay was not their fault and therefore not their responsibility to reimburse us even though it was their fault the attendant originally stated the delay was due to weather but when we corrected her she checked the information and confirmed it was not due to weather but still denied it was their fault overall really poor customer service and will likely not fly with them again

this had to be my best flight experience ive had so far jals service is unmatched by any us airline from the getgo you feel welcomed on board and are well taken care of cabin crew is very attentive and polite when you need something they are always coming down the aisles to check on people the food was the best airplane food i have had and was a great start to my trip to tokyo the whole flight was i will definitely be looking to fly japan airlines again when i return to japan

was held at the destination airport for two hours and told to pay compensation as a cleaning fee to a japanese passenger as the overhead compartment containing both our bags had a water leak no consideration for any evidence i brought up that showed it was unlikely my fault felt that the airline staff were quite clear in their preference for the japanese customer and had little regard for the international one as their attitude towards the japanese customer was constantly apologetic while the only words spoken to me were to ask how much i was willing to pay the other guy doubt ill be flying with them again with their lack of customer protection and reading the other reviews about them

luggage badly damaged and jal refused to take any responsibility very disappointed expected much better have been to japan many times and this certainly is not japanese culture and not what we have come to expect accidents like this are rare but do happen completely unprofessional jal to not fix the issue so unfortunately couldnt recommend your company again

i connected from narita to haneda airport at tokyo to take my ovenight flight to bangkok on japan airlines jl transfer from narita to haneda was easy on the limousine bus with frequent departures however it took a bit longer than scheduled due to late afternoon traffic once i arrived at haneda check in was quick using the first class check in and i was quickly into the superb japan airlines first class lounge at haneda based on my oneworld emerald status the lounge is very spacious with a very large dining area on the main floor with a side seating area and then upstairs there is a salon bar area serving drinks including the previously hard to obtain suntory yamazaki yr premium whiskey there is also a separate area upstairs with several massage chairs that offer preset massage programs lasting about or minutes each the lounge is mainly set for ordering using the qr code on your table with a few self serve items such as coffee and cold drinks buns rice and the trademark jal curry and several canapes the food is beautifully presented and delicious and definitely fine restaurant worthy i enjoyed a pork filet with pepper paprika sauce and phyllo wrapped scallop with sea asparagus of course i did not pass on ordering sushi made to order by the sushi chefs if you have access to the haneda first class lounge you will want to go to the airport early to enjoy its elegant ambiance and superb dining my overnight flight to bangkok was operated with a b fitted with the sky suite iii seat in a xx configuration the seat is fairly comfortable but there is not much storage around the seat for your things and the seat is fairly narrow in flat bed position as it was an overnight flight most people opted to sleep as soon as the flight reached cruising altitude if you opt to be served breakfast you will be woken around hours before arrival for breakfast western breakfast is not a strength for jal so i opted for the more filling japanese breakfast which came with a bento box with sections with fruit pickles and various different small bites and then a main of flounder with vegetable sauce and rice as usual it was beautifully presented and delicious the flight landed on time at am bangkok suvarnabhumi airport has a sprawling terminal so it is a fairly long walk to immigration due to the early arrival only one immigration desk was opened for business class passengers and there was a fairly long line up of maybe people by the time i got there fortunately shortly afterward authorities opened up a counter for elderly and those with children and i and a few others in the business class line were ushered over to the new counter since there was no one there i was at the luggage carousel by am out into the arrivals hall by around am and quickly into a car to my hotel soon after that as always jal provided excellent service and delicious food on the flight it is definitely one of my favourite airlines to fly with and i would always recommend it to friends

great airline staff were super attentive and did their best to communicate with their passengers the seat was ok for a business class seat a bit tight as we were sat in a reverse hearing bone seat rather then the expected apex suites which are far superior food was a bit of a let down but i would attribute that to the horrible airline catering that exists in north america and not japan airlines fault overall a pleasant and comfortable flight

i flew jal from vancouver to tokyo narita japan airlines does not have its own lounge in vancouver and uses the plaza premium lounge that lounge is under renovation so plaza premium currently uses a temporary space just an open area that is cordoned off the temporary lounge is very bare basics offering simple food and drinks served on paper plates and using disposable wood cutlery as plaza premium is also a pay to use lounge the space can get fairly crowded just lining up to get in took a while as the person in front of me was trying to pay to get in using a discount that is only available on the app the flight is operated with a b an older plane business class has the sky suite ii seats where the window seat alternate with being right next to the window with a counter next to the aisle on the even numbered rows or having a counter next to the window with the seat being right next to the aisle instead on the odd numbered rows the cabin is configured xx with all seats having direct aisle access but with the even numbered row window seats having greater privacy with a counter between the seat and the aisle i find the sky suite ii seats to be quite narrow at the shoulder when reclined to flat bed position because the armrest does not lower down and much prefer the original sky suite i seats which are wider at the shoulder in bed position and has greater privacy due to its layout older plane and less desirable seat notwithanding jal flights are always a pleasure because the food and the service are consistently excellent every flight seems almost like a constant competition between passengers and the cabin attendants as to whether the next passenger can get to the toilet first or the cabin attendant will get there first to clean up the toilet for the next passengers use i have been on hour flights with jal where there was never a time i went to the toilet without finding the cabin attendant had already tidy up the toilet and folded the toilet paper into a neat triangle point i usually opt for the japanese meal since they are always very filling delicious and beautifully presented this flight i opted for the western beef offering for a change a starter plate of grilled chicken prosciutto and salad and a main of beef tenderloin with stroganoff sauce and pumpkin and pine nut puree the meal was very good as usual but i confess i miss the beautiful presentation that the japanese meal would have had dessert was chocolate fudge cake which was fine but i always thought japanese chocolate desserts tended to be on the light side and lacked the strong bittersweet chocolate taste i prefer jal now also offers preflight meal reservation for an express meal or a vegan vegetarian meal supervised by chef yonezawa of the japan restaurant no code once again i enjoyed my jal flight and felt extremely well cared for by the cabin attendants i happily recommend jal everytime and the small deductions are for the older plane and the third party temporary lounge

worst customer service ever will not fly with japan airline anymore not recommended for everyone my daughter got sick on the plane so they had to return back to narita on the next day they charged me for k for tickets one way from tokyo to ho chi minh city normally cost around k after negotiation they gave me the boarding pass minute before departure time they suddenly asked for my daughters health check by a doctor which they did not do for hours ago so i obviously could not fly that plane damn they want to make money from me that was a horrible memory

discriminate airlines as a foreigner on board we got different services such as no choice of meal skipped meal services unable to change my seat with my family traveling with family and wheelchair is not welcome on board nightmare flight

this airline staff at the airport were bullying a customer they will not stand by the customer side to understand the situation they have no flexibility even when the policy is unclear or the information is not clear

positive the crew was fantastic very sweet and kind lounge access was great too negative seats were not that comfortable food was pretty average same as in economy class considering the premium i paid over eco fare really not worth it

hottest cabin it is almost always so hot inside the cabin that i wear summer clothes during winter flights no personal air vents to utilize i bring wet sports towels to stay cool even during temperate weather the airport turns on the heat but during the hot days will turn down the air conditioning impeccable service best airline food

this was the best flight experience ever the service the seat from beginning to the arrival was unparalleled with any flights i have ever had the flight crew are genuinely happy and extremely helpful and i felt welcomed and comfortable which was a great way to finish a tiring trip in japan i arrived refreshed relaxed and ready to take on my next adventure

what a fantastic flight the service and dining on this flight is the best ive ever experienced and i do a lot of flying a special thank you to aoki who was an absolute angel the cabin crew are a real asset to jal they did you proud comfortable seat too and all in time couldnt find anything id change thank you japan airlines

i am writing to express my sincere appreciation for the exceptional assistance i received from your staff member willy at the hong kong office as a senior individual with limited computer knowledge i recently purchased a multicities ticket online and subsequently needed to make changes to the itineraries willys remarkable patience and dedication stood out during our interaction despite encountering challenges she maintained a calm demeanor and took time to accommodate my requests willys professionalism and highcaliber customer service were evident from the beginning to the end of our conversation she not only found solutions for me but also explained all possible options outlining their pros and cons for my understanding i am truly grateful for willys outstanding support and commend her for her exceptional service such positive experience contribute significantly to customer satisfaction and loyalty thank you once again for having such a dedicated and competent team member

one of the best airlines from customer service and flight crew perspective business class for their dreamliners are little dated but crew makes up the shortfall airport crew of jal and flight crew is one of the best in my experience of flying for past plus years

changed of plane min before boarding ended up hrs delay replaced with dated which has more inferior seat my seat was unable to recline the ground crew was not organised to handle overall contingency handling to be improved although we were compensated with points or coupons we rather they had done more check before assigning the plane however the flight crew was on their level best to ensure our comfort

flight as always good but paid usd to use the lounge only to be told upon arriving in haneda that can only access hours before next flight so too late to use so dont pay for the lounge they just stealing your money i am a million miler on one world and cannot even pay for the lounge and get access i sincerely hope jal enjoys stealing my usd as i dont need the lounge hours after landing from a hour flight

great big and spacious plane we were traveling with disable person and the lady staff from jal special assistant service at haneda airport special assistant check in next to check in number were very helpful and kind with her professional manner during our last minute boarding she helped us along the way to our departure gate and really provide the best courtesy service in the airlines industry ive been traveling with many airlines and many classes around the world but im truly amazed with jal services

i upgraded my ticket from economy to business so my flight with a baby would be more comfortable there was a system error though where my infants lap baby ticket wasnt also upgraded customer service said we could upgrade at the gate at the gate they couldnt figure out how to make the change despite us waiting an hour to not miss our flight we had to give up on the flight i explained i was a nursing mother i was told i was only allowed to nurse her for a predefined short interval at certain times i was not offered a meal service i was not permitted to switch seats with my husband either i ended up finding an empty seat in economy to sit with my baby no apologies or refunds were ever offered in addition the business class seats werent worth the cost of the upgrade they were very dated and uncomfortable the food was the worst ive ever tasted service was disorganized throughout there are many antifamily policies in place such as not allowing a tiny travel pram to be opened in the cabin when deboarding

it was flight that was leff than an hour and half they served us dinner which was surprisingly very very good service on jal first is incredible i have previously written bad reviews about jal ground staff service which stands but this time there is a whole separate line for first class passengers that gets you in a special security line wizz inside which isnt fair but i guess thats the way it goes this line is quite commendable and its too bad they cannot offer at least part of the same experience to the economy or business side which i normally use

i have flown over a thousand flights and this is a good contender for one of the most disappointing ones deceptive i booked the flight in october on jal uks web site where it offered a business class option once in sapporo i was told that it was not a business class seat despite being class j which internationally is considered as business class and despite seatguru showing the business not premium economy label on the aircraft plan image attached so they are selling under business now the app shows class j something which is not even premium economy here are the benefits of this class no lounge access no priority boarding you are actually boarding last i kid you not youre in group catering glass of cold green tea nothing else over a flight h any other airline does better no priority baggage handling ours were delivered towards the end of a passenger service disorganised its a nightmare to access the app as a guest if youre not a jal member boarding is a complete mess selfchecking self handling of luggage you receive information emails in japanese in the lounge the staff were completely out of their depth when i complained about the situation their first reaction was to give me a lecture on the back of en envelope on the various flight classes when i moved on saying that i would not insist on accessing the lounge but wanted the coordinates of customer relations they suggested that they would process the complaint themselves disappointing chaotic boarding and you are boarding last full fare but half service better fly jetstar this is supposed to be a skytrax airline no way

we booked the x seat configuration and paid for extra leg room for the adults with the kids sitting behind us months after we booked we received an email telling us the kids seats had been moved rows back we spoke with customer service and said this is not ok but were told there is nothing that can be done we asked if we could move our seats but were told because we paid for an option that we can not change our seating for the adults days before our flight leaves we received another email telling us the kids seating has been moved again this time to the centre of the plane next to complete strangers we again tried to move next to our kids but again was told because we paid for an option we cant move after an hour on the phone we were told there is nothing that can be done no one else to talk to and we just have to accept the seating plan japan airlines think it is acceptable to split up a family and have strangers sitting next to young children i wonder if any of the management or board members would allow this to happen to there family

premium economy includes access to airport lounge the premium economy seats are very spacious the entertainment system is average the food is good the toilet seats are the best with bidet and very clean

terrible service from the lady managing the checking counter we only brought bags out of allowance but since one was kilo over she made us open both suitcases and transfer over she also seemed to enjoy making us do it
is a great place to visit and i would like to live here i will try to do my best to move to japan

as usual horrendous service before the flight in japan typical racism in japan means that if you have a middle name it is often impossible to checkin online try calling in good luck they charge customers for calling themabout cents per minute you then wait for mins for anyone to pick up listening to a repeating message about them not being available that simply repeats on a loop so after youve spent just waiting the staff simply read everything off the internet the same as customerswithout having any power or ability to assist customers whats the point
very very bad experience that they broken my baggage and lost my baggage cover i will never choose jason airline one more time
