impeccable food but only if you have not requested special meals the default meal design is by the red under young chefs jal has hired via a competition limitations only flight segments that start from tokyo hnd and nrt have these glorious meals also if you ask for any special meal you wont get the curated red u menu ymmv avoid transit between haneda and narita as the train ride is a long hm to hm only acceptable with fit travellers willing to sprint difficult with young children or physically infirm unless there is a hour minimum gap between flights you have to collect your luggage and clear two immigrations when transferring between hnd and nrt plan ahead the website struggles to take indiaissue visa and mastercard they really dont want our money the website is slow in every operation the ios app is a thin layer over the website so its equally suboptimal for of the tasks jal needs to learn from emirates etihad and qatar on how to deliver highspeed purchasing experiences app services and features and staffled experience

bought a pound ticket booking type x the airline blocked all the window seats saying i couldnt reserve them due to my discounted fare that totally sucks and have to wait hr before departure for online check in

this feedback is for those who will travel domestic within japan or i imagine international as well with jal japan airlines they require to take their portable hair straightener today on the last leg of my travel my little ghd portable hair straightener was confiscated as they do not allow hair straighteners i wasnt aware the restrictions were airline based as ana who i flew with to sapporo from osaka allows hair straighteners such as mine on carry on luggage i checked with airports and i guess assumed when ana allowed this that the other airlines would too i should have triple checked i think its silly that one airline allows and the other doesnt strange and not a nice experience therefore i will never fly jal again ana was great and had a seamless experience and at least i would not have lost had i flown with ana again

i missed one leg of my round trip ticket from dfwtokyoseoul which was the tokyo seoul part of the ticket because i bought another ticket from japan air from tokyo seoul hours later to spend time in tokyo and japan air canceled my entire return flights from seoultokyodfw and didnt even inform me they are cancelling the return flights leaving me days to buy a one way ticket home on korean air you can be on hold for hours while trying to reach japan air and you end up speaking to someone who is in india because its definitely outsourced and i heard three different stories from three different agents after three different phone calls telling me first i had a ticket it was fine no problem go check in i had seen assignments from another agent saying your flights were canceled because you missed the segment i basically got three different stories from three different agents and ended up with a refund of only the taxes which was a total of what i think is crazy about japan airlines is the fact that theyll cancel your return tickets and not even notify you of that just because you miss some piece of some segment no other airline in the united states will do this this is absolutely ridiculous no way united delta or american airlines would cancel any of your return flights just because you miss a segment of one of their flights you already paid for

everything seem to be geared to japanese passengers as though the rest of us didnt count all announcements were primarily in japanese and the stewards barely spoke or understood english i felt discriminated against for various reasons they announced two main meal choices by the time they got to me only one was available a currybased meal which shows poor judgment on their part with more hours to fly anything curry would cause foul odors i couldnt bare the thought of eating something like that there were no other choices and i politely refused poor judgement and poor thinking on their plan to stock insufficient quantity of a seemingly better meal later they came around with a pastry and choice of tea or other drinks i asked for coffee of course i was the exception to the rule and had to ask three times for my cup of coffee and to top it off during our breakfast it seemed as though i was transparent and they chose not to retrieve my tray until all other oriental passengers on the plane were cared for stewards kept passing by and looking at my empty tray but wouldnt even attempt to grab it no i didnt complain act disrespectful raise my voice or even show any displeasure i just simply sat quietly i have never experienced anything that bad even on a lowcost airline i would not recommend this airline at any price unless of course you are japanese in which case you will likely only travel on your home airline anyway shame on japan airlines i would have expected more respect and care for other people like me

worst website and combined customer service experienced in a very long time thought i would book a premium economy multicity itinerary for my partners th birthday next year and our recent engagement and was quoted k for economy class and k for premium economy when calling jal to enquire why is the price higher than business class they said it just is taxes and things they did not look into it did not care and could not offer an explanation as a result we had to book economy class if we werent going to japan i wouldnt have booked them at all also the booking platforms advertise the correct price k for both and then jal wont let you book them terrible terrible experience and took hours to try and sort it out wont be travelling with them again after this

due to a seizure suffered in tokyo and a resultant week hospital stay i was too weak to walk from the curb to the gate at narita so i requested a wheelchair the desk clerk took our passports but did not issue boarding passes she asked three different times what my symptoms were i stated alternately that i was too weak to walk to the gate my leg muscles were too weak for me to walk i was disabled after a hospital stay after her third repetition of the same question my boyfriend asked her if she was a doctor she said no he then asked if she would like to speak to the doctor that had treated me and started to dial his number she panicked said no and called a supervisor the supervisor said i just have one more question and then asked me you guessed it what my symptoms were at this point i assumed we would miss our flight and would not be given our passports back so i said in desperation that my muscles were too weak to walk to the gate i did not have a contagious disease i was not a danger to their passengers or crew i was not going to die on their airplane and that i was now extremely angry that finally got our boarding passes issued and our passports back the flight itself and the onboard service and amenities were excellent i grieve for people who use wheelchairs all the time and the humiliation they must suffer shame on jal

paid more than k extra for a business flight at night and i was coming back in economy during the day im doing it with a little child the company change the flight times with no other option than accept it and we cant change out business location despite having paid k for my tickets i also had to change all my hotel and tickets bookings and the customer service was useless they took days to come back to me with a price of a flight

i hate flying overall its terrifying for me jal was the best experience ive had on an airline though compared to north american carriers take off and ascent to cruising altitude was smooth no sharp turns and the pilot didnt full throttle to ft cabin and crew were clean and attentive and had more meals than i thought i would have overall awesome experience recommend jal would book again

flew from syd to haneda airport with jal and they were honestly so amazing extremely efficient friendly and consumer focused which made for a great experience the staff are on the ball with their servicing and make you feel as comfortable as possible if you are thinking about flying with someone else think again would fly with jal in a heartbeat

we had been late getting to the airport due to a missing bag but the lady at gate helped my family and i she was very sweet she made sure we got to our flight to misawa the flight itself was good but the people make it great

i am standing at the airport writing this review hopefully you can read it early before booking your airline ticket and avoid japan airline at all cost my family arrived in tokyo and days after my dad got sick and admitted into a hospital in japan he cant sit straight on the way back so we asked jp to upgrade economy to business class and we pay the difference they said no okay then we asked if we can cancel for medical reason get a refund and purchase a new ticket for business class they said yes on buying a new ticket with no refund fine the day we arrived at the airport to check in they told us the economy seat that we paid for is now cancelled without refund for some safety reason and that reason is for them to sell that seat for someone else im speechless at the same time expedia has not tried to help over the matter both expedia and jp told us to contact the other party for the matter none of them want to refund or help us to upgrade i know it would be a lot if you book everything for your vacation separately but next time i rather take my time to do that on my next trip than have to deal with this headache on top of the fact that our family is exhausted on this trip no one expects their vacation turn into a nightmare but craps happen and here is our story

i flew recently on jal premium economy from sydney to helsinki and back flights and i found the seats on the jal premium economy extremely uncomfortable even painful im a seasoned air traveller with silver for live from qantas i flew premium economy with qantas and cathay pacific and i believe the jal seats are some kind of a design mistake they dont recline in the usual manner just the bottom part the seat moves horizontally forward and the back support being mechanically connected attains a more reclined position the seat then attains a very unergonomic shape not compatible with a human body this arrangement also automatically reduces the passengers legroom increasing the discomfort even further there are only two buttons to operate this contraption one for the recline movement and the other one for the lower leg calf support however the lower leg support doesnt function at all due to its low range of motion so it just hangs there i couldnt find a comfortable position and couldnt sleep at all the seats are also very hard and my bottom still hurts a week after the return flights i find it hard to believe the japanese people renown for their design prowess and attention to detail installed these seats on their national carrier on the other hand the service was superb and the food exquisite albeit a bit small on size i also believe the food was the same as in the economy class

could have flown with cheaper airline but wanted to try jal flight was a morning flightflew on economy jal wider seats first problem was checking in at haneda i had checked in online and all boarding cards were on my mobile we asked for printed off cards but were told no you had to do your luggage labels and place on conveyer belt and scan mobile boarding cards it wouldnt read ours ended up a ground stewardess had to print off paper boarding cards for us for the scanner to work i saw the queues getting longer as a lot of people seemed to be having problems haneda security queues ran right through the self check in stations so the place was very chaotic and people not knowing what was happening so unlike the usual japanese efficiency you experience everywhere else on the plane now seats werent noticeably any wider but legroom was really good flight entertainment was very poor very limited choice of films screen wasnt very big seemed very dated with a pull out handset to control as touch screen didnt work when seatbelts light went off they came round with a bag of mixed rice crackers and a bottle of water after about an hour trolley came round with lunch and a choice of wine which wasnt very chilled beer was and soft drinks handed a large plastic menu between of us at time of serving choice of pork or chickenhad to make your mind up quick chose pork it was ok served with rice but nothing like beautiful meals we ate in japan also had ice cream no bread or cheese and biscuits just some little dishes of tofu cold broccoli salad and some other cold veg only ate some if it very disappointing after hours into the flight they dimmed the lights and a steward walked round with a pole pulling down any window blinds that were still open it stayed like that for hours he walked around the cabin constantly looking in each row for to check we were sleeping i felt i was in a nursery and being put down for my afternoon nap they closed the curtains round the galley and only came round regularly offering green tea about hours into the flight the lights went on and we were handed a horrible milk tea flavoured kind of cake with white chocolate chips which was very dry to eat then offered coffee or green tea or soft drink now hours into the flight we still had not been offered any trolley service offering alcohol other than at lunchtime my husband went up to the galley and asked for gin and tonics and the steward replied with surprised my husband replied there are of us each when the male steward brought the drinks to our seats he never said a word but frostily sat them down with a napkin and another packet of the rice crackers hours into the flight my husband again went up to the galley and asked for drinks but this time he was attended by a pleasant female stewardess smiling she brought them to our seats smiling half an hour later they came round the cabin with a drinks trolley offering alcohol drinks for the first time during the flight with only hours before landing at no time did they suggest to visit the galley for snacks or drinks you had to decide that for yourself and depending on who was there how you would be treated about hours before landing they brought round something to eat it was in a takeaway box and you had to open containers and mix it all up chicken and noodles but it surprisingly good definitely wouldnt fly with jal again we flew singapore airlines last time to japan economy was like first class meals service entertainment nothing was a bother to them and they constantly came round with drinks and snacks trolley and toilets were immaculate jal toilets were just ok and extremely small

this airlines is horrible they treat passengers who purchased tickets from agency differently the system do not allow you to checkin electrically you have to go to the airport and check in at the counter similar problem i still have when have to check in from sfo to bangkok it said i am not eligible to check in through their system the worst thing its system allocates seat for the passengers arbitrary never fly with this airlines

booked the flight through american airlines called immediately months before the flight to get seats seats disappeared times jal told me to contact american american assigns seats but they disappear and change got to the airport and seats had changed again all i wanted was an aisle seat anywhere disregarded status on american we were supposed to be able to check in hours before the flight will never fly them again if you are a foreigner they just do t care and wont help you

seat was comfortable good leg room for economy etc a few areas let this down compared to other airlines the food including the kids meals is strange its not western its not really mainstream japanese it was odd and definitely not suited to kids even the kids meals our kids left almost all of their meals and most kids trays i saw went back full we were glad we had some snacks packed for the kids when i asked a hostess on the narita melbourne flight if they had any bread rolls or snacks for the kids as they had not eaten their meal she simply said no and that was that the online system for checking in is clunky when doing it for a family at points we ended up with all boarding passes on a single phone but their system at the airport requires everyone to have their own which didnt work our kids are too young to have phones they printed us out boarding passes in narita when we were coming back to get us through one gate but then refused to give us the boarding passes which meant we had the same issues later on in the airport the entertainment system is sufficient but most other airlines have far better entertainment options and variety

recently had to cancel a flight due to health reasons and jal staff were fantastic to us the managed the retrieval and storage of our luggage and booked us on the next available flight when we were free to fly everything about their service is fantastic and they really make you feel like a valued customer they will be on the top of our list next time we wish to fly a route that jal service they set a standard other airlines would struggle to to achieve
ive flown with these airlines twice and had a great experience both times i enjoyed my flight good food very friendly staff

on the way back from europe to sydney flight from berlin was delayed minutes we were told we are too late for our flight to tokyo which was in minutes thats how jal booked our flight with only minutes between the flights we will be put on a next flight at to tokyo as it happened the next flight wasnt for us maybe because we are not japanese we were put on a flight in hours at am to singapore with finnair then to sydney qantas economy we paid for premium and then that was changed again to flight to brisbane and then to sydney arriving at am i dont even know if my luggage will arrive in brisbane or sydney or if ever my car was parked at the international airport so i have to catch the bus from domestic to the international terminal and probably pay extra as it happens our flight was changed back to sydney with qantas economy not sure why but thankfully we arrived safely in sydney collected our luggage and got home safely this is so unacceptable japan airlines you are the worse airline i have ever flown with and never ever againno one at the airport in helsinki was able to help they were saying thats all thru japan airlines so we sat there almost hours with limited food as everything shuts at pm only small kiosks are open and expensive but no choice send an email to the airlines with complain but no answer yet and it has been weeks now

the jal service between tokyo and australia was always much better than qantas when it came to food but sadly they have slipped down to the qantas standard with limited and poor selection and poor quality the service and crew were fine the aircraft an older with old style uncomfortable seats disappointed

the soft product was amazing the service friendly and helpful the food was exceptional however the hard product was a let down the seats were quite narrow and we are not big people compared to what is out there offered by other airlines these days we ere a little disappointed with the overall product

japan airlines uses gate at haneda it is an awful gate it uses buses we had a widebody that was sold out and idiots dont check in their fairly large carryons and shopping bags so the ride gets interesting sarcasm they dump you off at the bottom of those air stairs so there is a rowd of people with their carryons and shopping bags on the tarmac now have to climb the stairs those old folks who have problems walking with their carryons and shopping bags you can imagine the number of steps to get to the door of a widebody very fascinating sercie free exercise workout in hot humid haneda gates through just talk to someone up above and ask that you not be handed a x good luck
the staff at haneda airport was extremely rude and incompetent the planes are really old and business class offering was really bad when compared to qatar
it was a great flight with great entertainment good food and super friendly cabin crew all stuffs are clean and it was an enjoyable flight

i havent flown with jal for awhile so i am shocked with the terrible experience leg room is not so bad however the seat width is miniature size and i am average weight lbs serice from cabin attendant is good even tho they should have provided snacks between st and nd meal considering its hours min flight not sure what the real reason but i am sweating like a pig because they must have turned the ac off half flight at some point it feels like degrees farenheit omg its the most painful thing when you combine not sleeping terrible food and tiny seat and the ticket checked lady in haneda is rude too very shocking thing to encounter since japanese always pride themselves in politeness just skip this airline just go singapore airlines
yvr had the worst and most misinformed customer service avoid japan airlines unless you enjoy rude and incompetent staff

my family flew business class from vietnam to boston and had connecting flight at narita airport my parents in wheelchairs but werent allowed to preboard or board first based on the ticket class because there werent any wheelchair attendants available at the time of boarding we ended up boarding last food was cold and bland

jal has without the worst customer service that i have ever encountered i have been trying to get in contact over points and a confirmation of flight details and you juts can not get in touch with them the phone call was mins and then a transfer of which i hung up after another mins there is no email in this day and they try and make it as difficult to get in contact as they possibly can if you want to have any follow up with an issue baggage flights anything do not fly with them i give them a zero out of for customer service jetstar im australia has much better service and thats saying something absolute disgrace you guys need to wake up to your customers

wife and kids flew jal from finland to haneda i prebooked their lounge passes with jal sakura lounge after a hour flight all they wanted to do is shower and have rest before the next flight which is in hours time with another journey to sydney they went to the lounge front desk they were denied entry the lounge entry only allows entry hour prior to your departure time so if a flight takes off at pm you can only use lounge at pm however planes that take off at pm usually board at min before take off basically you get ripped off for your lounge pass paying for hours and only allow to use hours wife asked them if they can set a timer and use the hour and checkout themselves nope they wont allow you wife was really unhappy and tired so she gave up arguing with the front desk staff so i rang and spoke to jal in the australian phone line spoke to the phone consultant to lodge a complaint the guy was very nice and i explained the situation and ask why the logic of paying for hours but only get to use for or hours in lounge he couldnt answer my question i asked for cancellation of the lounge pass and get refund he could not get a refund as they dont refunds apparently what third world country is this so asked him to lodge a complaint for me and he said i have to use their website to lodge a complaint he also can lodge a complaint he said that all calls are recorded i asked if all calls are recorded whats the purpose of recording the calls if you cant use it to provide feedback he couldnt answer the question iam disappointed with jal their lounge access timeframe has no logic what so ever also what third world country technology do they have working there can record a phone call but cant use the recording as part of their complaint process this will be my first and last time using jal customer service is so poor

security immigration no separate queue for business class passengers expect long queues plan accordingly lounge the new sakura lounge th floor old sakura lounge sky view th floor surprisingly we werent impressed uncomfortable seats with underwhelming fb options definitely not meant for long layovers the only saving grace was the availability of shower rooms boarding we arrived at the gate on time only to be told that the process was delayed after a considerable wait at the crampedup seating area boarding was initiated in a systematic manner on entering the aircraft the crew guided us to our seats seating layout similar to our previous flight this too had a layout with reverse herringbone seats comfortable with all functions working perfectly fine the only flaw tight seat belts with multiple passengers requiring extenders service not as great as our previous flight but good nevertheless food beverage we chose the japanese meals yet again which were well presented arrival all the luggage was being dumped on the ground by the highheaded airport staff beware
great food lounges are a great food private bath clean modernized toilets decent legging space great customer service smooth landings and takeoff

i flew on japan airlines from narita to vancouver prior to the flight i used the jal first class lounge at narita based on my oneworld emerald status the lounge offers excellent food and service i tried several dishes by scanning the qr code at my table and ordering and each was beautifully presented and delicious special dishes included appetizers of serrano ham with figs marinated squid and marinated algae and manpuku chinese soba noodles from manpuku in ginza one of the oldest ramen shops in tokyo at the main eating times there are also sushi chefs making sushi to order there were also two different champagnes on offer joseph perrier brut and pierre de bry brut there was plenty of seating in the lounge and in the dining area and even a couple of massage chairs that offer a number of preset massage programs the lounge is an excellent preflight experience and most comfortable and relaxing before a long haul flight the boarding of the flight to vancouver was delayed due to cabin preparation issues fortunately the delay was only minutes and the plane managed to make up the time in flight arriving on schedule the flight is operated with an older plane b business class used the sky suite ii seats in a xx configuration with the window seats alternating between being separated from the window by a counter in the odd rows and right by the window in the even rows the sky suite ii is not the most comfortable of seats as in bed position the armrests do not lower down and therefore the bed is very narrow at shoulder level therefore i found it more comfortable to sleep with the seat in an incline position rather than fully flat entertainment system is not a jal strength so while there were enough movies on offer and some quite current it was quite limited there were a lot of japanese movies and tv programs that were either only available with english subtitles or not available with any english at all in flight service as always was elegant understated and attentive meals served on board were delicious and once again beautiful to look at i had the japanese dinner which starts with a bento box of many different items and then followed by a dish with three separate mains japan airlines is unique in that it offers a special coffee in business class for each flight with a full origins and tasting description in the onboard menu just like for wines in a wine review the one for my flight unfortunately had high acidity which i do not prefer but fortunately it was also a rich coffee and very very smooth overall i thoroughly enjoyed my flight with japan airlines

sorry its maybe long but explains thing hello recently i was traveling with family wife and two kids and from naha okinawa japan to bergen norway our first flight on the th of july had a flight no jal from naha to tokyo haneda with planned departure at which was significally delayed because of the delayed weve missed our shuttle bus to narita which we paid for and departed already on the plane flight jal weve notify the crew member about our problem we kindly asked if we could get our luggages one of the first on a belt so well have a chance to catch the bus ironically our luggages came out as the ones of the last then i approached the jal personnel to present my problem and ask for potential solutions we supposed to picked up our additional lugguages from currier yamato and catch flight ay to helsinki departing finnairjal it was then ive realized that im dealing with polite bench of kids where nobody speaks english i understand its very normal if we talking about local grocery store but travel company stasion at airport with no single person able to communicate with foreigner thats very low cheap and armature to me with precious time on table i waited long time for somebody who supposabely speaks english but then communication were bumpy and unproductive turning our already bad situation to even worse to waste more time let me point that i was asking for supervisor from the moment i approached the jal counter which eventually i wasnt able properly to speak with i was forced to take a taxi and when i sat in ive finally saw the supervisor with no second to spare ive just told her that i will complain about that the circumstance created by jal cost me for taxi to narita and tons of stress for whole family along we consulted jal customer service before we choosing a ticket and we were ensured that everything should be ok with those we had i also believe that air ticket also includes an airport fees like taxes security and others it was not our fault that flight was delayed but with absolutely no help from jal it became our big problem i should mention that my wife is japanese and we used jal quite much until now with satisfaction but after recent experience which is every traveler worst nightmare i dont think i will look positive at japanese air lines the email will be forwarded as a copy to whom it may concern

this is the best airline i have ever travel the customer service is pretty nice and devoted i have used the ordering touchscreen it is ease to use time saving and convinient as i didnt have to call the attendant but can order my food and process the payment myself i hope all airlines can develop this service it really did personalize my experience during the flight
flight attendants were nice inflight entertainment was diversity easy to order food by touchscreens and the payment thru touchscreen really quick best service ever

booked a rt flight through aa nrt to bkk bkk to hnd and hnd to dfw were on jl horrible experience everything with jl was cannot do on the hnd to dfw flight a snack service consisted of a slice of bread wrapped in cellophane followed by a beverage service of water only i kid you not this was premium economy jl only serves coke and sprite no diet options i could not get on the web site to preorder a meal jl blamed aa for that jl in bkk indicated that checkin for my flight would start at pm jl staff showed up at pm never again will i shell out premium economy money for budget airline services on jl

i will only fly with japan airlines whenever possible they appreciate their customers and run a very tight operation when my family is flying international i feel that we are in amazing hands far from home the international issues and fiascos just dont exist when i fly with jal

checkin at the dedicated business class desk which unlike many other airline counters at del was being used only for the said passengers the entire process took barely a few minutes just how it is supposed to be immigration security via the dedicated firstbusiness class lanes which took minutes in total lounge the makeshift lounge at the holiday inn express hotel nothing worth mentioning apart from the amazing views ie much better than the dingy claustrophobic lounges del is infamous for boarding streamlined with business class passengers being called as per the priority category once inside the aircraft the crew was proactively guiding the passengers seats layout in reverse herringbone fashion the seats are comfortable with the functions working perfectly fine the only flaw being the seat belts too tight for everyone i suppose with a number of passengers requesting for extenders service very friendly courteous and consistent no flaw at all one of the best crews weve seen in the postcovid world food beverage we went for the japanese meal and it was good to taste presented very well in short we had no regrets about our choice

i usually fly with ana but decide to try jal for this trip not disappointed service on board was excellent and the attention to detail was beyond expectations food was very well prepared and served with care jal is certainly an airline i would recommend to others

japan airlines has to be the worst airline ive ever experienced and the worst business class experience im traveling in a family of and weve all collectively agreed that japan airlines has quite possibly the worst both inflight and out of flight service buying business class tickets gives you zero priority unlike stated the flight provides no drinks and when we ordered the beef from the menu we were told that there was no more beef meals flight attendants were international yet did not understand anything in english so it was difficult communicating with them check in at departures was the slowest weve ever experienced at well this was the same for domestic flight check ins overall i would not recommend this airline to anyone not even to my worst enemy

we planned a family vacation to europe booking online and choosing our seating as family members suffer from mental disabilities and need window seats or sitting next to another family member we did not fill out the special assistance request as it has never been an issue with airlines in the past so thought it would be ok jal changed the seating plan on of our flights moving us from the seats we had chosen and on one flight to non adjacent seats when we contacted the call centre and asked if we could change the seating arrangement and explained our situaton we were told no they are the allocated seats there is nothing we can do after going back and forth with the operator i said that we would be unable to fly with the current seating arrangement can they move someone else again told no as they will not move passengers from their seating location eventhough ours had been changed having no alternative i asked for a refund which they stated would take to months to process entirely unhappy with the whole situation i sent an email explaining our issues and got a quick reply saying sorry we ask for your understanding but nothing we can do no offer of alternate flights etc just we changed your seat bad luck lesson learned dont care about their customers special assistance policy or anything so beware if you are thinking about flying with jal

i would very much like to thank you for the service of mr ariyoshi and his superior at checkin i was very happy with the differentiated service and education that served me and my wife really a very good experience that i will recommend to other people i would like them to know about this feedback thank you very much

customer service is non existent the website provides one customer service line with no options for anyone other than some sort of special members but i dialed it anyway called their customer care line multiple times over three weeks and waited on hold each time at least an hour and a half before hanging up i was trying to speak to someone about my ticket i went so far as to go to the airport to try and get assistance there were no ticket agents available so i went to the administrative office and was denied help from the manager because he said if he did it for me hed have to do it for everybody he told me to keep calling customer service and wait until someone answers the phone there is no way to communicate virtually on the website it was an infuriating experience to say the least i never got the help i needed but luckily my trip was great will fly to japan with an american based airline next so that i dont have these issues

we spent some time during the peak season june and july in different parts of asia being members of the oneworld alliance we were not able to get on our preferred airline because of schedule conflicts despite that we were able to get tickets from one of the partners jal first time flying jal embarking from different countries within asia and between the us and the conclusion from different routes was that it was consistently below standards we all felt like we were in the economy class instead of business class reasons for not flying jal again the lounge in different parts of the world sucks consistently look at the ramen pic below food on the plane was bad bland cold they went out wagyu beef all the times the aircraft was dirty old had an odor that was irritating if you dont specify the kinds and the amount of food or utensils that you want you will end up putting your finger on the buzzer many many times for instance i asked for some bread i was then given a kidsized cold bun with no butter and jam i asked for water and then i was given water with no ice if dont ask for napkins or toothpicks they wont put some on your tray the whole process was beyond frustrating and inefficient it was like begging for food and services other airlines will offer desserts extra drinks to you without even asking to make sure that you are well fed and hydrated you will assume that fruit salad and bread are pretty standard however if you dont ask you get none they dont have a specify time for the last meal before landing you have to time it yourself or else they will tell you that the pantry has been closed they dont take away your trash even if they see it i think they only take away your trash once or twice during the flight i needed to bag my trash nicely after you order your last meal they will tell you that it is your last order very funny they still struggle with english asking for a cup of decaf tea and was given a decaf coffee and then a cup of tea with lemon was asking for a glass of champagne drappier and a glass of opia the flight attendant kept clarifying to me they were both different it was very funny even that they wanted to put a cap on it was asking for their japanese white and red wine from coco farm they were available on all my six routes some of my traveling members are not diamond emerald members even though they knew that we were traveling together they put us in different lounges and groups for departure did not inform us that our check in would be a training session making us standing at the counter for a long time without apologies they also forgot to give us back our membership cards after checking in they had to chase us back while we were in the security area already flight attendants were stiff and not trying to make you feel welcomed and at ease the cabin temperature at night was way too warm to be able to sleep well when they assigned seats even though they knew that we were traveling together they separated us the seat was uncomfortable and narrower i was surprised by the positive reviews on youtube the truth is that it was not good at all

for an international flight home that we were dreading based on the time spent in air this was one of the most comfortable and easy travel components i have had in a long time incredibly friendly and interactive flight attendants helped at every turn we needed customer service reps at haneda airport took great care in addressing a problem with seating that was caused by american airlines i would highly recommend japan airlines for travel

worst airline experience in my lifetime been flying years unbelievable sardine can accommodations for an international long haul flight no personal ac above seat first time ive ever experienced this zero flexibility in changing my flight home i highly recommend choosing another airlines had to change airports in japan which meant a mile uber after having to go through customs and claim bag then of course check in again

i worked with american express to book our travel to haneda tokyo on july we booked in business class i had arranged seats where my husband had a window seat and i had the aisle across from him today june several days bfoe our trip i saw that japa airlines changed our seats i was not happy i called american express and they were on the phone with japan airlines for nearly two hours i erroneously disconnected the phone i then called japan airlines and i am still waiting for almost hours i understand that if there is a change in configuration of the airplane that they need to change seats this was not the case i sense that because we are not of japanese descent jal felt that it was okay to change our seats we had made our reervations months prior my husband is a wanna be pilot he love looking out the window on takeoff and landing that is why i try to select our seats additionally we like to sit across from each other and not next to each other patricia newman
comfortable flight good food reasonable layover luggage intact and courteous staff meets expectations

i had a very bad experience with japan airlines leaving from philippines to japan our flight was suppose to leave at pm but was delayed and changed to pm then it was changed again to pm midnight an attendant asked me if i am willing to take a different plane and flight i said yes but she did not approach me again i assume non of the passenger was able to leave with another flight or plane while we were boarding for our midnight flight i heard another passenger discussing passengers were able to leave earlier with a different flight or plane so i felt a disappointment i then asked one of the attendant what was the criteria they made on what passengers are allowed to leave earlier she did not look at me or answer me i had to ask the question again and she said something that i could not understand i could see all the attendants gathering together some were looking at me strange a couple of them pass by me and i was trying to ask for a letter that the earlier flight was cancelled they would not look at me they were trying to ignore me then finally they gave me the letter before i boarded no apologies and no explanation was made this is very poor customer service i regret flying with them i thought i would have a great experience compare to other airlines

i had a flight from phillipines to japan at pm it was canceled and change to pm then change again am an attendant ask me if i would want a different fight and plane i agree to take a different flight or plane at am i assume no one was able to fly earlier since no one notified us but i heard passenger was able to leave earlier i was disappointed so i ask the attendant what was the criteria for passengers to be able to leave early they ignore and avoided me they would not makeeye contact with me i was also asking for a letter stating that the flight was cancelled that was the word they used canceled but again i wasbeing ignore then finally the letter was given to me before i boarded with no explanation and no apologies i regret flying with japan airlines i did not expect this from them

except the app everything else was great ci automated baggage drop off was not only easy but as well fun space in economy was great biggest good inflight entertainment overall very good and look forward to my next fly

since touching down in narita nothing good about jal asian mostly looks alike obviously racism from transiting counter until in flight even flight attendants leader can be racism so disgusting first and last for me with jal my flight info jl nrt to seattle jun if jal can read this i hope you guys seriously look into this racism issue this is a very ugly behaviour shouldnt be in service line if thats the attitude

travelled london to tokyo on economy the seats were noticeably wider than other carriers and the layout was great most airlines running the aircraft was clean and modern and staff were very accommodating return flight on formation however managed to book early and got row so just two seats together the seats were a little less comfortable however the service was once again exemplary worth paying a little extra to use this carrier especially the using the sky wider seat layout

we took anas flight to haneda in december then we took jals flight to narita in april both were sixhour flights the differences we spotted were prices jals tickets were about cheaper than anas at the time of our booking seats and entertainment legroom was less than anas seats looked and felt older entertainment system looked like it was running on an s os interface movie selection was also less than anas our retractable remote control had some bits of food on it probably because the service team wasnt able to wipe down every single item during the short turnaround time suggest to invest in newer planesseatsentertainment systems which are totally touchscreen and high definition singapore airlines had introduced an app that lets you use your own personal devices as remote controls since this technology was around for over years also no retractable remote controls less dirty corners less bacteria food ana served us japanese mixed nuts twice and dessert was h√§agendazs ice cream their soba tasted fresh jal didnt have premeal snacks and their somen was a little hardened toilets anas toilets were larger and we observed the stewardesses checking the toilets almost after every passengers exit refreshening it ever so often they also had a bottle of lavenderscented lotion and fragrance spray in each the jal flight we took had none of the above stewardesses anas stewardesses were professional and very hardworking you could tell that they were always on the move but could seem a little cold as they were always rushing jals stewardesses seemed friendlier they smiled greeted and were more patient when asking our kids to choose a toy by the way jals toys beat anas cardboard plane they liked ana seemed to be the clear winner here hope jal update their planes

trying to register via their jmb scheme is laborious and eventually impossible via android boot up the laptop jump through hoops a few emails and registered only to find as a member my domestic japanese flights cost more than if i book the exact same jal flight through an online agent maybe time senior execs were hired on merit not time served or who they know they are way behind the game in

wife and i took jl from igi to haneda with high expectation from this international airline we were in for a rude shock both food and inflight service were terrible food was as if procured from some roadside eatery cabin crew seemed indifferent i had to remind twice to get a glass of wine to add insult to injury the cabin crew handed over breakfast in plastic bags to us even before we had struggled to finish our dinner the plastic bag contained a sticky muffin flavoured yogurt of an average brand some cut fruits all wasted i assured my wife that food and service should be better in the next sector hanedasfo and indeed it was as if we were flying a different airline it is unfortunate that some reputed airlines give less than average service and quality of food on sectors from to delhi some kind of apartheid inflight entertainment was limited cabin crew announcements in english werent clear

sky suite accommodations in business class are among the best in the industry the lieflat has multiple adjustments from recline to flat food and service are fantastic attention to detail from the cabin attendants is outstanding the onboard entertainment is fine but perhaps a bit limited for english speakers on longhaul flights the use of the lounge in tokyo was nice but the food was kept on the second floor level chairs at the windows were not overly comfortable due to a low back and odd recline the lounge itself was quite crowded and there was not enough staff to keep the tables cleaned off so it was not the best experience overall japan airlines did a fantastic job with this flight and we would highly recommend them

this flight is the daily itm airport connecting service for international passengers transferring at nrt the flight arrives outside terminal at nrt and then you are transferred by bus to the terminal where you then make your way back into the departure checkin area to once again go through security the flight is just what youd expect from a domestic flight the boarding process was supersmooth because not only do they board from the back of the plane forward they board from window seat to middle to aisle overall a very quick process

we were using aa advantage miles for this flight which they marketed as business class turns out jal called it premium economy so we had no lounge access the airport terminal was clean and orderly with plenty of places to have food and simply to sit boarding was well handled and quick as it appeared they board the back of the plane first which worked really well the flight was short but perfectly fine service was good and seats were comfortable the cabin was too warm for our taste overall this was fine for what it was

we booked this flight months in advance a couple months prior to departure the time was changed by almost hours with no notification from jalwe just happened to check on it ourselves and found the change yes changes happen we understand however this now required an overnight stay at the melbourne airport at our expense moreover our arrival in tokyo was now timed to arrive hours after our connecting flight departed for osaka jal had changed the time on the longhaul flight but not the connector because our arrival was now late in the day we could no longer connect the same day to osaka so we had to pay for a hotel night at nrt because jal refused they also refused to book a new connecting flight to osaka so we had to make our own arrangements including expense for the tokyo to osaka flight for as premium as the longhaul service was this lack of appropriate response from jal was quite disappointing

sky suite accommodations in business class are among the best in the industry the lieflat has multiple adjustments from recline to flat food and service are fantastic attention to detail from the cabin attendants is outstanding the onboard entertainment is fine but perhaps a bit limited for english speakers on longhaul flights the use of the lounge in boston we used the british airways lounge is excellent and even allowed us to board directly from the lounge onto the plane we were departing from gate e we would absolutely choose japan airlines again

the airline is very good in terms of offering a competitive price for the great service they are providing the leg space was much better than many other airlines that i had travelled in the past the way in which they handled the checkin process was also amazingly efficient with almost no chaos the asian vegetarian meal was definitely better than the jain meal the light meal served in the latter half of the flight was also great shortcomings the inflight entertainment options were very less i would say could have had more indian movies on the listing charging points just one regular usb point and no plug point provided which i had seen available on many other airlines on the whole it was a very pleasant flying experience with jal and i would definitely recommend
wonderful customer service by employee shejin keep up the good work shejin great job from japan airlines

we flew on flight jl on the way out to tokyo and jl on the way back to london and both flights were really amazing flight times were between hours each way seats and general comfort me and my partner are not the slimmest of people and sometimes travel on planestrains etc can feel a bit cramped so we were very pleasantly suprised to find on both flights that even in the economy seats on jal the seats were really spacious felt more like a business class sized seating than economy which was great for us the seats were super comfortable you have plenty of leg room my partner is tall and could fully stretch out his legs loads of space for your bags and bits you want while on the plane and even when the person infront reclines you dont really notice any difference in the space around you which is fantastic the head rests are really comfortable and are able to be adjusted in multiple ways to suit everyone seat material again increased the comfort as kept a nice temperature not too hot or cold etc both flights the air stewards controlled the lighting and dropped it to night time settings except during take off landing and when food and drink was being served etc and the lighting subtly transitioned at each point which was nice food and drink the food on both flights was wonderful i personally preferred the food on the flight out there but when i served a dish on the way back that i just couldnt have eaten lots of fish they very kindly swapped it out for a vegatarian dish they had spare flight out to tokyo dinner we both opted for the chicken cooked in japanese radish sauce with rice rather than the beef dish they offered this came with some small dishes on the side soba noodles smoked salmon cream cheese dried tomatoes vinegared cucumber wakame sea plant bread and butter fresh salad shortbread ice cream it was all really lovely but the smoked salmon side was especially good snack red bean bun rice cracker snack pack breakfast omelette with tomato ragout hash browns turkey sausage yogurt fresh fruits croissant drinks throughout generally whatever drinks you wanted plenty of choice of soft drinks a few alcoholic options and then several opportunities for hot drinks flight back from tokyo i opted for the grilled chicken cacciatore with mushrooms and pasta my partner opted for the hamburger steak in ginger with corn mustard rice both of which were nice but not quite as nice as the flight out the sides were sansho pepper kinpira with lotus root fried tofu steamed chicken zucchini with tahini sauce salad of quinoa mochi mugi barley fermented vegetable fresh salad with dressing ice cream snack rice cracker snack pack miso soup this was really special just what i needed lunch chewing tuna clam millet short pasta in a japanese ginger sauce this was the one i just couldnt eat it was far too fishy for me but the air hostess promptly found me an alternative of a mushroom curry which was delightful and very accommodating orange jelly with nata de coco which was very tasty_ drinks throughout generally whatever drinks you wanted plenty of choice of soft drinks a few alcoholic options and then several opportunities for hot drinks cleanliness and bathrooms the planes were both really clean but i have to mention how clean and generally excellent the toilets were on the flight back to london it had the most spacious airplane toilet room i have ever seen it was delightful it had little luxuries like deodorantfreshener spray face towels and was decorated lovely entertainment plenty of films shows music and other bits to keep you entertained i think i watched about films in total on the way out and on the way back but there were plenty more i could have watched i liked being able to make a music playlist also from the songs they have available and given there were so many chilled piano and nature sounding songs i was able to create a bit of a sleep playlist was exactly what i needed customer service so friendly so accommodating really brilliant service on both flights and in the airports at all points where turbulance might be encountered they gave fair warning as an announcement and given my partner is a nervous flyer especially with turbulence it made it easier for him to feel reassured as he said two of the best flights he has taken both were so smooth with minimal turbulence really even given the warnings just brilliant baggage came through quickly at both airports and seemed to have been handled with care flight back arrived about hour earlier than i expected based on jal original time on app winning the views both landing into tokyo and especially taking off from tokyo with mount fuji in the background incredible

the premium parts sakura lounge access though the lounge is not among the better world lounges it was too small for the huge crowds and very noisy full of screaming babies for hours on end catering is uninspiring a few japanesestyle dishes strangely there is absolutely no fruit a very basic food item they did have shower rooms and a quiet room with massage chairs and lots of alcohol the wines were of high quality also very many kinds of spirits including japanese brands and the lounge is clean but the fact that premium economy gets you lounge access is unusual and a big plus separate checkin counters for premium economy rather than together with economy and checkedin luggage gets priority after business class some amenities on board slippers and a small bag containing eye shades and ear plugs the seat is slightly better than economy though it is a far cry from the flatbed business seats basically you can recline a little more and have a little more space than economy the economy parts the catering is awful exactly the same with economy meals though premium economy gets you extra alcoholic items on request a quarter bottle of champagne and shochu a japanese liquor nothing in the bathroom no eau de toilette service is polite and efficient but rather cold and distant i suppose this is the japanese style but the southeast asian airlines have warmer crew seat service meals inflight entertainment lounge final thought if youre small size there is absolutely no reason to go for premium economy if youre big size it might make the journey that slightly more tolerable

my employee just told me that this pos airline just charged him to make a slight change to his wifes name to match her passport of course since the five tickets were purchased more that hours prior to noticing this they were unable to cancel for a refund and start over so the airline took full advantage of this man and his family this type of customer service should not be rewarded stop flying them immediately there are other options out therefind them they are not traveling until august

if everything goes fine with your flight you are lucky if there is any problem good luck every time i try to call i am placed on hold for over an hour and then no resolution when they respond to email they state they need more information although the information they need is on the email and it seems they cannot read english they dont respond to online forms or complaints there is little else i can do but report them to bbb and consumer affairs

positives first the lounge that premium economy gets you is really good the first time we have used something like that and lots of free food and drink peaceful atmophere and comfy chairs the seats had a lot of legroom i am foot and i had about a foot from my knees to the back of the seat in front having seats by the window means no disturbing or being disturbed if youre travelling as a couple the food if youre not vegetarian was good the cabin staff were excellent and the toilets were spotlessthroughout both hour flights the negatives the vegetarian food was poor and there was very poor inflight entertainment out and back from tokyo one of our screens didnt work there were games all board games there werent many films and you pay extra for wifi i paid for it on the way back but it only worked for a few hours although to be fair when i complained to the provider not jal they did give me a full refund
my wife booked me to fly out with her and missed the date by a day they wont change the fight for a fee they wont let us cancel the only option is to buy another ticket

jal from blrnrt was an overall moderate flying experiencethe ground staff at blr check inwhich seems outsourcedneeds a major revamp jal inflight crew were courteousinflight entertainment was limitedfood menu was moderate limitedbeverages were served only when askedwhich is definitely bad inflight service was erratic with the crew confused sticking small slips on the seats at various points depending on the meal preference servings were haphazardground staff at nrt were comparatively better overall a mid experience

the service from jal through zipair is terrible my wife got sick just before our travels to japan her family was to fly bkk to nrt she had a tumor thankfully not cancerous we fought for almost a month for a refund from zipair they would not offer anything this was a month for the flight they are horrible
i had a great experience flying from nrt to dfw the staff was extremely helpful and provided a worldclass experience

flight attendants are not accommodating or understanding of their own layover requirements or airport working hours in their own home country i had five different interactions with agents to try and understand whether i needed a hotel to stay in for an overnight connecting flight resulted in them saying that i may be denied entry for not having a hotel booked furthermore they thought that i did not require a declaration andor other documentation after going thru customs and talking to information desk i was made aware that a booking was not required for an overnight layover even though the main terminal closes at pm the whole airport doesnt close which is what they were saying nothing was mentioned in my booking that i needed a hotel booking they continued to state that one was needed but they were wrong their english speaking ability and comprehension of what is required for a foreigner to do an overnight transfer is poor i would not recommend this airline due to their negligence and the confusion that they caused while i was traveling on their airlines for their incompetencies poor english skills and understanding of foreigners travel requirements for layovers i will never nor recommend travel to japan via their airline it not only represents their airline poorly but also japan itself i hope that they improve but as an american i saw them treat a minority in a similar position as me with the same disregard and misunderstanding food was ok foot space is ok width of seats is not accommodating and i am ft lbs so keep that in mind when booking the stress that their gross ignorance of overnight layover requirements has caused along with their poor english skills and impersonal nod and smile to pass the problem onwards to someone else is appalling

extremely unpleasant experience checking in with jal in the flight from tokyo to london firstly impossible to check in the luggage the night before our early flight the morning of the departure only one checkin point worked for all economy checkins the assistants were ignorant limit arrogant requesting intra alia my year old son to move our luggage on his own without proposing any help no help in responding to my request in changing seats or to upgrade to a higher travel class against the supplement as a result i will be travelling with a child squeezed in a middle seat during hours although i have booked different seats during booking such a pity that jal managed to spoil the end of our trip to japan

there are several airlines that have very efficient and highly professional flight crew but out of about airlines that i was flying with japan airlines by far outshines them all what fantastic hospitality efficiency courtesy besides legroom in jal if greater than in majority of other competitors the only small complain is about the onboard entertainment that is little outdated and need a refresh and some investment

pretty decent flight in business class from paris to tokyo haneda with japan airlines on one of their s with their sky suite in a xx configuration but unlike many cabins with this configuration all their seats give everyone direct aisle access via a small gap for those in a window seat which i was from what i understand only a few airlines use these types of seats and while it was comfortable it doesnt offer a lot of storage space i am not a fan of the with their dimmable windows which the cabin crew can control and stop you from operating which i found annoying at around pm local time as we flew over korea and not able to see out the windows were only unlocked as we approached the japanese coastline on taking my seat i did notice what looked like some food or juice residue on the window and cabin wall near it and mentioned it to the crew and they seemed truly horrified and got some wipes out and cleaned it off apologising profusely the service onboard was fine with good food and drinks including maison brutin besserat de bellefon rose brut nv champagne being served i preordered the western beef menu before my flight which was great the crew was professional but i got the impression that they lacked some confidence when speaking with english speaking customers one of the great benefits in flying jal on my route which was paris to tokyo to sydney was the fantastic luggage allowance which was bags at kg each which is an awful lot of luggage but after just over three months in europe i managed nearly kg split over three bags overall a pretty good flight

firstly i dont like the layout of the cabin on this aircraft theres nowhere to store things unless you use the tray table the only other place is a narrow ledge covering the tray table when it is stowed if you are travelling with a companion you cannot interact with them unless you loosen the seatbelt and lean forward there is ample leg room and the seat goes flat for sleeping the cabin crew were friendly and efficient on the return journey there was no estern breakfast availablethey had run out not very good for business class

this was my first time to fly with japan airlines the services was absolutely amazing and unforgettable strongly recommended to fly with jal i would fly with jal again if i have any plan to japan big thanks for kben for your kindly services and all crew members on jl thank you krub

recently fly on jal times in premium economy and was quite pleased flights were on time check in a breeze and the class of service was quite attentive seats were roomy than us airlines and food and drink options were plentiful i did find that the ife needed a bit more options i will definitely consider flying them in the future when the opportunity is there

in january jal still required all passengers to wear face masks this was not justifyable because there is no regulation both in departure and destination countries plus people already know masks are not effective for preventing infection just because this face mask coercion i would not choose jal

we travelled as a family of from london to tokyo with three kids under five years old we purchased an extra premium economy seat for our year old as we were told we could strap her into a car seat on top of the premium econ seat just prior to boarding they confiscated our car seat as they were unsure of the regulations turned out they were incorrect and offered no solution for our year old but to carry her on our lap at one stage they said just put her in the seat asleep and strap the belt on the belt did not fit and she fell down and banged her head we asked if we could trade our premium economy seats for bassinet seat in any class economy premium business they refused to do this even though there were available seats as they said it would disrupt the passengers who paid extra for these front row seats none of them had kids it was very ironic given we paid a lot more for a premium economy seat that we could not use i wrote a few letters of complaint to their complaints department it has been months and quite a few follow ups and i have not had one singe reply
i havent gone on my flight but ive tried to call them multiple times and wait for at least mins they never pick up i email and their response takes days and the answer does not answer my question
sitting in economy there was additional seating space the food and service were outstanding my only complaint was their website which was a bit confusing

i reviewed a similar simular situation a year ago the excuse was covid then now restristrictions are lifted but jal will not transfer baggage after customs at haneda to a domestic flight at the transfer desk you have to lug your suitcase to a shuttle bus up the steps hang on to your suitcases and lug it down and to their transfer desk not check in because ive already checked in cannot recheck in extremely inconvenient

the service was good but the overall experience was not the plane was old with old tv technology plus limited space if i were a heavy person im not sure i could have walk through the little seat space the seat itself was not comfortable and for a pricey seat option the difference between coach and business was minimal the movie selection was limited and the remote not always worked in fact the flight attendant had to reset it my connection experience was not much better the crew seemed shifty and i had to show my passport multiple on what i can only describe as unnecessary workflow times sadly in an effort to be efficient they had the old sign system for group one then two etc im summary ive flown business class multiple times through multiple airlines and i have to say my experience with japan airlines had to be the worst

my first time to fly jal check in was too slow but flight was on time no choices for food we were served a fatty pork dish which was very unhealthy limited choice of inflight entertainment my flight back to manila was very uncomfortable check in was again very slow i was seated in the middle beside a burly passenger who dominated the arm rest and about one fourth of my seat the ground crew should have seated him beside a vacant seat food was again bad

bought a jal round ticket from sin to chitose return was with a jetstar codeshare flight was delayed from chitose to tokyo when we got to tokyo we were bumped off the flight hours later still no proper details on whats happening utterly disgusted with how jal conducts its business apparently as this was a codeshare with jetstar though we book the whole trip via jal jal had pushed all responsibilities to jetstar and jetstar of course was pushing it back that jal didnt wait for us by hrs of the of us still standing at the counter only of us were assigned hotel rooms no transfers to hotel was provided no meals no basic water provided due to flight connection hick ups we the customers got victimized no empathy to senior citizens and children who got stranded my yo mom and my yo got rushed mom hurt her leg due to all the rushing and jal takes no responsibility at all disgusting

august and hardly any good airline from sydney since qantas goes down with terrible covid recovery and bad management and some how i managed to get business class tickets to london from sydney via hanedatokyo at that time japan was closed to outsiders but transit was allowed as long as its was done before mid night it was great air line experience i have used ja before with amazing food and services and all flights were on time and smooth transit at haneda i will recommend any one flying from australia to take japan air rather than qantas since qantas flights prices and services are now rd class

my first time fright best service jal in the world i arrived heathrow then jal staff said this waywow so nice then after on plane so elegant service and passengers and meal restrant taste ohso my suitcase send straight way to lonfon to kochi my home town in japan so good service next time definitely going to japan so clean people are kind and lovely foods and helped a lots for mei was stay minatoya hotel in kochi every day well come gest same jal thank you for jal my best memories in my life to japan

what a miserable flight excited to see the had the new sky suite seat but from bangkok to narita and on to los angeles it was so so uncomfortable and could not get any rest plus aggravated an old sciatica problem that took several weeks to resolve i am ft tall and lbs this seat is way too small even the seat belt is too short to fit if spending the s make sure the jal flight has the apex seat in business or go with the much better ana seats

horrible customer service for some reason their web site doesnt like american credit cards i tried to purchase a ticket with different credit card and using different divides and browsers i was unable i checked with my bank and i was told that the problem is with japan airlines a number of customers reported this now i wish you good luck if you try to call them over the phone you may wait a couple of hours to speak to an agent the agents are rude and uninformed i talked to a number of them some gave me wrong info others just hang up one quoted to me price times larger than what is on their web site i guess they dont value customers i spent a couple of hours trying to buy a ticket i cant spend more i will check out ana instead

great flight great service comfortable and very friendly team i really enjoy flying with jal especially in first class when i can jal set the standards for all others to follow thoroughly recommend jal

i had an extremely difficult experience canceling a ticket i booked with bookingcom as the international call center couldnt help me and i was unable to complete a call to the domestic one finally i got to the asahikawa airport to board the new flight and yao was able to cancel my old ticket and refund me using google translate to communicate with me she was patient and kind it was very appreciated after all of the previous rigamorole thank you yao

japan is famous for having really good customer service or at least the staff is unfailingly polite when they are in the wrong jal had its staff doing a lot of apologizing as my flight was delayed by over an hour i missed my pickup and transfer connections if i did not have insurance i would have been incredibly screwed over my nd flight with them was delayed again by minutes they seem to have a lot of issues with trying to board and takeoff on time the stewardess are very polite and try to make up for the screw ups but it is unfair that they bear the brunt when whatever their issue is they need to fix it

forget about the flight this is the worst website since the early days of the internet how is it possible that a japanese company from a country known for technology can have such a bad website forget the translations it just makes no sense constantly giving errors links are impossible to find and redundant for example they have buttons asking the customer if they are flying domestic or international and if it is before or after april dont ask me why but it is what it is since on the next page i am going to have to enter the flight the departure date my name and some number they use why can they not figure out if i am flying before or after april just ridiculous let us forget that they dont even email you with a welcome email telling you your membership number if you assume it is going to be emailed and skip the page its on you will have to make another account like i did things they ask for email password digit password a one time password ridiculous and after all that i still get errors and cannot see my flight info i click manage booking and it gives me an error and i havent entered any info just utter crap

smiles all round but the service is poor and the food quite atrocious the menu is presented on a plastic card and shown to you just before service the food is congealed i made the dreadful mistake of having a spaghetti on the grounds that everyone can cook it not japan airlines i suppose you will get a different class of service if you tarvel business or first but i cannot afford to do so especially since they are considerably more expensive than british airways on the same route

the service food and flight were excellent i had to purchase a ticket in sfo exiting manila before they would let me board over and over they pointed out it was an extremely high fare but no worries all will be returned online with no problem well there is a problem the have a form setup to apply for the refund but when selected it sends you right back to the beginning of the refund process yes there is a number to call which took me twentyfive minutes to navigate through and finally hear a voice on the other end that thrill didnt last long as we were disconnected within fifteen seconds yes all out of pocket international long distance rate i wonder how much that is going to set me back fool me once shame on you fool me twice shame on me this was suppose to go so smoothly they take no messages on website or email contact the chat does not take your email or phone number so how does this help me this was suppose to go so smoothly

i am amazed how much different flying international is from flying us domestic the staff seem authentically nice they want to help you have the best trip possible i am annoyed that they force mask wearing but the world is still brainwashed that this helps anything on an airplane i talked to a lovely stewardess about my wife in the philippines i was going to see i shared our story how we go married in costa rica etc then she and other ladies made me a gift bag to give to my wife wow how nice is that i really like the food as well i only wish i could afford a first class ticket if you are considering japan airlines i recommend it remember to be gracious to the staff on board they are nice people any annoying rules are probably the governments fault

i flew from vancouver to bangkok connecting at narita airport onto jl from narita to bangkok i had about a minute layover but due to the airport being much busier than when i last flew through in late september i did not have enough time to use the japan airlines lounge after taking time to purchase some things at the duty free stores back in september practically no stores were open at the satellite terminal and only the main akihabara duty free shop in the main terminal was open at that time there were almost no customers and i found staff were actually approaching me to introduce products since i was the only customer in the duty free store this time the experience was quite different i went back to akihabara duty free to try and buy some things but the lineup for cashiers was so long that it ran outside the boundaries of the store and there was no hope that i could line up and pay for purchases before it was time to board my connecting flight on the other hand there were many small duty free shops open in the satellite terminal so i was able to buy a few things from there generally the airport was much busier and many more shops and eating places were open inside the main terminal and the satellite terminal it seems the general expectation is that it is going to get much busier at narita airport in the next couple of months as tourists from china start coming in force jl to bangkok boarded on time for its scheduled departure at pm but pushback was delayed to pm as there were passengers who had checked in but who did not show up on time to board then there was a long wait for take off and the flight finally took off at pm fortunately the flight was smooth once enroute and landed slightly early in bangkok suvarnabhumi airport at pm the flight was operated
