using a b with a xx seat configuration in business class using the jal sky suite seat all seats have direct aisle access as the aisle seat is slightly offset from the window seat next to it i actually like this seat very much much more than the newer sky suite ii seat as the original sky suite i has armrests that lower down when the seat is put into flat bed position and therefore is much wider at shoulder level in bed position than sky suite ii it also does not lower down as much as sky suite ii which seems a bit too close to the ground when in bed position for the sky suite i seat in bed position you can sit up at the edge of the bed and you are seated at quite a natural level in terms of angle of the knees sky suite i also has a fixed ottomanfootrest under which is ample storage for a carry on bag and there are storage compartments and shelf space all around the seat so lots of places to put things even without the retractable table open the retractable table also swivels so you can get up out of your seat without having to fully retract the table by swinging it out of the way i find the sky suite i seat is very comfortable to sleep in when in bed position much better than sky suite ii the flight was not very full with about seats empty in business class out of a total of seats in business class i had preordered my meal as the menu could be reviewed online around the beginning of the month for flights originating from japan jal business class has meals designed by famous restaurants in japan for this flight to bangkok the western meal was designed by three michelin star french restaurant leffervescence in tokyo so while the japanese meal was designed by the also impressive one michelin star ginza tokyo restaurant ren mishina and the japanese meals on jal flights from japan are always spectacular and spectacularly presented i opted for the western meal of wagyu beef sirloin with wasabi cream sauce and spinach gnocchi the meal did not disappoint from the appetizers to the bread to the very tender and well marbled wagyu beef sirloin it was an excellent meal one of the best western meals i have had on a flight in recent memory an interesting feature in jal flights is that a special coffee of the month is served in business class and the menu includes an introduction of the coffee of the month together with tasting notes as always service on jal was excellent not only are the cabin attendants attentive but they are polite and discreet in the unique japanese manner that western airlines can never replicate also as always the toilets are much cleaner than on most other airlines as the cabin crew clean the toilet after almost every use by passengers masks are required to be worn on board except when eating or drinking and it seemed compliance with the requirement by passengers was very good throughout the flight the flight was an evening flight and i was able to sleep fairly well for a few hours during the flight overall i enjoyed the flight very much enjoyed an outstanding dinner slept well in the sky suite i seat and appreciated the understated elegant service from the cabin crew i was concerned about arriving in bangkok as thailand had recently changed its rules for arriving passengers despite being fully reopened to tourism since october thailand on january reinstituted a vaccination requirement and a requirement for health insurance for covid medical expenses if a traveller originated from a destination or is going to a destination that requires a predeparture pcr test even more confusing by the morning of january thailand cancelled the vaccination requirement i was going to overnight at suvarnabhumi airport and then catch a flight the next day to hong kong which has a predeparture rapid antigen test requirement the announcements from thailand were not clear as least in english media so i was worried i would be asked to provide evidence of health insurance i was also concerned that the flight did not provide landing forms for thailand which i had been used to filling out in prepandemic times fortunately on arrival at suvarnabhumi airport i was able to use the priority immigration lines for business class passengers no landing forms were required and no questions were asked about vaccination history or medical insurance and i was through to the luggage claim area very quickly

i flew japan airlines from vancouver to bangkok in january first leg was jl from vancouver to tokyo narita jal does not have its own lounge in vancouver and uses the plaza premium lounge the plaza premium lounge is open to anyone who wants to pay to use it but nevertheless it was not very crowded the day i went it has a food station with hot foods meat lasagne tricolor pasta and buttered corn hot soup and desserts in a refrigerated case that day the lounge did not open the second section at the back of the lounge that has an additional food counter that was a pasta station on a previous visit flight jl boarded on time it is operated with a b with a xx seat configuration in business class with the sky suite ii seat i was actually hoping for the b with the sky suite i seats instead which is sometimes used on the vancouvernarita route as i like the sky suite i seat much more it has a larger video screen is much wider at the shoulders in flat bed position has storage for a carry on bag under the fixed ottoman and has storage space and shelves all around the seat the sky suite ii has a staggered configuration with a fixed counter and headphone storage cabinet next to the seat odd numbered rows have window seats with the fixed counter between the window and the seat and the seat located right next to the aisle whereas even numbered rows have the fixed counter between the seat and the aisle and the window right next to the seat so even row window seats have more privacy and better window views i was in a which is nicely located near the front of the cabin where both toilets for business class are located the arm rests on the sky suite ii seat are fixed and do not lower down in flat bed position as a result in flat bed position the bed is very narrow at the shoulder and it is difficult to sleep on ones back rather than on the side as the flight was mostly a daytime flight i found it more comfortable to use the seat in recline position to nap rather than flatbed position to sleep the flight was quite full with all seats in business class occupied except for one in the last row reserved for flight crew rest use the flight was scheduled for pm pushback was on time at pm and take off was at pm the flight landed at around pm about half an hour early jal has always been very reliable with its scheduling with flights departing and arriving on time consistently as usual service was exemplary on the flight jal has some of the cleanest toilets throughout the flight as the cabin attendants are constantly going in to tidy up the toilet after almost every use service of drinks and meals was courteous in typical jal fashion and meals always look beautiful as well as taste delicious i have a low tolerance for alcohol but was intrigued by the unfamiliar champagne offering champagne drappier carte dor nv and so asked for literally a tablespoon usually i end up receiving a quarter glass or a third of a glass but to my pleasant surprise the purser actually did pour me about one or two tablespoons of champagne perfect for a sip and taste i ordered the japanese meal which started with a bento box with compartments each filled with different appetizers and colorfully presented this was followed by the main of simmered chicken sukiyaki one unique feature of jal flights is that a coffee of the month is served in business class the menu even has a description of the chosen coffee including tasting notes just like for wines one weak point for jal is its in flight entertainment system it has fewer movies and tv programs on offer compared to other airlines and a number of nonmovie video programs were offered in japanese only without even english subtitles on arrival an announcement was made to stay in our seats as japanese authorities would decide the order of disembarkation for our flight those who were entering japan or transiting to domestic flights were asked to deplane first while international connection passengers were told to wait to deplan about minutes later however the lost time was quickly made up as security for international connections was very quick so i was back into the departures part of the terminal by around pm for my connecting flight to bangkok as always i enjoyed my jal flight from vancouver to narita good food excellent polite service and a comfortable seat
seat was comfortable enough for economy for short trips but would probably prefer business class for longer travel times food was better than most airlines with the same airfare

layout similar to aa business better experience essentials bag nothing special food was disappointing buy fresh sushi or something you like at the airport in tokyo to eat onboard flight attendants made fun of us for bringing out own sushi onboard in business when their food was practically inedible glad we did seats had more space and better storage no pjs though which is expected on hour flights like qatar attendant smirked when i asked service overall average and lack of respect for foreigners i understand japanese and the flight attendants continue to look down on foreigners disappointing japan air overpriced and nothing special choose qatar if you can better in every way you wont want to leave

booked through aa thus imagined an equivalent to aa business class japan air added a couple more seats in business making the fit tight no storage space for a phone even one seat row had an added utility box which made the flat bed position impossible to achieve near claustrophobic experience the japanese flight attendants smirked and giggled at inability to finish first course which was a japanese inedible delicacy flight attendants were unprofessional and condescending even my four welltraveled teens were shocked that thai smile domestic thai airways was friendlier and simply more neutral japan air lounge in bangkok was depressing and cold felt like a throwback the whole experience was unpleasant and i wondered what those sitting in economy must have experienced and felt pain for them

absolutely fantastic trip the crew put every possible effort to welcome me onboard and to accomodate every possible desire from extra snacks to champagne selection of food presentation and attention are at absolutely highest possible level special thanks to the team of taguchi yuko takemura hinano fai jarupoom na oochi sachiko for hosting me aboard and to making this flight as easy as a breeze thank you again

i have been calling japan air for days and cannot get through to a human beingthey claim minute service bs been on phone for days and hours on hold till phone just disconnectsno answer no humans there website is a disaster to navigatehorrible experiencei thought very high of there actual flight service but disgusted with customer service when you need to speak to a person

look the folks at jal are super nice and attentive but there are no individual air vents to give any relief when they crank the temp up well over degrees for the entire hour flight same issue on the return flight my entire family of four was complaining it wasnt just me i literally had to use their wet washcloth over and over poured water on it to try to cool off i am so very disappointed because the leg room was nice and like i said the workers are great i dont know what standard puts the temperature so high though it is just unacceptable no personal vent either i dont understand why

from boarding till landing it was an absolute pleasure the aircraft was well maintained and cleanthe crew was so caring and i am sure no other flight can ever offer you a crew better than jal my yrs old daughter slept off from haneda to newyork and the air hostess was really so concerned that she had no meals throughout the crew was so polite and responsive other airlines should send their crew for training under them

jal is famous for the food even in the economy one isle was served very slow compared to the other isle when my turn came the senior cabin crew asked me which menu that i prefer chicken with herbs taste like indian curry or hambagu japanese style i chose hanmbagu but when i opened it is the chicken with herbs the cabin crew did not know and apologized she went back to get hanmbagu but it was not available anymore it would be better if she apologized for telling me first that there is no more hambagu rather than asking which menu that i would like to have it was just an unlucky day for me why the flight from japan serving a weird menu in the flight to singapore the aircraft is old and toilet is dirty i would prefer other japanese airline than jal i guess movie selection is also not as complete as others including the japanese movie selections

the last leg of our trip from tasmania to vancouver was from narita japan to vancouver this was cancelled due to heavy snow in vancouver and the airport there closing down japan airlines put us on a bus and put us up in a hotel for two nights while they arranged a way for us to get to vancouver then scheduled another bus to bring us back to the airport where they booked us a flight to seattle the closest available to vancouver and gave us a bus voucher to get from seattle to vancouver we were provided with food and drink whenever we had to wait around too long at the airport all the staff at jal were literally running around trying to do the best they could for us and we appreciate all the effort and sincerity from the individuals that took care of us during this busy time we ended up getting a delightful visit in japan during our trip thank you for taking care of us

going to tokyo was fine no issues there coming back was terrible i had a good start with the checkin and baggage but went downhill from there the business class lounge was pretty decent just incredibly hot and packed full of people the woman at the gate was very racist towards me did not believe i had a business class tickets even after i repeated three times she kept trying to push me out of the line and putting people in front of me i finally went around them and saw a third shorter line that made her angry on the flight i could not get anyone to bring me water i became dehydrated when i asked for food i was asked if i was sure if i should be eating that she was trying to say i was fat so in turn she brought my food ice cold with no water so i couldnt eat it i am not fat btw i am a size and even if i was i paid k for the seat give me water and food

this flight was on board boeing with no personal tv screen for this hours flight but jal provide wifi the legroom was great on the narrow body aircraft and the crew was the best drink was served with no snack

i flied from bangkok to sapporo via haneda i always fly with jal as their boeing is the best in class with seat arranged in no other airlines has been doing this the seat was very comfortable and cabin very clean their crew was very professional and helpful always walk around the cabin

i flu jal business class from sfo to sgn on oct in general seats are good enough to sleep for a long range trip however jal foods either onboard or at airport lounges are subpar dont know if food quality are affected because of covid policy but my flights pre covid on the same route by cathay pacific gave me great satisfactions

booked a flight from lax to malaysia and what a wonderful trip comfortable seats and excellent customer service from both the flight crew and jal customer support my return flight did get delayed but only by about minutes cant say i fly often but i had a connecting flight from lax to japan than final destination to kuala lumpur both arrival and return flights were operated by jal and i dont regret choosing this airline would recommend this airline if youre flying into japan they even served hagan daez for desserts on the ride also get sakura lounge access if you have long layover or you can also rent a room w shower i paid for hours to take a small nap single bed w shower

we bought multicities bc tickets back in april for flights starting january we recently read very negative reviews of jal on trip advisor and trustpilotuk related to last minute changes cancellations selling prebooked tickets for higher prices no one to talk to at customers services etc all this made us very nervous about our tickets as jal had also made a couple of changes on our tickets with some incoherence we need to point out though that each change was communicated to us via email with that background we called jal for usa and canada and was so happy and relieved that a an agent came on the line right away b she was very pleasant knowledgeable and helpful with updating our itinerary based on changes for which we agreed c she also ensured updating of our seatings with the best available options and finally d sent us confirmation and ticketing promptly as indicated during the telephone conversation in summary we are very impressed with jal quality of customers services and up to now we must say that was our best experience we travel a lot around the world with the best rated airlines as qatar singapore airlines ana cathay pacific air france etc we hope the actual trip starting in january will be as planned and enjoyable why not

definitely the best airline i have taken had an hour flight and felt really comfortable sitting in economy the food and service were excellent the checkin process online was very easy the flight attendants were friendly and attentive if you are flying to japan take this airline if i had to find any drawback it was that there were not as many entertainment options as other airlines but still had plenty of choices

flew jal from melbourne to narita and on to frankfurt both flights perfect the planes have plenty of leg room lots of space the food and drink was plentiful regular and excellent staff very attentive and polite cant fault anything would definitely fly again

avoid this airline inflight service is fantastic ground service not so much you have to transfer baggage after customs yourself if you have four large luggage too bad drag it to the shuttle get to a different terminal drag it out and go to the drop location why cant they set up a drop location near the exit of the customs area like most other airports like all other airports that ive used anyway never had i had to lug my luggage personally between terminals on a connecting flight in any other airline i cannot recommend jal for this one reason

jal customer service is a kafkaesque nightmare to deal with very computer says no when i tried to write a written complaint on their website i got a response over a week later advising that if i wanted to make a voluntary change to my flight i needed to call the same number i had called twice before and written about in my complaint there is in reality no way to complaint to jal if you ask to speak to a manager they refuse they repeat the same line over and over again and have to be the most inflexible and unhelpful airline out there the story the ticket was originally booked from glasgow to london and then on to australia business class when plans changed we enquired whether we could just board the flight in london and not glasgow did not seek a refund or any other change we were advised that changes were impossible than if the flight wasnt boarded in glasgow the whole ticket would be cancelled we will be forced to fly from london up to glasgow stay in a hotel over night and then fly back to london in less than hours we have to fly to another country in order to fly back to our starting point its insane imagine missing your flight back to australia because the completely pointless flight you are being forced to take is cancelled and although you could board the flight in london you now wont be allowed to i understand the inflexibility of a ticket which doesnt allow changes but we werent technically trying to change the ticket just board when the flight stopped in london the absolutely refusal to even appear to try to be accommodating was completely shocking in addition the stop over on the way to london changed to a massive sixteen and a half hours over night there is no hotel offered so i hope you enjoy laying on the floor of an airport terminal because they kick you out of the business class lounge at pm

browsing the flight modification on my flight and then got notified my flight was cancelled immediately call in just to wait hours for no one to pick up yes no one picks up if you call in then they just drop all the calls when its time to go home and you get to try again the next day tried again for a month flight came and went i lost k i lost all my fn moneyand my flight how the f does this happen go ask them wait ask who because you cant contact anyone and no one responds to anythingahh what a beautiful experienceif the anger i felt could be transformed into hot burning fire i think my whole world would just set ablaze and id be surrounded by burning ash and an inferno at my back

i was not allowed to rebook my ticket theres no other option at all for rebooking customer service was crap had to call consecutive days called the whole day just to be put on hold for hours surprisingly someone answered just to tell me im not allowed to rebook after being on hold for hours lmao food was so bad was hungry the whole entire flight no snacks at all between the meals considering our body clock are still in the usa dinner was serve way pass our dinner time the next boarding gate was so far from where we got off not to mention airport staffs were not helpful at all and just to make things much more worse tickets are so expensive just wasted my dollars will never recommend to anyone and i will never fly from this airline anymore this was the worst airline ive experienced so far

jal does not transfer baggage for you after customs to connecting flight you lug your baggage out use the terminal shuttle and recheck baggage shuttle bus not level so you have to drag suitcase up and down the shuttle all other transfers i nave done the baggage drop offs were at the end of customs then just go to your new terminal and board for this reason a four dot travel o jal is downgraded to one dot if there was a way to give zero i would do not go to japan place advertises great service but fails to deliver in a big way

let me start first by giving credit to jal in operating long distance with configurations this definitely gets rid of at least most dreaded middle seats checkin agents did a great job and when they shifted as gate agents they were equally impressive that the whole boarding process took about mins with about occupancy on the flight the worst part was with the catering i had ordered an oriental vegetarian meal and both the meals were served with just steamed rice and steamed vegetables no condiments seriously jal not even pepper and salt which are staple in the cutlery pack cost cutting on salt and pepper no sauce to add or mix in the other passengers who opted for regular meals were served ice cream and when i asked for one the flight attendant did give a serious knee jerk reaction that she pulled the tray away from her as if i was snatching it and said that it was for other passengers and i cannot be given one appalling service and training from jal later i saw all unused ice creams being dumped into trash while standing in the galley area jal cant you ask for a second serving if some pax want it or keep it in the so called snack bar that you operate like done in british airways note my nd point above you did not serve one to someone who asked for it the so called self serve snack bar had a packet of potato crackers smallest potato chips ive ever seen and may be in the count of of them what is the purpose of this i think jal is very contended in staying out the top league while its national competitor is stepping on the gas every notch if you ever think of ordering vegetarian oriential meal be prepared to eat steamed rice and steamed vegetables like some monks do im traveling nrt sfo tomorrow and this time ive switched to a different offeringwaiting to see whats in store time for jal to grow up

so as a taller guy at ill take all the extra legroom i can get the seats were comfy and i had plenty of legroom which was nice the service was excellent as the attendants came around with miso soup green tea and coffee which was a nice touch but now for the not so good my wife and i agreed that this was some of the worst airline food we had ever eaten in all the years of flying it was consistently bad on all four of our legs from seattle to bangkok id fly again just for the extra legroom but because of the food jal is a notch lower than eva

i have been flying with almost all the hairlines in the last years economy business class and few times in first class but this airline by far the best airline ever traveled i am very impressed with the flight attendants they put their heart to help passengers and keep the airplane tidy and clean hope all airline follow japan airline in the future

when pal canceled our flight homeand expedia was no helpwe bought a ticket on jal the only thing which could possibly have been better was the pod seating on the boeing too tight limited choice of seat positions the food was better than any japanese restaurant that we can afford in the sf bay area usa the flight attendants were the model of japanese care and dignityand you knew everyone was diligent and competent in all they did the business class lounge in narita is huge and seems to offer anything you could need in the future i will spring for jal even if it costs extra its worth the money
i have been spoiled after this flight the flight crew was amazing the food spectacular and i slept hours of the flight i was so impressed that i just booked jal again for next october

i will write this in a list form point leaving japan lady at checkin counter made me stand there forever because she kept flipping through my passport and looking at the computer over and over again as though she was looking for something she could not find why did she not ask me i dont know so i waited there in the end realising how annoyed the people in the line behind me were and my own frustration i had to ask her is there anything wrong or something i can help you with then she says she cannot find my visa or esta for america mind you when i handed her the passport i had flipped to the page with the visa together with all the covid related document in that page thats solved proceeding to the security checkpoint the man there tells me to stop and immediately closes the line in front of me using the retractable banner he does not explain why he is stopping me i ask him what is wrong he tells me to just wait sir what am i waiting for he does not explain my japanese speaking colleague asks him he then explains that someone at the check in counter forgot to check the expiration date on my visa so now i have to wait a few more minutes for that same lady to come down here and note it before i can pass through she comes writes the information down on brown paper with a pen in my head i am thinking maam why did i have to endure that torture at the counter if you were not taking down my info but guess what i cant argue nor show my rage much because i dont speak fluent japanese and they barely speak english so i am boiling inside the whole thing took forever and the lack of communication was just very annoying especially when traveling with three other people whos experience was so different because of their japanese nationality no need for visas and hence no need for this drama but the real question is was this their first day dealing with a us visa was i their guinea pig why were they so confused and uncoordinated point no wifi on plane point coming back to japan on jl from lax to haneda flight was delayed about minutes but still the airplane staff were ushering everyone to stand up from the lounge seats to stand in line even though the plane was not ready why some people noticing that it is going to be a while sat back down but the jal staff were walking around like police dogs telling people to stand i dont get it baggage on your back and crowds getting smooshed together after scanning boarding passes is not the right tone to set for a hour flight on top of that the inflight meals were a choice between chicken and a veggie curry guess what they ran out of chicken before they even made it half way through the flight what was the logic there i told the lady i dont want to eat and she still brought me the meal anyway i have no idea why to be honest their menu was not appetising to begin with again no wifi and this time movie selection was so different from the jal line when we first came only has older movies yet still listed them as new releaes urghh if i could avoid jal i would because this was probably the worst flights and services i have received in my whole life but i will most likely be back on board again and i do hope that someone with authority gets to see this and makes the necessary changes for the comfort of the customers we are paying way too much tp be treated like this thanks for reading

first when i arrive at the airport i cant get to lounge as jal people are not here until pm terrible as this is part of my ticked and travel disappointed part of flight is the overall service no way to write comments on their email as it is directed to online form which rejects it over and over with no clear direction as to why it is easy to score great rating when not a single person can deliver negative comments second has to do with jal website unable to find me in the system every time is it a name issue why is there no search criteria by flight number the only thing is to pick search and system arrives to not found each time when you have late flights and your crew is not here all i can do is sit with crowds at the front of the airport no way to check my luggage go shopping or eat as traveling by myself it is cumbersome to leave the bags there is just a card on the counter showing pm return i guess it is related to when someone will show but cant be sure as it is in japanese is there no way for jal to show another terminal which may have a way to check bags and go through the security i was counting at getting some work done in the lounge not happy not well designed and shows no respect for a customer terrible website for what i am doing no instructions and it keeps rejecting even when those fields are not highlighted in red as requiredsilly and frustrating jal app has a very very low rating yet no one is doing any improvements flight is just one part of the travel service and jal failed before i even started

jal business class sold through american airlines the aajal fare from sea to bkk was total for our round trips tickets my husband and i have flown biz class from seattle to bkk many times with eva air first time trying japan airline because covid long story the onboard experience was a shocking disappointment in comparison with eva the quality of everything on our past flights with eva was topnotch especially the fresh and incredible dining experience whereas at jal the salmon and other meat were mostly over cooked i had to spit the food back out after one bite i asked for noddles again eva air had impressive restaurant quality noddles jal had instant cup noddles only really for biz class when comes to inflight entertainment the selection was very limited and of the movies came with japanese subtitle whichs very annoying sakura lounge at narita offered beer and coffee the only food in there was small packaged seeds with two pieces of almonds in each pack the eva air lounges are top quality in all regards including food choices

omg what a service i wish that other airlines are like jal this was our first trip to japan ever all started with jal from the time we checked in at lax to the time we arrived at haneda airport we were treated with respect great care and attention the plane was very nice and super clean the seats in economy class are very comfortable legroom is generous compared to other airlines inflight services were impeccable the stewardess always came around to offer drinks tea juice they genuinely paid attention to our comfort during the flight they are so polite no attitude the meals also were above average the entertainment system was great with movies games news flight info etc all in all we really enjoyed the hour flight very much didnt seem long at all hat off to jal and a japanese bow
hire another person to answer the phone hours to connect to a person is abhorrent in this age just crap all the way around

i must place a review as i was very disappointed with our trip in the above plane was tired and not in the condition i would expect first class was not up to standard i have gone first class a few times and expected the same no privacy in the open seating looked a little shabby toilet facilities were inadequate for first class and the food and wine choice was not up to standard travelled business class from tokyo to sydney in a jl and was cleaner and better laid out for a little privacy also my inflight entertainment did not work kept cutting out hostess tried to fix but would just drop out so was very long flight

after leaving late from bangkok but arriving with minutes until connecting flight to san diego they transferred us to another flight to seattle in business class and then seattle to san diego in coach adding hours and a connection through seattle horrible customer service again and paid for business class

the flight was cancelled and we were not notified until we arrived at the airport on the confirmed day of travel they booked us the day after then they didnt change our connecting flight and we had to spend hours on the phone on the day we were supposed to travel to try to get new flight to our final destination bangkok they had no space availability and asked us if we wanted to change our plans no the trip was planned and paid for months in advance they finally offered another flight on another airline al nippon at another airport haneda and we had hour layover to transfer and missed a night we already paid for at hotel in bangkok and golf already paid for horrible customer service trying to work this out finally got supervisor who changed flightairport after being on phone hours

we were on our way to australia from london via helsinki with finnair the airport in narita was over crowded i must admit the staff did try their best under the circumstances the plane was a but had neoshell seats which did not fully recline the plane was tired looking the food mediocre at best staff were uninterested generally everything was tired had to sleep when you keep on sliding down always wanted to fly with jal never again very disappointed

our first time flying with japan airlines and i was floored by the quality of service we received as well as the plane itself everything was clean upon arrival with not even a crumb on the floor as a tall person the seats fit my long legs without any issues not something you find in north america without an extra fee the in flight entertainment had lots of hollywood blockbusters and activities to choose from the staff was lovely professional and were patient with everyone around me the inflight meal was the best ive had on any flight ive taken and that have been a few hundred delicious flavourful hot and there was a lot to consume i will definitely be flying with this airline again

prior to the pandemic i frequently travelled with jal and its always been a great experience on october nd i took the am flight from hndlhr as i was boarding i realized i forgot to return my pocket wifi shimadasan who works for jal was a huge help and kindly took care of this for me i really appreciate her help and support super employee five stars

routing lgaord aa ordnrt jl nrt cgk jl and cgknrt jl nrtlax jl lax jfk aa was honestly excited to experience jal business class especially with a reasonable aajl fare from nyccgk at rt for business class as i sit at home recovering from this trip however i am nothing but disappointed mostly because my last flight from laxjfk on aa somehow provided better service than any of my jal flights i had ordered a vegetarianvegan meal which was confirmed on my outbound trip but not on the return leading to a very unpleasant experience the vegan meals when they were offered on the outbound were pathetic for the main course of a meal on a hour flight from ordnrt was one small boiled carrot with white rice and a piece of cabbage over the top the second meal of that flight was slightly better and the connecting flight had passable service except for the prelanding meal in cgk which was a bun with maybe two bites of vegetables served in blue plastic wrap thats somehow supposed to be acceptable in business class i mean across the board the hardproduct on jal sucks unless you have the apexsuite skysuite original on the w and select s however i had the skysuite iii on my flights fromto the usa and the shell flat neo my flights tofrom cgk to think what airlines invest in business class in the transatlantic market from nyc on flights of similar length or even shorter than nrtcgknrt jal should feel the shame of offering this product that was at no point competitive i cant fault any of the cabin crew however their main objective seemed to be avoiding conflict which i of course was not going to engage regardless of the meal discrepancy i had on the return i you do not have status with jal or oneworld and are only flying business class expect zero special treatment or priority including baggage delivery the airport experience boarding the nrtlax flight was shocking as they corralled everyone into the gate area at narita only to line up group have those in group stand up waiting in line while everyone else crowded around to wait including those in group the standard business class boarding group to be honest and i am being truthful in my personal experience i have flown similar distances on other airlines in economy class and felt more rested and less ripped off than in japan airlines business class further the entertainment selection and hardware is not sufficient for the lengthy itineraries that jal sells it truly makes me sad to write such a harsh review especially when the service was so well intentioned or at least manufactured to be however i could never in good conscience recommend jal business class when the only positives are the showers in the sakura lounge at narita and the packaged rice crackers with two yes im serious almonds in each pack something probably has to be done to improve the passenger experience

the good the bad and the jal fawlty towers airline style be careful if you did not see this for yourselves you would not believe it jal flight number jfk new york to tokyo th october as frequent international travelers vips with major airlines and life member of qantas we decided to use some points for a simple premium economy flight from new york to tokyo with japan airlines remember the name easy points used flights booked all good until we arrived at jfk airport days earlier we had tried to catch the flight but due to covid updated regulations we needed a pcr test so the flight was postponed we then paid the additional charge to qantas all good we thought japan airlines then informed us on our arrival via their supervisor our tickets were fake we were not confirmed on the flight yes fake and we were to call our bank immediately and put a hold on the payment earlier that morning we had double checked with qantas eddie from customer service was great not only did he confirm all good he called back to make sure everything was ok until we got to the check in at jal we showed our email confirmed tickets to the jal manager answer no we showed our receipt of payment answer no quote you have been scammed call your bank and stop payment the manager did imply we could but another ticket while my wife tried calling our bank i thought hang on wait i called qantas customer service and asked for eddie no problem eddie asks how i can help he was stunned he says tell them to look at their screen jal manager says no its fake and walks away from me his name he would not show us but it was not japanese he was in his mids and the name sounded like isuze with a mideuropean accent i call eddie again he says this is crazy ask him to get on the phone with me at this point sometime later the manager is now trying to avoid me i call to him in front of everyone and in a very calm respectful tone please speak to eddie from qantas here is the phone eddie says to tell you all you have to do is look at your screen he still refuses to talk with eddie well well the manager looks at the screen and guess what our tickets were there all along no apology nothing thank you qantas thank you eddie jal if this is the quality of your management you have problems big problems and by the way the flight was fine

just got back from europe after a very disappointing business class experience cabin and ground staff were rude and unhelpful western food options inflight were very low quality compared to japanese meal options flew on a and seat was very uncomfortable not able to fully recline seat into a flat bed and was very claustrophobic business class lounge at haneda airport has very limited food options and no showers after a hour flight and then another hours to come being able to have a shower during a layover is very important and all jal had was a small change room also no shops open i the transit area at haneda so not able to do any duty free shopping wont be travelling jal again

japanese corporate websites are notoriously bad but japan airlines is the worse it is impossible to know if your flight has been booked or not the customer service phone line often rings busy and then when you get it you are on hold until the line hangs up i do not ever want to fly japan airines if i can avoid it

except for having trouble getting in contact with them a few months ago when one of our flight connection wasnt going to work and we did get it sorted we have no complaints we got updates via emails while away and no changes were made service was good both planes and staff so for us we were perfectly satisfied with jal
very bad experience with customer service i called in days and when they re route me to the department always nobody pick up this was in the span of days of hours just calling them

i would not understand why the hr flight will be using regional business seat as instead of sky suite we fly business class long haul for more privacy and a good sleep the japan australia routes should never be regional

a transfer flight via nrt to lax and its cost more than usuall about and their service sucks extremely terrible inflight service the flight attendence keeps knocking restroom door endlessly during you use it and shout loudly even you ask them to wait never experience this terrible service in other airline the headphone in seat is half opened the drinks during the flight is only offered once unlike some other airlines will ask you if you need refill they dont have bilingual annoucnement at laxjust in japanese how can a international flight dont have board cast in multiple languages and you almost can not find their customer service like they dont exist at all tried phone email none reply

i couldnt fid my reservation when i tried to manage my booking or even check in online so i called the airline customer service contact and was on hold for hours one time and hours another time with please wait for the next available agent they could have saved us time by saying there are no agents available instead what a waste of time and with no indication if i was flying or not the next day inflight service and food was very good but the website and customer service are both nonexistent and useless
great service and michelin grade food most important the toilet is clean even though i could have chosen a direct flight from hkg with other airlines i would rather fly with jal best airline

my wife and i choose jal business class night flight from bangkok to tokyo haneda airport because we expect to have good service and some good rest we found the configuration business class seat of jal boeing is quite unexpected the seat configuration is which make the seat not so large we can not make flat bed but rather tilted bed which make us unable to sleep otherwise the service was good and the food was nice we do hope that jal may make some change regarding business seat

first experience flying with jal and it was great the food was good seats were comfortable with plenty of leg room plenty of free luggage allowance too xkgcabin bag movie selection offered something for everyone best part about them though is their staff unbelievably helpful always polite and always keen to go above and beyond to help when my travel agent messed up my flights and left me stranded in sydney on my way back jal were the ones to help me find another flight for free even though they had done nothing wrong as quickly as possible top airline all around
i traveled with infant and service which they provided was above and beyond i would recommend japan airlines for traveling with infant

worst airlines ever staff wasnt bad but the food unbearable and for a hour flight to narita it was just embarrassing you want to call customer service impossible i spent three hours on hold and nothing and then spent another hours on hold and still nothing other than please wait for the next available agent this company will never get my business again or anyone i talk to

the check in crew at klia gave confusing information they insist all pass including transit only ones need to have mysos app on the phone to board the guy said this would be checked at gate he also said we needed evisa for transit but another crew told him not to bother nobody checked mysos for transit pass however we and many others at klia had to download the app and fill out the info it requested that took about one extra hour to do jal should retrain the klia local staff cabin crew plane and amenities were great on the plane at nrt we required some first aid and ground staff there took good care of us we had to take another flight which they arranged later that day they were courteous and in view of the pandemic everyone wanted to be extra careful for airline

do your homework as to what an airline is expecting you to do prior to international boarding with health requirements as the rules change constantly also may i recommend you try to have at least a hour layover for an international connecting flight my travel was economy class from bostontokyosingapore and was pleasantly surprised with my overall experience even though the bostontokyo flight departed an hour later due to a passengers health issue jals staff was efficient and kept us informed on a regular basis as a matter of fact they were efficient all through the booking process through to departure my connecting flight to singapore was also delayed and i was able to arrive safely

wow i booked a trip with this company thru expediataap there was no warning that there is no solo travel right now in japan went to get a refund for he i spent no deal they will not give me a refund what kind of scum bag company is this do not use this company

for over years my family and i have flown the aajapan route from dallas to ho chi minh city and we always had a pleasant experience we would book directly with japan airlines however recently this week my parents misread their ticket for pm instead of am when they showed up to the airport they found out that they had missed their flight completely understandable it was their fault that they misread it when they went to the ticket counter for japan airlines at tan son nhat international airport they people there told them that there is nothing that they could do about them missing their flight they would either need to buy a completely brand new ticket or call up whoever they bought the ticket from i explained to them that we bought it from japan airlines they said there is nothing they could do at this time my parents are stuck in vietnam and i am in dallas so i waited for the customer service line to open and called them immediately when i explained to the representative he basically told me that their policies state that since my parents miss their flight they lost their value and they would have to buy a brand new ticket for k each i asked them if there is anything that they could do to help because we do not have k to spend immediately to get my parents back they told me word for word well if you want to get them back to america then you have to pay k completely heartless i understand your policies but i was asking for help because it was something that we could not afford i do not know the average persons affordability but for my family we do not have k to simple drop in a moment i can say without a doubt we will never miss a flight again or ever do any service with japan airlines there are plenty of other airlines out there who will make a connection to asia if i have to eat less to save more money to fly another airline i definitely would i called singapore airlines and they were able to help quickly and reasonably thank you singapore airlines

hi japan airlines i would like to share my appreciation for your ticketing agent tomoko i wish i had a better photo of her or it would have been better if i had a photo with her i also hope i got her name correctly tomoko was the agent who attended to me in lax fri at around pm pacific time for the jl flight to manila philippines she was most efficient and demonstrated outstanding customer service she was very genuine in ensuring that i am able to get on that flight and get back home safely to my family i hope this message reaches you tomoko you are so excellent in what you do helping jal customers thank you again for being so awesome i would also like to commend jals inflight wifi i had some work to complete and was able to do so with onboard internet thanks again for the great end to end service i had a great flight back home greatcustomerexperiences jal

jal maybe a great airline but if you are flying in their socalled premium economy avoid it bad food bad seating entertaiment was a joke and impossible to sleep i would be better fly emirates and fly economy instead of this even tough its far i would not fly with jal in this class again unless i fly for hell

if you actually manage to get onto a flight that has not changed or been cancelled then well done the service onboard is one of the best in the air however if you are one of the countless victims of jals flight changing cancellations or worse you need to contact the call center then it is one of the worst customer experience you will have i had flights to tokyo and then a domestic connection within japan out of the blue i receive an unclear email that states the flights have changed the departure time and date are the same but the arrival times on a direct flight have changed and the connections are now misaligned leaving me stuck the website was not functioning properly and so i was forced to call the call centre during the slim daily window in which they operate this is where the issues started nobody ever answers unfortunately due to the fact that i had a meeting i had to abandon my attempt and getting any information after a mere minutes in the call center queue listening to the same loop of music and the same condescending voice all of our agents are busy please wait for the next available agent or call back later the really galling part is every so often i hear a beep on the line where somebody is there but not answering even though i travel to japan regularly i will really think long and hard before ever choosing jal again they really have let themselves down with their appalling customer service no callback service no estimated wait time nothing

jal threw my autistic daughter and wife off the flight after screaming at her to shut up when she didnt want to wear a seatbelt and are currently refusing to pay the legally required compensation their uk help line requires about hours of being on hold each time you call and you end up needing to wait for a callback even for the simplest thing

i flew from london heathrow to tokyo haneda due to the closure of russian airspace the flight was slightly longer than usual but even this hour flight was surprisingly pleasant thanks to japan airliness incredible service food and entertainment i am a regular customer with jal and never have i been disappointed the crew were professional polite and helpful the food was more delicious than youd expect from an economy class product on a flight and the selection of entertainment was more than enough to keep you entertained for the flight two full meals and two snacks ice cream and dorayaki this seems to be standard on japan airlines on the other hand the seats are quite firm and perhaps a bit uncomfortable to move around in on a hour flight jal appears to use the same seats on its longest international flights as well as its shorter domestic flightsplenty of legroom though and seats are very wide recline is also somewhat good id definitely recommend japan airlines to you if youre travelling from europe to japan compared to ba and ana that ive also flown with to japan jal seems to be the best in economy class

jal has changed my trip without any notice and i could not check any changes on their website my husband had to call on jal call center to get the latest flight information jal gave us a hour layover in vancouver airport instead of hours as before and also another transit airport between halifax and vancouver with more than waiting hours in toronto the call center guy of jal in north america also has a very negative attitude when checking flights or options for us he asked me to call westjet to check and changed flights instead of working himself however we are not wetjets customers we pay the whole trip money to jal the call center guy told me that how do i know if i do not try to call westjet after calling him i did call westjet but wetjet could not help and asked me to contact jal again i did fly with my international airlines but its the first time i had a very negative experience i had with jal i would not recommend this airline to anyone its my honest review for jal

the zipair assistant changed our ticket to thailand instead of vietnam and told us where we could buy a new one to our original destination we got stuck in the airport because i need a visa to get out of the airport we ended up buying another tickets coming back from thailand and getting stuck in the airport for hours we couldnt fly t another country because nobody accepts passengers from a cheap airline like zipair neveeeeeer fly with this airline its a waste of time and money they ignore your emails and calls and dont care if they made a mistake they just want your money

how times and airlines have changed a few years ago jal was our favourite international airline we are booked on a jal premium economy return flight from sydney to paris in a few weeks which requires a hour overnight layover at the haneda airport hotel airside this was the only connection available we started to get concerned when we read that due to covid japan was not issuing any tourist visas unless in a group or even transit visas the japanese consulate in australia has confirmed this is the case and as we must pass immigration to get to the airport hotel metres away we will be denied entry into japan so what to do some travellers suggest sleeping in the airport waiting area some banks of seats have no arms so stretch out they say however that definitely wasnt an attractive or an acceptable option we are way past sleeping on airport benches or floors notwithstanding we now understand that a new development is airport staff are now shutting down the airport late at night again due to covid concerns and kick everyone out to where cant enter japan cant stay at the airport cant go back to the plane as most jal customers know and despite japans customary politeness and civility etc the airlines customer service is practically nonexistent certainly there is no capacity to email the airline i waited two hours on the phone only to be addressed by someone who didnt want to be there and had absolutely no interest in the issues i was trying to resolve i achieved nothing and was left with a feeling that the airline was happy to keep my flight payments knowing full well that i would be left in nomans land at haneda airport unable to go anywhere bottom line is that in my view jals behaviour has been unconscionable the airline hasnt even had the decency to contact us and no doubt all the other transit passengers on the flight and offer alternatives i will cancel my flight and fight the a for people cancellation fee that jal will impose it is clear that jal has little interest in the current unsolvable issue their only flight connection has created for its transit passengers

we had our tickets booked from new delhi to los angeles on the airlines for th august via make my trip the airline cancelled the flight and refused to accommodate any request for an exchange from mumbai to los angeles on the same date very poor service and compliance this was less than one month before travel

japan airlines is the worst airline that i have ever attempted to work with i booked tickets for my honeymoon with jal they cancelled one leg of a leg journey and refused to transfer me to the other flight that worked with the existing itinerary the only option they provided was for me to depart hours earlier still arriving on the same day due to the horrible layovers with their alternative itinerary obviously i chose to cancel the flight and booked another trip with singapore air at time of cancellation they told me id be receiving a full refund months later im still waiting on my refund while writing this im hours into waiting on hold on their customer service line so that i can figure out when theyre going to return my captive as far as i can tell sitting on hold is the only way to get in contact with jal i have and will continue to advise everyone i know to avoid this airline like the plague andrew bitzko

i took the early morning am flight from bangkok to tokyo narita i arrived at the airport at around am before check in opened at am i lined up for the first class check in line based on oneworld emerald status eventhough i was booked in business class the line was not moving as the first passenger in line seemed to have a complicated issue that took a lot of time so one of the business class counters took over checking in those in the first class line i had reserved seat a which is a window seat in the first row of business class on check in i was told the seat had a problem with the partition between the window seat and the aisle seat and that it could not move up all the way as the flight was pretty full and i was pretty sure all the window seats were taken already i said i was fine with my seat business and first passengers can use the priority lane security entrance on the main floor and did not have to go up one floor to go through security like the other passengers i was quickly past security and passport control and in the sakura lounge at suvarnabhumi airport instead of the usual self serve buffet sakura lounge is now on an order system where you go up to staff and order your food items or drinks at the meal counter you could order chicken curry donburi set sausage and egg set salad corn soup japanese gozen or fried chicken more than enough food and plenty of choices for breakfast service as usual for jal was very efficient there is a lot of seating in the lounge and plastic dividers have been placed between seats for covid protection the flight boarded on time on boarding i discovered the partition between my seat and seat b was completely taped down in the open position so that there was no privacy at all from seat b i went up to the purser to mention this as it was a different situation than checkin had explained to me after checking briefly the purser came back to me to offer a seat in first class instead since this flight did have a small first class section with seats and there was a single unoccupied seat business class is configured xx and first class is configured xx the first class seat was much more spacious than the business class seat with neat storage compartments all around the seat and a foot rest that could double as a second seat for a companion to have a join meal in the seat the first class seat had beautiful wood trim all around a very large video screen and a shelf under the video monitor that can move toward the seat as a large table there is also ample storage space under the food rest for a carry on bag on this medium haul flight the toiletries bag and menu were the same in first and business class and only the blanket was different with first having a warmer textured blanket service as always on jal was excellent lunch was served during the flight and i selected the japanese meal with the bento box of various starters followed by soup rice and the duo of mains of grilled flatfish miso yuan style and grilled pork saikyo style it was delicious filling and visually extremely appealing i have always enjoyed my jal flights and this one was no exception an upgraded super comfortable wide seat excellent food and service another great flight experience

i definitely expected a lot more from jal my mom was on the flight from ny jfk to seoul skorea and had the connection in haneda jal canceled the flight without any reason no weather or problem with the plane and let my mom know at the boarding gate she checked in her bags already and was waiting for her flight and was notified that her connecting flight was canceled and the one that they booked for her was now hours overnight stay at the airport when i got on the phone with customer service they told me the flight was canceled days ago but they did not send us any email regarding the changes to the flight they refused to get her any hotel or meal to compensate for the changes to the flight my mom is years old does not speak japanese or english and is now stuck at the airport for hours without any help from the airline absolutely ridiculous experience and will never take jal ever again

jal is usually one of the best airlines in the world ive flown several times in business and also first class wonderful but now after flying a round trip with them to jakarta and back i wouldnt be very excited to fly them until japan changes its quarantine rules for tourists every single jal flight was delayed both to and from usa and to and from asia this isnt really jals fault the japanese govt isnt allowing jal to leave a single passenger in narita overnight so if even one connecting flight from jfkordlaxsfosanseayvrdfw is delayed then all of the connections to bkkcgksinkulmnlhan are delayed so that every single passenger gets on their connecting flight same thing on the way back to usa my delays were sfonrt min delay nrtcgk hours delay cgknrt not delayed nrtsfo hour delay causing me to miss my connection from sfo to jfk in addition the intraasia flights on the features slanted beds in business class not flat which is not competetive with the other airlines garuda singapore air malaysia air cathay ana lastly jal weirdly serves only a tiny snack after take off on the hour flight cgknrt which departs at am hours into the flight the main meal is served i hadnt eaten anything before the flight because i like everyone else on the plane right got up at am got to the airport about am went through immigration and customs etc before boarding at am when were we expected to eat i wish id have known this ahead of time ummmm also i tried calling jals usa number at least times before the trip began and busy busy busy busy ridiculous pro seat and food on in business class on the er for sfonrt and return was excellent

my first flight from del to haneda was with economy class it was very uncomfortable no leg space at all food was japanese style and very limited the service wasnt the best as well when i landed in haneda i asked to upgrade to economy seat with more leg room for my next flight first of all the language barrier is a huge issue i have been told all leg room seats are reserved and i had no choice to pay more for economy premium the seats in economy premium are okay i cant say they are that comfortable but i got enough leg space you also get a small bag with some goodies for the rest of your flight food was okay not better than regular economy my main issue was that i saw a lot of unreserved leg room seats in economy so i dont understand why i was been told that they are sold out my experience with ana was definitely much better

i cant say enough obout this airline after getting canceled and ran around by delta we finally got rebooked on jal going from seattle to manila their economy seats are better than delta premium comfort the food is better i wish id known about jal prior ill use jal anytime i get the opportunity they earned my money with their customer service and amenities thank you jal this should be the industry standard finally a company that actually cares about their customers on my connection to another airline they had a rep to personally escort us to the next flight so we wouldnt miss it amazing service even if it is more expensive its worth every penny

tried to get a hold of customer service by phone for three days straight to make changes with my flight after booking online with no luck as far as the the flights themselves that i had i had a great experience with the cleanliness of the plan the service received from the flight attendants and the food that was served was much better than most other airlines i have had better entertainment choice on other airline flying similar routes in the air star experience on the ground star experience

flown to japan round trip with my wife about a dozen times using jal pretty consistently good service food overall experience in this regard on this last return flight to san diego the vast majority of travelers were foreigners non japanese upon landing the head flight attendant walked around and personally thanked the handful of japanese travelers including my wife but no one else she spoke japanese which i understand i thought that an odd business practice and one which id guess did not escape notice by other nonjapanese as well again overall service was satisfactory but i think the time has come to retire this business practice poor judgement in my opinion
bad customer service not able to help much please dont use them if need any customer service cannot communicate in english

my parents and i are on vacation to attend my brothers graduation in canada we are now required to look for alternatives on our own because jal cancelled our flight to malaysia a couple of days prior to our flight due to it being an overnight transit they are not assisting with alternatives and the only compensation they offer is a refund which is not immediate please purchase your flight tickets with caution do not purchase any flights with longovernight transit through japan and do not purchase with jal unless you are absolutely sure the purchase does not require you to reach out for jals customer service in any way also i am uncertain as to why the lady who called needed to ask for my family members names even the one who isnt flying but just in case the information is going to be used for malicious intentions i have gone through the trouble of recording the second half of our phone call in case nobody was recording it

after hours of calling their customer service i was not connected to a customer representative their website does not allow changing ticket horrible airline pay few hundred dollar more to flight with another airline will save you lots of time and work

my trip to jakarta had flights service and the flight attendants were uniformly excellent although their english skills were limited first time that ive found that limitation on a bilingual flight the film offerings were few and rarely tempting on the first flight had i been a tall size woman the seating area would have felt cramped but it was private and the seat reclined well on the second leg however the seat was not private but more like a reclining economy seat the major problem was the seat itself fully reclined it was like lying on a slant board my feet almost on the ground uncomfortable to say the least bad for circulation on both flights the design was not thought through with little perching space for personal items and food service at the same time i was spoiled by my turkish airline business class experience last year
maha at japan airlines at dfw was able to easily switch me to another flight they anticipated what i need and i appreciate that so much

japan airlines has good cabin crew but other than that good luck to you if something goes wrong with your booking their customer service is nonexistent all you get is a busy tone and people at the ticketing gate are the worst no compassion whatsoever one lady from their group tried to help me and only because she felt bad because i am traveling with a baby they dont smile at all i got left behind because the ticket number that my infant was assigned to was incorrect it was an easy fix to think about it because it was a lap infant ticket but i was left behind with my kids and worst is that i got stranded on my second leg meaning i had to buy tickets to get back home i have kids with me a five yo and a yo they are so heartless even if it was purchased thru a rd party booker they should still help or atleast try to help their passengers because it is still their product never flying jal ever again love their cabin crew but other than that its a rating of zero it was a nightmare one of the worst days of my lifethanks to japan airlines

lack of customer responsibility unethical opposite of what japan is known for i was not able to fly from seattle to malaysia because i have hours layover and i was not allowed to go to and i was not given any notice about i tried calling emailing and all kinds of ways to reach them and i had no answers weeks before my flight they just hang up the phone each time called narita airport and they said i was good to go when i got to seattle they do not let me board the plane and do not help me get another their staff were rude and was yelling at me like it was my mistake i hope this airline get shut down some day

where do i start customer service is awful from inquiries to checkin i cant tell if its communication barrier rudeness lack of confidence with employees to communicate properly with customers or they just dont care plane i dont understand how jal was rated a star airlines in all categories this should be a star airlines toothpicks were all around my seat area my seat area was dirty uncleaned jal prides itself on cleaniness its far from it i will advise that you get your personal clorox wipes handy headphone jack was screwed up i literally had to use books to support the headphone plugin to watch movies usb port was nonfunctional in my seat location to be honest once i observed the attitudes the communication experience with jal employees i simply ignored everything around me including the flight attendants and more focused on getting to my destination home never will i make a mistake to book with this airline food it was pathetic a joke for business class i watched some youtube videos before making a reservation the talk of food flight experience seems stellar be careful about recommendations of those youtubers wait till you have the real experience it was awful lounge the sakura lounge at narita airport was decent clean some food options the meal i ordered was ok the corn soup was good i didnt interact much with the lounge staff due to covid protocols but i did say thank you in japanese most responded politely however the lounge experience doesnt transfer to the inflight experience overall an awful experience for my roundtrip flight

covid significantly changes various aspects in our lives i understand that businesses are in the process of recovering from the impact of covid however it does not mean that an airline can create an itinerary that customer absolutely cant travel and push all responsibilities over to booking agents my family and i booked a flight to travel from jfk to sgn japan airline offers flights from jfk to nrt then from hnd to sgn we went with jal instead of ana because of shorter layover less than hr before departing we received a courtesy call telling us that we must cancel this flight and work with our book agent for a different path because of the covid restrictions in japan we had asked for assistance since we had contacted jal in the past and none of the calls were successful the average wait time is hrs theres no call back options our agent tried to contact jal but waiting from pm to pm and never got a response when we arrived at the airport the staffs completely ignored us and others who are on the same boat we had to go back to our agent to book a flight for the next day in such challenging period working together to find a solution is much more effective than denying responsibility selling a flight that no one could possibly fly is unethical a reasonable person would believe in the airlines arrangements while preparing necessary documents such as proof of negative pcr result in response to the current environment that we are in its the airline responsibility to offer fly itinerary that would take their customers to where they need to be

bought a rt ticket for my mother but the returning flight was cancelled and changed by jalfrom less than hour trip to hours trip i called jal their unwillingness to help really frustrated us they basically want their customer to just deal with it wait in the airport for hours cant go out to stay in the hotel and no resting area in the airport they let their customer to purchase tickets online and then subsequently cancelchange the flightsbe careful with jal yes they offered the refund for the returning flight but its less than or what i paid is not even enough to cover the oneway ticket if i were to know this id never purchased jal

i have not travelled yet but i already have bad experience with flight change two days ago i received cancellation email for frankfurt to narita leg of the flight from helsinki to sydney they moved me to the earlier date effectively killing the helsinki to frankfurt leg so change of flight was done with disregard to my itinerary worst thing is helsinki to frankfurt leg being operated by finnair but still booked through jal and paid for later they moved haneda to sydney leg for later day increasing our layover by hours and one more thing change the terminal from narita to haneda seems not possible with current government regulations but the system let that booking through so looks like we are in trouble now have to ask for refund for return to sydney flight two hours on hold calling the australian contact number still not getting through what a nightmare

i reserved a day round trip with jal but missed some connections on the first leg of the trip and had to book a flight with another carrier to get to jakarta days later i showed up for my flight home stood in line for an hour only to be told that because i didnt board those earlier flights jal had canceled my reservation without any notice and without any refund and resold my seat to someone else all the while jal continued to send me email notifications about my upcoming flight even as i was being told by their employees that i was booted jal does not allow online checkin at least not with international flights during covid so without any notification from jal there was no way for me to know i would be stranded in jakarta i submitted a complaint to the company on the website but never received any response i picked jal for my trip because they have a lot of glowing reviews but this was such a rotten experience i will never recommend them to anyone and if at all possible will avoid booking with them in the future

the flight my husband and i took from haneda in april were filled with four or five families with kids infants or teenagers which was usually a bad sign here is a list of the pet peeves we had on this flight journey have you checked which seat you are going to occupy properly we reserved isle seats for both of us my husband to be seated in the seat in front of me in the row c and myself behind him when we arrived at the seats my husband noticed that his seat was already occupied by someone else who was seated with his families and had to tell this guy that he was occupying my husbands seat in error this family guy moved to the window seat and my husband was seated in the designated isle seat some people just assume where they are sitting but there are always some people who reserve certain seats for reasons mind your kids and their behaviour looking at three seats in deg on the same number row across the isle from my seat c were occupied by a woman with two infants they were the main cause of the nightmare on the entire journey two daughters who were assumingly and years old were either bawling or screaming constantly the noise got worse with seat tray banging and lamp flickering by the kids and their mother had no intention of controlling their behaviour they also trashed around their food debris and litters constantly on the floor did anyone see the amount of rubbish they produced for the entire flight journey at one point i saw the woman changing one of the kids nappies on the seat another time she was checking the content of the nappy by pulling down the pants of the daughters while food was being served be considerate to other fellow passengers my husbands sleep was constantly disturbed by a family of five who were seated next to him occupying over two rows of seats who often kept walking back and forth to get snacks situated at the breakout area the father figure of the family tried to cross over my husbands legs while he was asleep unfortunately he wasnt slim enough to squeeze himself out of the narrow space left and knocking off the a bottle of water left in the seat pocket situated at my husbands seat hence waking him up with a loud din opt out of codeshare flight it seems that the flight we took from hnd to lhr was a codeshare flight with ba though we originally purchased the option with jal only so in a way we ended up paying more than these ba passengers would have paid i personally have never had good experience with codeshare flight with ba and this flight has proved it once again the speed of serving airline food is it necessary that the passengers simply get fed with airline food in a hurried manner with less than minutes when we get served with a main meal a pot of ice cream gets served at the same time why for someone who has delicate digestive system consuming ice cream straight after the main meal does cause an issue but i do like ice cream and can only indulge myself in this when i do have good appetite mostly i dont
