especially prior to the flight so i tend to skip it nowadays but i really would like jal to stop feeding passengers like a herd of cattle the level of service during the pandemic and post pandemic i was fortunate enough to fly back to japan once with jal during the pandemic outbreak before the lockdown and more tight restriction on the overseas travelling and on that flight there were just about passengers on board we in the economy class were treated almost like vips and cabin attendants were so attentive and even thanked each passenger for choosing jal to travel on this codeshare flight back to the lhr i felt being part of cattle class having to put up with noise smells and litters on the entire flight journey i am sure there are many reasons or occasions why kids have to accompany their parents on the flight journeys but when they do i urge the parents to take care of their kids so as not to cause any nuisance or disturbances to other passengers i also feel that airlines should manage better seat allocation befitting each flight situation for instance families with small kids should be seated in family friendly allocated seat location and other passengers can choose seats away from them if they wish

booked a flight with a layover at tokyo jal cancelled the last leg of the trip and put us on a flight that leave tokyo on the next day then they called us two days before the trip and told us we cant stay overnight at the tokyo airport due to covid restriction but they were the one who cancelled our flight and put us on a flight that leaves the next day our initial booking does not have an overnight layover told us theres no other alternatives and does not respond to refund request and does not pick up the phone worst airline ever

i booked a trip to london about a month ago to fly out in july with japan airlines never flown with them before but figured id give them a shot two nights ago they emailed me saying theyve cancelled my flights for no reason and put me on a different flight i tried calling their contact line the next day after five hours of being on hold the call disconnected times finally got through they couldnt give me a reason for the cancellation told me the only flight i can get will cut my trip short days and add another h of travel and layover each way or my other option was a refund minus tax to be in my account in months refused to give me paper trail of the refund request i just have to trust it will show up in weeks do not fly with japan airlines

i booked two business class seats in september for travel in june sydney to london return in april jal informed me that two of the legs were now cancelled they offered no alternative for one of the legs and the other leg they offered a connecting flight days after the first leg go figure in the end i had to cancel my flights and rebook with another airline at greater cost i will never use jal again having spoken to others it appears this is common practice with jal beware what was once a premium airline is no more

after two failed attempts at the start of covid to fly with jal i finally was able to do this trip in business class i can say it was well worth the wait i have flown other oneworld partners but i have to say that jal is my favourite and it will be my first choice when i fly again in the future the friendly and attentive service from the flight attendants was exceptional and their attention to detail was no exception you can see the pride in each and every jal representative i would highly recommended their business class product when travelling long haul thank you for a wonderful experience

still no response despite posting on very public social media sites they obviously dont care about their customers lets show them by avoiding them in the future terrible airline wheres my refund jal cancelled one of my business class return flights from sydney to london and now say i have to wait weeks for a refund wtf never again will i book this airline no wonder they went bust years ago

we booked business class to london with jal despite a long wait for a connection in tokyo with one week before departure they cancelled one of our return flights which resulted in us having to totally cancel our plans now they are making us wait weeks for our refund which means we cannot fly anywhere until we get our money back the entire exercise has been a waste of time and i hate to think how they treat their economy passengers i cannot recommend jal to anyone its not surprising they went bust years ago theyre heading the same way again
very polite staff everything was organized nice food lots of options for drink knowledgeable crew

for several days now i have been trying to reach jal customer service to amend my return travel dates but have not succeeded i called on different days and at different times on every occasion i was put on hold by the recorder for almost hours and i was so frustrated and angry that i couldnt wait any longer i am a skyteam member and i chose jal from many other carriers thinking that they are major airlines with customer service awareness and reliable aftersales support however it seems that i was totally wrong disappointed nerve breaking and made a bad choice in flying jal i would not recommend jal to anyone with a flexible flying schedule as they will be disappointed as i was

this is the least trustworthy airline or company for that matter that i have ever had the misfortune of using i have been on the phone a total now of ten hours on hold to get a refund for the ticket japan airlines canceled they canceled the flight i did not when i finally got through to them the representative i spoke with told me she didnt know how to process a refund and said another representative would call me back i was called back late in the evening did not pick up and so received a voicemail this is japan airlines we will only call you this once you will have to call us back to find out about your refund they still have my money i still have no ticket do not travel with japan airlines

they dont have any option of india meal if you flying from india you should have indian meal even in narita tokiyo airport i dont not find a burger or sandwich all the choices they have japnese i am not expecting for india food not a even international foor burger piza and sandwich i never use their services again and recomend any international pessangers to visit there because they dont have to any option to eat i dont eat any thing in flight and also nothing to eat in the airport thats totally bad experience

extremely rude and unpleasant staff in narita airport i have a ridiculous hour layover no one was willing to help me or offer me vouchers a hotel stay or to change my ticket the woman helping me named kobayashi took my ticket and refused to return it to me she rudely handed me a blank sheet of paper when i asked for an official form stating jals policy or lack of regarding long layovers she mocked me in japanese to her colleagues she was extremely rude i never want to fly jal again with staff like this

i have been to japan three times on jal always lax to kix in business class and have always found the service both on the ground and in the air and the food to be really great the seats were comfortable and the in flight entertainment always had something worth watching and things were clean and orderly

i never thought that this company would leave my son abandoned in an airport for more than hours no sleep no food not a single bottle of water a shame where is the fame of japanese companies warning in case you are looking for a flight to japan a disaster

three days in a row ive called jal customer service and failed to connected today i waited minutes and then it seemed to pick up but call ended also no response from online message sent through jals contact us tab

photos of in flight meals and menu lounge food posted separately i transited in narita to fly to bangkok on japan airlines as my incoming flight to narita was early i had time to use the first class lounge in the main terminal the only jal lounge open at narita it did mean a bit of a walk each way as my arriving flight and my departing flight were both in the satellite terminal the lounge has lots of seating and a large eating area on the second floor of the lounge food is now ordered by scanning a qr code at each table and is quickly delivered to your seat all the tables have every other seat blocked and the counter seats have plastic dividers between seats for pandemic safety and distancing i ordered some salmon fusilli and steamed vegetables and each was delivered to my seat beautifully plated on a huge plate on an even larger platter i also ordered some of the trademark made to order sushi from the sushi counter where you can see sushi chefs making sushi and again the sushi plate was delivered on a large platter therefore just three dishes and i was running out of room on my table already all of the food was delicious i boarded my flight to bangkok on schedule the flight is operated with a b dreamliner and was about half full in business class seats are configured xx with seats staggered slightly so window seats have direct aisle access as well there is a lot of larger and smaller shelf space on two sides of the window seat so lots of places to put laptoptablet phones glasses drinks the seat converts to a fully flat bed and was comfortable and quite spacious in bed position on this flight unlike the flight from vancouver to narita also operated with the same kind of plane the front toilet was not blocked for use by flight and cabin crew so there were toilets available for use by business class passengers the flight was an evening flight scheduled for hours minutes but in reality about hours long so instead of a full toiletries case as is provided on full long haul flights a small cloth pouch was provided with the basics toothbrush eye mask ear plugs and moisture mask a unique jal feature where you wear it over your mouth and nose and insert in wet sheets to increase moisture in the air you breathe service on the flight was exceptional cabin crew always took time to say a few extra words that created an exceptionally friendly environment jal service is always excellent but on this particular flight the cabin crew took it up another level yet initially there were some issues with the entertainment system and the system on my seat and the empty seat next to me both did not work cabin crew came by a couple of times to help and in the end restarted the whole system to fixed the issue food was divine on the flight as it was catered out of japan not only is the food delicious but it is presented in such a beautiful and refined way that your taste buds already won over when the bento box for appetizers or dish for mains arrives at your seat as always the jal menu includes a page describing the special coffee that is served in business class on that flight this time it was not a favourite as it was a lighter roast with more acidity than i like but nevertheless it is always interesting to see what special coffee would be served on my jal flight the flight arrived about minutes early at around pm i passed through the thailand pass checkpoint and immigration and had picked up my checked luggage by pm and was on board the hotel arranged van enroute to the hotel by midnight the application for the thailand pass process was a bit tricky as the application website is finicky requiring you to upload photos of your passport first night test and go hotel booking required travel insurance vaccination record but with limits on the size of the photo files however once i was able to complete the application and submit it i received the approval and the issuance of the qr code with my thailand pass within hours under the test and go system you must book the first night of arrival at an sh hotel and stay in your room until you receive your negative pcr test result from your arrival test i booked the sukhothai bangkok and they were very helpful with information i needed to deal with my thailand pass application and testing process the test and go program requires you to take hotel provided private transportation from the airport to the hotel i was somewhat surprised by the van that sukhothai bangkok provided to take me to the hotel as it was a decked out blingy vip van with changing color lights on the ceiling like a party van nevertheless it got the job done and i arrived safely at the hotel was quickly taken to a nurse on site from the hospital partner of the hotel to take a swab sample for my arrival pcr test and was in my hotel room by around am less than ¬Ω hour after i landed the whole process was relatively stress free and quick an excellent late evening flight with jal very comfortable well pampered with superb service and delicious food

one of the best airline service i have received the staff really helped me at honolulu helping me to rebook my flight helping me with my bags when i struggle with the kidsalso great in flight staff would definitely fly again

i cannot believe this airline horrible customer service horrific workers please never fly with them i was booked on a flight for june to london from sydney the airline suddenly cancelled the flight and sent us an email to let us know it had been cancelled no information on redirection or refunds were included so we called the airline after waiting on hold for over an hour we got through and the lady on the phone told us we would get a refund in weeks this is not okay they cancelled and then tell us we cannot even have our money back for weeks we need our money to book another flight then after us explaining to her that is not ok and we need the money sooner she hung the phone up on us pathetic absolutely shocked no explanation on the cancellation either this is ridiculous and i will never fly with them again they have lost me as a customer as well the people that i am travelling with

one of the worst flight experience bought the ticket online directly from their website as free of charge change initially we were supposed to fly out of lax on feb th but they didnt check us in because one us didnt have travelers insurance not to mention that was not indicated as a requirement to check in when i purchased the tickets and on top of that didnt even bother notify us of such a requirement prior to the flight anyway after spending couple of hours on the phone trying to purchase the insurance we werent able to do so because insurance companies cant issue the insurance on the same day of the flight so we had to reschedule the flight for first available and that was for days later this caused us losing days of our airbnb and our vacation extra expenses and inconvenience back and forth to lax and another for covid test since the test is good only dir hours not to mention that how rude and inconsiderate their staff are at lax airport anyhow at the end of our trip we decided to extend it for few days but when we went to manila airport they said our return ticket was not changeable and that we had to purchase another ticket if we wanted to stay longer i couldnt even believe that because the round trip ticket was purchased as free of charge change but they said only going to manila was changeable category k and return ticket was not changeable category q its hard to believe that none of this was mentioned on the website when i purchased the ticket and on final confirmation that i received it indicated that ticket was purchased as free of charge on changing and it wasnt specified that applies to only for one way this is by far one of the worst airline experience that we have ever had it was our first time taking japan airline and would certainly be the last time their plane are clean but the service and food is horrible not even worth it
my flights got cancelled twice in months in the last few weeks before departure it now costs me double to fly because of last minutes booking ill never trust them again

i have been flying cathay pacific to hong kong the last couple of years due to the pandemic however since hong kong has a flight ban in place preventing flights from canada and preventing anyone who has been in canada for more than hours in the last days from entering hong kong i flew japan airlines to narita to connect to bangkok and then to wait out the days entry ban before flying on to hong kong flying japan airlines after cathay pacific was quite an upgrade the service is much better and the food is also superior check in opens hours before the flight and i arrived at around am shortly after check in opened check in was already very busy and even in the first class line there was a bit of a wait for an available check in counter to become available this may be due to the need to check each persons extensive documents for whatever destination they were travelling to as i was not entering japan i was not required to comply with japans conditions but staff had to check my thailand pass documents and that took about minutes vancouver airport has reopened the d gates entry since there are now increased flights so it was nice not to have to walk all the way over to the domestic flights entry to go through security and then walk back to the international gates security was a bit slow as there was only one security line open japan airlines business class passengers have use of the plaza premium lounge the lounge was not very busy when i entered which was good as i noticed that one section of the lounge which used to have the hot foods station was closed all food is now provided in the former coffee bar section with sandwiches in the refrigerated cabinet and a small selection of hot foods on the side like mie goreng and butter chicken boarding for jal flight was orderly as usual jal operates a b on the route with seats in business class split between a front section with rows and seats and a back section with rows and seats in a xx configuration the seats are staggered so every seat has direct aisle access i love the window seat as in addition to the window it has a large shelf right under the video screen that has enough space to put a small laptop or a tablet and a narrow shelf along the side of the seat to put my phone and glasses the seat is the sky suite which i like quite a bit as it is quite roomy and enclosed by a head level partition which affords a lot of privacy in bed position the seat has great length so my feet did not even need to reach the shelf section under the video screen that is the last section of the seat in bed position shoulder space is also very good as both armrests lower down flat with the seat in bed position although the aisle side armrest is quite hard and not comfortable to rest my arm or elbow on in bed position there is plenty of storage space as in addition to the overhead bin there is a small shelf behind my seat for miscellaneous items and space for a carry on bag under the video screen the tray table pops out from the side of the seat and can swing out so i can exit my seat without putting the table away though requiring a bit of manoeuvring on my part to do so out of the seats in the front section were occupied so it was not too full the seat beside mine was empty so i could keep the partition between my window seat and the aisle seat down unless i wanted more privacy when it is time to sleep cabin crew will help put out the bedding which consists of a thick mattress pad and a light blanket the mattress bed completely eliminates any feel of the ridges in the seat where it folds in seat position and makes for a very comfortable bed to sleep on this flight had the magic entertainment system which is quite an upgrade from earlier jal in flight entertainment systems with a lot more choices of movies in multiple languages from multiple countries service on the flight is as always with jal superb very attentive but discreet and refined everything is done meticulously even a glass is carefully placed with the jal logo facing you toilets are always neat and tidy as the cabin crew are constantly cleaning it after passenger use food is a highlight on jal flights i almost always choose the japanese meal for the appetizer bento box with multiple sections featuring a variety of delectable and beautiful bite sized eats you start enjoying your meal even before you taste it as the presentation is always so beautiful and again meticulous meal service consists of lunchdinner served after take off and then a snack served hours before landing one unique feature of the jal in flight menu is the page describing the special coffee of the month for the flight jal features different specially selected coffees and gives a description with tasting notes as one would normally find with wines throughout the flight cabin crew were constantly going through the cabin looking for any passenger service needs and as soon as i finish a drink or a snack cup noodle cabin crew would very soon after notice this and remove the item the flight arrived more than an hour early passengers are requested to remain in their seat after the plane reached its gate as japan has specific procedures to deboard international transit passengers first before then deboarding passengers who are entering japan and must go through the arrival covid test procedure we lost about half an hour after disembarking from the plane as they had to wait for all transit passengers to be accounted for and they kept counting and counting and could not get to the correct count eventually all the lined up transit passengers were allowed to exit the gate and head to the international transit station once there passing through security was quick and then i was into the departures section and able to go to the lounge to await my connecting flight to bangkok the jal flight is very enjoyable with the service and food being particular highlights arrival and transit procedures at narita airport are orderly and generally very quick and efficient as the japanese are famous for if you have to fly somewhere that jal can fly to you should definitely consider jal for your flight and you do not need to worry about transiting and connecting at narita airport

i flew jal return to and from canada twice in and every person i encountered of their crew was kind and patient while dealing with the numerous issues travelling with covid causes staff both onboard and in the terminal were professional and efficient on my return i also had to rebook my flight within hours of it leaving due to a positive covid diagnosis the customer service representatives were polite and helpful each time i called times this experience has made me want to choose jal every time i fly they also fly pets which is a huge plus

i got delayed due to a blizzard this happens it is out of everyones control but they way they handled my ticket was deplorable i was rebooked onto a very tight connection then of course the first leg was delayed and i missed my connection as soon as the first leg was delayed i asked to be moved to a later connection and was told over and over again that it would be taken care of at the next airport in the air i again asked about it and begged to be given a seat on the next connection snd was told not to worry that someone on the ground would assist we landed and it was about minutes before the next flight and i was ignored by all of the gate agents and ground agents for so long that by the time someone finally looked at what i needed the next connecting flight had already left during the time i could have been making that connection i was helplessly watching the ground agents laugh with each other instead of helping me the next available flight they could book me on was hours later all of my friends flying a different airline ana made it home without any of these issues i will never fly jal again
kudos to all fas keep it up the excellent service staff were all accommodating they make sure to check back on us how our doing

yoday i recieved an email ftom japan airlines that they have preponed our haneda delhi flight to th may the flight now dhall lesve at am on th may i along with my wife are flying from dallas to haneda on th may snd shall reach haneda at hrs as such its not technically possible to catch delhi bound flight on th may i wanted to get in touch with japan airlines on their only customer service number in us ie but no one is lifting the call despite wsiying for even hours no other us number is available on the site surprisingly no email id is given where one can drop an email the phone number given while booking the tickets was of india which is no longer available wonder how jal is going to connect with me airlines should have shown some common sense by preponing both the travel legs even on their website in manage booking the system is throwing error and not displaying any information very poor services

im a frequent flyer and have flown japan air for a number of years thus far was well treated till i checked in for a flight to singapore last dec from dfw the ground staff natsuko k was impatient and rude in handling the process she rejected both of my covid tests without proper verifications one of the tests was a naat test similar to pcr test taken at albertson and the other was a pcr test as well from a recognized clinic here in dfw except that part of the standard form they used was handwritten i even had the medical prof on the call for natsuko to verify the test result but she refused i felt being discriminated against for no reason i was refused boarding and had to go take another covid test thats ridiculous according the med professional at the third clinic those two earlier tests were already valid pcr tests later i called my embassy who told me those tests should be accepted as well apparently she did not seem to be competent for the job even though she claimed to be a ground manager i believe she reports to tomoko t jal you need to review and take adequate action to prevent her from tarnishing the reputation of japan air i actually called jal support few times days before my departure to get more details about the covid test requirements but they have no clue later i decided to take the test twice just to be sure but they were both turned down for no reason

i fly japan airlines across the pacific whenever possible especially eastbound as the times and jet lag effects work well for me crossings in the last years on the same er configured aircraft each time tyolax there are fancier and more private first class seats in the air but the service and food set japan airlines apart and i enjoy the interaction over the multicourse wine paired meals if you are lucky some hibiki yr then ill sleep on a bed prepared just for me when i wake the large bathroom is cleaned after each person i think and i have a light meal and a fruit plate

very comfortable best in class legroom i was really impressed with the quality of service if you arrive when the ticket counter opens in the morning the staff stands in line and bows to greet the customers they are very friendly and went the extra mile to print the documents that i needed upon arrival the food that is offered is delicious they offer japanese staple foods and drinks which i enjoy

dont use gotogate they didnt refund over dollar on october th i bought a roundtrip ticket with japan airlines because the covid prr test views were one hour late i couldnt board the plane call the agent and she gave me one that cant be used no one answered the phone number and no one answered the call on her japan airlines phone in our company she said she could not help me change the ticket and needed japan airlines to help change the ticket now if you mind canceling this ticket buy it again i listen in response to her opinion she bought a roundtrip ticket on october she said that her company is very busy and it takes a few weeks to refund me the ticket on october in midnovember i got the money for a ticket refund its not a roundtrip ticket i called them and its hard to answer the phone today i answered the phone and said that their company needs to cancel the fee us dollars the rest of the money is deducted by the japanese company they asked me to contact japan airlines i called they told japan airlines that they would not deduct customer cancellation fees during the epidemic they asked me to contact the agency and i contacted the agency the agency said they could send me an email to prove that they wanted me to call japan airlines to not deduct the deduction during the epidemic for customers cancellation fees i called japan airlines to ask japan airlines that they changed their terms and said that they had deducted the cancellation fees now they are all playing games with covid the final victim is our consumption you not law asking them cancellation feewhat i will never use japan airlines again i hope gotogate will close down soon i also hope that the government can rectify this blackhearted travel agency

i was really impressed with the quality of service if you arrive when the ticket counter opens in the morning the staff stands in line and bows to greet the customers they are very friendly and went the extra mile to printdocuments which i needed upon arrival the food that is offered is delicious they offer japanese staple foods and drinks which i enjoy not that is impacts the experience but i really love the uniforms they wear the women are dressed in black suits with red and white scarves that look so nice
we were very well served by miss matsumoto and rest of the staff she was very polite and helpful towards my parents and other passengers would recommend

on jal f class today dec from hnd to jfk and honestly i think the dining on jal is simply worth every memory i chose the western meal curated by tokyo quintessence michelin stars chef and it was superb even the bread tasted so different fully cream flavour and excellent texture salon champagne and jyuyondai sake probably brought the experience to another level simply think the experience is just worth the memories for years to come will like to also highlight the great service delivered by both hara and nagano onboard this flight both of them took great care and hospitality throughout the flight ms nagayama on jl sinhnd dec also provided great service and hospitality throughout my flight on the business class

i will never fly jal again long story but brief version the check in people issued us all boarding passes after a very long check in on leaving to departure s they stopped me and took back my boarding passes and covid tests they li said we couldnt fly because our certificates were not complete they were issued by a top level pcr testing lab in tokyo with english translation fully certified they lied and said hk and cathay would not allow us to fly to hk after about an hour of mounting tension and stress i called cathay myself to find out why they blocked us cathay rep said we were all clear to fly to hk and into sydney i gave the phone to jal supervisor they ran around with radios etc boarding time was by then only minutes away luggage still at the counter this had now been over two hours at the jal counter with hungry kids and we were wiped out after months of planning and packing for a complete international move covid complications quarantine vaccines testing relocation planning etc etc this was the only cluster we had after months of meticulous planning with all contingencies forecast except gross incompetence with an airline check in they finally emerged waving four papers we could sign and board now minutes before take off we quickly signed including kids we were totally stressed as our onward plans had multiple things set up including vehicle deliveries lots of accommodations visiting plans for aged sick family in care all teetering on our correct arrival time it turns out the papers were to indemnify jal from us suing them for damages losses etc i quickly read the paper as we were leaving disgusted but too stressed and worried about getting on the plane we left i wrote my concerns the jal got a polite reply and guarantee they would investigate they did but the staff obviously lied again and no remedy offered the report sent had clear omissions and false statements we were deprived of the use of the lounge stressed to the point if melt down yet these clown think its fine i love japan and can say this was the first time in years of living in japan that japanese people lied and lied and lied again to me shame shame shame
one of the better experiences in flying economy class that i have had especially the food that little effort goes along way

hardly speak english very hard to communicate with my daughter was sleeping and was told no good will be served in the flight i till hours later and have to eat at airport lounge i told them i need any sandwiches for my daughter when she wakes up totally ignored my request for my surprise saying sorry nothing we can do really not happy

we booked a flight to thailand through jal for a trip in dec jal cancelled a connecting flight due to covid making the trip impossible offered no alternative so we requested a refund just as they state on their website jal refuses to respond after weeks of requests this is the worst customer service i have ever experienced in my life they take your money do not provide the service promised and just keep your money i will never fly jal again worst company no wonder they needed a government bailout

i cannot thank japan airlines enough for flying me home during covid they are probably the only airline who didnt cancel economy seats to prioritise first class their service was incredible and i would chose them over any other airline

hello i booked the ticket with american airlines and selected my seats early on to ensure i had a comfortable flight when the day came i did not have the seats because the flight was being operated by japan airlines they did not honor my choices and placed me by the bathroom on a hour flight in a half empty plane one i did not appreciate being by a smelly and dirty bathroom especially in times of covid user beware do not book flights to asia with american airlines if they put you on a japan airlines flight odds are you will end up next to a filthysmelly bathroom since you did not book through them to begin with and yes it stunk the whole way i am never buying a japan airlines ticket i wasnt even given the option to pay for an upgrade

extremely disappointed jal is only half of this disappointment i booked my tickets through mytrip and they just kept passing me around jal cancelled my inbound flights less than days before im supposed to depart with no alternative flights provided while i clearly see other flights available online when i search its almost like they want you to cancel and get a refund so youre forced to purchase the more expensive fares the issue is still not resolved but i ended up booking a oneway return which was more expensive than my entire ticket i made sure i booked directly with the airline and not jal it takes at least hours to get to someone on the phone and i made phone calls to them this isnt the first time i booked through an online travel agency with cancelled flights but this is the first time ive had this issue book this airline at your own risk if something goes wrong youre on your own and youre basically throwing your money away unless you buy the refundable fares good luck id stay away from this airline if i were you

had a wonderful experience on jal flying a in premium economy first having sakura lounge access was wonderful for my hour lay over next the flight attendant service was exceptional premiums economy seats are fantastic food and beverages are wonderful again the service is great i hope to fly jal again sooner than later

im a customer who is really upset i bought four return tickets jl from sydneytokyo departure on april through a travel agent called qunar due to the covid situation the flight was canceled and a refund application was made on over one year and a half i spend time communicating with qunar about the update of this refund every time i had the same answer that japan airlines hasnt refund yet and no information can be provided i totally understand there must be a large amount of application to deal with and i was really patient however it has been one year and a half and i really lose patient now im here to confirm with you whether you have refunded but the agent kept the money or the refund has not been dealt with if not i sincerely hope someone in this big company with a reputation fixes this problem i as a consumer have no other way to protect my own interest but hopefully your company can be responsible by the way there is no option in the travel date so just pick up one

while travelling back to the united states i had a flight from fukuoka to tokyo haneda with a connecting international flight with american airlines in tokyo narita my flight was delayed by minutes which left me almost no time to be able to catch the shuttle from haneda to narita when we landed i was paged to meet a representative on the jetway she informed me that jal knew i was in danger of missing my connecting flight due to their delay and escorted me directly to the baggage claim however when my baggage finally arrived we had missed the last shuttle to get to my flight in narita the representative then worked on an alternate method to get me to narita and minutes later they paid a taxi to drive me there a yen trip and i was able to catch my connecting flight instead of staying a night in tokyo they had also informed american airlines of my delay and i was expedited through the american airlines ticket counter to make it to my flight as it was boarding the lengths jal went to ensure i got to my next flight was above and beyond what i would have ever expected and i know for sure i will never receive this level of customer service ever again i wish i wasnt in such a hurry that i could properly show my deep gratitude to the staff

they charged me for extra baggage there were less than people in the flight still extra charges bags of kg each are allowed my bags were kg and kg is a lot i requested but no help not even cent discount

i originally booked my flights through mytrip please avoid this company but unfortunately my flight got cancelled due to covid and i experienced the worst customer service with mytrip when i thought everything was lost i decided to call jal the operating airline of tickets and they solved my problem on the same day from now on i will directly book with the airline company and avoid such agencies the customer service was also really friendly and patient

my girlfriend and me booked two flight tickets from melbourne to germany months before the supposed flight likemany other flights it got cancelled already months before the departure not mytrip or japanairlines sent us any message that the flight got cancelled we only find out by checkingit in the end we did the whole refund process paid extra and were calling them both to three times and japan airlines always said to us we have to talk tomytrip despite the fact that japan airlines were the ones who canceled the flight and mytripcom gave us kind of the same answer so both of the parties are not taking any responsibility and go against there own official guidelines they have written in their website mytrip said it take some timeto process the refund because of covid but we applied for our refund over months ago this is bullying and abusive behaviour and calculating that people get tired to ask for their money back but not with me if someone trying to go against them into court i am happy tojoin cheers willi

when my flight was cancelled due to covid flight restrictions i received a courtesy call from jal informing me of the cancellation and asking whether id like a full refund or credit the refund was in my bank account within days ive flown a lot with jal in the past and will stay loyal to them

i booked my flight literally months in advance the changed absolutely every flight on my itinerary right up to a month before im to depart they cancel the flight from london to glasgow if i want to get there days later it will cost me extra if i just want to get to london and find my own way to glasgow they still wanted to charge me extra so now im days before im to leave the country and my flight has now been cancelled i will now have to wait another weeks to get my money back from them and ive had to book my flight last minute with a totally different company do not book with japan airlines they cant be trusted to get you to your destination no matter how far in advance you book they are less than helpful over the phone making the whole experience a complete nightmare

i booked a flight for my husband and i for january it was part of a trip that involved the uk usa and cruising its now clear that this wont be possible due to covid so i cancelled our flights jal processed my refund promptly but charged a cancellation fee my understanding when i booked was that there would be no cancellation or change fees if the flights were cancelled due to covid restrictions i have tried unsuccessfully to get the rest of my refund via their customer service so i can see that i will need to take my complaint higher other airlines have provided a full refund so i really hope jal will do the right thing i had a put a travel date to submit this review but we have not yet travelled with jal and are not likely to do so unless they honour their free cancellation due to covid commitment

we recently had to book a flight to take our smallest family member to tokyo to have open heart surgery by the top canine cardiologist in the world the people who work at jal were so amazingly kind and understanding they called and checked up on us and invited us to bring sonny by to meet them at their santa monica location once they reopen after covid i felt enveloped in their caring it was on of the hardest times of my life and their kindness will live in my heart forever thank you so very much

jal stands out consistently in one aspect service at dallas airport ground staff actively asked for baggage tag to make sure my luggage will be checked through to tokyo onboard the crews were very hardworking even between meal service they walked around with drinks and snacks and collected garbage they kept toilets really clean they even turned off the personal tv of passengers who have slept to avoid disturbance to passengers because of the light they answered call buttons within seconds on arrival there were always plenty of staff to assist with luggage i have experienced over international airlines and none can reach jals service standard none of them is even close

despite touting free cancellation for covid related issues jal didnt honor this after booking a flight to bangkok for dec i discovered that there is a mandatory period of hotelbound quarantine even for fully vaccinated passengers on my arrival date so i tried canceling the ticket and their staff argued incessantly with me that things could change etc the whole point of my booking early was to set my plans including time away from work and meeting friends in thailand it seems pretty clear to me that this is covidrelated cancellation the last thing i expected from jal was a sleazy interpretation of what they clearly advertise as free cancellation

air travel report march ho chi minh city hcmc viet nam to jacksonville fl usa after being gone for years i just decided it is time to come home and my wife and i made the trek the airlines work together to offer customers an organized coordinated start to finish package itinerary and that is good convenient itinerary hcmc to tokyo japan japan air lines tokyo japan to dallasft worth texas usa japan air lines dallasft worth texas usa to jacksonville fl usa american airlines o flight time hours o total travel time hours japan air lines from hcmc viet nam to tokyo japan and from tokyo japan to dallas tx usa folks ihavenothingbutpraisefor japan air lines every nuance and detail from departure and arrival times to in flight service and attention meals andeventhecoffee were in every way above reproach and commendable american airlines from dallas tx usa to jacksonville fl usa the only good thing i can say about american airlines aa is they did eventually get us to jacksonville fl usa period in the interim though wow international flight passengers must collect their baggage for us two max weight suitcases carryon each carry that baggage everywhere we go and have it rechecked for athe domestic carrier aa and thats fair enough i guess problem dallas airport is huge huge and we had to lug our baggage and carryon from the arrival gate to the farfar away departure gate and thats fair enough too i guess problem aa changedthedeparturegate four times and each time we had to lug our baggage carryons to each new departure gate which were farfar away hundreds of meters from the old departure gate sidebar i am problem without reason or apology aa informed us the flight would depart hours late problem aa personnel wow they were all amiable friendly and talkative to each other but to the customers to the herd their attitude tone and demeanor was disdainful begrudgingly helpful and on the very precipice of being rude problem aa in flight service the inflight service personnel were much like the on ground service personnel the herd the customers was tended and managed with complete indifference and impersonal rote efficiency aa summary aa did get us to our destination beyond that i have nononezero positive comments i energetically do not and will not recommend aa to anyone period

there were only four guests at the business class and four flight attendants each attendant came to say thank you to me and took care of me during the entire flight all of them smiled and they were very professional foods were amazing and wines were wonderful

i booked a ticket from del to dtw with henada airporttokyo in connecting flights after week they told they have change the connecting flights airport in tokyo to some other airport from henada to that airport it was km and also i would require a transit visa since i was living airport with these difficulties and having just hours for connecting flights i asked them to cancel and ask for full refund but they have took cancellation charge which is very frustrating

i was trying to fly to tokyo in june the airline cancelled my flight and said to get a refund go online so i did that and was charged a cancellation fee even though the flight was cancelled i called and talked to a very rude guy saying i should have called and that theyll have to call me back to see if im even eligible no where on the email did it say call and im not supposed to be charged if im asking for a refund on a cancelled flight i wont book with them ever again

i just flew in business class last week from sfo to bangkok there was no linenobody at check in it took a while to check all required documents for travel food and service were very nice the food came with plastic cover they still tried to offer business class experience as best as they can during covid bathroom was cleaned very often i wish the blanket was better it was little too short and not that soft my food did not come with their famous rolls but i asked and they brought couple for me in sealed plastic bag the flight from narita japan to bangkok offered very comfortable seats but i did not like the gift bag on this flight there were airport staffs walked you to the connecting flight as soon as you stepped out of the plane in japan overall it was a good experience traveling during covid

having flown business or combined firstbusiness on alphabetically american british airways air canada cathay pacific klm korean air malaysian airlines singapore thai airlines and united i can authoritatively state that japan airlines is the absolute worst in chronological order here are the problems i experienced on one or both legs of my transpacific journey from north america via tokyo to vietnam in the first class cabin the lieflat seats have huge privacy barriers so if you get stuck with an aisle seat theres no way you can see out of any of the windows as the flight attendants roll up all the visual barriers if youre inclined to feel uncomfortable in a windowless space beware i was given no choice of dinner menu items as the flight attendants let their preferred passengers a group of about suited businessmen traveling together as a group choose their menu selections first there were snack items but no palatable main entree items no slice of chicken or beef or a pasta dish nothing but grotesque looking unnameable seafoodlooking items that i presume are popular among nativeborn japanese the inflight entertainment system for movies etc is an absolute joke think windows or similar operating system with lots of dostype prompts seriously and truthfully the system used on these two aircraft dated back to the year the overall experience inside a jal aircraft is dreary dreary dreary its a good thing that other than wanting a nice filling hot meal i wanted to sleep and got lots of that oh and there was a box of chocolates set out for everyone in first class on a snack tray by the toilets and in that box of chocolates at least or in the box were actually chocolate as opposed to chocolatecovered mystery creme in the name of saving on costs apparently no corner was cut on a happier note the executive lounge inside narita airport is a nice place to wait for your connecting flight luckily though all six count em six showers were occupied when i arrived i was able to book a shower for minutes later enough time to have myself a shower and a shave before rushing out to board my next flight jal seems to thrive on its longstanding relationships with many very large japanese companies who send their salaried employees lucky enough to travel overseas in business or first class

i connected at narita airport for jl from narita to vancouver after passing through security for international transits i had about a hour layover before my flight and so made my way to the only japan airlines lounge that is open at narita the first class lounge on level of the main terminal building of terminal now open for both first class and business class passengers on the way i noticed that the airport was noticeably empty of travellers and even at the duty free shops that are usually full of chinese tourists lining up for purchases there were few customers normally the first class lounge entrance is on the rd floor and you take the elevator inside the entrance to go up to the th floor now you take the escalator outside the closed entrance to the first class lounge on the rd floor go up the escalator to the th floor and enter the first class lounge there from the th floor you can take the elevator inside the lounge to go back down to the rd floor where the shower rooms are located the dining area is on the th floor when i was there from around pm to around pm it was not very busy there were plenty of seats with plastic partitions between counter seats and open tables designated with signs for one person or a couple only there were plenty of staff to assist and as always service is superb attentive lowkeyed the coffee and soft drinks machines are still self serve but all of the food is now served to you by staff and not self serve this applies even to the special kitkat bars for coffee that used to be self serve in jars but are now neatly displayed one to a dish in a glass cabinet and must be served to you by staff behind the counter there were still quite a few items available made to order including sushi from the made to order sushi counter but i thought the food selection was noticeably smaller and more snack like rather than meal like the only meal like items were the trademark japan airlines beef curry which is traditionally available in both the sakura business class lounge and the first class lounge the japanese style breakfast curious offering for late afternoon and the ramen hot snacks to order included soup dumplings chinese xiao long bao and sichuan style mapo tofu the coffee served in the lounge is the same special coffee lines that jal sources from japanese coffee specialist mi cafeto for first and business class on its flights always very enjoyable and flavourful after grabbing a quick bite i then went to the seating area of the lounge the seating area has lots of individual sofa type seats and some counter type seats at the large windows which provide a good view of the adjacent gates and the runway beyond surprisingly the massage chairs in this section of the lounge are still available for use i did not have enough time to use them this trip as they typically have a cycle that runs about or minutes but i have used them in past visits to jal lounges and think they are quite good and enjoyable as far as massage chairs go i arrived at the gate for my flight before boarding time and counted people in the gate area indicating a relatively full flight during pandemic travel restricted times since jal uses a b with seats uncharacteristically for jal boarding was actually delayed for about minutes the announcement indicated airport issues boarding was by rows and as expected from the very orderly japanese people passengers only lined up when their rows were called there was preboarding for wheelchairs and families with young children requiring assistance following which was boarding for first classjal diamondoneworld emerald and then business class there is no first class cabin on jl and i was the only person in the jal diamondoneworld emerald line the flight is operated with a b aircraft with only business class and economy seating in business class the plane is equipped with the jal sky suite in a xx configuration there are seats in business class and about or passengers in business class on my flight the sky suite is a great seat with direct aisle access from every seat fully horizontal flatbed option and an enclosure around your seat that is a little above seated head level for a great deal of privacy i had a window seat at k and the seat beside me was empty as well the two rows of seats behind me so there was plenty of buffer between me and other passengers with direct aisle access the window seats on the flight are a great choice as in addition to greater privacy you can also take advantage of the extra large windows on a b dreamliner note that the sky suite window seats aisle seats and center section seats differ slightly from each other in terms of little storage areas and counters the window seats are particularly good as they have more ledges and counters around the seat to put things on and a storage tray behind the seat headrest for smaller items there is also a storage shelf under the video screen and room for a carry on bag under the shelf on boarding there was a large pillow toiletries bag slippers noise cancelling headphones light blanket and bottle water already placed at the seat surprisingly for cleaning obsessed pandemic times there was also an in flight magazine a duty free shopping magazine and an entertainment program magazine at the seat and actual printed menus were handed out before meal service pushback was similarly minutes delayed but with a short flight time of hrs minutes we were scheduled to arrive early and in fact did land very early at am over an hour earlier than scheduled shortly after take off cabin attendants came around to take drinks and meal orders japan airlines seem to have made minimal changes to in flight dining service the same number of meals in flight the same choices of food and number of courses are offered for a japanese style meal tray with bento box with sections for different appetizers followed by a tray with the main course with rice miso soup and pickles followed by a third tray with coffee and dessert the only difference is that all the containers now have covers that the passengers must remove themselves flight attendants wore masks at all times and wore gloves during meal service i opted for and preordered the japanese meal for dinner and as always it was beautifully presented and if anything even more delicious than on prior flights with jal this might be due to the fewer flights that jal is now operating and it apparently switching to serving what appears to be the same menu on all its flights for similar meals i checked on jals website the menu for jals flights on the same day for other us and european destinations and they appear to all feature the same menu items meal service was completed about ¬Ω hours after take off cabin attendants then offered to put out the new airweave foam mattresses that jal now offers on some long haul overnight flights this was my first experience with the airweave foam mattress it is made of quite thick foam of maybe an inch and i thought it greatly enhanced the comfort of the seat when in flatbed position the sky suite seat has a fairly large video screen jal website indicates in but it is not a touch screen and while there is a separate hand held remote unit the interaction between the control and the screen is awkward they do not mirror each other in flight entertainment for english speakers has never been a strength of jal and so while there was an adequate selection of a few newer movies more older movies and then a handful of movies and tv programs with english subtitles many of the offerings were in japanese only or subtitled in japanese only about ¬Ω hr before landing the second meal service was offered a japanese or western breakfast i tried the western breakfast described as a sweet potato spanish omelette but it in fact came with sausages too not outstanding like the japanese dinner first meal but still good prior to landing the head cabin attendant came by to thank me for flying with jal throughout the flight service was excellent and the cabin crew did an excellent job of keeping the toilets clean arriving at vancouver international airport there was the usual pass through the machines to complete your arrival declaration and then all passengers joined one line for the customs and immigration officers the line was quite long but moved quickly i had downloaded the arrivecan app and filled in and submitted my quarantine plan and health declaration prior to my flight and so passed through very quickly when it was my turn a bit confusingly the customs and immigration officer gave me one handout about quarantine and then as i passed those counters and walked towards the luggage carousels the area was cordoned off in a way that you had to pass an individual who i believe said he was with health canada who then gave you a different handout about the quarantine there was also information which you can access on website links through the arrivecan app but the information from the various sources differed for example the two handouts indicated i would receive calls from two type numbers and that i must answer those calls but then the links through the arrivecan app refers to a third and different number overall a very pleasant travel experience with jal during difficult times for travel no diminution of in flight service enhanced sleep product and excellent meals

we flew jal to helsinki but were not allowed entry because the layover was in tokyo jal assured us before we boarded in sydney that this would not be a problem and that they were responsible for only boarding us if we would be able to enter helsinki we were denied access at the border according to law in finland jal is responsible to fly return us since they boarded us the jal representative tried to trick us into signing a paper that would make us owe them almost k for the return flight thankfully the officer from finland stepped in the representative knowing he was found out said okay ill get the tickets no apologies

i had an excellent flight with japan airlines their service was amazing and the staff were very attentive the flights were quite empty due to current government and travel restrictions which meant that it was a very spacious and comfortable journey i hadnt flown with jal before but i will definitely consider flying with them again in the future

i had an excellent flight from london tokyo sydney the staff were all incredibly attentive and looked after us really well on both flights the flights were quite empty due to currently travel and government restrictions which meant that the journey was very comfortable i had not flown with jal before but will definitely fly with them again in the future
love comfy seats and legroom on economy foods are great they have the latest inflight movies and shows very accommodating attendants complete with toothbrush small soaps sanitary pads in flights

i called their costumer service in canada because i need to bring my guitar well as far as i know any airlines will allow you to handcarry your guitar however the jal website say yes but not for their customer service its so confusing and their turn off the phone because they cant answer it unprofessional customer service it is a simple common question
staff were fantastic even at airport they were friendly and courteous plane was clean and nothing was too much trouble

website allows you to buy ticket for another person but that person cannot board plane without your credit card cost me in cancellation fees cancelling only one hour after ticket purchase and they call to inform us of the issue

i had some trouble with getting the correct health certificate to go back home since i dont speak very much japanese the attendants went way above and beyond their duties and made phone calls to the hospital that issued my certificate walked me to a different clinic that could help me get a new certificate all so i could make it on my flight they were literally running around helping me so i could make it on board at the last minute truly the best customer service experience i have ever had thank you

check in was handled in a friendly efficient manor and at my leisure they even let me choose my seat and print out my boarding pass for my return flight the flight was quick and comfortable and my seat assignment was perfect for my needs when boarding i noticed the plane was painted as a large whale shark although it was a pink whale shark i mentioned to the flight attendant that i loved whale sharks and have snorkeled around them in the past i loved that we were traveling in a large pink whale shark in the middle of the flight she brought me a sticker they usually give to kids that depicted the plane a small thing but it shows they listen and care

travelling from south korea to sapporo with limited flight options available the best deal i could get for flights came with an apparent drawback the outward leg involved changing airports in tokyo from narita to haneda as a retired senior with plenty of time on my hands this didnt present as an insurmountable problem not having passed through narita for years and haneda being a first for me by contrast i actually looked forward to crossing tokyo the transfer turned out to be quite painless within mins of arrival at narita i had cleared immigration and customs and had proceeded downstairs to the jr station to catch the narita express for the min journey into central tokyo after changing trains onto the keikyu line at shinagwa the overall transfer to haneda airport from narita took about mins overall with about mins to spare before departure to sapporo surprisingly for an internal flight the haneda sapporo leg was operated by a widebodied airbus a with a seating configuration in economy and this january afternoon flight wasnt particularly busy i had selected a seat at the rear of the plane row in order to take photos of the snowcovered landscape coming into sapporo unobscured by aircraft wings and the rearmost cabin was virtually empty leaving the rain behind in tokyo the weather was perfect throughout the flight and coming into sapporo with the sun low in the sky close to setting at pm in the afternoon was picture perfect no drawbacks instead a most memorable internal flight

i had one of my worst flights experiences with jal when i flew from sydney to tokyo the service from staff was ok but the cleanliness and food is below expectations i was extremely ill after the flight that i was not able to get to my first hotel of choice in the city but rather an airport hotel as i kept having to run to the bathroom i did send an email to head office but the reply was dismissive and no apologies despite sending them pictures of hair on the pillow and stains on the tray and seats if you want to fly to japan only fly with ana airline the service the food and cleanliness has always been way ahead of jal just a shame the day i traveled flight was full

japan airlines jal is one the most greedy and dishonest airlines i have ever dealt with and i have dealt with a lot of airlines in my life they do any tactic and tricks to get away with their obligations we bought our tickets through a travel agency return tickets from canada to india at the beginning of covid crisis and at that time there was no talk of pandemic and lockdowns or even flight cancellations however during our trip countries locked down and flights cancelled and many people had to forget about their flights or ask for refunds we contacted jal and they said we cancelled your original return flight so we asked to reschedule our flights for later dates since jal changed our flights dates travel agency did not assume any responsibility afterward and we had to deal with jal directly after a few weeks we called to make sure our flights are set but jal said sorry this flight is cancelled too and either you have to reschedule or cancel your flights at that point we had to get back to our country canada and had no choice but to get the repatriate flights through government and cancel our jal ticket so we requested a refund and now they say since you bought your ticket through a travel agent we cant issue a refund to you and when contacted our travel agent they said as soon as jal changed your flight dates they took over and we have no control over your tickets we contacted jal again at first they agreed that they have control over our tickets however in a subsequent email they sent this dear valued customer thank you for submitting your refund form to japan airlines upon review we regret to inform you that your ticket does not qualify due to the reason below ticket is issued by a third party travel agency basically jal doesnt want to honor our tickets and refund us and look for any excuse not to do so this is the worst and most irresponsible airline i have ever dealt with if you value your money and sanity do not fly with japan airlines they easily ignore you and look for any excuse to rip you off

i have to say i couldnt fault jal airlines in any way flew in mid march just before the lockdown and because of this there was loads of room on planehad a whole row to myself all the staff from check in to stewardesses were friendly and helpful food was of japanese style and served with either chopsticks or proper metal cutlery would recommend for the attentive service you get
great little exras in premium economy including priority checkin lounge access dedicated boarding time more comfortable seats and sound cancelling headsets to name a few

this was my first international trip and i did not have any clue as to how the airlines and their staff would be travelling with a group on th january and on my birthday eve i initially enquired from the ground staff if i could carry a small cake inside the aircraft as i wanted to have something sweet as this time i could not a cake they agreed to it finally i dropped the idea as i knew it will be difficult to keep it inside while just about to board the aircraft i saw the crew dressed in ethnic wear as it was indias republic day this small gesture from their end will remain with me forever my inflight experience was equally good as the crew was very supportive and attentive to my requests i was booked in the economy class and the leg room was good enough to stretch my legs while returning from tokyo to new delhi on jl on st january i was given a middle seat to which i was not comfortable sitting while requesting to change the same for an aisle seat or a window seat they happily gave me premium economy seats so that one of the group members can also sit with me i was impressed with the presence of mind and the eye for detail which their staff had whenever i travel to japan it shall be through jal one suggestion if a passenger is travelling with you on his birthday anniversary the staff should make it a point to wish the passenger as this will earn you more customers in the future

we had the opportunity to fly jl in their international first class on a recent visit to asia we were the only in a cabin of people in spite of all the turmoil associated with covid the on board service was excellent their menu is more comprehensive than a michelin star restaurant the fas were ou going and always there when we needed something seats are good sized although not like some of the other first class carriers like ek a little dated in my opinion in flight entertainment options were limited for a hour to nrt but the overall experience was phenomenal i have flown them in business class before and their business cabins are also very comfortable and offer privacy and aisle access to every passenger

my family has been flying with jal since their on board service is always excellent the cabin crews are extremely professional and helpful the economy seat is so comfy especially for my hubby the food is fine for my taste as asian but not to my husbands liking end of march during the pandemic we as a family decided to fly back from indonesia to us since the choices of flights were narrowing down because of the traveling ban from several countries thankfully jal still had some flights to us with reasonable price even though we paid almost twice the price that we used to pay the flight from jakarta to tokyo still had decent amount of passengers meanwhile tokyo to boston only had like less than passengers but man their crews were still professional thank you so much jal for bringing us back to our home in the middle of this chaos

the flight attendants were friendly and the food was good on the return flight we were given a makeyourown dish which was an interesting concept and fun to put together the inflight entertainment was great there was a decent selection of recent movies to enjoy

it is much easier to put on a light jacket use a blanket or drink some hot tea to warm yourself up however when you are hot theres very little you can do to ease the discomfort the airline both times to and back has manage to keep the cabin well above degrees f at the minimum my traveling partner and myself sweat through the entire uncomfortable plane ride if you are sensitive to heat do not ride with jal you will be miserable ana and singapore airlines are your better bet as they have always kept the cabin comfortable

its a good thing to have a great customer service during normal times but jal has proven itself worthy even during crisis i bought jal flight through a third party that bailed out last min my flight was rescheduled a day earlier and my connection flight forced me to stay in japan airport for days and because of covid i couldnt get pass through the immigration and had to stay in the airport without any restaurant opened tried to call the agent and waited for hours for days straight with no avail i called jal and they promised to help me contact the agent with jals help i could get the agent to contact me they sent me an email saying that the flights i wanted was full and i need to get an upgrade to business class costing usdperson for shocking i then called jals customer service to check and though they mentioned that it is customary for them to only reschedule flight through the agent that we booked in they would like to help and made an exception they rescheduled me to a flight i needed their in flight crews were really attentivethey came over n translated to us every single time because all passengers are mostly japanese at this time nobody really travels to japan except their own citizensduring our final flight to seattle jl though there were only of us they were still excellent they made us origami with our names and said we could choose whichever seats extend our seats and relax jal youre the best

i was exhausted after a long international flight so although on one level i appreciated the exercise on another it was the last thing i wanted the walk from the bus that brought us from the international terminal to the departure date for the okayama flight took me almost as long as the flight itself a long long way admittedly there were no hassles of check in and security check since the bus dropped us arirside in comparison it was a relief to pas through the electronic gates and settle into my economy class seat relaxing too to know the rhythm and cadence f jal service no surprises nothing unexpected just the regular rhythm of good bythebook service arrival was fast small airport short wait for luggage bus waiting outside hasslefree

there was a lot going on end of feb and early march and alternation and changes were made a few times during this period staff at the north american hotline was patient and very helpful up the air during this critical time the crew looked after travelers well i would definitely fly with japan airlines again when everything is back to normal

i was in no particular hurry to get to haneda with lots of time before my connecting flights for once though the flight left on time and arrived slightly early relaxing then service was very good kind thoughtful gracious checkin clerks could not have been more thoughtful seeing that i had a long journey ahead of me no food of course but an entirely predictable and thus somehow comforting selection of drinks delivered with a smile plane was only two thirs full which always helpw people relax al in all then a good flight
excellent service as usual lovely air and ground crew our flight was on time definitely recommend

wow what a brilliant flight japan airlines together with malaysian airlines are the two greatest airlines i have flown with and i have been lucky enough to have travelled many times around the globe the staff were truly outstanding polite helpful and provided an exceptional service the plane was very clean seat space generous and food brilliant with so much choice the infotainment screen was comprehensive and kept me entertained for hours the food was a real highlight whereby they provide information on the chefs who created all the individual dishes which is a beautiful touch the food was generous original and very tasty the drinks that were offered were both non and alcoholic in nature which was great they also offered snacks throughout the whole flight which in over flights i have never experienced however for me it was the incredibly profitable customer service that i experienced is the true beauty of flight well done japan airlines my greatest flight experience ever please accept my respect

we loved our experiences on jal also like ana a lot but decided to give jal a go this time as they advertised their awards for economy class seats in addition to having a split on their not often do you get a seat configuration in cattle class anymore everyone we dealt with was fantastic the seat lived up to our expectations and was miles more comfortable than ac the cabin was kept spotlessly clean the service was very quick and attentive the meals we thought were excellent washrooms always clean and available snacks and drinks replenished frequently though we waited on hold for hours to connect with an agent to rebook our seats back to canada the agent was exceedingly helpful and did everything we asked of her and was super friendly about it we often travel to japan usually with ana to acquire star alliance points now will choose jal over ana if available and not overly expensive as the seats were comfortable and there was a lot of space around our seat thanks

unfortunately for us jal really disappointed us big time as opposed to a few years ago when they gave us excellent service under the current situation japan airlines did not honour a reservation made by our carrier delta airlines to begin our journey back from singapore back to montreal canada the delta representative did a remarkable job securing a reservation for us and jal simply did not care and bumped us from our flight out of singapore shame on you japan airlines you guys did not have the decency to honour a commitment to us your customers in that flight and by the way your app sucks big time as well because it is only in japanese and you are supposed to be an international carrier jal as an airline has quite a bit to learn about customer care try getting a few pointers from delta airlines who have been outstanding helping us to get back home please share this review as much as you can so that japan airlines treat customers with more empathy and respect they are a disgrace to japanese culture this time
japan airlines has been very considerate of its passengers requiring flight cancelations during this difficult times of coronavirus excellent service japan airlines

jal is a quality airline one of the best things about jal is the configuration in the economy cabin of their also great seat pitch service was excellent the ife was lacking a bit but still enough to watch
the food was tasty and the show was amazing and i loved the snack and dessert were astounding and loved the flight attendant
the flight was good the plane i was on was a bit outdated service was good it was hard to hear the staff because they all wore masks

it is absolutely impossible to get a hold of a person to make a change in my reservation i have been calling japan numbers toll number very expensive and us numbers to no avail they obviously do not care for some reason the change cannot be done online but they wont answer the phone or the emails the most pathetic thing ive seen in my life

i always choose the aircraft i fly in because i want to choose the seating type i usually choose aircraft with twin seats when i fly with my wife and kids so we can sit two by two i dont like triple seats because that means i will be the odd one out sitting next to a stranger while my wife sit together with our kids on this trip from singapore to vancouver i was travelling with my son so it was only two of us airlines use b b or a on longhaul flights which are normally configured in or seating in economy class since i dont like sitting in triple seats when there are only two of us i chose jal because it is the only airline that configures its b and b with twin seats on the singaporetokyo sector jal uses b configured in seating with increased seat pitch in their sky wider cabin and on the tokyovancouver sector jal uses b with eight abreast seating this means on both sectors my son and i could sit in twin seats by ourselves the seating was the most important factor to me next was the service jal always offers excellent service even the food is special they have special japanese meals such as eel rice and mos burgers prepared by their flight kitchens in tokyo i chose jal even though the fare was a few hundred dollars more than other airlines to me comfort is more important than the cost i will definitely choose jal again
