the flight ticket was relatively cheap the food was great and the service was good there was a lounge in narita where we have a buffet meal before we boarded the plane it was free you just present your boarding pass to avail it
very nice and relaxing flight the crew were functional and the food was acceptable getting to the destination was problem less

flight attendants were polite helpful and efficient seats seemed to have generous legroom selection of movies was fine and food was good too my only criticism is that the cabin was hot and they did not bring drinks around often like other airlines

i was real impressed with the comfort and service that i received from the folks at japan airlines even in economy class the flight was long but they made it nice with multiple meals free drinks free movies free headphones hot towels to freshen up and everything except a bed if you need a bed you have to move to first class but we did not find it necessary the staff was first class and made the hour flight very comfortable if i ever have to fly to this part of the world again i will be sure to book with japan airlines

after much research i decided to pay the little extra and fly jal as my son flies them all the time to japan and highly recommended them wow was he right i will only fly jal if my destination is where they fly the north american airlines could learn a lot from them with respect to customer service from booking to check in to flight experience they are beyond exceptional they have extra leg room in economy they offer incredible food constantly throughout flight with real silverware imagine that they provide alcoholic beverages in their pricing as well the plane is immaculate and the bathrooms are well maintained throughout the long flight and are larger than a shoebox the flight attendants are overly polite and helpful and dont yell into the intercom just so they can hear themselves talk they only come on for announcements and with very gentle voices they dont flip the lights on in the middle of the night they slowly bring them on the pilots did not even speak on our first flight so the plane was very quiet and we had some restful sleep en route the airline is extremely on time they depart as scheduled and on our return flight we departed and ended up on tarmac about mins due to lightning and pilot came on and apologized and said we promise to do what we can once in air to keep you on time and they did we arrived mins earlier than scheduled they provide pillows blankets excellent movie entertainment and headsets this is how an airline should be

i too like chontls review am very impressed with japan airlines excellent customer service in fully refunding airfares due to corona virus last year when singapore airlines cancelled my flight and i needed to seek a refund as alternative fares were not suitable to us it took them over weeks to refund nearly i was expecting a similar situation at the very least but got all my money back this time within a few days with out so much as a phone call needed it was all handled proficiently through their website i will definitely be rebooking with japan airlines in the future

at the early part of the covid breakout we needed to reroute our trip from hk to another transfer point due to vn tightening their travel requirements we changed from a cathay pacific flight to jal through tokyo the quick connection at narita in tokyo was super quick very efficient the airlines cabin crew were all very good at their jobs and the food was decentgood didnt get much sleep but the cabin stayed dark enough that many did

i have booked the flights from bangkok to haneda for myself and my niece during march however due to the covid situation i have regrettably had to cancel the bookings and the airline is kind to not charge the cancellation fees due to tickets class conditions i have called the airline to cancel my bookings and request for full refund on feb and the call center named khun nichaporn and i got my full refund through my debit card on feb i am truly appreciated the efficient and the fairness of japan airline for this case and i will always fly japan airline with my japans trip you are such professional and generous airline thank you so much for making this process so efficient best regards chonticha d

great people on this flight and the one back they were so lovely i told our lovely attendant that i really liked the wine we had with dinner she promptly popped back with another bottle for me the little ones the plane was comfortable the food was delicious i could recommend jal more highly
excellent service throughout very comfortable reclining seats a really good selection of food and drinks

one of our best flights ever two seats by the window and plenty of space for our feet made it very comfortable to go from tokyo to helsinki good and tasty food and drinks and very friendly and serviceminded crew we slept very well in our seats with pillow and blanket available we can highly recommend japan airlines

good service nice food and enough space to squeeze out just from the middle window seats without having to disturb the aisle seat only slight issue was the seats seemed firmer than other airlines and were a bit hard

i have been travelling to japan regularly twice yearly i love the good food lovely scenery and great hotels since five years ago i have been using jal and no other airlines the cabin crew are friendly and the food is enjoyable what i wish to emphasise is that they are very customer friendly in view of the recent covid outbreak i cancelled my trip to tokyo for arts auction jal allowed me to cancel all my international and domestic flights and gave me full refund within two weeks i have different experience with my travel agent when i wish to cancel another trip to europe for the same reason from now on i would definitely consider jal as my first choice

whenever we can we prefer to fly jal their service and level of comfort is second to none last trip especially the cabin was not cold so we were perfectly comfortable without adding a wrap or blanket and the food is wonderful

jal used to be a snob airline while they even used to see video how to be a jals cabin attendant in their flight so i used to avoid jal because of their unfriendly service firstly the seats are so comfortable and wide it made me relaxed during my whole of trip served food is also improved comparing to salty previous foods minor but some improvements are necessary on jal are for example cabin attendants never helps passengers to lift up baggage which is normally done by ana english announcement is very poor

i travel back and forth to japan or times a year and i always enjoy flying with jal i have flown other airlines air canada cathay korean and i have to say for comfort quality of food even in economy and service jal is the best although korean comes a very close second
pleasant flight the service is superb the stewards are very accommodating and also pleasant they made sure that we are comfortable
opted for bulk head seats the st row with more leg spaceit had a lot of leg room couldnt reach the bulkhead even with legs fully extended more than any other airlines in economy

many reviews rave about this airlines superb organization customer service and amenities when it comes to food japan airlines also exceeds all expectations when it comes to their food face it an airlines food can make or break the flight jal not only gives free drinks with the meals but the main meal showcases the signature dish of up and coming chefs the food is served in dishes not cardboard to be eaten with real metal knife fork and spoon you will find no plastic sporks here while i am not a fan of their red house wine i did enjoy their sake and japanese beers special meal needs are welcome just let them know food preferences when you book in respect to their planes seating service and cleanliness the rest of the flight experience was head and shoulders above the nofrills service which we have been made to tolerate with north american carriers

second time with jal one world partnership with qantas on their dreamliner so comfortable along with fantastic polite service being a loyal qantas frequent flyer for numerous years and travelling in premier economy our luggage is tagged with priority access to qantas business lounge not offered by qantas upon return flight we get same again access to the fabulous jal business lounge the pluses are numerous flying with jal especially when we get to baggage claim and our luggage is waiting for us last year i did send a letter email to qantas querying why they dont offer same to a loyal customer never received a reply so definitely jal preference for me on my travels from now on

my seat was very comfortable the service was excellent the staff was friendly and accommodating everything was very good the only reason i am not giving it five stars is because the food was horrible i had the western menu but there were items and tastes not recognizable to me the only food that was warm were the main entrees mini quiches should not be served cold ruben sandwiches should have melted cheese and be warm everything looked beautiful but when items that should be warm are served like they were just taken out of the refrigerator they are tasteless or horrible the bad food was not just on one flight it was on all separate legs of my round trip if you take them order a special meal or bring your own food

from the time i flew jal years ago i have been a strong supporter of the airlines my memories from those flights were great the seats were comfortable the service impeccable and the food so memorable it made flying long distances more bearable and i have recommended the airlines at every opportunity i didnt get the chance to fly it again until recently and was dismayed to find that the standard had fallen i booked four flights hawaii to japan to singapore and on the way back singapore to japan to hawaii regretted it after the first flight the seats were small and uncomfortable the service was still excellent but they dont offer you a choice of meals anymore we were only provided one option hopefully you like the meal of the day

the staff on board during my journey were so helpful they couldnt do any more to help on boarding the plane the staff came to my seat to introduce themselves explain the fooddrinks service and to offer champagne or orange juice throughout the flight the staff were offering drinks and food service was as and when you ordered you are given an extra mattress to put on to the bed when it is in full recline which was super comfortable in board entertainment was plentiful and varied would definitely fly with jal again

our first experience flying jal when checking in the entire staff came out from behind counter and bowed to us very comfortable seats and fabulous food had our choice of either asian or western cuisine so impressed

perhaps it is downhill after you fly singapore airlines i had such high expectations for this airline and they were not met across the line the entertainment system was hard to navigate the food was not as good as i had expected and neither was the service i did not care for the seats either

i am not joking i really consider jal as the best air company for its courtesy to passengers jal provides excellent service on every step so your journey to japan starts on board i highly recommend this air company and it is sincerely

the service was awesome the staff are always very excited to help you the food was not as bad as i spected and the flight was super nice if ill be able to have a flight back to japan i will take it again with japan airlines

all of the flight attendants were so well mannered and pleasant actually not only them most of the japanese travellers are so kind as well when i came to my seat the guy in the seat next row to me waited for me to take out whatever i wanted from my hand luggage and then said let me help you madam and he carried my bag to be placed in the luggage space above us i didnt need to ask for help then while meals were being served later i was so tired and wanted to sleep so one of the flight attendants told me to just sleep when i woke up one of the ladies came up to me and asked if i would like to have my meal now i replied yes please and she brought the meal to me specially i have never experienced such care in any of my travel before

i cant recommend jal enough from the check in all the way though to deplaning the staff and crew were fabulous comfortable business seats delicious food and no request was too much i had trouble opening the overhead bin during flight and asked the attendant when she had a moment to please help me out she dropped what she was doing and immediately ran to help saying im sorry it took me so long it literally was a nanosecond what a pleasant change from the usual surly north american airline crews well definitely fly them again ifwhen the opportunity arises
a very pleasant flight the crew very professional and attentive didnt regret flying with japan airlines
jal gives you the best value you could expect from an economy flight great food attending staff frequent snacks and comfortable seats
very nice good service very comfortable seating station worth it if you can afford it for the hour trip as a bonus all passengers were allow into the japan airlines loach in those in economy

during the booking process i was not able to book premium economy on the way to the us but was able to for the return from boston the site lead me to believe i could do seat selection a determining factor for me in using an airline turns out that is not actually possible on the economy bookings so this was incredibly frustrating follow up customer service was terrible and overall experience was very unsatisfactory definitely going back to cathay once the world returns to normality again

flew from londonhaneda on b both ways probably the best airline ive ever flown from about international airlines everything is tailored to the customer really good flight and better than their other japanese competitor by far definitely recommended if its a good price

this was the best economy long distance flight i ever experienced the new dreamliner that jal uses had excellent leg room and pitch in economy configuration i ordered a special meal hindu probably thinking it would be vegetarian it wasnt but it was absolutely delicious and the fa explained all the ingredients to me the staff are very kind and attentive it was great value booked via ba and i was able to check in a snowboard for free
i travelled to tokyo on this airline i find the seats comfortable with enough legroom the food served was also good the in flight entertainment can be better but i am ok with what was provided

we traveled from miami to manila with a connecting flight in new york we were cutting it close with time with our connecting flight when japan airlines called me to make sure i was on my way a staff member met us at t he counter promptly checked us in and personally escorted us through the linessecurity all the way to boarding the airplane to make sure we made our flight the flight itself was great they provide warm hand towels prior to serving meals beer and wine are included options with meals they provide a variety of entertainment options from video games to movies books and music the staff was great i highly recommend flying with japan airlines

we booked business class flights to tokyo due to government travel advisories on the corona virus outbreak in japan we cancelled our flights japan airlines insisted on charging us in cancellation fees when all other airlines like ana announced special handling arrangements to provide a full refund we were going to rebook with jal but they refused to consider waiving their cancellation fee this is unfair and unsympathetic to passengers very disappointed and will not rebook with you

we checked in on line the night before our flight when we got to the airport hours before our flight a long line had already formed before the counter opened when counters opened there was no sign as to the location of bag drop for on line check in had my husband not sought help from an employee we would not have been directed to the shorter line when we finally got in the plane i was sanitizing the trays and seat belt when the stewardess kind of scolded me to buckle up food was better this time than my initial trip from lax to manila it was decent that they fed us more on this airline than any of the other ones ive flown overall i was satisfied with my experience but a little dissapointed to have experienced these minor issues that i did not experience with jal in the past

note we did not actually fly with jal on this trip here i am describing their customer service when i called to cancel our trip my family was supposed to fly to japan next week but we decided to cancel as there is currently a travel advisory for japan from singapore due to covid when we called jal they were very understanding and waived the cancellation fee we didnt really expect them to do so because weve heard that passengers on other airlines have been having issues getting refunds on their flights to south korea and south korea currently has many more cases of covid than japan we flew with jal before and liked the trip very much this time round we were extremely impressed with their customer service standards and would choose them for our next trip to japan
the cabin is clean and i can speak in japanese so its easy enjoy conversations with cabin attendants in japanese best china international airlines im not going to ride eastern airlines
great airling good service the food was a good variety found enough to eat they have earphones available and it was restful
organisationefficiency service jal excelled in every aspect of our journey to tokyo looking forward to our next visit

i flew in coach class from bangkok to narita the flight attendants were friendly very efficient and professional the food was quite tasty and filling and the entertainment system was pretty good with a large selection of new movies in english i would recommend flying jl to my friends and family

i flew from dfw via aa and connected in nrt to japan airlines to fly via a b in coach class from narita to bangkok the flight attendants were all young and very friendly and professional the food was quite good we had a choice of chicken and rice or pork and rice to speed things along they presented a picture card of the main course chickenpork in a few languages so you simply pointed to what you wanted for desert they served little cups of haagendazs ice cream because it was a hour flight prior to landing we had a fluffy breakfast bun and choice of beverage i would fly jl again and would recommend them to friends and family

after booking our trip almost a year ahead as we got closer to our trip we called jal to get seat assignment it was almost impossible talking to a live person and once you did get someone on the phone i felt like we got the runaround our flight was on american airlines operated by japan airlines we first called american airlines and got to talk to someone immediately they informed us that any changes had to be made thru jal we called jal and after waiting for about min they told us to call aa but wait theres more after days in japan with of us traveling jal counter could only check in of us what whywe ask they have this unapologetic smirk on their face and say we should call american airlines are you kidding me we call and aa airliens says they have nothing to do we ticketing jal counter then tells us theres nothing they can do and we should call our travel agent its probably am back homewe cant call our agent jal counter attendants just stand there and dont try to help at all while we franticly look for local travel agent info we are in japan mind youand cant even call the local agency office i go back to one of the many jal staff standing around and beg her to at least help us call an agency contact on japan after minutes of dumbfounded contemplation she gestures to an agent standing at the counterthank god because we feel that woman bent over backwards to help usand she did she got on the phone and called the number i had for the local agency and after minutes on the phone told us everything was ok back to the othersthere was one agent that helped us initiallyshe was rude condescending and everything but helpful if it werent for the last two ladies who helped us and the only interaction i got was from this first counterperson i would never fly japan airlines again how could an airlines ever employ such standoffish unhelpful personnel

first time i fly with jal and business class the simple and elegant of japan is show at the service and plane interior compare with others its come with simple and calm color and ambience for business class passengers fly from narita airport is encourage to use the sakura lounge located in nd floor which provide lunch but there is not much variant menu in others hand they served good food chinese siomay italian chicken wrap with caesars dressing japanese soba japanese rice with beef stew attractive automatic beer machine wine sake bar coffee and excellent tea corners kids menu include juice and desserts is available sakura lounge is separated two stores nd floor is for dining and st floor is lounge also bathroom in st floor will you take a shower before flying hours long haul but lounge is not access to boarding gate so please enjoy yourself but dont forget the boarding time i fly with jl for business class they offer the jal comfortable pajamas like cardigan with elegant soft green a pouch of eye mask moisture mask ears plug tooth brush about the inflight meals its call bedd cuisine by jun kurogi i choose japanese meals its course meals start from appetizer menu is yuba crabmeat with wasabi flavored soy starchy sauce tuna sashimi poached potherb mustard garland chrysanthemum mushroom in japanese broth with salmon roe simmered chicken vegetables bechamel sauce caviar grilled shrimp with aromatic vegetable sauce japanese omelet vinegared turnip wrapped with salmon there is lots for appetizer right serve in a overcute bento box the chopstick stand is red japanese crane origami but its plastic you may bring it but ask the permission with the crew for main course its dainomono marinated chicken with tar tar sauce and yellow tail teriyaki and they mention kcal and served with japanese famous steamed rice miso soup and japanese pickles and of course even i am full but its always have a room for desserts black sesame pudding served as dessert and hot tea all time served if you still hungry instant noodles peanuts chocolate in the pantry one hour before landed the crew served ice cream or chinese dumpling i choose haagen dazs ice cream inflight entertainment is not updated but so far not lousy at all funny thai movie box office movie is available the business class chair is reclining flat and comfy blanket is available the toilet amenities is awesome the toner and lotion is shiseido which is japanese famous branded lotion but the toilet size is same with others toilets overall fly with jal is experience great service and thank you for the ground crew and cabin crew

shouldve checked the aircraft type before booking business class its not worth it service is excellent but thats always true for most business cabin service for this route with this airline just go with economy unless they upgrade the business cabin

complaining about business class is pretty snobby isnt it but reviews require honesty so i have to say that yes it was better than economy or premium economy but not the standard i expect from business class service quite good and certainly friendly although they forgot one of our main meals served entrees and then totally forgot the main dish out of the wine selections on the menu they didnt have half available i ended up getting my third choice movies have very limited selection in english and you cant remove subtitles no pyjamas for overnight flight you get a top but no bottoms seats do go flat but are not as big or as comfortable as some other premium airlines it wasnt a disaster but for business class they can to do better they lounge is awesome though classy and great food and drinks
was one of the best economy seat i ever experienced good service delicious food great in flight movies and comfortable seat thanks jal
jal called it j class which is premium economy seats for their domestic flights leather seats with leg rest wider arm rest and of course room space they only served drinks for domestic sectors

got a promo price and decided to try service was good and food was much better seats were typical reverse herringbone your legs will go underneath the tv console managed to sleep well since you get a degc flat bed

the key is when you recline your seat you dont have to worry about the passenger behind you are given x kg baggage and access to airport lounge food was ok but you get sake and mini champagne service was excellent

with the global covid widespread many countries badly affected with high numbers of infected cases are allowing cancellation both for airlines and hotels japan is one of the highest in infected cases outside china yet main a regid stand on cancellation i am truly disappointed and disgusted by the way the situation is handled compromised on concerns by travellers and their safety has never been a priority i will never recommend jal and highly discourage anyone i know from choosing this airline

i booked a flight via the website a few months ago and there is the corona virus outbreak thinking that the situation in asia might get worse i went on the website to cancel the tickets to realize that they will charge me yes each flight that cancellation fee is insanely high my coworker cancelled her roundtrip tickets for and it only costs her eva airlines changing the tickets will cost each way difference in fare this is the last time im going to fly with jal im more than willing to pay more for a lower cancellation fee now i know
first time taking jal to sapporro the flight was comfortable ample leg space and comfortable seats crew were friendly highly recommend this airline

i loved flying japan ailines but this flight was just very hot the trip was hours long and the cabin was at least degrees if not warmer this severely impacted the comfort of the passengers the service was still excellent but the climate was uncomfortable

the flight from san francisco to tokyo was great this plane had more legroom and wider seats than ive seen on domestic economy flights they also served two meals and free beverages which was nice too the inflight entertainment options were ok although i appreciated that i didnt need to use my own device service was excellent with friendly helpful staff

i cant say enough about japan air my daughter and i flew to japan in november this was her first time flying japan air made the trip a memorable one for her and for me as well they are so attentive to detail and take the time to make sure each passenger is well looked after which is a rarity in todays airline industry where most airlines treat passengers like cattle japan air treats you like a vip even in coach the airplane was clean the food was well prepared it well presented and very tasty the leg room was more than enough and we were able to stretch out our legs without restriction we will fly japan air whenever we can they are hands down one of the best airlines

we have flown many times now with jal and it is superb the crew are always fabulous and the plane is clean with excellent service and good food their japanese timing is as always incredible we will be booking our next trip in the not to distant future keep up the good work

we flew from tokyo to boston on a hour flight the convenience of nonstop was the most important factor in flight selection we like the configuration of seats which was seats were reasonably spaced for coach service was pleasant the dinner was quite good and bathrooms were kept clean the second meal which was billed as a taste of ny from dean and deluca was poor individual screens played a variety of movies but many of the same features were being shown both in early january and early february

first time flying jal and it wont be our last as regular travelers economy class i must admit that jal economy class is a level above the rest of the airlines we have flown over the last years the extra leg room and wider seats make for a very pleasant flight with an attentive crew and very good food just sit back and enjoy the flight

first time flying jal and it wont be our last as regular travelers economy class i must say that the jal is one of the best so far more leg room and seats slightly wider than normal good food and attentive crew made for a most relaxing flight

got in on a seat sale so took advantage as offers skywards points for emirates never again polite service but nonexistent online checkin thought for a while my flight had been cancelled poor communication received zero emails past my payment confirmation food onboard was inedible service was ok overall besides the decent baggage allowance cannot say anything great about this airline and would not fly again

superb level of service and comfort having travelled practically all worlds most recognized airlines jal by far exceeded my best expectations generous space in economy class canine fabulous selection of food and beverages including menu created by rising japanese chefs sake gin french wine etc and highly professional and attentive to the very detail crew bravo

my husband and i were flying through japan airlines on january thth when the taal volcano erupted and all airports in the philippines were shut down jal flew to the philippines and the captain flew back to japan after learning that naia was closed when we returned to japan we had to go through immigration collect our luggages and had to check in to a hotel the first night was covered however we had to pay the extra night that we had to stay i understand that this was mother nature and there is nothing we can do the experience would not have been that horrible if jal actually kept us updated about our flight when we went to our hotel jal provided us with a sheet of paper with instructions on how to call for any updates mind you there were approximately other passengers on the same flight as us at this hotel when we called the numbers that were provided to us it was all in japanese we had to ask the employees at the hotel to translate for us we waited for about an hour to finally speak with someone when i spoke with the representative at jal she said to check the website for any updates the website they provided us was in japanese at this point i was so frustrated we literally felt stranded in japan not knowing if we would fly today tomorrow next week or at all it is so difficult to communicate with almost everyone that we spoke with at jal and no one was able to give any answers to when we would be able to fly to our destination the website nor the phone number that was provided were of no assistance expedia finally assisted with setting us up with philippine airlines it is disheartening to fly with an airline company and you feel so helpless because of the lack of communication and unsure of when you are actually going to reach your destination we have been flying for almost hours when this occurred when we were going to narita to catch the flight with philippine airlines we had to walk to the shuttle bus area that was minutes away at am the hotel was an hour away from narita airport i normally do not write bad reviews when i fly as i know things do occur but i am writing this review to urge better communication with passengers so we dont feel like we are in the dark this was the worst travel experience i have ever had i will never fly through japan airlines again
flew it liked it will do it again great service no impeccable service they didnt miss a trick highly recommend the flight and crew

i recently flew with jal as part of a code share booking id made with british airways theyre hard product is superb ive flown on s with other airlines in the past and theyve always felt very cramped however unlike other airlines jal only has eight seats across rather than nine so the seats were much more spacious width wise there was also plenty of legroom in front the crew were very polite and proved good service the food was very good for economy too the infight entertainment system was large and very responsive my only slight criticism is there wasnt as much filmtv choice as on other airlines and the free headphones were terrible for my return flight i bought a cheap pair of ear bud earphones instead highly recommended instead certainly if i ever fly to japan again ill be looking at jal as a preference

ive traveled with this flight jl few times a departure time is earl morningamwhich a public transport is not available airport shops are closed only a couple of shop are available arriving in uk london heathrow is early morning which is a business morning rush hour itll take a long hour to reach central london by car public transport an aircraft is ok even an economy class but always a long queue for a toilet users

i had to cancel my flight from singapore to new chitose airport recently due to my sudden injured ankle i called the customer service to do so and the lady also suggested that i get a medical certification mc to waive the cancellation fee after i had emailed them the mc they called me almost immediately and explained clearly the details of the full refund the last time that i flew with them was more than years ago which was a very pleasant experience such superb service and i couldnt wait to fly with jal again thumbs up

traveled on jl on hard to fault jal the economy seat product called jal sky wider is one of the best out there in terms of width and pitch food was great with various little extra dishes to accompany the main meal second meal service also good excellent service from the immaculately presented cabin crew polite and efficient perhaps some extra western content on the ife system would have been good but overall a very good flight with jal

my flight was melbourne to tokyo return large seat and leg room great staff great food i had vegan option two kg checked bags no charge for snowboard bag seriously hard to fault could have some more in flight entertainment options

i am taking the morning flight on jal to haneda airport in tokyo from bangkok i expected an excellent lounge with food for all tastes instead i am experiencing very unelegant lounge with mainly japanese dishes probably replicating the lowest eatery in tokyo for a westerner there is nothing but some soggy banana muffins and danish of the worst quality and not one choice of breads the lounge reeks of highly strong smells coming from the japanese dishes which are not fit and appropriate for an early morning departure i have been in other jal lounges and this one has taken me by surprise where are the airlines headed do they not care about their customers

this was my first time flying this airline partners with american airlines although the plane was definitely a bit dated and seats were not as modern as others the service and food options was very good i would not hesitate to book again or to recommend

i was excited to see that my flight from chicago to tokyo that we booked through american airlines was being serviced by japan airlines since i had heard good things about them the flight attendants were so attentive and pleasant and the food was very good it was a comfortable flight and it was on time maybe even a little early the entertainment options were very good also very very good experience

worst flying experience of my life thirty hours of delays entirely the airlines fault no information not permitted to leave gate not hotel provided everyone had to sleep on the floor lying cheating supervisors refused to inform how to make a complaint or claim tried to pressure into signing some japanese waiver for a tiny gift card airline currently paying a usd fine for similar issues in chicago

overall the flight was good i was traveling with my wife and yo daughter and it was very comfortable and relaxing the flight crew were great as well very friendly and were able to make adjustments to meals and such so my wife and i can take turns taking core of our daughter only downside is the miles program makes it extremely difficult to redeem miles for flights firstly you can only redeem for flights that start or end in japan you cannot use japan as a connection to some other destination if you do want to travel somewhere else via jal you effectively need to book two flights that endstart in japan and go through the entire customs checkin security process in japan as jal will not combine them as a proper connecting flight also the points required for a flight or upgrade can vary drastically the difference of a single day can result in needing x as many points

i absolutely loved this flight it was mine and my parents first time flying this airline and we would definitely fly with them again the seats in economy were spacious my dad who is over feet tall had the first relaxing flight of his life in economy the food was great vegetarian and glutenfree meal great customer service nice entertainment options but the seats were the best

this is the first time im using jal i often go abroad using so many airlinesbut this time i have to give stars to jalthe flight attendant is very friendly amd helpful im so impressed on details they do that time my son accidentaly touch his glass so the water goes all over him one of the flight atenndant came fast to him tought she will clean the mess with unfriendly face like other airlines atenndant but wrong she came to my son and asking are you ok are you ok helo clean him and bring him new glass of drink then after she clean the mass and in the airport i saw jal crew bring a paper with someone names as this passanger almost late and when they find him this passanger couldnt walk fast as age and they sudden run took wheelchair to bring him fasy to the plane im realy impressedtry and you will thinj same as me

i recently booked a flight from paris to sydney premium economy with japan airlines i flew finnair paris to helsinki and then should have been on a japan airlines flight from helsinki to tokyo my flight from paris was delayed so i missed my connecting flight when i arrived in helsinki i was told i was being put on a finnair flight however finnair dont have premium economy when i queried this they told me there was nothing they could do and i would have to take it up with customer service when i got home so i took the flight and then i contacted japan airlines when i got home they have now told me there is nothing they can do i have to contact finnair i am slightly confused by this as i booked and paid my flight through japan airlines in my compliant i was also requesting a refund for the flight i booked so why would an airline that i didnt pay give a me a refund i have gone back to japan airlines times and been given the same response each time they also havent addressed some of the issues i raised in my letter it is such a shame because i had such a good experience with my flights from sydney to paris however after this knowing the way they act when something goes wrong i will never fly with them again they actually have a really good product but their responses to my complaint letters have been diabolical looking at some of the other reviews i have read on other websites this seems to be a fundamental issue for them if you are thinking of flying with japan airlines think again because if something goes wrong they dont want to know

i was in the cattle car so it was cramped but thats not that big of a deal since the flights only for an hour and i dont have problems with leg room since im short the flight attendants were always ready to lend a helping hand with a smile „Ç®„Ç≥„Éé„Éü„Éº„ÇØ„É©„Çπ„Å†„Å£„Åü„ÅÆ„ÅßÂ∫ßÂ∏≠„ÅØÁã≠„Åã„Å£„Åü„ÅÆ„Åß„Åô„ÅåÊôÇÈñìÁ®ãÂ∫¶„ÅÆ„Éï„É©„Ç§„Éà„Åß„Åó„Åü„ÅÆ„ÅßÂ§ß„Åó„ÅüÂïèÈ°å„ÅØ„Å™„ÅÑ„Å®ÊÄù„ÅÑ„Åæ„ÅôÂÆ¢ÂÆ§‰πóÂãôÂì°„ÅÆÊñπ„ÅØÁ¨ëÈ°î„Åß„ÅäÂÆ¢„Åï„Çì„Å´ÂØæÂøú„Åó„Å¶„Åæ„ÅôÁü≠„ÅÑ„Éï„É©„Ç§„Éà„Åß„ÇÇ„Éâ„É™„É≥„ÇØ„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åó„Åü

id read that the jal travel experience had reviewed so well and i was not disappointed the care and consideration from the flight attendants was exquisite i found the food and presentation impressive such pride was taken to introduce their chefs and a range of food options oh and the seats had so much arm and leg room such a treat to travel with jal

dsiclaimer if you plan to use them for international flights then disregard this review this review only applies for domestic flight this airline is good for international flights but if you are using them for domestic flight as a foreigner you will be shut out of all their online service you cannot book any domestic flights online unless you pretend to live in japan and you can only manage your booking as long as you pretend to live in japan if you sign up for their jmb program you will not be able to see your domestic flights because you do not live in japan and this is only available for people living in japan to get their app to display english text you need to know japanese to find the option to switch to english then of course you cannot log on to your jmb profile because again you have to be japanese so then you also cannot automatically find your flights and the get your ticket on the app and you cannot sign up for jmb pretending to be japanese so there you go shut out of their online services and you are stuck with having to save pdfs or printed out sheets to manage your bookings planes are average the typical smallish domestic aircrafts staff is polite tho in the good japanese fashion but they seriously need to stop excluding tourists from their online services not every tourists wants to use train when going long distances that will take more than hours with train

i had the pleasure of flying jal for the first time on vacation to the philippines flights i have to say i was truly impressed with the crew on all flights the flight attends are the best i fly a lot for business i get to see the good the bad the ugly but the jal attendants are the best in the business nice is an understatement you could tell how much pride they took in doing a great job always smiled even with unruly passengers they kept cool dealt with the issue i was seriously impressed with the crews i will update with my flights here are jal jal i will fly jal again recommend jal to my friends family leg room good food way above average actually really good check in was a breeze with the jal app planes very clean again to me its about the flight attendants how great they were it makes the flight

ive been spoiled with business class flights to asia wasnt fortunate enough to fly business on this flight we used aa miles for this flight the configuration of this plane has seats on the sides rather than so our family of sat and this way no crawling over sleeping strangers to get to the bathroom theres more legroom than most economy seats we were quite comfortable the food was pretty good as well

japan airlines has consistently been on the top airlines list and its easy to see why brand new planes good amenities and impeccable service the bathrooms are kept so clean which is hard to do on an overnight flight the food was beautifully prepare in typical japanese fashion and very tasty the only negative is the movie selection
bought a ticket by agency supersaverru but did mistake wrong sequence of name and surname unfortunatelly jal didnt agree to change sequence cause tickets boute by agency

we flew jal from melbourne airport to japan we were immediately impressed with the amount of leg room they have in economy they have a wide variety of entertainment for adults and kids they even have mini games but the food was lacking for kids the staff were very friendly overall jal is a really good airline and we would fly them again

jal business class wasnt that great the crew were really good the plane was really old a bit dirty and carpet was ripping in some places food wasnt that great either i tried the japanese menu coming back and it tasted weird the western menu on the way over wasnt too bad but for business class i would have expected better food the movies were really old no new releases and you couldnt turn the subtitles off on some of the movies compared to vietnam airlines we flew in may it doesnt compare on any scale i felt like i had stepped back in time on this flight to the s

i picked japan airlines purposely to experience japan and its people before actually stepping on japanese soil the best choice without question the best service ever if i had a choice i would not travel with anybody but this airliner nobody can touch them

the flight from narita was on one of the older planes a overall the business experience was okay i was surprised i did not receive anything or was told that i could use the express security line the japanese lounge was the highlight new modern with a great selection of food and drinks the flight was good the seat was comfortable and was practically flat the crew in business were all mature and did their job while not the best i have experienced and not the worse overall it was okay experience

took the flight recently with my family to japan the flight attendants very polite and offered good hospitality to all passengers always smiling and available we were impressed with the range of entertainment and new movies on offer the in flight meal is high quality compared to other airlines and is similar to japanese bento box with ice cream tried the japanese plum wines japanese branded beers and kiwi juices they offered in flight small souvenir to all young kids we loved the roomy leg rooms not squashed like some other economic airlines the aircraft has businesspremium and economy sections overall in flight experience better than usual airlines we travelled with best of all it is direct flight from sydney to tokyo saving us times in travel

for years i had been hearing that japan airlines was a very special experience in commercials and other media jal was always touted as having great service luxurious appointments and all that kind of thing the actual experience however was far different starting from the very first arrival at narita airport rather than having a nice special boarding area with such luxuries as a shower good food drinks and other things it was really no different than any plain old boarding area in any plain old budget class filled and i do mean filled with screaming infants harried travelers and other unpleasant things usually in any prestige waiting area you have nice food displays larger and more comfortable seats and things like that none of that was in evidence here add to that the shocking news that the wait for a shower would be three hours and you have the equivalent of having to wait for your flight in the psycho ward on the flight instead of luxury food and other service you got something not much different than coach service and food and the only thing i was glad of was that this was a flight at night and i could just go to sleep and forget all this dont ever look for me to fly jal ever again and i go to japan usually at least twice a year give me united any day

after spending two lovely weeks in thailand where both the people were incredibly handson and delightful with my year old i flew home alone with my toddler on jal from bangkok to tokyo had a hour layover and again from tokyo to jfk outbound we flew cathay pacific and they were incredibly kind with us doing anything to make the hour travels easier on us but jal only added stress on us jal to tokyo simply seemed nitpicky my son had the window shade down and they really needed it up on a plane of rows they also commented on his reusable stickers that leave zero residue which i showed them and then they needed them removed for the landing id understand if they had been real stickers but it seemed to be a sticking point for them pun intended they also kept serving more food before clearing any trash so i couldnt even take a meal for myself because theyd served the kids trays first and then all these snacks and drinks but never clears anything before adult meals i was buried in trash finally and this was the deal breaker for me on the way from tokyo to jfk i checked in online in advance and was about to drop my bag off at the luggage check when someone pointed me to family assistance in hong kong and thailand all security and airlines pulled us aside to prioritize us so i thought the same was to happen nope i had to drag my bag and stroller across the hallway where they insisted i was lbs too heavy for our one bag when i explained that were permitted four bags and ive only checked one they told me to put the extra lbs in my backpack this may not seem bad except when youre a pretty t revamping alone with a toddler and already managing your child along with carryons and a stroller i cant split into multiple bags so they told me to go all the way to the other end of international to the post office to buy a box and i had to old lbs into the box they told me it was no problem but what they failed to realize is that it is a problem as a parent already juggling a lot now i have to repack my bag at customs upon arrival i was furious and so appalled at the lack of service never again will i fly jal

i was so excited to bring my partner h to japan aboard this airline because of my great experiences with it in the past and how this was going to be her first time the initial flight to japan was very comfortable and we were practically singing our praises about the inflight food entertainment and service the return flight however was another story we understood that security would most likely be tighter since it was just in the wake of an iranian leaders death after passing security and customs smoothly which included facial recognition technology comparing us to our passport pictures we started boarding the plane at the gate an attendant who was checking the tickets overlooked h and skipped over to the person behind her in line once we boarded the plane flight attendants were greeting the passengers as they headed to their seats one of them asked to see hs passport inspected it closely and even dropped it on the floor she didnt do this to the passenger before h and when i offered my own passport to her she just sent me along without looking at it or touching it h felt singled out by this action as she was the only africanamerican passenger having your passport inspected at security would be one thing but that was done with no issues once youre past that and boarding the plane to be treated as suspicious because of your appearance only makes a person feel unwelcome we didnt complain about it to anyone at the time because we wanted to at least make sure we got home but now h doesnt want to travel with this airline again if it can be helped

although the selection of entertainment was not to my liking the two meals were amazing jal has moved to a young chef designed menu scheme and we had some really interesting and tasty choices apart from that the seats seemed larger than most other airlines and the service unobtrusive and effective

japan airlines has recently changed their handling of partner reward travel and gives travelers using economy miles center seats this is a new low and the first time i have seen this for a flight booked months in advance jal has really gone downhill quickly since i last flew them a year ago

given the choice i will always take jal their service is excellent it was also a direct flight from where i live to japan large selection of recent movies free drinks and good food and leg room in economy we were served specialty ice cream and cookies on route to japan on the return trip my son dropped his wallet changing in the lavatory and they found it and returned it to him

why cant jal install some kiosks rather than making most of the people on the airplane wait for hours on a ridiculously long line the manager told me that they had three kiosks last year but none of them were working so instead we have a disney style line that goes on forever

the attached picture is of jals customers waiting in line for an hour and a half at mnl because jal cant be bothered to install a kiosk to print out boarding passes and generate luggage tags the picture actually shows only a small part of the line japan airlines is horrible and should be avoided whenever possible jals employees are also worthless and ill informed jal should fire all of them and start from scratch

in september we flew melbourne tokyo narita new york jfk and back in jal economy the direct service from melbourne to tokyo is fairly new as it started on september and is very welcome the seats food aircraft and service are all superior to the qantas alternative which we have also flown recently qantas is using very old s whereas jal is using dreamliners and the difference in comfort lighting and particularly noise levels is very noticeable qantas really needs to lift its game jal claims that it had taken a seat out of each row and fitted wider seats and they were noticeably wider not by a huge amount but it all adds to the comfort we were seated in the exit row so the leg room was good but im cm tall and wouldve been happy with the standard seats as well the only negative is that the melbourne flight goes to narita rather than haneda so you spend about an hour longer getting to and from the airport and domestic connections are more timeconsuming we had to catch a bus from narita to haneda to catch our domestic connection the other negative is that jals inflight entertainment services isnt as good as some other airlines but at least its better than it used to be once we were back in australia and putting our points into the jal mileage bank i realised that it was also easier to earn rewards on jal than qantas so well probably use the points for upgrades on our next flights with jal

flight was good small airplane for this route so the business class wasnt really worth it but flight attendants were excellent however as business class and priority on luggage i had to wait minutes for my luggage when most other people received theirs already

japan airlines has the lowest fare from new york usa to manila the philippines the one we took leaves around in the morning and arrives in tokyo japan around in the afternoon there is a connecting flight to manila around but we stayed in tokyo for days and took a morning flight from tokyo to manila the service was excellent from checkin boarding in flight and disembarking the flight from narita to manila was also excellent another advantage of taking japan airlines was the flight from tokyo to kyoto domestic in japan fares for international travelers was lower than the fare for a train the flight from narita tokyo to kyoto and from kyoto to haneda tokyo and from narita to jfk new york were also excellent

compared with qatar and qantas seats are cramped leave a lot to be desired entertainment for english speakers was terrible really old movies a lot of shootmup ones and very few to choose from even an english speaking documentary was dubbed over with japanese and only japanese subtitles on such long flights it would have been nice to have pjs instead of cardigan food and service was fine

the best economy flight that i have ever taken to asiafirst of all is the seat itself it was just like premium economy seats on other airlines plenty of legroom even if you are six feet tall the flight attendants were so friendly and helpful i requested glutenfree meals and they were actually quite good i will only fly them from now onthey exceeded my expectations
the food was very good cabin crew were very friendly and courteous lots of inflight entertainment but a bit more expensive compared to ana

flew two trips four segments on jal in business class using miles from my american account miles one way in business class seemed like a great deal it turned out that you get what you pay for the transpacific flights sannrt nrtsan were in s jal uses the sky suite which is an innovative design that allows them to get a configuration where many airlines are using a the seat is comfortable and converts to a spacious fully flat seat nicely squared off the downside is that there is nowhere to store anything in fully flat mode the interasia flights hndsgn and tpenrt were in shell flat seat configuration which is angledflat not a great seat food was decent though not spectacular on the long flights theres a service just after takeoff and a second whenever you wish up to two hours before landing jal is promoting the top chefs who develop their menu but an airplane galley is not a great place for execution the food quality was variable service was generally very friendly and professional no faults here with one big execption at the international transfer desk in nrt after checking in i was told by the woman at the desk that there were two lounges that i could use one just upstairs and one closer to my gate but that the upstairs lounge was very nice and the one by the gate was not so good i was just going to sit and read and have a drink so i walked the mins to the lounge closer to the gate turns out that not so good means closed for renovation and had been so for some time and at this point i was too far out to make it back to the other lounge imo this is an inexcusable mistake on jals part

ive flown many airlines and this trip i flew legs from shanghai to hawaii with jal and i mist say they have the absolute best economy service ever that goes for ground staff to checkin staff to on board flight attendants they were all so friendly especially toward my son and helpful and professional the seats were comfortable the entertainment system was top notch my son got his child meals so quickly and they were excellent quality actually except for the leg leaving hawaii all the food was the best i have had on an airline in economy class bravo jal
japan airlines is an airline that will surely provide you the comfort service and care while crossing continents

jal uses jet for the route from sydney yo helsinki via tokyo the only downside for these flights are the extended transit time we have to spend an overnight at tokyo or narita airport hotel on our way from sydney and hours on our way from helsinki the seat is spacious compared to most airlines and on our way back to sydney we have been upgraded to business class sky suite lie flat is possible from helsinki to tokyo

i would like to specially thank ms stephanie wong stewardess on my japan airlines flight jl code share with american airlines flight aa i can feel her earnest attentive service attitude towards all passengers she would occasionally checked on passengers if we need anything to make our hours minutes transpacific flight more comfortable she is very polite and wellmannered hooray to ms stephanie wong a star service thank you
excelent flights with jal disappointed with return ba with jal food and service was excellent and inflight films ba disorganised and minimalistic tried hard but lacked basics

always satisfied jals services and hospitality all cabin crues watch everybody with their warm eyes if you wnat to request something one of cabin crues walk up to you without your voice it is amaging this is omotenashi japanese style hospitality also flight is always on time you never forget

although it was a twelve hour flight in economy it was such a pleasant flight the onboard service was top notch and all the flight attendants made the experience worth to positively remember the plane an almost brand new dreamliner was silent comfy and really pleasant ive flown dozens of airlines and jal is one ot the best in long haul along with finnair ba lufthansa air france tap delta emirates and turkish a
like everything in japan the plane was exceptionally clean and the staff incredibly gracious i booked with american airlines and could not be happier that i was put on jal

i recently travelled to japan with japan airlines it was the first time i have travelled with them and it wont be the last the plane was new and very clean and the service was even better both flights crews were pleasant and very polite i highly recommend them

a brilliant experience for long haul we were in economy good food meals snacks and complementary drinks blanket pillow great choice of movies audio news games staff couldnt do enough so friendly would recommend

would never fly this airline again missed my inward leg but told by jal staff wouldnt be a problem on return leg but upon trying to check in told ticket had been cancelled as standard jal policy then told only one seat left and is business class i paid for that then was handed an economy seat and asked if i wanted a window aisle seat when i questioned this they lied again saying theyd not said it was business class was x the original return ticket one way and then when i get on board there are empty seats in economy class would never recommend or use this airline again

given what i had heard i was expecting a much better experience having been on any long haul flights id say this was no better than average food in pe was not as good as id hoped and service was only ok we paid quite a bit exrta for what proved to be just a bit more room
the seats were spacious and i cnnot believe how efficient the airport staff are when the plane was being docked

i have not taken jal for many years and found my experience very positive this time the check in was very fast and easy my plane was a boeing and the interior was clean and pleasant the seat was comfortable with a reasonable amount of leg room the service was very straight forward and efficient which was typical of japan it was a stress free and relaxing flight overall
