if possible avoid the sky suite iii configuration i much prefer sky suite ii theres more room and privacy configuration iii is like a coffin the tv equipment is bulky and theres no room to wiggle cathay has a similar seat but they were astute enough to carve out some space below the side console as others have said jl really lacks in the ife department i tend to watch on my own tablet i wanted to watch a korean film called parasite but it was only available in japanese subtitles wth jal really shines when it comes to the japanese meal option however they should offer one more western option not everyone likes to eat red meat moreover after having flown jl a few times i long for something besides simmered burdock or braised fish the fas are pleasant polite and check up on pax frequently i try to seek jal when flying to japan and beyond because im an alaska mileage plan member however im leaning more towards ana these days theyre consistent with their business class seat offerings meanwhile jl has three international versions why the sakura lounge in nrt is solid but i actually prefer the admirals club sadly theyre closing in mar

the plane was not cramped one can freely move around without bumping into something or someone i dread airplane bathrooms but jals are different they are clean odor less and the one i got in had a full length mirror i have been flying all my life with different airlines but jal is the one for me from now on

i anticipated this years holiday to be special but had no idea to hear extent my so and i were planning our annual international vacation and as luck would have it came across relatively cheap flights to japan in december heres the catch it included a brief layover in dallas seattle on the return flight but certainly more tolerable than that in hong kong virtually any layover is preferable to that of twentythree hours at the hk airportthe flight into narita was fairly smooth as the airline staff provided utmost courtesy and comfort i will say with utmost bconfidence that the economy seats at jal singlehandedly top united my other favorite midpriced international airline american airlines sorry to say do not come close either in the staffs attitudes nor in the food and entertainment selections jal provides a succinct snapshot of the culture itself unadulterated cleanliness customer care and courtesy that is genuine rather than one projected by fake smiles as par for the course of a flight into japan we experienced somewhat frequent turbulence an aerial version of an earthquake as if were it seemed to occur almost on cue while the staff served and poured beverages naturally my red wine added a splash of color to the tray table the program selection was excellent as i was able to dive headlong into japanese cinema and get in the zone for my trip every venture into the country feels new and fresh regardless of the frequency with which i visit this was my third time abs certainly will be one of many more to come especially if it is via jal

the service always great on asian airlinesthe business class seats were lay downs but narrow gave out blanket but no duvet meals were so so nothing outstanding movie selections were good would fly again with them

i flew lax osaka on jal and returned tokyonarita lax on american i never thought that id say this but american airlines was more comfortable aside from very good dinner on jal business class was only marginally better than comfort class on other airlines the seats were very cramped with a lot of space taken by a very bulky console between the two seats when in the flat position for sleeping the whole seat was raised making it an even more cramped situation it was brutally hot during the flight and when i asked about it the attendant said that there was nothing that could be done i understand from friends who were in coach that after multiple requests to lower the temperature their cabin became more comfortable amenity kits were nothing special the wine was housewine quality and other than the dinner the food was average and the entertainment choices were very limited especially for a flight of that length on the return flight on american the seats were definitely more spacious and comfortable the service was acceptable and the cabin personnel were attentive i have friends who have asked my opinion about which airline to use and contrary to my general policy of avoiding aa i found that on this this routing american was superior to jal

we really enjoyed flying with jal as the title of our review suggests the jal staff are well organized respectful and welcoming the service is very good too we really like their flying schedule and chose to fly to delhi via tokyo on jal after comparing it with airlines that fly across the atlantic there were a couple of areas that could do with improvement the specially prepared chef meals can be a hit or a miss and on the flight from tokyo to san diego the food was very unappetizing we also did not understand why on the daytime flight from san diego to tokyo they darkened the cabin for daylight hours when ones internal clock should be on daylight time this did not make any sense unless jal was trying somehow to reduce activity and service to save money it felt a bit manipulative otherwise the flights were very comfortable restrooms were always clean and the pilots were excellent landing gently on different runways

i had about an hour between connecting flights and made use of the jal first class lounge at narita near gate the lounge is under renovation the upstairs renovation is completed so the dining area upstairs is in great condition and well equipped as for the main floor more than half the lounge area is now closed for renovation so there is only a seating area on the main floor with all dining moved upstairs the upstairs dining area now serves food to order instead of a buffet there is a sushi station offering a set of three different pieces of sushi which selection changes every week there is also a noodle station offering a choice of two different soup noodles which you order and then are given a device which will signal when your order is ready finally there are two stations offering western and japanese style dishes made to order such as pasta or on this visit chicken in mushroom cream sauce on a side island station there are serveral breads and pastries and soups for self service all the food i tried was very good and presented on beautiful plates too the flight boarded on time at pm for the pm flight the flight is operated with a b with rows of seats each in business class configured xx i had seat a a window seat that is nicely positioned next to the window with a cabinet next to it between the seat and the aisle for greater privacy row and the other odd numbered rows have the opposite arrangement with the seat next to the aisle and the cabinet next to the window business class was not full on the flight with about empty seats the seat is the sky suite ii fully horizontal flatbed seat when reclined to the bed position the bed lies very low to the ground sleep was fairlly comfortable on the seat in bed position but the bed is quite narrow if sleeping on ones back rather than side there were two meal services dinner shortly after takeoff and then breakfast about hours before landing for dinner there was a choice of a japanese meal or two different western meals the japanese set starts with a bento box of many different items followed by a main of marinated chicken and yellowtail teriyaki with rice ending with a dessert of sesame pudding the western meals both start with several horsdoeuvres and then a main of either roasted japanese beef sirloin or olive flounder with clams ending with a dessert of a cream puff stuffed with bitter chocolate cream and yuzu confit for breakfast the choice was between the japanese set with simmered pork or the western set with an omelette with bolognese sauce i had the japanese choice with both meals but opted for the chocolate cream puff dessert from the western menu instead for dinner all the food was beautifully presented and delicious i also made a point of having coffee at both meals since jal serves special monthly chosen coffee in business class on its flights in fact the menu has a description of the monthly coffee in the same way as the available wines and sakes are introduced between take off and preparation for landing and the two meal service almost half of the hr min flight time was used up so i only managed about hours of sleep on the flight service in business class on the flight was wonderful as usual the cabin staff were very efficient and gracious in meal service and clean up were constantly going through the cabin to see if passengers needed anything else and constantly cleaned the toilets so they were always in good condition our flight landed on time and first bags were delivered to the luggage carousel promptly within about minutes after landing another wondeful flight on jal superb gracious service and great food
i wish i could give them less than a one they messed up my reservation and didnt care didnt try to fix it put effort in every flight i flew left late and arrived late i could go onbut why
this was a great flight the service was amazing get to check in early and request a goo seat take some movies with you
this was a great flight cabin service was excellent the entertainment selection could be more varied

having flown several asian airlines i had high expectations for jal flight from tokyo to san francisco additionally having just spent time in japan and knowing what service levels are there i was looking forward to the business class service i was doomed for disappointment service was relatively slow compared to other airlines and our specially requested vegetarian meal was bleh truly unappetizing a complete opposite to the service and food in asian air in which we flew across to asia

one of the few good oneworld airlines with qatar airways flew economy on very modern planes out back with wellappointed cabins compares well with emirates much better than ba or lh service was friendly food was pleasant makes a change and imaginative service was friendly the best choice for a direct flight lhrhnd

japan airlines has very clean aircraft and the cabin crew are always impeccably neat the food is ok and substantial then again this is on the meal provider the politeness of the japanese is legendary and cannot be more displayed the crew bows before the waiting passengers before they board it is always almost on schedule when everyone is asleep snacks are available in the galley their home narita has the cleanest rest rooms

had a pretty long flight arround hours even though i didnt pay for any premium service or had extras the attention was excellent im a really tall person and usually struggle a little with the economic airlines because my legs dont fit but in jal it was all the opposite sits are comfortable space for the legs is okay space in the restroom was perfect for even stretching myself the food is incredible had lovely meals tea and snacks they give you pillow blanket slippers headphones three meals and hot towels to clean yourself the enternetainment was okay recent cool movies and series

this was my first trip flying on jal and after hearing a few positive things i decided to book their long haul flight from london to tokyo direct i was travelling to japan for the rugby world cup and the quarter final was the day i was due to arrive so i was anxious having not used jal previously of possible delays i should not have been worried as not only did the flight leave early but it also got in early the flight was just under hours which played havoc on my knees and back however the attendants were always on hand with an extra cushion drink or additional food of which i took advantage of each time i am and there was good leg space in economy and my only issue was on the return flight when the individual in front of me reclinded their seat for the best part of four hoursno fault of jal of course overall it was a good flight with efficent timing and atentive staff would recommend and use again for any future japan visits

easy check in online and then extremely quick baggage drop off comfortable seat with good leg room onboard service was great flight attendants were excellent ordered boarding instead of the usual rush and you actually had free space in the overhead locker

our first time to fly jal and we absolutely loved it the flight was on time and boarding was orderly the cabin crew are so gracious and attentive food is good they even serve wine in economy i was not able to view the inflight entertainment because the flight was short but my husband enjoyed watching some movies already planning our next flight using jal

very comfortable seatsbeds with mattress if required nice touch service was attentive and friendly and food and refreshments were of a high quality entertainment could have been better though i felt there was a limited choice of films compared to other airlines flights were on timeearly and all in all a very pleasant experience

i was looking to book through japan air because of the very good service they have on board flying attendants are always smile check on passengers all the time food is great many movies to watch i would definitely recommend to fly by japan air
comfortable seats awesome wine list food portion enough but have room for improvement wide selection of movies which is a big advantage very polite server

pleasant flights to and from kuala lumpur on this airline one of the few airlines that actually have a bit of extra leg room service is good and no complaints with meals or service try not to fly to australia via singapore on jal as they code share with qantas out of singapore and their flights are not as good and neither is the planes used

we have used this flight from narita to honolulu st thing we were welcomed with was even though we have used coach class we have reserved to use sakura lounge prior to flight through one of our credit card service provider as a benefit of its card we were welcomed with hard rejection of the lounge usage and lounge receptionists werent helping much kept telling us we were not registered we were sure that we were registered to use the lounge but it was not on their record nd thing on the returning flight when they deliver meals to us we were sitting at the end row and one of the choices meal they had run out that could happen because again it is an economy class but the food provided as a result was enormously bad taste i have been using multiple airlines in my life maybe or so but it was the worst of all i had to spit out and didnt even touch the rest it was the same for rest of the people in my group we were group of the other meal provided on the same flight was also extremely terrible not sure how to describe but they should be serving purchased bento or sandwich box at the airport instead of such terrible meals it was way over the limit even it is for economy class it was cheaply priced flight for sure but they should at least give us some dignity

first time on this airline new with good seat configuration meaning more room than my previous flight on a ba which had great food great entertainment and movies excellent service very comfortable would definitely fly with them again
nice variety of entertainment up to date movie list great food and drink great service comfortable seat

it was difficult to get seat assignments early on japan airlines so we had to take what we got which wasnt a problem after all the economy section on jal is very good its roomier than others and has that wonderful japanese service

the whole experience was excellent i hated the idea of a hour flight but it was made so easy with attentive staff great seats wide deep and comfortable lots of leg room and plenty of storage space there was a sense of calm and quiet not normally experienced on most airlines i would definitely use them again

there is no doubt that the hospitality of the airline staff on japan airlines was the best ever in over years of air travel the plane was exceptionally clean the seats were the best ever large spacious it was a boeing series flight very smooth bit the key talking point was the closeby pass of mount fuji everyone got up took photos exchanged pleasantries very social and many shared learning excellent value beats all airlines that i have ever flown on hands down in economy class

we flew round trip in premium economy in october to and november from stellar service the cabin crew is unfailingly polite helpful and attentive if only all airlines could offer this level of service the onboarding process in both directions was breathtakingly organized and efficient the best two onboarding experiences in all our years of travel it really makes you wonder why it cant always be that way dont make something simple something hard comfort the premium economy seats are comfortable and certainly worth the price the restrooms are cleaned and restocked so frequently that they are always fresh and pleasant to use nuts and bolts the power outlets in either of our seats did not work in either direction and that was a downer particularly on such a long flight underseat storage in front of you is limited but better than some others the headphones werent great and outlets didnt accept our headphones the movie selection was poor and resolution not great on the flight between jfk and haneda the plane was so hot it kept us awake the flight back was very pleasant food we have read here that many people liked the food on their flights we found it awful really awful both flights the best and saving grace was the ramen noodle cups made available on our return flight despite the negatives we view jal very favorably they treat people very well and the kindness and consideration shown by their personnel ncluding check in is exemplary premium economy is comfortable and good value we will likely fly jal preferentially whenever possible
great services good food excellent crews reasonable price ground service is also amazing staffs are full of service mind

the cabin crew were very pleasant and helpful the food if you enjoy japanese fare for economy class this was five star the seats were very cramped checkin was easy too this is certainly one of the worlds better airlines but our first choice ana is better but their scheduledestinations did not suit

my first flight to japan was on jal i made sure the aircraft was a for the many hidden comfort features built into that particular model aircraft i was well pleased with the result jal configured seating on the boeing aircraft in economy international with their e configuration resulting in seats across better than many competitors who use seats across cabin comfort in the due to better air better humidity and lower noise was excellent the crew was helpful efficient unobtrusive and friendly the flight path chosen by the captain avoided turbulence while reaching our destination on time if you like to avoid surprises jal is a solid choice the mother with infant who was seated in our bulkead row center section was given a wallmount bassinet allowing the infant to sleep comfortably and quietly directly in front of okasan the cost was very affordable though i did not compare airlines to search for cheaper fares videoaudio entertainment was good meals were amazing with stainless flatwarein eonomy seriously so im not even going to look at any other airlines for my next trip to japan or other east asia destinations then there is this note japan airlines jal was awarded by customers for featuring the worlds best economy class and the best economy class airline seat at the at the skytrax world airline awards held at the paris air show

braced myself for the usual loooong haul flight from manila to usa via haneda to my surprise it didnt seem that long because of the comfort the whole flight offered i was pleasantly surprised to realize the seats were not as cramped as i recall the crew was excellent and flights left and arrived on time

the service from jal staff both on the ground and in the air is excellent weve flown jal several times to and from japan and prefer to fly this airline than any other their customer service via phone resolved an issue i had quickly and efficiently

found a great deal on cheapoair rt lax to bkk business class dont splurge often but glad i did this time i was greeted personally by the crew supervisor by name before takeoff and again before landing to make sure everything was good the food service seat and entertainment were excellent you must try the japanese menu at least once amazing cannot wait for the return flight
so polite and well mannered nothing was a problem efficient and very friendly for an economy flight i really enjoyed it

i took jal economy class for my flight return jakartatokyo and osakatokyojakarta on november its a nice filght experience starts from the airport ground to the airplane cabin the whole service was great easy checkin and baggage procedures ontime boarding and departing even the pilot crew appologize for mins delay due to takeoff queue spacy legroom great inflight entertainment delicious inflight meals and free flow drinks the cabin crew also very polite and helpful its really worthed flight

overall the flight was pleasant and smooth nothing in particular to specifically highlight the crew were professional and courteous all along and have pleasant smiles the in flight entertainment was enjoyable though there wasnt a great selection to choose from the food being served were nice

i recently flew a leg trip from saigonhanedajfk iverall it was a great travel experience the gate staff were professional and courteous we boarded saigon on time haneda a minute delay but arrived both times a little ahead of schedule my seats on both the and er were comfortable large compared to us and other asian carriers ive flown with good legroom and mobility and everything was clean this has always been my experience on japan airlines i had a lot of in flight movies tv and music programs to choose from western and international with or without subtitles my choice the food and cabin service was good and the flight attendants courteous and professional good eye contact and respectful giving me their full attention when they were addressing me thank you ms bando i had confidence that they would be able to handle any situation the entire cabin was nicely appointed and the lavatories were always clean the flight attendants see to that excellent job not everyones favorite my seat the carpeting and the tray tables were well maintained and clean too not always the case on most other airlines ive flown at hours flying time its definitely a long haul but my experience onboard made it one of the best economy experiences ive had this was also a great value i paid usd round trip which is a highly competitive fare combined with the service aircraft and baggage allowance it was a great value domo arigato japan airlines

i used this airline on january fly for about hours from jakarta with stop at narita and continue to sapporo the staffs start from check in counter and cabin crews were so kind friendly and helpful the flight itself was very clean and i have smooth fly experience with them the food was good and we have free flow waterjuice everytime we need with snacks in between you wont feel hungry if you fly with them oh ya i love the ice cream the option of videos are vary you can choose music movie news etc without feel bored so i enjoy my first fly with japan airlines good job keep the good service

standard flight to san diego only because i was coming home did it feel good it was nonstop and the only way i want to fly connections are too dangerous these days jal on whole was a good flight crew attentive and fairly comfortable for economy

i read reviews before booking most commented that there was leg room in economy and its true the price was right and so grateful i could fly into logan airport boston some reviews said the food was terrible but that was not my experience it was a breeze to check in online and get boarding passes i generally cannot get boarding passes printed in advance on other international airlines

japan airline may be a little more expensive but the extra legroom and service is well worth it this was especially good for me as i had an overnight return flight and was refreshed ready for work when i landed back in sydney

i have flown a number of other airlines including another trip to japan approximately months prior with ana ana was okay and i had no complaints but jal went above and beyond the cabin crew were attentive and friendly the seats were comfortable the food was delicious and the flight seemed to go quickly with us arriving relatively relaxed and refreshed i couldnt recommend jal more and only wish they flew from sydney to more destinations
excellent service and pod lie down seats food was very good and flight attendants helpful flight time of hours was fine with these seats and entertainment options

i couldnt have asked for a better airline everything from the lounges service food and seating was first class i have been doing this trip every year for the past years and have never had a lost suitcase and have never had any delays treat yourself this is a great airline
jal continues to be one of the better international carriers that ive flown would highly recommended

second time to fly with jal both experiences the same friendly from the moment you leave the ground until you touch it again no sour faces like other airlines tend to have so much leg room down the back the food is outstanding the drink choices amazing and the toilets always clean and seem more spacious than other airlines give them a go you wont need to think twice the only thing that could be improved is the entertainment particularly the music selection and tv series stars from us

food is good they feed you wellstaff is very nice no attitudes seats are comfortable and movies on seats chargers for phoneplenty drinks even two bloody mariesi love japan airlines and ibhave flown a lot
excellent food presentation and taste staff are courteous and professional i would not hesitate to fly with them again worth all your benjamims

i am a very nervous flyer so i was not looking forward to the hour flight to japan we travelled premium ecomony because of the fact that i am nervous so wanted to be as comfortable as possible and it was definately worth paying extra as the seats were very roomy and comfortable with plenty of leg room i spoke with a member of the crew and explained that i was nervous so he asked my name and checked on me regulary throughout the flight to make sure i was ok the bathrooms were kept very clean but now having been to japan and seen how clean the country is its understandable why the planes are so clean i forgot to mention the boarding process at frankfurt and how amazing quick it was premium economy boarded and the we were ready to go but we did not even realise that economy had even boarded so we guessed they boarded both at the same time but at different entrances the only downside was the food none of it was good which was disappointing but then again plane food is never good overall the flight was good and the staff were great and i would recommend japan airlines with no hesitation i just hope i get to fly with them again we loved japan too so it is likely we will go back

japan airlines is highly rated but sitting in economy you dont feel like theyre going out of their way for you you are at the bottom of four class levels and you really feel it food service is hurried and limited not a lot of selections for drinks movie selections were limited that said you are no doubt getting bigger seats than on any american airline and they do have direct flights from nyc i would take them again for those reasons but not gladly our flight to tokyo was probably made worse by a child who cried loudly practically the entire way there the plane was pretty much full so no possibility to move further away from the crying fourteen and a half hours on a plane is probably too much for a year old child parents probably need to look into some sort of sleep aid for a child of that age otherwise they are being very inconsiderate of other passengers
surprised by a flight all business or first i was so glad that i could stretch out sleep not possible however

we raided the piggy bank for business class owing to the length of the flight i had prior experience with jal a number of years ago and it has gotten even better comfortable pods with legroom to stretch out and sleep im and the mattresses they provide were extremely comfortable flight attendants were courteous attentive competent and seriously attractive in stylish uniforms food both japanese and western was excellent our return flight was from haneda airport and we availed ourselves of their business class lounge while waiting to board best ive ever seen „ÅÇ„Çä„Åå„Å®„ÅÜ„Åî„Åñ„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åó„Åü arigat≈çgozaimashita

i flew to tokyo by jal in november for two weeks visit in japan the service on sky is excellent and cabin crew were always plite with gentle smile food was lovely and snacks were always given away between as well the entertainment didnt bore me out in the toilet cubicles there were handwritten messages from the crews on the day it was heartwarming it is a long flight but jal will give you a comfortable journey for sure

enjoyed my week trip nonstop direct flight aboard boeing on jal from jfk ny to narita japan and return on jal this composite plane allows more pleasant humidity level thus avoiding that typical dry scratchy feeling and a little more leg room the stewardesses are polite pleasant efficient and work hard to keep everyone happy my return trip was a bonus had seats to myself to stretch out and sleep sideways on this trip i got a prepaid sim card at narita arrival for my unlocked iphone good for month unlimited data g for us it worked out great got all my emails text google gps without worrying about data use or if wifi available for phone conversation use in japan or to call my friends and family in usa for free used apps whatsapp and line whatsapp worked flawlessly for text photos videos video calls and phone calls
flight is on time flight stewardess are friendly and accomodating as always it must be the japanese culture

for long haul flights i will choose japan airlines whenever i can their economy seat is better than most airlines ive taken and the meals served are quite decent some flights can be quite packed because of the configuration but besides that ive mostly had good experiences with jal
excellent airline even though economy the seats were spacious enough the food was delicious the hostesses attentive movie and audio were better than the average airline

im only tall and even i feel the pinch of not enough legroom but there was plenty on this flight the staff were more than friendly and attentive the food was very good for airline food too this is a win

impressed with the hospitality and the way they take care of small details the quality of food and taste was so good and they were happy to customized as per my needs i m sure would love to travel again with them
amazing flight with jal they are so efficient friendly and great i highly recommend this flight and airline

i took jals overnight flight from tokyo haneda to bangkok in business class prior to departure i visited the lounge as jals first class lounge in haneda is closed for renovation first class passengers and jal and oneworld elite members ie emerald are directed to the sakura skyview lounge instead on the th floor near gate the lounge was very spacious with lots of seating in the buffet dining area and elsewhere the buffet had a good selection of food including jals trademark beef curry but does not have any made to order stations as found in jals first class lounge in narita and before in haneda the lounge was not very busy when i got there around pm for my am flight it picked up a bit closer to pm but there were still plenty of seats for everyone to stretch out a bit with empty seats buffers for all i made my way to my gate a bit early and lined up in group for oneworld emeralds and jal top tier members jal sorts passengers into groups and has separate lines for each group very orderly uncharacteristically the flight was late in boarding by about to minutes as a result pushback was also late at about am for the am scheduled flight take off was about am with the video monitor showing a flight time of hours minutes the flight was operated with a b equipped with the sky suite iii horizontal fully flatbed seat laid out xx in business class i had the first window seat a which was nice as it was on the side with an additional toilet at the front and the front galley was located on the other side of the plane so there was no galley noise or traffic near my seat the downside for seat a is that it only has one window whereas most other window seats appear to have two windows the sky suite iii seat is a bit unusual in that it does not have a leg rest that can be raised in recline position like the sky suite ii seat instead the entire seat just slides forward and flattens out for recline to a flatbed when fully reclined to the bed position the passengers legs fit into quite a deep hole under the video screen but as a result the exit space to the aisle is located quite high up the body when lying down so it is a bit difficult to exit to the aisle from the bed position there is a small storage cabinet on the window side of the seat to store the headphones and the bottled water provided on boarding and there is another storage space under the armrest on the aisle side which can be raised or lowered with the aisle side armrest lowered there is extra width to the seat in bed position but i found the material of the armrest to be a bit too hard to comfortably rest my arms on it as opposed to on the cushioned seat that said and also perhaps because it was a late night flight i found the sky suite iii to be quite comfortable to sleep in and slept for about ¬Ω hours on the flight on boarding business class passengers found a form at their seat for them to fill in as to breakfast preference i opted to be woken up for breakfast and chose the japanese menu as soon as we took off and the seatbelt sign was turned off i reclined my seat to bed position and fell asleep fairly quickly about two hours before landing the lights were turned on and breakfast was served as usual the japanese meal was both beautifully presented and delicious i also had some coffee as jal serves special coffee in business class sourced from a coffee hunter based in tokyo the coffee is always excellent and jal even includes a description of the coffee of the month in the menu with growing region background and tasting notes just like for wines our flight landed a few minutes early at am immigration was quick as business class passengers have use of the premium lane which only had a couple of people in each line therefore i was at the luggage carousel before the first bags started arriving about half an hour after our flight landed one of the benefits of an overnight flight is that bangkoks notorious traffic is not a factor at all and i was able to get into the city center in only about half an hour with the light traffic of early morning

we enjoyed our long flight on jal checkin was efficient and friendly the was clean with the longest seat pitch in economy that we have experienced recenltly the flight staff were well groomed friendly and provided excellent service the meals served were very goodbetter than us carriers accompanied by a good selection of complimentary beverages including beer wine and champagne the entertainment system was good with an excellent set of earphones that were provided

travelled on their b on their rd flight to hnd of the day ground service was polite as usual unable to purchase j class as it was a full flight plane was new newspaper and sweets souvenirs were given at the entrance upon boarding round of drinks were provided in this hr of the flight newly furburised seats were of light made material with minimal padding and recline however legroom was better than the europrean flights within europe individual air vents were available at each seat it provided some relief as the air con was not switched on during take off and landing jal inflight and ground service are as exceptional as always

i also returned on jal and both directions were top service and comfort i had paid extra for legroom and felt on both flights that i was at home in my comfy chair in front of my tv when i return to the east i will book wherever possible jal

i havent flown with them yet but they have stunned me with their profoundly poor customer service and amateurish communications they changed my flight notifying me in a poorly written note that included only a phone number from within japan the only available number for jal inside the us was overwhelmed sometimes busy and did not have an option for me so they hung up eventually they didnt address my companions ticket or changes for a connecting flight and my locator number no longer works and so forth and so on i wrote them through their website and received another strangely poor note asking me to just write them back without addressing the several issues they created seriously this is a major airline i really thought theyd be efficient i cant believe ta named them fifth best in the world

great customer service on board friendly crew smooth flight it was one of the quieter planes ive been in and even though we were told there might be turbulence it seemed a very comfortable flight they serve plenty of food on this hour flight i just found it rather bland but thats just me
i wrote my review of this flight but was unable to upload photos of the cx lounge and jal flight earlier here are the photos

ive flown jal business class several times not the best business class but im happy with it the service by the flight attendants was great the actual flight was comfortable flight departed on time and hours later with a minute stop at tokyo narita to change planes for another hours flying time to manila it actually seemed quite quick now to get over the jet lag thanks jal see you again

travelled to kmq on their first flight out from hnd on a full flight at am we were terribly late and reached the check in counter mins before the flight ground staff were kind to print our boarding pass and personally escort us to the gate with our big suitcases the suitcases were loaded to the aircraft at the boarding gate flight crew were courteous and did one round of drink service seats had little padding and recline however leg room was good they deserve a star rating in skytrax

good service nice smooth flight seat is not the best but plenty of leg room no complaints arrived on time flying pe grated access to jal private lounge in narita upon landing while waiting for connecting flight very good lounge so i would recommend

japan airlines was at one time our airline of choice well times have changed we family of three missed our red eye flight am from tokyo to bangkok our mistake regarding the date and we took full responsibility by purchasing tickets from another airline because japan air could not help us get to thailand the return portion of the flight remained unchanged but to our dismay japan airlines cancelled our entire flight without warning they had our email address and phone numbers when we arrived to the bangkok airport for return to tokyo seat assignments in hand they said that our tickets had been cancelled even though there were empty seats in their flight the japan airlines officials refused to honor any portion of our paid tickets or to put us on the flight our option pay for new one way tickets on thai air very nice by the way and wait for hours in the bangkok airport next time we will just avoid the headache and skip japan airlines entirely they would not even give us the frequent flyer mileage we paid for stingy and bureaucratic would be two words to describe that behavior shockingly when they use japan in their name a country that excels at customer service

jal premium economy proved to be not only an excellent value way to travel to japan but an excellent way to start my time in japan a dedicated check in line was swiftly able to check in me in then provide an express path card for departure security and immigration one of the great things jal offers for premium economy guests is business class lounge access both in sydney and tokyo the qantas lounge is pleasant enough more so early on before it gets crowded with a reasonable selection of food and drinks big plus is the barista made coffee after heading to the gate priority boarding is offered also the premium seats are very comfortable both in width and pitch with a dedicated leg rest and foot rest also provided a comfortable blanket pillow was waiting on arrival along with a basic amenity kit more than adequate for this flight recline was excellent and being a shell seat you wont have anyone reclining into your space or legroom on the food front food is the same as economy with the addition of a few drinks such as sparkling wine and sake food was of high quality by economy standards for both taste and presentation udon noodles are available in between meals and a small snack bar is available also in the galley entertainment wise jal is definitely lacking compared to other carriers however there was more than enough to pass the time wifi is available and is reasonably priced the crew were warm engaging and helpful both during meal services and otherwise

i flew jal from vancouver to narita in business class prior to the flight i opted to use the cathay pacific lounge rather than the plaza premium third party lounge offered by jal since the cx lounge is much nicer and much less crowded plaza premium allows anyone to enter by paying always crowded as usual excellent service in the cx lounge particularly as the jal flight is about a half hour earlier than the cx flight so the cx passengers largely had not arrived at the lounge yet when i was there cx offers the noodle bar with hot food to order and also a side buffet with sandwiches salads desserts i tried the chicken risotto quite good but a bit too salty and shrimp dumplings wrapping stuck to the paper so both dumplings ripped open when i tried to pick them up but did not want more food since i had to save room for the great meal service on jal general boarding for the pm flight commenced promptly at pm preboards those who require assistance and young children started earlier around pm jal has switched to a b instead of the b dreamliner for this route the tradeoff is an older plane but better seats in business class with sky suite ii fully flat bed seats instead of the angle flat shell flat neo on the b dreamliner the seats are configured xx with just rows and seats in the business class cabin considerably less than the to seats on the dreamliner configured xx every seat has direct aisle access and the window seats alternate rows with a console beside the seat on the window side or the aisle side my seat a has the console on the aisle side so provided a bit more privacy from what happens in the aisle in addition to converting to a fully flat bed the sky suite ii seats also have a lower back massage function which felt quite nice the flight was slightly late on pushback due to some passengers boarding a bit late and then there was quite a wait after pushback before the plane started to move to taxi and ultimately take off was a bit after pm the flight was not very full in business class with about empty seats out of though one was being used as a pilot rest seat as always a highlight of the flight are the meal services with each meal being beautifully presented i had the japanese meal for the lunch served after take off which started with a bento box of delicious and visually attractive starters then rice with both salmon and sukiyaki beef and finished with the lemon mousse cake dessert jal serves a special coffee in business class and the menu describes in detail the coffee of the month much as a wine review would describe a wine as a result i always have at least a couple of cups of coffee on jal flights for the second meal i chose the western option of a ham and cheese frittata also good but was disappointed the croissant came bare without any butter or jam there appeared to be at least cabin stewards including the purser attending to the small business class cabin so service was very attentive and always courteous and excellent they seem to be constantly cleaning the toilets even taking the time to fold the toilet paper into a triangle at the end a gentleman was celebrating his birthday that day and the cabin crew actually brought him a bottle of champagne a little fruit plate and a small gift bag and sang happy birthday to him cabin staff even went around to the other guests to ask them to join in the celebration the entertainment system is a bit weaker in selection than perhaps cathay pacific partly because many selections are japanese only due to the time of the flight i did not sleep much as it was mostly afternoon and early evening vancouver time but did find the flat bed comfortable enough for napping the flight was quite turbulent and at the wrong times during both meal service for the second meal service the turbulence was sufficient to cause the cabin crew to serve coffee in a paper cup with a plastic lid instead of a ceramic cup due to a combination of the late pushback and takeoff and probably a relatively long flight time we arrived around minutes late perhaps this was the reason we had a remote stand and had to walk down steps and be bused to the terminal arriving around pm into narita is a horrible time for immigration lineups with so many arriving passengers flooding towards the passport control counters that airport staff had to hold up signs indicating where the end of the queue line was all told it took about minutes from the plane touching down on the runway to my exiting into the arrivals hall after passport control and customs there is no priority immigration lane that can be used by jal business class passengers so everyone just joins the general line all in all another excellent flight on jal with excellent service and food

what a dump this airlines is i highly do not recommend anyone to fly with japan airlines particularly for long flights firstly they starve you with insufficient meals on board their solution to this is to provide you with instant noodles when you are starving great so no just starve you but make you malnuourished at the same time secondly they try to blind you with overly bright fluorescent lighting both in the plane as well as when youre in transit in narita airport unless you love fluorescent lighting i advise you to avoid this airline at all costs thirdly when you then had enough of their crappy service and you go to cancel the return flight while in boston they put you on hold for an hour just to cancel the flight no cancellation via internet allowed i dont know why is this the s all in all a nightmare experience created by the japanese like youre caught in some bad hentai movie with no escape and with crappy lights to boot

i am an american airline aa member and have recently booked my flight between chicago and japan using aa mileage points from chicago to japan there is only one aa flight service so i had no choice to book the aa flight operated by japan airline jal then i tried to select my seat in advance but simply was unable to do it so i contacted aa and learnt that jal is very strict about seat selection for code share flights irrespective of the aa membership levels this is ridiculous given that both aa and jal are now oneworld alliance members and also given that aa passengers may have to use the aa flight operated by jal if it is the only one aa flight service provided i have no intention of becoming a jal member again i am japanese and used to be a jal member only to solve this issue ie i have more domestic travels in us relative to flying between japan and us japanese airline companies including jal provide excellent care and service to passengers which i like very much but jal and probably all nippon airways can be more flexible about seat selection for code share flights

first leg ending in narita japan second let to vancouver bc ive had better food on an airline quantas and american come to mind but im not so sure the service on japan air has its equal in my own experiences which only include british and alitalia to the above for international flights these people never stop looking for someone to attend to they came around at least ten times with drinks four times with food and once with warm towels they are quick to attend to small children and those that just look like they need something if they do or not love this airline i would fly them anytime

this plane blew me away as i walked in the door past the first class seats wow then got to my seat i could actually sit and had room for my legs then the service started free meals to be exact hot clothes about every hrs to refresh you drinks non alcohol all u wanted watched excellent movies free as well very comfortable seats the bathroom wow again evan had toothbrushes if you desired wrapped i strongly recommend this airline my best by far experience on any airline
very comfortable journey with courteous service variety of inflight entertainment and serving requested special meal on priority

after the terrible experience with cathay pacific last monrth i decided to try jal for this trip been a long time and regret not using them again sooner benefit of jl is that flight is that it boards from the t at ord so no need to make the trip over to t plane is a service and catering was excellent very generous measures for all drinks too only small negatives are that the business seat space is a little tight with the jal staggered configuration and the window seats could do with more storage space also took a look at the premium economy cabin seats seemed spacious and comfortable and cabin has much better design for the twin toilet area compared to cathay pacifics noisy and poorly placed single toilet on the plane will definitely be using the jal pe service in the future the fare paid for this trip was surprisingly reasonable and the connection flight jl continued the excellemnt level of service

this is the first time we flew japan airlines we we treated so nicely and at time did not know to handle the japanese politeness and courtesy but nice to get pampered the whole experience was flawless from check in to deplaning no hassles and issues outstanding service

very good food despite my wanting to do as much japanese as possible the wagyu beef for the western selection was fantastic you can get robes a mattress pad and other things but you have to ask slippers with a shoe horn light blankets and pillow along with the amenity bag are standard bs class very nice the flight attendants sailed down the aisles with smiles but i couldnt get their attention then i pushed the call button by mistake and instantly two attendants were there to help me thats when i learned you have to ask i was politely waiting until they had time to notice me and they were politely allowing my privacy the lounge was good but not great at first we were disappointed until we realized that the real food was upstairs yes there was a sign duh
flight cancelled alternative involves hours in tokyo transferring to haneda from narita at my own expense arriving hours later stupid useless airline cant even run a schedule never again

ground staff amazing despite the english japanese barriers hey even my japanese does not go far into airline technical language these women were so helpful lot of support to get my bag to me for the next day promised to contact my hotel they did promised to find the bag they did they could see i was tired and stressed so courteous to this soon to be cranky traveler i wasnt happily the desk staff had to fix about five airlines issues about baggage about staff to help many issues they post a whopping big sign that i almost fell over to attract my attention enroute to baggage carousel i asked a random staff member they had a list of passenger issues and directed me to that main desk all had my details while i could make judgmental comparisons of other destinations i wont they do not deserve the space here for the terrific staff trying their best friendly at pm my crankometer rises after pm if i get my bag or not that is not the issue it was the amazing service
amazing quality and service bento boxes salmon legroom is incredible consolelike games on entertainment system

we are regular patrons of jal flying from vancouver to manila with stop overs in japan and have always been very satisfied with the overall service this year it was a marked disappointment with the downgrade of air craft from the dreamliner to a boeing it was not a pleasure to fly a long transpacific journey on a smaller uncomfortable aircraft which lacks the luxury of size of the planes used in the past that it was a disappointment would be to put it very mildly more so on the return journey they ran out of the western breakfast as requested by my husband unacceptable for a business class service otherwise the service was as usual excellent on one note the new amenity bag by maison kitsune a brand i like is rather useless in its flat sizer
service is very very good staffs cleanliness is among the best in the industry no complaints but not as good as emiratesfor overall experience
very comfortable flight and check experience staff very kind and polite nothing is to much trouble

after buying two round trip tickets notice sent that we would land in haneda and fly out of narita requires a transit visa for filipino wife we were refused visa by japanese embassy in manila jal said was our fault and could not get refund we were going to my sisters burial had to buy wife a rt ticket through hong kong to dallas i flew on original flight noticed my seats confirmed by jal rxqbwu were changed and my wifes seat sold to another passenger jal was great airlines up to this experience will never fly them again after many flights with them before extremely disappointed in jal my wife has usa green card and is a rn working on masters

it is difficult to classify the nature of this complaint as it spans jals reservations office as well as airport experience but it revolves around the above flight as well as my connecting flight jl which i missed because of delays in the initial flight once i received notification that my flight was going to be delayed my travel agency and i both tried contacting jal but the numbers just rang out i appreciate that they were in the aftermath of a typhoon in japan but nonetheless it is unacceptable for an airline to just go awol in the circumstances my travel agent advised me to go to the airport early and see if the staff there could help me this i did but the guy on the checkin desk could do nothing for me he suggested that i speak with the jal staff in the american airlines lounge once through security heres the best bit when i got to the lounge i was told that the jal staff had gone home for the day can you imagine my frustration at this the flight from ord to nrt was delayed by many hours but the jal staff didnt even bother to wait around to deal with travelers queries im sure that they would have known that there were going to have many customers in similar circumstances to myself effectively i was left in a situation where i was leaving ord with no idea what arrangements would be put in place for my onward connection all of this amounted to a thoroughly disappointing experience the first time that i was taking this route under a jal ticket although i have flown the route on an aa code share number on previous occasions based on the thoroughly unsatisfactory customer experience with jal i am extremely reluctant to fly jal again particularly as a jal flight at least if i had flown on an aa ticket i could have expected much better customer service as an emerald oneworld member

very comfortable flight in economy that hit all of the right customer service buttons except for the long flying time easy checkin boarding could be smoother but minor issue clean freshsmelling amazingly friendly welcome from everyone overhead space was good seat comfortable leg room was fine seating allowed for more aisle room good on a long flight for the walkers takeoff was ontime staff was amazing friendly excellent care always asking if you needed anything if you were comfortable food was very good and served hot even the cutlery was warm and this was economy cleanliness on this full hour flight was incredible bathrooms were cleaned by staff more than once and not with a quick wipe of a paper towel all floors were kept clean with the help of a sticky roller there was nothing messy about the condition of this airplane from start to finish amazing attention to detail and japanese cleaning traditions based on this one experience would recommend jal as a preferred airline to use in asia

in october and november i flew on jal on the bangkok to osaka route and again on the tokyo to chicago route and both nonstop flights were great the jal app allowed me to check in early and select my seats on my economy flights the flight attendants were always welcoming friendly and courteous the food was pretty good as well and was plentiful the seating had a little more room and reclined pretty far back allowing for sleep and relaxation i enjoyed my flights and if ever in japan and if the price is right i would fly with jal again

to the way back to germany we had another very positive experience with the japanese airlines very polite very helpful very good service enough room for the legs also in the economy class excellent food and beverages no delays no problems every other airline should take example on them

we flew back to the uk with boeinger aircraft despite the fact that we couldnt select our seats in advance we were fortunate enough to be given the front seats in the economy class aisle and middle i was very pleased at first that i was given a seat with more leg room than other seats there was an english passenger who was already seated at the window seat when we got to our seats i had to sit in the middle seat as my husband preferred to take the aisle seat and didnt have much complaint up to the time when i realised that the seat i was allocated had some faults later on the passenger next to me was a large lady with an injured leg and she kept moving about within her seat unfortunately everytime she moved tossed or turned the rest of the seat ie my seat directly and my husbands were affected in that her movement made the rest of the seats to be shaken badly and we hardly could get any sleep in this flight journey when i was seated in the middle trying desperately to get some sleep my seat was shaken in connection with this passengers movement it was almost as my seat was constantly pulled from behind when she moved each time to make the matters worse this passenger would like to take a peak at the view outside the window shutter a few times for the duration of the journey when the aircraft was flying into a daytime zone she opened the shutter unexpectedly and it really interrupted my sleep i really couldnt wait to see the end of the journey and get away from this hell honestly i really wished i could have my seat swapped with another had there been any vacant seat available unfortunately it was a full house with a large entourage of japanese school kids also on the same flight the only good thing about this journey was excellent customer service provided by the cabin attendants and food being served next time i fly back from japan to the uk i hope to get a better seat with possibly a better and more polite passenger another annoying incident once the aircraft finally landed at heathrow was that we were told off by a grumpy old english passenger at the premium economy class not to block the aisle when we were already waiting with our luggage for the aircraft door to open this was after the seat belt sign was turned off upon arrival i mean some people would like to get off quickly for transit etc and for that reasons they are waiting standby with luggages they are not blocking the aisle deliberately but simply just want to get out of the aircraft quickly as possible i dont quite understand why he has to complain about us and he himself ended up standing at the aisle waiting to get out whilst we were waiting for the door to open just because he has paid extra for the seat doesnt give him any more automatic privilege and rights than the rest of the passengers in economy class please note my rating on this review just refers to the quality of travel i had with this particular aircraft nothing to complain about the jal service or staff i think they were excellent hosts its just a pity that on this journey i had a terrible journey back from japan to the uk

this is the second jal operated flight i took from ukeu to japan we were fortunate to have flown into japan with the latest aircraft carrier boeing from the last review i have done for jal flight they have made more improvement in the choice of the aircraft carrier one of the feature which i was pleased about this carrier was the window shutters no window shutters so especially the passengers who would like to keep the window left open during the whole journey cant do anything about the window was shutterless but it can shut any brightness or glares out coming in from the sun outside the economy seat dimension jal sky wider was another great feature in that the width of the seat and leg room was more than the conventional economy seat and it doesnt seem to affect me that much even if the person in front of me decides to recline the seat in addition i feel some improvement was made to the touch panel screen which has become more touch sensitive so that you wont have to touch the screen with more force which i hate to see especially when your rear passenger is someone who likes to tap abruptly at the screen rather than touch while you are asleep so overall i was very pleased with the aircraft and the quality of the travel from frankfurt to narita

our experience with japan airlines throughout the years have been quite positive that we have always taken this airline on our annual visit to the philippines their planes are well maintainedeven the toilets are always kept very clean typical of japanese culture their stewardess are very polite and hospitable
one of the best airlines ive been on and would definitely use again food was good and service was excellent the planes were comfortable too very smooth security and check in process at haneda

we had till today always bad experience with the long trips not enough place for the legs not enough beverages and drinks and so on but that was not the case by japan airlines a really perfect service very friendly and kind enough place for the legs also at the economy class a good program to offer the drinks and the beverages and tasteful food with a variety of japanese tastes what is more wide selection of films and series to watch free of charge during the flight a very good experience that we will be happy to repeat

the lunchtime meal was amazing both regular and the glutenfree option i had they had a program of inviting young chefs to compete to provide meal options best airline meal ive ever had service was augmented by hot towels twice during the flight and good blankets provided at no extra charge i hope never to fly with anyone else between australia and japan
the food in the plane is amazing stewardess are all so polite and respectfulhighly recommended

everything was efficient and orderly check in fast seemed you had to be at least sapphire one world to get fast track i am biz class alone not enough which is a bit crap especially given naritas propensity for queues lounge ok but a little unexciting given this is jals home base wifi was good capable of streaming video seat was a little narrow but good length in a good hardware for inflight entertainment but the choice was a little limited wifi was chargeable in biz class i didnt try it food was good as was the wine whether you choose jal or sq on this route probably a matter of taste andor pricing if money not an option id go for sq not flown ana or ua recently on this route so cant comment but heard ua have improved

i really recommend flying japan airlines when flying to tokyo in economy class the seats are really comfortable you have plenty room of leg space the food is great and you can start your trip enjoying a typical japanese meal they have a nice entertainment system with nice movies to watch in case you cant fall sleep the flight attendants are really nice and helpful

the economy seats are wider than your average economy seats with more leg room each seat had usb input for charging your device a provided tv and controller which was loaded with moviesshows music simple games and able to view your flight itinerary for my flight international and about hours of travel blanket and pillow were provided for each seat toothbrushtoothpaste provided in the washroom dinner breakfast snack time but can request for more free beverages including liquor in flight staff was very friendly and helpful when i had issues spoke both japanese and english loading and unloading was quite efficient was a great overall experience and would recommend others to use this airline for travelling international

and hours flight from tokyo to vancouver was pleasant for a long flight plane arrive on time and left on time and we even got in vancouver about minutes ahead of time flight attendant was efficient and polite and decent amount of leg room entertainment center in plane was typical and had lots of movies to keep you entertained best long flight i had for over hour plane trip

i am giving stars to the cabin crew went jal on return trip as well it was a seat was well padded and enough room but major issue is it doesnt lie flat at its flatest i tended to slip towards my feet so had to keep readjusting myself i decided to not sleep and just watch a movie the food is good the toilets clean crew were somewhat late serving the meal but i wasnt that hungry anyway the crew were polite helpful gracious very attentive always smiling true the overhead pa announcements can be hard to understand with the accent but they were willing to repeat and explain to you personally if you didnt understand or have a question overall a pleasant flight
absolutely nothing to complain about everything was great with this airline and would most certainly fly with jal again

great service from crew but an old plane uncomfortable bed in business and so so food our return flight from jfk to cgk was similar via narita problem was one of my suitcase appeared on the arrival carousel with a wheel assembly missing staff was oblivious and couldnt have cared and we left airport wouldnt fly jal again after this experience and cost

first time fly jal and it was disappointed cabin service was ok im sorry i just have a very hard time to understand what the cabin crew said food was below medico er for japanese cuisine on a japanese airline how can it be bad right not it was not good at all the entree cooked fish was hard like rock the crew member doesnt seem to communicate to each other difference member come to ask us the same thing like breakfast we ordered before one will tell us the item we ordered was out and we told them we ordered ahead of time so now is not out since we have more jal flight to catch i try to call the customer service number guess what it charge per mins if you use your cell to call it will charge you per sec i am not sure but it less than a mins seriously which airline will charge for customer service so no more japan airline

we flew from bangkok to san francisco with change of jet in tokyo the service on both legs was terrific we found the service better than first class on virgin and british airways which are quite good we have traveled on other air singapore cathay pacific china eastern airlines and thai airways japan airlines is handsdown the best the food was quite good we try to fly business or first class on long flights but decided to fly economy this time we were suprised i would fly japan airlines anytime there were a number of flight attendants they were so sweet and kind

japan airlines has never failed us in giving their best to make sure our comfort and safety the cabin is always super clean plenty of leg room and superb service from the crews flight is always on time and on board entertainment is awesomehighly recommended

were suppose to be on ba but got moved to japanese airlines and so glad we did things like seat room cleanliness food were average and what you would expect from a mid priced airline on a economy seat entertainment was at the same level as ba but not as good as virgin the staff were amazing they were polite and smiled when they served you a rare thing with cabin crew these days they were efficient remembered the children meals we had ordered again an issue we have had again and again with virgin and ba with very unhelpfulrude staff from both the staff couldnt do enough for you and found that completely refreshing

a big thank you to the jal staff at frankfurt for returning my bag to manchester short connection and no way of checking all the way through resulted in me leaving my bag in frankfurt the staff at frankfurt made the effort to have it transported to me at manchester airport at no extra cost many thanks james
nice crew and friendly team will seat again when came japan good choose in time to departure and arrival on time too

i booked my jal flight with american theres a jal kiosk at ohare in the newly remodeled admirals club flagship lounge which if you are flying business class you get access to whether you are flying american or jal the service at the jal kiosk is impeccable and i dare say better than what youd experience at the admirals club the flight itself is pretty standard for business class i prefer aa long haulstheres just a little more freedom to wander jal customers seem very orderly by contrast the cabins feel a little dated too though the seats lay completely flat and the entertainment options are good and the food in business was actually much better than what i experience on aa the service on board was excellent as expected friendly but slightly formal jal terminal and sakura lounge at narita were excellent with good shopping and dining

i requested for vegetarian meal during my flight but the request was missed out the flight attendant just said that they didnt receive any request on their end and left it as that there were totally no service recovery done like offer some cakes or vegetarian sandwiches etc i was left hungry till later when they took out some cakes and muffins for the passengers during snack time why wasnt this offered to me earlier very disappointing service its my first and last flight with jal

flew from helsinki to narita airporttokyo very comfortable flight more leg room in economy than ba as they were who i booked with good food i had the vegetarian option very attentive sevice i would definatley fly with them again as a preferred choice of airline to japan

on the my wife and i went from melbourne australia to tokoyo japan on a flight at am the staff were friendly the seating was comfortable and food was good we were greeted with a smile when boarding and on arrival in japan this was my first flight with this airline i would definitely recommend this airline and hope to fly again with the airline in the future

this is a review of their review and survey i wrote a negative review of their check in service at itm i responded to their survey to criticize their idiotic check in staff at itm and requested a response i also sent a criticism to their website requesting a response three out of three no acknowledgement or response of any kind positive negative or neutral is japan airlines being overly sensitive to anything negative said to them all us airlines are far better at responding to a complaint whether or not they do anything begs another discussion but at least they all respond invariably most airlines the problem is the understaffed airport services like check in transfer baggage drop off ticketing etc most flights once they take off are usually fine i know they can do only so much in the air i also understand they can only do so much on the ground when the place usually look line lines at disneyland now disneyland does a much better job of controlling lines and the masses jal may want to consult disney on how to operate a line people waiting to be checked in ticketed baggage drop etc jal is the worst in response of all airlines ive encountered

i need to remind my self to avoid jal if flying from jakarta the office people was super unhelpful i booked my ticket through a online rd party without any cancelation policy it was business class ticket and i spend k yen so its not the cheapest but it was last minute ticket and i need to have a change one day earlier due to some urgent work they did not allowed me to they were so strict and unhelpful just reply no no no and no non refundable as well so take it with the japanese super calculative and unhelpful i think just stick to garuda at least they

i received unprofessional airport handling from japan airlines in jakarta for my flight departure from jakartatokyonew york on october th on october th am via email i received notice of web checkin result with seat no all the way to new york on october th am via email i received notice of flight cancellation for jal tokyo to new york follow with on october th am via email i received notice of flight cancellation for jal jakarta to tokyo due to typhoon hagibis we sincerely apologize for the inconvenience was mentioned that i can contact local japan airlines in jakarta and i did it and waiting for almost minutes without never able to reach the reservation staff the other no was an answering and open only for week day office hour on october th as i received no information at all about my flight schedule so i came to the airport am japan airlines check in counter open and assisted by japan airlines staff use jal uniform who immediately told me that this is a force majeure and he cant do anything about it i told him i open my reservation online and i saw japan airlines already rebooked my flight october th ke seoul incheoon but he said its a computer generated itinerary and nothing he cant do about it while we talked i found out via flight radar that jal on that morning fly to tokyo i noticed that every single japanese nationalities assisted by japan airlines staff japanese and wear jal uniform assisted quietly to immigration i also received an email from japan airlines that flight jl tokyo to new york back to operation as per schedule im a frequent traveller so i asked the counter if he can transfer me to qatar airways both jal and qatar member of one world first he try to confuse me and he said he will transfer me via china airlines malaysian airlines and the airport for almost hours without any hotel provided by japan airlines before leaving jakarta i know typhoon hagibis typhoon no will stop everything but japan every year have more than typhoon and
