a some passengers left behind in confusion as no one take care their journey i gave poor rating for my flight jakarta to new york
no departure delay the cabin is clean wide sheet spacing good service japanese quority amenity is good

i and my family are always using jal for the international flights due to my home is in bangkok and my daughters study in us i always use jal because of good service and always ontime my daughters are sitting in economy class in which also get the good services and good food as well i recommend jal to anyone that would like the great pleasure international flight

we would like to say thank you so much to hori the wonderful and super helpful supervisor for japan airlines at haneda airport for changing our flight so easily yesterday and for taking away all the stress we were in a bit of a stress as we presented ourselves to the wrong tokyo airport and we had no chance to catch our flight back to france we had a great flight back to paris food on board was very good
aside from the flight being full and the seats my colleague and i received were not so great everything else from food to comfort to the larger entertainment screen was of a good quality

this was such unbelievable service i cant stop raving about how much i loved it champagne was served to me from a magnum of crystal to start dinner you had your chose of anything your heart desires i t was incredible lobster filet mignon done right not over cooked my favorite was the truffled egg sandwich again amazing comfy pajamas and the amenity bad had everything one could imagine in there love this airline the staff were amazing

national flag airline company the aircraft was b as my favorite one i love to board to asian airline companies very very good to service hospitality meals and beverage etc i was very surprised to the toilet in this plane they have bidet toilets in the plane also the space was super clean super comfortable flight to me
regular domestic flight journey off to ngs as it was only a minutes flight they will only serve drinks theres beef broth also its weird but tasty quick service on time landing

flight departed on time from tsa bound for hnd what made it exceptional from all other major airliness economy was the food on board i seldom clear all dishes but jal had such a high standard of catering service that deserves a wide mention flight landed on time and i have a connecting to ngs fa stood in front of gate with my name on it and gave me a ticket for the train service from the intl terminal to the domestic one yet i could not figure out how to use it anyway i managed to squeeze past the security and immigration within minutes and managed to get my bags and drop within minutes for my next flight see even with a connecting of only minutes you will still be able to make it on time

i fly almost every week for work sadly usually in economy jal is far and away the best airline i fly in it is comfortable and clean with decent food but the main thing is that the airline gives the full impression of really wanting you on the plane thats not always true of usa carriers to give a small example i left my pencil case in the lounge at narita airport i told the flight attendant and soon a pencil case was being run the length of the airport and delivered on to the flight just before takeoff it was only a pencil case but jal treated with care i hear many stories like this excellent airline always my first choice

as i said the seat etc is good the drinks offering is good the service was good but the food was just very boring and disappointing i pre ordered an ovo lacto meal and it was so boring like on many airlines to be fair my amuse bouche was salad and some peper sticks my starter was exactly the same just a bigger plate followed by some boring pasta with sauce and this twice on the long flight so twice pasta there is so much amazing japanese food which could be made vegetarian but jal chooses to serve salad and pasta was really not impressed for the flight you get the usual amenities kit and some slippers but no pj you can have a cardigan if you ask for it selection of movies was also not great

i have been traveling a lot on singapore airlines and this was the few instances that i am flying on another airline the one main comment that stands out is the seat spaciousness compared to sq feels roomier and cushioning was better other than that the food and service were about the same although i am high on sq loyalty tiered program my future choice for flights to japan would be now based price delta as loyalty has a price limit

travelled up from sydney to tokyo on their jl flight on board boeing dreamliner far from any dreams on this flight seat space was sparse for a business class fare compared with other airlines there entertainment system is the worst experienced in either economy or business ever poor selection for non japanese speaking people so glad this was a short flight they ran out of food options crew made excuses every time a food option was not available they should offer smaller selection so have more dishes to go round coffee was warm at best i tried multiple times to get a good cup so gave up happy when plane landed could get off

my wife and i flew japan air to tokyo from san fransisco what an amazing comfortable flight im ish had more room then first class on a domestic flight was fed amazing food and drinks for free drinks being the adult kind and was treated as a first class person all the way to the hot towels and beverage selection amazing crew and very happy to help

the below is a letter i sent to jal by email but five day later no response dear sirmadam it was most disappointing to end my great trip to japan with having to deal with a lying disrespectful jal person when trying to check in along with being fleeced for a considerable amount of money i shouldnt have had to pay while i missed my inward flight to japan through no fault at all on jal part due to my flight to manila being cancelled and me having to get a later flight it was most distressing to find when going to get the return flight that this had been cancelled this was despite the jal personnel at t in manila telling me this wouldnt be a problem when i didnt make the time to check in there i flew with another airline to japan later that day as jal didnt have any more flights i could get on that day i would like someone to please explain the following and are hopeful for honest answers which is something i certainly did not get last night at the narita airport why was my ticket cancelled without informing me after i had been told that it would be ok to use by jal staff in manila why did the young gentleman checking me in tell me that this is a world wide rule with all airlines that if you dont use the inward leg the return is cancelled i know this is not true as ive experienced the same with china air and air new zealand cebu pacific and pal for various reasons and never had an issue with the return leg why does jal have this rule where tickets are cancelled without contacting the customer a very poor rule that you need to reconsider why when i first started to try and check in and was told that my ticket was cancelled and that it was impossible to check me in and despite that seats were available on the flight this shouldnt have been seen as impossible there is very little that is impossible this should have been very simple to sort on being told i would have to pay for a new ticket which i said i would that the plane was suddenly full and the only seat left was a business class seat i said that would have to do as i had to be in manila today as i have a meeting with people flying in from taiwan thailand malaysia i was told the price for the ticket was y while this seemed expensive even for a business seat i said yes i would do that as i had to get to manila that night i very much got the impression the young man didnt think i would accept this and didnt want me to fly that night why after being told that there was only one seat left did the young gent ask me if i wanted a window or aisle seat i challenged him on this if he was lying when he told me there was only one business class seat left he said that some passengers had not turned up for the flight why after being told that i had to buy the only business class seat left on the plane did i get a economy seat for the y again i asked why i had a economy seat when he told me the price was for the only business class seat available his response was that he hadnt told me that was for a business class seat another blatant lie why once the plane took off was i able to walk around the plane and spot empty seats after being lied to that the plane was full the empty seats were as follows row e row ae row eg row k row ef row d row ef row a row egk row egk row f row eg what a disappointment it was dealing with a dishonest and disrespectful person that works for you after such a great trip to japan where i found everything to be so good and the people so polite honest respectful and disciplined this was the first person i met on the trip who is a disgrace to the good people of the japanese nation i will not let me put this off japan as i plan to have another holiday in winter and maybe catch some of the olympics i will however be flying with another airline this person has lost me as a customer for good and i will pass onto all my contacts how poor jal treat their customers im hoping someone at jal can answer my questions above kind regards michael j mcgrory

i hadnt flown with jal for some years and was bowled over by how good the experience was impeccable service from the cabin crew who were courteous charming and went out of their way to be helpful everything else was good but it was the crew that made the extra difference food was excellent with a choice of japanese or western menu and good wine and beverage choices again including some japanese options sake umeshu seat was roomy and comfortable with support to keep your legs up its perfect for shortmedium haul and although the lieflat bed option isnt great a bit short and not completely flat it seems this isnt the seat jal uses for long haul flights any more decent entertainment selection with easy to use touch screen system and for once the headphone jack is clearly marked and easy to find so often not the case the only downside is that jal doesnt seem to fly from hong kong to haneda a much better airport with much better access than narita nonetheless jal will be my preferred option for tokyo from now on
great service and efficiency meal was good friendly flight attendants entertainment below average on time flewi september

i took the jal ovenight flight from osaka kansai airport to bangkok the flight is the last departure for jal for the night at am when i first arrived at the sakura lounge at kansai around pm it was very busy as jal shares the lounge with a number of other airlines including emirates and there were a number of jumbo international flights around pm by pm though the lounge was almost empty as most of the other flights for jal and the other airlines were boarding or had departed already the sakura lounge has a good selection of food in a buffet several hot vegetable dishes sandwiches salads halal beef hamburger pieces and of course jals trademark beef curry with rice after i had eaten i noticed staff then brought out different items for the buffet including a japanese noodle offering and fried pork and fried lotus root on skewers there was plenty of food on offer for a dinner preflight service as always with jal is extremely good food is replenished promptly and as soon as a guest finishes staff rush over to clean the table for the next guest the late night flight boarded and pushbacked on schedule flight time was hours minutes jal uses a b with the shell flat neo seat in a xx configuration in business class for this flight the shell flat neo is an angle flat seat and the window seat passenger has to step over the aisle passenger to access the aisle however as i had seat a in the first row it was easy to step over the aisle seat passenger as there is no console from another seat in front blocking me while the seat is only angle flat i find it quite comfortable to sleep in as it seems to have greater width at the shoulder and chest level than jals fully flat sky suite i ii and iii product on boarding there was a meal service selection card at each seat for the passenger to select whether to be woken for breakfast or not i chose to be woken for breakfast notwithstanding the short sleep time on the flight as jal has excellent food i was not disappointed as the japanese set breakfast that i was served was both beautiful to look at and filled with a wide variety of great flavours from a bento box of a selection of several starters and a hot main of fish and vegetables due to the late night departure time very quickly after takeoff the captain announced it was fine to recline ones seat and most passengers quickly settled in to sleep about an hour and minutes before landing i was woken for breakfast service service was exceptional with the purser for the flight making a point of coming by to chat with each passenger once they awoke and making sure to provide reminders about the premium lane fast track through immigration setup that is provided for business class passengers arriving in bangkok she also went through the cabin prior to landing to individually thank each business class passenger for flying with jal the flight landed about minutes early at am there is quite a long walk from the gate to immigration but so early in the morning it was not busy at the airport or immigration first bags arrived at the luggage carousel around am shortly after i got there one benefit of the early morning arrival is the lack of traffic on the roads i was at my hotel in the sukhumvit area in less than minutes as opposed to the one hour plus travel time that is the norm

i took a connecting flight from tokyo narita to osaka itami airport this is a very short flight of only about an hour and jal put too nice a product on this short haul flight with a b equipped with sky suite fully flatbed seats in j class domestic business class in a xx configuration with such a short flight time there was really not much chance to take advantage of the fully flatbed feature but i did appreciate the privacy of the seat with semienclosed seats and staggered set up so my window seat had direct aisle access without having to step over the passenger next to me there was a large video screen for my seat but on this short flight the entertainment programs were disabled so the screen only showed flight information there was a quick paper cup drink service for the short flight our pushback was about minutes late and there was about a half hour wait for takeoff due to heavy traffic at narita airport in the early evening slot as a result the flight arrived about minutes late first bags arrived at the luggage carousel about minutes after landing i was headed for kobe and luckily the airport limousine bus to sannomiya station in kobe is quite frequent and i was on the bus enroute to sannomiya about a half hour after landing jal operates a number of different planes and configurations for these domestic short haul flights often the flight will be with a b or b with just standard seats often configured xx so this flight with the much more luxurious sky suite was a pleasant surprise
the customer service was exceptional first time flying with them and would do it again i am feet so i have a out of always will fight for more leg room hence it not being
wow the plane crew bow before getting on the plane the crew was very polite and the trip very smooth would fly again with jal

first time i flew to japan i am foot inches tall and we were seated in the back of the plane in coach i had plenty of room comfortable flight food was good for no extra cost service was great and attendants were always friendly and available when we needed something no bathrooms at rear which was good because no constant traffic there was even an area behind us to stand and stretch also suitcase checkin and one carryon per person all in all it was a good experience and we will fly with them again

the premium economy cabin provides lots of legroom and seats are wide i was seated in k which has extra space given its location directly behind business class the crew on jal are excellent always have a smile and very pleasant the cabin and toilets were very clean and food was plentiful and of a good standard overall i would highly recommend jal and will look forward to flying with them again in the near future

the overall flight is fine but i can say its not better than some other airlines i got that business ticket from sfo to hnd with the air miles redeem i never take jal and heard a lot about the japanese airlines have great services so i have a high expectation for that flight the sakura lounge in sfo its only opens between pm its especially only open for services for the jal passengers its quite small the space between seats are bit narrow its ok the foods they served are limited the sushi is cold and the rice is hard the fried chicken nugget do not taste good compared with the united club lounge in hong kong its much better on the flight the plane model is i choose a window seat i dont like the design of that seat it feel narrow not much space to extra storage i feel like i am sitting on a economy seat just it have space to stretch my leg and able to convert into a flat bed the good is it has a very large screen but its not a touch screen need to use a wired remote control the entertainment is ok have the latest hollywood movies but most of them i already watched before also you can use the remote control to order the side foods anytime you like the service of course the flight attendants did are excellent jobs for the services i have no complaints the foods i love japanese foods so i choose the japanese menu i looked at the pictures of the foods they served its very attractive and seems very delicious yes the foods they served exactly like the pictures i seen before but i am disappointed to the taste its quite mild and not much flavored the meat are over cooked so i want to say i didnt enjoy the foods it served after the main dinnermeal if you want some snacks or side meals you need to order through the remote control or you can have the flight attendant order for you its ok overall its good and acceptable with that flight i am glad that ticket is free i want to say if i have to pay i prefer some other airlines such as cathy pacific china airlines or singapore airlines

ok i understand and accept that my flight home to sydney from narita was cancelled due to a severe typhoon however whats not acceptable or explainable is the total lack of contact by emailphone or text from jal to firstly advise of the cancellation or to advise of arrangements they would make to put me on an alternative flight all phone numbers on their website rang out without an answer so my last resort is lining up in hour long queue outside of their tokyo office is this a first world airline or not i think not and would be very disinclined to fly with them again

got cheap tickets through a website and have to say fantastic service legroom food and to have the crew come around and personally thank each passenger for flying with them is a real change i would definatly fly with this airline again

absolutely fuming with japan airlines and would never recommend them to anyone booked through them as i thought they were a reputable airlines how drastically this perception has changed came to japan for the rugby world cup and everything seemed sweet unbeknownst to everyone a typhoon hit japan and we knew things would be a little chaotic no fault of ja obs so we called ja to consult as to what to do with our trip as our flight was to take off the day after the typhoon hit we were told that the flight would likely go ahead and that if we were not there for checkin we would not be given a new flight as the chaos continued the only way to the airport was through a bus the day before so we stupidly took this bus got to the airport and thought o well at least we will make our flights where things get troublesome is that not long after arriving to the airport we hear that the last bus to tokyo city is leaving but hey we check again and our flights are still scheduled so we decide to stay half hour after the last bus had left we get and email our flights are canceled because of the connection issues between tokyo and the airport so now we are stranded in the airport and no way to leave all because we were told that had we not been there for check in we would have to buy another flight where things get even worse ive been trying for the last hours to get though to anyone from japan airlines to work our when our next flights will be but hey all phone lines are not able to be reached and noone from ja is here so instead of staying in a nice hotel were stranded in an airport with no knowledge of when we can leave and no idea when our next flight is thanks ja youre definetly not recommended completely understand this must be a chaotic time for you but wtf would you cancel your flights the momemmnts after the last chance for anyone to leave the airport theres still hope we may be able to get home without too much more unneeded stress but hey im not holding my breathe

staff were friendly helpful during check in there were some baby toddlers on the flight but the crew were very helpful in helping parents to deal with children which make the long flight tolerable thanks to their hard work

this was a short flight from nagasaki to haneda and went well checkin was flawless and board the same the aircraft was spotless and the staff smiling and courteousbaggage arrived promptly as did the flight on time

i cant believe that i did not know this before but jal has more space in economy class compared to other planes in certain newer models they have removed one seat per row ensuring wider seats on a ten hour trip from sydney to narita tokyo this really made a difference as you did not feel so hemmed in the seat in front was also a little further away which just made the whole experience more pleasant staff were extremely polite and the food beautifully presented for the return flight i had managed to get an economy plus ticket for the same price as my outgoing economy seat its definitely worth looking at booking directly through their website when i consider that i could have been stuck in a cramped jetstar flight for the same price with no food or entertainment included i feel so happy that i came across japan airlines will definitely fly with them again to japan

the st class lounge is bigger than the one in haneda airport and has better food this flight is similar to the one i took last year from haneda to new york cabinet crew and service are very good the only difference is the food on board this flight from narita has international cuisine besides the japanese cuisine the last year flight from haneda do not have international cuisine the excellent services from the crew are similar

prior to my flight on jal from vancouver to narita i opted to use the cathay pacific lounge instead of the plaza premium lounge that jal uses as the cx lounge is much nicer is less crowded and has better food the lounge had lots of seating and was never very full during the hour or so that i was there cx has the noodle bar offering dim sum wonton noodle soup and dan dan noodle made to order but they also always have a western offering too it was chicken risotto today so i gave it a try quite good tasting cx also has a cold buffet section with sandwiches salads and desserts my jal flight from vancouver to narita was operated with a b instead of the dreamliner b that jal has been using the last few years whereas the dreamliner was equipped with angle flatbed shell flat neo seats in a xx configuration the b is much better equipped with the sky suite ii fully horizontal flatbed seat in a xx configuration i selected the window seat in row as the window seats alternate by having a shelf next to you on the aisle side or next to you on the window side and k is nicely situated right next to the window with a shelf between the seat and the aisle for more privacy and less disturbance from aisle traffic row by comparison would have the shelf on the window side putting distance between you and the window view there were only rows of seats in business class for a total of seats with empty seats on this flight boarding and pushback was on time expertly and efficiently handled by jal staff as usual flight time as reported by the captain was relatively long at hours min due to strong headwinds we ended up landing at pm about minutes late as a result once in flight i noticed the engine noise in the cabin was considerably louder than on the dreamliner the air was also noticeably drier since the part carboncomposite dreamliner is able to be pressurized to a lower altitude with more moisture in the air than the all metal b the toilets were also smaller and less nice than on the dreamliner just regular old style toilets instead of the japanese toilet spray equipped ones on the dreamliner on the plus side the sky suite ii seats with their fully horizontal flat sleep position was much more comfortable for sleeping than the dreamliner shell flat neo seats though when fully reclined the bed position was quite narrow at the shoulder position unlike the original sky suite seats the side armrestspartitions on the sky suite ii seat do not lower down when the seat is reclined to bed position so no extra width is provided in the bed position the sky suite ii seat does have lots of little storage spaces a good size one located on the shelf next to the seat and a small cubbyhole under the video screen for a phone or small tablet there is also a cubbyhole close to floor level for shoes meal service on this pm departure afternoon flight was dinner after takeoff followed by a breakfastsnack about hours before landing food as always on jal is delicious and beautiful to look at i selected the japanese meal for both meals the hot entree at dinner was salmon and pork belly with the pork belly particularly distinguishing itself in taste prior to the entree a bento box style starter selection is served with different selections dessert was coconut pudding with peach sauce as always i finished with coffee as jal serves a special coffee in business class only in flight and it is delicious for the second meal prior to arrival the japanese selection was grilled rockfish with rice service as always on jal is gracious and attentive when i mentioned i always have the special coffee served on board the flight attendant kindly offered a pack of the coffee brewpack for me to take home to enjoy the entertainment system had a good selection of recent hollywood movie as well as a number of japanese and asian movies i am not a big fan of narita airport as it is always too busy after landing i made my way to passport control for my connecting flight and was lucky to be a few steps quicker as the line became much longer a couple of minutes after i joined it fortunately the line moved quite efficiently so it was about a minute wait to get through immigration my luggage was already on the carousel by the time i reached baggage claim and a few minutes later i was through customs and into the arrivals hall at about pm a bit more than half an hour after landing

it has been a while since i had flown domestically with jal and this flight did not disappoint checkin was seamless and courteous and boarding the same the flight left and arrived on time and baggage came out reasonably fast overall a goof flight in an older boring

being in japan for the rwc we arrived late into osaka and had an early connecting flight to sapporo as a number of others did as well our plan was to get a meal in the loungethere was pretty much nothing there tea coffee and beerwe had one of them no food ok wait for the flightagain the staff were friendly and everything was effiicientbut no food tea or coffee etc if you wanted it
a top notch airline good food and free drinks flight crew was excellent we used to think korean air was the best for flights in that direction not any more

ÈõñÁÑ∂Á©∫Èñì‰∏çÁÆóÂ§ßÂ∫ßÊ§Ö‰πü‰∏çÁÆóÂ•ΩÁù°‰ΩÜÊòØÈ§êÈ£üÂØ¶Âú®ÊòØÂ§™Â•ΩÂêÉ‰∫ÜÂç≥‰ΩøÊòØÂíñÂï°ÈÉΩÂæàÁî®ÂøÉÈõñÁÑ∂ÂÜ∞Ê∑áÊ∑ãÈùûÂ∏∏ÊôÆÈÄöÁîöËá≥Â§™Áîú‰ΩÜ‰ªç‰∏çÊ∏õÊï¥È´îÈ§êÈ£üË®≠Ë®àÁöÑÂÑ™ÁßÄ the seat is not really comfortable for sleep and the size isnt spacious i still appreciate the wonderful meals and the considerate staff offered me a nice flight experience i dont like the ice cream too sweet and not tasty

the seat pitch is larger than other airlines and the leg room was great for a hour flight we were provided with neck pillows and blankets and i was able to get very comfy the crew were friendly and the food was really nice
we upgrade to premium economy by paying approximately us and it was well worth it great service comfortable seats and good food

theyll wake you gently with a nice hot towel offer a choice of beers and the food even comes with instructions and write up on the chef would be happy to receive such service and food at a restaurant much less miles high plenty of movies and games to play so the only drawback is lack of sleep upon arrival keep up the good work jal

this is one of my most favorite airlines another being korean air traveling economy is like the old days you can actually sit in the seat and not get a stomach ache from scrunching your knees to your ears like other airlines make you do the bathrooms are spacious complete with those great japanese toilets the staff is so wonderful gracious japanese hospitality so why did i give it this rating going from tokyo to delhi the dining options were fish and beef going to india and serving beef as an option is culturally clueless id say and this is the second time thats happened on this leg weird that from honolulu the options were chicken and shrimp now that would be a leg to have beef jal if youre looking at this review please respond im so curious to hear why this is the case thanks

when i said comfort i meant comfort its a very large plain like a could possible be the air turbulence was next to none throughout that hour the flight attendant was wonderful service is great the food very nice so many different choice on the menue just to name a few beef stew chicken curry with rice and even a special birthday celebration for a passenger vegetable all king of drinkswhen the pilot announce we about to land i said wow
we traveled with jal global card so could enjoy smooth procedure lounge at narita was renewed wth wider space and what most supried us was that the airplanes were equipped with washlet

we flew jal business class from sydney to tokyo for a week at the rugby world cup we had use of the qantas lounge in sydney and jal lounges choice of two at narita both flights were on time the all female cabin crew were very welcoming and attentive and all spoke english the seating is and we had the middle two both ways the seats are very comfortable lie flat of course and with all the usual facilities the entertainment package is comprehensive with a good choice of new movies the absolute stand out is the food there is a choice of japanese or western cuisine go japanese it is beautifully presented and exquisitely tasty youd struggle to get a better meal in a quality restaurant my partner had the western menu on the return flight and it was similarly delicious as an interesting aside the flight crew have taken taken taciturn to a new level on the flight out there was a curt crew seats for landing on the return not a peep not a problem for me im glad theyre concentrating on flying the plane if you ever have the option of flying jal take it i have flown business class with almost every airline and this is one of the very best

conclusion instead of giving people trying to make an international check in a run around open more desks jal has numerous agents running around giving you advise their way of telling you what to do and their response when refused which is rather amusingly obvious that a refusal is not what they want when they are trying to tell you what to do in a suggestive manner only one agent here that handles international flight so go wait for the four desks to open minutes later we were already second in lne so why go where we have to wait more minutes we had plans to have lunch at itami so heck with baby sitting the luggage for minutes longer plus more waiting what are all those agents with jal lapel pins doing open the damn desk at instead suggest to people standing at the back of the line to go elsewhere and wait some more the reaction of the agent when i refused to go was surprisingly unpleaseant when done full of smiles it was suggested several times that it would be quicker to wait until than to keep waiting where we were by the time the suggestions stopped we were served and checked in at least an half an hour prior to the other check in desks opening several families and unfortunate souls who tood the advise where all gathered waiting in line for a line that didnt open for another thirty minutes if they didnt like where i was waiting just say so and tell me to move then i may have moved it was a suggestion so i politely declined the first couple of times but when it is done for the third fourth or fifth time most people get irritated i am one of most people what i concluded was the airport manager for jal at itami must be an idiot just so you know the business class to japan on jal fine business class nrt to pus fine economy to nrt economy to nrtitm fine gate and check in and transfer agents were fine thus my conclusion of the idiot running the itm ground agents

the japan airlines flight from singapore to miami both to and from i was asked to provide some proof that i am allowed to be in singapore even though as a citizen of another asean country we are allowed to travel among the member nations visa free any other airline would not have even asked for me to show some card or id that i am living or working in singapore i have lived in singapore for over ten years ive travelled all over the world for many years the experience with jal was a first for me it was a very offending experience i will never take japan airlines ever again if you are not white or japanese dont take this airline as they will racially profile you

i am very disappointed with jal it has ruined my first japan tripexperience we were set to depart am th september and because we heard about the typhoon that hit on th and ended on the th morning on the very day of departure we even rang at pm to make sure our flight had not been cancelledrescheduled and we got the all ok and happily we prepared and booked our transport to the airport for pm just as we were about to leave for the airport we got an email saying it has been cancelled due rotation caused by typhoon in the morning bear in mind typhoon has left japan by then we werent given any further instruction on the email and the toll free reservation number put us on hold for an hour we need to know when our rescheduled flight will be postponed til so we were forced to go to the airport adults babies and children and you can imagine the anxiety and confusion at that time when we reached we were greeted with a bottle of water and a sandwich we were then told to get a number and waited in line at pm at just about am we were finally at the front of the queue and was told we didnt have much choice anymore and the the next flight would be on philippines airlines at am transiting in manila for hours we asked if we could get a hotel just to freshen up while we wait for bear in mind we booked jal cause we hate transit flights to be then put in this situation is appalling philippines airline counter to be open at am airport departure gate to be open at am but we were declined that we were forced to wait with crying babies no sleep on the floor in tullamarine airport subsequently we went to manilla on a packed plane jal forgot to get us a bassinet for my baby and we are forced in a role of adults with no room for baby my baby had not slept since pm the night before that was so horrible for the hours flight you would think a mainstream airline would usually have bassinet for under months olds but jal forgot to book me that on the replacement flight the following is not directly due to jals fault more phillipines airlinesmanila airports incompetence but jal put us through this hell when we reached manila and told them at immigration that we were transiting to narita they assumed not sure why and what with phillipines airlines and took us straight to the transfer desk which is outside the immigration hall we even asked if we can collect our luggage first but was told not to worry at that stage when we got to the transfer desk they were shocked to find out our transfer was actually with jal the manila tokyo leg and they panicked after realising their mistake as by then we were outside restricted areas without of bags they also refused our reentry to collect our bags and after hour waitingwatching them panicking there they finally offered to get our bags for us but came back minutes saying they couldnt find our bags we were forced to rush to another terminal waited another minutes for bus without our bags and board the plane to narita we got there late the next day and lost days day transitingstuck in airports and day having to buy clothes as we had nothing we missed our tour to gotemba and mount fuji as a result of this we were not offered any apologies whatsoever and when we flew back on rd we asked nicely if we could get an upgrade or at least an apology at least if no compensation we were only given a lame sakura lounge entry which we only had less than minutes to spend in there i am very disappointed with how japan airlines treated us and how this has ruined our much anticipated trip that we booked months ahead and has caused us all the stress and dramas it was hardly a holiday thanks to you

i query whether it is worth paying extra to go business with jal we had to search for the check in which doesnt even mention business there is no business lounge all we got on the flight was a drink and the seating doesnt seem much better than economy seating i was surprised at the lack of food as this was a lunch time flight and the overall time in the plane was close to hours in addition there was no inflight entertainment i guess that i sound like a whinger but this was the first business class flight i have been on which felt like economy on a budget airline but with better seats

the only thing i liked about this flight was very attentive and caring flight attendant the hardwares are aged so much and did not feel i was in first class cabin also food are very mediocre and tasteless the only dish i enjoyed was ice cream and some desserts i would not fly again with jal s first cabin its not worth it for my experience

japan airlines which i will refer to as jal is an amazing way to enter japan from anywhere on the globe with their very comfortable aircraft amazing service on my flight check in was very fast and efficient with no line as there were many counters open for passengers a diagram was shown of the boeing showing how half the cabin was for business passengers surprisingly and only cabin was for economy passengers the boarding of jals aircraft is very fast and efficient and was completed within a few minutes however despite the gate in sydney being located right next to the food court there is no seating directly at the gate as it is shared slightly further away with other gates and at the time the morning flight departs it can be hard to find seats during boarding economy business class were boarded at the same time and after the express queue for business class ended economy passengers were invited to use that queue too right after boarding the very friendly cabin crew accounted for any dietary conditions putting identification stickers on each seat which required them so the process would be smooth when the meals were to be served from this moment the experience felt very strongly japanese with the cabin crew taking a bow in the initial welcome the on board bathrooms also were extremely spacious has marble flooring had toilet seat cleansing functions straight from japan the toilets are some of the cleanest most modern toilets i have ever seen on a plane and the crew were constantly cleaning them unfortunately apart from at meal times beverage services were very sparse and when they did exist only one type of beverage was available this meant that you were often very thirsty and unless you wanted the particular drink being served you would have to wait until the meal service there were meal services on this hour flight one after takeoff and one before landing due to the plane being a boeing the amount of legroom was massive also according to a brochure in the seat back pocket it has been rated the best economy airline seat for years in a row however the recline on the seat was a bit less than expected and i couldnt fall asleep however lots of other passengers could jal was an amazing airline experience which id never expected and i definitely would fly with them in the future
although it was a very long flight the staff made it very enjoyable always asking if i neeed anything else the food was good and served at good times very nice trip

to be honest i really didnt expect too much from jal the plane wasnt new or anything like that but the devil was in the details on our flight to tokyo my girlfriend pointed out that the tint on the windows was adjustable via a small button control system next to the window there was usb slot available to charge a device and a small velcro pocket next to it in which you could hold the device like a phone galaxy s g i didnt try the food on the flight to japan or the way back but it seemed to be decent and the stewardess were extremely courteous if i had one bad thing to say about the experience it was that they turned the seat belt sign on way too early in my opinion they had it on about minutes before the plane landed to be fair im not sure if this is standard as im usually sleeping right until we land on other flights all in all id fly japan airlines again

jal russia support was very kind to return me full price euro for nonrefundable tickets taking into account my health situation i severely broke my leg and we had to cancel the planned trip to tokyo i emailed to jal support the next day they replied they took decision to return me the full price and in a few days the money were transferred to my account i really appreciate this decision taken by jal russia support now im a very loyal jal client and going to chose them for my japan trip when i recover thank you jal

as an ana frequent flyer i had never flown jal however on a recent business trip my organization booked jal round trip from tokyo to seattle i was extremely happy with the quality of service and the cleanliness of the cabin in economy class even though the flight was full keep up the good work

the service on jal was excellent the staff was attentive the food was good and there was plenty of food provided the airplane was greatall seats had plugs with the ability to charge your phone and the inflight entertainment had lots of choices

since my wife is japanese we travel to japan every years we have two daughters and i also like for them to keep in touch with their relatives from over there every time we have used this airline and the service has always been exceptional

this airline is excellent providing a most pleasant and comfortable air travel experience the bilingual staff are truly dedicated to customer service being highly efficient professional polite and kind to everyone food and beverage service provided a quality offering of selections nicely packaged japanese crackers and meal of edible art beautiful presentation and delicious an amazing inflight meal the plane was immaculately clean including the bathrooms which were constantly tidied up during flight down to the toilet paper being given a triangular end fold the flight attendants were highly attentive checking on passengers and amazingly helpful cheerfully assisting with special wheel chairs for those with bathroom needs very impressive airline and staff
in addition to adequate ventilation pleasant scents in cabin gave an extra bonus to the flight there are many code shared flights in jal now and i would prefer jal flights if possible

i flew delta the past several years but tried jal since it started a direct flight service from seattle to tokyo i felt that i had more leg room in economy seats than i did on delta most difference between delta and jal is the service everyone was friendly professional and patient food was better too i would fly jal again if they keep offering competitive fair

we flew japan airline business a couple of days ago from haneda to singapore whilst this was not our first experience of jal business it was the best we chose the japanese meal option and it was better than any restaurant we experienced in japan just the best airline food i think i have ever had
jal provided excellent food an attention to detail when presenting my partner with diabetic meals definitely recommend this airline for customer care on long haul flights

we flew round trip to osaka from lax on jal the level of friendliness and professionalism on this airline is exceptional even in economy class the flight crew makes you feel special in addition the quality of meals is far above expectations great experience on a very long flight also when arriving in osaka i left my ipad on the plane jal staff retrieved it and returned it to me in the terminal within only a few minutes of reporting itand their agent stayed with us the entire time until the device was returned what great service

last minute change my reservation with malaysia airlines was cancelled due to engines problems changed to jal same one world group maybe it was because of the last minute change at narita airport i always requested for fruit platters on board prefer to eat the foods in jal st class lounge before departure however jal very kindly informed me that they do have fruit platters on standby i would recommend that jal do not serve what they call as fruit platters no even at last minute order never seen such sad and old looking fruits should have been in the bin weeks ago

good flight online checkin was done smoothly aircraft foot space was wider than i expected food was good however the lavatory wash basin was clogged at the early stage of the flight i asked a flight attendent to clean she did immediately that was good

japan airlines are amazingly clean polite and service is second to none premium economy from los angeles to tokyo to melbourne was great obviously it was more roomy than economy but it was more than the physical space that was great the ambient space and overall respectful way that the japanese staff managed that flight was brilliant im already booked into my next flight with them and will not fly another airline to japan if they continue to operate in this way also their vegan option was superb by far the best plane food ive had
words can not describe this airline amazing service with smile and attitude very helpful all was clean and nice thank you
excellent service great crew good food great concept of having featured chefs good selection of movies and music the long haul haneda to ny was not as bad as these flights are

exceptional baggage allowance economy passengers could take suitcases each kg this was especially valuable to me as i was taking a whole lot of sheets towels blankets kitchen utensils etc to help set up a house there for a family member plane left on time seats were very comfortable with extra leg room attendants were very attentive polite professional meals were nice and ample food for the flight

the best airline in the world our economy seats are very comfortable and have all the amenities like free movies wifi flight tracker not to mention the best airline food the crew are always very helpful and very courteous the plane was well maintained and very clean it was a hour flight but the bathrooms were always clean whenever i will use it i will definitely book with japan airlines on my next trip
great all around airline our airlines in north america could learn something about hospitality and service from them
excellent service excellent seats excellent food excellent cleanliness rivals qatar airways and singapore airlines my japanese so especially enjoyed the japanese meals will fly again

flight to japan tokyo narita airport took about hours from checking in to boarding everything is a breeze the online auto checkin is rather easy to use just need to register info hours prior to flight the plane interior is very well kept and clean bright and spacious seats are comfortable and with good legroom flight crews are well mannered and very courteous and helpful the inflight system is simple but somewhat lacking contents food is great one of the best i have eaten so far ticket price is attractive and reasonable overall a good recommendation

jal always has first class service no matter what cabin you are seated in i especially enjoy the class j seats offered on domestic flights i travel to okinawa frequently for business and have never been disappointed with the service from jal

service was great from checkin to arrivalall staff on board the flight were extremely efficient and very professional providing excellent food and wine the best part are the large seatsbig tvelectric privacy screen and the lie flat bed the cabin is kept spotless and even the carpet is cleaned after each meal service there is also a self serve counter with winesbiscuits various snacks and wonderful chocolates jal runs a very efficient service on this route

we chose to fly through japan to europe as the fares suited us as well as the seat plane configuration i was very impressed with this airline staff are all immaculately presented and polite the legroom in economy was excellent better than any other airline ive travelled with the seats are comfortable and the seatback is designed to have all sorts of different pockets and hooks to store all your gadgets during the flight free bottled water and bag of snacks provided during the overnight flight some of the other meals were a little peculiar and not to my liking but overall i would definitely travel with jal again the overnight flight to tokyo is direct and hassle free and the seat configuration makes it great for couples no arguments over who is lumped with the middle seat
the service was blown me awayeven the ground handler was so thoughtful and helpful i can feel the truly japanese hospitality
jal flight is always great food is great too we can order various type beer and wines that makes me feel relax

mh was cheaper than jal when flying from japan to malaysia in the past at least business class but recently it is not the case the cost competitiveness of jal from japan to malaysia is the best mostly food entertainment service cleanliness comfortabilityetc most of them exeeds your expectation the flight atendants are supportive and kind which is not so common all over the world if you travel with business class from japan to malaysia select jal it is worth however if you are tall andor big be careful a bit as the leg room is not that big i am cm in height but rather heavy kg in weight so i am big in some sense i do not want to accept i am fat hahaha and felt leg room was a bit narrow except for that mostly everything was excellent

jal always serve the best of the best friendly fight attendant with professional manner what i like about it is for the second meal you can choose the time you like and basically you can eat anytime you like the seat are so comfortable it will become your bed degree and they can provide you more cushion if you like

the overall flight experience from london to melbourne with jal was very good my two sons and i were issued bulk head seats on the first leg which made for a comfortable journey to tokyo the staff were great the cabin including toilets was kept spotless and the food was pretty good for those on a standard menu my son is coeliac and his gf food was not as good due to some inedible fish upon booking we were informed that the incoming flight would land at haneda and our outgoing flight was from narita but it would be our personal responsibility to transfer across tokyo with a hour layover we were informed that it was possible an hour passed by the time our flight landed late and it took a long time to clear customs at haneda upon exiting we discovered that there we no spaces left for the transfer bus leaving in the next minutes and would have to wait hrmins for the next bus this journey takes approx one hour we opted for the express train option between the two airports however im not sure why express is used at it stopped at all but a few stations went through the tokyo subway system and took almost two hours the strangest part of the process was the requirement to purchase the tickets using cash rather than credit card which necessitated an atm withdrawal i think we arrived a few minutes earlier than had we waited for the next bus but my children enjoyed seeing tokyo from the subway and it was an easy doortodoor journey if long this flight was chosen as we were using points and didnt have much choice i wouldnt pay and willingly choose this flight route

tokyo narita airport is rather far from down town tokyo than haneda airport there is however sushi bar counter at jal first class lounge and typical japanese style order and served three kind of selection with a mix andor three single is available it is a weekly menu such as tunamaguro snapper octopus etc there are other counter salad bar and noodle soup ramen counter same as typical japanese style order and served why not enjoy those japanese food before boarding
given the typhoon concern the flight was surprisingly smooth no turbulence it was also ontime premium econ very comfortable lounge access for prep econ passengers also a great touch

jal far surpassed my expectations the food was quite good there was a balance of food groups my previous flight was united from nrt to sfo and it screamed of cost cutting carbs of chicken and noodles with a noodle salad and bread chicken a la scurvy melted ice cream which is the cooling for part of the main meal the jal meal was attractively arranged on signature red even the containers showed attention to detail i would recommend jal hands down for food the only fault was the plane was uncomfortably hot no one likes to feel like they are short of breath that was the only fault cabins that are too hot

i had a great fare for around but chose to do the upgrade bid and won an upgrade for about the week prior to the flight one of the best perks besides the ample legroom on board was being able to eatdrink relax in the beautiful jal airport lounge at lax for several hours before my flight

the jal customer service is terrible we arrived to narita airport around pm to transfer to sgn at pm we were noticed that the flight was cancelled due to the typhoon and no one lead us just was told to go the transfer counter and line up there to get help the lobby were filled up with passengers since all flights were cancelled at that time no any slot attendent was out to arrange the lines no any decided for lines so the lines was messed asked the customer service if they had any arrangement for us they tried to avoid the answer kept telling us lining up after lined up for about hrs was told to group together whoever had the same destinationsso we got pulled out from the line and asked us to wait in group and we were waiting for another couple hours the slot attendants decided to take pictures of our boarding passes so we thought we would get to arranged another flight so we waited for another hours i felt something wrong since no one came out let us know what happened so caught a slot attendent asked her what was going on she told us should line up to get help but not waiting in front their working area or we could book another flight online but we must pay for it and i asked her about the boarding pass photos she rejected that they took photos so we ended up lining up again and we have been in the airport hours no food no any info only a bottle of water and they started sending out blankets around am but we had been here for whole night also we were told if we were signed up for another flights we must get out the airport grab our check in luggage and recheck in and no one told us the narita airport closed at night so we couldnt even get out the airport to get a hotel and rest since immigration booth was closedso eventually we all got stuck at the airport couldnt sleep no food no drink
the plane was super clean looked literally brand new lots of legspace delicious food and super nice staff
so far jal is giving the good service and i like it they provide delicious food and also they have a good wine and beer
outstanding courtesy delicious food clean and wellmaintained cabin and lavatory made this length trip a pleasure

i took the jal flight from taiwan to boston connected in narita tokyo japan it was a very long flight but jal made it as comfortable as it could be the seat was more comfortable the screen was new and big and the meals were actually good the connecting flight in narita airport was one hour but its easy to find the gate and not too rushed
left on time and arrived early service was great airline food was was very good and the free drinks even better

was on hold with japan airlines for more than one hour about a flight my family and i were supposed to take to warsaw tomorrow it turns out there was a problem because my husband couldnt input my updated family name on the jal website when booking our flight so he ended up using my maiden name when i called jal the customer service representative at jal flatly told me that i could not possibly board our flight so i should just cancel my flight i said this was impossible since we are traveling with our month old baby the cs rep from jal then suggested we all just cancel our flights and book new flights adding that it was going to be more expensive i was shocked that she couldnt suggest any other solution most airlines to my knowledge allow some name change especially if its a problem with changes from maiden name to a compounded family name but jal was completely inflexible to even suggest just cancelling my entire familys flight we are all packed and ready imagine how difficult it is packing to travel with an month old we are booked at a hotel near narita and my husband is meant to participate in a conference the day after we arrive in poland but now all our plans ruined because jal would not consider our situation in the end we booked a flight with a different airline and we will be departing the day after tomorrow for warsaw i managed to contact jal finally and asked to cancel our flight the second cs rep we spoke to was somehow more helpful and tried to provide some other solution still the problem is that they absolutely do not allow name changes this whole fiasco cost us more than yen not to mention the stress of preparing for an aborted longhaul flight with a baby ive enjoyed the food and service onboard previous jal flights when i was single but it was extremely upsetting to be told to just cancel all our flights when there wouldnt have been any problem in the first place if we did not have any trouble with jals website i will definitely not fly jal again now that i have a family nor do i recommend it to anyone traveling with small children

jal hands down absolutely one of the best airlines the flight from narita to dallas was perfect i will definitely start flying with your company more often i would like to give a special thank you to flight attendants kaneko nanami cf kunieda mari for your wonderful conversation and true professionalism

i flew on at pm boarding time the gate agents were extremely helpful and friendly the gate agent manager dressed in blue vest was extremely busy with setting up the gate but she and her staff went out of their ways to help me i am extremely grateful and recommend japan airlines to all friends and families

both jal japan airlines and ana all nippon airways are my favorites as they have firstclass service even in economyclass for this particular trip i booked a multicity itinerary of new york seoul with a stop at haneda busan tokyo tokyo new york normally i fly ana but since ana does not have a flight from busantokyo i took jal for the first time in several years they did not disappoint the seats feel wider than most us airlines staff is super helpful service is impeccable movie choices are adequate choose your seats quickly especially if you are traveling as a group of two the economy area had threeseat and fourseat rows but very few twoseat rows
in typical japanese fashion the airline stewards are amazing nothing is too much trouble the seats i feel are a bit more cramped than other airlines for economy and it made for a long trip

premium economy provides extra comfort with the seating but the food is the same as economy it is very ordinary scrambled eggs with minced chicken for breakfast which i found a strange combination the airline stewards gave excellent service

seats like business class of old almost however im not used to the seats reclining downwards like business seats and not leaning backwards but definitely clean and quite good service with great tv screen charging port and plenty of space to stow things this comes with slippers and nighttime pack with a mask as well food was good quality and they walk around often serving drinks and snacks bathrooms was spacious for an airplane with a separate bench to sit on in the toilet room clean and well maintained throught the hour flight

dreading this hour flight it turned out great the seats were comfortable and reclined to a good pitch the cabin was large and airy it also felt like the pressure and air circulation worked well very little jet lag the bathrooms were large for an airplane plenty of storage space the headphones provided for a list of recent movies were large and comfortable however no eye masks or earplugs were provided so make sure to bring your own if you want them the drinks were all free and readily provided the meals were fine nothing to write home about but not bad i will definitely fly with them again
