we had planned to book a finnair flight for this trip but ended up with a booking from jal this is worth your money very well organised extremly friendly staff which makes for a wonderful customer service experience and great inflight fb an excellent travel experience which i can only recommend

i have a short day trip to osaka from tokyo so that time is extremely tight for me so i rather take domestic flight than high speed train both haneda airport and itami airport are located near city centre compare with others so it wont take long to get to the airport i was impressed by jals extremely efficient boarding arrangement for domestic flight as all the passengers were well coordinate it took around less than minutes for passengers to board the flight though inflight entertainment was just limited to radio and no meal was served only drinks and nuts as i remember i rather stay relax on the comfortable seat than rushing for a meal i have pleasant outbound and inbound journeys and both flights were arrived on time

i took the airline from manila to chicago via japan the only unpleasant of the entire trip was transferring from haneda airport to narita in tokyo though i was aware by the time of purchase but find it too uncomfortable transferring with two large luggage in tow but the inflight services of japanese ladies is so good that how i wish my flight is longer food is good even at economy

first a word of caution unless you are traveling with an organized group which is taking care of arrangements you must get a visa for vietnam before you leave from the states non negotiable now about the flight wonderful in terms of comfort and service our flight attendants were anxious to please us in any way they could which is what one has come to expect from asian airlines the only aspect we found lacking was the food which was often quite unusual for our palate even the western menu

i like jal and their wonderful aircraft and their service however this time i wondered what happened a cabin crew served us but unfortunately her behaviour was not good she looked insencitive all time especially in the night when she asked a passenger at my next seat to shut the windows cover her elbow touched my water bottle in the holder and dropped it with the noise and shock i woke up but she did not do anything not pick the bottle not say excuse me she just took no account of it frankly speaking she was an eccentric person

if you have a jal flight you can only board jal wherever you go on various airlines for about years jal is very kind except for the web center about of crew members are also good people however it is difficult for business class to cancel the purchase and i want more jal from centrair

ÊÅí‰æã„Å´„Å™„Å£„Å¶„ÅÑ„ÇãÂπ¥‰∏ÄÂõû„ÅÆÊ≤ñÁ∏ÑÊóÖË°å„ÅØÂøÖ„Åöjal„ÅßË°å„Åç„Åæ„ÅôÂ≠ê„Å©„ÇÇ„ÅåÂ∞è„Åï„ÅÑ„Åü„ÇÅÂÆ¢ÂÆ§‰πóÂãôÂì°„ÅÆ„Éï„Ç©„É≠„Éº„ÅØÊ¨†„Åã„Åõ„Åæ„Åõ„ÇìÂÆâÂÆö„Åó„Åü„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„ÅåÊúüÂæÖ„Åß„Åç„Çã„ÅÆ„Åß„ÅÑ„Å§„ÇÇÂÆâÂøÉ„Åó„Å¶Êê≠‰πó„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô the annual okinawa trip which is an annual event always goes by jal because the children are small it is essential to follow the cabin crew we can expect a stable service so we always board with peace of mindthx

jal hands down absolutely one of the best airlines the flight from dallas to narita was perfect i will definitely start flying with your company more often i would like to give a special thank you to dallas gate agents mar samson laila ali and flight attendants doi aigaki for your wonderful conversation and true professionalism

i have been a member of american airlines aadvantage for a few years and always try to fly on one world partners airlines whenever possible recently i travelled on japan airlines to tokyo narita from dallas tx as an aa platinum member one world sapphire i have been lucky enough to have been upgraded occasionally on aa but its been a challenge on the partner airlines specifically cathay pacific finnair and british airways i was already prepared for being told no when i asked about the possibility of a complimentary upgrade from standard economy i was pleasantly surprised when the agent smiled thanked me for being a sapphire member and handed me a boarding pass for their premium economy cabin the seat was comfortable and came with a variety of creature comforts including an amenity kit slippers a large pillow blanket and noise cancelling headphones i had more legroom than i needed and the footrest was a nice touch also the seat itself was quite wide had a small privacy divider a large seatback screen convenient storage spots for cell phoneglasses and the seat recline system was kind of cool in that the seat slid down and forward within its own space not bothering the person in back i was able to sleep reasonably well and felt pretty good upon landing after a hour flight overall i was extremely impressed with the premium economy cabin and would certainly consider paying the price in the future looking forward to flying on japan airlines again

i was noticed during check in that premium economy class passenger could access to the sakura lounge and i could have a full breakfast before boarding at am the inflght services was excellent with all the necessary amenities provided including slippers plenty of leg room for ft tall passenger like me

we were very impressed with our flights in business class from chicago ord to bangkok on jal the flight attendants introduced themselves to us knew our names and were so helpful and kind the seats in business class were very comfortable the food was exquisite the drinks i had champagne and japanese plum wine delicious and overall the service was excellent we usually flight business class and we have had the chance to do so using other airlines and i rate jal number one of the most impressive things for me was how clean and neat the bathrooms are kept during the almost hours flight from chicago to bangkok in other airlines after the first hours you can see how much a bathroom is used during a flight because of the smell spots and dirt on the floor and sink in our flights with jal from chicago to narita airport in tokyo and from tokyo to bangkok and back we didnt see a spot on the floor and there was a supply of toothpaste toothbrush mouthwash and hand lotion until the end of each flight we will continue flying with jal our favorite airline now

we got premium economy seats for the hr flight for traveller and enjoyed the space provided even as middle seats in a config enough space to step over sleeping neighbour if needed reclining the seat does not impact the person behind although the seat felt a little used up already the seats were good decent food and drink options and extremely nice and helpful staff also efficient boarding process overall outstanding service

we boarded the boeing very smartly we were greeted with smiles even though we were at the rear of the plane the seating was the best we have experienced the accommodation puts qantas and british airways to shame there was plenty of legroom for me m tall the seats were comfortable cabin service was impeccable food was a good average the only disappointment was they ran out of our preferred dish the alternative was fine entertainment was fine with latest release movies disembarkment was very efficient buses were used as the airport is being renovated

this was my rd time flying economy class with jal from san diego ca and i am very pleased with all flights including the connecting ones seats are considerably roomy with spacious legroom area food service is good depending on ones taste most important i noticed the lavatory was always super clean i think it was thanked to the ongoing attention from the flight attendants

i been traveling to tokyojapan every year thus far and i would never fly any other airline other then japan airlines the airline ticket can be expensive though i do not mind it i love the service that i receive all the time the flight attendants always make me feel at ease and comfortable and i always feel safe when riding with jal too i never had any bad experience with this airline thus far i would definitely recommend this airline to family and friends and to anyone traveling international i been traveling with them for yes or so and counting the attendants are very friendly also i remember last year when i flew into narita airport i was late picking up my luggage so when i went down to look for my luggagethere it was waiting for me at the japan airlines counter and the agents were holding it for me or keeping an eye on it for me i thought that was so nice when i went to pick it up the agents had a smile on their faces which made me feel at ease also they are always on top of things when it comes down to safety toothis is a must for any airline that you travel with i will definitely use them next yr again

flying on jal to aomori in august was my st time on jal folks going to aomori to take note that even though it looks direct aomori doesnt have a clearance counter so passengers have to alight in tokyo and retrieve all luggages through immigration and then recheck in again for aomori flight sin tokyo haneda aomori was smooth but seat arrangements was bad and the website didnt allow me to change designated seat at internet check inthis is free for all regular airlines ive travelled with before resulting in middle seats for all of my group aomori tokyo haneda tokyo narita sin no mentioned that other than retrieval of luggages at haneda airport passengers have to make their way from haneda airport to narita airport no free transfer and the bus journey took hour costs yen you have to lug luggage from the belt to the bus and then back to narita airport to check in again i booked a flight from sin aomori sin thinking that i dont have to lug luggages during the transittransfer its the first time on a direct flight that i have to pay for transfer from airport to airport there was no information on this upon purchase of ticket that this transfer is not included in ticket pricing whats the point of buying jal to travel direct from sin to aomori when it feels like its separate bookings i could have bought sq from sin to tokyo and buy a domestic transfer to aomori instead then the shuttle transfer from haneda to narita on my own expense is something thats acceptable

the service is great but too much no need to pause the inflight movie like times for meaning less announcements seats are small and tight there was this rude old lady just jestures to the ca to lift her luggage to the shelf and the ca smiles and do it customers are not higher than the staffs other then that its always clean on time

flight attendants are top of the line you can expect meticulous customer service on the ground and inflight checkin was smooth and fast as the business class lane was empty baggage claim at del was also quick as our luggage came out first usually choose to sit in the middle and the second cabin k h there are fewer seats which make for a less noisy environment jl uses the b sky suite with the reverse herringbone configuration fullyflat beds let you sleep comfortably meal service is top of the line with western and japanese choices for lunchdinner its a shame the business class tickets dont have a separate security line that would make the whole experience quite comfortable

what is surprise that business class ticket did not give you priority lane access haneda airport was surprised that when we sat down was not offered a drink in business class as normal the meal on the flight was fast and fishbased which should be ok unless you did not like fish like me did not like it

japan airline has some of the best service in the industry their flight attendants are so professional and caring especially when you have young children something ive never seen before is when deplaning everybody got up at the about same time and we departed the plane in less than minutes us flights and seems like people think everybody needs to wait for them only negative is about a month later we found a cheaper flight for jal after we purchase the ticket and they would not honor the lower cost flight difference

the service is very good we got a full meal and a great snack my kids were over the moon because they gave us ice cream they gave them little toys and were very attentive i forgot to inform ahead of time that my boy has food allergies and told them on the flight and immediately they made sure his food was safe to eat they checked all the ingredients and offered me options good variety of movies free beer and wine we flew economy but didnt feel trapped we were comfortable in our seats for the hrs of the flight

just the way you want your flight to be uneventful also as is typical with a japanese airline or most any japanese service great service this along with great attitude good food comfortable seating clean bathrooms snacks provided to take as you like all good and ive flown millions of miles

i was lucky to have a firstclass experience on jal ive traveled on first class on aa a few times when they still had direct flight between ny and tyo there was no comparison the service food drink selection and bathroom etc everything was better than aa the flight attendants are friendly but keeping distance between customer and staff for return flight i used aa business class i realized that jal service was superb

so dissatisfied with japan airlines my wifes ticket apparently shows as an infant and our infant shows as child and after being at japan air kiosk and talking to both expedia and american airlines for hours we arrived hrs early we still werent allowed to board and missed our flight and of course the flight for tomorrow is booked on top of that everyone at these three companies is still saying not our problem how is this acceptable especially with an infant everything is correct in our itinerary but apparently something got lost in translation when transferring to jal but save for one jal worker everyone passed the baton into someone else and now were left stranded in a city w dont live in with our ten month old and no game plan after spending the last seven hours on the phone we were told by expedia that my flight looked like an infant fare because it was so economical to add insult to injury the manager at the jal seatac kiosk refused to acknowledge me a hispanic woman or my husband instead telling her workers to tell me she cant hell me when i was literally in front of her meanwhile she was taking selfies and all smiles with her japanese customers this is unacceptable behavior and now were being told it will be for us to fly out tomorrow i have never heard of such an absolute disregard for customer service as this
excellent service on checkin comfortable seats with extra legroom testy and diversified inflight food

we recieved helpful courteous gratious and needed services on our recent flights in japan just before leaving for japan my wife was injured and ended up traveling in a wheel chair we had a lot of luggage that was needed for this trip including two carry on bags and four large suitcases not only did jal take care of my wifes needs by transferring her to a wheelchair in the airport at the same location jal checked our bags and helped to get her to the gate and onto the plane it was all done in an atmosphere of graciousness they were incredible

i usually travel to abroad once or twice in a year for leisure and business i have used many airlines in past years including emeritus and ethihad but i found this fight very comfortable aircraft was new and with latest features not only the legroom was sufficient even in economy class but hospitality was also excellent i choose the hindu vegetarian meal and the food was par excellence honestly not expected in a airline not belonging to india bar was having wide variety of drinks japanese green tea and roasted tea were the point of attraction as it was giving a feel of japan before actually reaching there infotainment system was very good although hindi movies were very few hollywood programs were in plenty language selection was wide for about languages all the service was with smile every time i enjoyed the flight and landed fresh for the day to come

jal is still using an series forcthis route with no premium economy and outdated business class at least in economy the seating is as designed by boeing not the ridiculous the greedy american carriers have squeezed in good and service topnotch for economy but for hours passengers were fanning ourselves because flight crew either refused our requests to lower the temp or the ac system was not capable imagine being too warm for hours

jal is a great airline with wonderful service however some of their international flights go into narita international airport and others into haneda it is not worth saving a couple of hundred bucks to change airports for a connecting flight besides the for the transport between the two one has to collect their baggage and recheck it

we actually flew with jal twice in the past months both times business class on both occasions the actual flights were okay but the ground service was difficult and frustrating for the the first flight melbourne osaka return in february i had trouble finding our flight on the mobile app and tried contacting their offices well that was just too difficult and frustrating eventually everything worked out but it was unnecessarily frustrating and time consuming for the second flight melbourne madrid return things got worse i booked a business class ticket online and the money was taken when i tried to confirm seats i was told that on one sector there were no business class seats left and we were bumped to economy we were told that wed be wait listed for business and if the business seats did not become available wed get a refund for that sector that wasnt very satisfactory i contacted jal several times in the lead up to our trip and this information was repeated you are waitlisted and may have to apply for a refund hours before the flight i received a phone call to say that we could have business class seats however because the tickets had to be reissued we had to pay additional charges apart from being very annoyed at this new fee i had to spend a considerable amount of time on hold whilst the process of reissuing the ticket was managed by jal very unsatisfactory service and i really wouldnt risk flying with them again

this was the best flight i have had in nearly years the service was excellent on the flight and on the ground in tokyo the only issue i had was long lines at checkin in manila but i suspect this was much more due to the airport than jal the food on the flights were excellent a full gourmet meal including haagen dazs green tea ice cream that was far better than anything i have had in economy since i flew on pan am and as a big man the seat belt was large enough to not need an extension i will fly jal whenever i can from now on

jal has been my last carrier of choice when flying inbound and outbound from japan has really surprised positively when compared to aa service under one world alliance very punctual courtesy service and very respectful to the passenger provides a great value for the money in economy and business class and for those whom enjoy the emerald status on one world the lounge experience in narita is outstanding by far the best in my history of business travel

air japan is a very professional airline with great staff smaller than average seats good inflight entertainment and average food when an issue arose with a drunk passenger staff members handled everything very professional and made all other passengers feel safe

we flew economy class from osaka japan to los angeles california usa the service was good and the stewardesses were very polite and helpful the toilets were clean throughout the flight the economy class seats were wider than that of other airlines but the seats were very hard indeed and most uncomfortable the food was reasonably good for economy class

even for a short flight like seoul to tokyo there were real business seats which is not the case in europe even for longer flights like paris moscow service was excellent as its always with japanese people they are so sweet kind and attentive toward customers everything went smoothly

i use this flight to travel across the us directly to tokyo in the larger dreamliner aircraft for the entire journey its far more preferable than the smaller aircraft used by us airlines to transfer to an international flight at la san francisco or dallas it should be noted though that window skysuites in the jal dreamliners have less personal storage space than the aisle seats but have great privacy and a personal aisle entrance i also like the excellent boston ba lounge made available to jal passengers

worn down lounge at suvarnabhumi and osaka airport few food options only and not tasty at all same goes for the flight the western and japanese food tasted terrible the best choice were the paper cup instant udon noodles all in all a disgrace

i flew from sydney to tokyo in july i am not a happy flyer but a frequent one this was my first time with jal and i was very impressed economy class was more roomy only seats on the outside rows the food was good the staff very friendly and helpful i then flew with another airline to amsterdam and the difference was so obvious jal really shined

no long haul economy flight can be considered comfortable but jals superior service at least makes a hour flight pleasant great choice of in flight entertainment food was quite good in airline terms especially flying out of tokyo which included a jal version of a teriyaki mos burger looking forward to our next flight with jal

decided to fly by jal as ive heard many positive reviews about this airline from boarding to transit in narita airport to arrival everything went on smoothly no confusion at all flight attendants to ground staff all very friendly helpful and speak good english but what i really love is the seat i must say is the most spacious seat ive ever experienced you will never regret to fly jal

comfy seat delicious food wonderful service i couldnt decide which sake to drink the crew gave me all of them to try then asked me which one i like better and gave me more of it would definitely recommend it

after waiting for the airline counter to open they dont open until hours prior to the flights departure we were checked in fairly quickly and were allocated our seats as selecting them online was unavailable to us the aircraft was a boeing version and we were seated in the second section of business class which only contained rows row and whilst we were taking photos of the cabin the flight attendant offered to take a photo of both of us which was very nice of her on the seats were a pillow and slippers the amenities bag contained toothpaste toothbrush ear plugs moisture mask steam eye mask lip balm and tissues the remote control for the seat to be converted to a flatbed was easy to follow entertainment had a reasonably good selection of options with recent movies and tv series the menu had both a japanese option and a western option but you couldnt mix the two it was either one or the other bit of a shame as there were dishes i would have liked to have tried on the japanese menu the western menu main meals were either beef cheeks or ling cod the raspberry mousse cake had gold flakes in it which was interesting you could also order cheese fruit and chocolate from the anytime menu during the flight about hours prior to our arrival we were served a meal the western menu was mushroom frittata with a croissant yogurt and fruit thoroughly enjoyed the flight our section of the business class only had seats in such a huge space and the flight attendants were really friendly and caring wouldnt hesitate in flying on japan airlines again
japan airline is an excellent carrier with newer planes enviable seat configuration in first class very clean on time with very good service

the seats in economy are very comfortable with plenty of leg room the amenities provided included a blanket a pillow with a cut out to fit your neck and a wide variety of movies games tv shows and music in the entertainment portion of the flight two meals were served and they were excellent during the flight the flight attendants came around offering water juice and a full bottle of water was provided with the dinner menu each seat provided a usb hook up for charging your devices hot towels tooth brushes and small towels were provided to freshen you after the long overnight flight during the meal the flight attendant asked each passenger to return the recline seat to the upright position so that the passenger behind the seat could enjoy their meal

just completed a trip first time ive booked jal singaporeosaka via tokyo return excellent experience at a considerable saving as compared to the newly announced no airline for would have no hesitation at flying jal again just one warning if travelling from osaka itami with an international connection there is a separate checkin line and in the morning peak it is very slow took nearly hour to get to the front of the queue
premium economy is all one needs for this long flight service is great and the seats provide great leg room and comfort for this long journey

i like flying jal to japan because the moment you get on the plane you immediately are entering japan airspace so to speak you are entering japanese culture with a pretty good business class japanese menu the flight attendants are incredibly polite as you would expect and japan airlines at least in business class to me is as good as any airline i like the cabin configurations as well yes there is more space in first class but quite frankly not enough to justify the price difference definitely recommended the only downside is the rules based inflexibility of jal my kids were flying premium economy and they wouldnt allow them to come into the same airport lounge as my wife and i they did have access to the basic international lounge so the of us could only use that lounge to stay together

the service was excellent the flight attendants were all polite and attentive and the foods were good also they served miso soup which we cant find in other flight seat was spacious i left behind my pouch in the plane and asked the staff about it when in the immigration theyre very helpful and fast in coordination they even shuttled me to the plane to look for my pouch when we arrived all the left items had been handed over to the lost n found then we headed to lost and found and yes i got my pouch back the service truly reflect the hospitality of the japanese people

very pleasant experience recently with jal flight with layovers from manila to san diego boarding procedures in manila were efficient staff made every effort to answer questions and provide customer service before the flight kudos to the flight attendants very responsive and exceptionally courteous baggage handling also well above average bottom line jal pays attention to every detail and makes every effort to provide exceptional customer service good job

back couple months ago i took flight back to atlanta first flight is from surabaya to jakarta m hour transit and its been exhausting and when i check in to jal the staff behind counter is very helpful patiently helpfull when i had to arranged the luggage and help with my mother in law thank you mr hendri susanto if im not mistaken his name thank you jal

jal socalled business class is basically a fraud what other airlines call business class is the first class business class has slightly larger but still small seats no lounge access no priority boarding no welcome drinks no possibility to hang your jackets paid business class and was squeezed in a row of four in the center of the plane an egregious way of cheating unsuspecting nonjapanese out of their hardearned money avoid

my first time flying with jal and they were magnificent the flight left from melbourne a few minutes past midnight a bit of trap and easy to get the day wrong but on time there seemed to be more than average legroom in the economy section and the seat belt was incredibly generous which is really unusual it made for a very comfortable and easy trip i took my own water and was glad i did there was little offered although im sure i couldve asked for some if id needed to

a comfortable flight on a small ageing boeing aircraft quite adequate for the hour and minute flight the snack a salad roll was welcome en route nice to get a cup of black tea which was hard to find in south korea no entertainment i guess due to the short flight

my experience on jal was wonderful their boarding is easy passengers are welcomed multiple times and acknowledged with direct eye contact and a smile the crew is exceptionally polite and try very hard to anticipate your needs what i found really great was that if a passenger falls asleep during drink or food services they wont wake them but will put a sticker on the seat table so as to be able to provide service when the passenger wakes up finally they provided a pillow added back support pillow and a blanket very enjoyable trip both ways

we had a great experience with jal until a major delay on our return trip where the airline didnt even provide as much as a lunch voucher however up until then i would have easily given them stars for service comfort quality of food and courtesy entertainment program was great seats were roomy with plenty of leg room food was delicious and staff was friendly personnel on board was wonderful but ground personnel in tokyo although courteous didnt do much for us with an almost hr delay i would have expected at least some food vouchers we saw them hand cash to japanese passengers but im not sure what their situation was i would fly with them again though our experience on board was great

fly at nightdepart from narita pm in this flight we didnt apply halal food so only could choose chicken for my husbandbecause i didnt like chicken and no fish menuso i didnt eat all night longonly fruitand vegetable and little cake and hagendaas ice cream so i cant sleep because still hungry and i offered a little bread againand only got different when i fly from jakarta to tokyo on last junethe stewardess gave me breadsbread contain meat and big so i felt full enaught and could sleep well maybe jal serve a sandwich with omelett besides a round little bread next but overall i like fly with jal

japan airlines offers the best and most intimate seats in business class the sky suite provides you with full privacy all seats have direct aisle access the any time you wish concept is a plus im looking forward to flying again with jal crew is at all times caring and attentive

check in smooth and fastmeals re halal foodtasty and can apply more bread everything is fast and on time we re enjoyed to fly with jalall flight attendant very kind and helpedwe wanna to fly with jal for next destination

dear sir my recent trip to tokyo on jl was quite an experience things were going well on flight but the heavy rainy weather around japan affected the flight on its approach to land at haneda it was quite a bumpy ride and turbulent but the calm manner of the flight and cabin crew was very impressive basically it was quite like a mild roller coaster but everyone was calm and the landing perfect
food is good they make u stay hydrated unlike korean air and their attendants are always so kind love it

we flew premium economy from dfw to tokyo narita then tokyo narita to sydney we flew on boeing for both flights we had access to a lounge at dfw before our flight and at narita between flights this was welcomed especially for the hour layover in tokyo it should be noted that premium economy on other airlines do not always include a lounge visit the is a great plane to fly on and my favorite since i feel better at the end of a flight the seat is a recline in the shell so the seat in front of you will not encroach on your space the legroom is ample the food and onboard entertainment were fine the room under the seat was a little limited the cabin was warm so it was harder to sleep than it should have been the amenities kit was nice the points guy has a review which included pictures of the seats the amenity kit and the food in premium economy overall i would certainly fly jal in premium economy in the future
wifi dont waste your money im on a flight from tokyo i to singapore and after hrs i cant get enough data to do anything other tha this mail dont waste your us pathetic

from the check in to the landing everything was perfect polite comfortable on time and very well done the staff at checkin were very organised and ready to help nothing was too much trouble and they all were very efficient food on the flight was excellent as were the hosties a really good experience will fly with them next to time japan and then on to london as i understand i can have a day stopover love my days in tokyo i thought signs and language would be an issue but some signds and google translate downloaded without internet was fine

i decided to go with jal because my original airlines changed my itinerary twice after booking three months before my trip jal also has routes from san diegotokyomanila staff were very attentive cheerful and kind newer airbus model roomier legroom average size seat width clean cabin and bathrooms boarding and disembarking were smoothly done and on time i did not mind a long layover because all the resources available in narita airport such as customs and immigration and hotel transports that make layovers a pleasant experience my only beef with jal is the food it could be better but please do not take away the real cutleries and the ice cream cupthats my favorite other than that ill fly jal again and recommend it to friends

i love the jal business suites very comfortable private and all seats with aisle access perfect for the long transpacific hauls the service is attentive and courteous jal excels in small details like extremely clean bathrooms throughout the flight which some airlines tend to neglect on long flights i also find that the japanese menu which is light but filling excellent for a long flight in any case the additional ondemand menu available throughout the flight is wonderful when the munchies grab you

was flying to the states from vietnam via american airlines and the stretch from hanoi to tokyo was operated by japan airlines we were supposed to be in the economy class but got upgraded for free to premium economy and it was literally the best plane ride ive ever been on free wine free udon noodles great inflight entertainment with noisecanceling headphones and ample space the seats recline super far with a folddown foot rest and flip up leg rest the arm rests are quite wide so you dont have to jostle with your neighbor for elbow room plus theres a partition at head level so you have a good amount of privacy couldnt be happier with the flight arigato
good seating layout and specious seats flight attendances are very friendly and helpful service is excellence

in my many years of travel never have i experience such great pain in doing a transittransfer internationaldomestic while making the booking the jal system auto book us with a gap of hours for a change to domestic plane in haneda airport upon checking in only did we learn that we have to clear full customs baggage be taken out check in again at domestic transfer counter no thru baggage into sapporo and baggage will not be accepted at the transfer counter if you are later than mins to flight departure then it has to be carried all the way to the domestic terminal be checked in there hair stands up in horror arriving at haneda the passport clearance was miles long it took full mins to clear then we dash to the baggage area with the heart thumping all the way found our baggage run to find the transfer counter now its only mins left we see the staffs kept looking at their watches trying to decide if they would accept the several poor souls on the que more heart thumping thank god they accepted the luggage gave us the train tickets as it is too late to take the bus we had to run really run to find the train platform to catch the next train at the domestic terminal clearing the security was another mile long by chance we saw the priority lane we fought for attention of the staff showed our boarding time is almost closing they allowed us to join the priority que by the time we ran to the gate its only mins left our heart was thumping endless what a super big pain how could jal allowed this kind of connection in their ticketing also why didnt provide sufficient upfront information eg baggage will not be checked thru etc to travellers same horror story on the way back when trying to check in on line we realized tho it has a jl plane id it was actually a code share under jetstar means we cant check in online at airport jetstar could not print the boarding pass for the nd lag on jal and jetstar flight was delayed mins heart starts thumping again as we knew the nightmare with insufficient time to transfer this round its narita even bigger more running searching right bus to right terminal etc and the running gets real stressful clearing passport security run dash run dash we arrive at the gate with the boarding started this is the nightmare that i thank god that i survived through but do you want to put yourself through it my advise avoid the pain take those airlines that does direct flights into sapporo not jal that has to transit transfers to domestic flights in tokyo i dont understand why jal process flow and design are not so traveller friendly
the seat is roomy and comfortable food is very creative and deliciousthe attendant service is kind and excellent i miss the hot hamburger on breakfast very much
my first experienced with japan airlines check in was quick friendly and polite cabin crew the food is fantastic happy flying with comfortable seat will fly with this airlines again love
great flight attentive staff my dietary requirements were not passed on to them for some reason but the cabin crew went out of their way to put something together for me it was greatly appreciated

had a long layover in osaka from thailand i had injured my ankle and my husband asked the first class lounge for a bag of ice since that is almost impossible to find in the limited space we were allowed in the airport the attendant came out took one look at my foot and ran and got someone they got my ice and insisted on a wheelchair i tried to protest but since i couldnt even get my shoe on i didnt really have leg to stand on pun intended they went back and called whoever was in charge and called all my connecting flights to minneapolis lax to chi to msp there were wheelchairs waiting at every gate shuttle at lax cart in chicago and in msp talk about above and beyond who does that japan air thats who i had priority seating they were very kind to me and the rest of my trip was made so much easier good thing too because my gate at lax was mile away extra bonus we are vegan and the food is amazing as well as very pretty fyi i have never seen airline bathrooms this big everever

the aircraft is spacious seats are very comfortable food is highly superior service or the flight crew is implacable every meal is a special surprise its really of superb quality compared to all other airlines great job jal

my mom dressed me in a pressed dress shirt my best pants and made sure my hair was combed we were getting on a aa plane to florida the flight attendants all smiles and welcoming serving up hot meals and great service long gone are those days in america welcome japan airlines from the gate at dallas to our final destination narita airport japan we were greeted with smiles and excellent service hot food options hot towels snacks pillows blankets and anything else one might need in a long flight the plane was new including personal entertainment electronic window darkening foot rests and enough lavatories to satisfy anyone just a joy to fly with such a professional airline who hasnt forgotten that we are passengers and guests not baggage and cargo do yourself a favor and treat yourself to with this airline
good flight flight was not delayed seating comfort is good even though its a little tight for a feet tall person service is good and professional

i flew on jal on the del yvr sector and found the aicrafts to be new with all the modern amenities on board be it the infotainment system usb chargers on every seat the crew is very courteous good legroom nice warm meals served with a smile

whenever travelling to japan feel free to book jal as they are the best airlines i have come across so farespecially if you with a toddler you get food varietymilk basic needs etc and a great airline staff amazing seats and leg space that you get in this airlineyou can surely give it a try and i am sure you wont be disappointed

the toilet is always so clean like a star hotel with washlet normally i hate meals on the airplane but the food taste great and they have hot miso soup on the plane the service is also impeccable all and all awesome experience id definitely want to pick japan airlines if i am going to fly to japan next time although it is not cheap yet but thats what you need to pay for the excellent customer service

i travelled to tokyo from melbourne by jal in economy class in may this year the seats were comfortable the aircraft was clean and modern boeing and the customer service by jal airhostesses and cabin crew was excellenti would recommend jal and fly by them again
i always love to fly with japan airlines there is considerably more leg room than average airlines and the flight crew are very friendly and nice

great service and excellent food the jal dreamliner economy seats have to be some of the best with heaps of foot room and very comfortable seating my only criticism is that sparkling wine doesnt seem to be available in economy although i have had it in premium economy previously the flight attendants are always smiling and go out of their way to assist
clean good service flight on time the flight going is small plane and return journey is big plane

paid extra for long haul to europe this was first leg customer service was excellent seats were comfortable bed was better when i realised there was a mattress in the overhead locker silly me transit lounges were also much appreciated

excellent customer service the hostess remembers and delivers my onboard requirement excellently onboard entertainment was great and kept us occupied throughout the flight departure and arrival time was punctual seat arrangements are good in a xx seats arrangement however check in service is slow and can be improved by allowing an extra lane for those who have done the internet check in to drop off their bags

i flew jal for the first time i did fly one leg in business and the other in economy i loved this airline they have the best inflight food of any airline i have ever been on and am going to be flying them as much as possible in the future i had a day stop over in tokyo and they were amazing to deal with

it was a long hour flight for my family and i with young kids and i was initially quite apprehensive about it but it was good first of all the attendants were really friendly and polite some of them could only speak a little english but they make it easy by giving you cards to look at and point out what you wantneed the kids were given a good quality welcome toy and the kids meals were really cute throughout the flight they will periodically offer waterjuice without having to ask for it the seats were comfy slightly wider than usual and they have snacks near the service counter for you in case you cant sleep and felt like munching something i would definitely fly jal again if i have the chance

we spent some time considering premium economy and business class on our jal flight in the end considering the length of the flight and the need to move around we decided on business class it was a very wise choice because we had individual compartmentalized seats that we could raise and lower partition screens we had a true sense of privacy the seats reclined and raised in a variety of positions so we never felt cramped or hemmed in on top of all this the service was stellar the stewardesses were concerned for all of our needs and were extremely helpful the best of any airline i have ever flown the food was exceptional and help was immediately available regardless of the hour additionally access to the first class lounge was included it was an amazing experience from check in through arrivals i could not have asked for kinder better attention from everyone i consider the flight especially one of this length as a day of my trip i cannot imagine spending it in discomfort

super airline and while my japanese is very limited the ground and onboard staff always make my trip so easy online checkin for nonjapanese is a little cumbersome but with the help of my office team is possible

worth paying the extra monies our car service picked us up earlier than we had requested so we arrived before jal even opened their counter we were first in line and when it was opening time staff marched out together lined up in front of the counter and then bowed to whomever was in line then because we were so super early we were given coupons to their lounge the lounge was stocked with snacks even sushi for a bit and all you can drink including alcohol lounge was located above so there was a view for people watching once on the flight staff regularly fed us with meals snacks and drinks there were also a selection of movies and all the comforts were provided including headsets check to see if there is a food difference between economy and economy premium if more leg room is necessary weigh all that against cost difference

i just have to say that even flying economy was almost as good as first class being a sapphire member with american airlines sure has its perks japan air coshares with american and they are definitely worth it thank you

the foreign airlines japan australia and canada are so much better than united free food and free entertainment package japan airlines took it to another level of service the flight attendants were so service oriented they came around with water numerous times the seats were huge and comfy compared to united i will definitely use them again to go japan

so my wife had to go to the philippines to see her sick father basically she had a hour delay in tokyo they said it was because of weather in beijing i checked the weather in beijing to tokyo when she was flying and the weather was beautiful but if there was weather problems that is not where my complaint is she had to catch a connecting flight to her home town on a different carrier so the delay caused her to miss that flight they told her in tokyo that they would take care of it very poor english they should have better speaking english employees if they are going to fly from the us so she got to manila went to the ticketing counter of japan air to get another flight to her home town nope said they could not help her because it was not japan air they dont fly to her home town i called japan air while she was in tokyo and they told me they would accommodate her they also told her that an hour and a half connecting to air asia was not enough time to get there thats irrelevant however its in the same terminal and it has only taken me minutes to get there when we have done that trip before so the guy at the counter said that he could get her a flight for to her home town because they work with that airline he went on the internet to find her one i could have done that and cheaper i spoke with him too poor english and rude like he did not care so in the end she went to the air asia terminal took minutes to get there and had to buy another ticket that was hours out and it took hours for nothing at the japan ticket counter lies lies lies i will never fly on japan airline

food awful yes many japanese traveling to the us and food reflected that but many americans traveling back home felt the plane was just dirty i didnt take the plastic bag off the pillow put my jacket between my head and pillow and wouldnt use the blanket i usually wipe down tray table and things i might touch but this time i wanted to wipe down the seat and walls between seats if anything really necessary was said by the flight attendants or pilot we would never know because we couldnt hear or understand either never again

my fianc√© i flew business class london manila july we had to change airports in tokyo ie landed in haneda transfer to narita fine we knew there would be some disruption but we were not prepared for the complete lack of service from jal upon check in at heathrow we were assured that the transfer was common occurrence and would happen seamlessly in fact there would be someone to meet the flight and aid us since we had to get through immigration collect our bags considering we were business the check in at heathrow wasnt professional up to the standards of most font line international carriers they share veryl limited facilities with ba so i boarded in london with some misgivings which i expressed to the purser she allayed my fears stating the transfer was common practice would radio ahead so now the flight was great food good service excellent hours of top class flight disembarked to find no one waiting for us approached one attendant holding a little card was told to go through immigration collect our bags go to the bus counter buy a ticket for narita what a bun fight it took an hour fifteen to get through the queue only to be told we were at the wrong counter half an hour later we got to the carousel to collect our bags to their credit our bags last to be collected they had an attendant with the bags i explained our predicament and was told to go through into the concourse and buy a bus ticket no room on the busfull half hours left no jal staff within coowee i had to leave my fianc√© who was totally stressed with the baggage go upstairs to arrivals in order to attempt to sort out the situation no help told to take a taxi by this stage our connecting flight was due to take off in just under hours taxi driver was great he realised the gravitas of our situation sped to narita he did what jal should have done cost of cab aud eventually got through boarded to be told no western food they had run out dont give me that sitting in d in a half empty business class no western food came aboardthere is more but ive bored you enough dont touch jal unless youre desperate good if nothing out of the ordinary happens but no backup a disgrace i travel heaps and without doubt the worst asian airline
what a great place to be for hours premium economy on this flight was excellent with great entertainment comfortable seats and cabin crew that care

we flew by japan airlines for the first time as we usually take emirates we were amazed how excellent the service was all the air hostesses were very friendly and helpful food was great and the seating was very comfortable the fare was much cheaper than emirates but quality of service was much better also for economy class passengers are allowed to take two bags of kg each plus hand luggage kg we definitely will advise to fly with this airline and this will be our first airline of choice

jal is a terrific airline and their business class is pretty impressive starting with the lounge at jfk which was way more than i expected great food relaxing atmosphere and a selfserve bar boarding was quick and easy and the onboard staff could not have been nicer or more attentive the business class seats are staggeredmeaning you do not have to bother the person next to you when getting in and out of your seat the seats also flatten to a bed a nice plus on a hour flight i was lucky enough to get a window seat the window seats are very private especially when you raise the divider between you and the next seat the aisle seats in business class can feel a little busy with aisle traffic both food and service were amazing i love that they have asian and western choices on the menu i kinda tried them alland they were all great a lot of great choices for inflight entertainment you have to pay for internet and its not cheap there are also some great little amenities onboard i will definitely be flying with them again

i have flown on jal before but it has been a number of years ago i forgot how great the service is on this airline all of the flight attendants are focused on making your flying experience an enjoyable one as a result this flight seemed to be shorter than i thought it would be i have decided to use jal more often when i fly to asia in the future

this was the best flight i have ever been on in the beginning i wasnt looking forward to the hour flight but it was very good the service was amazing they serve hot meals in the hour flight drink no cost hot towels served before you get your meals ect another thing that is great is the japanese people and how they travel every time you get on an airplane with a bunch of canadians and americans in is a painful experience i am canadian the canadians and americans dont know how to act as soon as the flight is in the air they are standing up and digging in the overhead compartments or letting their young kids run up and down the isles and walk around staring and invading others space the movies on the flight were all free and all new releases with many to chose from getting on and off the plane was very organized it was a very pleasant experience

when we checked in for our flight we were told we would not be seated together but after my wife told them it was my th birthday and she would like to sit together we were told we will see what we could do when boarding the flight we were greeted by its a double celebration we upgraded you too premium economy and we have bought you a present a lovely hip flask from harrods the flight was lovely and the food and wine couldnt be any better at the end of the flight the cabin crew gave me another gift a model of the plane with happy birthday and flight number written on the top all together a great experience from japan airlines

first time on this airline and was really surprised at how nice it was for an economy ticket big seats lots of leg room food was better than most airlinesand served with real silverware service was outstanding i really thought i was in premium economy classplane looked like a new one i would fly again no problem check in was quick and easy very nice service for economy class
fantastic crew greta food very comfortable seatflat bed used miles to get the first class experience great value
the premium economy seats were comfortable for a long flight the facilities were clean the food was good the staff was friendly and courteous the entertainment was ok
overall i will highly recommend they have great seats and they also offer free use of their lounge which comes with a shower

boarding was quickcrew was efficientthe airplane a south american plane wasnt comfortable didnt feel safe it was a short flight due to heavy turbulence i was sick but the crew just ignored it i was happy whn i could get of the plane

my first long international flight and it was great the space was good chairs were as good as you can get for economy entertainment great all the movies etc food and beverage service was great i didnt get to pick my meal since they were all gone however i was extremely surprised by my seafood dish which was excellent i enjoyed the staff they were very nice and made me feel comfortable i would definitely fly on jal again

comfortable flight lovely professional staff and definitely the best airline food ive ever had the plane had a nice area with drinks and biscuits that you could access between meals and i felt comfortable moving about the cabin

just flew jal to japan for a two week holiday direct flights from melbourne to tokyo the flight staff are very professional and make sure everyone has what they need on the flight home the food was delicious the food was designed by a top winning chef i chose the vegetarian curry option that included salads and desert followed by icecream before we landed we got a make yourself burger which was also a novel idea and delicious would fly jal again

i havent even flown but the ground service is appalling whilst confirming my flight information everything looked fine correct and ready to go so pop i confirmed it turns out after picking my seats my names are magiclly misspelled while on different forms of confirmations i have correct spelling took me hours to even connect to a human being when i finally connected i was treated as if i was stupid and badgered at for making sure my name was correct i have screen shots and copies of my confirmations with correct spelling ive been waiting days stressing over this whole ordeal they cant manage to help ease this tension it seems as if theyre so set on just waiting untill its too late to cancel where my fees will double this whole time i havent been treated as a paying customer but rather a criminal i dont suggest using this airline at all the inflight service could be good but i wouldnt know i cant even manage to get my tickets fixed

very good service friendly staff and the food was delicious jal has engaged world class chefs to develop their inflight menu and i appreciate it my only complaint is it felt that i had slightly less leg room than air canada im nearly though so i always feel a little squished i was traveling with my visibly pregnant wife and the staff at jal in the airport and on the aircraft treated her very well and ensured she was given priority without us having to ask it not only made us feel special it was nice to see that the airline values family and is happy to accommodate the slightly more difficult task of flying around in that condition

i have been flight to japan many times and tired various airlines such as british airways sas and finnair japan airlines is by far better than any of the others the service is on a whole different level the staff is very polite respectful and helpful the flight is a lot calmer and passes faster the food is excellent even in economy worth every penny

experienced world round trip on one world group ay ba aa and jal ays new a c class seat was comfortable and flight attendant were friendly food and drink were standard ba flight inside europe even it was very short flight they served food and drink efficiently just worked for service in time then ba long flight c class seat arrangement is not very comfortable because seat side by side are sitting looking each other space among seat was minimal ba lounge at heathrow was good aa service inside usa was minimum poor food and drink service same as other us base airline after these flight experiencs jal flight from san francisco to haneda was the best check in lounge service inflight food and drink and flight attendant when you have choice among one world flight my recommendation is use jal

we flew on two separate jal flights one bangkok to tokyo one tokyo o seattle we really enjoyed both of these flights though any airlines economy seats suck for legroom sorry it seats shouldnt recline when its this tight we adored the flight attendants on both flights friendly efficient food was ok i ordered gluten free and all meals were fish which i enjoyed but their idea of fruit was two separate dishes of the same melon ugh but we would definitely fly jal again

the service you get from the crew members were excellent they were very polite in every way also little things like a free toothbrush in the toilet helped a lot the toilet was always kept clean by the staff

only seats in economy in their so the space is maximized to give extra pitch and larger seats nearly premiumfood and staff stunning as expected in any japanese business it was a really great flight i will certainly fly again on jal

i took the long haul flight from tokyo narita to san diego on jal i flew in from bangkok and had a short connection time of one hour to make the flight scheduled for departure at pm but found that the san diego flight was delayed as there had been a gate change from one end of the terminal to the other as a result boarding was delayed and we pushed back about minutes late there was a long wait for takeoff due to the many flights taking off from narita at that time of the evening and it was around pm before we took off the flight was operated using a b on boarding i was pleasantly surprised that the plane was outfitted with jals sky suite fully flat seats instead of the angled flat shell flat neo seat that i expected based on seatguru the sky suite seat is wonderful not only does it convert to a fully flat bed but there are also narrow shelves and counters all around the seat and little storage nooks here and there plus storage under the legrest for a carry on bag meal service on the flight was dinner which was delayed and then service interrupted part way due to turbulence after the main meal was served many snack or second meal options were available for any time service according to the menu salad jal trademark curry ramen or udon sandwiches cheeses japanese and western set plates the choices were too plentiful to sample even on a long haul flight for dinner i had the japanese meal which featured seared wagyu beef and grilled black cod before the appetizers and main was served there was also a really delicious amuse buche of sesame tofu with wasabi and sweet corn flan with sea urchin cabin staff asked me whether i wanted to be woken for the second meal prior to arrival and i opted to be woken and ordered the japanese plate with roast beef roll eventhough both meals had miso soup the two soups were very different ones a thoughtful touch in variety as always the meals on jal were delicious and beautiful to behold notwithstanding a very turbulent flight with the seat belt sign turned on repeatedly i managed several periods of good sleep of a couple of hours each jal has added an airweave mattress pad for sleeping these were stored in the overhead bins and when i was ready to sleep i unzipped the package and the pad folded out easily to cover the seat converted to a bed i thought the pad probably about an inch thick did make a difference in making the seat more comfortable as a bed despite the delayed boarding from the change of gates and the long wait for takeoff due to narita traffic the flight arrived in san diego only about minutes late i enjoyed the flight very much and thought the many choices for any time dining after the main meal service and the airweave mattress pad which jal has added made the flight even more enjoyable than prior long haul jal flights i have taken would love to repeat this long haul experience if flying on the same route again

i took an early morning flight from bangkok suvarnabhumi to tokyo narita on japan airlines booked as american airlines aa as the flight is scheduled for am i arranged for a am car from the millennium hilton bangkok which arrived around am due to the light traffic that early in the morning after a quick and courteous check in at the jal first class check in from my one world alliance status i used the priority security lane to quickly pass through passport control and was in jals sakura lounge the lounge is very large and as jal did not have many flights early in the morning it was mostly empty there is a full buffet of food including western eggs and sausage but also japanese offerings like yellowtail and daikon kelp in soy sauce sweet potatoes cooked jelly mountain vegetables japanese style buns stuffed with noodles and more not that i needed the food as the millennium hilton bangkok thoughtfully put together a packed breakfast with ham and cheese sandwich pastry breads fruit and orange juice the lounge has a good view of the departure gates and the runway the flight was operated using a b configured xx in business class with angle flat seats shell flat neo we pushed back on time at am flight time was estimated to be hours minutes and we arrived on time at pm meal service was lunch shortly after take off and drink service i opted for the japanese meal since i generally find the japanese meals better than the western ones on jal i was not disappointed as the meal was delicious i found the angled flat seat actually quite comfortable for napping and as long as i positioned myself at the correct place on the angled flat seat i did not slide down on the seat it is also relatively wide i had seat d the first row so i did not have the cabinet in front of me with the video monitor that other rows have and therefore it was very easy to exit from the seat legroom was also very good in the first row the video monitor for first row seats has to be retrieved out of the armrest and is smaller than for the other rows however the entertainment system for jal is not its strongest point anyway so it did not bother me jal has a smaller range of english movie choices than other airlines and most of the movies in other languages have japanese as a subtitle choice instead of english as always service on japan airlines is superb and courteous and the washrooms are kept very tidy by constant cleaning by the cabin crew overall no complaints and a very enjoyable early morning flight

be warned that japan airlines does not allow reserved seats for economy class was allocated seats which were separated from my travelling partner they have very poor seat allocation system as the person beside me was a single traveler and they could have just made the seat arrangement for people travelling to sit together instead of separate not worth the price paid as could have got better service and seats on other airlines such as singapore airlines at similar price

the travel agent that i was working through for this flight booked the wrong date for the flight when they tried to change it jal refused to do anything about it even though it was a mistake and i caught the mistake within hours after repeated attempts by myself and the travel agent responsible jal still refused i offered to pay whatever fee was necessary to fix the flight dates but their customer service refused to listen to my situation they had an appalling lack of willingness to help me with a situation that was out of my hands i cant use the flight on the day it was booked so now i have effectively paid dollars for nothing as good as they are at the flight itself i cannot recommend this airline because of their customer service they were totally willing to make me pay for a completely new flight

great flight and experience started with the lounge enjoyed the admirals club in nrt airport great customer service working on the seats for my family ppl not sure why but in the reservation my family got split up so we had to work on that mostly accommodating were able to get me and two kids near and then wife two rows ahead worked well enough customer service on boarding and inflight was excellent kids got toys and flight attendants were very friendly to them best parts of the flight yamazaki whiskey seats i fit in to sleep food yes the food and drink probably the highlight of the flight they served a wagyu beef was excellent not just regular tenderloin this was a legit wagyu cut steak fortunately i was able to eat mine and then my kids already asleep i had to suffer with their portions didnt want the food to go to waste and the yamazaki to wash it down was wonderful i have another jal flight booked next month and i am very much looking forward to it

this is my first review for jal checking was ok the check in person was not the most friendly when i said items are fragile she made me sign the tag and said airline not responsible when i said the items are good now so it is their responsibility if they are broken she gave me a lot of lip in return not the best first impression luckily nothing was broken and cases were just fine the flight itself was good family and i slept well flight crew was very nice and friendly with the kids gave them gifts i liked that the crew did not wake us up for food but rather asked us before we fell asleep if we wanted food or not hakushu whiskey on board most importantly i am and i fit in the lay down seats very comfortable

we had a comfortable flight from sydney to tokyo the aircraft was new dreamliner with sufficient legroom comfy seats and good interior ambience inflight food was at average level as compared to qantassq on this route also we felt that the inflight crew were bit lost in their attempt to provide the best service overall an average experience and value for the money we paid for our discounted fare flights

we had high expectations for jal on this flight but were let down by the service and the food as a non fish eater i was disappointed to note that the second meal was only a fish option absolutely no alternatives which meant we didnt get a meal and then the whole cabin stunk of fish making me want to throw up this is the first time as a platinum frequent flyer of many years that ive ever come across this and was severely disappointed in addition to add insult to injury the stewardess singled me and my partner out to put our seats up dont have any problem with this during the meal service but they did not ask the couple in front of us to put their seats up which left us cramped and squashed overall although the product is not too bad i would not recommend flying jal

very good service and the staff was extremely courteous and friendly however the food left a lot to be desired i have experienced this in the past as well when i have flown with japan airlines if jal improved the quality of their food they would get a top rating from me

japan airlines the most systematic airlines which i ever had the ground staff are so friendly to assist whatever doubrs we had even the airplane which the seats are so confortable in legs space compare to other airlines moreover the japan airport its so covenient weather its in nagoya chubu airport or haneda international airport or narita international airport easily find the hotel nearby and even in the airport easily can see the direction board to tell you the train station limousine directions etc so convenient easy to find and no stress during your travel

it was round trip from bangkok to osaka recently seat allocation brand new airplane window is electronic sunshade seat pit is wide legroom is good if youre average heightpro cleanliness politeness of crew services in flight entertainment it was a hours of comfortable trip conmeal they served on economy just only one choice and their taste is below average even miso soup for anything else cant complain compare with their competitors like thai airways ana jal is in the middle it is one of the good choices for your japan trip

it has been more than years since i last flew jal i had to go from japan narita airport to kaohsiung after arriving from the us given the schedule i had two choices the lcc vanilla air or jal i am glad i chose jal despite the slightly higher fare boarding started on time to a remote stand via bus the flight was operated by an older er but it has been retrofitted with larger luggage overhead bins and jals awardwinning skywider economy seats at inch width and inch pitch these are probably the best economy seats in the industry in terms space and comfort the ife is also stocked with plenty of movies and music service is executed with traditional japanese professionalism and precision i noticed some of the crew members were able to speak mandarin to the chinese passengers not being a fan of airplane meals the meal was actually quite good for economy class and it came with a small haggandaz green tea ice cream i dont think you would find that on too many hour regional flights we arrived at our destination on time although i was quite tired from having just flown in from the us and got virtually no sleep i still found this jal flight to be a pleasant one
detailoriented cabin extremely comfortable seats professional cabin crew and excellent food choices

ive been flying jal executive class business class since and have visited japan more than times since joining the jal mileage bank something i didnt do for many years ive spent over on jal i always appreciated the fact that if i booked over the phone they would allow me to reserve flights well in advance about ten months and i would not have to pay until two weeks prior to the flight not once did i ever cancel those flights i always honoured my arrangements with jal i am a sapphire tier customer for all the good it does me now jal in their wisdom have decided that there is no more buy now pay later deal in other words they have seriously downgraded their level of customer service certainly i can appreciate that there are some potential customers who cancel their bookings late i however am not one of those people my loyalty to jal and the fortune i have spent on them over the years means nothing to them they show no loyalty to me being a sapphire tier customer means you get a shiny blue card and bugger all elsethe way jal treats its best customers is a disgrace

japan airlines has got really good service both in flight as well as ground i flew and the seats were really comfortable in business class full flat the crew was really good and helpful the biggest issue is with the food and beverage on board the beer on board is only ashi which unfortunately is not that good there are no other international beer brands the other drinks are saki there are few international brands of alcohol as far as food is concerned there are predominantly two choices japanese and western on any flight the japanese is understandable and is mainly fish and see food i am allergic to fish and seafood so cant eat it the other option is western which is beef and fish universally on all other airlines it is chicken and vegetarian this shows how much knowledge the featured chef have of the world cuisine even on the flights to and from india which had about indians the menu was exactly the same most indians dont eat beef and lot of them are vegetarian imagine what will they eat all airlines cater to the local taste rather than forcing what they like if you are going to fly jal please pre order your meal

nice extras like squash and sweets included as part of the service check in bags included in the price of booking up to kg which makes it nice and simple and no need to book in additional luggage after paying for the flight good times for leaving and departing we were given an exit seat and asked if we would mind which was fine for us

everything about this flight was perfectfrom checkin through arrival granted it was just a few hours but you know youre having a great experience when you dont want the flight to end it was my first time ever on a dreamliner and i was glad it was on this airline the aircraft bb was squeaky clean had a modern cabin with new window tinting technology and configuration legroom was wide the seat k was comfortable the ife screen was large with a good entertainment selection excellent service quality and efficiency were evident throughout the flight food was equally excellent as expected on a japanese carrier

i was looking forward to flying jal because my dad flew with them before and had a good experience my concern on this flight was that i bought my ticket separately from the rest of my family and therefore was afraid we could not sit together however i give the airline credit for making adjustments so that i could sit with my wife and young children the flight was uneventful which is the best type of flight flight attendants were friendly and professional they also gave our children jal souvenirs which made them really happy the food wasnt bad i had fish which was moist and tasty the seats had plenty of legroom inflight entertainment was all right but most of it was geared towards japanese passengers overall i was glad to have flown with jal and had a pleasant experience

from checkin to modifying seat assignments and meals served jal has a very comfortable package with excellent service my main complaint it that the movie selection was limited especially as the origin was in the us however i compensated by listening to some of my favorite classical music

very professional and helpful though we were unlucky when we were checked in as a trainee was doing it and she made some mistakes and took us quite a bit of time to complete check in aircraft was very clean food presentation was absolutely great and food was decent landing was good and on time

checkin was quick being am there werent too many people around the attendant allocated our seats as selecting them online wasnt available to us at the boarding gate we were in the priority queue which didnt take long to board the aircraft the aircraft was quite good and had a good feel to it we were seated in business open suites and in a middle row sidebyside with a divider between us on our seats were a pillow menu blanket slippers and an amenities bag which contained a toothbrush tissues moisture mask steam eye mask lip balm and ear plugs i was taking photos of the business class cabin as you do and the flight attendant offered to take a photo of us which was a nice touch the western menu had tiny serves of courses being smoked salmon fennel soybeans tandoori chicken followed by asparagus tart seared tuna sashimi agrodoice shrimp with chia seed sauce mains was either roasted duck leg with jus sauce or beef fillet steak with brown butter balsamic sauce migas dip wild rice gratin dessert was blueberry cake bottles of water were available throughout the flight as were the items on the anytime you wish menu entertainment had a good selection and the movies were quite recent all the flight attendants were friendly and respectful overall an enjoyable hr flight

jals business class cabin configuration is almost as bizarre as british airways access to the window seats is via a very narrow lane even a moderate size person has to turn sideways to get through only the windowside aisle seats have any accessible storage all the others have storage behind the headrest which means you have to get out of the seat to access on this particular flight food was very average in choice and quality service was ok

this is the first time we have flown jal and we had a great flight with plenty of legroom the flight attendants were friendly and the restrooms were kept clean during the flight meals were above average no hesitation in flying with them again

our flight with japan airlines was all that we could have wanted the aircraft was very clean and the seats comfortable the staff were immaculate and very respectful catering to all our needs we enjoyed the food with a choice of japanese or western and liked being provided with warm refresher towels twice during the flight the toilets were clean and toothbrushes and razors were available
