we have taken many jal flights tofro japan in our annual times to nihon our feel is always the international flights are better than the domestic ones overall oopsnevertheless would like to share the most recent trip experience in latemay when we took jal from sg to hnd a redeye flight it is hours journey the embarking and checkin was good as other airlines the takeoff was on time and orderly inside the cabin the seat legroom and aisle spacing was respectable especially for us asian but agreed with some ta reviewers that the inflight entertainment is only average movies are ok not too dated but the audio is mainly japanese and korean if english be prepared for more selection of oldies songs than contemporary the chinese selection is minimal though there is a personal entertainment screenpage the programs are all in japanese meal wise always something to look forward to it is probably in japanese airlines that they serve warm miso soup really refreshes us beside the hotcold green tea just like to highlight an incident that i believe speaks volume of their good customer service it was midway through the flight and light were off resting time i was thirsty so i approached them for a warm water minutes later the air stewardess came back with one and with a lid cover over it apparently worry that it will spill andor ensuing the temperature will not drop so quick a small gesture but i take it very positively we will continue taking jal if the timing slot is good and also believed all passengers will continue to receive attention and good service throughout their journey

overall experience with japan airlines has always been good as their crew is warm and friendly as what japanese usually portray themselves to be on this return flight from narita to singapore the crew serving the aisle i was sitting at was especially attentive to my kids the food on japan airlines is always good even a simple porridge dish for breakfast can be made so amazing

always a joy flying with them the crew is always pleasant the airline always selects a catering company which prepares super small neat portions but very yummy i love passing through narita or haneda airports in japan please fly with jal hands down one of the best out there

i would say this is one of the best airlines i have flown with the entertainment has current and older movies and games for kids good was great and the cabin crew were very friendly and efficient they couldnt do enough for you price return from melbourne was very reasonable as we managed to get their first birthday specialfrom melbourne to tokyo for i hope to fly with them again

i was on a short flight just under hours everything seemed okay until i requested a blanket at first the staff was handing out the blankets walking down the aisle and i asked for one it was not wrapped in a plastic bag i thought it was a bit odd but took it anyways when i looked at it there was a stain on it so i handed it back telling the staff that it was no longer needed then after takeoff it got quite chilly inside the cabin so i requested a blanket again hoping that they wouldnt bring be the one with a stain this time fortunately they handed me a different blanket i was very relieved but when i took it in my hand i smelled this horrible filthy smell at first i tried using it just cover my legs but i couldnt bare the smell i just dont understand why they wouldnt notice this smell before handing out it was disgusting and i so regretted touching it after that everything in the cabin seemed filthy and dirty and i felt very very uncomfortable

the routes flown laxnarita hong kong haneda naritalax cabin premium economy the equipment er cabin layout and cabin system check in separate fast and efficient check in for premium economy passengers at lax and hong kong and narita bags get priority gooooooooooood lounge access lax as a premium passenger you get lounge access at lax but jal does contract with a basic lounge provider at tom bradley not as good as norwegian premium economy passengers getting the one world business lounge but the jal lounge at lax is in my opinion way better than most plaza premium and priority pass lounges i have been too around the world also virgin atlantic pe passengers dont get a lounge and neither do air new zealand passengers the los angeles lounge has some sandwiches cup of noodles snacks a small outside seating area good wife and boooooooooooze enjoy good the lounge jal contracts with at hong kong is qantas business and this lounge is the bombcom it is a very very very big comfortable lounge way better than any business lounge at lax or sfo or jfk or newark pe passengers on jal get to use this lounge amazing food is good alcohol selection is good not as varied as one world lounge lax but the food is way better than what they serve at lax one world business lounge the flagship sakura lounge naritagoooooooooooood better than most us airlines international lounge and aa admiral club lounges as pe you get access food is good booze is good the seats inches of pitch gooooooood better than united pe american virgin all of ana some of air new zealand most of cathay pacific fleet but not as generous as norwegian norwegian offers or depending on the equipment flying but the seat is very functional and spacious and you will have enough legroom the controversial thing about the seat is that it slides forward to recline rather than slides back frankly for a premium economy product nothing beats the recline on norwegian pe seats and their pitch is good too so i was not a fan of the jal recline but they make up for it in so many ways jal fas they are the best in the world besides the gulf carriers they are prompt friendly and kind and willing to serve the food you will not starve on a jal pe flight snack after snack udon de sky probably the best economy food offered in the sky not enhanced food like virgin or air new zeleand but when you have lounge access you tend to have your meals at the lounge instead of eating on the flight unless your flying a solid business class like qatar airways or turkish airlines business catering again for economy food it is pretty good also you get hagen daz icecream and snack after snack after snack goooooooooood my advice is eat at the lounge and if the food is good eat the airline meal but enjoy all the yummy snacks and udon de sky and the hagen daz overall i will fly jal again i normally fly business class when going overseas but when i am paying for people and not traveling alone pe is the way to go with jal
japan for tourism is awesome friendly safe go with proper planning to enjoy not that expensive as people think theres an agent at delhi who does good planning if anyone wants her link i can give

the flight was on time and orderly boarding is straight forward though security clearance and luggage check in took a while advise jal domestic pax to be at the luggage check in counters mins before take off instead the inflight entertainment is everything is in japanese though you have a personal entertainment screen but the programs are all in japanese is not movies or anything just some japanese travel program which i did not understand a peep even the jal wifi programs on gogo system were all in japanese and very limited flight is comfortable and the gifts for kids is interesting and well liked by the kids i chose jal so because of the super early program which cost me less than usd per pax both ways

now i live in moscow and always travel by this company the attention they provide is of very high quality regardless of the kind of seat you have punctuality japanese is something that is very much appreciated in these times and this company knows it perfectly in all my trips i have always had very good experience with the menu you can choose between options and the combinations and flavors are of very good quality and do not forget the appetizers that help you taste meals better in one of my trips my suitcase broke down and when i went to pick it up from the conveyor there was a person from the company waiting for me with the bad news however they gave me at the time a new suitcase with the apologies of the case yes i dont change jal for other

after having a terrible experience with qantas flying into osaka we were happy to be on a different airline heading home jal actually exceeded our expectations in regards to their welcome their craft their service and the quality of their food first time ever ive eaten and enjoyed an airline meal in stark contrast to qantas staff nothing was too much trouble and they were constantly up and down the aisles with coffee tea green tea and water upon landing staff were at the baggage carousel offering help and directions to anybody who needed it i highly recommend jal
fly with jal for the st time and i really have a great and pleasant journey with their excellent services and also the ontime schedule hope i can have another flight with

so i bought a round trip ticket for my girlfriend from mnl to nrt airport with my us credit card she had no problems flying from manila to tokyo but a few days before her return flight jal cancelled her flight they told her i needed to go to the airport in the usa to show them the credit card i used to purchase the tickets not is this a tremendous hassle since the airport is not that close to me but i dont even have enough time to go to the airport now before her return flight back because this is so last minute and i have to work and they also said that they wont issue any refunds for the ticket too i think they should at least refund half the price of the ticket but actually should probably be the full price given the great hassle and inconvenience now she had to buy a different last minute ticket to fly back to the phillipines and that ticket is very expensive
love the japanese service quality so polite and helpful great food on board too if there is pyjamas it would be perfect
everything was excellent even for the economy class passenger the pillow they provided was just wonderful for supporting your neck whereas the only part i did not like is the windows of the aircraft

im not one to write a review unless its incredible or atrocious this experience was the latter this was the first time i flew japan airlines after hearing about their amazing customer service experiences from my friends who live in asia sadly i have to say it was one of the greatest disappointments of my flying experience that ive had my luggage was damaged somewhere from jfk to khh via nrt there was some type of oily liquid that was spilled on my black luggage which i later discovered had seeped into my bag and ruined my clothes japan airlines obviously knew about the spill as my baggage came out onto the baggage claim carousel wrapped in a pink plastic bag i didnt think anything of it since i thought maybe they had covered it due to severe weatherrain it also had a strong foul smelling odor when i took it out of the plastic but again i just thought it may have been the plastic bag felt dry and i couldnt see liquid damage since my bag is black when i got to the hotel i opened my bag to find my belongings soaked and stained in an awful smelling liquid photos and videos were taken immediately i also washed my handbags and clothes as quickly as i could to prevent permanent damage we contacted japan airlines the next day and spoke to their customer service at kaoshiung airport we submitted all my travel documents the baggage tags and boarding pass along with my photos and videos of damages even though they covered my luggage with plastic they are refusing to accept fault the only compensation they are willing to give me is a cheap replacement luggage that doesnt even compare to mine and they refuse to take responsibility for my damaged hand bags and clothes no dry cleaning no allowance for clothing which is frustrating since the majority of what i brought is now ruined and unwearable and no compensation for the inconvenience theyve caused needless to say japan airlines has lost my business i would never fly with them again my biggest regret is that i couldve saved and flown with cathay pacific

we purchased an air ticket for my wife to travel to visit family in tokyo japan on jal the ticket was purchased via gotogate travel purchased on for travel beginning on at a cost of approximately unfortunately after booking and upon inspection of her travel document she discovered a typographical error in her first name on the ticket her first name four letters has an extra letter ii instead of i rather than the correct spelling were not sure how this happened and were quite surprised to see it we made repeated attempts to rectify this situation and get the typo corrected we contacted gotogate by phone and email multiple times we contacted jal by phone and email multiple times we drove to the airport in san diego and asked for help at the jal desk we contacted alaska air though our efforts did receive some replies none were satisfactory the typo remains on the ticket given the fact that tsa or the airline may stop her at airport security screening or stop her from boarding the flight she is not willing to use the ticket therefore we have requested a full refund for the amount of the ticket minus an appropriate handling fee so that her booking via go to gate on alaska and jal will available and so that some other passenger may book travel on the seat we believe that the airline and the travel agency have a moral obligation and responsibility to serve customers to the best of their abilities and to rectify this kind of situation moreover both the airline the travel agency and other customers stand to benefit by allowing the seat to be used by another customer we are aware of the airline policies and practices regarding refunds and changes yet we believe certain situations are exceptional and require flexibility at this point all we can do is chalk it up to corporate greed and feel a simmering anger over our loss

great flight the entertainment system has dozens of movies and tv shows to watch which make the flight go by quickly the service is exceptional and the food was very good for any flight we flew economy class and had enough leg room their other classes of service looked even better i would absolutely fly jal again when going back to japan

japanese airlines is an expensive airline and we would hardly fly them but you can fly cheap even expensive airlines need to play only dates we flew the next day after the world cup in moscow thousands flew from moscow including to tokyo but why fly back the flight by the way was not loaded we didnt buy a ticket on the japanese airlines website but on the s website with which they are in codeshare it turned out cheaper than aeroflot as it is sung in the famous song first of all planes well and girls then as ana its the main competitor the japanese airlines used of been dreamliner we were already flying these planes with nowegian airlines in the united states despite the current skepticism about boeing after two catastrophes with the max the dreamliner is an excellent aircraft with best ergonomics and the notorious smart chameleon portholes now about girls i mean flight attendants they work great smart sensitive in short a role model there is a simple means to conquer air passengers on longhaul flights is to offer metal cutlery i dont know why its so important but it works that on flights on emirates that on japanese airlines the food is excellent breakfast and dinner a sandwich with fruit for lunch the quality of food and star airlines skytrax the food is about the same equally good wine for some reason almost always french if you dont have enough you can ask for another glass the entertainment system is good movies novelties and a little classics games in general hours passed unnoticed the best praise can not come up for longhaul flights

ths is my first time using jal and it was amazing from the boarding process service very nice and friendly staff willing to help and fulfill your needs meals are incredible i got salmon creamy for lunch and ice cream when take off from jkt i got two yakult seat ang legroom is soo nicee very convenient even you are travelling in economy

a direct flight from melbourne to tokyo the cabin was spotlessly clean ample leg room and the inboard service excellent the dividing partition separating economy class from business class had a window which i believe made the inside of the aircraft appear much more open and spacious my seat number was c and i believe the plane was a b i give this airline my highest recommendationi flew times on my trip with japan airlines and could not fault them in any way
loving the experienced at jal feels the japan even before you reach the island best economy seat i ever had
good comfortable chairs everything was extremely well organised food was better than average in so far as airline food is concerned toilets clean all the time

a very fuss free check in by a lovely member of staff bags were weighed and on their way in no time i dont think it took much more than minutes to be checked in the flight was fully booked but the plane was efficiently loaded and took off on time seats were a little bigger and were great my only thought was i wish they werent synthetic food served was yummy and we were at our destination right on time we would definitely fly with jal again

it was such a pleasure to be treat the really good old fashioned way too many airlines have lost their way they were friendly and obliging on the plane the two young ladies who helped us off the plane in our two wheel chairs were so helpful they were patient and strong in handling our four pieces of luggage they helped us through immigration and customs all with a smile they absolutely refused any tip thank you japan airlines i look forward to flying with you again and look forward to recommending you to everyone i wish that i had written down the names of the two wonderful ladies who helped us

had the pleasure of returning to japan via jal business class out of jfk checkin was smooth once the attendant realized my baggage wasnt overweight as she confused lbs and kg tsa pre so security was a breeze and they use the lufthansa lounge in terminal different german beers on tap and its never too early right i waited for food for the plane as i knew in business it would be better and was definitly good choice since it was about lunch and i knew i was sleeping immediatly after i went with the western and actually had fish on the plane for first time and was excellent as was the service i had the first window seat behind first class and was really private the way the seats are designed so zero disturbance throughout the flight downsides to the seat are that it gets a bit hot as the port side of the plane gets full sun blasting for about half the flight at altitude and for my cm frame it was just a tiny bit short otherwise everything else was great and will certainly repeat in the future

we flew with this airlines twice the first time the flight attendants were rude and inattentive they ran out of chicken and only had pork left maybe it was a mistake on my part to not order a special meal but i thought because they had chicken on the flight which i ordered while booking things would be ok the second flight we ordered a special meal for our year old and they gave it away they tried to give her a replacement meal of unhealthy and snack that consisted of peanuts which she could not eat when we told them no they came back with baby food

economy sydney to japan we chose jal for a few reasons daytime flight going over meant we started the trip not tired and everything we needed jr office supermarkets etc were still open plus no delay checking into our hotel the price was very reasonable the flight both ways on time the staff efficient and we were able to move seats on both flights to bulkhead seats movie selection was adequate to a hour flight food ok with reasonable drinks offerings would definitely recommend

i flew jal flights tofrom japan premium economy was better than business on other airlines for starters we had lounge access on both ends which was relaxing the seats were roomy and had tons of legroom the aircraft was a which was quiet and felt less claustrophobic than most planes ive flown on the seats reclined in a way where the seat back didnt jam into the person behind you meals were good and there were snacks and drinks available throughout the flight crew was very friendly and happy to do anything to accommodate passengers i was very concerned about what id do for hours on a plane but the flight went by quickly the direct flight from bos to nrt is a fantastic route and seems very popular
the business class at japan airlines is much better than economy class the price gap is not as big as expected

i dont know whats happening with japan airlines such terrible customer service in the new first class lounge signed up for a shower waited an hour rechecked with attendant and she had not written me down now people in front of me as everyone was arriving for the flight i had the pager but just kept repeating there were people ahead of me no apologies new food service is a step down from the previous first class lounge so disappointing

we were travelling overnight from japan to canada which was a challenge in itself mostly i cant fault the flight as staff were accomodating and friendly comfortable environment and flight in time with little turbulence my only considerations when choosing the airline next time would be limited movies challenging menus for western travellers especially children the seats on this flight dont lay right down and for a business class seat there was limited privacy usually this wouldnt worry me but considering the flight is overnight i would prefer to rest without worrying about disturbing the person next to me due to this i didnt sleep at all im not sure i will use this flight again during the hours but for a less fussy traveller the airline provided a great service at a reasonable price

we travelled as a group of three from sydney au to narita airport in japan the flight was great especially considering the daylight hours with little turbulence or delays there were a few disappointing issues namely limited movie selection a seat that didnt recline for one of our travellers another didnt have a working usb port and the third had problems pausing the movies when needing to go to bathroom meal times etc however the staff were friendly and tried to fix whatever problems they could all considered we enjoyed our flight and only had a few minor issues with jal

this was a very long flight with a hr transit in nrt the xx seating configuration for both planes the b and b made the flights a bit crowded arrived yvr very tired jal want to milk revenues for seats but theyll never achieve superior status they could learn from cx and sq inflight delivery capability id avoid jal but this time i really had no choice because of last minute trip arrangements
we had a great flight flying jal everything is great from check in to landing and pick up luggage deffinately will fly with jal again next time

check in was very good and quick the seats where good and the choices of moves was a good selection the lunch on our seven hour flight was tasty and a good sized serving leg room was better other airlines we have been on

while the cabin is starting to show its age and is not as fancy as the new first class suites that are popping up this product is still amazing the suite itself while doorless is very private i was traveling with a partner and found it quite easy to talk to each other but with the partitions raised i cannot see her at all the seat is roomy and for a foot lb guy i had plenty of space to toss and turn and sleep and jal still provides a mattress pads with the choice of firm or soft the service is top notch the cabin crew were all super friendly and was available immediately as soon as you needed them but at no point did they feel intrusive the food is one of the true highlights of the flight this meal would be great even if it was at a restaurant on the ground my favorite dish was the tuna which was made with fresh high grade otoro it was so good i ordered plates i slept for majority of the flight so i could not try all the food but everything we did have was delicious this f cabin does have the seatbelt on the ottoman which means couples could dine together although it is a little awkward as the person sitting on the ottoman has their back leaning on the tv but other than that it was fun to be able to dine with your significant other on the plane my small gripe is that jal no longer serves dean deluca ice cream in first and now its just haagen daaz which seems too plain for first class imo the amenities kit is now by etro it was loewe last time i flew with jal and for ladies a cdp face mask was given while men got the shiseido grooming kit i opted to get the cdp facemask for myself as well as men can also appreciate a good face mask the pjs offered is now unbranded the old ones had a jal logo i found these new pjs to be much softer than before and are very comfortable they fit big the large actually for me when i am usually a xxl in street clothes overall jal still offers a super amazing first class with good seats great service and amazing food

our first trip to japan and this hour flight was the start of our vacation we were in the seat section next to the window near the back of economy class the staff was attentive and kind we had full meals and a small sandwich offered in between no charge for wine served with food the food was pretty good frequent trips were made by the attendants to offer tea water or juice they left pitchers of both in the back of the cabin along with a basket of assorted snacks where you could help yourself there were movies tv programs music and games all available for each seat blankets pillows and eye masks were availablethe plane was clean

heard about the great service of japanese airlines and sure was not disappointed with this flight the flight was very well organized from the start of the boarding process to deplaning the only slight flaw was the economy class food was not so great although the japanese beers being offered made up for it also the plane was older so the inflight entertainment system and seat need to be refurbished

this was my first experience flying with jal and it wont be the last the services was star even in economy and the level of comfort was great the steward staff were great especially with our kids the food was the best airline food i have tasted in a while even better than some business class meals i have experienced

the business class experience was okay overall and the service was very friendly i chose the western menu and it was disastrous the food looked and tasted dated the main dish fish was not properly warmed up and had totally dried up quite frankly it was a disgrace even the coffee was lukewarm and weak not a good experience

we travelled to tokyo ex sydney return and the experience was superb crew were attentative food not bad seats were more roomy than others overall a great experience on the return trip i logged on hours before departure and was able to secure the exit row

i was dreading the long transpacific flight but the experience was better than many shorter domestic flights in the us spacious comfortable good foodamenities and great service from boarding to deplaning it was a positive experience i might have wished for a better entertainmentmovie selection but thats about the only criticism i can come up with

check in only hrs in advance compared to cx hrs can be better business class lounges taipei nariata honolulu not much food variety but you sure will get the beef curry with rice in every jal business lounge on the carbin seating typical business class seating acceptable food only provide western or japanese lack of quantity you have to pick it once you on board otherwise the popular dish will gone and you need to get what is left taste is good well compared to china airlines and asiana airlines similar to korean airline and cathay pacific airlines overall i think jal is good but still has lots of room for improvement
i recommend it excellent food excellent drinks excellent attention excellent comfort everything excellent
the flight was really good service is great and the flight is very clean economy class is better than most other i have travelled entertainment could be better overall great experience
i took a flight from bkk to haneda tokyo round trip jl and jl the online check in was fine and easy the flight was overall good and cabin crew are extremely nice and helpful highly recommended

this was a very good minute flight from tokyo hnd to tokushima tks everything met or my expectations especially the wonderful views of the japanese alps and mount fujithe airfare was lower than the only other airline offering nonstop service on this route

i know japan airlines is good but it is normally over my price this time i found cheap by internet i picked exist seat so i had very good leg room i know i have to help when i need to by the way it was like lcc need to do check in by machine by myself but very comfortable as usual but it depends on who assist me as usual flight was jta
amazing i was well taken care off being a vegan the stewards ensured that my needs were met at all times i really appreciated that
excellent service meals and a snack which was a sandwich side and ice cream a meal for me along with great beverage serviceincluding complimentary alcoholic beverages highly recommend

i swore off taking jal years ago due to poor service and aging equipment this was the first time i had flown them in over years they have most certainly improved the was clean and the seats were some of the best configured business class of any overwater airline that i flown recentlyand ive flown a few the cabin crew were friendly and professional the food was ok by airline standards but nothing memorable the only downsides were a totally inoperable flight status function in the seat video and a cockroach that had made itself at home next to my seat

worst customer service ever booked flight from knoxville to hanoi for sept tried to have me fly to chicago a day early with no place to stay i told them of a connecting flight through dc that would save me this problem they said okay but refused to email me a new itenary told me if i opted for a refund that i had to wait months all this after hour and minutes on hold waiting to take to someone the customer service rep tomie was completely unhelpful and could care less about my flight problems opted for the refund and will go back to flying korean air and ana when i go to hanoi avoid at all costs
the most uncomfortable seats in any cabin on any airline my whole body hurt for a week bad food and terrible movie choices two stars not zero only because of the cabin crew

this was a better than average jal flight with food prepared in japan much better than incoming flightsit was code shared with finnair as this is a convenienet way to get to europe as finnair provide the next leg into many destinations in europe the entry process was an abomination with two officers asking many questions and taking excessive time to procees people taking care is needed but this was not well done we waited nearly an hour and we were about in line this is totally unaceptable for airlines like jal and finnair who promote helsinki as an entry port to europe this is not new and time for change oficers appear arrogant and not focused on getting legitimate peoplethrough in a timely fashion we were first of a number of flights in from asia and one can imagine the delays that occurred later

i flew from tokyo to singapore return in business class the experience was excellent throughout with good food western and japanese selections wine nz sauvignon although the lack of any rum was noticeable i could not find it in the airport duty free or lounge either so i assume rum is not so popular there a standard dnata lounge in singapore but a full jal lounge in tokyo with showers breakfast very comfortable seating good light and low ambient noise on board there was a nice greeting at your seat from the lead stewardess amenity kit slippers a lie flat bed with space although notable on the return leg i found a bit more space with the window seat than the aisle seat in the formation this was the jal skysuite power points privacy good screen and a comfortable lie flat bed i got a good hours sleep on overall a good product i will be very happy to use again

japan airlines charges a premium for their business class but i cant see how the experience onboard justifies the higher price the biggest problem is the seats themselves hard uncomfortable narrow not relaxing when sitting upright and hard to sleep in i dont understand why they are so narrow given the huge amount of space devoted to each seat food is substandard the japanese choices are unappetizing for a western appetite and the western options are unimaginative and often not well prepared on the whole the cabin crew is excellent and gracious but it doesnt make up for what is basically a very uncomfortable flight groundside their lounges tend to be overcrowded with slow internet again for the prices they charge it doesnt feel like value

supposed to travel from haneda to sydney via beijing on april connecting flight out of beijing was qantas but due to cancellation of the qantas flight we had to stay in tokyo another three nights funds were provided for this by jal returned to narita three days later and we were hosted in the sakura lounge prior to boarding very nice service on board was exemplary polite and attentive excellent catering and good inflight entertainment

first time flying jal into san diego the was a newer aircraft with upgraded entertainment system the flight was overall good with the exception of food provided on this flight good leg room and comfortable seats made it better than average customer service both on the ground and in the air was great

this was my first time flying with jal and in a aircraft the flight was fine with great customer service and aircrew the one thing i was not too keen on was the food on this fight the leg room was sufficient and the seat was confortable as well

flew japan air lines both ways for sfohndsfo in premium economy all of the personnel were immaculate in dress courtesy efficiencythe epitome of professional the checkin counters at both airports do it right they are prompt courteous and treat you in such a special way utilization of the sakura lounge on both ends is a real treat with plentiful snacksfoods drinks and extremely clean lounge the airplane was also very clean with bathrooms extremely clean inflight entertainment system functioned well and plentiful in choices for length of flight it was a very unique welcome treat to be cared for in such an outstanding human manner well worth the time costgo to japan and back with this airline

firstly jal is a better service from australia to japan than qantas it is lower cost new aircraft and charming crew and generally much better food an issue with this service which is a good one is the ridiculous departure time of five minutes after midnight obviously cost driven but not good for the customera second observation and a pattern on a number of jal flights is that the food is lower quality depeneding on the route and if it is prepared in japan or the or the country of departure overall still better than the other alternative

everything was very prim and proper very efficient and personal interactions very cool they get the job done warmth and personal interactions were second thats ok the food was not catered to an international tasteseemed very japanese which makes sense for this airline
very fly from honolulu to tokyo or osaka good service good food and drinks too many fly a day to both destinations from honolulu

japan airlines jal flew me from tokyo to beijing knowing i had missed my flight connection as i had brought it up with them three times prior to takeoff landed beijing where i was left without any food and water for hours jal staff wouldnt give any information on what if anything they were doing about organising ongoing flights was left in small transit area with a guard unable to go anywhere and virtually no contact from jal finally flown back to tokyo after hours with no sleep i am an older woman in a wheelchair and was only offered yen about aud to catch train in packed tokyo subway to a hotel no vouchers or money given at all for food for two days while waiting for flight to sydney hotel room was dirty smelly smokers room jal staff at beijing indifferent to my problems and need for food and water staff also aggressive completely unhelpful and unwilling to give any information on what was happening throughout all this time as well as myself there was also a monthold baby who also had special needs and no concern for either of us was shown only got water after hours because i managed to finally convince younger jal staff person to bring some as older man dismissive i have had a number of health problems since as a direct result of the extended period without water and food and the stress caused by the attitude of jal staff

recently flew return from melbourne to tokyo check in at melbourne was good except no express pass to get through customs etc as have experienced in the past flight over to tokyo was great with friendly service same as the return flight the only criticism i have and was very dissappointed about is that on top of already big amount you are paying for business class you dont get free wifi in this day and age you would think this would be automatically included i flew with qantas on a domestic flight in economy and it was free japan airlines really need to look in to this especially in business class

the flights all left on time the service was excellent the plane was kept clean and tidy the entertainment unit was good with a wide variety of movie options but best of all there was excellent legroom in economy i will fly them again

it was my first trip with jal japan airlines having used several airlines before i usually fly economy i found the leg space is the most spacious i have experienced so far much more than qantas and emiratesseats were also very comfortable more than emirates qantas onesthe toilets were always exceptionally clean throughout entire flight flight crew very attentive the only downside i would mention is the breakfast was very poorly however main meal was very good i would still use this airline if i had to fly to japan again

jal has to be one of the best operators of the dreamliner planes they just get it right the customer service is excellent and food options is impressive i got to say the japanese always aim for perfection with anything they undertake and jal holds that standards close to heart

be aware that certain tickets you purchase through jal web site dont allow you to select your preferred seat seat map is not available for certain tickets and youll find it out after you decide to choose a particular flight you may have to go to airport counter for seat assignment by the way i booked this flight months in advance i find jal web design a bit hard to browse through and frustrating quality of service by flight attendants is excellent and they keep toilets very clean always food is not bad at all ana all nippon airline lets you view seat map always and seems much easier for me to search flights on their web site

the flight was on time the service was good and friendly i always get served vegetarian food on flights and this one was by far the worst ie the main meal however i had other little nibbles that were offered with the food
highly recommended airline asian customer service is still the best best meal on the air kudos to the management and staff of japan airlines

the staffs were very friendly and provided excellent services during the flight time the meals were very good spacious legroom and clean lavatory even the flight time was punctual my only complain was the airline only offered kg baggage compare to kg i used to have

great service compared to north american airlines upon boarding the plane we were offered candy and headsets all for a domestic flight the announcements were in both languages and the flight was smooth and pleasant the staff were very friendly and professional the flight was on time and there was a lot of help upon landing to guide you to the right direction

the sky suite is perfect for solo traveler a window seat is like a personal suite with ample space for you to enjoy the flight the meals are very delicious i didnt know that you can have such amazing meals on the airplane from savory japanese appetizers to delicious grilled salmon to a variety of items ramen beef don on the ondemand menu the flight attendants are very attentive and polite jal definitely made this hour flight from boston to tokyo quite a pleasant experience
except that it was hot and ac seemed to be running on the lowest possible setting besides that flight was just fine

i often fly with jal first class from either tokyo to osaka or vice versa and have never been disappointed the service is definitely the best i have experienced the crew are so polite professional and friendly i think our australian national carrier internationaldomestic flight crew should be trained by jal sadly the flight is only minutes but nonetheless you are treated like royalty the meal was delicious plentiful and presented so well that it would even out shine some of the fine dining restaurants that i have eaten at thoroughly recommend jal first class

i have been traveling for years for both business and pleasure and all over the world i have flown other international carriers and this is my first time to fly japan airlines i flew premium economy and was pleasantly surprised how much the seats reclined and how great the service was i also enjoyed the japanese food on the airline it was very good im also a fan of foreign film and they had some great little japanese films i will definitely fly them again

our second flight with japan airlines and much more enjoyable than our previous overnight flight the cabin staff were all pleasant attentive and service orientated a really excellent and friendly team the cabin was half full with most seats in the centre empty two meals were served during the flight a hot lunch tray after takeoff and udon noodles before arriving in melbourne quite good overall and much better than the overnight snack pack and breakfast we had last flight legroom was very good and the general atmosphere quiet i recommend taking a day flight over flying at night if you can as i found it hard to sleep well overnight in premium economy seats they are quite firm with limited adjustment
i dont fly very often but i felt even in economy that the staff did an awesome job i would definitely fly with them again

flight was delayed about an hour due to a problem with the entertainment system according to the announcements but we saw them loading cargo into the bay which we think was the real reason for the delay got on board pretty fast after the delay and we were seated and take off without any problems we actually arrived in new york on time the crew was was friendly and helpful hang up jackets got us drinks and blankets etc there was only one served meal on the flight dinner the food was okay with the main course being fish or beef the appetizers were strange but okay after the meal everything has to be ordered with the flight attendant or the remote choices were good from sandwiches noodle rice salad etc they were served until hours before landing luggage got there okay somewhat enjoyable flight will take jal again

crew were also kind helpful however this time boarding got delayed a few minutes but the flight was delayed for an hour we were early going to the airport since narita is further than haneda food served during this flight was not good its a good thing there are appetizers since the other two were unpalatable the main dish was just passable was already hungry desserts and drink saved the meal

it was my st time to fly withjal it did not disappoint the crew from the ground up to the flight crew were nice helpful the only hitch was during bag drop she crew did not accept a photo of the online boarding pass on my phone even if it has the correct name the qr code so i have to bring out my ipad during boarding i showed the boarding pass photo on my phone the crew was able to scan the qr code without a problem in flight entertainment has enough choices i guess the language barrier led to the adequate food serving with choices of appetizer desserts no need to ask for the passengers choice we boarded on time and flight was on time overall it was a good experience

on the trip to japan we flew coach business class on the trip back even in coach jal treated us all with great care attendants walked the aisles with water and snacks throughout the flight meals were tasty bathrooms were kept clean and supplied entertainment selection was broad and contemporary seat pitch was awesome for coach fly jal is all i can say

the worst service ever on any business class flight i was traveling with my son who fell asleep promptly on boarding not once did the crew ask if he would like something to eat or drink basically we were ignored for hours seems you have to be a japanese salary man to get served in business class on jal crew did not help with airweave mattress or anything though they assisted japanese passengers very disappointed at the discrimination on this flight

i love japan airlines the seats were comfy my friends said it was too hard but i have no complaints my boyfriend manage to live thru economy he said it was pretty good the seats were an inch more than american economy airlines the flight attendants were very friendly we were served two meals and a small snack during our hours flight the food was a bit salty but tasty also several drink services when there were no meals served they set up a snack station where you are welcome to help yourself i was allowed two free bags to check in which is great no one fought for overhear bin space so there were bins that were actually empty in flight entertainment was excellent saw movies that i had been wanting to see fairly new movies were available took a small nap or two and then we arrived im actually looking forward to my next flight to japan with japan airlines
jal surprised me with spacious leg room and great service by cabin crew nonstop serving water at least times within duration of hours food and snack was delicious

i flew on april from seattle to tokyo and then singapore returning on april on the reverse singaporetokyoseattle route the tokyoseattle route is a new one launched on march business class was totally full on the seattletokyoseattle flights maybe because of the attractive promotional fares that were nearly us less than the equivalent business class fares with ana and singapore airlines sq this review is of the tokyoseattle flight the japanese reputation for efficiency was quickly undermined at check in and at the airports seattle as well as tokyo although tokyo was noticeably slower everything seems to take longer than it should and longer than it does elsewhere in tokyo this was true of both check in and security not because the hand baggage security screening is better or more thorough in narita but just because it all moves slowly i found the language barrier particularly noticeable on the ground and in the air i say this as someone who has regularly flown asian airlines such as singapore airlines cathay pacific china eastern china southern ana this is not a comment that comes from a lack of cultural sensitivity i speak a number of languages and do not expect everyone to speak english but the situation is different when considering international airlines services englishspeaking routes where it can be anticipated that a significant proportion of the customers primarily speak english in this context i found that many perhaps most jal staff have a surprisingly poor command of english and are sometimes incomprehensible despite years of living in asia and working with asians including japanese i found it almost impossible to understand the attendant at the check in desk in tokyo and the flight attendants were barely better the jal flight attendants were all friendly and wellmeaning hospitable and attentive to the point of intrusion the famous japanese service training is certainly evident in the air the food and wine were disappointing for business class in comparison with other airlines serving these routes jal is less good not bad but not as good as others of course the standard is better than a us airline would be nobody is ever going to suggest that united should get an award for its food and wine offerings even in their evershrinking international first class but i recall ana as noticeably better and sq is significantly better on both food and wine as well as on pretty much every other category it was unfortunate that my seat had a broken monitorentertainment screen i was informed of this at check in twice at the gate and twice on board but as the business class was full there was no alternative seat and therefore no solution the compensation offered it was quickly volunteered i did not ask for it was a jal coupon for a discount on a future flight or points for onboard purchases or jal miles these were not much use the first two only apply if one intends to fly again with jal and the third says the miles can only be credited to jals own mileage program not to a program partner and it may take two months for any compensation to be mailed to ones address hours is a long flight with no entertainment available as is standard these days the seat becomes a flat bed i found it hard and uncomfortable at least plenty of very soft pillows are available try getting an extra pillow on united my conclusion try ana instead better still go with sq

the comfort of the jal is superior to other carriers s the seat configuration gives the feeling of spaciousness i think i was flying on a newer aircraft as my connecting flight onto hongkong was obvious an older i noticed the difference right away with the color scheme plus the seats didnt seem to be as wide and leg room was less the in flight service was lacking as the flight attendants seldom passed through with water and juice for hydration the past three years ive flown sia and the fas would do the water service about every twenty minutes as with most carriers today the food was mediocre a notch below sia but above the others i chose jal this year for convenience my home to takeoff two hours not having to go to sfo i did have to pay about more to save six or so hours

my first time flying to japan and i was a little nervous because of the length the attendants on the flight were so patient kind and attentive the meals were unlike any ive had on other airlines my only downside is that because it is under the same family with american airlines the first layover was not enjoyable as their attendantcustomer service is horrible would highly recommend jal
japan airlines operate a quality service their aircraft leave and arrive on time as scheduled their inflight service is always good and a choice of japanese or western food is available
service is second to none food is incredible good choice of entertainment and seats were very comfortable thank you japan airlines for a great experience

it was our first time using this airline our departure time was delayed airports fault for roughly an hour but we still arrived on time the inflight entertainment kept me occupied during the delay as well as the flight the food was great and i liked how they went around and offered drinks tea mostly every or minutes for free after serving the meals this was all on economy
absolutely no complaints leg room seemed greater than other airlinescommunications excellent check in prompt meals less boring

our first visit to japan and my chance to fly jal trying to catch the cherry blossom season we caught a night flight to osaka and onward by bus to kyoto this pm flight will transist at haneda with about hrs window to catch the domestic flight which will land at itami jal boost of generous leg room at economy which i found it true but the seats has rather thin cushions all round which made sleeping a bit uncomfortable i would suggest a travel pillow for more comfort light supper beer sake etc are all available to help you sleep better we land at the international terminal at haneda you will have to clear customs retrieve your luggage and check in at the domestic flight counter located in the international terminal then you go to the basement and catch the right bus to the domestic terminal there are types of bus service one goes to where ana uses and the other jal as you can see this process takes time and if your flight is delayed you will need to rush the domestic flight was smooth and i would like to praise the jal ground staff for arranging the next connecting flight for us as ive missed the scheduled flight because i forgot to adjust my watch for the hour time difference the return flight is from osaka kansai also transit haneda this sector is much better as our luggage were automatically transfer to the international flight as the flight from kansai also lands at the haneda domestic terminal you still have to take the bus to the international terminal duration of bus ride is about mins but sometimes due to aircraft movements the tower may halt all vehicles movements overall great flight good experience nice japanese politeness and food
a great flight seats with plenty of leg room good on board entertainment and food very good crew very attentive would recommend this airline
the service was ok apart from no english language at all for all the announcements which i didnt like also the landing was not the best
they have the best service i luv always japanese they are the best but the food was not good

i have been japan for traveling with family around days with a fantastic trip everything looks perfect from the trip begins until back to thailand with japan airlines flight jl th jan my family get some problem which is cabin crews responsibility to solve it but when i noticed to japanese cabin crews she cannot deal with this problem and ignore it i feel really badits not because of the problem but the service mind with japanese cabin crew done to me i have been flied with japan airlines for years but customer loyalty will be ended here thanks

flew japan airlines from san diego to tokyo and shanghai the service from checkin to landing was first rate the skysuite for the san diegotokyo legs are really roomy in economy class the seat was extra wide and there was plenty of leg room to spare the flight attendants were very attentive and polite even reminding the people in front of you to put the seats upright during meal service the tokyoshanghai legs used older models and the seats were noticeably more narrow with less leg room but the service was still on par with the other leg of the trip the only concerns i had were the cabin being a little warm and the seat pad wearing down after a couple hours in on a hour flight that can become a little uncomfortable other than that i enjoyed my flights and would highly recommend flying with jal

often take jal for domestic travel in japan they provide free wifi service during the flight and complimentary drink on the flight the soup is the best choice for the complimentary drinks jal never fails me for their service

super roomy on the dreamliner everything was fantastic and the a la carte dining was just great highly recommend their ramen which was just delightful the only knock and its a minor one the amenities kit was a bit substandard compared to what was offered on malaysia airlines probably the last time id ever fly business but i would have no hesitation flying jal in economy

have flown prenium economy with a number of airlines jal had so much leg room that i had trouble reaching the foot rest in front this was one of the new aircraft with the shell seats that slide forward when recline not back onto the person behind brilliant trip food good to eat staff pleasant and toilets very clean throught whole trip

with their mechanical trouble a flight got hour and mins delay and it was notified only hours prior to the departure not only that because of missing the connection they had to find a flight to sfo which was failed the ground staff had no idea and ended up helping her looking up on sky scanner no way to compensate any of the loss basically paid me yen to change my connection flight after the arrival to sfo and made up all the story after all also told me fk off so they are good at not delayed but once they do they have no idea what to do and no compensation then gets mean hopeless
great flight with a very attentive crew premium economy is certainly worth it sufficient legroom confortable seatsvery much on time great staff at checkin in narita and lounge access
my main concern on a long haul flight economy is will the seat be comfortable so pleased to report they were in flight entertainment good food good

my daughter and i had a very comfortable flight from tokyo in business class we went to the lounge before the flight i didnt eat anything as there was not a wide choice of food the food on the flight was very nice and the service was very good plenty of leg room and the seat was comfortable there were no problems with boarding and disembarking i would fly with jal again if the price was right

the service was greateverything was good except the inflight foodit didnt meet my expectationtastelessbut other than that i feel comfortable flying with jalthe wifi service also available in this aircraft skyliner
absolutely the best flight ive ever taken the alcohol was free flowing the seats are incredibly comfortable and the service was impeccable hoping jal starts flying to every destination on earth

when looking for a good plane trip comfort and service is key japan airlinejal is the best at doing both of this because of their new leg space improvement good service and their great comfort during flights when talking about jal your probably thinking about japan and the flights from my closest airport to japan takes around hours even though sitting down for hours with only little bathroom breaks may sound impossible jal makes it possible by adding more space to your seat and improving the material used for the seats also theyre rated number one in economy class seats on skytrax last of all their service is really good whenever i wanted a drink they would bring it to me without any hassle wherever you go on japan airlines you for sure want to fly it again

booked okinawa tokyo flight via opodoede seat allocation prior to check in wasnt available while checking in online no combined seat form my wife an i have been available any more very untypical for a none low cost airline at the baggage drop we had to wait for more than min though only limited opened baggage drop counters we asked again for seats next to each other but only middle seats in rows behind each others were available we took them but didnt get a new boarding pass on to security with another long waiting line while scanning our mobile boarding passes staff told us that these are not valid so we had to wait till a jal agent brought finally paper based boarding passes on the plane no announcement in english just japanese which we found odd not the service we expect from a japanese company

the airline was clean and on time which are both major plusses to me i flew premium economy which is definitely worth it if you can afford it there are only two seats next to the window the seats are large with plenty of leg room and there is a tiny divider between you and the person sitting next to you there are also tons of free movie choices food was hit or miss first flight it was delicious second flight not so much expect japanese style food if flying from japan a plus to me

recently travelled between heathrow and new chitose via tokyo and return using jal and were very pleased with the experience both the international and internal flights were on time comfortable premium economy economy and the service was both charming and efficient the homeward flight was at two in the morning from tokyo and we were surprised not to be given a light meal before settling for the twelve hour flight snacks were available on request but apart from that we found the floor flight to be very good and as this is a route we use often we will be using jal again the costs too compared very well with other airlines despite it being a popular holiday travel time

this is our first time flying direct from san diego to narita and back and there were no better way to do this than with a top notched airlines we have travelled with several world class asian airlines before and jal ranks amongst the best of the best air attendants were friendly and attentive and were prompt to ensure that all our needs were taken care of the flights were super comfortable in the awesome boeing dreamliner and there were sufficient leg room even in economy announcements were made in both japanese and english the touch screen entertainment systems were easy to operate and there were more than sufficient movies from fairly recent ones to oldies to keep all of us entertained the meals were very good and creative and out of the box for one of the meals jal had winners and finalists of the red u chef competition in japan create their in flight meals and they were really delicious and gourmet for another meal they had mos burger a famous japanese burger joint create a burger meal these were arguably the best airlines food i ever had jal will definitely be a top choice airline the next time we fly internationally

i have flown with jal to tokyo several times before so i knew what to expect and i am glad to say the standard of their great oeverall service has maintained there are several other options for this route but i didnt think twice before confirming my reservation service was pleasant and attentive and the meal served was just as good as before my only comment is that their inflight entertainment system though adequate could do with an upgrade with more varieties offered

for a hours flight it was better than expected there was complimentary food service twice with free drinks alcohol included which i didnt expect it was decent airline food i appreciated the variety of entertainment selections leg room was typical the cabin was warm and i didnt need my courtesy blanket at all bathroom lines were minimal with clear signage to indicate when available flight staff encouraged you to stay buckled up and in your seat but hours is a long time and my swollen ankles were not happy when we landed dont try to bring on more than the allowed number of items

the business suites on this flight provided enough comfort and some privacy for this longhaul the attendants were always available to help and after the amazing first meal you are able to order a complete menu of items for the remainder of the flight through the ife controller seats were comfortable and went to lieflat bed mode for an comfortable sleep complete with mattress top pillow and blanket entertainment system was filled with movies and music allinall this made the long flight much easier

from counter service to attentive onboard personnel baggage handling entertainment choices and comfort i would fly this airline next time i go to japan baggage allowance pounds max checked bags plus carryon pounds max plus one personal item purse backpack briefcase laptop

first time travelling on jal domestic flight from tokyo haneda to nagoya even though it was a short hour flight i could not believe that candies were served on the flight instead of drinks i would expect more from a full service airline

good flight was very impressed with the whole crew they were very courteous and responded to anyones requests immediately the aircraft was very clean inside the seat was fairly comfortable as much as can be expected on a nine hour flight with adequate leg room they gave us row which has no window so were quite disappointed by the seat selection given to us when assigned a month before the food was quite good the free wine was an unexpected bonus

i was impressed with the comfort of the flight the seats and restroom were spacious and there was plenty of legroom at one point the flight attendants provided toothbrushes with toothpaste in the restroom for anyone wanting to brush their teeth

all in all a very pleasant experience service was polite y professional out of the mealsnacks were good dessert almond butterpudding was the best was not impressed by the beef in wine sauce had a taste for gin was not charged for drinks took the edge off flying y allowed me to get about an hour nap on a hr flight this was truly a upscale experience service esp
it is a good trip on the flight food is really good and suit my taste during the flight i watched one beautiful anime called natsumes friends book via nihofuncom and my animelist perfect travelling

i was very happy during my journey to japan i have to say jal is one of the best airlines to flight around the world they provide you with the ideal supplies drinks foodetc a very comfortable environment you can see movies anime during flight everything was fine

ive been travelling across the world and i never had a problem andor we never had a problem about combining luggage trying to save space and our luggage is only at k for people in luggage we even travel from tokyo to hokkaido thru ana and didnt have problem even from manila to tokyo then didnt question us combining luggage in one bagluggage which we are supposed tohave k each we were very rush mins before the plane leaves and they even hold our pass to go thru beacause we have to pay first our flight and then i asked to show me if its in the policy caused back in manila and hokkaido we didnt have that typ of problem and guess what they gave us a japanese printed policy take note i cant read japanese sirmam and no specific words that we cant combine combining this happened in narita airport
the staff was outstanding nice attentive and very competent the food was very disappointing and the plane pretty old and not well kept i heard how highly ranked they were and was very underwhelmed

it was a very short flight from osaka to sapporo but was comfortable with good sized seats myself being lbs looked like a newer plane as it was very clean staff were very friendly from checkin and on the flight free drinks on the flight but no food they were very attentive and kind travelled with my daughter and they gave her a model plane no problems at all with checked luggage even though we checked in hockey equipment and sticks which are oversized nothing to complain about but it would be good to know that you need to download the jal app before takeoff if you want to use the inflight wifi and watch tv or use the internet

it was my first time traveling on japan airlines id always heard of asian carriers attention to customer service hospitality emphasis on detail all of the aforementioned were not only met but exceeded on my first flight aboard jal the boeing dreamliner was immaculate and constantly serviced by the flight attendants throughout the hour journey from tokyo to jakarta the meals were all excellent with options for both japanese and western menus i opted for the japanese menu and was delighted with the options presented so masterfully the opportunity to sleep was afforded with the lie flat herringbone seat of the hours i slept for nearly hours very comfortably the crew was outstanding from boarding to deplaning in jakarta would fly jal again anytime and anywhere they fly

business class seats are terribly uncomfortable a nightmare tried every angle with different points of contacts sleep position was the worst ended hours of fighting for comfort with horrible headache and pain through entire body wasnt the only traveler complaining other than the seats food was good and cabin service was very efficient

top quality all the way the cubicles are welldesigned the seats easily adjust to any desired level down to lieflat you can get in and out without crawling over anybody there is room for ones belongings the individual tv screens are large the food is excellent on the leg from tokyo to hanoi they even served me a steak exactly the way i like it the amenities include a sleep jacket quite soft and comfortable and slippers as well as the usual items and of course a face mask the many flight attendants on jal are so attentive to our every need

love the seating in economy the wife sat next to me was a very good flight on time running at both ends i request wheel chair was provided no problems the only minus was the food very japanese not my taste but others loved it i was cared for very well by crew

the new business class cain is excellent with each person having their own mini suite so you dont bother or step over anyone when you need to get out of your seat for any reason their on demand dining works extremely well too

booked the tickets for the flight about days in advance to get around off the average roundtrip ticket economy for a direct flight from nyc to tokyo there was a freak snow storm the day of our departure and as soon as i found out the flight was canceled i called jal customer service they were extremely helpful and put me on standby for the next available flight from a different airport since the original flight was not to be rescheduled for a few days later they even managed to get two seats next to each other so amidst the disastrous conditions of having a multiday snow storm almost end my entire trip jal saved the day the flight was delightful which is saying a lot since it was hours lots of movies to choose from attentive flight attendants and comfortable seating i will be booking my next trip to japan with them

i was in business class to help accommodate a back injury business class seats on this plane lie completely flat and have a nice area to stash items unless you have the window seat you do not have much privacy the sky suite design has the side of the seat wide open to the aisle i think the center might be preferable to aisle because there is a separate entry area and you have partition walls between seats the food on this flight was horrible the plane seemed very dated and it felt like the air was not able to circulate i was in th row and the smell of the bathroom was evident throughout the entire flight further back seemed better on that front in flight entertainment was a very dated system with few offerings the screens in business are quite large but that meant you were more subject to light from movies watched in other seats despite the partition walls

the service was outstanding very attentive crew i purchased business class ticket for lie down seat as i have a back injury the plane was a newer model but the business class seats do not lie flat as described by ticket agent they come close but still have an incline the food was pretty good it leaned toward japanese menu but there were still a few western items on it not much offering in the media area a few movies and strange collection of one or two episodes of tv

again a aircraft second time this seemed to be a newer aircraft one could tell buy the carpit wear seats were comfortable and leg room was adequate the service was excellent on this flight all the way from crew and ground personnel food on the aircraft was hot and tasty with the exception for breakfest meal only one choice was not goos at all allinall this was a good flight

this is my first time flying on a i booked the flight through american airlines account so this was a code share flight the flight was goodand the service was excellent in every way this was not a new aircraft and the flooring was well used but the aircraft seemed to be well maintained the food was good with three selection available and it tasted good too seating was ok if your are under feet but gets cramped if your over feet

no problems with the jal service as expected vert polite service food was good and plentiful flight on time and all else went well bit more expensive than some but would recommend if this is your only trip to japan

departure was after midnight and the journey was so smooth the seats so comfortable that i slept for much of the trip the great thing about the premium economy seat apart from its generous width is the fixed back of the seat which does not encroach on the space of the passenger seated behind even when fully reclined my flight attendant did not wake me up for the meal service and only served me breakfast when i requested it at the end of the service how very kind and considerate the meal was light and tasted ok the only downside was the airline lounge at osaka airportitami which was extremely crowded passengers had to go down one level and then up another to access the buffet spread like several other travelers we did not take the trouble to do so

i flew on a flight from tokyo to seoul and was treated so kindly by the crew when they served the meal they provided me with a translation of what i was about to eat on a preprinted piece of paper i thought that was so thoughtful obviously safety is number one when flying but on board service always makes the experience so much better jal is an outstanding airline in my opinion looking forward to another flight in the near future with them

flight departed on time at pm boarding was orderly and there was a sign to indicate jals boarding priority jal one world elite members board first followed by business class passengers who dont belong to the first group there is no first class service on this flight there is no pretake off beverage service when fas were released from their seats they came by to take meal and beverage orders there is a printed menu laid out on the table during boarding choice of japanese or western meal i chose the japanese meal since the flight was out of japan the seats arranged in a herringbone placement are comfortable however they are not that wide window seats have a little extra space on the triangular tabletop by the window there is not very much storage space for your belongings magazines and instruction cards are placed in very thin pocket on the wall below the tabletop cant put anything thicker than magazines in it items placed on the tabletop are not secured and will slide around during turbulence there is a tiny locker in the wall above the tabletop at shoulder level its triangular space is not very usable and is adequate to store the headsets provided they are over the ear headsets though not noise cancelling i didnt use them amenity kit had eye shields socks and toothbrush of disposable quality had to put my belongings in the foot well to ensure they didnt slide around there is an extendable arm rest on the aisle side it must be retracted stowed during taxi takeoff and landing when extended there is a small storage box below not much use due to triangular shape and unusable when arm rest is required to be stowed movie selection was quite good and includes japanese selections new release movies were adequate though not as extensive as other airlines i was tired and watched only one movie japanese meal was adequate disappointing for something coming from tokyo the starters were served in a flimsy bento box numerous one to two bite items that were tasty main course was served after the bento box was cleared it was disappointing rice served with stir fried beef which was of meager portions and not particularly flavorful dessert was served after table was cleared it was nothing memorable i remember much better meals served before the airline went through reorganization lie flat seat was quite comfortable you have to adjust the lumbar support to make it totally flat otherwise you will feel the bumps despite that i could feel the joints in the seat cushions it needs a bed pad to cover up the joints had to adjust my sleeping position so that my hips would not come in contact with the joints as they were a source of discomfort the blanket was quite thick and i perhaps should have used it as a bed pad fas were attentive when you press the call button surprisingly they did not hand out bottled water at the beginning of the flight i had to ask for it it was supplied on my outbound flight snacks were available on request choice of ramen soba or udon instant noodles nothing terribly exiting and i didnt need it slept the rest of the flight ice cream served as prearrival snack overall the flight and service was good not outstanding

it was my first flight with a full fledged airline and i was not disappointed the staff spoke english and seemed to take the time to note which passengers preferred speaking english or japanese i sat next to a japanese lady on my return flight and the attendant switched languages when asking which meal i preferred i found it very impressive the meals were good they made sure to have options one more asian and one more western however the sides always included something japanese i thought it was a great touch sample some lesser known japanese treats while on board they handed out some rice cracker snacks and ice cream the drinks available included some jal exclusive wine which tasted good had a chance to taste both because my bf ordered red and i had white the seats were comfortable they provided a small pillow and blanket very much appreciated it had a wire in the head rest that could be used to stop your head from rolling too far i liked that a lot not sure if thats a standard feature for all full airlines entertainment was good the movies werent too old and being able to see some japanese movies was cool

we recently flew from dallas tx to tokyo japan on a flight with jal the flight one way was approx hours we were in the economy class and were concerned we should have upgraded our seats due to the length of the flight to our pleasant surprise our seats were very comfortable able to lean back as well as having a monitor installed in the headrest in front of you stocked with numerous movies tv shows and games to keep you entertained during the flight you were also provided a neck pillow as well as a blanket both items were sealed and located in your seat upon arrival the seats themselves were spacious to be economy and there was plenty of leg room also the overhead bins were spacious and held our carryon sized backpacks easily the flight attendants were very nice and accommodating due to the length of the flight numerous meals snacks and drinks were provided you were given a choice on entree or main dish of some of the meals the food was surprisingly good the food was served accordingly heated dishes remained hot and chilled dishes remained cold upon being served you were also given silverware with each meal the attendants returned promptly to remove items upon completion also the one thing i forgot to pack was my headphones to my surprise the flight attendants came around at the beginning of the flight and asked everyone if they needed a set of earbuds while these were not expensive earbuds they worked perfectly and were conveniently free of charge i have no complaints of our flight to or from japan and would highly recommend jal to anyone
