the seat were comfortable but did not have any individual entertainment for a the laggage was a little slower that ana but it was still fast

compare to sia and qatar jal seats are tighter compared to both amenities are not great compared to qatar service is average compared to both food is average compared with sia transits was rushed n did not enjoy the lounges lots of room for improvement

jal is second to none when it comes to customer oriented service they make it priority to make sure customers are comfortable and have a good flight experience the planes are well kept clean and the attendants do their best to keep it that way throughout the flight one of the top airlines available and still doing their best to make it better

our family of four had taken jal business class from singapore to haneda airport i was always told jal is one of the best unfortunately quite disappointed by the food and space on the business class they also dont have preflight drink the chair cant lift the individual leg rest and must turn into a bed to raise the leg rest

we are expats living in manila and took a family trip to tokyo with our yo daughter the plane was brand new and the crew was so helping and welcoming to our surprise we had to preorder our daughters child meal in advance this is kind of weird as their policy is to even offer toddlers a regular meal unless they are asked differently as if a toddler would eat a regular meal in any case as i had ordered a special meal for me and my husband this option was not an option online i checked more than times with no luck thank god i had some snacks with me but our daughter was really disappointed she did not get the kids cutlery etc

we flew jal for our quick trip to nagasaki because of their flight schedules and affordable airfares to nagasaki their service was very pleasant during the short two hour flight their attendants were all smiles and helpful during the whole flight

food on the plane was quite bad some kind of pizza with tomato sauce and that was the only option available because the food was so awful i asked for cup noodles and i was told that they only offer cup noodles to premium economh customers cup noodles are not even expensive the worse thing was jal served the same food on the flight back definitely a bad experience and will avoid jal economh flight

one of the best airlines ive tried from the moment i stepped into the aircraft i instantly felt its worldclass aura their service is on point from the ground staff assistants and of course flight attendants they were all professional and kind i bought my tickets maybe months or less before my trip to japan i chose economy but it felt like business class what more if i opted for business class the entertainment available during the flight will surely keep you entertained the whole flight their movie selection had recent movies i watched the greatest showman tomb raider a star is born and bohemian rhapsody they also had movies from other countries and japan of course music and other sorts of entertainment was available but wasnt able to really explore them since i was busy watching and eating yes eating the food in jal was really good it was delicious overall jal for me is one of the best decisions i ever made i have already recommended jal to my family and friends and for sure i will fly with jal on my next japan trip

this was our first transpacific flight and weve had some less than ideal long haul flights in the past for this trip we decided to splurge and go with jals premium economy the flight actually exceeded expectations the obvious extra room was much appreciated im but the other enhancements such as lounge access expedited baggage handling and enhanced menu offerings also added to the overall experience the jal team both on the ground and cabin crew were top notch professional and friendly i was sort of dreading the hour flight but my fears were quickly dissipated well definitely return to japan and jal will be the first airline we consider
great to stay a week and take advantage of the jr tickets relaxing trip to yunomine onsen wonderful foodie stay in tokyo

we had an issue where we were trying to bring a lithium ion battery item that was safe for travel through but japans version of tsa said it was unsafe we tried to argue and proved that it was safe off their own website no less but to no avail that isnt the issue here thoughwhen we asked how we could mail it home the japan airlines staff had no clue when we asked what we are supposed to do they shrugged at us and said sorry no idea they are just the airline while we tried to google to figure it out the staff then cracked jokes at us and called us stupid argumentative americans so there was that will not recommend japan airlines or fly them american or any sister airline ever again whole experience was awful and it didnt help that while we were giving up an expensive item that mind you is on the approved list on jals website we got to be made fun of too dont assume we dont know the language

my first time traveling outside of the country with my wife for our honeymoon i was a little nervous but the kindness of the flight crew the comfort of the plane the amazing inflight meal all of it made the long hour flight fly by pun intended there were plenty of recently released movies available to help pass the time i watched on the flight there we intend to go back to japan as soon as possible and we will most definitely be flying japan airlines again

overall it was a good flight as far as boarding and timing went and general quietness in the cabin i found the seat harder than expected and even maximum adjustment wasnt comfortable so hardly slept i would not consider a flight to europe at this class food was extremely poor snack for overnight after we boarded at around midnight was packet of smiths crisps timtam biscuit small pastry and bottle of water pretty awful offering for a premium economy meal hot breakfast was not at all appetising more like lunch or dinner cant say im looking forward to the return trip

i appreciated the touch and go service which negated the need to print any documentation the flight was comfortable and i was surprised there was drink service for such a short flight the seats were comfortable hostesses hospitable and the flight was smooth it felt as if by the time i blinked i was already at haneda the first flight from kix means that you can arrive in tokyo in time for breakfast would definitely use jal again

jals service was excellent from san diego airport to inflight service and on to the arrival airport a couple of small issues we were not allowed to purchase tickets for jals lounge and could not upgrade at the airport but we got what we paid for an on time flight with good food and entertainment

back forth to japan once a month jal is my all time favorite to travel next time ill try the business class leg room is spacious even in economy im cm and feel so good flying with economy class of japan airlines
excellent service food and inflight entertainment the flight attends were friendly and courteous throughout no complaints

we did not know what to expect but the economy plus allowed us to fly together with the two seat row instead of the there or four seat row in economy the flight attendants were pleasant and thoughtful and efficient food on airline has improved and is a plus for customersthey did not supply bose headphone fortunately i we had our own charging plugs are available as well as a good selection of entertainment

seat was comfortable and good to rest which was quite important for me who was so tired service was good as usual about mealwe can not expect much from inflight meals it is always better to bring your own foods i do not like the too polite announcement i hope crew or captain do not disturb us who are enjoying the inflight entertainment

ticket is not the cheapest but theres no changes at all first they said no seat but when i tried for a new booking theres some seat then they ended up said my ticket can not be changed at all its the rules ans regulation that they dont show previously not reccomended at all

this was my second rount trip flight with japan airlines from san diego to asia flying in and out san diego instead of lax or sfo is convinient no la traffic and less time processing thru customs and immigration though the airline fare is mnore expensive thanfluing in and out of lax the checking counterstaff in san diego and manila were so accomodating thje flight itself left on time our flight attendants were friendly and attentive food selection is okey i wish there more westernise choice public announcements were little bit long because they were announced in japanese and english wish they annouce it in english first the plane was clean on all flighs the legrooms between tokyo and san diego were little cramped compared to tokyo and manila flights overall great service on time flights and short layover between connecting flights

a great airline with plenty of leg room my husband and i flew from haneda airport injapan to dubai on an hour flight and it was a comfortable flight plenty of onboard entertainment food good and friendly and helpful air crew

right from the staff at check in at tokyo airport we had an excellent experience on japan airlines the staff in the flight were always going up and down the isles serving water and juice frequently the food and snacks were very good and the beverage service was also very good we also enjoyed the inflight entertainment and the selection was very good this was the first time in many years that i can recollect the seats were very comfortable and the leg space for a tall person like myself was more than adequate even in economy class i would strongly recommend that if you have the opportunity to use this airlines then you will not regret
food not only looks good but tastes good too great service for economy class comparable to business class comfortable clean and wellmaintained punctual great quality at a reasonable cost

we recently made our third return flight from melbourne to tokyo using jal in the last months this experiance was as good as the last with excellent service on time departure and arrival spotless and modern aircraft and very enjoyable vegetarian meals the economy seats are comfortable and the leg room is much better than most other carriers the flights are as enjoyable as any hour flight could be

check in at frankfurt was nice and easy checked out the sakura lounge which is well stocked with snacks drinks and everything else youd expect from an airline lounge the lounge is however very small and is also used by almost every other oneworld alliance member so finding a seat was challenging staff were excellent though boarding was smooth the seats are pretty nice with everyone in business class getting aisle access the footrest area is wider than some other business class products but i noticed that in lieflat mode it was a tight fit and im only a shade under a small glass of champagne was served in a plastic glass it really was two gulps worth and was a little bit underwhelming a hot towel was given and then takeoff procedures started once in the air the staff came to take drink and dinner orders the menu was in japanese german and english the fas english wasnt great and she kept trying to refer me to the german menu despite me wanting to turn the page to the english menu at the back we went back and forth on this for a while until she realized that she had made a mistake and that the english menu page was not the prelanding menu i ordered a german chardonnay which was very nice and the western meal like ana jal have a japanese or western option im not a huge fan of simple binary options like this because they do tend to bevery simple not being a fan of japanese cuisine i had to choose the western option which like the japanese option was very seafood heavy which is something i struggle to eat the first two courses were a shrimp and corn potage amuse bouch√©e followed by a raw salmon and quail egg entree i can handle shrimp but the singular shrimp was a bit dry the corn potage just wasnt my thing since i cant stand salmon in any form or quail eggs for that matter i asked the flight attendant if i could skip that course after explaining that i couldnt eat that she agreed i guess it wouldve been nice to have been offered anything as an alternative but there were some nice german breads served so it wasnt too bad a few minutes later my entree of salmon and quail eggs was delivered to me anyway later the flight attendant remembered that i didnt want this and cleared my table and delivered the main course veal straight away the veal fillet was very nice again quite small with only a token slice of red and yellow pepper the desert was a small slice of chocolate and raspberry cake again very small but very nice all in all dinner tasted very nice but i felt like i hadnt eaten much at all i was pretty tired and just went to sleep soon after staff lay out a mattress for sleeping and it was pretty comfy i got about and a half hours light sleep the on demand service meant that the cabin was quite busy and noisy all night though so i was waking up quite a bit throughout the night breakfast was scheduled shortly after i woke up and again it was a japanese or western option the western option this time was an omelette and sausage with a crossaint jam and some yogurt the omelette and sausage was pretty bland and again quite small the single croissant and jam were nothing to write home about and the yogurt was a tiny cup with two desert spoons full of plain yogurt with a little bit of fruit syrup for taste nothing special at all and i can honestly say ive had better economy class breakfasts than this all in all a pleasant experience that neither disappointed nor stood out i thought the food was okay but the servings were very small i think the lack of choice that japanese carriers offer is a big sticking point for me japanese carriers are very one size fits all in their approach to dining if you dont like japanese food then you only have one other option and if you dont like whats offered in that youre out of luck my time living in japan has taught me that japanese customers tend to enjoy fancy branding and products the menu was proudly advertised as being designed by award winning japanese chefs and this is a great selling point for the average japanese customer on the other hand nonjapanese tend to be not so concerned with branding and image for me i like options and neither jal or ana are very good in that respect staff were pleasant but were just there again its what ive come to expect in japan they were very good at their prescribed job and only performed the minimal level of service but were a bit cold and impersonal there were no personal greetings or farewells and they didnt call you by name i find its little touches like this that really make a business class experience for me my business class flight on thai a few months back was good for this staff knew your name and came to check on you regularly even air new zealands premium economy had a far more personal level of service than jals business class jal lacked that little something extra here inflight entertainment was pretty good overall and the large screen was very nice controls were a little slow but nothing unusual id give jal a out of ten on this flight a good base level product but it did feel like bare bones service
japan airlines is first class all the way the flight attendants were professional and respectful the meals served were excellent quality and the video and audio entertainment was top notch

my first trip to asia can only compare to flying to europe it was truly a dreamliner it was a quiet smooth flight very impressive first rate movies for a hour nonstop trip watched coming home service was fine would take a again if i had a choice i wanted to pick my seats ahead of time but because i bought on hopper the airlines refused though we needed to sit in the middle section it is only seats across and there was an empty seat beside me
first time flying with jal service was excellent and food was nice easy check in service definitely recommend them

seat is great and inflight screen good but the food very poor quality luke warm not great staff are of course really great check in was good but even with gold card no fast track through security at haneda

i had an early morning flight on jal from singapore to narita i arrived at changi airport terminal around am for my am flight the terminal operates a premier check in lounge for business classfirst class passengers for multiple airlines located behind row instead of the jal regular check in at row i had a connecting flight at narita on jal on a separate booking but after a phone call to check with jal staff at the premier check in lounge were able to confirm they can check me in for both flights there were probably or check in stations in the premier check in lounge of which only about were in use so there was no wait to check in but i found check in staff was a little slow in checking me in probably because they check in for multiple airlines rather than being dedicated staff for jal as i am used to for jal flights the lounge leads directly into passport control security check is at the gate and i was quickly into the dnata terminal lounge which jal uses at singapore jal does not have its own lounge and so uses the third party dnata lounge which also serves a number of other airlines the lounge had lots of seating and a fairly wide selection of hot and cold food for breakfast including chinese shrimp dumplings and bbq pork buns fried vermicelli noodle sausages and egg three kinds of sandwiches etc i tried the bbq pork bun and the vermicelli noodle and both were a bit hard and dried out probably having sat out too long on a brighter note though the lounge had a barista making specialty coffees to order and it was pretty good wifi was inconsistent in the lounge i kept losing the signal and often found it easier to connect to the internet on the changi airport free wifi rather than on the dnata lounge wifi i went to the gate a bit early as security check was conducted at the gate but there was not much of a line up and security check was quick there was a slight delay to boarding at am instead of the scheduled am due to aircraft cabin preparation and pushback was also a bit late at am instead of the scheduled am but we made up the time in flight and landed at pm ahead of scheduled arrival at pm perhaps because of the slightly early arrival i was slightly disappointed to discover that on arrival we had a remote stand and had to walk down the stairs to buses to take us to the terminal i was connecting to another jal flight and had lots of time to connect so the slight additional delay on arrival was not a concern for me the flight was operated using a b aircraft fitted out with the sky suite iii fully flatbed seat in business class each seat had direct aisle access in a configuration i found the seat to be quite comfortable but rather inflexible in operation table lifted up and angled toward you but difficult to use except in fully upright seat position seat recline button covers entire recline function with no separate button for top of seat and leg rest so one could not for example raise the legrest in an upright seat position in flight meal was excellent as usual i selected the japanese meal as they always seem more substantial and more interesting than the western meal options service is as always courteous and excellent and the washrooms were maintained in a very good condition by constant cleaning by the flight attendants all in all a very pleasant flight

narita airport has got to be one of the busiest airports around great food lounges and shops but jal sakura lounge has got to be the best ever the food customer service accommodations and the smiles are amazing all attendants provided the special care personal service so very thankful for the experience

checking in to take off everything was exceptional impeccable friendly service from the checkin attendant to the flight attendants nothing but smiles and great personal service their conversations and smiles made me feel comfortable relaxed and special this had to be one of the best flights ever for me thank you jal

the cabin crew is always impeccably neat and very courteous as the legendary japanese culture is known for the food has improved and better the aircraft is very clean the pilot knew how to land smoothly overall jal makes you feel important as a human being and not as a revenue cash cow

flew over the arctic they have it down they dim the cabin so you slept earlier and adjust to the time zone with the least amount of stress food was great service impeccable i will always take this flight to narita going forward

flying out of haneda to singapore i arrive quite early around am for my am flight using first class check in and priority security line i was quickly into the jal first class lounge at haneda at around am the lounge was very busy and almost all the tables and seats in the dining area were occupied but most had cleared out by around am food offerings for breakfast were fairly standard sausages eggs hash brown grilled mackerel two soups lobster soup potato an scallop soup there was a chef making pancakes with strawberry or caramel sauce to order set up decor and food offerings were pretty much the same as the first class lounge in narita however one area where haneda clearly has the lead is in the washrooms in the mens toilet twice as many toilet stalls as narita first class lounge for a similar sized lounge the flight to singapore was operated using a b equipped with jals top level sky suite iii fully flatbed seats with direct aisle access from each seat in a configuration the seat is quite comfortable and has a small side locker to store the headsets and other small items the table is a bit awkward as you pull it up and swing it towards you but there is not a lot of flexibility in how to position it similarly the seat simply reclines back down to a bed or straightens back up to an upright seat and there is no option to individually control the seat back and the leg support portion of the seat ie you cannot raise the leg support without reclining also once the seat is partially reclined it is very difficult to get out of the seat so you have to raise the seat back almost to fully upright position before you can easily get up and go out similarly the table does not work well if the seat is reclined so you pretty much have to have the seat fully upright to use the table for eating there is a fixed armrest on one side of the seat that does not move so when you recline to a fully flat bed you actually have to fit your arm under the fixed armrest in the space between it and the seatbed because of this i found the seat a bit narrow when in a bed configuration but there was plenty of length shortly after take off we were served drinks and lunch as usual food offerings on jal are delicious and visually appealing having had many japanese meals on jal recently and seeing an interesting western offering i opted for the western meal with wagyu beef sirloin steak with foie gras sauce with a bit of oxtail on the side the beef was very tender and the oxtail wonderfully stewed and flavourful the starter was interesting too moroccan style abalone salad prior to landing chinese rice dumplings were offered this is literally a ball of rice wrapped in leaves and steamed so not much of a snack therefore i opted to also have one of the instant noodles with udon soba or shrimp flavoured noodle on offer service as always on jal was courteous and excellent no airlines flight attendants are as meticulous about cleaning out its toilets as frequently our flight arrived a bit early but as it was still around pmlate afternoon passport control on arrivals was very busy the lineups for passport control basically occupied the whole of the arrivals lobby and backed up almost to the escalators leading down to the arrivals lobby it took about minutes to get through passport control and by the time i arrived at my hotel on orchard road by taxi it was about hours after landing the jal flight to singapore was very comfortable with excellent food and service

i traveled to nyc from sydney in business class and it was a wonderful experience their planes have aisle access from window seats so if you fly solo you can enjoy and view outside without bothering anyone when you want to get up the seem to serve a full meal shortly after takeoff and everything after that is on demand using a touch screen to order food and drinks solves any potential language barriers and i found the service to be extremely fast polite and professional my fellow travelers were also very quiet and courteous which i very much enjoyed food was amazing i stuck with the japanese options and was in heaven

the best thing was the crew the food service might be slow but come with friendly and attentive service great portion and variety of food inflight the boeing was new and the ife run smoothly and offering great price for wifi service

they would not serve single female travelers in business with drinks i rang the button twice and finally walked up to the galley where they ignored me until i tried to pour my own drink they yelled at me in japanese the lie flat bed does lie flat but it is narrow and very hard they were late for some reason and some safety announcements were not in english although over half the flight was americans or brits boarding was chaotic at best and food was not edible

jal is a cheap very big airline in japan it has a seat capacity of more than passengers jal has wifi connectivity inside the aeroplane you can use the wifi connectivity for multi media uses they have class system in all airlines of japan ie upper class membership card vip membership card platinum membership class etc for local citizens those who are frequent flyers the meals are also very good that is served on jal there is also the facility of hindu meal in jal and there many movies one can watch including hindi movies and also cartoons for children and animated movies for them inside the airline there is also one guide tour of japans sight seeing channel and it is a must watch channel for those who are visting japan for the first time which it is a well known airline in japan i would give a star rating for jal

be careful how you book if you are traveling with a friend if you book through any site other than their own you will not be able to choose a seat it will be assigned on check in if the plane is anywhere near full you will be guaranteed to be separated and each will have a middle seat somewhere on the plane research before you book

not the airlines fault but the flight began with the passenger next to me having an emotional breakdown and screaming just after take off thankfully the flight crew did a great job calming her down and she was fairly docile rest of flight the flight was good overall business class has fold down flat seats and large personal tv monitors you get a complimentary overnight bag a pillow blanket and can also add a foam cushion to sleep on thought the food was just ok tried japanese option on way to japan and western option on way back the sea bass on japanese option and steak on western option were the best items just felt overall that the service was not as prompt as it is on american run flights like delta and american all in all was a comfortable flight

as the title suggests worst customer service experience my partner and i are travelling to japan for our honeymoon and have been told we cannot sit together we are on our honeymoon and i am pregnant was told by the airline that the seats are blocked out and not yet allocated but still they cant make arrangements nobody replys to my emails and when you sit on hold for over an hour youre lucky to get to speak to someone when you do the customer service rep offers no service what so ever we havent even flown yet and still the customer service is terrible will never book with jal again

this is the first time i go to japan and fly with japan airlines two thumbs up for the pilot because of the plane fly very smooth especially when landing the crews are very very polite and helpful even for passengers in economy class the service makes me feel very comfortable enjoy the meal and beverage very much youll never feel hungry in this flight next time i come to japan ill fly with japan airlines
for long flights i always fly first class or business class the extra cost involved is well worth the comfort of the flight

not at all like a usa domestic carrier this airline actually cares and takes pride in their service they smile they pamper you and do the upgrade to premium economy for a hour flight food was outstanding for real usa carrier crew face would crack if they tried to smile

flew san to sin via nrt on jl a nd jl on nov although jl is the older shell flat seats i did find it to be very comfortable and the jal service was absolutely perfect although flight departed almost an hour later the team went to each individual guests and apologize for the delay and assured the flight will be on time the flight landed on time the in flight meals were fantastic and the crew including jean seki and takao were very hospitable

certainly going from nyc to hanoi via tokyo is a long trip so be prepared however an airline can make or break the experience we left jfk on time and arrived to narita international airport about early excellent service especially from reith one of the many flight attendants who took excellent care of us premium economy is worth the extra money but realistically after hrs few things are still comfortable our flight from narita to hanoi was also excellent lounge service at jfk alitalias for some reason while dated think s was clean and offered snacks and drinks the lounge in tokyo sakura was fantastic and very efficient offered buffetstyle meals snacks and drinks great experience

it is rewarding when things just work the way they are meant to work and thats how i felt about my flight it was delightful in all aspects seats food service everything just worked well without any any issues or complaints top class itll be my new fav airline from now on

compared to economy class of other flights ie british airways our return flight the leg room was more than sufficient the food quality was great on board no difficulty with check in we were within the weight limit on board wifi was utilised though this was rather slow in flight entertainment was ok with a selection of recent movies the customer service was pleasant overall flight seemed to be pleasant and comfortable

recently flew with jal from tokyo to vancouver in business class this was an overnight flight the check in was very easy and all staff members were friendly and helpful language was not an issue the sakura lounge located about mins walk from the gate was large and had a selection of food and drinks available the lounge was clean and tidy and a good place to rest before the flight onboard the staff were very friendly and helpful and i quickly settled in i was surprised that business class is using an old side by side seat layout it is good if you are wanting to conduct business or as a couple but if you are sleeping you had to climb over the person next to you to go to the bathroom the seats turned into a bed although it wasnt a flat bed and you slept on an angle i found this annoying as there are other competitors who offer lie flat beds in their business class this was an overnight flight and i was looking forward to a good rest the food and drinks selection offered both japanese and alternate selections both meals were delicious there was a snack bar near the rear of the section where passengers could choose what they wanted there was also minimeals that the attendants could prepare for if required the entertainment was good with a selection of movies both new releases and old favourites the inflight progress maps were limited and i was surprised that there wasnt an external camera to view the takeoff or landing maybe this model of b didnt have such cameras overall the flight was smooth and the staff very helpful friendly and welcoming

booked a codeshare garuda flight operated by jal because it was the lowest and our corporate booking tool only books the lowest fare so of course since the flight is actually operated by jal garuda airlines is basically useless after taking the money so after i had to check in online at the jal website with my eticket number since the garuda booking reference connects to nothing i conclude my business in jakarta and head to the airport to do some work in the lounge before my flight since it was a codeshare flight i was not able to get a boarding pass online well apparently jal cannot be bothered with having a person or a kiosk to print a simple boarding pass after i finally walked to various counters and kiosks i called jal customer service and was informed there are no kiosk for jal at cgk and a person would not be there until hours before the flights departure time so here i sit for the next hours on the checkin side of the airport where its hot humid and theres no where to even plug in not to mention im here with hundreds of people trying share limited seating at least i had some time to type out this review shame on you jal how hard would it be for kiosk to print a lousy boarding pass

hours flying time seat placement for flat bed seats is not really in ideal angle it is a bit uncomfortable but service and on time departure and arrival is great and a reason to fly from tokyo to honolulu is cathay pacific or thai air do not fly to honolulu hawaii us territory
such wonderful service i will never fly another airline when i have an option for jal they have me for life

i flew jal in feb from lax to manila rt i am impressed by their courteousness i travelled with elderly mother and they were very accommodating and respectful with everyone especially the elderly in flight entertainment with movies and music food was good i would highly recommend them

its just a very short transit flight however the counter staff seem have no information regards international flight and domestic flight trying to push us to pay for over weight luggage i have explained to her we just came from hk an international flight and we are not overweight of our luggage as we have kg allowance not kg she kept on asking for ticket and not accepting my eticket nowadays who will have paper ticket with them and not eticket how could i give her a paper form even i dont use any paper ticket in last ten years anyway i guess as all the good experienced travel to japan and with japanese people i think just a disappointment that someone sit in the counter service will have that attitude in the flight is fine nice smooth trip staff are nice and professional too

i havent flown the arabian airlines that advertise how awesome they are all the time but this airline that doesnt advertise everywhere is awesome the difference between them and airlines in the us is staggering the attendants care the food is good we flew in premium economy which is a touch better than economy but my son and i walked through the back part on a few laps and it looked comfortable but the best ever was the service my gosh they actually cared so different from the us i will fly these guys whenever i go to asia in the future

we fly quite regularly to australia and now choose to fly via japan it is a fascinating country and we spend three or four days intokyo or kyoto to break up the journey it also really helps to avoid jet lag flying jal has been a real bonus they are considerably cheaper than ba and qantas but service and comfort are superior service from cabin crew is exquisite and charming and the food is exceptional i sleep much better on jal than other airlines and i wonder whether they circulate air more generously so far they have always arrived on time my only minor quibble is that their films are not quite so good but i rarely watch in any case

it was very fairly a premium economy experience the seat was as comfortable as one could get without actually laying down the amenities were just fine the food thoughvery typical of the japanese to have delicious food even on their airplanes it was so good flights left on time and there were no hiccupsuntil i got to hanoi and my bag didnt arrive with me fortunately jal is part of an airline group that easily tracks bags within their network my bag was delivered to my hotel promptly the next evening even with that i give them five stars

the boeing st class is very spacious privacy is very good when the screen is up not a problem for window seatsif you like japanese food than you have good choices the attendant even make bed for you if you need to sleepthe entertainment system should be good though i didnt try it

check in was quick and well organized they have a wonderful system to get the largest crowd quickly checked in the line was long but keep steadily moving so there wasnt a concern about missing your flight i love that they allow you to check one to two bags for free depending on your destination my new preferred airline for travelling asia
outstanding service and quality standards the staff courteous smiling and efficient the seats are spacious
the politeness friendliness and kindness of the cabin crew is commendable excellent service food is also really good nothing to complain

this review is about booking on their website not the flight i learned the hard way after booking on their website to save a few dollars less than expedia ive decided to book on their website and made a mistake of typing my last name as my first and first as my last name this mistake cost me an extra for reissuance of ticket even though i paid for the ticket on the same website jal their system did not intuitively see that im the same person with same address im just used to better ai employed by most us companies just book on known travel websites we have better protection and complaints are heard without slapping penalty for mundane incidents

we bought jal air tickets to and fro trip for our family trip this time they do provide child meal looks appetising but not tasty at all their speciality drink kiwi drink was well received at least by my family unlike sq flights they do not have earphones which are catered to children just one standard adult size also on my returning flight i have asked my husband who was seated at the aisle seat to inform the air stewardess that not to open the small bottle of red wine first as i want to have it later after my dinner it was ignored and that air stewardess still give us an unhappy look in comparison the flight from singapore to japan was more pleasant and approachable even though not all the flight attendants spoke good fluent english the return flight attendants were more fluent in english if asked me to choose if my budget allows i will take sq flights or try out ana for future japan trips or better still try out premium economy or business or first class of jal and compare if there is any difference in the treatment by the staff

there is nothing to complaint about their on board services attendance are professional caring polite and patient in handling passenger need it was a great experience flying with jal the only thing i would suggest them to improve in providing halal food for muslim personally i did write a remarks during purchase the flight ticket and i guess it was not put enough attention to the crew and the team who preparing it they did serve nonhalal to us which we have to asked and there is no replacement to it except salad overall its a good experience flying with jal

it was my second trip to asia and first time to use premium economy seat from checkin premium economy was separate from other class and checkin procedure was quick without waiting in flight there are many goods such as mask and slippers small pillow and blanket quality of inflight item is closer to that of business class although foods and beverages are almost the same from economy class overall satisfaction was good if there is another chance i would choice preimum economy
service from start to finish great food more leg space than american airlines upgraded seats boarding and take off from osaka was so fast i didnt even realize that the doors were closed

the japan airline is good the seats are bigger room for leg space and the food is wide range except my boyfriend who was flying from boston with japan airline to singapore feedback that the meals are limited and not multiple with snacks on the long flight basically i flew back from haneda to singapore the flight was good as the friendly ground staff was very understanding and provide me with a seat after the premier range of passenger seats i have alot more rooms for my long legs to be stretched my meals in the flight was well done with good presentation and the food was still hot when serve the only issue will be the snack should be like a warm chicken or tuna wrap instead of the bread

the flight crew on japan airlines is like no other i have ever experienced all of the attendants were professional caring friendly patient and accommodating it was the best experience i have ever had on any airlines nothing seems to rattle this crew and they communicate in a very genuine manner by making eye contact and speaking to passengers at their level the food water snacks and refreshments were tasty and plentiful we even were served my favorite ice cream for dessert i am now a happy customer for life oh and i even was able to watch several current movies on my flight
meals is delicious service is great staff is very tactful when they serve their meal or dessert they make sure every passenger is being address dessert was haggen dazz

travelled jal from beijing to haneda and the flight was fine the service was attentive and friendly traveling in business class in a slightly dated arrangement only complaint is there was no welcome drink before takeoff otherwise great service and highly recommended
a perfect flight from singapore to tokyo great cabin with superb space for economy flights and a great screen for entertainment food and service was good too highly recommended airlines

wide seats good seat pitch and great service at reception and in the air seating is as good as many premium economy of other airlineseven take your oversize luggage ie skis and process them for travel
pleasant flight with friendly and helpful crew i thought the the food was good for airplane food when compared to other airlines

we recently flew jal from vancouver to tokyo and had a wonderful experience it was the first time foe the three of us to fly with jal and to fly on dream liner as well the service before during and upon arrival was excellent the flight attendants were very pheasants and gave every impression that they loved their job the service was very good and their attention to derail regarding my msg allergy was awesome the flight was long but it was a pleasure with this airline would highly recommend jal

the night before our flight and without any notice jal changed plane configuration both our travel agent and we tried to get us back to adjoining seats we tried at checkin and we tried on the plane we even asked single flyers if they might switch i wont go in to that so we ended up paying for business class on a flight where we were separated by rows and i have a flying phobia oh so sorry

i flew jal round trip nrtkhh as part of my trip from orlando to kaohsiung jal service is impeccable the flight staff were professional and courteous the seats were human sized unlike the american flagged carriers who keep shrinking seat and pitch and very comfortable the economy meal was amazing even came with miso soup blankets are offered to all in economy
excellent with newer planes very pleasant flight just sit and relax and enjoy the food very good overall i felt safe in flight

this airline was wonderful the airline staff was outstanding the flights were always on time and the lounges were great from the ticketing agents to the stewards and stewardesses it made a very long flight comfortable and relaxing would definitely fly this airline in the future

this is the second time ive traveled with jal and it is amazing how the flight attendants go out of their way to comfort you on my return flight i had even received a birthday card and a replica of the plane since my birthday was the next day in general this is the best airline ive flown by far they make economy class feel like the business class of other reputable airlines i would definitely recommend jal especially for long international flights their service is top of the line

great people clean and newer airplane superior service and just a fabulous experience lots of movies and the food was fantastic i will fly jal again when i return to japan highly recommended and when you are in takiyama visit the sukyo mahikari center for light

the flight was great and unlike other airlines the sleeper seats were easy to get in and out of the return trip was delayed and we were afraid of missing our one toon but they called ahead and rushed us thru security and waited u til we arrived

even in the cheap seats the service the room the entertainment and food were on point with very comfortable and spacious seats even a nine hour flight is not that bad the movie selection and also the food snacks and drinks were delicious the flight attendants were very polite and helpful

jal have the best economy class going and their premium economy is also good but with reservations for a start it was a night flight taking off at am and there was no food for the first eight hours although snacks and drinks were available i suspect many would have preferred more choice about this the seats were comfortable but you were locked into a a rigid space you cant move the arm rests and as i was traveling with a young daughter it was not what we wanted she had to sleep separate from me and it was hard for me to move as i slept economy was better in that respect otherwise all was good although the food when it did come was hardly spectacular

my wife boys and i flew nonstop roundtrip boston to tokyo this february in economy and can only say great things about this airline the staff went above and beyond really catered to our kids to make a hour flight go by fast and comfortable i highly recommend this airline
great flight heaps of leg room good food and friendly staffwould definitly us again and highly reccommend

i felt the difference from checking in everyone is so attentive as an american customer who is used to lower level services i greatly appreciated these ladies who went beyond means to serve the customers i especially am grateful of how they treat kids families got on board first with the top paid customers kids always got their meals first and most of all these ladies will always serve with smiles thank you jal

all the crew members paid attention to the passengers so that we could enjoy the flight they make a good group and give the service of good quality even though we had no meals economy class from osaka to okinawa at the airport their check in service was speedy and helpful

at about five and a half hours this is an in between time flight not short not long one odd feature jals frequent travellers are boarded before business class passengers good news is that it is long enough to get an hour or two of sleep after lunch you might need that sleep as the crew give you huge glasses of champagne and wine the champagne a grand marque the whites were adventurous but the bordeaux was superb crew were friendly and very helpful however failed to bring drinks or water before takeoff unless asked lunch was excellent before landing hot towels refreshments and ice cream were served jal japanese shirts were offered to passengers the aircraft was well maintained but the lie flat seating a bit older as is common with this length of flight as this is a japanese flight the toilets were pristine and the wc had all the toys you would expect from japan on time arrival and haneda is a lovely airport smaller and friendly and easy to negotiate around
a wonderful way to end my trip to japan wish i had flown them both ways the attendants were polite and caring the food was far above most airline food and it was just a great experience
we flew on japan airlines from san francisco to tokyo and then to bangkok and back and it was a very pleasant experience the flight was comfortable and the customer service was excellent

i took a domestic flight from tokyohaneda to okinawanaha japan airlines has class j the seat is available with only yen approx usd surcharge and unlike economy plus of many airlines they offer full business class size seat with wide seat pitch the service is the same with the economy class but you do not need services for hours domestic flight having extra space and comfort with only usd additional is a great value for those who travel frequently within japan regardless of travel class of the ticket if seats are available at the airport you can upgrade by paying the surcharge very good value for money

whenever possible i will always choose jal the staff were extremely polite exceeding all my expectations they were prompt and so kind the food was amazing warm fresh and just overall amazing the seats were comfy and i loved the hot towels before meals our own pillows and blankets overall a

small uncomfortable and extremely lousy food not really edible sad because i love japanese food the movie selection was terrible i would not fly with jal again there are many options for the same cost

i took a very early morning flight on japan airlines at am from nagoya chubu international to tokyo haneda i chose to fly as booked more than a month in advance it was cheaper to fly than to take the train for early arrival at the airport the train was the only option as the limousine bus does not operate early enough i took the first limited express from nagoya station at am which arrived at at nagoya airport the train was completely full since it was the first fast train of the day to the airport on arrival at the airport it was a short and wellsigned walk to the domestic checkin again as it was the start of the flights for the morning there were lineups at every checkin counter for economy business and first class i used the first class check in based on one world emerald status and after a short wait for the or so guests in front of me was met with the usual friendly courteous jal service as it was a domestic flight no japan airlines own brand sakura lounge was available and instead jal offered the centrair domestic lounge a third party operated lounge used by a number of different airlines including both jal and ana the lounge was really nothing more than a place to seat with an offering of some basic soft drinks coffee and a little alcohol but that is pretty much as expected for a domestic lounge the flight was scheduled for am and boarded as scheduled at am the flight was operated using a b configured in jclass ie domestic business class in a x configuration i was in the aisle seat on the side all seats were full in jclass for the morning flight seats were reclining seats with a little recline only but for a short flight that was fine i was quite tired and therefore napped through the entire hour flight there might have been a drink service but i would have napped throught it the flight arrived on time and luggage delivery was quick with the luggage coming out shortly after i arrived at the baggage reclaim hall one thing to note is that the arrival time of am meant that by the time i exited the airport and caught the limousine bus at am it was rush hour so the expressway out of the airport was more like a parking lot than an expressway nevertheless i was able to reach shinjuku station by around am

cannot speak highly enough of jal premium economy row h and k are the best seats great leg room away from the toilets and the galley jal premium economy gives you access to the qantas business lounge and the jal business lounge

we were flying from tokyo to okinawa in february we had originally booked all of our flights using a travel agent in maryland we went from guam to tokyo tokyo to misawa misawa to tokyo tokyo to okinawa okinawa to guam from this listing you can see we were traveling a lot in japan japan airlines had been fine thus far until this flight there were of us traveling went first no issues then we were helped by two other staff they first gave us one figure for our luggage overage then they tried again and gave us another figure for the overage then there was an issue because our flight was originally booked in america which made it international even if we were flying from haneda airport to okinawa which is a domestic destination they took our money then told us they needed to have the back office clear our reservations and i guess our money too the they told us to go out of the line and wait on the side until the back office could verify our reservations and our money we asked how long we would be waiting and they said minutes we said no why are we not getting our boarding passes and change for the bags we gave them yen well they kept leaving the counter and asking us to leave finally we asked for a supervisor for assistance minutes later a supervisor appeared with still another amount for our excess baggage and our boarding passes and our change she just kept saying so sorry so sorry no real explanation of what the hold up was about or why the difference in the pricing for the excess baggage i do know when jal does screw up they screw up big time no explanation it took us over minutes to check in we probably would have still been standing there had we not asked for a supervisor really then we took the flight and really they cater to their japanese speaking clients on these domestic flights explanation in english but no written signs in english happy to get to okinawa and happier that my flight to guam will be with united and not jal i would be leary of flying jal if you flight was originally booked in america and your are flying out of haneda to another part of japan

excellent service excellent food the cabin crew were very polite and frequently helped passangers put their bags into the overhead bins this is almost unheard of now among the us carriers one little thing that was a nice touch was a cardboard sign at the entrance area of baggage claim indicating the appropriate belt number i know the screens eventually give the information but to me it was still a great touch at the end of a long flight

great food great inflight entertainment lots of leg room and comfortable seats the onboard service was very good staff very friendly great customer service would definitely fly with this airline in the future

myself and my sons flew economy direct sydney to tokyo narita return with jal january this year jl jl like all things japanese the whole flight ran like clockwork we booked online through a uk based booking agent for around per ticket cheaper than either the airlines direct or any other site sydney check in was good and well managed the return tokyo check in was perfect sydney being sydney the snowboards had to be taken to oversized baggage counter after weighing our luggage however at narita they just went straight through with the rest of our bags the kilo checked luggage allowance by kilo bags plus carry on is double that of qantas and much appreciated when taking snowboards boots apres boots ski jackets etc and there was no extra charge for the oversized luggage the plane itself was near brand new the seats comfortable for economy seats ample leg room good entertainment system and wide choice of what to watch inflight service was excellent meals offered were good and the fight attendants attentive and helpful to sum it up it was a typical japanese experience efficient on time in fact early on the return leg and exactly what you paid for

the flight was great foods was good order special meal when i travel to tpe because of there is beef on the going flight n normal meal on return the crew service was ok there is chinese crew onboard that who cant speak english or japanese i dont like is the announcement as its too long cant watch the movie n cannot finish due to the long announcements entertainment was good as there new movies return was delay more than min due to waiting for one missing passenger plus atc hold which i dont think its good for other passengers who have connections

flew dfw to bangkok round trip two legs each way through narita second leg of flight was basic economy from narita to bangkok premium economy not offered premium economy was very comfortable and amenity filled blanket headset eye mask pillow slippers provided with good seating room i would give it an eight of basic economy few amenities and crowded of premium economy or higher is way to go crew very friendly and offered great service of food japanese oriented menus and about airline average of boarding system very strange and inefficient jal does not recognize pre check in us overall would fly again at or above premium economy

stars airlines and best economy cabin by skytrax cant lie im really really comfortable flyingwith japan airlines good staff very helpfull seat so fluffy and distance every seat very wide ill fly again with japan airlines arigatou

so this is really a pity as i find the jl a great flight and the service of jal is fabulous but the transfer at lhr terminal is a shambles minutes wait at security as no fast track security in transfer zone so almost missed connection even if i had a minute connection time so while jal is great the ba service and treatment on the ground is a disaster now some will say that the solution is to go through immigration and back in through the first wing of terminal after brexit that will not be a solution unless immigration controls as as today this will make transfers at heathrow unviable it is a pity for jal with a fabulous service and product to have it devalued by ba no longer paying for the fast track security for terminal transfers same problem a week ago transferring through heathrow to a ba connection from africa

checkin was quick and efficient the flight attendant staff were all friendly and professional even though the economy class seat i had was not an aisle seat there was still plenty of leg room available my flight from bangkok suvarnabhumi to tokyo narita was smooth comfortable and on time i always enjoy listening to the japanese language from native speakers thanks jal i had a pleasant experience

japan airlines is a comfortable flight even in economy there is plenty of legroom for someone of my height ft in and the amenities are plentiful during your flights over the ocean all of the seats recline back a good amount and the inflight entertainment is incredibly diverse not the cheapest but not the most expensive jal ends up being pretty affordable for the value you receive

i have flown with a variety of airlines over the years and until i flew with jal my favorite airline was an american competitor not any morejal is number one in my book now from baggage check in through deportation of the plane the customer is treated like a king even though i was flying economy i felt as though i was in first class thank you jal for such a wonderful flight experience and please keep up the good work

a very comfortable flight from moscow to tokyo looking forward to flying this company again because the flight attendants are so experienced and professional and many things are made me feel like a guest not just like a passenger although the webpage is a bit tricky for me so i did not manage to understand how to book the vegetarian meal i hope to find this option of the next flight

flight to misawa was great just enough legroom for my long legs if the flight was longer than hours i would have not been able to enjoy the flight with the current leg room the seats were comfortable and the staff was very pleasant and courteous the ride was smooth until we got closer to misawa they we did experience bumpy skies but we were able to land and got our baggage and then got out to experience the snow all in all it was a quiet flight

this was a nonstop flight from boston to tokyo and it was by far the best flight experience i had ever had the attendants were flawlessly dressed and extremely polite the food was excellent and the plane was spotless

great quick flight with excellent service jal always lives up to its reputation as a topnotch quality airline i like that when weather related problems at my destination could have caused a delay or diversion of my flight jal notified me about it delays can be quite annoying to say the least and by being informed about the possibility lessens the impact the flight wound up being delayed about minutes

the airline was perfect the flight crew epic and the food wonderful the boeing dreamliner as outfitted by jal is the worst aircraft on this planet and likely any others whatever you do avoid the and go for the the space between the forward seat and your face is so close that it renders the entertainment system useless see the enclosed photo having purchased the seats months before departure jal could have made a bit of an effort to seat my wife and i together but it is still the seat spacing that makes this ride terrible only two classes of seats economy and first class no good options here food crew cleanliness and everything else was wonderful just a miserable ride

this was my first experience with japan airlines and overall it was very pleasant i had the pleasure of sitting in business class and honestly its the only way to travel on a long flight food was excellent flight attendants were very professional and well put together and i loved having a ton of leg room only downside the wifi was useless i purchase a flight pass and it worked for the first hour thats okay i entertained myself with free movies and shows two thumbs up for japan airline

flew on business class last december flight was great and we have accumulated milage on several of our flights with them service is great but the japan milage bank website is so bad we tried to redeem the milage and it was so difficult to use we can only book flights to or from japan booking process is so tedious i have used kriflyer several times and it is much easier to use i can complete a booking within minutes on krisflyer website i spent half an hour on jal milage bank site and finally gave up their customer service is also very bad the wait time is minutes or more

this was our first jal flight as we usually do long haul flights with another carrier i think the legroom was better than what we are used to however that is where the similarity ends there was no menu and no idea what drink options there were when meal time comes you are offered one of two choices the food was fine though service through the night is limited which is normal one flight was slightly delayed but that is not usually the fault of the airline overall we arrived safely in relative comfort and that is what matters to me it was a pretty good flight but still a bit to go for top marks

great flight good food and nice staff the only bad thing is the hours flight its too long obviously jal is not responsible for that when i take a plane for or hours flight i have no problem so with nearly hours i came very tired

by far the best economy seat i have ever flown i am over feet tall and there was more room especially leg room when the seat in front was reclined service is top notch and the staff are especially polite and helpful best economy i have ever flown
terrible service hours delay and no information no servies for business class not stars airline

airline between tsa and hnd is a popular choice for its short distance to downtown and jal has an advantage of flight time for tw based passengers however the deployed airplanes for jl and jl is quite olddecorated the seat facility including seat adjustments personal tv or even seat width are all quite medium to low quality the seat adjustments are not working smoothly and personal tv touch screen is not always responsive the ground staff for my departing jl flight is not friendly either i had a ski luggage and she asked if there is a wax therein i answered it is a whole new ski and should be coated with wax and no box of wax additionally next i asked her whether wax is considered as flammable material so cannot be transported and no response from the staff anymore she just felt unhappy of a ski luggagea really bad experience of japanese company service both jl and jl boarding gates are quite far away from terminal entrance the passenger bridge is only with one entering way once biz class passenger seated all passengers will walk through your seats and need to mind not being slapped by other peoples jackets backpackers and even arms

we were going from cold weather mt fuji to warmer weather in okinawa so we had more than normal clothing we had to check in luggage per person and the allowance was only kg per person per person that means kg or lbs per suitcase some suitcases already weight lbs most airlines allow kg per suitcase even low budget airline like peach allows kg per suitcase we had to pay over us for overage and we were flying j class or their premium economy class what a rip off i definitely am not recommending jal to anyone i would definitely like to hear from someone at jal to hear their explanation

i took an end of january jal flight from vancouver to tokyo narita and was surprised at how empty business class was i counted the front section of the b where i was seated seat k right side first row window and about half the seats were empty therefore almost every passenger had an empty seat beside them and with toilets for business class there was always an available toilet with no wait the flight was punctual as is reliably common for jal and service and food was excellent i selected the japanese meal for the first meal lunch as i find generally the japanese meal is better than the western choices on jal the starter bento box provides an always interesting combination of many different small bites and overall the japanese meal seems more substantial than the western meal choices the main is always two meatchickenfish with rice and pickles and this time it was fish and chicken for the second meal a smaller snack before arrival i selected the western set as the japanese meal did not seem particularly interesting and was surprised when the flight attendant came back to advise me they were out of the western meal and whether i would take the japanese meal instead i reluctantly agreed and probably frowned as a minute later she returned to advise that another passenger had agreed to switch their meal choice and she would be able to serve the western meal to me after all i was glad as the western meal was very delicious particularly the mango citrus slaw and the soft fresh rolls i noticed jal was serving two junmai daiginjo sakes on the flight so i asked to try one expecting to be poured a small cup for tasting instead i was given a whole small ml bottle which was very nicely full bodied but much more than i could drink the usual complaint about the xx layout and no direct aisle access for window seats in the b dreamliner used by jal for this route did not apply this time as the half empty plane meant i had an empty seat beside me so no effort to step over another passenger the angle flat seat is still not as good for sleeping as a fully horizontal flat seatbed but i did note jal has introduced a new dense foam pillow instead of the previous soft fill pillow and it was much more supportive being in the first row i had the smaller pull out from the armrest screen instead of the larger screens in the other rows which have the screens on the back of the previous row but i always thought the smaller screen was a good trade off for a window seat that has much easier step over access if there is a passenger in the aisle seat and because jal does not have as broad a selection of movies as cathay pacific or british airways for example by comparison but i was a bit surprised jal had bohemian rhapsody playing on the flight whereas a cathay pacific flight i took on the next day did not have it yet checking on future planned travel i discovered that jal will be switching to a b on the route during the peak season starting in early june and that the plane will be equipped with jals much nicer fully flat sky suite ii with direct aisle access for all seats however the trade off appears to be price as flights in early june to around midoctober seem to be priced around the range round trip instead of the current or so

we enjoyed a wonderful flight with japan airlines from tokyo narita to frankfurt return in january the flight from narita to frankfurt is of high appeal to me as i do not like night flying and with a departure out of narita around am local time and arrival into frankfurt at pm local time and flying over the beauty of northern russia it is a fantastic flight similiarly the return flight from frankfurt is daylight with a pm departure out of fra and afternoon arrival into nrt the ongoing service in flight catering and on board facilities of the boeing dreamliner series is fantastic the only failure was the jal lounge at frankfurt which is definitely not up to jal standards the venue catering and the environment is none different to a school classroom needs a major overhaul we look forward to flying same route with jal again next year

my partner and i booked the listed tickets and received multiple emails of cancellation of seats and change of flights this resulted in the following firstly seating that was not together secondly downgrade to economy i called and spoke to a jal representative and i was informed that premium economy was not available due to the change of flight and was told i had to downgrade to economy or pay the difference and upgrade to business i then asked if other dates were available for premium economy as my partner is a tall gentleman and cannot fly economy and was told that no dates can be confirmed i asked to speak to a manager and this was denied i had to argue to have a refund which i still have not received this has been an appalling experience and subsequently ruined our holiday to japan i would never fly with japan airlines or recommend jal services based on the extremely poor service i received there was absolutely no attempt to fix the problem which your airline created by changing the flight good customer services means assisting the customer this was not the case a very unsatisfactory outcome

the overall experience from the lounge to the flight was sub par i was expecting a lot more and was completely disappointed the lounge was very old and the food wasnt far behind the flight was just ok and the seat was old as well

chose the airline because of the japan explorer pass that is available for foreigners to fly domestic routes on a very affordable fare service and comfort on board was good check in process is very efficient and staff courteous and helpful would definitely choose jal again because of the provision of this explorer pass thank you

we flew jal recently from singapore narita airport hawaii and i would highly recommend jal airline the chair for the airline is larger than other airlines since i had plenty leg and elbow room i felt comfortable the whole flight so cant complain too much the in flight entertainment content was plentiful so if you stay awake the whole way you wont be bored the staff was very helpful and service was excellent

we flew jal recently from melbourne to tokyo narita and i would recommend this airline to friends and family and not hesitate in flying with them again i had booked the tickets using webjet and then choose our seats by visiting the jal website after consulting seat guru i would have liked to see the price for premium economy but this was not an option on webjet it may have been out of our budget anyway as my son and husband are quite tall i prebooked aisle seats for them the seat configuration on our flights were so we had one seat behind the other in order to get the aisle the seats seem to be slightly deeper and there seemed to be more elbow room due to the seat configuration dont get me wrong it is not premium economy though but we were comfortable from check in to boarding and landing the customer service was spot on the plane left on time with no delays the flight to tokyo was an over nighter and we were given a snack bag and then breakfast close to arrival on the flight home from tokyo to melbourne we had a flight during the day and we were served lunch and dinner there was a good offering of movies and entertainment which was easy to access we were very impressed with jal and will definitely fly with them again

we flew jal from pvg to kix and a return flight nrt to pvg recently and we were totally wowed by the level of service we received the comfort on board and the efficiency of boardingdeplaning the meals were edible though nothing incredible by the hagen daz ice cream was a nice touch we loved the skykiwi drink and were so please that we could opt for that along with a glass of wine and a cup of hot green tea after our meal in flight entertainment was awesome and especially on our second flight when we had a newer plane with their extrawide economy seats we were so comfortable one of our best flights ever they gave us blankets even for the short haul flights and the little things like cup holders and extra compartments in the seat back really made for an enjoyable flight cant wait to fly jal again

jal is supposed to be all about customer service and i did not get that i went in line and due to a codeshare flight i checked with their staff to check if this was the right place i need to be the staff in polo shirts were like no you need to go gates down carrying two heavy luggage i raced there to find out i need to go back to the original spot sweating and tired i told them of the situation and they tell me that the staff in their check in counter area dont know how to speak english and not their staffso this situation does not have to do with jal ummm ok then one of my bags was kilos over and they charged me haha great service recovery too _

the food and drink options were excellent the seat didnt lay completely flat and i ended up sleeping reclined but was very comfortable i feel like premium economy may be the best value for the dollar with this airline but if its not available then business class is still a good but pricey option cheers

yes the way it should be when flying highly respectful and well educated crew staff absolutely ravishing food real champagne not fake bubbly like on first haha american or even worse ua and of course japanese elegance i tried ana several times each time was disappointing so i came back to jal by far the best airline on oneworld together with qatar and cathay all the rest on that alliance just pathetic big seats good selection of foodelegant dark designunlike that horrible ana blue either japanese or european mealsdrinks first class excellent wine selectionnothing to complain

everything first class is supposed to be private compartments great ameneties bose headphones excellent food and wine pajamas and lie flat beds made up with mattress pad and quilt by attentive flight attendants
this airline is a amazing lots of food to eat hostess was great everything with the flights was great i would recommend to everyone

i flew melnrthel in premium economy before flying on to oslo returning from hamburg in october and november simply put this is an amazing experience with space galore and a comfy seat the food is the same as economy but its good and you can get champagne or sky time kiwi which is well worth a try as is the udon de sky service was top notch too both narita and helsinki airports are easy and stressfree to navigate unusually for premium economy lounge access is thrown in but you cant really take advantage of it so good are the connections downsides the cabin temperature was a bit warm and the entertainment a bit lacking in english stuff well it is a japanese airline and it looks like theyre discontinuing premium economy from mel to nrt in early may but these are not enough to keep me away ive booked them again in may over to budapest in premium economy back from paris in economy
the seats are spacious and lots of legroom compare to other airlines and the sector is also quite zone very comfortable when travel on long direct flight

jal service was very good food staff cleanliness amenities movies were average a big bonus in jal premium economy is access to the business lounge this was a great surprise we enjoyed breakfast in sydney and several drinks and nibbles in tokyo on the way home in a comfortable setting everything is as youd expect in this class of service except there is no priority boarding we had the first row of premium economy which provides even more space and leg room although tv screens must fold away

while this is a long flight it is a direct flight which is a huge plus the flight attendants were all very polite because its a long flight everyone gets a pillow and a blanket you dont get that all the time i was able to plug in watch movies etc and charge my phone watch etc the entire time and even though we had to depart a bit late the pilots made up a lot of the time overall a really good experience same good experience on the way back

the economy seats are super spacious and comfortable compared to other airlines as an average height person some economy seats felt very cramped and the barely reclined but with japan airline my knee was nowhere near the seats in front when reclined the angle is very good that i almost thought that i was in premium economy

i took this flight together with my family the service was awesome attendant and friendly crew i would also like to compliment the food that was served best airline food ive had in economy class tokyo to manila leg

had the opportunity to fly to japan tokyowakayamanagoya on a holiday in december and decided to fly via jal it was one of the best decisions we ever made the flight was cheaper than some other airlines and the seats were way more spacious even roomier than the sq premium economy which i took from mlb to sg service was impeccable and food was decent definitely good value for money and comfortable too

we wouldnt think of flying to japan with another airline in my wife and i made three roundtrips between san francisco and tokyo on jal in premium economy which might be the greatest bargain in airline travel for a few hundred extra dollars you get the lounge before flying and your bags get business priority the seats are plenty spacious and lack nothing in comfort the servers are unfailingly attentive and charming they dont wake up sleeping passengers for any reason this is the incomparable injapan treatment that we love
