american airlines booked us with japan airlines we rode on the dreamliner premium economy seats were plenty comfy if you can get first class the chairs adjusted in the legs and back and even had a foot rest the movie selection was nice i liked the goodie bag they even had noice canceling head phones which was so helpful for a hour flight the crew was so kind and kept the lavatories clean where they left toothbrushes after dinner i appreciated their food thats what tickled me most the mid flight snack was noodles look at the pic airplanes on the noodle or veg couldnt figure that out japan airlines lounge was nice i pigged out there too again the crew was great at all three airports
great onboard service and hard product flight delayed due to incoming passengers much confusion with the gate team trying to get the flight boarded very polite but very disorganized

ive always heard that jal airlines was a great arline but now that ive experienced it for myself i strongly disagree ive been flying first and business class for over years so i know a great airline when i see it never have i been told that i cant have something to eat thats on the menu until jal and they also were very slow responding to my request i paid extra to get extra but its obvious jal trears you like an economy flier biggest waist of money and i will never fly this airline again there are so many amazing business class flights to choose from its sad that for the extra money i paid they still dont value the customer needs serious improvements food selection was poor

cabin staff is excellent truly caring friendly helpful exceptionally clean cabin great coffee no pajamas but a reusable cardigan is offered feels a little strange good slippers ok blanket food is not quite what it used to be
one of the biggest airlines in japan but compared with another ana japan airlines have older aircraft and service is not so good

this airline has excellent service by all staff i was on a very very long trip and while the other more american airline was okay as soon as i transfered to japan airline it was quite a difference you are made to feel welcome by all staff at the gate and while in the air everyone is smiling and offering to help you or serve you when the gate agents arrived to open it they all looked at their customers in the gate area and bowed to us i will always fly this airline if i have a choice

first time jal flyers and what an amazing flight the cabin staff were dressed very professional extremely polite and efficient in tending to the passengers the food was very tasty and the plane was clean and restrooms were well tended to they even provided disposable toothbrushes they also provided comfortable blankets and pillows my husband and i agreed that it was like flying years ago when the airlines and employees took pride in their jobs we will fly jal again

my first trip across the pacific was accentuated by comfortable accommodations attentive flight attendants and delicious food i had to return early because of an emergency at home which necessitated traveling coach the accomodtions were not as comfortable and spacious but the food was good and the attendants were so polite and helpful i look forward another trip in the future on this fine airline

mostly the legs of the flights seemed smooth only the last leg from narita to lax was very turbulent that i thought we would die the food was good i loved the ice cream cups no sushi though going from narita to mnl there was no other choice but a salmon meal which was not okay because hubby is allergic to seafood so he did not eat anything good thing the flight was just about hours he survived regarding cleanliness the flight from mnl to narita there were so much dust where the carry on luggage bins were and the aircraft itself

this is my first time travelling with jal with my family we are adults and children age flight is on time and smooth during my travel date the entertainment and food are good and we have comfortable seats as well definitely will choose jal again if we travel to japan again

have flew several airlines from usa to asia specifically hong kong for more than years no airline services can match japan airline locking up in a airplane for more than hours the high quality services offered by the flight crews is crucial jal has the best western and japanese food menu the fresh cook rice and most important is the food served by exceptional professional jal flight crews the flight attendants are not just smile but maintain the virtues of japanese hospitality and kindness they create an atmosphere of comfortable and memories i always felt my hour flight as if it were only a few hours
no need to say more best flight ever hostesses were very accommodating even though it was a short hr flight i would travel japan airlines again

this direct flight from jfk to narita was a dream i was impressed from the moment i checked in at the ticket counter the agent noticed that i was tall and without me asking arranged to have my seat changed to the exit row where there was unrestricted room for my legs the onboard staff was extremely professional courteous and helpful the flight departed on time and arrived early my premium economy seat was comfortable enough relative to business class on board entertainment was expansive i was a bit disappointed in the quality of the meals although the meals on my return jal flight were excellent i have flown to japan several times before on delta and kal but jal will be my first preference in the future
everything was perfect the staff was incredible friendly and the food was good the flight was on time ive just loved everything

travel a lot in last twenty years and always impressed with jal orderly clean timely great service from ticket counter till departure from destination terminal attendants on board are friendly courteous timely and helpful i am old enough to remember most american airlines were this way sad

four stars for hard product and food only third time in long haul first class on this flight first time traveling with my husband jal wins on hard product mostly for being able to see out the windows and the memory foam mattress the food on this flight was excellent as for all other aspects i still prefer ana cristal was gone before dinner service mostly because they kept my husbands glass full and mine empty i was basically ignored and crew deferred to my husband interesting as i bought the tickets and am the only one with ow elite status i had to ring the call button multiple times and was not greeted with the typical japanese high level of cabin service was treated more as an inconvenience if i can redeem miles for the ticket ill fly again otherwise my cash goes to ana

unbelievably good flight what an unexpensive award its amazing how travel in asia carries great value and excelent service this was a ba award flew economy plus cabin for a hour flight perfect marvelous lounge service great on board food terrific entertainment

flew the family of us to tokyo i am very experienced international traveler countries so far very spoiled as i usually flew business but flew economy plus with the family from ny jfk to tokyo and was very pleasantly surprised i have back issues too but premium economy had lots of leg room and the seats were large and comfortable enough for this big american male the food was good but not great so we traveled with some extra snacks however overall we found the service to be excellent very professional and attentive was overall very pleased with the airline

in flight staffs treated my family and i very badly i never imagined to experience something like this in my life worst flight of my life time and my opinion jal is worst airline of all after took off my flight jl narita to melbourne one hour later my two years old daughter was trow up we both were all cover with vomit staffs only helped us by bought us some wet towels but i did have to clean everything myself i used my dirty top to cover the seat which still dirty with vomit i know my daughter throw up so did try to not bother much for help but my top covered with vomit so had to ask if they have spare top and they helped me with one cardigan i did offer to buy this cardigan but she said is was ok and i did plan to ask if how she want us to return this top however no one offer to help and ask how about us treat us like it was your fault u better leave with it then hours before landing one japaness staff did come to ask my husband to return the cardigan because she need to do stock taking and want to make sure we return it then just mins later another staff came to ask me to make sure we have to return the cardigan in mins really i never feel treated like this before do u think we really need your logo cardigan that much do you really think we need to take it with us that bad we did not want even wore it if my sweater was not full of vomit all you care is the cardigan what i going to wear have u ever care how well of my daughter have u ever came and ask how she feel why did she throw up not even once you came and ask how my family are doing alright she is only what you care is only the one cheap cardigan which have your logo on the chest who want to ware that we return your cardigan straight away that show me enough if something ever happened jal staffs will definitely worry about their belonging more than passengers sorry this matter also shows me enough about what is jal airline main focus is and i will make sure will not travel with you again mark my word even we have free ticket i will not take it that flight make me feel so bad like i am a criminal try to steal your stuff i did pay for nearly for my family and all my staffs to travel with japan airlines and let me tell you worst decision ever this trip is worst trip of my lifetime thank to you and i will make sure i will pass this message to everyone i know to not use japan airlines again in the future because if accidents happen they will not care no courtesy no care no customers service worst than budget airline food also bad not and never again
the seat is comfortable even for economy class cabin crew always stand by and look after passangers even in the evening when most of people fall asleep the minus is only theres no wifi

i was flying back after a ski accident in club med sahoro which made it impossible to walk with no pain at my knee with children and a couple of luggages my husband was struggling a friend suggested asking for assistance from the airline right from the start at obihiro they took care of everything all the crews were informed connecting flight from nareda was totally full but everyone from ground to flight did they best to make it easier and comfortable for me we appreciate all the extra effort and they did it with so much pleasure that i felt bad being such a burden when we arrived in singapore this experience was different all the arrangement was made but somehow the ground crews gave me the feeling that it was grudging meant to be the disparity in attitudes were so great that i can only accord the attention and assistance received from japan sectors were truely exceptional i am flying next week for work alone still needing assistance to move around lets see if singapore airlines is as good as they claim i will share again

after a long flight from sfo to tokyo my boyfriend and i were sure we were going to miss our connecting flight to new chitose minutes to clear customs transfer bags and make it to our new gate this was the last flight of the night upon leaving the plane a jal agent was waiting for me and my boyfriend with a printed sign with our names she said she knew we had a tight connection and rushed us through customs grabbed our bags for us and her and a couple other agents helped us navigate to our connecting flight they literally carried our bags and ran with us through the airport in the us not only would we have missed our flight but our bags definitely would not have made it this was hands down the most amazing customer service experience japan airlines for the win

clean new plane nice comfortable seat amazing meal as good as any you would find at a great steak house the service was exceptional polite quite and attentive at all times many other carriers could learn well from observing the jal crew on this flight could not give them higher marks the only two downsides on this were that in the business class seat although it was comfortable the lie flat is on an angle which makes it tough to sleep and the internet was not working the entire time spotty reception
family of booked premecom pe seats same price as qf disc economy syd to nrt pe seats excellent heaps of leg room especially front row food same as economy rate jal pe best ive travelled

the only reason for giving four stars instead of five was that the plane felt ready for a refresh the wear and tear on the seats and seating areas were apparent so that said i cant recommend the airline highly enough when it comes to service and quality the air hosts were all absolutely amazingly attentive their dedication to ensuring that passengers had a comfortable flight was apparent from the moment we boarded until our departure and this was true on both our inbound and outgoing flight a pal who travelled first class said it was superior in all respects the food was light years better than the food ive experienced on other airlines the bed was comfortable the beverage selection was first rate and the flight was smooth and utterly painless i arrived in japan refreshed and ready to explore i would absolutely recommend this airline and i would fly with them again in a heartbeat
i couldnt recommend japan airlines any more highly i flew with jal from melbourne to tokyo tokyo to sapporo and then in reverse excellent service meals entertainment and comfort

the flight was excellent save one issue the tortoise shell chicken meal was not very good and i was only able to eat a very small portion of it the airline claimed it was made by some award winning chef and this meal was picked to be served to economy class passengers my advice is to stock up on snacks and eat a large meal before boarding i lived in japan for years and am not a stranger to the cuisine

my first time with japan airlines has been fab experience especially in terms to the leg room choice of movies and attitude of the stewardess even though a red eye flight they were prompt and not grouchy when i asked them for drinks etc i love the efficiency they had compared to the other apparentlyworld class airlines we travel by i would highly recommend japan airlines this would definitely be our preferred airline for now

when traveling in economy class the most important is the seat and legroom this is my first time flying with jal and im amazed how spacious the legroom and i also believed that the seat is wider than other airlines i also find out that one of the toilet is bigger than usual the toilet have an additional space for baby changing diaper i would highly recommend for everyone that plan to travel with economy class to try jal
we were impressed with the helpfulness of the flying attendants they reacted to a small and big issues with a genuine care treated us extremely nicely

the service on jal isnt bad unfortunately its clear that they are operated by the same company as american airlines which to me means theyre underfunded the planes are fairly old seating is less spacious food is subpar and the movie screens and tech is all outdated all in all this is still a better airline than say china eastern but thats not saying much dont book with jal expecting better food or service because they are japanese this company operates more like american airlines which means theyre stingy with economy class theyre out to make money more than to please their customers qatar is a far better option
i experienced very good service from check in to off board very typical japanese hospitality that never went wrong
this is malaysian airline code share operated by japan airline the food quality and quantity was simply no never enjoyed airline foodlike thisfor a long time very attentive

i continue to fly jal for my trips to japan i wont ever consider a us carrier why would anyone want to im willing to pay the difference in price for a completely different experience clean bathrooms good food impeccably dressed flight attendants helpful flight attendants pleasant flight attendants comfortable seats i could go on and on this time i opted to try premium economy and was glad i did not inexpensive but totally worth it unlike us carriers that charge you extra just for a bit more leg room and nothing else same way how they charge you for baggage the premium economy seats are wider and have a crazy amount of leg room premium economy also grants you access to the jal lounge excellent food and beverages rather than eating at restaurants and their crazy prices at honolulu airport youre able to have a really nice meal and relax in comfort the narita lounge is even nicer a bit better outfitted im not sure but the food spread also seemed to be a bit larger all in all another fantastic experience on jal another reason why im flying less and less to the us mainland why subject myself to the torture of flying us airlines when i can fly to japan and have a great time

having previously flown into tokyo from lax and disappointed with the service and attitude the flight from tokyo to melbourne on a was back up there with typical jal standards the staff were friendly and attentive the food was designed and prepared in japan not lax by top chefs and it was very good the flight departed ontime and arrived on time and priority bags came out first and quickly well done jal

japan airlines is like the united air of japan also known as nikk≈ç is the flag carrier airline of japan the service is incredible from the moment you step into the aircraft just after takeoff you are presented with a hot towel just like first class hahah then a snack plus a drink alcohol is free on international flight then two meal service and two more snacks pluse constant drinks the food is really good portions are standerd size a tip if you never flew an asian airline before its warm in the plane to warm for mearound digs but my wife was happy

i flew on this airline for both domestic flights within japan and international flights tofrom japan the service was great as the attendants were probably the most polite that ive encountered the food was good and i liked the variety of entertainment some of the flights i was on had free wifi while on other flights i watched a few anime movies and read their selection of manga titles the premium economy class was slightly more comfortable with more legroom and amenities but i probably wouldnt choose that class over regular economy class if i had to pay for the tickets myself as regular economy was pretty good by itself

this was my first flight on jal i was excited to fly them as ive read great things i am a bit of a snob and like to travel biz class but cathay and jal one world guys wanted ridicules prices for biz hong kong to hnd rtn so went with premium economy over all i would fly them again but i dont think its worth more then economy the seats were very comfy and would be great for long hall good entertainment and big screen im used to premium econ on qantas which is a step just under biz this was just a step over econ the food was ok if you are into japanese food and there was no pre flight drink and i had to ask for alcohol it wasnt offered the flight attendants were very respectful and polite i could not fault them if i could put jal flight attendants on qantas flights that would be perfect we left a little late and the pilot was asking forgiveness and it wasnt his fault we made up the time no worries at times we were traveling over kph thats the fastest ive ever travelled summary great crew and plane poor food i would travel short or long hall without question just look for better prices thanks jal for my intro to japanese culture ps i loved seeing the ground crew bow to the plane and wave until we left

jal is the best jal is the best i needed to write that twice because there is no other airline i would rather fly they are classy smart very serious about excellent service helpful and the model for any other airline ive been flying all over for over years on a whole range of aircraft but jal is always in first place highly recommended

we had a great flight back in when we took premium economy pe back from haneda to singapore so this time we book pe both ways but it wasnt as enjoyable the lounge at singapore is not great as its not the jal lounge the food and drinks served are not of japanese standard we hardly ate anything and the lounge is not conducive can hardly find couch seats the toilet in the flight to tokyo is also bad it smells of urine and it was only half way thru the flight but the service from the stewardess is still great the lounge at narita was awesome though its crowded but its still conducive with lots of seating great fooddrinks

i read all the reviews before i purchased my business class tickets on jal some how though i missed any reviews on the business class hard product out of san diego i thought the product would be the same as out of la why would it be different yet it was i was shocked to find on the san diego flight they use the old style configuration and the seats dont go completely flat plus no privacy i was very disappointed to say the least for me it was not comfortable and will never go that route again i actually felt cheated out of my money especially for the same price i could have flown a nicer product out of la this was the first time ive flown jal it wont be the last either as the service was outstanding probably the best ive experienced but ill be much more careful in the future to do my research on which type of business class seats jal is using on a particular flight

i took the short domestic flight on jal from osaka itami airport to tokyo haneda airport to connect to an international flight from narita itami airport is very close to osaka city center so a quick half hour limousine bus ride was all that was needed to get to the airport check in was quick and i used my one world alliance status to access the diamond premier lounge near gate nothing fancg but there is a good amount of seating including lots of counter seating next to the small food area with a selection of a few bakery items to snack on in addition to offerings of drinks the flight was operated on a b and i was in j class which is domestic business class nothing fancy here just regular seats with a slight recline configured i had an aisle seat next to the window seat but had unlimited legroom and no disturbance from my neighbour on access since we were on an exit row with no seats in front of us the flight was very busy and j class appeared to be full due to the short flight there was time only for a quick drinks service which was efficiently done with the usual jal grace and courtesy flight was on time luggage delivery was fairly quick and it was easy to reserve and board the limousine bus to connect from haneda airport to narita airport

maybe it was an off day but a feature of jal is their friendly and attentive staff but on this flight the crew seemed disinterested and there were few smiles or attention or for that matter interest the food standard was ok but not to the standard when flying out of japan where they use famous chefs as the inspiration for their dishes but out of lax the famous chefs were not in the bedd menu maybe because they cannot guarantee the quality available in japanthe aircraft was an older boeing and not as comfortable as a but having said that it departed on time and despite km heads winds arrived on schedulestill much better than most domestic us airlines but noy what one comes to expect from jal

they always give us a great friendly service last time i went to japan they couldnt fly due to a strong wind but they offered me a transportation to go to the different airport and a hotel to stay i love japan airline

i paid the premium fare as i wanted to sleep and enjoy a great meal jal delivered unfortunately the nashville to japan portion of the trip was on jals code share airline american subject of a negative review under american airlines americans food and service is much below that of jal as an added bonus jals checked luggage allowance is kilos higher than american and they allow three checked bags vs two on american
comfortable direct flight i request halal meal and it was nice and delicious very friendly cabin crews
wonderful staff attentive and friendly comfortable flight good movies on in seat monitor lots of fluids served to keep us hydrated nice hot clothes to wash our face and hands

i have never written a review for an airline but felt indebted to share my experiences for its excellent service and quality of the cabin first it was very spacious with lots of leg room probably more spacious than most of us major airlines the food was quite good compared to other airlines that i have taken my family and i actually finished all the food for both lunch and dinner which never happened before with other airlines furthermore their restrooms were huge and super clean they were all the time is it amazing one of the restroom could fit people even larger than the business class of other airlines that i have tried the best part was their service my family and i were celebrating our anniversary and birthday on this trip the chief flight attendant maru not sure if i got her name correctly and her crew members were so incredibly thoughtful that they gave us special gifts and a handwritten card we were so touched by their thoughtfulness they made our long journey to japan memorable and joyful highly recommended
first time using this airline which i found to be very good i would fly with them again it was business trip
plane very clean staff very polite food above average washroom clean regularly good choice of movies
i always use jal as a point of comparison when talking airlinesflights simply the best air travel experience i have ever had
the check in process was easy the stewardesses were all very nice the airline was incredibly clean and the food was actually pretty good

this was a hour flight it was a very comfortable flight they came around very often with food and stuff to drink there in plent to watch on the little monitor in front of you in many different languages as well as listen to misinterpret if you like the seats are a little wider than on a regular plain ans every seat has a pellow and blanket so you can sleep they do turn the lights down lawn as well as lower all blinds to make it easy to sleep
the flight attendants couldnt do enough for you superb service quiet clean and exceedingly comfortable ride excellent food service and meals will fly again with jal
gentle and professional service with genuine smiles and courtesy food was well prepared and served on time however efforts need to improve on the childrens games and toys

the ground staff is excellent at the check in at cts helped me all the way with our twins traveling together the flight is average and the food and inflight entertainment leaving much room for improvement

im posting a followup to my previous review of jal which complained about their undisclosed refusal to allow seat selection or seat preferences to economy passengers at that time i had called their customer service and received no satisfaction subsequently i went to their website and made a strongly worded complaint on their contact us form this apparently went up a little higher and i was informed that their gate agents would be notified of my need for an aisle seat i was skeptical but to my surprise i was not only given aisle seats but preferred boarding and treated with kid gloves by all their personnel all four flights were on time and my travel experience with jal was excellent if i had not complained repeatedly perhaps i would be less satisfied but i have to say that they do take customer service issues seriously and my actual experience on the flights could not have been much better my last flight was only half full and jal still kept their schedule in stark contrast to garuda which canceled two flights on me that had not filled and caused some real headaches

japan airlines really impressed me their inflight meals for the economy class was quite good did not see what the first class people ate but i enjoyed it as many other carriers do not give meals to the economy class

from the friendly smiles to courteous demeanour nothing is more welcoming as you board the plane the stewardesses seem genuinely concerned about your comfort the other time we flew jal my niece with peanut allergy was with me and the attention they gave to addressing this was commendable from asking if someone eating peanuts nearby would affect her to providing allergen free food then checking if she was alright i cant say the same with their partner american airlines the leg room is longer and the seats much wider than most airlines the meals are also more appetising toilets are kept clean the only second thoughts i have is about the price but if i am able to get a promo price i will definitely take jal

the service is excellent the food is definitely better than most and the seats are nearly lay flat i fly pretty regularly to japan on jal and american you cant go wrong with either airline just make sure youre in business class

amazing service with great food and attention to detail on my way back due to a minor back injury the flight crew helped me with every part of the check in and settling into the plane and also made sure i had two seats to myself at the end of the flight the attendants went around and thanked every single passenger for taking japan airlines i travel a lot and take it over flights annually and japan airlines is always my favourite

cleancomfortable and quiet the only problem we had was our meals got mixed up on the first leg but our flight attendant was able to rustle something up for us she was so sweet we had a hour stop over in tokyo and we got to explore the airport what a great airport for the second flight the attendant at the gate was able to quickly order meals for us so we had no issues for the remainder of our journey polite and efficienta great airline

first time with jal after more than years in s i was surprised on how comfortable and very modern aircraft it is now i fly to tokyo and return back to jakarta i i enjoy good food movies music and even the toilet

i spent my entire birthday in airports and on planes with little to no communication with my family or friends while onboard before we landed they presented me with a birthday gift which absolutely made my day thank you so much jal for the amazing service awesome plane and the wonderful gift that made my birthday memorable
always on time friendly stewardesses clean seats and facilities highly recommended for low stress travel

pleasantly surprised by their service efficiency you get used to such a mediocre service with other airlines like delta american aireuropa norwegian etc that when you get to enter to an actual clean airplane bathroom you feel so amazed like if you were receiving a first class treatment i flew in four different flights with japan airlines in all of them we left on time boarding was very quick the staff was extremely nice and helpful i had severe allergies and my medicines made me more dehydrated than usual and they kept bringing me water and juices to battle both my allergies and the effects of a hour flight seats are hard not much cushion but they have good leg room and an ample selection of movies drinks i think it was a great for the price of the flight

this overnight flight was part of a jal package from europe back to australia through tokyo where we had had a day layover to mitigate jetlag the biz class flatbed pods are good the entertainment on the big flatscreen tv was more than acceptable the food western was a highlight as was the japanese single malt whisky the service was a little slow but very japanese and delightful it cannot be scored higher than four stars when benchmarked against other international business class flights taken in the past it was expensive jal charges heavily because there are only four carriers who fly tokyosydney direct jal ana qantas and jetstar which is effectively a qantas subsidiary there are other much cheaper ways to fly to europe if you do not have to go to japan

when returning to san diego from narita jal is the best for a direct flight it leaves at pm and arrives san diego at about am flight time is hours minutes the food is good in quantity and variety variety of alcohol good flight attendants are couteous and attentive the only thing i didnt like is that the plane is b and the toilets are in the middle of plane

last week i flew on japan airlines for the first time it was a memorable experience and very positive the service was top notch on the ground i had to have wheelchair assistance and jal uses their own employees to meet and transport its wheelchair passengers with uniformed personnel that could be mistaken for inflight attendants they were friendly spoke english perfectly and would not take a tip best wheelchair service i have encountered checkin was flawless and they actually came to me while i sat in the boarding area and asked me to board first then once at the plane they took my carryon luggage and stowed it for me the flight attendant introduced herself and let me know if i needed anything to let her know in flight service was again at a very high level with good food and very innovative some a result of a chef competition that they held i thought the minestroni soup and small loaf of bread for breakfast was perfect and a great substitute for the usual breakfasts on airlines seats were comfortable recaro seats and inflight entertainment had an excellent choice of movies coffee tea and water were offered several times during the flight some snacks were offered during flight in the flight attendant serving area but only rice crackers and some chocolate this is the only aspect that i would rate as below average the flight attendants were always available if one needed them and very cordial and attentive in vancouver i was again met at the gate by a jal employee and transported by wheelchair all the way through immigration and to my connecting area overall i had two very impressive and comfortable flights
every thing about the flight was perfect could not fault anything the seat was slightly narrower then other business class seats but comfortable

its the best service is excellent all very kind helpful and respectful unlike american airlines such as unitedamerican who has no pride in their work as ca food selection and the level of the taste was great too clean toilet that is cleaned by ca very often i highly recommend it
jal services are great there is nothing to point out i prefer to choose their airlines most of my travel trips
informative check in process warm greeting quick respond baggage handling its fabuluous food communicative air crew service its interior and film etc its crew action to clean a mesh

i had a pleasant return journey on jal on after climbing mt fuji the service was great the flight was punctual the take off landing was smooth and i enjoy the meals inflight entertainment thank you jal for the great experience
great airline with superb service going on japan air to singapore early feb in business class unfortunately have to fly coach back in march because i did not book soon enough

stly the meals served on board jal is not very nice compared to the other airlines i took previously my dept flight to chitose was ok but my return flight from chitose was chaotic because there was heavy snowfall when i reached chitose airport and all flights were suspended i would think such situations should be expected and managed in a more professional way the jal staff at the chitose airport cannot speak or understand english and that makes it worst during such chaotic situations especially for passengers like my group of which is our st time encountering this the staff should at least provide some positive substantial info and try to ease and calm the nervous passengers but they did not i have to go from jal staff to another to get to an english speaking staff who can understand and converse with me in the end i got a staff who was quite helpful and he speaks good english thank god we were able to get help from this particular staff and he managed to give us a standby tickets out of chitose

flights were on or aircraft jal is one of the few airlines that have a seat arrangement in economy most others squeeze an extra seat in each row so jal economy seats tend to be a tiny bit wider however the the distance between rows seems to be pretty tight for some reason i found the flight between melbourne and tokyo was much more comfortable than the flight between tokyo and vancouver the food and service were ok but nothing outstanding generally i would try to give the a miss and find a more spacious aircraft if possible always check seat guru for seating plans
if you can spend the money you will have a fabulous experience its night and day difference traveling in business class from economy service comfort so special

this has been my second time flying jal the first experience was bad when i had gotten a old vessel that wet my carry on bag which i placed below my seats however this time round was better i have wider leg space for seats civilised passengers in board and attentive cabin crew my flight involves flying into haneda airport and then transfer to a domestic flight to fukuoka i enjoyed both journey where i managed to get good quality sleep on board without being disturbed by unnecessary lighting or announcement in the flight airplane plane was average yet i also enjoyed haagen dazs ice cream given a dessert at the end of my meal for both of my trips
cas took care of me frequentry chief cas announcement in the flight is good enough japanese meal was good though idid not try western meal

this is a great flight for anybody going to japan especially for tourists visiting kyoto the flight departs from the nice tom bradley terminal at a reasonable hour and arrives in osaka before the trains stop running the train station connected has trains to takes you to kyoto in a little over an hour so you can spend the first evening in kyoto if you like if you are the type that cannot sleep on the plane there are good hotel options connected to the terminal there was no premium economy offered when i flew but it appear they will off that starting mid that will make the hour flight more bearable without costing too much
had a great flight the cabin crew on japan airlines are beyond efficient and really make the difference

cabin services are always excellenthelpful flight attendantalways on timebut only thing that i disappointed was meal even business class meal was not goodtasteless i ate only one bite and didnt touch the rest

choosing jal whether its expensive is really value for your money the leg room is quite comfortable and even the seats you have your own monitor to watch movies or tv shows the stewardess are very courteous and organized unlike other international airlines food is simply great

i have flown with all the major international airlines at one time or another and have found faults and hygiene problems with all of them the exception is jal i paid economy and got upgraded on the departing flight from sydney to paris and returned paris in economy both classes were exceptional both in service comfort and the cleaniness a also the food was great in both classes i enjoyed an overnight stay with full breakfast included staying at the airport nikko hotel included in the air ticket price i also received a nice meet and greet at the airport in japan the only reason i do not fly with jal is because now i live in queensland and they have cut all their brisbane flights such a shame but with all the health risks involved in travelling its great to have an airline like japan airlines who are way ahead the others when it comes to hygiene and cleaniness

best airline to fly to japan same price as american but times better customer service making the reservation and service in the air friendly staff and flight attendants highly recommend once you fly jal youll never want to fly american airlines
the upgrade to premium economy was worth it we allowed to use the lounge with free food and drinks comfortable massage chairs etc

this was a very enjoyable travel experience for a long flight from singapore to new york via tokyo the flight attendants were wonderful kind courteous helpful the plane was spotlessly clean even the restrooms were maintained well on the long hour flight to new york they did something i have never seen before my adult son was sleeping when they served dinner so they put a sticker on his seat so they would know and remember to offer him food when he woke up they were constantly walking around with water coffee snacks
great service and commitment nice food and choices two eggs for a personal breakfast comfortable seat and accessories

at booking desk we were upgraded to premium economy which was a very pleasant surprise we flew from melbourne to narita as in economy and were well looked afterand reasonably comfortable the return flight in premuim was a very nice experience indeed arriving feeling very fresh i would highly recommend jalfor the for the level of service they provide

ive been using japan airlines for more than years at least twice every year the conversion point of the mileage isnt good at all but the rest of the service is great i usually try to avoid using a bathroom which men and women have to share but with hours flight you cant avoid i like the fact that i see flight attendants go to the bathrooms so often to keep them clean all of the time from the checkin counters in the lounge at the boarding and on the plane people treat you very nicely most of the time the flights are on time

excellent flight service and timing the best airline ive travel with even the economy class is much better than others the only thing that was difficult is that on my way back they had an alliance with an airline from malasya and it was very difficult to check in online and to find the flight at delhis airport

having flown jal to japan and the united kingdom on several occasions my experiences have been very positive the airline is reliable efficient and has a good safety record its cabin crew are courteous and helpful in every possible way in the past i flew on a number of airlines but none met the standards of jal their performance is second to none
what great servicewe can not speak highly enough about the attendantswould use them again in a flash

the crew was super attentive the meals were okay i dont think airlines should try to do gourmet keep it basic and tasty fancy restaurant style just doesnt prepare well in the air just saying i did appreciate the double menu western and japan types of food i am over tall and when i fully reclined my feet pressed against the foot rest not good for hour flight from tokyo we took at a great leg room tight on the shoulders only hours so it was tolerable looking to stay away from the movie selection was pretty good those and a book got me through stars is solid not jal fault for the type of planes they fly
st flight with jal from dme to tokyo narita great trip friendly attendants great food and drinks the only cons small lavatory

if i am flying to japan only with jal the price is quite reasonable food and overall service is good for economic class and the best of all if there is turbulence the aircraft goes higher where is it less turbulent our flights have been mostly on meters altitude very calm and comfortable this is an extremely important thing for someone who is very y anxious when flying
the service is unparallel the food was delicious i have plane food the place was super confortable even for a hour flight great way to fly back from asia

the online experience with jal was pretty bad horrendous really i wanted to login to the system and see my reservation but was never able to do that first time this ever happened to me but i read that their economy seats were good and i was pretty confident i was booked as they did send me an email after i inquired i had the most basic of economy seats but everyone at jal had me believing i was a valued customer customer service was better than i expected the seats were better than premium economy on deltaunited the flying experience was better than i could ever recall flying the standard usa airlines i highly highly recommend jal

best airlines for flying to asia staff was super friendly and helpful they speak english the flight is comfortable no matter where you sit the food was amazing and service was impeccable my go to airline

service was excellent as was the food typical japanese seven course meal for dinner and a very nice breakfast and snack in between seats were adequate with above average leg room considering the price and service level i would not hesitate to flay jal again
i wasnt looking forward to such a long flight business class seats were much more comfortable than britishair and united less claustrophobic

really great service the flight attendants were very polite neatly dressed and courteous they consistently served meals and were generally available to assist at all times a note of caution though the food tends to be japanese oriented so persons with special dietary needs must advise the airline in advance do not presume that there will be anything to suit special needs

the airline as known for its high quality of service i flew more than flights a year and was never disappointed regardless of the flight classes the only improvement i wish is for the quality of tea in business classes as it tastes like the ones from supermarket at low price the airline should tie up with one of the famous brand and serve them
my st experience with jal from new york jfk to singapore via tokyo i have a feed back may help you to improve your services i believe

japan airlines is by far the best airline i have flown it starts with the attendants who are well dressed and extremely polite the airplanes are spotless and the food is excellent add to that the timeliness of the flights and you have an excellent airline

we traveled in november from sydney to tokyo narita airport and back to sydney in japan airlines premier economy class in a nonstop flight the flight was very comfortable our vegetarian food was good and delicious the checkin was smooth and quick we were allowed in qantas business class lounge at sydney airport and in sakura lounge at narita airport the staff in the flight were polite and always attentive

took this flight on thanksgiving day fairly crowded but everything was orderly leg room was good food was okay with either japanese or western style had some new movies to watch but choices was limited no big surprises

over the last year ive had the privilege of traveling on long haul business class flights with a number of airlines including emirates jal united and british air and jal is the best their plane was the cleanest after hours in the air their beds were the most comfortable and their food was certainly more than adequate if you ever have a choice this is the airline to chose i had a visa problem for my ongoing travel and the jal staff handled it masterfully it was in total a fabulous experience

this was my first time on jal and i loved everything from the staff with exceptional service and also the cleanliness the food was superb as you can choose japanese and western the flight entertainment is also good however i did wish their was more movies that were newer releases on the way home i flew premium economy again a fantastic product the service and meals were unbeatable i felt like their was constant food being served with was great the seats were extremely comfy and the barrier on the side of the seats next to the head rest is perfect as it gives you privacy without looking at the person next to you other than that a great product i would recommend anyone to fly with

we had a very unpleasant experience on jal and my husband was ordered out of his premium economy seat we flew from tokyo to singapore on th november in a family of my husband was on premium economy class as it was work travel while i and my daughter of yo were on economy normally on long flights my husband and i would swap seat to take turn to look after our daughter we have done this a few times on singapore airline and there was absolutely no issue so today i took the premium economy seat first after two hours i swapped my seat with my husband to put our daughter to sleep however one of the stewardesses immediately ordered my husband out of the premium economy seat and said that no seat swapping allowed we explained our situation and said that the seat rightfully belonged to my husband we apologised and said we would not do it again however she insisted that my husband must return to the economy seat now at this time my daughter was over tired and refused to leave my side so i sat down with her in economy while the stewardess pointed to an empty economy seat far away from our seats and said that he could sit there but not allowed back in premium economy afterwards my husband explained the situation to other stewardesses and they were very sympathetic however they said that the person giving the order is the head steward and they have no say they suggested that if we wanted to we could file a complaint and so my husband did a few hours later my daughter woke up from her nap although we tried asked her to sit with daddy and let mommy sit in the front she refused to and kept screaming i want my mommy when i returned back to the premium economy seat she ran after me with tears streaming down her face asking for me she looked so distraught that i lifted her up and let her sit on my laps and told her that she cant sit here almost immediately that stewardess came back and said to me your daughter is not allowed to sit here i couldnt believe it as the stewardess looked like a mother herself and how could she be so unkind and heartless to ordered a teary toddler right back to the seat so i just looked at that lady and then carried my girl back to economy i asked my husband to go back to the premium economy seat again as this is just absurd he paid for the seat and yet ordered out of his own seat so he did and that stewardess made a big fuss again she even said to my husband i understand that you have filed a complaint about us and so have we we know all your details and i have reported you to our airline now this is just ridiculous my husband was firm but never lost his control or got too emotional at that point he was so frustrated that he just left and to make the matter worse the lady went to apologise to every single customer in the premium economy cabin because of our disturbance in the end we spent the majority of our flight back in economy with the premium economy seat being left empty as my daughter just wanted to be with me and i didnt want her to scream or cry on the plane and disturbed other passengers on top of that we felt so humiliated and discriminated as if we were thieves from economy seat trying to steal a seat from premium economy had the crew members told us from the beginning that no seat swapping allowed we would have definitely sat in the correct seating we felt discriminated because in the same row of premium economy seat one passenger kept swapping back and forth between business class and premium economy he is a huge man and hence i noticed it when he walked down to sat next to his wife in premium economy so that very man was allowed to go back and forth but not us later on when we complained about the differential treatment to the ground staff in singapore we were told because the man was on business class he could switch however he wished to and because we are on lowly premium economy we are not allowed to do that i really really liked jal and would always have only good things to rave about this airline however after this incident we are very scared by the airline and we are seriously want to avoid this airline forever

its very confortable airline from japan to singapore departure time is set before noon and arrival time is before evening so its convenient for me especially for the business traveller time consuming viewpoint this flight schedule is very good in flight service is an acceptable level both foods and drinks cabine is clean and there is no claim on this

i flew jal for the first time and was very impressed by the service and cleanliness the economy seats were comfortable as far as economy goes there was a variety of tv and movie selections the food was good by airline standards i would recommend jal for long haul flights
nice friendly and helpful flight attendance the food was good and looks healthy comfort seat and spacey

its my nd trip to japan by jal this time my family of travel in premium economy class sadly theres isnt priority for boarding unlike sq also the stewardess didnt ensure that all windows be up when landing though they walk through the aisles in fact its my first time witnessing such a scene not worth the price

i had a great flight with the jal airlines the check in was smooth and gate agents was very nice and allowed me to board first because i am bringing my child along they also provided seamless good customer service and was always very accommodating and smiley throughout the way i cannot praise this airline enough they also provided cute and nice bento set for my child and even gave a free toy on each way of the flight i definitely will choose to fly with this airline again if i travel to japan again
our flight was awesome took off on time and was very pleasant the flight attendants provided us with outstanding service i would highly recommend this airline

i tried st time with jal since i had a good impression with japan and people but really regret because of communication attitude in new york office specialy food and other stuff only i am happy with cabin crew tey are realy helpful

arrived at jal first class lounge at narita around pm for my pm flight and the lounge was not too busy however by pm the lounge was packed and lounge staff had to make announcements apologizing for the condition of the lounge and asking guests to share tables this is becoming a frequent experience with the jal first class lounge in the main building of terminal at narita as the second floor of the lounge is closed for renovations thereby reducing seating significantly having travelled through several times in the last couple of months i have found the first class lounge often to be not relaxing and peaceful at all but instead overcrowded and difficult to find an empty table or seat it does fluctuate through the day so whether one will have a good experience in the lounge will depend on your luck the first class lounge in the satellite building may be better since it is not under renovation yet so if you are unsure of where your gate is you may be better off going to the satellite building first class lounge instead of the main building first class lounge i left a bit early for my gate as i know jal is very prompt with boarding and as i have priority boarding with my one world status i was one of the first to board after the infants and assistance boardings and was quickly settled into seat k window seat in the first row on the right hand side of the plane business class was completely full on this flight so overhead bins were quite full this is particularly the case for the bins over row since there are no bins over the two seats in the middle section of row xx configuration jal uses a b dreamliner on the route but installed shell flat neo seats so it is not fully flat bed and the window seat passenger does not have direct aisle access however in row there is no cabin with the entertainment system in front of your seat so it is much easier to step over the aisle seat passenger window seats are also more attractive on the b than other planes because of the significantly larger windows giving views that would not be possible on another plane eg view more directly straight down below the plane as usual jal served great food on the plane generally the japanese meal is more substantial and more interesting and delicious than the western offerings so i chose japanese meal for my dinner and it was delicious starting with a bento box with different starters and then two mains served with rice i saw a salted chocolate dessert on the western menu that sounded more interesting than the dessert offered with the japanese meal asked whether i could have the western dessert instead and glad that this change was possible for the breakfast served hours before landing i opted for the western meal for a change it was described as a salmon cake more like a salmon patty and turned out to be served with some nicely cooked pasta not soggy it was delicious and i was very happy with my choice despite the short hour flight and the angle flat seats i managed a good hours of sleep as jal was quite efficient with dinner service finishing about hours after takeoff and then also waking up the cabin hours before landing for breakfast service in terms of weaknesses jal does not have a great entertainment system and the choice of movies is not very broad other than hollywoodenglish language movies jal does also offer movies from china vietnam thailand india etc but those only have subtitles in japanese english language movies though can be viewed in a number of different languages with subtitles in a number of languages a negative of row seats is that instead of a large entertainment screen in a console cabinet in front of your seat you have a small screen that pulls out of the center armrest the other weakness is that jal does not provide any seat covers or other special bedding to improve sleep and the duvet that is provided is very light and not very long so a tall person will struggle to be fully covered nevertheless i always highly recommend jal business class as it is priced very well and the service and food are always excellent the washrooms are also in much better shape throughout the flight than with other airlines as cabin crew frequently tidy up the toilets after use

for some reason jal do not operate the boeing dreamliner on the narita to lax route and still use older s they fly into san diego with the at the same time departurethat was the only negative as the boeing is not as comfortable as quiet or as new as the s food service and quality was good and better than most other airlines staff are always friendly and service orientedthe flight left late but arrived on time and baggage arrive intact and relatively quickly

despite being in economy there was plenty of legroom convenient as i live in kona and the flight is direct meals were excellent with premium big island candy cookies and onolicious ice cream i cant imagine what first class is like frequent tea or drink service and snack before arriving in narita free movies as well lots of new movies to view great service and food

we decided to fly from tokyo to osaka before flying home to brisbane on the last leg of our journey we had not flown jal before and were pleasantly surprised at the amount of leg room we had especially comparing it with some of australias airlines the staff were ever so friendly and accommodating the food was delicious with a japanese and western meal offered we were so impressed that we will now look at flying with jal again especially when we travel overseas

my child has a nut allergy and i had advise the airline they were very thorough in their questions in what i need to know about what food rad being served and very aware of her allergies i definitely recommend them as we were very happy with the service

this is a good service that links melbourne with tokyo despite the am departurethe only benefit is the ability to get into tokyo early am the aircraft is a boeing and new and clean the staff are always pleasant two benefits over the alternative carrier qantas is a lower price and better food and service

terrific service from checkin at los angeles to arrival at kansai airport flight attendants were extraordinary and provided superior customer service and attention if i am fortunate enough to return to japan i wouldnt fly with any other airline japan airlines earned a star rating from me for every aspect of the flight even the food was terrific

i took the jl flight from vancouver to narita again which i have done many times before but this time encountered unusual boarding confusion at vancouver there seemed to be people lined up and milling around the boarding pass reader lanes in all directions and jal did not do as good a job of keeping things organized as they usually do that said part of the problem may have been the unusally high number of passengers travelling with infants and young children several wheel chair boardings and at least seniors who needed assistance preboarding as a result of the boarding chaos the plane was a bit late pushing off at around pm there was a long taxi with many planes ahead of us waiting for takeoff so takeoff was not until pm or so but nevertheless we landed around pm slightly ahead of the scheduled landing time of pm that is one thing that i have found in numerous flights on jal they tend to be very good on departing and arriving on time and punctuality is a trademark for the airline the flight was operated using a beautiful b dreamliner but outfitted with angleflat seats in the neo shell flat seat series i took seat k as the larger windows on the dreamliner really make the window seats attractive and with no seats in front of me there was not the usual entertainment screen cabinet to make stepping over the aisle passenger next to me tricky as with other rows row also gives a good vantage point to watch on and quick access to the washroom at the right front of the cabin which many business class passengers overlook in favour of the two washrooms between the two sections of the business class cabin as i had flown the route recently i opted for the western meal instead of the japanese meal i had before for my lunch the beef tenderloin in red wine sauce was good but it does not compare to the excellent japanese meals on jal row seats do not have the larger screens in a cabinet in front of the seat and has instead smaller screens you have to pull out of the center armrest entertainment system was never a strength of jal anyway so i did not mind the smaller screen tradeoff for the huge picturesque window notwithstanding the angle flat configuration i did get a few hours of decent sleep before cabin attendants woke the passengers about hours before arrival for breakfast another little hiccup i had related to my checked luggage i was connecting to a cathay pacific flight the next morning at am and asked if jal could check through my luggage since they are both one world alliance partners and as the cx flight can also be purchased on jal as they are code share partners on the flight i was told by vancouver check in staff they could not check through and i had to pick up my luggage and check in with cathay at tokyo narita however when i failed to see my luggage delivered in narita and checked with ground staff there they pointed out my luggage receipt actually said hong kong so apparently my luggage was checked through anyway i checked with jal upstairs in departures again to be sure and they explained that they can check through for flights departing within hours of my arrival on jal a couple small hiccups on this particular jal flight but will stick with the airline for the route as it is competitively priced to hong kong compared to air canada and cathay pacific and service and food are excellent

i took the short haul flight from haneda tokyo to itami osaka on jl in jclass which is the domestic business class i arrived at the airport about minutes before my flight used my one world elite status to use the very efficient first class checkin and then the dedicated security entrance and lane for first class passengers and top level frequent flyers located just to the left of the checkin counter the whole process was extremely efficient friendly and a surprisingly nice touch for a short haul domestic flight the dedicated security lane was very quick with no line ups so within minutes i was into the jal diamond premier lounge the lounge was huge and the decor was stunning for a domestic level lounge pass the reception desk there is a luggage storage area with keyed lockers to store your carryon including handy roll in ones at the bottom for your roll on board past the storage area and then washrooms is the entrance to the main lounge to the right there was a dining area with some basic foods on offer corn soup miso soup some breads including a curry bun referencing the famous curry that is served in jal international lounges and two kinds of rice cakes then to the immediate left an open seating area with seats that are well designed with a privacy screen between seats and a built in storage area next to the seat for your carryon and finally to the far left a larger seating area with individual cubicles that are very private the cubicle walls are high enough that from the entrance you cannot see the occupants of the cubicles at all equipped with a comfortable arm chair and a little pedestal table the level of comfort and size of the domestic lounge at haneda puts the jal narita first class lounge to shame so hopefully the renovation that has begun on the second level of the first class lounge for jal at narita terminal main building will result in a revampt of that the seating areas in that lounge to at least match the domestic lounge i had to try the curry bun since it is featured in the jal website description and it was very good not very spicy at all my lounge stay was thoroughly enjoyable the flight to itami boarded on time minutes prior to the flight for this domestic flight jal has a small first class cabin with lie flat seats and serves a hot meal even during the short flight for business class or jclass in domestic speak the configuration was on the b i had seat c the bulkhead row right at the door where the second airbridge connects during boarding it was a bit inconvenient as passengers entered right in front of your seat but during flight it was a good seat as the passenger next to you does not need to step over you to get to the aisle and there is unlimited legroom to stretch out the jclass seats recline a bit and also have a leg rest that extends up a bit but only useful if you recline your seat as well as the leg rest does not actually touch your legs or support them when your seat back is not reclined at least for an average height person no entertainment system on this short flight other than music channels at your seat actual flight time is less than an hour so there is not much time for anything other than a simple drink service the flight arrived on time and exit out out itami airport was quick the gate was very near the baggage claim area there was a short wait of a couple of minutes for luggage there are windows in the baggage claim area and i could actually see the luggage containers being removed from our plane and then being driven over below the baggage claim area and then i was quickly out to take the limousine bus with its cheap frequent service to osaka city center transit from itami to osaka is only minutes about half the time that it would take if you flew into kansai airport instead a good domestic business class flight offering that is only slightly more expensive than economy worth it for the less crowded jclass cabin a more convenient arrival airport at itami rather than kansai and an impressive experience at an unexpectedly luxuriously fitted first class lounge at haneda airport domestic terminal

having suffered from qantas and virgins economy class i chose jal premium economy in nov i think some of the things i got was for business class for the small additional fare compared with economy it is value for money but i am not sure how long this could last here were some good things i got a ticket for speedy custom service there was virtually no queue it took about minutes in total to go through custom including security check then i could use the qantas lounge comfortably seats with free breakfast and drinks the leg room on the plan was more than i expected i estimated that the leg of a person of foot tall could not reach the back of the seat in front on the return flight from tokyo jals sakura lounge provided free dinner and drinks there was another quiet and nice area for people to go on the web or rest most surprisingly i got a pass to use the quick custom service when i returned to sydney while other people were queuing for the self custom service i was already out and my luggage was already on the conveyor belt this is the first time that i did not need to wait for my luggage

i usually fly with korean air or air canada to visit korea since my shoulder is not great i decided to use japan airline this time last time i used it was almost years ago i wasnt certain about narita airport for the connecting flight the sign at the airport was great both ways and i had plenty of time to go through security check before the connecting flight food in flight toward pusan was not that great for my taste but on the way back was much better the service was courteous and pleasant i would definitely fly jal if i travel to pusan again if incheon is my destination i would still prefer korean air or air canada

i had a long layover at narita before my flight to vancouver so had lots of time to try out all aspects of jals narita first class lounge i arrive shortly after it opened at am and found that it filled up very quickly i had breakfast and lunch in the lounge and there was a great selection of hot and cold food in the buffet the made to order sushi counter was also opened at breakfast it operates am to pm and then again from pm to pm there was a special treat in the lounge on the day i was there jal was introducing some kind of local sweet made with red bean paste and chestnut and in the afternoon there were a number of reporters crowded around the featured sweet taking pictures after breakfast i used the shower rooms to take a shower the shower room is not very large but does have everything you need and a rainfall showerhead and multi side jets in the shower jal is renovating the second floor part of the first class lounge at naritas terminal main building so the lounge was more crowded than usual around am after taking my shower i had trouble finding an empty seat in the lounge luckily the crowd seemed to disappear quickly too so after an hour or two suddenly the lounge was quiet and fairly empty again i came off an overnight flight and wanted to nap a bit in the lounge but found there were very few seats that you could comfortably nap in most have low backs jal used to have massage therapists giving short back massages but stopped that a couple of years ago choosing instead to rely on installing more massage chairs i used the massage chair once again on one of the minute programs and it was fairly good but still feels like small bowling balls rolling up and down your back a far cry from the real person massage therapists the first class lounge used to have i went to the boarding gate a bit before the scheduled boarding time as jal typically does board promptly jal has special priority lines for its highest frequent flyer levels and offers the same privilege to one world alliance emerald members so i boarded very early and got settled in quickly jal uses a beautiful b dreamliner for the tokyo to vancouver flight but as many have complained continues to use an outdated angled shell flat neo seat it is quite comfortable and actually works quite well but still cannot compete with any of the other airlines or jals own fully flat bed seats service and food as usual were excellent on my flight window seats do not have direct aisle access and window seat passengers have to step over the aisle passenger which can be a bit tricky balancewise when the aisle seat passenger has fully reclined into an angle bed mode however in row there is no cabinet with the entertainment system in front of the seat the screen is pull out from the center armrest so the window passenger can step over the aisle passenger much more easily even if the seat is in angle flat bed mode with the much larger windows that the b offers this is one plane that makes it worthwhile to select the window seat even if it means less convenient indirect aisle access flight was on time departing and arriving jal is behind the times with its angle flat seats on this route but makes up for it with superior food and service

took the morning flight from haneda to itami and was surprised that it was a huge plane and it was full service was good and staffs were friendly all the way checkin was smooth at the airport and arrival was good thinking of using jal for next international trip

what a wonderful airline great service and wonderful food really wonderful id endure the long flight again to eat the food we also came back narita to ord and it was again wonderful they even have wrapped toothbrushes with toothpaste in the bathrooms
very clean very efficient excellent and friendly service no complaints at all will def use jal again

what a great airline the check in and boarding process was swift and efficient the flight attendants were exceptionally considerate kind and professional the food was terrific and the airline has a heart i requested all aile seating on my flights because of certain medical issues that require me to have easy access to a restroom jal was happy to accommodate me and they did on all flights in advance when i got my boarding passes for my return flights i was told they were all aisles great when on the last and longest flight i discovered that i was not on an aisle i mentioned our arrangement to the flight attendant at first after looking she said there no aisle seats available then when i explained the situation to her and even mentioned that jal had a copy of my doctors note on file she left then came back and said she had one aisle seat available and would move me after take off which she did to an aisle seat with leg room and next to an empty seat i was in passenger heaven jal is the best in my book an airline with heart

i took the overnight flight on japan airlines from bangkok to tokyo narita when i checked in i was requested to use a third party lounge rather than jals own sakura lounge until after pm as they said the lounge would be too busy with other earlier overnight jal flights however when i got to the lounge they said it was not overly busy so they admitted me anyway eventhough it was earlier than pm the lounge was pretty packed but there were still seats and table available near the dining area i wanted to eat dinner in the lounge and go to bed after the flight takes off as it was an pm departure and the flight time was less than hours so there would not be enough time to sleep food offering in the lounge was quite good with lots of variety both chicken and beef curry hamburger steak in tomato sauce clams cooked in kimchi sausage fried chicken a bit of a strange mishmash but definitely substantial enough for dinner i noticed also that after i finished my meal a few of the food options had been changed after pm the lounge became a lot quieter as a couple of earlier flights were boarding seating is not fancy but it is a good sized lounge with good food offerings for a business class lounge the flight was boarded on time as is usual for jal the flight was operated using a b fitted with sky suites in business class this is an excellent product fully lie flat great privacy and lots of trays and storage areas to put drinks glasses tablets or phones there is a really clever little storage tray just above and behind your seat with a mesh cover that is handy for charging cords phones and any other small items to be kept safe from falling into the seat sides i noticed that each of the seats has slightly different configuration of trays and storage spaces i had the window seat which is the only one with the storage tray above and behind my seat and by comparison it looks like the window seat has the most usable and useful storage areas i was feeling a bit hungry when i boarded the flight and therefore opted to try the late night sushi snack on boarding cabin crew also asked you to fill out a form indicating if you want to be woken for breakfast and if so your food choice i filled in that i would like the japanese breakfast set as typically the japanese food on jal is better than its western options i did note that while the food is very good it was noticeably inferior to th earlier flight i took on jal from osaka kansai to bangkok probably because the japan based food caterer is better than the bangkok based one i had a very good sleep during the flight as the sky suite is very comfortable for sleep the flight was scheduled to land am and arrived a little early by the time i walked from the gate at the satellite terminal to the main terminal the first class lounge was just opening at am so the timing was good i enjoyed this overnight flight very much service is excellent and the seat is very comfortabel for sleeping in an overnight flight there was also lots of privacy and with direct aisle access from every seat i was not disturbed in my rest

booked the flight without knowing much beforehand and it took us by surprise the little touches made by jal before taking off the crew wave goodbye at the ground with a banner wishing well thats a first time experience what made it lovely was the seafood meal choice that was made available to economy class too and for all seafood lovers pescatarian could be another option staff are polite and helpful generous with amenities when you asked for it the screen restarted a few times and the crew actually mailed vouchers as an appreciation after we got back service standards only downside is the leg room pretty tight for their planes would definitely fly again and recommend jal
wow from service to food to legroom everything was tasteful classy and perfect i cannot wait to fly this airline to asia again thank you
