made a very quick last minute trip from tennessee to singapore on november the flight did not arrive in singapore from narita until am the inbound flight to singapore was nice the regular business class seats that on jal are not the best the service was great and i was able to sleep after a hour flight from dallas to narita the return from singapore days after was much different same air craft but the service was slow i was on seat a window single seatit took more than minutes to get something to drink had to ring the attendant bell several times to get someones attention it was the same for the lunch service slow and no sense of attention to the customer at least that is how i felt on another note their intercom announcements are excessive and disturbing it is hard to see a movie with the amount of constant interruptions that have no significant meaning next time i will take my i pad with my own movies to that i dont have to hear the a flight attendant that loves to hear her self talk out of for jal

we are just at the end of a trip around the world and in the process have flown a number of airlines on different international routes of all the airlines that we utilized this japan airlines flight was the very best that we have experienced boarding was very quick and efficient directed by immaculately dressed and very polite personnel the seating was comfortable and although in economy class almost roomy the food excellent and the service throughout the nine hour flight most attentive as an added treat there was a japanese breakfast that provided a most authentic taste of the real japan hats off to japan airlines for a job very well done

i joined a group of friends traveling to japans northern island of hokkaido for a holiday as the flight was short and we were holidaying we elected to buy the cheapest tickets available which we located on vayama one thing that i appreciated was the rather generous baggage allowance for such reasonably priced tickets kg per passenger arrival and checkin at tokyos haneda airport went smoothly and we had time to grab lunch before boarding clearing security was very efficient with a minimum of delay or hassle very different from the usual tsa rigmarole and boarding was swift and orderly the aircraft was a boeing and seating was i found my window seat to be comfortable enough for a hm flight and the plane was very well maintained take off was on time and soon we were flying high over honshu while there is insufficient time for meal service in economy class a complimentary drink was offered and appreciated arrival was slightly delayed due to weather but japan airlines acquitted itself handsomely with the quick delivery of our baggage all in all the good efficient and courteous economy class service of japan airlines is fine especially for rather short domestic flights in japan

cozy seat and nice meal especially japanese set lunch and sake in business class you can order your nd meal anytime from your seat video controller you do not need to call flight attendant this system is very convenient

are we glad that we booked jal business class for our return bkknrt flights both flights were on time the food and service were up there with the absolute best in the sky the cabin and seating were spotlessly clean the flight attendants really made the journey that much more special with their attentiveness and friendliness nothing was too much trouble and all delivered with genuine and sincere smiles the seating outbound was the shell flat neo which was perfectly adequate and the return leg was the impressive sky suite boasting a lcd monitor we should add that the sky suite is the best business class product weve ever had the fortune to be seated in we very much look forward to flying with jal again in the future

this is little late as we travelled oct but due a stroke on return it has taken some time to get this written more to follow on our trip to japan first time booking frist with any airline but this was a special trip and a surprise for my wife we were directed to the private checkin area and boarding passes issued very quickly we were then exported through a private security screening and then straight into the first lounge the facilities were amazing the flight was called and we headed to the gate boarded first as pax offered champagne nice touch the fight hours a hit towel before lunch service a hot meal and more champagne the cabin service director welcomed us by name and ensured are journey and requirements were taken care off absolutely spectacular crew who all spoke english the food and beverage were excellent
flight was smooth and aky was cleanand blue and everything was in order and we had a great short flight

initial flight was from shanghai to tokyo and i had to change planes to get to la the plane was almost an hour late in leaving shanghai and i was going to miss my connection in tokyo i asked the flight attendant about it and she said not to worry when i arrived in tokyo a woman from tokyo airlines was waiting for me with a sign with my name and escorted me to security and then to the gate for my flight to los angeles and i made my connection on japan airlines without any problems it was superior service and stress free it was my first time flying japan airlines i usually like to fly qatar airways when if fly overseas i am from the usa i was pleasantly surprised and would fly with japan airlines again

very nice the foods was good the staff always asking you what you want and i will fly again via jal from narita to manila philippine the best airlines and hoping next time they give souviner for their passenger i heard some of the passenger they ask can we bring this blanket
legroom was spacious and food was nice it was really a good welcoming feeling to fly for a holiday to japan staffs are nice both on board and at the checkins

i flew economy plus from boston to tokyo on the very comfortable and spacious seats with a large monitor and usb charger the staff was excellent and attentive the food was also very good one of the best flight experiences i have had in a while close to hours but very comfortable

when flying to south east asia you have many options for me it will always be jal premium class for only a few dollars more jal premium class offers many luxuries lounge wider seat with foot rest and separate line for ticketing in all my years of flying i found jal one of the best experiences followed by lufthansa what made this flight stand out was the combination of professional kind diligent warm attentive but not obtrusive service this premium class flight was booked through american airlines and was less expensive then most airlines flying to hanoi

what i admired most about japan airlines jal was their staff whether it be at the checkin at the gate or in the cabin they were all wonderful kind courteous and helpful it makes me wonder why other airlines cant be like jal their inflight meals werent great and movies on offer were not good either but these minor deficiencies were all overshadowed by marvellous hospitality shown by the staff their website is not user friendly and online check in was impossible if jal can rectify these shortcomings they could easily be one of the top airlines in the world
flight attendants were very attentive to our needs the food was awesome flight was smooth even though we were seated at the back

i flew business class from guangzhou can to tokyo hnd on japan airlines jal the flight was on a boeing i selected jal based on lowest price excellent value for money for the business class airfare time of day departure and the nonstop direct service i departed from guangzhou instead of shenzhen as the price was less by about rmb my seat was very comfortable and roomy and the cabin service was impeccable very friendly japanesegraceful attentive and helpful the food quality was very good and the portion just right for me inflight entertainment options were average

this is our first experience with jal we expect good service simply because it is a japanese airlines but the services we received are beyond our expectations flight attendants are friendly and cheerful cabin is clean and comfortable food and beverage is ample and delicious this made our hour flight from lhr to hnd totally pleasant and enjoyable we look forward to another flight with jal highly recommended

the sakura lounge level at narita international airport was huge and the service amenities were awesome plenty of beverages snacks best place to chill until my flight gate jl was ready for boarding my seat k was already prepped with an amenity kit a blanket a pillow and noise canceling headphones i definitely enjoyed the nice headphones since i didnt have one myself the amenity kit was great for a short redeye flight i also got slippers a shoehorn the entertainment selection was uptodate and had western asian options the seats had a comfortable adjustable headrest a padded seatbelt i had a ton of leg room a leg rest an adjustable footrest and a center divider for some privacy ive never sat in an airline seat with so many footrest options the seat was also wide instead of reclining backward it reclined forward so that it doesnt disturb the person sitting behind me cabin crew was attentive friendly jal premium economy seats were a huge upgrade from the economy seats i have sat in jal economy seats and the premium economy seats were a million times better i would definitely fly jal premium economy again

i am so glad i quit flying emirates and i gave jal a try the service in economy class is simply stunning all these new middle eastern airlines can do what they want their flight attendants are simply not up to the job in addition the boarding is super smooth unlike the madness at dubai airport or in doha on jal the flight attendants show the amazing tradition of hospitality of japanese and the food is excellent even the japanese snacks during the meal services are great

it has been a very long time since i flew jal over years and i have to say ive been utterly impressed by the excellence of the service way above sq and cathay pacific the cabin is pleasant but the food is really the best ive ever had in economy class and the flight attendants are amazing

the economy class seats on this flight were very comfortable with lots of leg room compared to other airlines flight attendants were attentive friendly and always smiling i think it must be a directive that they smile every time they talk to you the food was good for an airline full meals and a snack wine and beer are free

jals newest aircraft has configuration in its business class and offers great convenience all isle access and comfort full flat and side table for longhaul flights japanese food is great with nice chardonnay wine elite member has access to cathay lounges which are the best by far at the hongkong airport

we booked business class on this our first trip into japan on japan airlines seats h and k as soon as we sat both seats reclined back too far into an uncomfortable position the flight attendants recognized this was a problem and called for technicians to fix our seats they quickly arrived and without even examining the seat simply said in broken english normal very normal and walked off the aircraft there were lots of smiles and apologies from the flight crew but no action i have flown around the world a couple of times and i know what a business class seat or any aircraft seat should feel like in an upright position it should not feel like i am lying down the flight was just over a couple of hours and my old back took a beating but i must say the flight crew were gracious and attentive

every year for my satogaeri trip to japan we have travelled to and from narita but this year we have decided to travel back to the uk via haneda using jal just on the inbound flight our outbound flight was by finnair before this i flew with jal before but operated by finnair or ba i think and didnt get a good trip this time i flew back from haneda to london heathrow with jal operated airline my honest opinion was that on the whole i did enjoy the trip back to the uk this time and the services ranging from airline food inflight entertainment system and so on were good legrooms the most important of all for me was the legroom on the economy seat as everything depended on it for the duration of hour flight which would be bound to cause extra strain on myself as i age on all annual trips to my relief jal operated fleet does provide a good and wide enough legroom for economy class seats so i was very pleased with it even with the reclined seat by the person in front of me this time again i still had enough leg room to stretch my legs which was good but the only snag was the reclined seat got me a shorter distance between the flight entertainment screen and my eyes and i had to keep my head away from the screen to give me the right distance for correct angles and viewing the tilting of the screen didnt help me in this case flight meals i think jal were quite generous in providing more than sufficient amount of meals to passengers on this flight jl i think i have an average appetite just like other people but the long haul flight can influence my appetite quite easily too on this flight i did enjoy the meal that was served first after the takeoff from haneda the choice of meal was adequate it was either beef or chicken dish with rice and i chose the latter and enjoyed itbut it was quite a heavy meal with good amount of rice and chocolate mousse as a desert we were also provided with a small pot of hagen daz ice cream after that the meal was served really quickly and all the food with trays were removed swiftly afterwards then about half way through the flight journey we were woken up again by serving of another light mealwhich proved to be quite heavy for my stomach it was a oval shaped bun with tuna mayo filling i love tuna mayo but my stomach was still digesting the previous meal when this was served hours later but being a glutton for food i couldnt refuse so i consumed it which turned out to be a bad mistake then about hours before the landing we were served for the final time another supper my stomach was still full with previous two course meals in it but i couldnt say no to this meal either as jal was serving ÂêâÈáéÂÆ∂„ÅÆÁâõ‰∏º which i never had before as a flight meal i dont know what non japanese passengers thought of this last meal but i was quite intrigued by this meal as this company yoshinoya was ubiquitously known in japan like macdonalds in early s i think selling their best selling product beef bowl with rice gyudon and i never had a chance to eat any of their product until this flight timing was unfortuante though as my palate was somewhat paralysed with full stomach which struggled to operate and i could just taste the beef and egg sauce all i remember in this flight was feeling queasy and full stomach air circulation and temperature within the aircraft the only thing i would seriously complain in this trip was about this matter i noticed quite a number of passengers were sneezing several times and i found the temperature in the aircraft really hot in fact for the whole journey i was feeling really hot and regretted i should have come in with short sleeved shirt i wonder if i was one of the few passengers who experienced hot air during the whole journey inflight entertainmment system the selection of entertainment was adequate for me i would normally read a book or listen to my own personal audio player anyway so i didnt miss much even if there werent enough choice in the flight system but i think the improvement was made for the touch screen system i wasnt keen on this screen when it was first introduced because if you had a passenger behind you who would use the touch screen in rocky manner heshe would simply punch the screen to select deselect each time and i would be the victim of being punched at the back for the whole hour journey that would be my nightmare it did happen to me once with codeshare flight however on this journey i only felt some light tap a few times from behind and hardly noticed it most of the time or maybe i was lucky to be seated with a very considerate passenger behind me overall this trip from haneda to london heathrow was good and pleasant despite the lack of sleep as i always experience on every long haul flight the only other comment i would make is about the seating plan in this flight the fleet had a seating plan of left centre right seats in most rows in economy class at the checkin counter we both wanted aisle seats and we were told that we would get aisle seats as there were two seats but when we got into the aircraft we realised we were allocated one aisle and the seat next to it middle seat we didnt minds getting two aisle seats with front and back and i think the jal staff who served us possibly misunderstood us but we relatively had a good and almost problem free flight on this trip so we would certainly consider jal to be one of the possible candidate flight carrier for our journey next year we have used finnair for the past few years and their service has been equally good too but with the brexit situation in the uk yet to be settled we would have to find out what each airline could offer next year

i flew from sydney to narita and then on to jfk its a long flight but jal is a good choice the seats in premium economy are a little bit bigger than the economy and the cabin crew were delightful flying premium economy allows you to enter the lounge which is nice
one of the best airlines service was great their flight attendants are very accommodating i felt relaxed during our flight from manila to tokyo
jal is my choice of airline when i travel to asia service is great from check in counter to crew on the plane

i just flew from toronto to tokyo with air canada and then tokyo to bangkok with japan airline the service and experience was night and day difference japan airline even offered very delicious meal very happy with japan airline and even the flight attendants are so cute

when youre on a flight of hours one would expect a comprehensive selection of movies what a disappointment i know we were on an old plane i think but thats no excuse for jal not to download some current movies applicable to the demographic of its business class customers the staff were friendly but their service was a reflection of lack of numbers the food was average to poor quality jal must be into some serious costcutting exercises we hate to think how bad conditions in economy might have been
premium economy seats the nonstop flight on a and the always smiling and always helpful crew has turned me into a japan airlines advertisement

comfortable and full equipment seats make passengers relax staffs in nice uniform and manner look neat all services are attentive and helpful safety mind comes first especially checking overhead luggage compartment throughout the long flight it is worth for money and time

most comfortable economy seats ive ever seen the configuration also meant not having to clamber over someone to go to the toilet like everything japanese everything was as advertised although we were late taking off arrived slightly early

this is a great company i had two checkedin luggage places included by default in my ticket extremely convenient and not expensive they could have better variety of films and free wifi on board cmon it is st century but everything else was perfect the jet was brand new to make the window dark each window had a button with smart glass extra cool also the service was greaet

this was our rd trip to asia on jal every trip was a pleasure to travel on this airline service is great seats are roomy and one can do hour flight comfortably food was good only thing needed little more selection of food at their lounges in asia we highly recommend this airline

i originally started my journey in kuala lumpur but this review is about my flight from narita to lax on jals i had a tenhour layover at narita so journeyed to shinjuku and spent a few hours wandering when i returned to the airport i found my way to the fast track security and i was airside in about minutes being a j class passenger youre afforded access to the wonderful sakura lounge for those in the know however you also have access to the admirals club cathay pacific lounge and the qantas business lounge if youve the time i highly recommend loungehopping the qantas lounge is super quiet since their flights are redeyes when i checked in in malaysia the agent asked if i wanted an aisle seat instead of middle i declined because i read the middle seat is actually very private when i checked in at narita the agent also asked if i wanted an aisle instead of middle trust me for this flight youll want a middle seat boarding promptly began at in such an orderly fashion boarding begins with passengers with children and those that need extra time then first class and upper tier mileage bank members can board followed by business class on their there is a forward intimate biz class cabin there are only seven seats in this area i highly recommend you secure a seat in this forward area flight attendants came round with welcome drinks and i helped myself to some champagne while it doesnt seem like the middle seat provides much privacy once the dividers go up youre in your own little world whats also great is you still have aisle access after takeoff cabin crew came round to take meal orders i opted for the japanese menu and a lovely sauvignon blanc i love jal cabin crew because theyre not only friendly but theyre incredibly gracious i highly recommend the japanese meal its beautifully presented tasty and the ingredients are topnotch i really enjoyed the root vegetables simmered in broth after the meal service youre able to order snacks from your seat why dont more airlines offer this technology i ordered a katsu sandwich udon soup and ice cream my flight attendant brought it out about ten minutes after i ordered it my only one complaint is i found the entertainment to be lacking while there are new movies on board i didnt have much interest in them though i enjoyed the japanese movies sadly our hour flight came to a close we landed and taxied to our gate i paid for this oneway flight highly recommend jal

nice food drink and service recommend crystal champagne blue tea Á£ØËá™ÊÖ¢sake food japanese food is priority i have to say i am so lucky to have all crews to serve me and another customer at first class ÁæéÂ¶ôÁöÑ‰∏ÄË∂üÊó•Ëà™È†≠Á≠âËâô‰πãÊóÖ ÊàëÈÅ∏‰∫ÜÊó•ÂºèÈ§êÈªûÈÄôÁµïÂ∞çÊòØÈ¶ñÈÅ∏ ÊàëÂπæ‰πéÂøò‰∫Ü‰ΩøÁî®Ê©ü‰∏äÂêÑÁ®ÆË®≠ÊñΩ Âõ†ÁÇ∫ËÉΩÂú®‰∏ÄËê¨Ëã±Âì©È´òÁ©∫‰∫´ÂèóÁ±≥ÂÖ∂ÊûóÊòüÁ¥öÁöÑÈ§êÈ£üÂ§´Âæ©‰ΩïÊ±Ç

i tried an overnight flight on jal from osaka kansai to bangkok departing past midnight at am and arriving at am i was a bit worried about the overnight flight as the flight time was not very long and i was worried about getting enough sleep to be functional on arrival my worries were misplaced as i actually slept very well on the flight we departed on time taxied for a while and took off around am and arrived about minutes early at about am jal uses a b dreamliner with angle flat shell flat neo seats while the angle flat seats are of course less comfortable than fully flat bed seats and as the shell flat neo do not give direct aisle access for all seats i found my seat h in the first row on the aisle to work quite well for this flight the flight was completely full in business class and the passenger beside me in k appeared to be quite ill with a cold or flu so he was sleeping even before the flight took off and rarely moved from his seat during the flight on boarding cabin staff distributed breakfast preference cards so passengers can select whether to be woken for breakfast and what they wanted for breakfast i selected being woken for breakfast and the full japanese breakfast set soon after take off i reclined my seat to its full angle flat position and slept soundly for about hours out of a slightly less than hour flight time because of the time of the flight eventhough business class was completely full and there were children in the section it was very quiet throughout the flight about an hour and a half before landing i was gently woken with a pat on the shoulder for my breakfast i regret not having collected my senses to take photos because the japanese breakfast set tray was simply stunningly beautiful in presentation even small pieces of vegetable were carved into the shape of a maple leave and colored to give a more beautiful presentation to the meal not only beautiful the breakfast was also delicious especially memorable was one of the many starters offered in the bento box which consisted of a slightly more solid tofu with a wasabi sauce topped by a couple of shrimps the wasabi added just the right interest to the tofu prior to arrival cabin attendants distributed priority lane passes to all business class passengers allowing them to use the very fast no lineup priority lanes for immigration at suvarnabhumi airport my suitcase was delivered within a few minutes of my arrivingn at the baggage carousel and i was out to meet my ride within about minutes of the doors opening after landing

i took a domestic connecting flight from narita to osaka itami airport on jal and was pleasantly surprised that jal chose to use a b with sky suite flat bed seats for the short hour or so domestic flight the sky suite is very luxurious and comfortable since it can convert into a flat bed and as it is very private with the seated passenger well shielded from the aisle the configuration is xx with the window seats alternating with the flat console on the window side or on the aisle side i was in a which is the better window seat as the console for my seat was between me and the aisle giving me additional privacy there is a storage cabinet next to me on top of the console and a storage slot under the video screen for your smartphone or tablet sky suite would be a very comfortable seat for a long haul sleeping flight and so for a short haul it was clearly beyond expectations due to the short flight time there was just a simple drinks service which was carried out with jals usual grace and politeness also due to the short flight time there was no video entertainment program eventhough all seats had video screens we departed on time and arrived on time an excellent beyond expectation short haul domestic flight

i took the jal afternoon flight from vancouver to narita on a boeing dreamliner configured xx in business class with the two window seats without direct aisle access as the plane was fairly full in business class i opted for seat c since it would be easier for the window seat passenger to step over me because there is no seat in front when i reserved my seat a was unoccupied but unfortunately it was occupied by flight time nevertheless with no seat in front i was not disturbed when the window seat passenger had to step over me to access the aisle the usual complaint applies that jal chose to use a beautiful new plane in the dreamliner for the route but install outdated angle flat seats in business class i slept a little bit on the flight but not deep sleep but i think it was more a matter of the flight time during the afternoon and evening rather than the angle flat seat c does get a bit more traffic passing by it as there is a washroom in front of it past the galley but it was not excessive as there are two other washrooms behind the first set of business class seats the relative ease of step over for row seats is counterbalanced by the negative that your video entertainment screen has to be lifted out of the divider between the two seats and therefore you cannot continue watching entertainment during landing as you are required to stow your video screen as usual service is superb and food is both beautifully presented and delicious there are both japanese and western meal offerings and while the western offerings always sound tempting as well i almost always opt for the japanese meal since they seem to be so much more substantial with many more items coffee on jal in business class is a special blend only offered on flight in business class and it is one of the best coffees i have had in the air so i always enjoy a couple on a flight jal is very good with time management and boarding management so we departed on time and arrived a little early i did have an issue on this flight in that when my priority tagged luggage showed up as the first suitcase delivered to the luggage carousel it was damaged aside from some indentations in the soft sided suitcase the entire pull out handle was missing and there just two wires sticking out of the tubes from which the pull out handle would have been extended i reported the damage to jal and they sent me to jal lost found located outside immigration and customs and next to the domestic checkin desk i told lost found my suitcase was severely damaged and hard to use without the pull out handle and i had a connecting domestic flight to catch in about minutes time they offered me a replacement suitcase but they only have one type in two colors and it was a very solid but very heavy hard sided suitcase weighing more than lbs whereas my usual suitcases are light soft sided suitcase weighing less than lbs i had no choice but to accept the replacement suitcase as my damaged suitcase was not really usable for continuing my trip on the domestic connecting flight so i took everything out of my damaged suitcase and put it in the replacement suitcase luckily the replacement suitcase is a full inch large suitcase so there was plenty of room for all my luggage contents i should mention lost found was extremely polite in handling the problem and thorough in helping double check my damaged suitcase once i transferred all my belongings to make sure nothing was left behind lost found also advised that they would arranged for the destruction of the damaged suitcase once i left lost found then required me to sign a form acknowledging i received a replacement suitcase and told me i would not be able to claim compensation for damage since i received a replacement suitcase i told them i would take up the issue with jal after i get to my destination as i felt it was unfair that i was forced to accept a heavy replacement suitcase that i would not normally buy and be unable to claim for part of the cost of a replacement suitcase similar to the one that was damaged and that would be what i would normally use when i arrived at my destination i did contact jal through their website and initially their response was the same as lost found in denying any compensation because i received a replacement suitcase after some back and forth explanation i am glad to report jal did accept i did not have a choice but to accept their replacement suitcase and that the replacement is not what i would buy for myself or use normally they agreed to compensate me for part of the cost of my damaged suitcase which i accepted as a very fair handling of the situation in summary while i did have an unexpected unpleasant experience of finding my luggage has been severely damaged in transit ultimately jal handle the matter well gave me a replacement suitcase to allow me to continue my travels and made a fair agreement to partly compensate for the damaged suitcase as the replacement was not what i would buy for myself

the customer service was at an excellent level the crew is very very friendly the flight was also new nothing to be complained about their service only a couple of points that i had concerns the first thing is the bag holders on the roof was shivering at the take off and landing i dont know if its natural but i was concerned the second thing was that as it was a japanese flight some food was not to my taste other than that i highly recommend this flight
we travelled to japan on japan airlines to tokyo the whole experience was excellent check in check on food seats staff efficiency and courtesy were all wonderful highly recommeded
very long hrs flight on b dreamliner brand new aircraft comfortable roomy seats for economy premium nice added amenities excellent food service very accommodating cabin crew

comfortable and enough space for seat attentive and kind crew movie choices were uptodate special request for diet vegan from osaka itami was carefully attented not the usual food served for vegetarianvegan was different patty with rice and a chocolate cake dessert definitely specially made nd time from singapore to japan and will continue recommended

team members were pleasant during check in the sakura lounges in honolulunaritabangkokthe team members at the entrances could be more welcominglounges served very little food compared to other lounges surprised that some of the flight attendants onboard were not more helpful with stowing the overhead luggage powder rooms were well cleaned before another guest enters japanese meals could be tastier the layflat beds would be more comfortable with even a thin padding

we flew jal to get to bangkok this was by far the best airline ive traveled on so far others i have used are american airlines steer clear of that oneim american too china southern cathway pacific china eastern korean air and united jal is the best clean lots of leg room in economy perfect and proactive service and friendly authentic smiles i had to fly american on my way back and wished i could have jumped out of the plane with a parachute not really but wished i was back on jal for the return

jal have a small number of companion two persons travelling together fares for seniors in business class we have used this method of flying for the past years the flights are during daylight leaving sydney in the morning arriving in narita tokyo in the afternoon an overnight stay in an airport hotel at jal expense leaving the following morning for europe helsinki london frankfurt paris arriving in the afternoon at your destination jal use the latest boeing with very comfortable flat beds the food is excellent both japanese and western the service is great you also get entry to airport bisiness lounges and as a bonus when you look out the window you see a vast snow covered siberia with large rivers and mountain ranges absolutely superb try it you will not regret the experience

the journey was a long one hours there and hours back so comfort was key i recommend that if you can afford it you upgrade to at least premium economy if you want to sleep i was travelling with my five year old son overnight for the flight out so getting some sleep was important he slept for about six hours but was very uncomfortable as the seats to not recline much and there was nowhere for him to rest his feet other than on me i did not sleep at all in premium the seats recline more and a footrest comes up in business you get fully flat beds on the positive side however the service on the flight both ways was excellent staff couldnt do enough for us snacks and drinks were left out for us between meals and my son was thoroughly spoiled with toys and a special childs meal which was bigger tastier and more fun that the adults one i cant fault my food though and it was nice to get japanese food there was a decent range of films and tv to keep us both entertained although there could have been a few more childrens films available on the whole i would recommend flying with jal a pretty painless experience for what could have been a hellishly long and horrid flight

my alaska airline frequent flyer miles purchased the business class ticket the food and service were subpar and generic the plane landed safely good news the jal flight was my only option when using frequent flyer miles so i did not really have a choice of airlines

i was supposed to fly with economy class however for some apparent reason that didnt bother me all seats had been taken up when i arrived for my checkin japan airlines did the favour of escorting me to premium class which i was not expecting at all service or japanese hospitality was charming and nothing out of the ordinary my only advice for the future is to provide halal option there is an increasing demand for this and even the vegetarian option did not leave out foods not suitable for vegetarians and people of religious faiths

it was my first long haul flight so i was pretty nervous japan air was absolutely incredible from start to finish the staff on board were incredible and couldnt do enough for you constantly offering drinks and snacks the food was delicious and made me incredibly excited for what tokyo would hold i fell asleep at one point and an air hostess actually turned my tv off and put a blanket on me ridiculously sweet highly recommended

i got lucky and got the exit row so i had lots of leg room the in flight entertainment was great with a nice selection of music and movies the food was really good and they had the snacks and drinks flowing what really makes this airline is their employees they are so kind and accommodating i would most definitely fly jal again

do not think this airline caters for anybody taller than ft the seats do not recline just the base moves forward food was not to my taste even after staying in japan for weeks eating local food i have no idea what they are thinking serving a burger that looks and has texture of rubberdisgusting
the new jal on a dreamliner in a window seat business is as good as many first class offerings noise level low and seats beds excellent and great and nonintrusive japanese service keep it up

overall the people were fanatastc and professional the comfort of the cabin seating layout was dated and cold the seats were lay down but hard as concrete and not enough room to lay sideways comfortably the entertainment was also difficult and combursome to navigate the food was marginally better than cafeteria in business class the plane coming from narita to taoyuan was the worst seats i have ever been on it reminded me of my grandfathers broken recliner horrible design and broken seating adjustments jal will get you were you want to go but i hope the review their competition the pillows are so small its comical the blanket is thin as a sheet the details matter in business class other airlines are offer more for the same price

the service on japan airlines is simply superb as is the food the equipment on this flight was very modern for example you could darken or lighten the windows by your seat by choosing from a point darktolight dial the flight attendants are exactly that attentive and theyll speak to you in any language you prefer theyll even open the conversation with a caucasian in japanese if thats what he suggests no problems with luggage either it arrived very timely

excellent customer service thank you japan airlines for such an amazing customer support a few days before i was facing an issue with my flight cancellation but i literally want to say thanks to this tollfree number for helping me as the experts guided me instantly one of the best customer support till now i highly recommend japan airlines

the food was just ok we had trouble understanding much of what the japanese stewardesses where saying the configuration of adjoining seats where not aligned so my wife and i seemed to be artificially separated
best company i ever flight delicious food on board cheerful staff very comfortable aircraft check in without any problems and delays
aircraft presented well and crew were very friendly took off at scheduled time and landed similarly even it was only an hour flight light refreshments were served along with drinks
traveling first class on jal but they dont connect to pretsa system so am waiting minutes in line somehow they dont have a contract so dont fly them until they do

excellent outbound onboard service from purser horiuchi hubby went to sleep right of narita and when he woke minutes to landing in honolulu horiuchi was already waiting to serve him is kaiseki meal inbound we were delighted with masako our chief cabin attendant senior sommelier who looked after us very well sky suite beds are definitely an improvement from the sky suite we noticed that window seats have much larger footwells than the middle couple seats avoid the middle seats if you are tall cons again cabin can be on the warmer side bathrooms werent as impeccable as the last time we flew pillows can be more substantial and a mattress pad would be absolutely appreciated

i ended up on the flight as part of a trip to hong kong korea and japan this was the last long haul leg and i usually use this leg to adjust back my body clock so good sleep is essential to be fair i make multiple long haul flights a year in either business or first class and with over years of doing this i have seen all the seats and all the levels of service across many airlines so maybe i am just getting picky but this is an old configuration that few still use and on pretty much my favorite aircraft dreamliner this was very surprising these days business is pretty much across in a pod style arrangement with large screen full lay flat and usually a mattress pad etc however this flight was across so you are sitting right next to your fellow flyer no privacy screen and seats that should have been banned years ago these are the seats that recline to about degrees have the hump in the middle and the flip out footrest to catch the continual slide that the angle causes they are by far the most uncomfortable seats ever put in business class and the inventor should be made to sit in one for painful hours every day and then apologize to all flyers who ever used one multiple complaints and grumbling from passengers and it amazes me the japan air considers this acceptable so i did not sleep ended up with back ache and once off the bed of torture swore i will never fly this route with this airline again these seats were so old fashioned they even had the screen that comes out of the arm rest and sits at a crooked angle food was mediocre service excellent stay well away this is just cheap old fashioned seating and cram as many passengers in travel that most abandoned years ago

excellent service clean comfort on time and wider passenger seat the stewardess offered us to take our picture it was very nice i love this stars excellent airline for sure i will put in the top priority for flight to japan

we asked about an upgrade from economy to premium economy at check in the cost was each sydney to tokyo which we gladly accepted access to the lounge was not included the jal service was impeccable from check in to exiting the plan the seat was very comfy with lots of leg room the configuration was seats across in configuration all other airlines have seats across on the in a configuration really nice food the toilets remained tidy and clean throughout the flight jal is now my favourite airline

as is typical with jal it was a good comfortable flight leaving from san diego only one flight a day is easy for us as we live in the area further it avoids the indignity hassle maltreatment and general nastiness of going through lax i regard lax as to nations worst airport as regards service and the connection between domestic and international flights stinks perhaps a bit too much food was served but other than that nothing to fuss about a nice feature is a washlet in the loo which i have not seen on other airlines

i have always used japan airlines for japanchina trip i have nothing but faith for the airline great service good meal inflight entertainment and almost always on schedule what more can you ask for the airline if you are travelling to japan try them once
when i took flight from tokyo to kona that day was my birthday so clue gave me miniature airplane and some gift with their message it was great memory

totally love jal for having flight attendants so polite lots of leg room in the plane everyone have entertainment if front of them and headset is provided the foods are served warm and healthy they sure take good care of their passenger from babies to seniors excellent
the food was great and service was good too for a fair price would definitely take again and recommend for others

for our first trip to japan we flew with jal and had a really great experience both flights between boston and tokyo going there and coming home were smooth and efficient the crew is very polite and friendly it was one of my most pleasant flying experiences
its not exactly business class more like premium economy not very comfortable seats just soft drinks in paper cups
its not my first time flying with jali just love and feel safe traveling with this airline that is why i always recommend it to my family and friends

i flew from london to tokyo with japan airlines for the first time i have to say i received excellent customer service very attentive excellent quality food and drink although i did find a hair in my meal but they changed it very quickly and i love the fact that the seat dont recline but you can amend the chair up and down avoids any confrontation cabin crew were always on hand to answer any questions they were polite friendly and were very welcoming a typical trait of the japanese i will definitely fly them again as their entertainment system was one of the best ive encountered

while it was all so very polite lots of bowing etc the actual service delivery was just average for a start very few of the cabin attendants spoke reasonable english which made communication difficult the magazine had so many languages that i couldnt easily ascertain how some of the equipment worked also the airline seemed to treat their own nationals better than westerners it was impossible for us to preselect our seats and only sterling efforts by our travel agent had us seated reasonably together another couple was not as fortunate being separated by seats and an aisle when one travels in a premium class it is not much different to walking into a restaurant i am used to being offered a drink after i board the plane as happens on all of my other international flights on this flight there was no service for an hour while this might have been acceptable to a passenger starting their trip at narita we had come from berlin and had been travelling for about hours already that said the actual plane a dreamliner was fine and the seat comfortable because flights from australia to almost anywhere the level of service is so important to me and my wife jal failed the test my wife now even wants to fly qantas although she has been critical of that airline in the past

got a great deal on japan airlines premium econony as a leg flight from melbourne to london i was excited to see it included lounge access which meant a chance to freshen up in tokyo however even though we booked the whole journey through japan airlines it was only afterwards we learnt the tokyolondon leg was codeshare and a british airways flights this meant no ability to select seats or preselect meals which can be done on british airways it also meant no access to the lounge at narita even though we thought we had booked a jal premium economy ticket because of the codeshare we were not eligible fun to find out when exhausted after hours flight the flight itself id have given stars to great seevice by staff food was okay plenty of room in the seat would have liked a bit more recline and extension of footrest but that was fine got some sleep would have got more but as with all flights there was a crying toddler at least our return flights are all jal so lounge access is fine
first time flying jal i was quite impressed and would gladly fly with this airline again the service and value were top i highly recommend this airline

the flight was in midnight but all the staffs were nice and friendly the entertainment resources were good with many movies music however its better if they provide english sub to english movies also need more albums of new music

bucking the trend here to say the premium economy seat on jals is one of the most uncomfortable seats i have ever sat in whilst the rest of the jal experience was excellent the seat is awful the seat is as hard as nails i was constantly having to readjust my position because i was sliding on the seats fabric when the seat was in the recline position and with no inbuilt foot rest it was nigh on impossible to maintain a position consistent with sleep my bum was numb after hours of a near ten hour flight i wont be flying with jal again which is a shame because the lounge the food the cabin crew were all excellent
flight departed on time seats were comfortable im crew was attentive food was great and flight arrived on time

it was a long haul from dallas texas to ho chi minh in business class most of all i enjoyed wonderful services the hardware of japan air business class from dallas to narita with private seat but from narita to ho chi minhs unflat seat a in flight and k of flight as expected jal crew deliver top notched service especially ayano takeuchi flight from tokyo to ho chi minh i want japan airline recongnize her genuine personality with professional service most of crews are super excellent but her service was outstanding with fluent english i must point out floor carpet and divider units of are bit outdated and quality of main meal the quality of dinning and limited selections of movie in inflight entertainment must be improved immediately it was worse than previous fly and quite short to meet jals reputations over all i enjoyed and thanks to jals flight

i have flown with jal for every japan trip i do both economy and premium economy are wonderful comfortable and convenient i do love the extra leg room for premium though the service is the thing that always stands out for me staff go above and beyond and are always kind and helpful the food is also delicious will always fly jal for my japan trips

i had the first row in premium economy class there was a big space from my seat to the wall that separate us from business class i height cm wasnt able to touch the wall with my foot even when reclined cas were graceful
ive made this trip many times but this was the best yet for comfort service and promptness cant fault it one bit

i was in first class seat g everything about the flight was fantastic i actually flew round trip from jfkhnd and the hnd to jfk leg was much better in terms of soft product the food was a notch better because they enlisted chefs from michelin star restaurants to cater the menu men received a shiseido mens facial care kit in addition to the standard amenity kit and women received some extra facial mask the lotion inside the amenity kit was too fragrant the seat was wide and comfortable we even got to dine together one of my favorite f class products the inflight entertainment system can be better selection was decent but the handset was hard to use
love to fly with japan airlines my hours in the sky was amazing the staff are nice the food very good and tasty the inflight entertainment is great just love it

i have always heard great things about jal so i was excited to try it for the first time jal was worthy of the hype the staff from ground agents to flight crew was exceptionally courteous and polite waiting at the gate the flight crew passed by stopped turned around and bowed to the passengers before boarding the plane boarding started minutes prior to departure and was so efficient that the plane was backing out of the gate with about minutes to spare there was ample overhead bin storage available even though my family flew economy class there was more legroom than we are used to on american carriers the seats were comfortable as the plane left the gate the jal ground crew on the tarmac lined up waved and then bowed to the plane and its passengersthe food and beverage service was very good much better than we are used to passengers are even given slippers the cabin was clean and there were multiple entertainment options available the inflight service was excellent deboarding the plane was also very orderly and efficient i dont know why boardingdeboarding takes so long on american carriers the flight departed on time actually ahead of time and arrived on time actually ahead of time the service on jal is over the top my family and i are flying on jal again in a couple of months it is definitely worth it

first time to travel with japan airlines and i am now a fan cost of airfare is reasonable considering that my checked baggage allowance is consisted of bags kg each staff are courteous and respectful from the time i checked in until the plane landed at my destination for someone like me who frequently travels economy seats are so roomy and entertainment selection is a delight food is fab my stomach and my palate were happy and most important is the restrooms are roomy and very clean with what i have experienced so far would definitely fly with jal again and would recommend it over and over again

this was an overnight flight from melbourne in a b it left just after midnight and there was minimal flight service no offer of a turnin hot or cold drink passengers were just tucked up on their very good flatbedsthe is getting s little dated although this aircraft was in tiptop condition in the cabin and the toilets the cabin attendants were reactive rather than proactive all in all a classy operation frayed around the edges

my flight was delayed by about an hour but i was able to arrive on time coming back to ny i love the service they were very helpful and respectful you can get full bottle wine and can of beer during your meals i love how they put snacks near the restroom area and you can take as much as you want they served drinks throughout the flight i thought the food on the flight was just ok the portion was a bit small for me i thought they would have some sushi but they didnt i was a bit surprised when they served a hotdog as a full meal i was very hungry still after eating that i wished they didnt turn on the light so much they give out haagodez ice cream the seats were very roomy i love how they made the pillow with a neck rest but they didnt have good movie selection
enjoyed every moment of the flight the attendants were professional and their services were just excellent they set the bar very high

took the overnight in pa i had preselected my seat but was asked to move to accomodate a family i of course did but it meant being penned in by the window as the fellow passenger went straight to sleep it made for not the best experience i also found the flight warm and quite stuffy but perhaps due to my circumstance tv choices were good i hadnt experienced before not having a takeoff meal there was a notice at checkin re being presented a snack bag on boarding which indeed they did you could also get a noodle cup if feeling peckish overall i think jal offer a good direct service returning in economy on the day flight so will see how that is

as a handicapped passenger i couldnt have been treated better at both airports wheelchair service was offered and the handlers were very courteous everything about the flight was very good except the food it was likely good if you like japanese but its not for me

my wife and i recently flew business class melbournetokyo it was a waste of money the business class lounge at tullamarine airport was a shared arrangement and quite ordinary the plane cabin layout was cheap looking and the seats narrow sleeping on the overnight melbtokyo sector was very difficult our vegetarian meals were all cold and largely tasteless the only saving grace was the very friendly and efficient cabin staff on top of that not necessarily the airlines fault one of our cases was damaged however dealing with jal ground staff re repairs is inefficient

if one remembers singapore airlines inflight service in the old days you would have a point of comparison with japan airlines the inflight service is superb including the food premium economy was completely full as an indicator i asked for a midafternoon snack so the stewardess brought me jals own original udon de sky noodles accompanied by a halfbottle of french champagne

jal has amazing staff both on the ground and in the air due to an approaching hurricane all flights in and out of kona were delayed by hours we were expecting that to be the case with our flight too which would have totally upset our plans in tokyo surprisingly we took off right on time and had a very smooth flight thank you jal

what a pleasant surprise to be told that our premium economy seating allowed us to visit the sakura lounge at both the melbourne and narita airports almost as nice as the business class lounge the service and quality of the food served on both our inbound and outbound flights to tokyo were outstanding and i found the cleanliness of the bathrooms the best of any airline i flew on

its my first time riding jal and im quite satisfied its on time flight crews are very good and always with a smile food is very good if you love japanese cuisineits more than what i expected domo arigatou i will ride it again next time

the second experience with jal was not quite as good as the first the outbound flight from bangkok as usual struggles with ground services the business lounge stinks of curry rice not great at the best of times and quite revolting early in the morning the boarding procedure is deficient all passengers use the same to have their ticket and passport checked before entering the boarding lounge at least boarding is separate but airlines need to raise this issue with aot the desk was built to allow two lanes why not use it that way drink service on the outbound commenced hour after take off and meal service about hour and minutes food quality and general service is as different as night from day outbound versus inbound flight information page on vod was not available seat was uncomfortable with limited functionality and not the best if you suffer from claustrophobia or unless you enjoy sleeping in a coffin

my friend and i had a most unnecessarily distressing and anxious journey during the first and second stages of our round trip booking with japan airlines my friend is a sixtytwo year old pensioner who suffers from anxiety and depression he has also recently had a bypass and open heart surgery i am an year old pensioner and my friends carer this trip was planned especially to be a relaxing holiday for both of us where we planned to stay with my sister in the united kingdom and then spend four days in tokyo on the way back to sydney australia we booked our flight through italktravel cruise blue mountains australia who sold us the package japan airlines jap jl jl british airways jl jl we accepted this even though on our first stage we would arrive in tokyo at narita hours on august and depart the following day from tokyo narita at hours a stop over of hours our travel agent was quite clear the the package included jal arranging the transfers to and from overnight accommodation paid for by jal the booking also required wheel chair services for my friend on every section of this round trip journey both my friend and i were looking forward to a most relaxing and enjoyable trip to help us recover from all the worry and anxiety we had gone through as a result of my friend having open heart surgery and a bypass operation in april this year at sydney international airport we needed to advise the jal personal that my friend needed to be wheeled from the checkin to the qantas lounge then to the aircraft this was then arranged a short while after takeoff we were given the customs forms to complete these required us to indicate the address at which we would be staying while in tokyo as we did not know which hotel jal had booked us into we told the flight attendants that we expected them to advise us where we were to be accommodated during the stopover this would have been about one hour after takeoff the flight attendants stated that jal never arranged for overnight accommodation for their passengers and that this should have been done by our travel agent we showed the flight attendent our booking itinerary which clearly stated once flights have been ticketed jal will provide confirmation for your stopover the flight attendants insisted that jalnever ever paid for passengers overnight accommodation we explained to the flight attendants that because there was such a long delay between flight jl on th august and flight jl the ba flight on august a stop over of hours jalhad made this package to sell the tickets this constant insistance by the flight attendants that it was not jals responsibility to provide our overnight accommodation caused us extreme distress as we did not know what we could do when we arrived at narita airport we asked if it would be possible for us to use the jal sakura lounge and stay there overnight no this was not possible we were told at no time did any of the flight attendants offer to communicate with jal or our travel agent to confirm what we had believed to be and what were in fact the arrangements fortunately we noticed that wifi was available on the flight we tried to send an email to our travel agent but it failed to go this would have been now some six hours since we boarded the flight we asked the flight attendant why the email could not be sent and were told that we would need to pay for the service having then paid us we sent the email to our travel agent within thirty minutes of our email to our travel agent a jal flight attendant came and apologised and showed us the message they had received the message read to jl re stac pax case the pax already has a hotel reservation harroad international hotel narita twin bwed room pax do not need to pay additional fees thks from nrtoo this confirmed everything we had been saying ever since takeoff why did jal flight attendants not contact jal to confirm what we had said right at the beginning of our journey it would have saved us having all the worry and anxiety for the entire journey so now just before arriving at tokyo we were able to try to calm down however this was not going to be the end of our troubles on the morning of the th august we arrived at narita airport at about hours we went to the jal checkin and inquired about the wheel chair for my friend the jal officer said that this was the responsibility of british airways ba and advised us to go to the ba check in counter we stated that as we had booked our flight with jal it was jals responsibility the jalofficer telephoned ba and then told us that ba would provide the wheel chair service for my friend when we enquired if ba would take us to their lounge we were informed that as we were travelling premium economy with jal we could not use ba lounge we asked if we could use japs sakura lounge and were told that we could not as our flight was with ba we insisted that as our entire trip was with japan airlines this seemed absolute nonsense for if jal had used one of their own aircraft we would be entitled to use the jalsakura lounge again the jalofficer insisted that this was not possible we stated we were prepared to pay for the use of the jalsakura lounge or the ba lounge if necessary again we were informed that this was not an option finally after over one hour of discussion and our trying to reason with jal personnel the jal officer contacted her manager thank goodness that this lady jal manager used common sense to immediately organise a wheel chair for my friend and we were escorted to the jalsakura lounge at narita airport once again we had to suffer unnecessary anxiety and stress for a good hour before the matter was resolved to our satisfaction our entire premium economy round trip from sydney australia via tokyo japan to heathrow united kingdom with return with stop over at tokyo japan then return to sydney australia was booked with japan airlines why did it take so long for japan airlines personnel to provide us with the service we had paid for and expected to receive as premuim economy passengers these flights with japan airlines that we had anticipated being a most enjoyable start to our four weeks holiday became a horrendous and dissapointing experience the food provided by jal was absolutely disgraceful for the price we paid it most certainly did not cater to the european palate the only positive aspect regarding this flight was that the jal premium economy seating was wide comfortable and most satisfactory as the seats were able to recline without encroaching into the space behind our official conplaint to japan airlines with a request to upgrade us for our entire return trip was rejected all we received were apologies and assurances that jal staff were expected to know that jal did infact pay for and provide overnight accommodation when there are delays between connecting flights two very dissapointed customersmy friend and i had a most unnecessarily distressing and anxious journey
