i fkew with southwest aa delta aerom√©xico av√≠anca star per√∫ and that far aerom√©xico was ok but japan great food excellent service crew good tv do far great at all

this is actually update from my previous review on jal and im downgrading it as it did not get any better as i hoped in my view the incabin service is only part of the whole experience and i dont think its too much to ask that if you decide to buy air ticket and fly from a to b it should not be too much hassle well it was a tremendous hassle with jal and im sure will be with anybody if you need anything but just vanilla flight laxtokyo or nyosaka im flying to okinawa hopping there to kume and ishigaki islands as well i have spent many hours for several days trying to book these flights the web site would not allow that multidestination reservation would not work giving some cryptic errors the japan explorer discount program reservation would not work either and when finally i was able to at least reserve trip between tokyo and naha it was more expensive than just regular flight i finally was able to get it done through japanese site guessing on what kanji characters might mean there finally i bought round trip ticket and discovered later on that my return flight is not the same as direct flightit actually goes through the wrong airport and i have to transfer within very limited time frame from haneda to narita and no assistance with transfer is provided nor can i rebook the flight from naha without paying exorbitant fee though multiple flights directly to narita are available on the same date so now i will have a very stressful time and a chance to miss my flight from narita to lax unless paying another for rebooking at the very least the web site could warn customers that particular flight requires transfer waiting on phone whopping hr for customer service does nothing to make the whole experience less unpleasant and to top it off when i filled the contact form on their we site describing my poor experience hitting submit button brought beautiful access denied you are not allowed to email from this server message at this point i could only laugh first time im flying jal and sure the last one all i need is to buy ticket and get where i need to go making it a battle and adventure is not it why did not i choose cathay pacific or singapore airlines a little longer stay in hong kong on the way but judging from my experience no hassle seems i need to learn things hard way if you are like me sure try jal the only reason i rate it stars not one is that inflight service and accomodation is fine though not exceptional

this was the second time i took jal the reason it was the second is because the first time was so pleasurable and i could take a jal coded flights all the way through from buffalo to hcmc last year i took jal from kennedy and appreciated the friendliness of the personnel and the efficiency of their boarding once on board the entertainment was sufficient for a halfway around the world flight and the meals on board were surprisingly good who ever thought that texmex beef served aboard a japanese airline would be better that the asian selection consumed by an asian plus narita airport is quickly becoming my favorite place to refresh during a layover after a long flight from now on i m going to try an book on jal whenever i have the opportunity
the seats were tiny the air hostesses were like tiny pinyatasbut adorable the geisha girl costume costume worked for me

the staff on board the from lax to kix were fabulous one out of four ordered the japanese menu but the western menu of beef was far better the seats on this plane are so hard and so short dont lay flat that the ride was not a comfortable one immigration at kix was not as bad as we had read line moved quickly currently you can only go out of the airport via a train that was a fairly miserable train ride after a hour flight we got off at the first exit to meet our driver but it is very confusing which exit to take therefore taking more time when we were tired if you have a driver meeting you get very explicit directions as how to which exit at the train station drive to kyoto was another hour and a half in hindsight maybe a night or two before osaka before we headed to kyoto would have been better

took the flight from singaporenaritasingapore on the er jal skysuite seat is surprisingly wide with good legroom for economy class and even better for premier economy i find it so much comfortable than qatar and sq er which i traveled last year not much comparable on the food though i like the variety of jap beers they offered the services and attitude of the crews make this airline great to travel prompted to requests and always served with great smile show us an excellent customer service we felt your warm hospitality and definitely our first choice for our next travel plan
good timing and great legroom great service good timing and great legroom great service good timing and great legroom great service
cabin crue very kind comfortable flight good facilities altough in economic class can bring bagage good n nice servis all is good perfect
japan airlines has problems but is once again becoming better and better with their customer service food and onboard service is excellent

irrespective of which airline wins skytrax or any award japan airlines wins the respect in all categories the crew is awesome helpful curtious and will help you in case of any issues especially food or any other kind i would like to travel with them wherever possible without any other option

i travel a lot this was my rd trip to asia so far this year i have taken emirates singapore airlines and american this trip was the worst ever flight on september th food was alfull comfort of the seats was less than average size of seat is fine for a small person but not a foot american most flight attendants did speak english they listed wins on the menu but had of them on board then the white wine was not cold i could go on just flight another airline

highly recommended our flight from yvr to narita then narita to manila was such a great experience more leg room and a window seat gave us the comfort and easy flight very friendly and helpful and happy staff
very comfortable great service will happily fly this jal again multilingual staff were greatly helpful when selecting food

due to some inexplicable snafu we werent able to have our baggage transferred directly to sapporo from tokyo so we had to collect our baggage from london then have it reloaded we had priority collection and then the jal staff processed our ticketing very quickly we made the sapporo flight in adequate time and then had a very enjoyable flight to sapporo we were most grateful that ba and jal recognized our predicament and that they acted promptly to sort it out

my flight from narita to bangkok is jal number or american flight i have an aisle seat in coach hopefully it wont be super tight its the next day now it was super tight and hard to even semistretch out i could not even get my computer bag in my seat when sitting there the person in front of me put the seat back and i literally had no room it might have been the most cramped i have ever been on a flight attendants were nice but being cramped so badly didnt help also i am a sapphire with american airlines platinum pro and jal did not even let me pick my seats out i was assigned these seats the day of the flight with no input i dont get this at all i usually fly business or first class and i would have upgraded to business on this flight but was given no opportunity to do thisso on this flight from narita to bangkok there were empty seats in business i would have upgraded for sure if i was given any chance to dobut again i was not from now on i think ill just fly cathay pacific from the usa to asia i am flying back with them when my business is done in thailand and they worked with me several months before my flight to give me the best seats available due to my sapphire status with one world alliance i just dont understand jal and why they refused to work with me they might have just lost me forever

my flight from ohare to narita was flight number on japan airline and flight number on american airlines i came very prejudiced to this flight due to the fact that jal would not let me procure a seat prior to the day of the flight i called american and jal the day before i flew and jal said i had not paid enough money for my flight to be able to pick a seat i paid about for the flight and i am a platinum pro sapphire with american and one world partners alliance i was not very happy and on top of that i flew with jal in march on the same flights to bangkok and i did pick my seat out early jal said if i was an executive platinum that i could pick my seat outit worked out ok for me as they assigned me a seat the morning of my travel and gave me an aisle seat in the middle bulkhead the lady in the bulkhead on the right side of the plane wanted to stow her baggage under her seat so another guy with the seat behind the bulkhead myself and this nice lady from the philippines changed seats and i was given the seat i desired a long time ago no one is in front of me and i can stretch out easily now the attendants on this flight are super they are a great reason to fly jal they are super helpful and always have a smile and go out of their way to make you feel like you are the only person on the flight also the meal we were just given blows other airlines food out of the proverbial water i received a course meal and every course was great my initial headlines were going to be never fly jal but i am changing the crux of my article thanks to the great people i have mentioned above i will write later about this ongoing flight we are just leaving north america and still have quite a ways to go im back just had a snack these flight attendants are busy as bees in a hive and as nice as you could be im laughing now as im typing as i have done a on my original intent for this story these are the nicest and best flight attendants i have ever had the privilege of working with and i have flown an awful lot they also put out a piece of bamboo with a towel over it for people to stand on and relieve different stresses in their body they also posted a graphic on what part of the feet corresponds to different parts of your body this has been a great flight and im actually going to post some pictures of this flight and that is highly unusual for me they also have a cool wine label for their white and reds its using different vinifera from france its called double zero i also took a picture of a snack box they put out for all of us with the sign please help yourself we have been flying now about hours and its gone pretty quick great great flight
the crew were kind and friendly they provided good food and drinks the only disadvantage was it was too cold inside the plane i was glad to fly directly from narita to san diego

this review is for booking and preflight customer service with jal i regret not reading through more complaints about jal before booking on their website my issue has happened to others with shared code flights my husband and i booked our first leg with jal for our honeymoon we went onto their website for the booking at no point during the booking process are we informed about not being able select seats on the flight until checkin but that ended up being the case we called up jal and their response was that we probably missed the bit where we are informed about no seat selection possible we went back and went through the online booking process again and cannot find a statement that informs us about no seat selection until checkin for that flight we called back again the agent on the phone this time said that is the type of flight we booked and they cannot do anything except to add a note about that we wish to be seated together and informed us we can pick seats upon checkin time on the side all the calls have min wait time so far when it comes to harsh seat selection policy we feel that if this is a short flight fine if jal is a bare bones budget airline then fine if this is not our honeymoon then fine except this will be a long haul international flight with a supposed star service airline for our honeymoon jal is beyond disappointing for us in the booking process not only are we not informed about critical information that could help us decide we cannot seem to get any help in correcting a situation that we did not create so to sum up only fly jal if you are aware their online booking can miss critical pieces of information such as no seat selection available until flight checkin time when something goes wrong preflight you may likely be dealing with rigid non helpful customer service

we took the flight from sin to boston via narita both sectorcrew were very good and efficient they were attentive and also friendly aircraft were well cleaned and thru out the flight the flight stewardesses were coming out with drinks very pleasant flight even though the cabin were a bit warmth i do understand that the japanese like the cabin warmth but do spare a thought for the other passengers that are not japanese after all this is an international airlines

to start off jals business lounge at singapores changi airport is no better than the breakfast you get at a budget roadside motel in the united states very disappointing compared to the lounges we experienced on a four week asian trip the business class seat there was no first class on this flight was pretty tight service was efficient and impersonal not once did the flight attendant ask if we needed anything i was in the restroom when dessert was served and was never asked if i cared to have some when i returned to my seat this is not what i would expect from jal but maybe my expectations were too high

premium economy on jal was terrific the service is impeccable the extra leg room and seat size helped stay comfortable on the hour flight i wish the lower leg foot rest raised a bit higher but that would require a whole design change the food was quite tasty and the overall experience was amazing
the flight is good service is also good being a vegetarian the flight serves tasty hindu veg meal overall good experience

flying on a leisure trip from delhi to tokyo we were glad to choose jal as the in flight service experience was simply amazing best so far first of all economy seat comfort and leg room is way better than its any other competitor international airlines cleanliness on point as expected but what impressed us the most was the awesome customer experience by the cabin crew being a vegetarian and forgetting to prebook the meal had little issue with the available nonveg choices but the crew was so courteous that they went over the top and made us quick vegetarian snack with the things available with them sandwich sort of thing and feeling so sorry about us not able to have proper meal had it been some other airlines they would have hardly cared for that also dazed off during breakfast meal they put a hand written note to inform them once we awake to have meal as per need instead of just passing by or putting the food in the seat pocket simply amazing experience

due to the distance we decided to try premium econ i would never fly economy again the seats were roomy and very comfortable and as well as having headrests there was a personal led light for reading the windows had a colour change to block the sun if necessary the food was quite enjoyable for airlines and the wine list had very good wines and a champagne the staff were very polite and helpful as well we had access to the flight lounges i recommend jal premium to travellers if you want a comfortable tripand st class business are out of your price range
customer service to the core from supporting the customer right from check in counter till making feel like home till landing is the experience you will feel while you fly jal
right from check in counter to welcome aircraft seating comfort hospitality with overall options like entertainment dining makes a worth to travel
meals were average not much legroom the seat was uncomfortable the flight was on time flight attendants were very friendly

have travelled with jal many times and just love their skysuite in business class one feels cocooned from the rest of the passengers the service is excellent and the food is good can thoroughly recommend this airline

flown on jal from sydney to tokyo and return over times each experience has been faultless ive only realised how good they are until i flew on an airline inferior to japan airlinesjals service and comfort is always exceptional arigatogozaimasu

took japan airlines for our first ever trip to asia great service by grounds crew the flight crew were in a totally different league though excellent service they answered every customer call promptly and provided everybody whatever they asked for it was amazing to see these petite ladies put all size of luggage on the overhear bin the seats were a little cramp no legroom for the tall foreigners and not comfortable for the hour flight my butt hurt for a week after we landed the food was not very palatable though especially to an american palate cuisine is mostly geared towards asian travelers and no alternatives were provided even the chips were seafood flavored i used the bathrooms after we took off and i was surprised that it smelled like urine that was a turn off otherwise it looked clean and had enough supplies sanitary napkin toothbrush etc overall it was a pleasant ride

enjoyed an overnight direct flight from melbourne to japan not having a stopover and thus shorter travel time was great the airline serves alcohol free of charge and for airline food is better than the usual staff were welcoming and service was good

this was my first trip to japan and i chose jal as they are supposed to have a bit more leg room in economy the flight times also suited me as it is an overnight flight and as there is next to no time difference you do not lose a day traveling the first leg from adelaide is a qantas flight to melbourne then a bit of a wait until you board the jal flight around midnight it was quite comfortable in economy but i would probably opt for a cheaper flight as it was not that much better in leg room the overnight flight was great for me

the staff could not have done more to help out and make sure we were comfortable they even had cardigans for us they are to borrow not keep which helped when the temp fluctuates in the airplane nice and dark all passengers were considerate to keep shades down as long as possible food was fair but the service shined

i just return from sapporo japan flying with jal airlines this was my sixth trip to japan being twelve international flights plus twelve domistic flights to sapporo i all ways fly with jal my first flight to japan was with qantas six years ago which is a good airline but as i have a cultural interest in japan now i find jal provide the experience i like flying economy is not so bad price is right for a direct flight to tokyo only hrs i am not interested in cheap flights that take you about or more hrs with stop over in other counties eg hong kong jal provide a good service with good in flight service i all ways request an aisle seat leg room is ok better than being cramped in a middle seat food is mostly japanese style airline staff always friendly and help full all normal airline facilities jal also have a frequent flyer program to earn points for future flights i will continue to fly jal
excellent service and on time departure and arrival very scenic flight down to osaka staff are very friendly and courteous can thoroughly recommend flwith jal

all i could say is this is the most comfortable economy seat i have ever flown on a domestic flight despite there is no individual tv but they offer unlimited free wifi inflight i would love to take jal again

the plane is very comfortable smooth and feel safety while on board i was request for muslim meal and the crew very concerned about that they explained why i didnt get the ice cream or the same sandwiches which is for me that is sweet the same experienced when i flow back to the country thank you jal

this flight left tokyo haneda at in the morning for an eleven hour journey cabin crew helpful and polite plenty of leg room lights dimmed in cabin on completion of drinkssnacks easy for sleeping only one meal served which was prior to landing at heathrow once again i commend cabin crew for service thankyou

we flew home from japan on the japan airlines er business from tokyo to nyc the plane got great reviews onlinebut not from me there are business class seats and they are acrosswho would want to pay for business and sit in the middle unless youre a party of the window seat gives the most privacy but you and the flight attendant have to squeeze between the the seat next to you for access its a bit claustrophobic in there and the width of the seat is narrower than most it does provide a flat bed seat and the flight attendants are great but the plane seems old and worn out some of the compartments were kept closed with duct tapeno kidding probably the worst plane ive been on in business class

staff were very helpful and went out of their way even to the point of running after us after checkin and asking whether we would like to a free upgrade to premium economy my first international flight with jal but will definitely be back

they clearly put a lot of effort into service and i have to give it to their flight attendants they did a great job and were courteous and professional throughout our flights the plane going to tokyo had plenty of legroom for my husband who usually complains of cramped legs the food options can be found ahead of time on their website so you know what youre looking forward to overall would recommend

premium economy on jal is probably the same as business on ba the seats were very comfortable there was a lot of leg room the entertainment was great with touch screens that actually worked we got given noise cancelling headphones slippers eye mask ear plugs and toothbrushtoothpaste the service was very attentive and friendly as expected we also noticed that the air quality was much better in our area and much less noisy as compared with economy we had a stroll through to stretch our legs the windows had a special filter so you could still see the outside but were darkened so that we could sleep if we wanted to we flew with our year old son and though it was much easier in this area with lots of room the seat partitions and arm rests werent movable so we couldnt lie him flat across two seats for his nap this would have helped him sleep a bit more comfortably this problem will resolve itself though once hes grown up a bit it is definitely worth flying this class if you want a good journey and not to become too tired on reaching your destination everything was so efficient and neat even our buggy was put in a plastic carrier bag to protect it when loading on to the plane the seat arrangement was it wasnt busy at all and it was nice that they didnt fill the seats by giving upgrades to economy class selfish i know because you do have to pay quite a lot more for these seats we got given some nappies and snacks for our son and his first hot meal was great chicken and mash with broccoli very good for young child for some reason he didnt get a second hot meal when the adults got one which was a bit of a shame but we just shared ours with him it would have been great for him to have a meal with us as we used up all our spare snacks for this as well i would have given it an excellent rating if we were able to use seats to lie him down and for him to have had a meal with us if youre travelling as adults with older children then this would have definitely been excellent
this is very good airline great modern planes and great inflight entertainment and on board meals and beverages as well will be flying with jal airline again
experienced a lovely trip very courteous service nothing was too much trouble only negative is they need to update inflight entertainment to more contemporary and current
great flight service was excellent very attentive attendants food was good seat space was better than many other airlines
great airline the food was fantastic the service was really good i would certainly travel japan airlines again

cleared customs at narita then caught a bus across town to haneda seamless transition from international to domestic notwithstanding the requirement to change airports smooth flight to osaka picked up luggage and walked on to train

this was my first time on a jal flight and the experience was quite positive flight attendants were all smiles and friendly and not to mention finally some decent plane food and most importantly my flight was on time too
helpful checkin staff and very friendly cabin crew first time flying with this airline and if the opportunity arises will fly with them again

was able to choose seats at no extra cost nice clean modern cabin staff very professional and welcoming loads of films to watch onboard was easily able to book vegetarian meal in advance and noted different options for other dietary requirements veganglutenfree the food was the largest airplane meal ive ever had and tasted very acceptable also served with proper silver cutlery very comfortable for long haul flight would use again

nice food and amazing customer service legroom is better than other airlines they offer a variety of drinks including alcohol and food only bad thing about it their entertainment is not so up to date worth the money you pay

jal made my trip perfect the service is great the hostesses are so kind and the meal and wine menu are just amazing i couldnt have hoped for a better flight thank you so much to the company and the team this day

overall a good flight experience the service was very good the flight was on time and for a tall person cm i appreciated the adequate leg room in economy the only disappointment was that i checked in at osaka itamy on a domestic flight which was excellent but late and had a very tight connection in tokyo i arrived in melbourne on friday night but my luggage did not come until monday no one had contacted me and i tracked it down after making several phone calls as they could not guarantee delivery by monday evening i went to the airport to actually collect it myself it had been sitting in the luggage agents office for two days it was fully labbelled with name and phone number etc

this was the first time ive flown premium economy with any airline so i was interested to see what it was like departure was delayed as a result of electrical storms in the area unavoidable of course but the flight was about hours late in departing and for well over an hour we sat there without the offer of even a glass of water not impressed the range of movies on offer as ok if you dont normally see many food was patchy dinner was quite good breakfast was pretty ordinary the seat itself was quite comfortable and there was plenty of room more so because the seat next to me was empty the crew were friendly and efficient id like to travel premium economy with another airline in order to make a more valid comparison
i have flown several airlines in business class and jal rates at the top as far as im concerned most comfortable seats variety of food and drinks outstanding service

i took my granddaughter who dislikes flying to japan for graduation in june i splurged and got the premium economy seats we also took the nonstop flight it was an amazing experience the service was spectacular the entertainment system was supurb the food was excellent the long flight mostly comfortable and my granddaughter didnt have to use any of her motion sickness antidotes our tickets allowed us access to the first class lounge in boston and it was a superior place to wait for the flight unfortunately in japan there were no premium lounges but that was okay i will definitely make this trip again

our return flight to melbourne with jal was as good as expected from our previous outward leg flight with them quite efficient courteous staff make the journey effortless would fly with them again the only grumble is the fiddly in flight entertainment system control additionally more information on the available movies music would be good both minor issues really a more substantial pillow would also be good

i will highly recommend to fly jal to tokyo we flew fro sydney to tokyo in march and the flight was terrific the hostess were very polite helpful and well mannered the service and the food was very good in flight entertainment was of great quality and the seats were very comfortable with plenty of leg room i will fly again with themwell done

loved my flight on jal esp the layflat seats from tokyo to hanoi i wish they had those on the run from yvr the service was impeccable and a nice touch was when the cabin crew came around near the end of the flight and said something personal about each passenger the jal lounges were also comfortable and wellness stocked i had a whole day in natita coming back so not only got great info to go into town but was refreshed before getting on my next leg of my trip thank you japan airlines it was my first time with you but not my last

modern aircraft comfortable seats and great leg room for an economy class service is excellent bathroom kept very clean all though the flight the food was a bit disappointing but ok inflight entertainment not the best ive experienced but again ok overall a very pleasant experience and a big stepup from qantas at least on this route

jl return from melbourne with adl mel arranged by jal with qantas good flight good service and no problems even qantas were good this time for the first time in ages weve had problems with them in the past and their so called customer care has been more like do not care

much better value for money when compare to cathay pacific and the food and beverage is great just a pity that their in flight entertainment was a bit boring and the collection of movie is very limited

the service is excellent but they still have those terrible chairs in business class the chairs do not go horizontal completely and there are very uncomfortable i would understand if it is old equipment but the fly the new

this was a great airline to travel on premium economy was excellent with very comfy seat plenty of legroom and the food was pretty good the crew were super polite which you would expect of a japanese airline i discovered at checkin that if you book economy you can upgrade to pe at checkin for a very reasonable price if there are seats available
had a very smooth flight from manila to narita airport food was great presented by acclaimed chefs although there was a wait checking in it was a good flight all in all

jal is prompt efficient very neat and clean helpful and respectful this is total professionalism at its best as exhibited by the pilots flight attendants and ground staff they may not know english very well but will try their best to help you they will bring you to someone who speaks english and will also show you the way in contrast to some chinese airlines i have tried like china southern airlines or china eastern airlines you will get a feeling that they dont care about you at all i tried to ask help from some ground staff in shanghai but the lady seemed annoyed at me that i couldnt speak chinese i look very asian by the way not only that they do not speak english well but possibly due to a lack of training in people skills their attitude could get very rude so kudos to japan airlines keep doing what you do best being respectful to everyone i highly recommend jal

food collection is great service staff very friendly though compare to same route air ananda this plane model isnt as modern and seat isnt as comfortable id still choose jal for their staff friendliness and good quality food

very good flight experience i especially liked having seats only on the side for window and aisle no middle seat the flight departure and arrival times were good for each end of the trip the service very good too entertainment was varied and very good too overall it was a very good flight experience in economy class please note that i am short so the leg room was not a concern for me but tall people might be concerned the cabin ceiling height makes the plane feel spacious

had round trip flights on jal with three legs serviced by america airlines bought jal as it was the cheapest option offered via airtkt and the difference in service was could readily be seen between the american airlines legs and the jal legs the jal flight attendants were more attentive and kind jal also had a memory foam pad to use on one of the overnight legs and they made all the difference on ability to sleep comfortably when next head into asia will look to fly jal again

we actually flew with an award ticket business class to narita japan and coach back to dallas tx business class was wonderful the seats reclined completely and amenities service were a treat we werent lucky enough to snag business on the return but we had a two seat arrangement for our coach seats jal economy seats are wider and less pitched than many airlines notably one world partner aa it made the long flight home significantly more tolerable in economy food was interesting noodles for breakfast on the return but hey going all out for an authentic experience i definitely would fly jal again

i was terrified of flying for hours from boston to tokyo however after my flight with jal i am totally comfortable and doing it again in years they were on time the seats were comfortable they gave me a blanket pillow and headset the staff could not have been nicer and the food was delicious my favorite part was the entertainment they had so many movies shows and games i stayed entertained through the entire flight then i did it again to get home now i cant wait to go back

read that jal economy seat is the most spacious and won world no economy seat and since my favorite singapore air does not fly direct to hokkaido prefer direct flight for my trip thought i might as well take the chance to try out jal it was indeed spacious it was the most spacious economy i had ever tried but then again the comparison could be limited as i had flown on just sq thai cathay lufthansa ana eva china airline air nz silkair and the budget air scootjet starair asiaexscoot tiger it felt as spacious as scoots business class that i taken before perhaps is due to the very slim seat design which has well thoughtout features in line with what the japanese are famous for their thoughtfulness and consideration for others the meals served are on par with sq and the airhostess sevice are ever gracious and attentive i would definitely start flying to japan on jal please note when booking choose the flight that offers these jal sky wider economy seat not all flight will have these seat and i think most of the jal domestic flight in japan will not have these seats

exceeded our expectation in the quality of service provided staff were very helpful and obliging on the ground and in the air i would travel with this airline whenever it services the destination we are traveling too
attentive crew much more space could stretch out your legs didnt feel like the usual can of sardines

i would definitely recommend jal the flight crew members were amazing the bathrooms were kept very clean roomier leg space than some of the american airline i would choose this airline anytime without hesitation

having flown with jal before i rated this my best flight i didnt hesitate to fly with them again to japan i like the more legroom than an a qantas great service and food although the bread roll should be fresh looking forward to my return flight

the flight over was during the day which was great staff pleasant and seats we ok the tv has plenty of entertainment to keep you occupied the flight home was during the night for hours it would certainly be better if the foot rest on the premium economy seats would go level as trying to sleep you would slide down so made it very uncomfortable the seats reclined more than economy but still i feel they could improve when the seats go back they slide into themselves so dont encroach on the person behindthe food was quite ok and the toilets always clean would definitely fly again with them but pick a day time flight we were lucky enough to get into the business class lounges before boarding which was an added bonus we had two different planes

jal had a wonderfully caring crew on this flightthey really made my daughter feel welcome american airlines made zero effort our had good seats unlike the american airlines flight with horribly immobile seats good flight good service i would fly them again

the only downside of this trip was having to change airports in tokyo and collect luggage get a bus and then check in again i would have thought that premium economy passengers might have had their luggage taken for them however the lounges at haneda and narita were exceptionally clean and well stocked with food and drink the pe seats all the way to europe and back were very comfortable and in the dreamliner pe passengers had their own tollets

always a pleasure flying jal excellent service friendly crew food was okay but better than other airlines free alcohol always a plus love the small touches like disposable slippers and toothbrushes they include

the cabin service and food offerings are absolutely top notch the cabin staff really go out of their way to make the trip as comfortable as possible while the entertainment options maybe fall a little short of some rival airlines and are more geared towards the japaneselanguage market their core customer there is still plenty of choice the jal sky suite is an excellent businessclass product but try to avoid the middle seat in center of the aircraft because it loses out on storage cubbies compared to the other seats its a little annoying they turn all the cabin lights on again two hours before landing in order to offer passengers a last meal before arrival it means the sleep time on a flight of this duration hours isnt great

we were on our way from rochester ny to beijing china the longest part of the trip was chicago to tokyo i was told by an asian friend that asian airlines had bigger seats that is true we were in premium economy even though on the trip to tokyo we wwere in the middle seats there was ample room i am and i would stretch my legs to my hearts content the amenities were great there was plenty of food and drink the food was very good quality the choices for movies and tv was impressive i will fly them again and have recommended to friends
this was my first time flying jal i will use them again friendly service crew acceptable food compared to the quality of the other carriers take off and landing on time

i was on vacation in the us when i was diagnosed with the flu days prior to my return trip to bangkok my doctor told me to delay my flight for my own health and that of the other passengers but i had booked a nonrefundable ticket with no travel insurance and had to just throw myself on the airlines mercy thankfully they were very gracious to me and rebooked me on the same flight a week later without even charging me the normal change fee thank you jal i highly recommend this airline for their excellent customer service
the flight was perfect on time the food was good the crew was very friendly for a five star rating the landing should have been better
i have flown jal many times and its always a good service domestically seats are comfortable staff are courteous and everything is always clean

was my st time fly with jal to haneda airport the flight lavatory was super stinky once onboard ride was bumpy and the worst was landing the pilot shocked me twice during landingflight to tokyo and back to singapore i can only say no no to jal if i need to fly to japan the next time
beautifully maintained dreamliner with spotless cleanliness in the cabin the crew were extremely efficient as well as attentive comfortable seats and reasonable choice of meals

our first time flying on japan airlines and my wife and i were impressed by their service boston to narita route is served by their dreamliner which offers confortable lay flat seats on business class entertainment onboard was not as good as emirates but service was excellent making this a very enjoyable flight
boeing premium economy is excellent with seat pitch of excellent seat comfort and legroom with good food and decent service from crew excellent inflight entertainment lounge access was also a plus
such a friendly and comfortable experience would definitely travel with this airline again great aircraft service meals

only took this flight because ba cancelled a direct uk flight with hindsight we got the better deal the cabin crew were the most polite ive ever seen and the standard of the cabin was superb food definitely to my liking and the cleanest toilets in the air

whilst it was mine and my wifes first time in business class it was a bit of a let down with q to say the least the jal business class was simply amazing the crew were super attentive and made us feel at home the food was restaurant quality the ife system monitor was huge if i had to pick a downside the seats might feel a little narrow for some but in no way uncomfortable simply put if flying from aus to jap there is no question who id choose

we travelled to tokyo narita from sydney this year in april flying jal premium economy class service and staff were helpful friendly and prompt the space in the seat area was fine however the footrest which extends at the front of the seat to allow you to stretch out in comfort was of poor design the footrest would not hold position when the height was adjusted and once the weight of feet were added it caused the footrest to sag resulting in sliding down from your sitting position and this impacted on my bad back initially we thought it may just be an issue with the seats on that plane however on the return flight to sydney we had the same experience as a result it was difficult to get into a fully comfortable position to rest

i chose to spend more to experience the premium economy i dont know that i would spend that money again the seats and extra leg room were nice but given that the economy seats have decent leg room i am not sure there was enough added value the food was average the entertainment selection was probably below average the staff were all very friendly i would say the biggest advantage of the premium seat was having no trouble with finding luggage space in the bin above the benefit of the lounge access was nice the sfo lounge is very underwhelming though i think i would probably just buy the lounge access in the future i am curious as to the experience on the other airlines jal was a fine flight but nothing to brag about

so my family and i were on a ama flight lax to osaka which was flown on a jal plane about minutes into the flight when the attendants were passing out beverages i ordered my kid a soda it was noisy i was distracted by kid who as a year old was excited to be on a plane and i did not realize he had given my kid a soda water until a few minutes later after he passed i chuckled thought it was no big deal and passed it to my wife who asked another stewardess to exchange it for a soda the flight attendant actually made my wife apologize for the mistake and then ignored us for the rest of the flight i mean literally the attendant gave the guy next to me a drink and then walked away from my frantic requests and hand signals it was unreal i am guessing it was racism as in the initial confrontation the attendant kept on using english with my wife who is japanese and of course spoke to her in japanese between the grudge keeping flight attendants and the s uncomfortable seats it was a rough hours after the flight we contacted jal to complain they contacted the flight attendants who said they had given us special service because of their mistake believe me you do not want the special service

checkin staff at jfk could be a bit more consistent utilise their discretion and be a bit hospitable the flight from jfk was uneventful thank god and the service was generally attentive although some passengers got a little loud at some points during the flight which was understandable to a certain extent due to the length of the flight the meals were tasty and the bathrooms were always clean i am not a tall person and had adequate leg room but the seats were super hard and initially i found it very difficult to find a spot to fall asleep in but managed to at some point during the flight on arrival at haneda i noticed that my suitcase handle was broken and went to the relative parties to report it the lady spoke english and was very thorough completed all the paperwork and i was on my way the hard seats alone are enough for me to fly business on my next long haul if i fly with jal again

it was good there was a checkin counters and security check of first class only but it was not good there was no emigration of first class onlyfirst class lounge was comfortable cabin attendant welcomed with smile it was the seat surrounded by a pattition such as modern living room with decoration of wood the combination of the french courses and extensive wine selection ot top chef supervision were like a flying restaurant after the turndown service i was able to sleep soundly dressed to the prepared pajamas cabin attendant gave me service in advance understand my needs my heart was filled with the flight such as i stayed in augerge i was not tired at all in spite of the hours of flight british immigration was smooth in the use of fast tracki was able to spend without stress from the biginning to the end of the flight i want to use jal first class again

best first class experience from start to finish jal first class passengers also get access to sakura lounge at haneda airport shower room is available although a bit on the small side staff is very friendly and lounge is really spacious made to order food hamburg steak w madeira truffle was available during other services such as massage chair and shoe shine service available once on board the flight attendant introduce themselves service is top notch and attendants very genuine unlike the other airline cough cough but it could be because this is first class and this was also my flight attendants first time in this cabin needless to say every is great in terms of food and service wagyu beef caviar champagne and bed was made when ready to sleep imo jal provides the best service in the sky and staff seem very genuine in making sure you are taken good care of

on the august my wife and i were travelling business class with jal to prague jl from sydney with an overnight stay paid by jal at the marroad hotel i would like to report back on our experiences the food in the restaurant was of poor quality and lacked the flair and skill japanese food is known for the room had a dirty towel on the sideboard i use a cpap machine this needs to be plug into next to the bed the only way to have the bedside power point work was to have the hallway light on i called reception who came to the room who confirmed this was correct the required us to sleep all night with the light on in the room the internet was unusable the router was outside if our room door and we still had virtually no connection we had reception come and assist but could not fix the issue overall in my view the hotel was at best stars i am confused and disappointed as to how the sits along side jal business class airport and inflight product i understand the airline prides itself on the quality of the product and rightly so

my family took the flight to narita for hours eventhough we were in economy the leg room was spacious and did not feel cramped the toilet was very clean and with the electronic buttons for bidet and all other functions crew were attentive and very polite overall a good experience

our flight to kuala lumpur from narita was very comfortable with jal nice and friendly staff i had the japanese lunch which was good i ordered an earl grey tea but was not available only had english beakfast tea inflight movie entertainment selection was average vanity kit was not given therefore cannot comment on that overall not a bad flight

if you wonder why such a disparity between reviews between starterrible and starsbest its because of cultural insensitivity simply put to understand it one needs to realize that as a rule japanese are highly cultivated people who are generally very polite and warmhearted and would like to go out of the way to help you thats how japanese are brought up but on the other hand they are also brought up to be ultimately loyal like to the company they are working for and that means the company rules book goes before the bible between these two polar opposites they have to live so here we are if things are simple straightforward and along the book all is perfect youll get wonderful service and experience however if anything anything at all is slightly off all is crashed nothing is going to work anymore dont expect any problem solving my personal experience started with ordering tickets on line sure enough no problem getting ticket laxtokyo nice options all crystal clear but alas i need to fly to okinawa with at least one stopover in naha thats not a straight line and here it just refuses to work properly time i spent trying to make things work any way imaginary would be enough to walk to okinawa and back calling customer service and asking for help to handle their web site predictably ended up with statement they dont know what is the problem with web site and offering me to pay fee for the privilege to buy tickets over the phone even that though did not work as by the time i convinced the agent that stopover means im stopping for several days in naha before proceeding to ishigaki which is also okinawa as island in okinawa archipelago which took significant efforts btw it hit pm and line just went dead seems they automatically cut it at pm maybe as well too as i already started to have images of hawaii in my head vs dreadful images of having a day of bad weather in okinawa and get stranded there by jal as that would be a problem they could not solve bottom line three stars arithmetic average of great service and absence of any problem solving

flew short haul flight with japan airlines from seoul to fukuoka cabin was clean and fresh seat pitch had enough room small snackmeal was served even for this short flight and i was pleasantly surprised had very enjoyable flight

i flew from jakarta to tokyo when departing at morning their checkin is quite fast including their maximum baggage allowance allow me to bring pieces of luggage thanks to extra space for usb port and charging socket i could work and entertain conveniently the breakfast was good also the drinks where you can request anything you want extremely polite and nice flight attendants great inflight entertainment where you could watch japanese shows or movies music and some mangas you could read the lavatory is frequently cleaned for a few hours so it gave a fresh scent for passengers who need to go there

this our second trip with jal and it is always a pleasure flying with this airline staffs are nice food are great seats are good and plane is very clean always on time and always nice to have a layover in japan my second choice airline for my number will be ana airlines but pretty much the same as both are from japan

flew melbourne to tokyo departing at midnight arriving around am intended to sleep all night or at least until they served breakfast idea worked but poor pillow made sleeping less comfortable the thin biscuit wafer type pillows dont work for this westener staff excellent food good had seats a c good location only issue is its a bit squeeze getting past aisle seat to window seat but hey were in bc not cc cattle class so shouldnt complain right as expected of jal flight departed and arrived on time would fly with them again

my daughter and i were excited to fly on jal and we were not disappointed the configuration of their seats allow everyone to have their own private compartment i liked the window dimming system which allows the windows to gradually get darker or lighter the tvs are inches super huge there is a good variety of entertainment to choose from the flight attendants are so polite and helpful they volunteered to take a photo of my daughter and i there is so much food available outside from your regular meals the seat becomes a lie flat seat which is excellent the only downside is that the seat cushion was hard even with the mattress pad that i was given the seat was uncomfortable i found it difficult to get comfortable i look forward to flying on jal again

have flown on jal economy two times on the er and both have been wonderful for a hour flight the seats are far superior to any us airline and of course the service you receive is great the attendants are gracious as expected from a japanese company and the food was delicious with japanese flair but could be eaten by someone whos not too keen on trying different foods good size tv screen with lots of movie options to make the flight go by quickly

our flight was delayed about minutes due to weather and i was amazed at how apologetic the crew was for the delay it is highly unusual back in the states to know any reason a flight is delayed or receive a heart felt apology from he ground crew to the pilots to the flight attendants the service was excellent flying business class though i wish the seats would have been better cleaned between flights

the return flight was good the flight to vietnam was cramped an hot because i booked my flight through united airlines i couldnt pick my seats on jal they put us in the back rows in the middle i tried to pay to upgrade our seats and they wouldnt even let me do that the food was really good and the service was great just wish i could get better seats

seems like most people had woes with their preflight processes i dont remember much about that though one thing that stuck with me was i couldnt resist having an ice cream prior to the flight and was fighting hard to finish it as the gate was closing didnt want to waste the ice cream and we then tried to board the plane with the half eaten ice cream without being stopped yay on a different leg we were also given the privilege of priority boarding as we picked the seats next to the emergency exit thats where i want to be waiting when i do not have an ice cream in hand flight crew were also friendly and attentive throughout the flight seats were also comfortable for a domestic flight the journey was much more comfortable than the international flight we arrived in just wished it could just bring us home

booked a flight for domestic japan airlines and apparently it never went through i received the email providing me with the confirmation number and fare cost after one month i decided to check up and found the flight hasnt even been booked i called and they said they have no credit card record and the flight was canceled i flipped and said how can that be i added in my credit card and everything so i decided to do it again went through and filled out everything online and added all my payment info i get a similar type of email stating the ticket purchase deadline of this reservation is august please purchase your ticket by the deadline above otherwise the reservation will be canceled automatically after the deadline so i told customer service and she said it went through you dont have to do anything anymore then i argued what about the first time i went through it i wanted the fare of my original booking so i next decided to cancel the flight i jut booked because i was only trying to prove a point of what i did and what email i got then next i cancelled the flight i just put in so happens i only get of my refund back so i lost another bucks the stupid site said i would get all my refund back but if you dig down certain flights will have a penalty so they said i would have to call domestic japan airline i tried calling and waited over minutes on the line just gave up what the f man

jal had the best schedule to reach my destination from my home i went to their website and compared their classes of service the website showed that premium economy had minor differences from economy at times the price so i chose economy booking on jals site proved impossible because it refused to accept numerous entries including my name address frequent flier number etc all in wrong format so i booked the same flights with travelocity super easy but travelocity didnt give me a chance to select my seats so i called jal to get my seats reserved this is months ahead so should be a good choice of seats after hours yes two hours on hold i got a jal agent who informed me that my class of travel does not allow seat selection until check in the agent would not even allow me to request an aisle seat which is essential to me for health reasons i doublechecked their web pages describing the different classes of service and there was no mention of this difference between the two classes there is even a section on seats which shows pictures of the seats for the two classes but never mentions that they will not allow advance seat selection in economy unlike all other airlines i have flown some airlines charge a small fee such as for advance seat selection in the case of jal it would cost me over to upgrade service for these flights to get my aisle seat to me this is inexcusable i will not fly with jal again

having booked my window seat a many weeks before i find on boarding i have a middle seat f two things here whats is the point of having advance seat booking and always check what seat they have given you at check in premium economy is very good but disappointed with this flight seat reallocation without notification at check in
my year old just flew this airline to and from asia he had very positive things to say very attentive crew great food clean would definitely fly jal on our next trip

japan airlines is fantastic to travel with their service is awesome the cabin crew are very helpful and the ground service camparable the premium economy seating does not recline as much as other airlines and the food is not up to scratch however as a seasoned traveller i eat before i get on a plane and i dont sleep your really paying for wider seats and less people in your space sleep quality is non existant to upgrade to business would have been good but not at the cost they were asking

although the service was nothing short of spectacular on par with all of the other airlines known for superb service i have to knock japan airlines for two things first the business class seats in the are nowhere near as comfortable as the ones i have experienced on many other business class flights with other airlines and second it is amazingly hard to sleep with a toddler screaming and yelling for of the flight beyond that my daughter was asked if she would be willing to move because the couple wanted to give the toddler his own seat even though only the two adults had paid seats this was easily one of the worst bc flights i have ever been on due to these reasons even the earplugs provided could not drown out the yelling and screaming i definitely recommend jal for its service but not for the other reasons listed my hope is that some day an airline will set age restrictions for businessfirst class and that airline will likely win me as a customer for life
the flight was so relaxing and in no time we arrived in japanin business class we experienced beautiful japanese cuisine we also have got a cardigan

flight was part of homeward journey to new zealand we had been away months and during that time had flown on many different airlines and this was the best after air nz of course staff were friendly and polite the food was a choice between international and japanese food flight was hours long new release movie choices to watch leg room seemed more than other airlines and seats had an optional foot rest a good head rest adjustment and were comfortable

after so many years of flying between usa and japan now i only fly with japan airlines even in economy class they treat you like a human not cargo they place snack stations at the back of the aircraft where you can help yourself with water juice and snacks during the flight it is hours flight and you want to be as comfortable as possible i tried to save few dollars and flew other airlines but i always come back to jal
my first time with jal every single detail is ok staffs are all nice both ground and air services

one of my favorite airlines for flights to asia the other are asiana and cathay pacific its dreamliner service on both legs san to nrt and then nrt to mnl the on the manila leg was a bit newer and slightly larger than the one on the san to nrt flight seats are comfortable with decent cushioning and leg room theyre abreast on the outboard rows and are wider than most the dreamliners are comfortable to ride quiet and with a foot pressured altitude i dont care for the lcddimming windows while its nice to be able to dim the shade and still see through the window its slow to react to the control and keeps changing even after you release the button an indicator for the setting would be nice the aisle seats on the outboard rows have a vertical metal case that takes up about of the sidetoside leg room on the sannrt flights the dreamliner between nrt and mnl doesnt have it one thing i didnt expect when i booked this particular itinerary i booked it through american airlines because the trip was marginally less expensive than booking through jal what they dont tell you is that you cant get a seat selection until you check in thats a bit rough when you consider the possibility of seating somewhere uncomfortable for hours
i didnt expect to be packed inside the airplane for seven hours i didnt pick this airline it was chosen for me what a nightmare run by young kids less than yo with no sense of customer service

somehow i expected more for our flight from osaka to tokyo boarding was slow service was okay but only average but regardless its a good option and priced about the same as the bullet train with less hassle to get to the airport train station

polite staff i was sleeping on take off and when i woke later found a sticker on the back of the seat in front of me telling me to contact them if i needed anything later when they served breakfast they gave me extra food

what a world of difference after several times flying to japan on american airlines we decided to choose the one nonstop flight operated as a codeshare by japan airlines and considering the hours we had spent previously packed into an undersaized aa seat we decided to opt for the premium economy it included access to an airport lounge at dfw with free snacks and beverages instead of across in a jal has across in a and the premium economy has across extra legroom in front of us leg rest and foot rest and the seat reclines in a shell where it doesnt lean back into the person behind you the food and service were also superior the only minor hiccup is that jal doesnt participate in tsa precheck in the future american airlines should issue a boarding pass in their app or print one at the counter with our tsa precheck status and then use the jal boarding pass to get on the plane

almost everything about this flight is as good as you can expect it to be configuration on a b gave plenty of seat width leg room was even more impressive the seat was very comfortable even without declining arrival card in every seat pocket our flight was delayed an hour and we received updates from the cockpit every fifteen minutes or so they informed us the exact time expectancy they received from atc and it turned out to be pretty accurate food was absolutely delicious and presented nicely my favorite has to be the limited custard pudding ice cream from haagen dazs which to my understanding is served on all outbound international flights the cabin crew was as you would expect amazingly nice and polite if there is any complaint at all it would be the entertainment system which was a bit limited compared to the average airline i could not turn off subtitles which bothered me a little the provided headphones produced good sound quality but were not the most comfortable overall it was a great experience flying jal i am looking forward to more custard pudding ice cream in the future

great servuce with jal comfortable and reasonable fare ticket will ride again for my next travels really recommend it the attendants are kund and friendly and attended our needs same as with other customers needs

following a thoroughly enjoyable visit to fukuoka i had to get to tokyo i contemplated the shinkansen but opted instead for a ride on a japan airlines boeing from fukuoka to tokyo haneda for the flight i opted jl they were operating a triclass configured aircraft with economy j seat and first products on board first class checkin at fukuoka is a dream located upstairs the wood panelled checkin lounge resembles a fivestar hotel after an efficient checkin followed by a luxe private security zone directed me instantly into the sakura lounge with terrific views across the tarmac after enjoying light refreshments in the lounge i made my way to boarding where first class was boarded as priority through a dedicated jetway the dedicated f cabin is nicely configured in a xx staggered arrangement of fourteen recliner seats in soft cream leather with a seat pitch of inches cabin crew swiftly pointed out the features of the seat including charging points for electronic devices and offered slippers and shoe horns lunch was served on this short minute flight a single tray was offered with multiple dishes beautifully presented including rice crackers to go with a drink a steamed salmon appetizer a sesame tofu and crabmeat dish and a main dish of braised chicken in a japanese pepper soy sauce niigata premium steamed rice some miso soup and japanese sweet all was absolutely delicious light yet filling flavoursome and rich for those keen on lighter options udon de sky was available as was consomme drinks included apple orange or sunshine juice liquid salad a cold pressed smoothie of sorts unique to jal colas teas water iced coffee and a nonalcoholic suntory beer in addition to two sakes on offer nicolas feuillatte brut champagne was available along with a ferrari sparkling brut wine from italy two white wines chenin blanc or a white bordeaux and two reds a temperanillo and cote du rhone quite a nice selection covering most palates i thought a premium shochu was also available in addition to four beers and suntory whiskey crew were extremely polite attentive and engaging the aircraft was immaculate and remained so throughout the flight the chief purser who had personally greeted each f customer returned as we were on stand to thank us for flying japan airlines the crew gave me a small bag containing rice crackers as i had commented how particularly delicious their rice cracker mix wasa delightful touch the view of japan from my window seat was wonderful for the duration of the flight it put a different perspective on compared with the train journey i was in a taxi at hnd within minutes of landing overall a thoroughly enjoyable travel experience

very accommodating with seat selection no extra charges started from kona hawaii requested exit row seating they told me i needed to talk to someone at jal in honolulu international airport when i got there they expected me and provided me exit row seat with no charge jal staff was really hospitable and friendly food was good seat was comfortable for that long flight to narita then to manila i would flying this airline again

jal used to have the best premium economy when flying to tokyo compared to air france alitalia and ba all tried out considering seats service and pricing in that regard this flight return has been clearly disappointing in particular considering that the price for one of us was which is clearly not a bargain for a premium economy seat there was business on korean air at that price but we could not have travelled together speaking of travelling together this has been one of the main issue when using separate bookings in all fairness bookings were taken via ba but what is the point of registering a named travel companion if this is simply ignored we were separated both on the outbound and the return flight with in both cases ground staff unable to come up with a helpful solution it is only once on board and largely due to the proverbial courtesy of fellow japanse travellers that we could travel together during these permutations it was hilarious to discover that we had not been the only coupled separated despite the moderate size of the premium economy cabin as for the service it is still competitive compared with other airlines but not as good in my view as in previous years on jal for instance on the return night flight there were unusually few rounds of water and beverages for a similar price i dont think i would fly jal pe again

i used to fly domestic in the philppines with our local airlines and since i had a chance to go japan i like to try different airlines and not to book with local airlines in ph but japan airline instead the price is reasonable from the airport the staff are kind i requested them to give me a window seat the flight used boeing and it was also my first time to ride on that wide aircraft i was so amazed the seats are wide enough and theres also an entertainment were you can watch and listen to the movies and various music they served delicious foods of course japanese food and i enjoyed it so much i had experience japan automatically even im still on the plane this december i will be flying to japan airlines again and that was manila narita layover hanedaitami and kixhanedalayovernaritamanila

flew both to and from laxnarita on jal paid for premium economy since it is such a long flight even though we were a family of so it was pricey to upgrade i also booked through american airlines so i could earn mileage aa and jal have a partnership arrangement premium economy is a very small section of the plane between business and economy seats give you extra legroom lots of little freebie extras love the slippers and free alcohol and a pretty good recline of course not as good as first class or business where you get your own pods but still appreciated couldnt swing first class or business costs when dealing with tickets seats themselves werent very comfortable but not worse than regular airlines would have been nice if they had a little more padding though also a nice extra with premium economy is that we were able to wait for our plane in the jal lounge and that had drinks and snacks and comfortable seating which managed to pass the time nicely overall a very comfortable flight

great flight service was as usual excellent the staff were attentive but not intrusive as is sometimes the case with other airlines i chose the japanese meal im western but love the food and have always believed the best japanese meals are served when leaving japan but on this flight from lhr the food was excellent and easily as good as the return flight a great selection of wine and a nice surprise a couple of japanes options on the menu as well overall a great experience

this was my first time using japan airlines am a frequent traveler and have used singapore air cathay pacific emirates qatar etc jal was a very pleasant experience for me and family leg room is much better than airlines mentioned above inflight service is par if not better all flights were on time plane for jakarta to tokyo b better than tokyo usa b meal quality good though choices of movies limited

a typhoon was nearby which effected the scheduling of the flight out of narita checkin was initially effected but once a plane was ready it was all efficient service with respect and a smile checkin was excellent with a premium economy ticket access to the business lounge is included which is a definite plus when considering flying with jal also offered when flying sydney to narita the lounge is a little retro these days and the offerings are rather basic but it is a very nice place to spend an hour before the flight particularly as shopping options in the crowded international departure area of narita are rather limited the plane was very new and comfortable and overall the flight experience was very good seat is excellent entertainment screen is great i watched two movies food is good service is great the premium economy experience is lessened compared to other airlines as there is no dedicated toilet the range of snacks offered is very small with nothing exciting to nibble and no pretakeoff drink bubbly juice or water as provided by some other carriers the missing little premium economy perks which reduce an excellent rating to a very very good i will definitely fly jal again

return flight to hong kong again nothing to complain about great aircraft and superb service my only gripe was my childs meal was great and had lots of child friendly things the carrot was in a shape of an airplane for example and they had a very small hellokitty type fork and the dessert had a teddybear shaped chocolate my expectations for my meal were increased as i thought the japan catering would be better on this leg than the outward bound unfortunately this turned out not to be the case and i would describe the food as edible perhaps next time i will order the kids meal for myself other than that the flight was delayed due to strong winds in hk nothing to do with the airline and i couldnt really fault the overall experience

we sat near the front of economy from hong kong to narita not a long flight but we really couldnt find anything to complain about the service was excellent the plane was clean and the food was good for an economy class flight we ordered a kids meal which came very quickly following take off and the lunch service was also served quickly with a good range of drinks not the most spacious of cabins and leg room but it was only a four hour flight would definitely travel with them again

good things had free wifi during flight time on my way to tokyo had early checkin and baggage release facility bad thing had a poor communication at naha airport we were almost missing the flight due to lack of information had no wifi on our way to okinawathats not a big problem as its a free service

you cant go wrong on jal and with business class its a comfortable relaxing experience the food and service was great the only complaint is the lay flat seats are a little short for anyone six foot or taller

when i boarded the aircraft and saw that the seating arrangement in business class was similar to american airlines i took heart but it was short lived the seats on japan air in biz class are very uncomfortable they are narrow and hard and have few ergonomic adjustments the area around the seat is not well utilized with no place to storehold items during a long flight considering the high price of these seats think twice before spending the money on this class of service for long flights on japan air made me really appreciate american airlines setup
never had that much space in economy classcrew was very friendly service was great everything was finetotally recommend that airline

we arrived at narita airport looking forward to our premium economy flight to melbourne it was a very pleasant surprise to be told we had been ungraded to business class for the trip i can say without question the service and food served on this flight was outstanding the staff were attentive and the western main course meal in particular the beef was in a class of its own a very enjoyable flight made more enjoyable by the staff and the food

the crew are nice although cant converse well in english the seat is comfortable and interior of the cabin is nice there are good selection of english movies but not so for other asian movies they are mainly japanese asian movies and musics the food however was horrible not very appetitisingnone the less the price tag is the most attractive part of the flight

japan airlines premium economy is the best ive flown and i wont hesitate to fly again the pod like seats mean that you can recline within the space of your own pod not disturbing anyone behind you and not being disturbed the service is typically japanese polite courteous and nothing is too much trouble the food is fine it is plane food after all and the amenities are comfortable

check in was easy staff members excellent flight crew were also exceptional the trip was an easy run made easier with the assistance of crew would not hesitate to recommend this airline the only downside was the entertainment lacks new movies

flying japan airlines was one of the best decision that we took the flight attendants were warm and hospitile the food was gourmet quality the seats even though in economy class were clean and comfortable even after getting down the flight the flight attendants helped us with some key information on the airport and the city looking forward to travel again with the same airlines

the seat was comfortable helping me to sleep well the airline provides privilege tag to checked language but long immigration queue made meaningless the portion of food was a bit small for me and economy class food was provided advance seat reservation really helps for me to book my favourite place
great airline always super efficient friendly helpful staff seamless connection in tokyo onboard wifi really works well food is well presented drinks well selected

i flew from melboune to tokyo to moscow flights and seats were ok i have flown in more comfortable and modern seat compartments it was ok it not fantastic the problem was food unless you liked or ate japanese menu my wife fell asleep on take off and was then told sorry all western food is gone japanese or starve not even sushi was on offer the tickets were ok but we will never fly with them again and i travel constantly

i went okinawa japan in march i flew from london to tokyo by british airways bs which was not as good as i expected while i returned to london by japanese airlines jal which added to my disappointment with ba anyway jal was the best airline i travelled with the flights were amazing the food on flight was amazingjust like had in okinawa i was surprised with the free wifi service they had on the flight although i was a bit uncomfortable with legroom i expected a bit of wide space for such a long flightthe flight attendants were excellent helpful they had provided a huge entertainment options on board headphones and shawl for coldamazing overall my experience with the jal was amazing despite the legroom thingy
legroom was very limited food was average flight attendants were attentive and helpful entertainment choices were ok but not fantastic

both jal and ana are the representation of the japanese service dedicated staff thinking in passenger service giving you a fantastic experience when traveling everytime i can choose jal i go with them
