have flown most asian airlines out of san diego and los angeles for me and my wife jal is hands down best stewards are super nice polite professional floors bathrooms kitchen are are immaculate that said their pe class is not worth it given huge price difference from china airlines eva cathay k difference is typical but jal is so clean and spacious in economy that i often fly it due to cleanliness and great flight crew their service and cleanliness is direct reflection of values japanese culture philippine airlines is the worst dirty bathrooms snooty flight staff slow cleanup after meals like minutes last time we flew after an almost year gap we decided to try them in feb lax mnl since it was a quick get in and get back to san diego in days and direct connection to other parts of pi saves few hours a hour flight and two of bathrooms in economy were unusable for half the flight no toilet paper dirty disgusting so big lineup in business class flight attendants didnt care my wife is filipina and its embarrassing to her as it reflects badly on culture and mentality of her native land weve sworn off pal for internal flights their domestic flights are better but always late plane always late pal is well known in pi

i was not impressed of the service and the whole experience the seats are very small compare to other international airlines i thought that it is clean as japan is very clean but i was disappointed i would try other airlines before jal again

i was supposed to fly on air india on that day however the flight was delayed by hrs due to some technical problem i was informed by air india in tokyo that i could take japan airlines flight problem was that my fare was calculated roundthe world c class basis and on star alliance member airline only however japan airlines accepted me to fly with them even though it is not a star alliance member this saved me hr waiting time at tokyo airportflight experience on japan airlines was excellent

when i go to japan i always take jal its only one direct flight from boston i believe besides great flight attendants every single time and good satisfying meals as airplane food they serve a cup of ice cream as a dessert after dinner often jals original fravor with ice cream makers those ice creams are truly frozen solid every time it makes me wonder how they can keep them such good shape they serve sliverware not plastics plastics will snap in half because of the solid frozen ice cream lol their sheets are quite comfortable even for economy class you dont feel so clogged up their economy class sheets received some kind of world prize please refer to jals website for the details they hardly ever delay their flights can be arriving a bit earlier due to the weather conditions but never been late even once when i experienced over all they are quite established steady company in my opinion and the best part is they must keep trying daily bases to hold their quality up there may be better than yesterday but never less i highly recommend jal for the long flight you can count on my words above

we recently flew jal to tokyo and return for a holiday this was our first time with this airline it proved to be one of our best flight experiences the inflight staff excelled with continued unobtrusive service from food to drinks and any other needs so different to others where when the lights went out everyone disappearedthe food was also good and the flights were on time
it was my nd time using jal and i still remain very happy with this airline stewardess were genuinely warm flight was smooth landing was calm and meals were greater than my countrys airlines

i cant help but think of the financial difficulties the airline has faced in the past ten years and reflect on my recent flight with jal the service was impeccablewarm friendly attentivereflective of the japanese spirit of hospitality however flying in premium economy you see that while you have some choice in your meals jal is looking to keep their costs low the quality is quite good arguably excellent and worth of mention but you will not get much of a choice or a spread even in premium economy in some ways the premium economy product was no different than some of the business products ive experienced on us carriers except that you had excellent service from the start at haneda at the ticket counter to deplaning in san francisco

flying to jakarta indonesia jal flight number was the first leg of a two flight sequence jal once again lived up to expectations in service food and the flight itself the flight is about hours the cost is just under cathaypacific and singapore all three are great however japan goes the proverbial extra mile a big plus is they operate with boeing s with that planes configuration there is plenty of room even in economy which i flew the first time a while ago jal is a great choice

the airplane is amazingthe technology food and service are the best the flight attendant are all beautiful and also dress very nice and presentable they really work very hard to provide the best service possible i highly recommend this airlines to everyone its the best

we havent flown on jal for some twenty plus years as they were always more expensive however this particular time they were less expensive than ana so we booked the onboard service both ways were mediocre at best which is like cathay pacific nothing special just routine work food was borderline ok and did not serve any real snacks or light food the entertainment movie list was also lacking in selection luckily we downloaded movies from netflix into our devices will probably not fly on this airline again

jal needs to work on their online reservations systems so that international reservation changes can be made online whilst in japan currently you cannot make international reservations changesmanage bookings in japan online you must use the call centre which charges y usd for every seconds with a wait time on average of minutesthats before you have even spoken to an agent to enquire about changing a fare date when you get through to the call centre often the agents understanding of english is poor and you will be shuffled around until the call centre staff find a member who can understand exactly what you want to do with your booking my advice onboard jal is a superb airline but their system for handling booking changes is frustratingexpensive and time consuming when booking with jal check wether your fare is changeable online particularly if travelling on business or working on projects that may require a flexible departure date

i flew with japan airlines because finnair cancelled our flight boarding was very good and seats was very comfortable staff was very good too inflight entertainment was very varied take off and landing was very smooth food was ok i can recommend this airline

took this flight from los angeles to tokyo departure was delayed due to a delayed arrival of the aircraft overall service is pretty good i would call it the japanese standard inflight meal was good but the main dish fish was too sweet

jal certainly lived up to their reputation for good service the cabin crew were attentive and nothing was too much trouble for them the food was excellent and the seats were very comfortable my only issue is that we had a day flight but we were served a meal at am and then cabin was darkened for people to go to sleep

im a tall guy so having extra leg room is always a plus our family did round trips flights from chicago to tokyo and i could be more pleased the level of service as is often the case with nonamerican airlines was quite good with consistent and reliable service throughout the flight whats more i had the most leg room ive ever had on a standard economy ticket

was told i needed an escort to my next flight during a layover because of passport issue airline took my passport and boarding pass and refused to return them unless i gave them after hours of arguing because they couldnt justify it i had to pay or be stuck without a passport refused to call embassy after me constantly asking extortion and illegal for a corporation to seize an american passport beware

i had travelled on jal long time back in from singapore to kuala lumpur but that was a very short flight lasting only minutes now i got a chance to travel to tokyo from delhi by this airline with lot of expectations it was an awesome experience the cabin the staff the food everything was great above all the humbleness of its staff is something to be experienced the flight too was smooth barring minutes of turbulence the checkin process is unique and very pleasant surprise as compared to other airlines the return flight too was equally perfect hats off to jal

in tokyohaneda i used a designated first class check in counter after passing through the security checkpoint quickly i proceeded to the jal first class lounge the lounge was very spacious but crowded a bit and offered a good selection of breakfast food and drinks they also had shower rooms a champagnebar a room with a kicker machine and a smoking room i enjoyed the time during my stay in this lounge after boarding the boeing er i was guided to the jal sky suite a the cabin was not fully booked which was not too bad the charming crew members in the first class cabin introduced themselves with their names and offered some drinks before takeoff the seat was really spacious and clean but a bit outdated which was not a problem for me at all there was also waiting a red amenity kit from porsche design up in the air the service started with an amusegueule of my special preordered japanese vegetarian menu followed by a very delicious multicourse special meal every time i was served a new plate or bowl the flight attendant explained to me what it is consisting of and also the meaning in japanese cuisine i was really surprised of the friendliness and attentiveness of the airline staff which i enjoyed pretty much concerning the drinks i decided to try after the french champagne a pommard red wine which also was from france after meal service was over i was handed out a pyjama and i changed my clothes in the bathroom in the meantime my seat was converted to a comfortable bed with a mattress and very soft sheets by the way in the bathroom they had a typical japanese toilet with a lot of the famous functions toilets have in japan i had a very good sleep above the clouds although i woke up and could order a noodle soup and a pot of tea there was served another delicious vegetarian meal before arrival in london i even could order some stuff from the regular menu at all times very special for japanese airlines is that they offer a good selection of japanese drinks like different kinds of sake wines which i also tried a glas or two from all in all i have to say that jal is a reliable and safe japanese airline which i definetly would fly again with this first class flight was one of the best experiences i made in this class of service not least because of the professionalism of the cabin crew members

we were upgraded on our return flight and what a wonderful experience the cubicles were divine i had so much room and was so comfortable for the entire journey the food was magnificent drinks and snacks were plentiful if required flight staff attended immediately once the call bell was pushed the toilets were always clean whenever needed something that is definitely not common will definitely consider a trip in business class again
we went premium economy due to our height and we loved it the staff were very nice the food was tasty and we could have endless drinks and snacks fantastic would definitely fly again

i booked my flight from flight network i pay for my window seat all the way from edmonton to jakarta somehow japanjakarta is not window seat i asked at vancouver counter gate to help me change it but they couldnt do it even though the window seats are available so they ask me when i arrive in japan i should go to transfer counter after i went for security check at international tranfer theres transfer counter on the right so i went there to ask them change to window seat unfortunately the lady is rejected my request rudely then i showed her that i paid for the window seat even the service at vancouver asked to change it in japan another drama that she talked to her supervisor in japanese about my case still she said no service for economy class so when you are in economy class means no ground service in narita airport i wish i took photo of them

undoubtedly the best flight of my life as there were only three people in the cabin the crew recommended we move to another row so we have a full row to ourselves so we didnt even see the other passenger demonstrating the service and consideration wed see throughout the flight they made up the empty window seats as beds so we could comfortably move between seat and bed for the duration of the hour flight the crew were incredibly accommodating and attentive walking us to the restrooms to change into our pajamas talking us through the various menus and letting us alternate between the western and japanese menu i wanted the caviar and sushi the food was astonishing and beautifully presented and both champagne options exquisite wed been looking forward to the flight for a while and it was everything we hoped for

just arrived back in melbourne on jl there was a family of about people including children seated around and in front of us for almost the entire flight one of both of the children were screaming or yelling disrupting other passengers the family members did little to curb that behaviour other than to say a quiet shhhh occasionally the children played in the aisle often with an adult getting in the way of staff and passengers although this went on for hours the cabin crew did nothing to intervene given jals otherwise high standards this was very disappointing an additional point with jal is that the cabin temperature is set quite high on of flights we took with jal over the last weeks the internal temperature of the cabin was uncomfortably high

having flown several times i can say that japanese airlines generally have great concern for hygiene and customer experience they do not stuff too many passengers like some airlines do their seats are comfortable and throughout the flight they ensure that you are hydrated and satiated i took another connecting flight of jal to singapore and experience was consistent strongly recommended

have a recent trip to hokkaido japan is a nice and enjoyable while travelling with jal being a premium economy customer we are allowed to enter to lounges both in singapore and japan international airport which actually allows us to rest inti before the flights the sitting for the class is nice but the cushioning is a little thin it will be great if they can look into it the seats can fully lay off without disturbing the back customers and are perfectly fine and comfortable for tall people like me by the way i am meter entertainment in the plane has a wide selection but the bad point is that outbound and inbound are the same therefore i got a little bored after a while as for the food wise is not fantasy but still good language is an issue to many of us as we dont speak jap but what i have encountered is that the staff have lots of patients and even will go and look for someone who can speak english to assist us on the issues we have as our flight is being delayed but we reach the airport early during the return flights but the staff who cant speak well in english got a friend who is going off duty to help this lady not only help us to change to an earlier flight and ensure all the processes in

travelled three different trips to vietnam with japan airlines their service is outstanding and attention to detail is spot on enthusiastic and friendly staff that really make it seem like its their sincere pleasure to take care of their passengers

my st time flying with jal cabin crew all are friendly asking how we doing etc its so pleasent comfortable seat for economy in flight entertainment bit disappointed cant really enjoy it because not so many choices of current songsmovies meal its okay i ordered moslem meal moml overall its a relaxing and enjoyable journey

awesome airline first time flying with jal and would definitely do again service was prompt and first meal was great second in flight meal had some very oriental options which was not really suited to our taste but the service was outstanding the screen entertainment was also excellent

never flown jal before and to some good fares the seats were comfortable with individual lamps couldnt lie flat for sleeping but good enough the entertainment system was one of the better ones and very easy to use choice of programs could be expanded the care package was lovely with toothbrush slippers eye mask face mask water the food was not so great actually there was no dinners when we left at night but a small bun didnt mind that but the bun was not great breakfast next day was dried salmon and rice quite fishy service was impeccable everyone so friendly polite and big smiles

everything was just above average compared to other airlines ive been flying with the food was not that great but you get what you paid for they also serve ice creams after meals the best meal was the breakfast one because they served a known japanese burger on board the flight attendants were great and very responsive

this was my second time flying with japan airline i really liked their service and their hospitality to their customerspassengers first of all i was happy with jal when i flew with them two years ago therefore i knew i wanted to fly with them again this year my husband and i booked economy seats from kuala lumpur to san diego we were amazed by the leg room they have i was very happy with the interior inside the flight the seats are very comfy and very new i liked the fact that they always providing free toothbrush and toothpaste in the toilet thats a plus in terms of food im not a fan of airline food because i cant eat while im on the flight no matter what airline i fly with i had a hard time eating on the flight i like to just drink a lot of water or nibble on some snacks the flight attendants were very professional friendly and always smiling i really liked that i for sure will choose japan airline again for my next trip

although only a hour flight i found jal to be excellent the aircraft a winglet was clean and spacious and the staff were very pleasant from check in to flight attendants free on board wifi was an added bonus would recommend them to anyone wanting a good flight experience

booked direct flights from new york to and from tokyo on a jal boeing the price of direct tickets was only a few hundred more than flights with connections so it was a no brainer i am a nervous flyer but the flight to tokyo was smooth as butter we flew north from new york through canada over the bering straight down through the coast until reaching tokyo magically this hour flight over some pretty active weather regions was buttery smooth there was a generous amount of legroom in economy class and a i was able to extend both legs fully beneath the seat in front of me the entertainment systems were ok a very good selection of movies but the music and video games were basic the video games especially were poor equivalent to bad cell phone games years ago singapore airlines has much better games actually using nintendo brand the food was passable dinner consisted of a japanese meal rice sides and a meat dessert was pleasant a cup of haagen daaz ice cream the return flight was a bit bumpier but the staff told us right at the start to expect some light turbulence and made an in flight announcement before hitting a rough patch in the north pacific this really helped to settle my nerves all in all an almost perfect flying experience
wonderful way to end a fantastic holiday a little bit more leg room and comfort jal were great to fly with and the lady at check in couldnt help us any more than she did
i sit in economy class the leg room and seat are comfortable they provide halal food which is really good the flight attendant are really nice

flight from nrt to tpe flight delayed then some taiwan parents did nothing to control their infant four adults in the family two kids one of which was an infant screaming for the entire duration of the four hour flight flight crew did nothing parents and grandparents did very little infants do not belong on flights period selfish parents bringing their infants with them on vacation what is the point seriously and this all was in business class i paid extra for my seat so i dont have to deal with this garbage unfortunately both airlines and parents take no responsibility for this issue bad just really bad

excellent customer service and superb food the quality and space of seat in premium economy is almost as good as the old style businessclass before the sleeper seats were introduced and definitely worth the money jal offers a huge baggage allowance each person is allowed x kg checkin bags which really helps when travelling with the family after a shopping holiday the entertainment system is excellent and easy to use premium economy customers can also use the airport lounge my only criticism is the relatively poor standard of english and jals insistence of its staff squeaking in as high a tone of voice as is humanly possible when making announcements extremely annoying and antiquated jal management need to revise this policy and move into the st century

i have flown at least times in my life and dozens of times with jal their inflight service is always pretty good the meals are okay but their website and web checkin process is the worst of any airline its so frustrating trying to get through their system confirmation number not valid cant find my booking error error error hey jal heres some advice just copy what another airline does just do exactly what they do figure it out completely revamp your process it stinks

flew the dreamliner on the direct flight and for a hour flight it was actually enjoyable the only challenge is trying to sleep as the flight leaves at pm boston local time business class seats are very comfortable and offer plenty of room overall the food was good and plentiful service was very professional and responsive amazing how easy it is to fly across the world

flying an american airlines flight operated by japan airlines meant that little or no service information made it through between the airlines systems a window seat confirmed with aa on the phone and showing on the aa mobile app was totally absent for jal so even with a high priced business class ticket i got the dregs of the seats all the jal agents could say was so sorry arriving in dfw i had to ask where the baggage claim was because the two airlines systems couldnt link and update me one world isnt a good thing unless its a good world and from my experience its not

the aircraft is its new the service quality is very good when i pushed the call ca they tried to help asap the missing points are the following there is no amenity because this is a longhaul flight the eye mask is helpful breakfast meal is not good taste for me it looks the english breakfast and its only one choice the seat is hard i asked another blanket for the cushion

japan airlines sacrificed one seat in the economy class to make seats a row instead of seats a row for many other airlines they also increased the seat pitch this made noticeable difference in the sense of space and the comfort level of the economy class especially when you fly long haul the inflight entertainment is very good with touch screen functions food service is very good quality for economy class and i especially liked their campaign to feature young and rising chefs in japan to come up with appetizers main dish desert etc with a touch of japanese innovation and traditioncabin attendants were very attentive to passengers and take care of their requests quickly and nicely i am not surprised they are voted the best economy class by skytrax for the second time most highly recommended for those who want space and quality in the economy class

from check in to fast track exit complete and professional service and the plus hour flight is made to remember all the latest movies food choice between japanese and western and drink menu is extensive and on tap yes you have to pay for it but you only live once for the experience

the hours flight became a excellent experience the flight attendants were all superfriendly and gave the best service with a big smile the glutenfree food was served two times and tasted perfect the seats was not the best a little bit hard to sit at som i had took a pillow to sit at the entertainment was just perfect a flight that served the passengers from departure to arrival

took this flight for convenience i will never fly jal again for some inexplicable reason they literally cannot ever fly this route on time despite it being only two aircraft from san to nrt and back again check out flight aware and you will see the ontime performance is like no explanation from the flight crew either also this flight goes to narita which is like hours from tokyo i have been spoiled by always flying into hnd and since this airline is a government monopoly you would think theyd offer it to hnd but no nrt it is we bought business seats since first is not available ever on this particular flight we were excited to fly the but alas jal put shell flat neo seats in the plane these are the most uncomfortable business seats ever they are narrow and dont even lay out a normal angle for sleeping they were world class business seats decades ago why jal would put this crap in a new plane is beyond me but for an hour flight it was torture the flight attendants smile alot but beyond that there is not much communication on the way home delayed yet again we had seats d and g these seats should be torn out as inexplicably there is no storage overhead whatsoever and since its a bulkhead no place to put anything ridiculous to have to fight with other passengers to put a bag overhead the food was not good and service uneven i have never seen flight attendants drop so many things at one point a dinner roll went careening down the aisle the clanking and dropping of dishes in the galley was obnoxious for like hours straight for all its faults its back to delta and flying through lax for me
attentive and friendly service and good selection of food and drink also good selection of in flight entertainment and the ramen were delicious

i enjoy flying with jal even on short flights like that the whole experience was smooth and professional friendly checkin hasslefree boarding ontime departure not even much turbulance along the way arrived in tokyo ontime and rested for my meetings inflight service a cup of apple juice they dont have to provide it but it is a nice touch got a nice big smile with mine too

we booked this flight using k american airlines miles each you cannot book this flight on the aa website you must call their reservation number this is by far the best longhaul economy class ive ever flown the leg room and seat width is excellent instead of configuration on most airlines jal uses on economy my seat h does not have a seat behind it so reclining does not bother anyone the meals are excellent and the flight attendants are warm and friendly i recommend ordering the skytime drink its made of kiwi juice

japan airlines economy class was comfortable and roomy for someone who is feet and i did not feel cramp the check in process was fast and smooth their website is a bit difficult to navigate and slow the flight attendants was helpful and pleasantly nice they offer some of the latest blockbuster movies to watch in their in flight entertainments the food overall was good lax its lax not much can say with it i did not sit in premium economy but from looking at the seat i did not think it is worth the price upgrade unless it is cheap upgrade free or if you want to sit toward the front of the plane then it might be for you they have a snack area you can get drinks and light snacks anytime you need there is a usb port to charge your phone

even though i flew economy on this occasion on a b with seating i must say that the leg space for myself at cm was ample and i did not have the feeling of being squashed in all flight were on time food and beverga service was very good with ample choice and tasty meals aircraft was clean and even after hours the toilets were more or less clean in flight entertainment i would give out of before landing we received a put it together yourself burger which was unexpectedly tasty i can highly recommend jal

i had booked a round trip from new delhi to san francisco and back with a stopover in tokyo on our return flight i booked the flight economy class thinking i had a deal did not realise that one has to change airports narita to haneda which involved getting transit visa and additional cost of changing airports with luggage on adding up the costs it was expensive compared to other airlines once i had booked my tickets it was impossible to contact the japan airlines on phone also tried through an acquaintance in japan he also could not contact the airlines on phone i wanted to extend my stopover in tokyo from day to days but could not contact the airlines through various means the flight was comfortable with good leg room the food served was tasty the flight experience was good anand
we was travelling from bkk to nrt the service was very nice during the trip for hours seat is comfortable clean inculding movie on borad
always the same highlevel of service flight attendants are welltrained to be friendly and attentive to passengers needs

we were on a japan airlines flight to narita from vancouver recently the inflight service in the economy cabin was unquestionably better than most of the airlines we have experienced in our travels to asia and europe from north america the cabin crew were so polite and courteous and the meals were outstanding due to severe winds at narita our flight was diverted to haneda airport and as a result we missed our connection to singapore from narita when we finally got to narita we had to line up for more than hours to get another flight to singapore we were tired thirsty and hungry and only after some complaining we did get some water from the ground staff about hours after we started waiting in line since our new connecting flight was some hours away we managed to get hotel accommodation from japan airlines we could take a shuttle bus to go to the hotel but we were told that the airline policy was not to provide shuttle transportation from the hotel back to the airport and the airline would also not provide any meals after some more complaining we were given yen for return transportation but we could not get any meal vouchers we finally checked in at the hotel at in the morning and everything was shut we had to wait till early morning before we could get some snacks from a store outside the hotel obviously we can only blame mother nature for the inability to land at narita on time to make our connection but we think japan airlines could have done more for the totally exhausted customers who had to wait in line for hours

the jal business class check in at nrt airport very efficient and polite the business class lounge great with some good food and drink the boarding very smooth the business class seat is not as good as jals oneworld partner american airlines the crews are very polite and helpful i ordered japanese food option but in the end i got western option beef course as japanese option run out the beef is one of worst i ever had
im a moslem with family and request moslem meal on the board the attendant serve us first compare to others its great and the kids got a present from them the plane touch down narita on time

i recently flew in jl from tokyo to melbourne and the comfort food and beverage and service offered was outstanding jal is a great option for anyone travelling to or from japan or europe as you can spend some time in japan which is a wonderful country i would recommend japan airlines very highly and they are a fantastic option if you are looking for a tier classy one airline

my experience with jal is always great last week i took flight from narita to manila i noticed today that i left my tablet pc in seat pocket by mistake i thought it will never come back however when i called jal they quickly found my tablet the aircraft was also great latest aircraft boeing is used for flight light adjustment is very smart and i could rest very well although it was a short hours flight inflight entertainment system was also great with lots of movie and music selections for meals i could enjoy japanese style delicious lunch and hagen daz ice cream as dessert as oneworld sapphire member i could also enjoy sakura lounge service at narita airport where i could enjoy delicious breakfast buffet

ive made this trip on premium economy many times over the past years or so mostly on eva decided to try jal this time because of oneworld status and booked through aa i rather wish id booked through jal because pe travelers have business lounge access both at ord and nrt i did not because i booked through american airlines in addition the gate crew at ord was american airlines so of course they were abrupt and boarding was confusing and illmanaged the flight itself was great other than the fact that i found the pe seat unusually uncomfortable compared to eva qantas cathay or lufthansa for example its one of those seats that slides forward in a shell to keep from invading the space of the person behind you but i found that it placed the weight directly on my tailbone which more than a week later is still aching food was ok but not great and the selection of movies was fine without being outstanding i think in all all in all that i would not go out of my way to fly jal in premium economy again if theres a convenient cathay or eva flight

shaming company we are traveling one year using a round the world ticket and after already flying more than routes this year we just had the worst check in service in ours lives after more than one hour waiting jal people charged us in usd for ours surfboards here in tokyo while other flight with jal no charge was applied we are traveling with luggage less than what we could have and it is just non sense to receive a charge like that and people behaving really bad someone need to change this rule and staff should focus on customer service not only playing the paper rules we will never travel again with this company ps i am a sapphire customer

voted as the best airline in japan but i think it is still a grade lower than the top international airlines the biz class seats are well designed but just a tad too narrow another cm wider will be good the food on the way to tokyo was quite tasteless i think the best is the ramen cup noodle the food on the way from tokyo was much better entertainment program was good with touch screen

t first flight with jal and i was quite happy with the service and the seat the flight was hrs in a er if anything the extra room made it unfamiliar to snooze but that is a personal thing we had a meal on flight and two snack options for our hrs there is a drinks and snack station for economy at the rear of the plane there were toilets available for economy in flight entertainment was on par with other airlines but the software running the entertainment was fast no delays when pressing your choices overall i felt like premium economy but sitting in the cheap seats

that was my st experience using jal and i love this flight and the service comfort seat even in an economy class and good service from the flight attendant jal lavatory is not too small as a normally flight and they also serve a good flight meals i love jal note this is a very late flight review since tripadv just asking me to write a flight review which my actually trip by jal was on last spring cgknrt

traveling long distances is always very daunting but our experience with japan airlines was excellent the service was really superb it was very comfortable and the attendants were very efficient i would always consider jal when traveling

the flight was very good and although we left new york hours late due to the snow the pilot made up most of the time on flight i had a connection to osaka and was able to make it flight attendants were courteous and put me at ease with the delay

a pleasant flight with very friendly cabin crew this was a midnight takeoff and interestingly they didnt overfeed us like so many airlines do my wife really enjoyed the japanese style breakfast i had the european breakfast and found the omelette very disappointing read didnt eat it i am rating legroom as average below simply because i am cm tall and even in business i can never lie flat and be comfortable

a flawless experience from beginning to end the cabin has an intimate feel with only seats on this flight only of the seats were occupied making the flight attendant to passenger ratio the seats are spacious and comfortable not as private as singapore ana or the middle east but still very nice for a hour flight food was excellent and always available wifi was complimentary for first class and fast enough to check email and send texts pajamas were offered but jal typically keeps cabins at a warmer temp so i would advise bringing alternative sleep attire if you have difficulty sleeping in warm temps overall a fantastic flight and wouldnt hesitate to fly jal again

my first experience with jal was very very positive flying every year on the long routes from australia to europe and having much experience with stars singapore airlines cathay pacific garuda stars emirates oman air vietnam airlines thai airways malaysia airlines i would rate jal services much better they were good in everything starting from boarding till debarkation it was amazing to see how efficient they were on boarding for example they reserved minutes for it and finished minutes earlier it was the same on my connecting flight in tokyo both flights departed earlier thanks to it and arrived to their destinations much earlier as well all inflight services were very good the aircraft were new and very modern the crew was very nice and responsive the food was the best i have ever had on long flights the aircraft cleanliness deserves a special mentioning it was outstanding it looked like the toilets for example were cleaned after every visitor it is worth mentioning as well that they were in line with japanese standards that was astonishing to see on the aircraft i think that a small addition to inflight amenities would make this airline even better that their star competitors what i missed on their flights were small things like night socks air plugs mouth wash skin conditioner razor and other accessories

choosing the premium economy seats was probably the best decision we made for our trip to japan the seats were spacious and comfortable not to mention clean we were thoroughly entertained by the movies provided on our personal tv screen food was good the fligh stewardess made my kids very very pleased by giving them a souvenior from jal and before giving my kids their drinks the flight stewardess drew a doraemon face on their cups it made the children feel special we had a delay in our flight and the ground staff of jal handled the situation very well i did not see one grumpy passenger we had to take a connecting flight and i am pleased to say the quality of service is the same kudos to jal for setting such a high standard for flying in comfort

i actually made a round trip on jal to singapore and the year previous to kuala lumpur the previous year the airline went out of its way to make sure that my wife and i got seated together when there were problems with the reservation last year and gave us a free upgrade this year they have had a meal upgrade in both premium economy and business i would recommend that you give jal a chance to serve you

pleasant smiling and courteous staff says it all couldnt have been more helpful at checkin nor more pleasant its great to see how culture and training come together to give a flawless outcome the grooming of each staff member was super and customer service seemed uppermost

when i fly it is always with jal or ana they are the best having researched them i know about their unyielding commitment to absolute safety and perfect service i heard later on that there was a ca who drank alcohol on the flight i was on but i didnt notice anything thats how good they are so if you have to pay an extra to reschedule your flight last minute thats on you dont blame the airline blame yourself for not planning properly and expecting somebody else to pick up the pieces jal is one of the best airlines in the world

i have never flown on jal before nor business class everyone was so helpful and kind the accommodation was excellent and the meals were truly unbelievably good i slept well and was entirely relaxed best flight ever
i could have very relaxing sleep on board with spacious full flat sheet for business class during my long flight over the pacific ocean

this was my first trip to japan with mh and returned malaysia with jal the checked in process was easy and fast and we were offered the sakura lounge prior to our flight to kul we spent most time in the lounge and the foods offered was excellent boarding time was accurate and flight depart on time the business class has excellent hard products seat was spacious and comfortable together with some nice quality amenities cabin crews service were top notch and very caring to each business class passengers we had a wonderful flight experience with jal and will definitely try it again in future

we spent hours on this flight in economy class the efficient at the gate was amazing all staff in the plane was very friendly and helpfulthey really went the extra mile to make the flight as enjoyable as possible even if we were in economy food was actually very good i would take jal again in case i would go back to japan

i dont have a good physiquebut the seat of economy class is tight and hard im a bit of a diabetic and on a restricted dietbut there was no food selectioni guess money might have solved this problembut online booking i could find no option at haneda airport i had to wait may baggage delivered in over half houri know this no exceptionalbut a series of misfortune made me sad and fed up

as the title says my jal experience was ok neither good nor bad as a premium economy flight it delivered the leg room but the seat was not particularly comfortable the pillow flimsy my video system had a few problems and i found the meals acceptable but uninspiring i was hoping to start my trip with some japanese inspired meals but pe shares the same menu as economy and with spaghetti bolognese as the default main meal for one occasion the menu was overall disappointing they need much more of a japanese theme to their meals there was no priority queue to board the flight but to my surprise the ticket did include access to the qantas business class lounge in sydney which was a great start as we felt very relaxed and somewhat privileged im not sure id fly jal again as it was clearly inferior to my pe experience with cathay pacific in late

i was flying home with my loved one who was receiving cancer treatment overseas and the flight staff were very attentive listened to our concerns and provided a special pillow to relieve his pain at the end of the flight several attendants came to say goodbye and well wishes even gave us a special gift of origami crane necklace they handmade during the flight moved me to tears
one of the best airlines that i have used to fly to japan price is reasonable cabin crew friendly and welcoming food is good too nothing much to complain

very good wine selection good food presented with artistic flare friendly and attentive crew and excellent entertainment selection restrooms remained spot less during flight also flight offered an assortment of anytime meals in case you got hungry
the staff was very kind and always happy to help and very profesional diversity for the meals and also japan is one of the most diverse countries

i was on the premium economy seat to tokyo for night flight and wanted to see the differences i booked for economy seat for morning flight to kul from tokyo and frankly speaking it was as satisfied as the premium seat although the seat was different and there was no extra amenities the space was still big compared to other airlines economy seat it was rated world first class economy seat and one thing i couldnt forget is how amazing the meal was and we were given a cup of haagen dazs ice cream for dessert imagine when you finished your meal and expected nothing else but then you were given a cup of ice cream and everyone loves ice cream i was enjoying the whole flight that i watched a few movies rather than taking naps till we reached kul certainly choosing this airline again for my next trip to japan

jal offered few classes of seat and being curious with the premium economy seat we booked for it for our night trip to tokyo from kul by paying a little bit more than the economy seat and the experience was great as you would have never expected for this class of seat and you get to enjoy the lounge service before the flight first we were seated before the economy seat rows with bigger space different seat extra amenities slipperstoothbrushhair brusheye cover and we have already felt how premium it was the flight crews were all really professional and they were smiling the whole time i guess they have the best smile compared to other airlines not to forget clean lavatories and it has a full body mirror inside since it was a night flight we slept all the way to tokyo and to be honest i wasnt even feeling tired or having body ache after the long flight and the seat must have contributed to this
this is our nd time flying on jal in flight service is great hostesses are always waiting to help we highly recommend this airline
very clean and sophisticated bathroom huge extra leg even for the economy class great foods love it

we travelled with jal again after our last two trips to japan because they were so good this time we were going through to london as an experiment to see if it minimised jetlag it did and we hit the ground running in london the second and third legs of our triptokyo to london and return to tokyo were also very good the best thing apart from the service on jal is their premium economy seats they are in a shell so that you never lean back into someone elses space and they dont lean their seats back into yours

flew jal roundtrip jfksin via nrthan upgraded at jfk to premium economy for first leg rest of trip was in economy service was generally excellent throughout the experience boarding was orderly checkin counters efficient premium economy is not really worth the upgrade though food is a little better and you can have champagne but the footrest of the seat is awkward i could not find a good sleeping position at any point during the flight jals regular economy has such generous pitch comfortable seats and good food that premium economy feels superfluous i slept better in three legs of coach than one of premium economy

the jal lounge gets very busy in the hours prior to this flight leaving i was annoyed when i requested use of a shower i was was told there was over a min wait for the showers which put the vacant time at the same time as my boarding with mind to go i enquired again and was now told that there was at least another min wait the member of staff running this apologised but offered no alternative so i enquired at the front desk and they suggested i try the american airlines lounge so i rushed over there found their lounge empty and was able to have a shower before my flight why did jal staff not tell me of this option sooner the flights themselves were good i found the seat comfortable i recommend odd row seats a and k as these are the good window seats jal use the ba lounge is boston which was good funny that the jumper was offered on the day flight to boston but not on the return flight from boston ask and it might be offered all flight crew were delightful
their flight crew service is excellentthe stewardesses are always polite attentive and always serve with a smile not like other airlines the checkin counter staff attitude to their work is excellent

i am writing this as were still over the pacific as we were handed free wifi access codes when we took our seats while its not super fast its nice not be charged for it especially when flying first class check in at jfk was a breeze very friendly staff had us on our way in less than minutes she then walked us to a special lounge adjacent to security there two helpful airport employees helped us remove our electronic devices and carried them to the front of the security line a special tsa employee checked our passports an boarding passes not sure how this works i guess the airline pays for this service shortly after take off we were given very comfortable pajamas and a nice amenity kit the seats are wide and soft leather and will be made up into a bed anytime you request it what was nice is they lay out a soft cushion and provide a down comforter the lie flat bed is over feet and i was able to stretch out very comfortably the japanese set menu for lunch was delicious there were a number of small dishes followed by the main course and a wonderfully sublime dessert the cabin staff is always smiling and are always ready to provide anything you want the bathrooms are cleaned each time someone uses it overall this has been a very positive experience

for whatever reason asian airlines are warm compared to american airlines which are cooler my mom was sweating like hell and felt somewhat miserable my dad and i were fine though the wifi sucked though

i flew times with japan airlines in a time frame of weeks and all three flights were more or less on time the crew was friendly and my luggage always arrived as well all in all this is everything one would hope when flying so im satisfied with japan airlines services and would definitely book again with them

a thumbs up to japan airlines for their service we took the connecting flight singaporenaritasan diego the checkin baggage handling information and flight was quite good the seats in economy class are good value for money and cabin crew is soft spoken and well organized the food served during the flights was of good quality their serving of icecream at the end of the meal was a good way to end the meal

from the moment you board and step on the plane the level of service from jal is like no other the staff are willing to look after all your needs the business class seats on the dreamliner were comfortable and it was great to be able to lay flat plenty of dining choices and snacks available through the flight i did not select a meal so cant comment on the food quality in this instance it was cheaper to fly business compared to economy so always check just in case well worth it as it was superior service

this is our second flight with jal and again it has again met and exceeded all our expectations what a great airline we flew on the dreamliner and loved the experience what makes this so special is the staff wow they go out of their way to make your flight as comfortable as possible always courteous and friendly and very professional they seem to actually like doing things for you so different from surly staff encountered on other flights love this airline even the ground crew wait in an orderly line and bow and wave you off as you taxi the tarmac food isnt too bad either and plenty of it we love the seats at the back near where the staff sit its quiet and plenty of room to stand without disturbing anyone else we travel a lot and after this great second flight we will always look first to jal before booking flights for long haul flights this is the airline to use the only negative i can think of is if you need to call jal before your flight beware of holding on for a long time whilst listening to the same repetitive music

the seat is wide and comfortable the toilets are clean and less occupied since the number of the seats is less than economy class the additional fare was approximately jpy usd this price is quite reasonable for this great facility for a long flight

a friend recommended jal and they had a great price for my round trip the friendliness of all employees the speed of checking inand the great service on board made this a great experience food was very good and filling seats were well padded and good leg room and they left and arrived on time stewardesses were ready to answer any questions solve any problems lots of programs movies etc to watch and keep entertained this is now one of my two favorite international flights out of the seven i have flown for the last years

this airline is a reflection of the country everything is done right service is great everything is clean and you feel like a guest instead of a burden the seats are comfortable with adequate leg room inflight entertainment worked and was abundant and the food was good with a choice of japanese or western food check in and boarding went smoothly with no problems flight attendants are friendly and are there to help it was a long flight made easier by this excellent airline

if you are the kind of personwesterner whof likes working in japan or enjoys their culture of courtesy growing up partly in canada a country of friendly folks who do take a bit of pride in their ability to be polite japan is the level up the airline even when faced obnoxious abusive beligerante and wrong customers they remain professional composure the how i dont know the gate staff in flight is love they offer japanese and western food take some pride in presentation attentive staff actively seeking your comfort its not a luxury airline but they do try to make you think it is with service flown several times around asia to and from japan good clean effective efficient all spring to mind value for money i miss japan so much sumiming up flown more than a dozen times positive experience cant sayou that about my favoured most flown top in airmiless virgin who have been pretty good practice
cabin crews were very patient and helpful would come and check if we need any assistance with our child food and beverage was wonderful

this flight was in a smaller dreamliner which had business seats theres nothing wrong with the sky suites but what was evident today was that theres not enough rest rooms for business passengers in this configuration instead of the usual there was only it was disappointing as the lack for need to queue for restrooms is the reason i fly business bad move

this was my first long haul flight and it was a great experience they made sitting on a plane for almost hours as comfortable as possible there was a decent amount of leg room a foot rest and great inflight entertainment the food was beautifully presented and delicious my husband had to have the low salt meal which was even better than what i had baggage allowances were generous as well free checked bags and a carry on plus personal item were allowed spirits were offered at no extra charge and there was a small snack station on the plane a blanket and neck pillow were great for my attempt at sleep but i can never rest while im flying i did appreciate being able to get cozy

one of the best airlines in the world and i have traveled for over years even if you are seated in economy you are treated like a guest from the moment you check in until you get off the plane you matter to jal

it was a excellent flight with jal i am not a good traveler when it comes to airport and airplane i have my phobia but i took a promise to be brave when my child was born that i will try my very best to take her on holiday as much as i can i felt safe and comfortable thumbs up

hand over foot you can actually stretch out your hands and feet the boeing dreamliner is the best i have traveled in beats the by a mile the self dimming windows are a great invention and the business class seats are comfy food between la and japan could have more selections for non seaweed lovers staff were exceptionally nice this was an american airlines code share one note business class was not available on the phxla route and the was dirty every seat taken smelly ich we paid k for the round trip and the aa agent told us we did not pay enough for business class on the phx to la segment poor customer policy
food are ok fare is reasonable on board entertainment is sufficient children below years old are happy with their on board gifts especially the cutlery set

jal people are respectful i fell asleep and they tagged me and offered my meal when i awoke and thats great service in economy in addition the leg room was sufficient for my height tho the width of the seats are typical narrow the movies are current i caught up with some great ones

excellent friendly and helpful staff from checkin at melbourne all the way during the flight and until we landed in japan our seats were premium economy which were very comfortable and even economy looked pretty good not as tight or as many seats as per other airlines they even gave us travel goodie bags during the flight with tasty snacks in them slippers were comfy for the flight as were the blankets and pillows
only if they could be more trained to know english also food quality needs to be upgraded specially for indian food

its been at least years since i had last flown japan airlines the business class fare were very reasonable so i decided to give it a try not the newest business class seats but in terms of service food and amenities all up to todays standards first i would like to mention the warm and friendly greetings for amenities i love the cabin slippers and in the washroom love the individual mouth wash packets oral care is so important when traveling the drink menu was my highlight with sakes and umeshu as options and for dining i opted for japanese cuisine presented beautifully a great way to travel to japan

the best staffs very friendly and very very accomodating love the food super delicious chair was roomy and entertainment on tv was great ontime and love the boarding process cant wait to fly to this airline again in february of next year

not flown yet but amazing business class deals on bacom using ba avios booking months ahead jal offers reward seats to other oneworld partner ffs flat beds in jal suite flying hours honolulu to narita for just avios and oneway also kyoto to shanghai jclass flying hours for avios and cash price ticket osapvg without avios is eyewateringly expensive oneway for such a short very popular international flight

this was our first experience flying with jal and it was wonderful the food and service in first was superlative it was intuitive service where your wish was anticipated before having to ask i travel often with ba first class but this is a much better product i will definitely fly with jal again great airline and service

after a smooth checkin at the counter i spend sometimes in the sakura jal lounge it may be a bit difficult to find following the sign get me lost the lounge is quite big and is divided into several sections those who love window seats may enjoy the window counter seating that has an awesome view of the runway for those whod like to do some work a photocopier machine and other facilities provided there is also a room for reclining chairs smoking room is also available food is properly prepared and presented and is tasty enough to fill you up before boarding the plane drinks soft drinks wine beer tea coffer are served staff at the gate are very efficient the flight departs and arrives on time the flight is pleasant seat is clean comfortable equipped with necessary facilities legroom is great too staff are nice courteous and willing to help meals are ok not that great but well presented the amenity kit is average though

my husband and i recently flew jal for the first time and we plan on using them again in the future our trip was to saigon from san diego and from there we flew to a few other countries on a budget airline i think that helped us really appreciate jal their service was wonderful the seats and legroom were pretty standard and i believe two of our flights were delayed but i think the good service helped me look past all of that i loved our food on the flight to asia and the food on the flight back wasnt bad either they have young chefs that create the meals and they include a little bio about these emerging chefs with the meals which i thought was a nice little touch ive flown singapore airline for a flight to asia before and that was obviously top notch but i would say this is a good second place

jal has serious problems we arrived at haneda via qantas to onwardly fly with jal to london however jal refused to recongise my qantas issued business class tickets to allow access to the jal lounge even though we were flying business class with jal to london unbelievable similar to my previous report jal cannot be trusted and dont bother trying to argue with jal airline staff whose english is quite poor and obviously do not understand the real meaning of honouring codeshare partners as part of their one world partnership i am guessing we will have the same problems all the way home again jiggidyjigrigged off to have another arguement with jal about my return flights wish me luck

jal operate s which are comfortable and clean on the tokyo sydney route this flight departed and arrived on time the staff were the usual very pleasant japanese ladies who smile and go out of their way to assist the meal was good but not always up to business standard on some other more competitive routes

i hope that this review helps you because it contains information that i wish i had read prior to flying with jal which i have decided is the best airline i have ever flown with despite a lot of difficulty at first concerning being seated with my spouse for a very very long flight from san francisco to haneda tokyo to ho chi minh city vietnam and back i booked on jals website fullprice for two economy seats not on a code share at the end i expected to be able to select seats but i was not given this option this is not too uncommon for american carriers often you have to wait until hours or however long to select them online but because my husband has a painful medical condition which required him to be on medication while flying i wanted to be seated next to him to be able to assist him with coping he is fine to fly medically but his condition does require meditation and coping skills which i have been trained to assist him with and again requires that he be on medication so he is a little out of it when he flies we picked jal for our first long flight due to its outstanding reputation however we are not wealthy people so we had no real choice except to fly economy jal wound up being a fantastic airline but their customer service phone line and seat selection is horrible and we will fly with them again in the future because we intend to go to japan and several other places in asia especially after he found the flight tolerable for his condition but i will get to the good part of the review after the more negative and frustrating part so after i had entered my credit card information i was unable to select seats for us as anyone would i immediately called their phone number which in the us entailed waiting and waiting and waiting for many hours dropping connection several times and taking days to get through i considered cancelling the flight but felt with jals reputation that once we reached someone it would be resolved finally i did reach a customer service person on the phone and i was told i could check in prior to the flight online hours in advance and we could get seats together i briefly mentioned a medical issue being the core of my concerns but i did not belabor it simply trusting in the process and reputation of the airline hours prior to the flight i logged in and was unable to select seats still i again called jals customer service number and i received the information that it was hours in advance and to be sure to log in to the moment i queued up to log in to the website which was extremely complicated to use with many different pages nested strangely but i managed to log in within one minute after hours and there were no two seats next to one another we had been seated separately my spouse began to have a tremendous amount of fear and to suggest cancelling the entire threeweek prepaid vacation to vietnam i called again to the jal customer service number again waited in total i believe i called and waited for about hours over about five months to jals customer service people i finally got through to a representative who said there was nothing he could do he was terse and he said we should arrive at the airport early we live almost three hours from the airport but we arrived four hours early anyways there was a customer service agent at the checkin counter for jal fortunately but she was unable to assist and said she could only make a recommendation we waited in the line so that we were first to checkin for another hour and then the next customer service agent said the flight was overbooked and she could not assist either but to ask at the gate at this point my spouse looked like he was not going to get on the flight at all but he soldiered onwards i was so profoundly disappointed that nothing we had done had helped us simply get seats next to one another so that i could comfort him during a painful stressful time at boarding they again could not assist us and so we boarded the flight in separate cabins i found myself in a middle side seat next to what appeared to be two fairly young people perhaps college aged and i wound up asking the young man next to me if he would switch seats for a price and what price it would be and i said i would with extreme sincerity that i would not be upset if he said no because it was a long hour flight he said for he would allow my husband to sit in his seat so i gave him and they switched i think that was a fair price i would have been happy to give it directly to jal but they did not allow us to upgrade or anything my husband found his condition considerably less painful than expected much to our tremendous joy and he enjoyed the flight he loved jal as did i we flew from sfohanedahcmc and then from hanoinarita and took the limo bus to hanedasfo so thats quite a lot of flight time with jal we enjoyed every moment with them and my husband found his medical situation tolerable for a flight of this length so we will assuredly be taking more jal flights and we even signed up as members i asked finally why we couldnt switch flights since i could not find anything online about this except for people using miles or on codeshares and i wanted to avoid the problem in the future the jal in tokyo easily explained that the economy flight we selected was something called nclass a term i dont exactly know or understand but it must have mentioned it to me somewhere during my booking and meant nothing to me at all since its not a familiar code so my review is to let you know a few things as a traveler if you want to sit together for a flight do not book nclass flights on jal not only can you not change your seat you also cannot even upgrade jal has serious customer service problems on their phone lines in the us and have room for improvement there take jal anyways i always fly economy i always hate flying and jal is absolutely the best airline i have ever taken the food is amazingly good with a wide and changing menu plus great drinks and everything is free the staff onboard are incredibly nice and professional the seats are comfortable and large even in economy the inflight entertainment is excellent with top us films that change regularly they give you real pillows and blankets the captains were kind and present upon boarding the actual boarding process was a breeze the airport at haneda is easily my favorite airport in the world due to the great shopping food and concept in preboarding and narita is also an incredible hub with a train station to tokyo or narita right underneath and luggage check everyone is so kind and friendly and helpful and the entire plane is comfortable and classy and clean with a large percentage dedicated to sleeping seats it felt like luxury or maybe just civility to be able to fly this way as though we were flying back in the early s when airlines still took a sense of pride in their work as more than just cattle cars but i will find a way to ever avoid nclass tickets again i dont quite understand yet what these are but i will be googling soon also avoid the bassinet row thats where we sat a few rows behind the bassinets which is where they wisely offer families with young babies seating on the way back from hanoi incidentally there was no way at all to check in online for anyone in economy but in that case we arrived to the airport four hours early again and we got the best economy seats on the plane since we were first in the us being first did not assist at all i believe that they always do put families together that seemed their priority a grown husband with a medical condition who was still cleared to fly seemed a little harder to explain the urgency about but alls well that ends well we are now jal members and if you can afford the liedown seating i would take that although i didnt find much difference that i could see between priorityeconomy and economy we flew in economy i do sincerely hope they improve their phone customer service and website both are beneath the status of this carrier

few airlines can perform both with great service and ontime departure and arrival online checkin really helps ease up the line and the stress for travelers the meal is far best compared to all economy airlines servicing same routes absolutely the best service overall and will definitely fly again with jal

this was my first time with jal i was deciding between ana and jal but eventually decide to give this national airline a try it did not disappoint me first the service was as good as or even better than sq secondly they were extremely caring and customer centric mine was a midnight flight and my experience with other airline was meal served after two hrs regardless of the timing but jal only served small snack after we come aboard and served breakfast two hr before landing this allowed the passenger to get enough sleep i must commend their seats more spacious than many other airlines it was comfortable but only thing is their cushion was a bit hard when we reached tokyo for a domestic transit we just need to deposit the checked in luggage after we cleared the custom and the luggage can be picked up at your destination airport very customer centric and make it convenient for us i will go for jal from now onwards whenever i am travelling to japan

booked flight with jal and as no direct flight from manchester they arranged for a finnair flight to helsinki which was fineto connect with jal flight to tokyo the service was above and beyond the usual economy flight the air stewardesses worked hard all the way through the flight making sure everyone was looked after the plane was spotlessly clean food drink snacks and entertainment were very good would definitely fly with them again

this was my first time on jal since i had a negative experience they well and truly redeemed themselves seats are comfortable with lots of leg room nice food they had a menu which was created by young japanese chefs cabin crew were so helpful the only negative was that the inflight entertainment didnt change at the end of the month so the selection was the same in both may and june

be extra careful with your luggage two expensive backpacks were soaked wet with fishy smell liquid which ended up damaging our personal belongings gifts and souvenirs japan airlines will not assist with your losses if it does not fit perfectly in their description of luggage damage policy according to the jal representatives there are many passengers transporting undeclared products such as fish and seafood that can cause this type of big problem in your trip be prepared to protect your valuables no wonder why they emphasize waterproof luggage in the japanese stores when buying a new bag

this was our first time flying premium economy and it was worth every cent entry to the lounge made the start to our trip much more pleasant the seats and the screen were very large and there was a leg rest that came out to support your calves and also a foot rest there was a reading light in the seat and the entertainment was good the staff were very polite and friendly and the toilets were the largest id seen on a flight we were given a snack bag with chips water a pastry and a tim tam as well as the usual amenities pack i would definitely fly with jal again

this entailed two flights one from helsinki to tokyonarita airport and the other onto sydney both flights are over hours long with a hour layover at narita overall quite a long and tiring flight from start to finish jal is a wonderful airline very punctual and the hostesses cannot do enough for you food is either japanese or western and quite filling planes are spotless definitely recommend

thank you ff milesit was absolutely amazingthe flight was goodi expect that regardless of classhowever st class on jal is wonderfulthe seats are wonderful you bed is made up with a nice mattress amenities are very nice the service is superband the food and drink is better than superb they pride themselves on the foodwith good reasonthis flight made the tripthank you jal

we chose this flight after much reviews this was the only nonstop flight haneda airport is much closer to tokyo we were able to get reward miles with a partner airline jet blue hopefully this will materialize somehow we assumed jal had a great reputation now for the complaints we generally fly business class when it is a long flight we can compare this to past flights the flight was delayed hours and we were not informed japan airlines does not have its own well stocked business class lounge in jfk this was totally unexpected the lounge was overfilled and we went to another lounge at the airport the design of the business class seats were designed after a rectangular casket with a hard floor they ran out of food seems as though i am whining but it was not worth the extra expense and could have done better

i was very lucky to be upgraded to premium economy on the return flight from japan on the dreamliner i had traveled over in economy on a brand new boing and i was very impressed it was very comfortable with good food the usual great service from jal but the sky premium was just a notch above in both the seat level of service i would be more than happy to travel on either
whenever i have flown domestic services in japan jal is the one to choose first class service and extremely efficient embarking and disembarking procedures

the flight was on a new and was a good example of how jal runs their airline staff were pleasant and courteous the meal as good as it gets on aircraft these days and the flight arrived on time baggage always comes out fast a good airline
flight left at midnight which is not great but the meal was light and just right breakfast into narita was tasty service is restrained and polite in japanese way but excellent will use them again

new hrs in the air and service was greatlike a previous reviewer mentionedone of the best international flights i have ever had if you are taking a cruise out of yokohama best to fly into haneda airport much closer but this was booked through holland america and the price was much less
the flight was very good as was the return leg from narita to bangkok good service reliable and new b planes on both legs food was also ok as far as airline food goes

recently flew premium eco return to tokyo staff fantasticfood goodseats excellentairport lounges greatespecially at narita i have even decided if i fly to europe again ill go via tokyo on jal ps i have flown business class and even iston emirateslast year to paristhey managed to lose my luggage in dubai and not even an apology yesit was all very luxurious but you cant beat jal premium for value for money

the flights from nrt to cgk and back were nice and uneventful the planes were pretty new and the staff very good service even in coucheconomy i was told that jal is the only airline that offers umeshu for free that is plum wine i tried it and loved it the food was surprisingly good and i enjoyed them and the snacks too i used the wifi and thoroughly enjoyed the entertainment selections cant expect anything better than my flights with jal loved it and will fly it again soon

our flight was suppose to be on am tokyo time but by the time we were checked in on am we were informed that the flight was delayed for hours and we were given meal coupons as compensation after we dropped our baggage we spent the time to travel to the narita city visiting the shrine then we returned to narita airport to have lunch using the coupons the departure was on time as per delayed etd the flight was nice and the food was also okay we travelled with our year old baby so we specially ordered a bassinet for her all is good no complain
seat space is very generous for me m height height for my husband and my year old can sleep comfortably head on my lap and feet on my husbands lap food is great no delay

always flew delta whenever we flew from ph to us via narita but tried jal because they had a direct naritasan diego flight instead of naritalasan diego seating space was slightly more comfortable food was a little more palatable than what im used to and they offered more choices on the tray there were less english movie choices but it was interesting to watch the japanes movies overall its the little things that made this flight more comfortable than my usual flights i liked the array of pockets in front where i can store water gadgets and magazines separately service was lovely flight attendants were always nice and respectful despite the long flight best of all bathrooms were remained pristine even at the tail end of the flight with toothbrushes and ammenities laid out of you inside will definitely book jal next time i fly west coast
