from the time you approach the checkin area a personal assistant greets you and takes you through the checkin process each question is greeted with a bow the boarding area was thickly packed with people attendants walked through the crowd with signs in three languages to inform us of which rows were boarding and when making the entire process stress free on the plane the overhead bins can swallow lots of carryons the seats were modern comfortable blankets pillows and noisereducing headphones were all standard i flew on american airlines and we were packed like sardines airbus is the right term as you need to bring everything you want on the plane jal provides it all foodservice you get a choice of a japanese meal or a western meal along with complimentary alcoholic beverages this is definitely the way to fly the choice of movies was astounding as well as games music and tv shows go japan airlines the flight attendants bow each time you ask a question they show up within seconds of pushing the call button the lady next to me used this service quite a bit they are in a league of their own
although a very long flight i was pleased with the comfort of my seat flight attendants were well organized and service was excellent

we flew jal from haneda to sg changi on may my wife lost her glass case on plane we wrote to jal cust service they responded swiftly and advised us they have found the lost we collected the lost case in sg jal thumb up jal cheers adam nic singapore

jal gives us a not so nice in online reservation at first we might have make an error even we have selected gender male but thought it should auto populated as mr but required to select respectively it took us to make changes from ms to mr to reflect it correctly on my boarding pass this has to go through via email and phone call to make this small change we believed this needed to be improved in term of online application system should auto once we have choosed correct gender nevertheless jal boarding check in counter was a hassle free with quick n tip top check in services plane services was great too still will select jal as an air carrier to japan cheers adam nic singapore
thats quite good there are so many new arrivals of the entertainment movies and every time depart arrival time is on time

my husband and i have flown jal from perth to sapporo and return for several years now and have no complaints we usually fly qantas from perthsing singperth and i can honestly say that theres a significant difference in leg room price wise we choose jal due to the luggage allowance pc kg checked plus kg carry on a no brainer since we take our own ski gear we like the large variety of food although the actual food service is somewhat slow due to their attentiveness of each customer the staff are kind friendly and helpful

absolutely great schedule leaving sydney at am and arriving at around pm in narita great timing because you can connect to onward flights or do a stopover in narita very nice cabin service although a huge imbalance of men and women in the business cabin very few women were in the cabin making me want to pull my screen up and invoke my privacy option japanese men slurp their noodles and soup be warned however this is a very good value flight recommended

i sat in skysuite a next to the window on this particular jal flight skysuites afford good privacy when the dividing screen is up this was particularly important on this flight as i was astonished to be just of women amongst more than male travelers in this cabin and therefore valued the privacy i also thought that the flight attendants pandered to the male passengers or maybe it was because they were more demanding i was thankful that the privacy factor was so good in this aircraft configuration and i really like the personal suite entry corridor meaning there are no legs to step over having used jal business many times over the years my only other disappointment is their menus which always consist of a japanese or western menu the choice rarely deviates from fish or beef which i find monotonous however this airline has an impeccable schedule it has the ability to depart an airport up to half an hour late yet arrive at its destination on time i also find all their schedules socially friendly and connect well their prices too are good value against the top tier airlines yet seat and cabin comfort is in many cases superior excellent comfort and value

my passport fell out of my pocket while i slept and disappeared under my seat the purser and all her staff were very helpful trying to locate it while we were flying but it took very prompt support from a technician who dismantled the seat within minutes of landing to find it great service

im someone who doesnt like flying or airports so travelling business class is a must on long haul flights though ive flown many times this was my first on japan airlines and i was pleasantly surprised there was more storage than most other airlines and seemed more space maybe because of better design the cabin crew were first class and the inflight meals were excellent for dining in transit the whole experience had a fresh feel as some other well known brands are getting a little tired and it shows

great crew very professional and friendly they worked hard from the start of the flight until the end however for those passengers who order special meals they will not get the ice cream the airline attendants will hand the ice cream to only passengers who requested normal meals i did not like this and a couple of passengers became upset with the ice cream issue perhaps jal should come up with a better way to distribute the ice cream aside from that and horrible turbulence that lasted nearly four hours the airline is worth the money

ive been to asia many times over the years and knew what the long flight entails my wife has never been that far on a plane and wasnt sure what to expect after hours of flying time she was very impressed we selected the premium economy seating for the full round trip the seats were very spacious and comfortable we had over movies to choose from plenty of music choices along with games to keep us entertained on the screen as well the cabin attendants to me are the very best in the business theyre always smiling and super polite even after hours into the flight they all were very pleasant and happy to serve this is how an airline should treat their customers all of the food options were great too traveling by plane is no longer enjoyable as in years past and can be very stressful however japan airlines has giving me hope that there is still a friendly and comfortable way to fly out there other airlines should follow their lead if i could give six starsi would simply the best
nice and friendly service good video device delicious food and comfortable seat are there any other choces i think the answer is no
the flight going over was on american airlines nothing special typical aa service the return flight was jal seats were wider and more leg room flight attendant service was excellent

roomy seats great movie selection only advice is dont rely solely on the meals they serve some really weird meals i would pack my own before the lounge in tokyo was great so eat there but the lounge at jfk was the air france lounge which was a complete embarrassment

i was tired and was looking forward to a rest on my trip home then the guy next to me sits down with a babe in lap great well i was lucky in that this was the best behaved babe on the flight in that he whined a couple of times for a few seconds until dad gave him what he wanted and a few times his foot relaxed and fell on my seat then dad pulled it back like i said i was lucky that this babe sat next to me as he actually didnt bother me at all i am glad i wasnt sitting next to the two or three other babes on the flight that were bothering me for a good portion of the flight it seemed they were tag teaming so at least one of them was crying also i am more comfortable not reclining my seat and when the seat in front of me is reclined i found it hard to focus on the tv screen as it is too close to my face

i have flown on many different airlines and different types of planes i must say that this had very little room for my feet under the seat in front of me because the electronics box for my entertainment screen took a generous portion of the room for my feet there was plenty of room for my legs but not for my feet other than that i thought the flight was very good i would think that this was a thing and not a japan airlines thing
it was around hours no snacks plenty of offers for beverages but for a hour flight an option firs acts would have been great staff attentive

time and time again we were impressed flight service but yet always treated pretty horrible by jal ground staffs whilst some a friendly most of the time we get snobbish slow moving stone faced ladies this time served by a lady named kobuchi who spent lengthy minutes rechecking our travel documents like we were criminals been to japan times and immigration is always a breeze jal please train your staff on international travel documents and somemanners if they wish to thorough in their checks this is my last jal flight
the service and food were exceptional getting on in melbourne after midnight the main idea is to sleep and wake up refreshed in tokyo

i took the flight jl with japan airlines jal from tokyo japan narita international airportnrt to honolulu hawaii hi daniel k inouye international airport honolulu in march with a boeing in a seating configuration and the flying experience was a very positive one the flight was long haul about hours and the flight attendants provided excellent service served meal and also generously coffee snacks and beverages alcoholic drinks free of charge the given amenities were very satisfactory the seats were very comfortable having enough legroom sky jal widerincreased seat width to make the journey really nice and enjoyable japan airlines jal is a member of the one world airlines alliance considered to be one of the best airlines in the world and has gained the recognition of customers collecting many awards and accolades over the years eg for jal has been voted asias leading airline asias leading airline for economy class for business class and also for first class etc and continues to enhance the quality of the services provided i enjoyed my flight with japan airlines from tokyo and honolulu and i will fly again in the near future if the opportunity arises

we always travel jal when traveling to either the uk or europe for a few reasons jal service is always excellent the on time commitment for the majority of times is achieved you can break your trip at an airport hotel with a good nights sleep meal thrown in on the ticket price and jal is still the cheapest business class fare i have been flying for over years with jal and would recommend the air line to anybody

jal experience was all good and better than ba with whom we flew home the jal was code share so good opportunity to compare we had seat allocation at booking and on check in were given lounge access an unexpected bonus new seats in premium economy were good and new reclining system excellent food was reasonable but not fantastic but service from crew was excellent good flight haneda is also much better to fly into with monorail and train access to tokyo much quicker than narita

i have flown this route many times japan airlines provides a consistent experience in both their hard product seats meals and very helpful attitude of their employees the seats in business class for this short flight about hours are not lie flat and the window seats do not have direct aisle access typically these arent problems for a short flight the boarding process was a stress free experience on this particular flight there were high winds at narita forcing multiple landing attempts the pilot informed us of this possibility shortly after takeoff it was useful to know this in advance

while we had some language problems with the flight attendants they went out of the way to help while most airlines have a hour window for special meals jal is however aa sent a note to jal and jal came through the flight crew was attentive friendly and actually seemed to care i was impressed that being said there could be better coordination with aa for executive platinum members sometimes the oneworld benfits get lost it also sucks to get stuck litterally at the back of the plane as an elite flyer

my wife and i flew to japan on jal a couple of weeks back in economy class we flew on the which was new and comfortable service by the jal stewardesses was quite superb so polite efficient and friendly hard to believe we were in economy this was as good as business class food was excellent too possibly the best flight i have ever been on and i have flown extensively over the last years

after living in japan for five and a half year the one thing i miss the most about japan aside from the food is its super advanced toilet and i did not expect that japan airlines would actually bring that toilet experience onto its flight literally the amenities those buttons gosh those buttons and the cleanliness screamt japan and it almost moved me to tears as for the rest it had just the right legroom space entertainment was plenty enough for an hour flight and the service was overall nice not a big fan of the inflight meal but it was paid off with a great glass of umeshu

getting onto a flight from japan to new york and realised that japan airlines had put a mobility impaired man in the aisle seat with my partner and i on the window and middle of course everyone has a right to travel but my question is whether they support dangerous seating conditions with tow able bodied people to now have to navigate over someone who cant move out of their seat if there was an emergency or fire where evacuation was required we would be stuffed literally he wouldnt be able to get out in time and we would have to physically get over him or assist him to get out this is a highly dangerous situation which japan airlines condones unfortunately qantas did a very similar thing before and after complaining realised it was a fault in their system that shouldnt allow it very disappointed with japan airlines you may wish to rethink your journey with them
wonderful experience the attendants went out of their way to make you feel comfortable ive flown many airlines and jals team understands what customer services is unlike other companies out there

cabin crew are excellent there service is the best they always try to maintain the cleanness of the toilet the movie on the plane is new and variously for choose the last thing i will recommend is the meal on the plane its worse than ever and let us feel a little disgusting

the flight attendants were very attentive and smiled all the time during the last two hours i slept and missed the last snack they left a purple note as a reminder to let them know if anything is needed that was really thoughtful the food meals are delicious and healthy they even made rounds for tea coffee or juice from time to time i like the attached cushion on the seat head and soft pillows more comfortable leg room was more spacious and has stainless footrests the bathroom needed to be cleaned often during the flight

booked aa but flew jal because of codeshare was glad i did cause got the chance to experience jal and experience what others were sayingsurely it was a long nonstop flight but the service food inflight entertainment for economy class is on par with all the other asian airlinea lot better than their american counterparts

on line check in is permitted only h in advance and unfortunatelly despite beeing on the same reservation my husband and i didnt receive two seats one near to the other weve been lucky that a passenger has been so kind to switch his seat with my husband otherwise we had to fly for almost h one far from the othter on the web site is also impossible to book a special meal company doesnt offer such a great service on ground too because the phone service for the domestic flight hasnt english speaking attendandts so you need to talk to an interpreter who translates you what the attendant says and vice versa a never ending phone call japanese food on board is pretty good while the western isnt that great on board assitents are very kind and polite

having almost always flown singapore airlines my family decided to try jal to japan the price was slightly cheaper compared to sq we were pleasantly surprised to find that the seats were slightly bigger than normal with good leg space cabin was very clean and the food was nice my family actually finished the meal although it was an am flight there was no breakfast but lunch was served hours into the flight the only other meal served was a small snack at about hours before we landed of course there were no lovely singapore girls attending to us but the stewardess were very warm sincere and polite service was very good perhaps a better command of the english language would help as the flight was filled with well behaved japanese it was very quiet and comfortable no inconsiderate behavioural nor people talking loudly etc we will fly jal again
great attitudes warmly welcome cleanliness nice food comfort and most important i got sleep well in plane

never again jal we have travelled with many an airline but your deception has spoilt our travel even before we have left the ground our booking was planned months ago business class for a conference but jal has allowed the timetable to be hijacked what we didnt realise is that even though it was clearly a jal booked itinerary nevetheles one section was covertly copartnered with british airways who cancelled their flight throwing our itinerary to buggery what was a one stop travel intinerary has now become three stops what was only hours travel has become filled with lengthy layovers extending the travel up to a possible hours given jals short notice and a conference committment there was no option for us to cancel and jal has not indicated any compensation arguing that it was bas fault who argued that it was jals fault with no real explanation this corporate aerial pingpong with no apology or compensation is seriously frustrating and distressing which indicates a lack of care for customers who become vulnerable victims at the mercy of jalsbas corporate whims which actually costs customers time and money having to adjust budgets accommodation reorganise work and meeting schedules and even family committments etcetera etcetera jalba it is not good enough we your customers demand that you stick to your committments accept responsibility and the consequences of your actions that can decimate your customers plans and compensate us accordingly rather than cowardly whimping and leaving your customers to pay for your mistakes

from the moment you check in to the moment the plane pushes back from the gate the service is impeccable the boarding time for an entire international flight took less than min and we were on our way we flew out of yvr and stopped briefly in nrt on our way to sgn we will fly jal again and recommend it to anyone flying along the pacific rim
not recommended to choose jal the staff at kansai airport counter were very slow to handle baggage queuing for one hour to finish baggage check in

useless call centre in hong kong lied to us about what dates we could change our tickets then said sorry and they will not charge us but charged us anyway they leave you on hold for minutes while they calculate the fee difference but each come up with a different number for the same day

the night flight from kuala lumpur to tokyo was comfortable and the crew was very attentive but the cabin was a bit too warm love the premium economy sits and extra spacious toilets from tokyo narita to kuala lumpur was great the sakura lounge was very packed but organised food was good as usual the crew was very attentive continues flow of drinks and food love the cup udon haagendazs icecream and bread cabin temperature was just right the awardwinning prawn curry rice was good too

excellent service and flight tofrom south korea to tokyo its been many years since i flew jal last trip was from sfo to hnd on a which was very long now the new tech planes help take traveling easier this was our half trip to japan and loved the great service courteous staff and nice flight short trip from gimpo to haneda but flew in a huge boeing dreamliner that had lots of leg room and great meal service which was unexpected considering the flight was only hours for the money we paid about double what it would normally cost but that was because we were heading to tokyo for the cherry blossom viewing sakura luckily we had already eaten at the airport lounge and did not have too much to eat on board on time performance and easy gate location on both ends made the flight that much more enjoyable

this is our second time with jal the first time was last year flying from vancouver to manila the service is very good from checkin until we got off the plane the cabin crew are very attentive to all the passengers and always smiling our seats are wider as compared to other airlines the cabin smells fresh the food they served is what i liked best i have no complain with the quantity and the quality they start serving the miso soup before they serve the main entree and you can ask for more soup until youre satisfied the last they serve is ice cream aside from the dessert included on the food tray coffee and tea are nonstop and i even requested for decaf for dinner my only complain on our nd flight was the washroom because towards the end of the flight it was already dirty maybe because it was a very full flight and the attendants were so busy attending to all the needs of the passengers thats why they had no time to makeup the washroom i hope it will not be the same on our next flight back to manila this coming august nevertheless its still our favorite airline and well keep on using it as long as they offer reasonable rate

japan airlines codeshares with finnair and we found both the airlines very good the route traverses russiasiberia near the north pole and the experience and scenery itself is a treat helsinki is a sort of northern version of the middle east transit terminals but much more relaxed and less frantic there are two stops at tokyo and helsinki but the waiting time was short the trip only took an extra hours compared to the middle east routes and in my opinion is worth the extra time the business class prices were several thousand dollars cheaper than the comparable middle east routes the planes are modern and the cabin crew service was excellent

i flew jl b nrt to lax in business in may check in at nrt airport was smooth and helpful being oneworld emerald i was able to use jl first lounge there are two at nrt airport the one next to customimmigration is more crowded than the other side of terminal the only notable difference between two locations was sushi the other side did not offer it but if you like less crowded more relaxed environment id recommend the far side lounge departurearrival were on time as always jl offered one of the best services in the class i like the mattress availability of extra blanket many food options and you can eat whenever you feel like up to two hours before arrival entertainment system is top notch another great experience with jl

i have been boarding jal since i moved to australia their service has been improved since a few years ago especially meal service is excellent especially we can enjoy nice japanese cuisine also full flat bed sheet provides private room for each passenger wifi service is available with good connection strongly recommend this airline when going to australia

the dreamliner service on this route is very good and certainly a great way to get from australias east coast to europe jal staff seem to expect passengers to fit and remove their own seat mattress also the little cardigans they provide are strange the japanese menu is highly recommended the downside of this route is japanese immigration at narita

we took our first trip to tokyo from jfk i was nervous about flying that long before you knew it we were high above the clouds and the flight attendants started serving food but first in typical japanese style warm hot towels for washing your hands not boring airline food but tasty and distinctly japanese also miso soup as well then they even served h√§agendazs ice cream after a little nap they came around with delicious sandwiches and then finally another meal before we landed this time it was pasta with the most delicious creamy sauce totally worth not counting the calories on this flight it surely made this long flight seem very short our returning flight from narita to jfk was exactly the same as in great however this time around they pulled off entirely different meals except for the beverages and miso soup everything else was completely different and completely delicious and this was in economy class can you imagine what they serve up in first class the flight attendants were cordial kind efficient and pleasant inflight entertainment system was great as well dozens and dozens of movies and tv shows if we ever have the chance to go back to japan we know we will only be flying japan airlines
not so many latest movies and music compare to other airlineit had a lot of explanation in the programme too much hospitality

i had a rush need to get to europe hence buying the first available flight what a surprise and contrast from my qantas flights from brisbane to tokyo the difference was chalk and cheese qantas at best waste best mediocre whereas jal was sensational the staff were polite attentive and made you feel as if you were important to them the in flight entertainment was great as was the food the choices and the variety japanese as well as european on my return to haneda i had an overnight staying at the airport and a day in tokyo brilliant if i had to use one word to describe the trip with jal flawless cant wait to fly jal again

it was superb female stuff were all flawlessly beautiful and polite and attentive it is quite common knowledge among us this is the best airline within our country but it was far better than others and it felt as the customers were better crowd and i did not get the annoying and inconsiderate normal crowd who will do unbelievably rude things and they acted much better and that was important for me that there was no disturbance in that way or people around us have better sense or selfconfidence around them and not bother people in a horrific way that we see on the news i did not see any fight or people abusing others like on youtube videos every time i have to go home from the states i would choose this airline

jal have checkin security and flight connection procedures down to a fine art what a pleasure to deal with their staff they are courteous beyond belief the aircraft was whisper quiet and the cabin crew and service were outstanding well done jal we will certainly travel with you again

it was inevitable to be delayed due to the bad weather but they made late announcement and kept changing gates which was annoying by having said that flight was smooth and short with professional cabin crews i have lost my headphones in the airplane upon arriving at oita but they kept it for me to retrieve except bits of miscommunication well recommended airline

their flight attendants always serve you with warmest smile and kind hearted they walk all the the time to serve your drink and food the toilets restroom are always in a clean condition and nice smelling the seat was clean and neat the plane arrival and departure is always on time the food are delicious and lucky me i got the food menu from the chef competition many choices for drink try their originally juice from japan my son only complain about the lack of anime movie in the flight entertainment that using english subtitle only available

travelled to tokyo and back on jal punctual and efficient extremely courteous service with excellent food choices good clean cabin and spacious seats for a change were seated togetherwithout having to pay the return flight from tokyo was to leave at am all passengers were offered food and drink in the lounge to avoid disturbing sleep on board excellent touch strongly recommended

i cant click to rate legroomseat comfortin flight entertainmentcustomers service and the rest i would give points for all of them flight was delayed one hour plane stayed on runway for one hour before take off on the way back to melbourne no reasons offered besides all communication are in japanese with minimal english translation meals are basic very hard to ask for a glass of water we offer to refill by bottle but they refuse just give one child cup at a time they are not happy as we asked for a lot of water to hydrate

hotels in tokyo are expensive particularly if you are visiting in cherry blossom season i dont normally fly with jal because the cost is relatively high but this flight departs from haneda at in the early hours this gives you a full day but saves night in the hotel also its a lot cheaper and quicker to travel to haneda than narita even a taxi is affordable if you have luggage the airport is also quieter and smaller with only international terminal if you can sleep on the plane the timing is good and easier to recover from jet lag finally its in the same club as ba so you still get your air miles i spent more on the airfare but saved an expensive hotel had less hassle and got home early the following day

our eight hour flight to tokyo was very comfortable and satisfactory the customer service was excellent our every needs fulfilled the seat was spacey and comfortable making the flight a convenient experience two thumbs up for jal keep up the good work

i am normally a star alliance flyer but for this particular holiday to kyoto and tokyo we found a great deal on jal and wanted to give it a try both the outbound bkk osaka kix and inbound from nrt were dreamliner but the biz class configuration differed the outbound to osaka was the traditional jal shell flat seat without partitions which i thought was dated the return flight from tokyo featured their sky suite which was a great deal better recommendation is still for aisle seats if two of you are traveling together both flights were on time on board service excellent food pretty good met all expectations that i would expect from a japanese carrier two criticisms first was the limited english language capability at narita airport check in counter one would have thoughtand secondly for some unexplained reason which remains unexplained by jal to this day i couldnt pre select seats on my return flight to bangkok on jal website will certainly fly jal again if the price is right otherwise have to stick to star alliance for mileage purposes

on our most recent flight from japan to la we decided to fly by japan airlines from narita transportation to narita was quick and easy we used the airport limousine bus which stops at many hotels in the tokyo area we boarded the bus at the ana intercontinental hotel the cost for the bus is less than taking the narita express and frees you from having to push your way through tokyo station and navigate nearly half a dozen escalators the bus dropped us off right in front of the terminal the line at the checkin counter moved quickly the staff noticing our stroller we were traveling with our threeyearold daughter opened an additional terminal to get us through more quickly security was efficient and polite when the flight was ready to board we were allowed to get on early we found our economy seats large and roomy with lots of foot room the size you might expect on economyplus at another airline each seat had a blanket pillow and headphones the inflight entertainment monitor had a good selection of movies games and music however the headphone jack was the kind usually found on airplanes the twopront variety it worked well with the cheap airline headphones but i had to be careful not to bump the jack when using my bose qc headphones or the sound would cut off our flight left the terminal ontime but it took nearly minutes of taxiing before we finally took off the larger seats and headroom were much appreciated on our hour flight to la and even more appropriated on the andahalf hour return flight the flight passed quickly enough the inflight meal was airlinemediocre but we had brought food for the flight from a shop at the terminal arrival al los angeles was painless and we got through immigration and customs quickly the only problem we had was our primetime shuttle which never arrived to pick us up or half a dozen other people who were also waiting we had to spend for a taxi to get to our hotel in orange county avoid primetime shuttles at all cost a month later they still havent refunded our payment though they promised an immediate refund getting back to our flight japan airlines gave us comfortable seats good service and a reasonable price i highly recommend them

one word old everything is so old in the plane it is so dusty and we kept sneezing and who serves cup noodles as a meal for business class service is ok but the quality is poor seats are comfortable for business class but they should really revamp their old planes

so it turns out im not a great flyer mostly takeoff but i couldnt speak more highly of jal from check in to landing ive never been treated better in my life seats comfy as flight crew friendly and helpful and the food omg better than most restaurants will definitely fly with japan airlines again
this was a sensational experience the staff a very friendly and the service was second to none would not hesitate to flight jal again

i recently took a flight with jal for the first time to see if heir accommodations are worth the premium plane fare than those middle eastern airlines the food is at par exceptionally great like those middle eastern airlines well prepared very good presentation sumptuous and worth the calories however in the amenities side jal lags behind double row window seats and quad row for the aisle no privacy despite the raising divider your seat sinks to the ground when you want recline you could imagine the dirt on floor near your face i think jal is old plane and should be retired those middle eastern airline are much superior in comfort and price much lower so would i take jal maybe if its a new plane that offers single row window seats that doesnt sink to the floor

wanted to try jal as theres hardly discount for jal and usually flew with cheaper airline to japan turns out the difference between ticket for pe and economy seat is just sgd oneway so forked out additional sgd to get better comfort its all worth the extra money as they allow to use loungegive priority for luggage additional amenity and significant legroom compared to economy class however boarding was together with economy which i thought could be adjusted in the near future i flew other airlines but jal has two additional features which i dont see in other aircraft tiny foothold under everyones seat which crew used to step and reach out to overhead compartment normally i would just step on the seat mirror in overhead compartment which allows you to see if any luggage was left out without the need to peak inside this feature is very helpful for petite and short individuals food was good and sufficient entertainment to survive any flight one disheartened event for me is when jal refused to compensate my damaged baggage claim definitely wouldnt fly jal again due to its high price and unwillingness to extend customer service

the dreamliner plane was spacious seats are nice and wide and the service was impeccable they ran out of one of the options for lunch which was no big deal as both options were nice and gave us an apology treat they really go above and beyond to make sure you are comfortable during your flight would not hesitate to fly with them again and recommend them to everyone

jal continues to provide exceptional attention to service in terms of courtesy punctuality comfort care for its passengers regardless of the class of service seating arrangements in their aircraft has placed long haul passenger comfort at the forefront of their travel arrangement well done jal thankyou for an excellent journey

excellent airline on all segments flights were on time or early no other airline ive flown with can board and unboard passengers so quickly amazing food was great too seats were comfortable and spacious enough

a pleasant impression flew with jal children are prioritized in their flight when you start checking in flight counter you can request kids meal for your child but the rule is supposed to tell a few days before your departure date passengers with babies and children are prioritized to board the plane first inside the plane you are also friendly greeted by the flying attendant and will be informed if there is available kids meal for your child for the baby will also be asked if you need bassinet or other needs such as diapers for your baby toys from jal as compliment also available and given as soon you reach your destination

in april several friends and me took flights from singapore to osaka to attend business meetings and took chances for sightseeing during sakura season we prebooked the flights with transit at tokyo in december because it was one of the cheapest commercial flights available then while i dislike the longer routes with transit of about hours in narita however i enjoy the free meals and generous luggage allowances offered by jal the transit at narita need to check because it is from international to domestic terminals vv of about hours are sufficient and smooth on inward bound journey arrival at osaka itami airport is also nearer to the city then kix overall i enjoy the excellent inflight services by jal

its my favourite airline so far food at its airport lounge is good seats can go down about degrees for the premium economy so i could get a good night sleep spacious enough to stretch my legs and i m metres tall service onboard is prompt whenever you asked for something even for a pen the aircrew always get back to you quickly and are always with a smile and very ready to help unlike sia but the food onboard need to improve a little kind of tasteless and blend throughly japanese service i would always choose jal if they have flights to wherever i want to go to
great airline with courteous staff and good food seats are comfortable no problems with checking in entertainment is good

air crew were so beautiful nothing was too much trouble and they were very attentive we elected the japanese meal option which was very nice especially the sake and a great introduction to japanese food cabin was older tvs smallish and bed not so comfortable

we flew economy because my wife and i like two seats together and jal have two four two configuration in economy the bowing dreamliner was very quite and the cabin staff were excellent looking after our every need because of the long distance we decided to stopover at narita and this was a great decision as it cut the journey time in the air in half and we arrived in moscow refreshed and ready to go having had a good nights sleep in a hotel close to the airport great airline and great way to do this journey

this was the best flight i have flown on the is a great plane the seat leg room was better than an a the service was great as was the foodbeverages the entertainment wasnt as extensive or appealing as i have experienced but i did find things to while away the time flying again with them in nov so that is my endorsement

i took the flight jl with japan airlines jal from seoul south korea incheon international airport icn to tokyo japan narita international airport nrt in march with a boeing on a row seats and i really enjoyed it on the ground everything went smoothly although it was necessary to take a shuttle train to the boarding gates the take off was on time and on the air all the crew has delivered excellent service although the flight was not long haul about hours the flight attendants served generously both snacks and drinks free of charge the seats were comfortable having enough legroom to make the short journey really nice and enjoyable japan airlines jal is considered to be a very good airline as different awards prove it eg for jal named best economy class airline seats for the second time in the annual skytrax world airline awards at the paris air show the first time was etc and continues to try hard to provide excellence service i enjoyed my flight with japan airlines and i will fly again in the near future if the opportunity arises

once again i chose jal to fly from sydney to tokyo and home the service was immaculate with very courteous and attentive staff amazing food and good entertainment fellow travellers were very considerate too probably because you feel so welcomed highly recommend this airline
not as spacious as a but well laid out in business class with comfortable flat beds and very good service food was ok complimentary travel pack basic
very comfortable seats with lots of room food like economy but that is ok plus access to lounge at airports luggage came promptly

the legroom in jal premium economy is great seats fold back into themselves so you dont have person in front taking any of your space the space in between the seats mean even if you are in a row you dont touch the other passenger plenty of seats for couples definitely worth it food is the only let down
brilliant food and service staff charming and kind in flight entertainment all worked properly dreamliner is great aircraft and very comfortable

the journey was a pleasant one as the seat and legroom are spacious the screen is also bigger than the other airlines i only watch movie during meal time and had comfortable sleep throughout for meal it was quite a nice surprise to be given steel utensil and not plastic ones and the best part even the planes toilet was installed with electronic bidet
very good flight we will fly jal again the food was good and service was good i can recommend this airline

great service and i slept very well after seeing good films the food was delicious and just the right amount i feel better after flying in the dreamliner i think it must have something to do with the air plus it doesnt seem so noisy or maybe it was because the earphones were so good

decided on my first flight from gothenburg to helsinki that i needed to do some more work and get some good rest during my flight to tokyo so in helsinki i located the japan airlines service desk and upgraded from economy to premium economy cost was fixed at euros thought is was a bit hefty but in retrospect it was worth it the seats were wide the table big the food really good and the amenity kit helped me on a couple of good hours of sleep no problems with space for my legs im cm and i also enjoyed the size of the ife screen only minus was that the in flight announcements cut right through the movie i was watching at a nonadjustable volume which was really loud with my headphones otherwise highly recommended

one of the best airlines in the world inflight entertainment and food are also phenomenal they really try to the fullest for their customers at all times if you have any chance to fly jal do not think twice recomanded

japan airlines is by far the best ive ever flown with from little details such as disposable house slippers for the flight and the quality of the packaging of the meals which were also of superior quality to bigger things like the friendliness and service provided by the flight attendants jal is always going to be my goto airline when traveling to asia
very good service on time well organized check in boarding and cabin crew very efficient and helpful

its a longhaul flight basically its difficult for the body however it was minimum the cabin sheet and equipment are new and not tired the cabin temperature is slightly warmer although i called an attendant a few times they took care of my calls very smoothlythe food service is nothing special but its enough the outstanding point is in a washroom i used it several times it was always clean the crew tied to maintain the washroom constantly and i guess that the passengers are also trying to keep a clean themselves generally speaking nobody does not want to defile the cleanness

extremely friendly stewardess which i think is a japanese custom but i was served by a good looking stewardess who is very friendly and smiling while serving it adds a bit of bonus with that kind of gesture and service toilet is amazing it has that latest technology flush just like what you expect in any toilets in japan food is definitely amazing top notch when i went to the toilet i saw the stewardess took a big bamboo pot of rice out and mix them so you can imagine fresh hot white sushi rice since mine was a night flight i went for a snack food japanese style it is served to me in a small course bento ish with rice surprise to see that much of food after hours flight they start serving lunch where i chose japanese meal this comes with a bento of cold sushi and other cold dishes follow by main course where i had a grilled salmon with rice and some condiments i totally enjoyed my flight experience on japan airlines the only downside for this airline is the headset it doesnt really provide that much soundproof and i didnt like the way they packaged them up in a cheap plastic bag would love if they could put in a nice headset cover as if you are using the bose headset overall i give on my experience

the aircraft was a new and was comfortable and clean the flight departed on time and arrived on time and the staff were typical jal ladies courteous and pleasant the food on this leg is very good as jal have to compete with others so they do it well maybe she was tired after the long flight but the senior attendant took an order for the second meal and then completely forgot about it not to jal standards

long haul flights arways are always trying but this flight and crew made a long haul flight relatively comfortable the crew were attentive as japan air always are there was very little turbulence even the food was well presented and tasty

their operation is very puncutal and the staffs are very polite so yu can feel yourself upgraded you should check in advance from which side you can see mr fuji and book a seat of the side in winter you can see the best fujicovered by the snow
the seat is very comfortable because the seat is made from rather and very kind for my daughter for example elaborate airplane toy are presented

my husband and i travelled to and from tokyoheathrow with jal on our honeymoon the seats are incredibly spacious and comfortable with one of their planes offering seated aisles as standard no awkward middle seat the quantity and variety of their movies and tv shows is insane youre spoiled for choice the staff are incredibly friendly and polite i didnt get on with the food on both flights and the staff were very apologetic and as we were departing they apologised again really great service the main downfall unfortunately is the food except for the soba noodles on the return flight there are very odd combinations and if youre near the back of the plane the only decent sounding option is unavailable choice was fried chicken or prawn curry can you guess which one was left over all in all i would definitely fly with jal again but id make sure to bring some snacks

once again we had the opportunity to fly jal japan airlines to tokyo their premium economy is excellent and value for your money on the ground you have access to their business class lounges both at dfw and narita the dallas lounge is very basic where the narita sakura lounge is twolevels and has every amenity you can think of in the air jal had the same high level of service as we experienced previously the premium economy seats are comfortable have great legcalf support as well as a foot rest since the seats slide forward rather than recline backwards there is no problem within a reclining seat interfering with the monitor or tray table food continues to be extremely good well presented favorable and high quality there are several choices in addition to snack service and a snack bar if you go hungry its your own fault the flight attendants are attentive pleasant and appear to really enjoy serving their guests yes i use the word guests rather than passengers we look forward to our next jal flight
very nice helpful and polite cabin crews yummy meals throughout the flight spacious seats and hassle free checkin and boarding love it

in april of this year my wife and i used the services of japanese airlines when flying from moscow to tokyo we used the services of this airline for the first time and our flight took place on the boeing dreamliner t was an unforgettable flight on a beautiful plane with a great airline business class seats allowed for a hour layover sleep drinks and food were excellent both japanese and european dishes were offered the flight attendants were nice and helpful my wife and i express our sincere gratitude to the japanese airlines company for the wonderful flight as usual i express my gratitude to yandex translator for the preparation of this post because english is not my native language

wonderful compartment seats that turn into beds they put down a pad and give you a comforter and pillow the service was outstanding and the food was the best ive ever had on a flight would highly recommend on the way to japan we were in business class and it was very good

jal operate relatively new s on the melbourne tokyo route and do a good job this flight was on time the service was friendly and polite as you would expect the meal was average but it departs after midnight which is a negative so most prefer to sleep you can do a lot worse than jal

the pilot is superb the legroom is comfortable the service is great with regards to food staff and the timeliness of the scheduled flight if you bought your ticket through american airlines and you want to upgrade your ticket jal will not allow it until you call aa the problem with that is if you you are flying when us offices are close you are out of luck

i was expecting refined service and comfort in jal business class but found neither cabin crew was mostly matter of fact or indifferent with one exception one does not feel welcome as on other flights from different airlines more important six hours into the flight i had an excrutiating pain in my right leg not a leg cramp and called the hostess who had no idea what to do thankfully one of them knew about thrombosis and got me pillows to help raise my leg and drain the blood so i do feel most jal stewardesses are unresponsive and untrained for emergencies layout for business class cabin is charmless extremely partitioned it felt like a cheap office building and made me claustrophobic seating was not entirely comfortable as i felt squeezed like in a cubicle entertainment quality is good but tv screens are way too big for the space its overwhelming and you cant help being bothered by your neighbours lit screens while youre trying to sleep poor air quality poor accessories eyemasks turn hot when you open the package which is absurd and not relaxing especially when the cabin feels stuffy they should be cold if anything so i could not use it to block the light from a tv across the aisle all in all jal business class was inferior to that of other airlines ive flown i was very dissapointed and will not fly them again nor recommend them to anyone on the positive side ckeck in was fast and the food was excellent

i could stayed on airplane very comfortable thanks to polite staffs and clean seats but on way back to japan they asked me to move from narita airport to haneda airport to take domestic airplane it takes hour by bus which requires expense about yen in addition if they have such a bad connection they should note me before booking i was really satisfied with jal by narita but i was regret to choose the company after haneda

on my night flight from melbourne to tokyo i thought the beds were very hard on my return flight from tokyo i was offered a mattress just wondering why no mattress was offered on my initial flight i had not flown japan airlines before but had traveled on other business class airlines on the return flight we were given a towel but no drinks for two hours and then i was told there were no western lunches left my daughter and her two daughters flew economy on the same flights but had no complaints
the gate and inflight service were both well executed the drinks meals snacks and entertainment were great it made a very long flight very enjoyable i would gladly fly with japan airlines again

i was on the pm flight from sfo to tokyo on may i was stuck on san francisco traffic for a long time while in traffic i discovered i left my passport in the hotel i stayed inonce i reached the airport the ticketing staff already knew who i was because everyine else was already at the gate waiting to board by this time it was already and told the ticketing agent my scenario and told them someone was bringing my passport she asked me where they werewhich was minutes awayi knew i wasnt going to make my flight but to my surprise she said you will make it if the passport is here by pmat three the passport arrives and she took care of everything including have me swished through by another agent through the long security lines all the way to the front and on to the boarding gatewow now that is service in its upmost besti was too much in a hurry and didnt get their names but i wish japan airlines reads this review and commends the two special staff members one lady and one young gentleman that helped me so very much i salute your service par excellance and will recommend your airlines to everybody domo arigato gozaimasrichard nazareth silva of san francisco flight jpn to tokyo continuing to bangkok thailand on may at pm again i thank you so very much matane

from the time we purchased tickets to the time we left the gate the service was exceptional crew was well dressed courteous and professional food was actually delicious and enjoyable staff always smiled lots more legroom im and this was in economy everything was very clean and smelled good i got the feeling they actually wanted you to be there this was such a nice contrast to the terrible service and attitudes of pretty much all airlines in the us i will make an effort to fly with them again
was able to upgrade on both longhaul flights which was well worth it plenty off leg room and wider seats in premium economy staff are very pleasant and attentive it was a pleasure to fly with them

overall i had pretty high expectations for my flight that jal did not come close to meeting first the pluses the skysuite seat was good for sleeping and with a window seat provides great privacy the plane was very clean in relative terms many negatives though the food japanese meal was pretty bad not as bad as some other airlines in business class eg british airways but easily worse than most american carriers for a comparable length international flight in business class the food was overcooked much worse than what youd get in a moderately good japanese restaurant in boston service was basically on request only the mandatory service items meals duty free etc were offered but nothing proactively beyond that if you rang the call bell and asked they were happy to comply but compared to for example jetblue mint the service level was much worse the lounge in narita on my return trip sakura lounge was just plain bad no food other than rice crackers and cheese balls and very crowded the amenity kit and other onboard amenities were very basic for example no moisturizer in the kit or in the bathrooms the blanket offered was very thin and not warm at all no storage available at the seat at all the only option during takeofflanding is storing all items in the bins overall i would choose just about any other airline over jal for a business class flight unless you have no choice on the route in my case they offer the only nonstop so i dont have other good options

after arriving at narita with plenty of time for an early checkin on a very damp day we were disappointed to discover that none of our group of four were sitting together our friends had been allocated seats a couple of rows apart whilst my husband and i found ourselves situated some rows apart not a good start to checking in our friends on complaining were advised that the flight was fully booked and it would not be possible to make any changes fortunately when i spoke to the staff requesting that my husband and i could be seated together it seemed to take a short phone call and we were reallocated new seats side by side and with the bonus of plenty of leg room needless to say our companions were not impressed other than that we had little to complain about and we did enjoy having metal cutlery to use for our meals we did wish the plane could have been scheduled to arrive into changi at a more sociable hour as it was not great to reach our hotel at am to find we had been transferredupgraded because of maintenance issues however realise not always possible to suit schedules of all passengers

i booked my tickets through british airways from london to tokyo and was really excited when i saw they partnered with japan airlines for my stopover in frankfurt on my return to london for a business meeting i arrived early on the day i was to fly because strangely they didnt allow me to book my seats in advance like british airways does when i asked the very polite girl at the desk if i could sit with my business partner she couldnt have been more polite to offer two middle seats one in the front of the other thinking that would suffice she was sneaky about it to because when i asked she implied it would be no problem printed the tickets and was starting to load my luggage however when i looked at the numbers i noticed they werent in the same row and asked where these were again with a sweet little smile she politely said they are in the middle seats one in front of the other i was a bit confused since im almost six feet tall and needed to be seated next to my colleague to discuss our strategy and meeting agenda i asked again if she could please reconsider and give us twoseats together side by side again she was very polite made a phone call but only had the middle and maybe a window seat but nothing together i explained we were on business and asked her if we could possibly upgrade to business since i have a ton of miles and she said no they dont take ba miles even though they are partners some partnership i asked if i could buy an upgrade and again was told no i became frustrated and practically begged the woman for anything but the middle seat she had the one window seat which i gave to my colleague and then she just got rude with me and told me to either accept the middle seat and get out or just move on and get nothing i explained i didnt understand why she wouldnt let me pay for an upgrade but she just got more obstinate and told me to speak to british airways i asked where the ba desk was and she didnt want to tell me she just said its in the terminal which by the way is the size of six jumbo jets the frosting on the cake was when she said with a smile and her most polite voice is there anything else i can do to help you i was floored seriously what help she made it clear she was not going to help me nor did she want to help me help me off a bridge maybe she was very rude and left me feeling like a criminal i left after that and walked around aimlessly to find ba but couldnt i later found out that ba doesnt open until pm my flight departed at am i decided to call ba and explained my frustration but they couldnt help accept to say sorry and suggested to ask the attendant once on board i did only to be told my friend could take the other middle seat in front of me they had nothing together otherwise i saw a ton of open seats in business too but they wouldnt let me upgrade even when we boarded the plane they seated our section last really last when my colleague and i finally were allowed to board premium we were pushed aside last minute for another japanese woman in economy i got the distinct feeling we were pushed aside because we were foreigners too and that just made me feel sick to my stomach needless to say vvi will never fly with jal again theyre nonservice service faux smiles fake polite voices and disgusting food made me sick i was extremely disappointed with them and will never fly with them ever again they were the worst

one of the best airlines in the world sakura lounge is seriously the best except cx lounges service is outstanding inflight entertainment and food are also phenomenal they really try to the fullest for their customers at all times if you have any chance to fly jal do not think twice

flight from laxnrt was a great flight even though it was in economy the seats were more roomy and comfortable than us airlines with a lot more legroom food was good and flight attendants outstanding and helpful entertainment system had a lot to offer and it worked well comfortable flight than departed and arrived on time will fly again

i flew jl lax to nrt in may imho jl offers one of the best business class travel experiences food options beverages comfortable seat entertainment overall service was outstanding the only missing piece is not offering pajamas instead they offer some jacket to wear during the flight which is fine but id prefer pajamas asked for extra blanket and got it without any problem temperature was comfortable and b aircraft was relatively quiet although i was sitting right next to the engine qantas first lounge at lax wasnt crowded and very comfortable overall excellent flying experience

jal departed from jakarta cgk to tokyo nrt on february they are still using the boeing for this route which is they provided skywider seat in economy class the seat was wide and the legroom was awesome but the seat cover quite rough and makes it uncomfortable especially on the headrest when it ajusted the meal was excellent one of the best in the air

pros friendly flight attendant cons food is bland in flight entertainment is so so some movies no english subtitle check in long waiting time ground staff not approachable paid high price on this flight but im not satisfied wont be flying with jal again

cabin service was nice and very attentive food presentation was great but the taste is normal seat was clean and comfortable but the seat are not full flat bed boeing overall fight was good with great service and value for money

this was my first flight to tokyo and first time on jal a colleague of mine flies to japan frequently and recommended jal as being much better than ba what i found out was the just like many airlines business class has become ok nothing special the crew was really nice and welcoming but the facilities and the food where just ordinary would i fly with them again yes would i look for another airline in a heartbeat

would like to say thank you to the entire jal team for a flawless trip to bangkok from boston and connecting through tokyo narita from the airport airport lounges and especially the flight crews they exceeded my expectations in kind friendly and professional service i would also like to thank american airlines as i booked through them they assisted with getting my seats reserved i recommend this airline

in the air cabin service was great not unexpected as jal cabin service is great fa are very friendly and attentive to your needs my surprise was with tickets that i bought jal has a j class which i was led to believe to be business class j class is really a premium economy class biggerbetter seats located at the front of the cabin found out at haneda airport from jal that there was only a first class lounge and boarding for j class was last entrance to the plan was from the front away from the coach boarding area so it was no bad this must be jals general boarding plan just not familiar with it overall experience with jal was ok with the great in flight service

i have taken this direct flight from boston to narita several times as part of trips to the philippines the service is great it is a long flight and they go out of their way to make passengers comfortable there are three meals on the flightand the food was very good

i had no idea airlines treated customerstravelers this way the flight attendants listened to us and went out of their way to make our trip special whenever possible the only thing about the flight we would have changed is to fly business or first class next time and that is because of the flight time to japan there are games i was listed as on the tetris top leader board movies flight exercises these actually helped flight information shopping ebooks and tv shows i watched three just released movies and a panda special total on the way to japan and back a dinner was served breakfast and two snacks with beverages available the whole trip also a pillow and blanket were provided for the duration let me just comment that if jal flew domestically i would be on the flights

flew family of on the dreamliner v with sky wider economy seats great leg room and seat width excellent entertainment choices and fantastic service always with smile the flight attendants went out of their way to make sure toddlers in the group had a great flight although hour flight was a smooth ride loved the windows which you get to adjust the shade darknesss level will fly this specific flight again

weve flow jal a few times now starting in economy and now in business its one of my favorite airlines in economy the seats on the transpac flight from sfo have a whopping of leg room and are very comfortable in business i was worried about the configuration on jal but the seats are amazing they are fully lie flat and extremely private roomy on comfortable i slept seven hours on the flight from haneda to sfo earlier this year and on the recent sfohnd flight i think i got fully eight hours food is very good i ordered the japanese menu and the quality and variety is delicious the sakura lounges in asia are typically top notch sadly the sfo lounge in sfo was quite a disappointment but i have yet to visit a lounge at an american airport that is even as good as a typical lounge at major asian airports all in all jal is a great airline

although the jal lounge at suvarnabuhmi airport is nothing special and quite busy the service starting from boarding the plane at bkk all the way to disembarking at tokyo was absolutely excellent on the six hours flight there was a choice for japanese or western meal the japanese meal was tasty and well presented accompanied by an excellent sake the business class was clean and serviced and the crew worked tirelessly throughout the flight with absolute dedication trying to please everyone in the full cabin kudos go to jal for the impeccable service

japan airlines gives excellent attentive service in premium economy it also gave us access to the sakura lounge which had excellent freshly prepared food we ate our primary meal in the lounge prior to boarding the flight and slept through the meal service on board the seats slide forward rather than recline back and are not as comfortable as some other premium economy seats

i am and seat space is no longer what is was an economy flight to japan has me in serious discomfort the width of the jal premium economy is only an inch or two wider but it is the pitch you are paying for and they deliver in spades i could fully stretch out my legs and the recline was enough to allow decent sleep to happen im not saying it was bliss in the sky but a huge improvement food is the same as economy which is excellent with pergaps some extra drink options thrown in slippers and fancy headphones thrown in too a very strong recommendation if you are flying overnight it will be hard to go back to regular economy

the flight and staff were great although a long flight it was comfortable and the food was really good the premium economy seats were very nice and had more room than economy they give you an amenity bag with toiletries and a pair of slippers to wear during your flight each seat has its own personal tv with free movies and games will definitely fly jal again
i recommend flying jal out of seoul gimpo as the smooth checkin and boarding is easy on the traveler in the airplane service is great and our shedule was respected with punctuality

i love this flight i live in the boston area and this is the only direct flight to tokyo which means no hassle return connection through the usa its such a hassle if you have to go through immigration and customs at the first usa entry pointconnection that said the service on the flight is excellent and the food is the best ive had in economy the plane is a new dreamliner and is very comfortable the timing of the flight departs at pm is a good time slot at logan because their arent a lot of travelers at terminal e international terminal security lines are small and not a lot of people in the terminal it arrives at narita at pm which is early enough to still easily get to your hotel via any convenient transportation limo bus or express train

not a fan of flying probably iike most people flying jal recently restored some faith especially in customer service flights over and back on time and really quite pleasant excellent selection of movies plenty of food which was quite good and staff were excellent flight over a bit better than return mainly as the pa announcements a bit annoying mostly in japanese and were more frequent on the red eye special it got a bit painful these werent safety announcements by the way included flogging even more souvenirs n duty free i really hate this i think people have plenty of time to shop without doing it on the plane trips really wish airlines would not do this
flying with japan airlines turned out to be a really wonderful experience comfortable spacious seats delicious food and great service one of the most pleasurable flights in my life

i had two flights from jal from gimpo korea to narita and narita to chicago ohare and i have nothing but good things to say in gimpo the staff let me know i had an extra bag check in available and helped me save by dividing the bags under weight and made my trip easier by checking in the second bag i had as a checkin the boarding process was very quick as well it was a short hour flight but the plane i was on had big leg room so i could store my long bag under the seat and got food too for a short flight as well as drinks were offered at various intervals in narita i arrived hours early because i wasnt sure how the checkin process when i didnt speak japanese at all but the staff was very helpful and let me check in my bag early the staff helping was also very respectful and courteous when i had questions to ask luckily i didnt have a passenger next to me on my flight so i had plenty of arm room but the legroom was spacey for economy flight food was delicious snacks were offered near the back where guests could grab at will and also were handed out rice crackers and bread and also got drinks at regular intervals the back part of the seat was a little bit too stiff for my liking but they do give you a neck pillow you can use for your back as well so it worked out one of the best if not the best flight experience i had with both flights

great service but the line to check in at the airport was outrageous a giant hall with snakes of humans for various airlines the lines were so long you couldnt tell where it ended up i must have stood there for minutes

this was our first time flying japan airlines and it was a great experience by far the best and most comfortable flight ive been on my boyfriend who has flown plenty more airlines then i have brought japan airlines up to his top the meals were great and so was the service hope to fly with them again sometime soon

the staff at the airport were very helpful and so politeon time performance was great as well as the service on board the aircraft the meals were great for airline meals i would recommend this airline to everybody will definitely fly with jal again

food was great japanese hospitality from the stewardess were just as expected great service seat was comfortable didnt get much from inflight entertainment cause im the sleepallaway type but my partner who couldnt sleep was satisfied with it

such a wonderful surprise the layout for club is amazing as no one has to climb over anyone the space is well planned huge t v screen so much store space great goody bags and for the ladies soft comfy cardigans on our return could only get travelled plus and was concerned but that was unwarranted as the internal part of the seat slide down so comfy and fell asleep for hours service cleanliness fabulous and toilets to and bigger than normal so if u had young kids more than enough space thanks jap airlines for your service

brilliant hours flight with friendly crew and cabin staff who really looked after passengers needs with seating at there was more leg room and seats seemed wider with no additional payment for specific seats meals were served at appropriate times and food was of a decent quality refills were offered and staff were attentive to passengers needs important little touches included the provision of toothbrush and paste in the toilets prior to landing and the toilets were kept in pristine condition without reservation i recommend jal and would certainly fly with them again compared to the codeshare with ba for our return flight which was appalling in every way travelling long haul in economy class with jal was comfortable with excellent service
it was a perfect trip on time service was high standard and very pleasant willing to do anything for the kids and us

my wife and i flew on a new in business class the layout is totally odd its the aisle seats are ok the window and centre seats are totally boxed in hard to squeeze into and largely devoid of storage space japanese meal is very good western meal so so the pillows are japanese style and if you have not experienced that before imagine a rock cm thick and youre in the zone service is friendly but formulaic the cabin temperature was set to degrees hottest ive ever experienced on a plane and there are no individual air vents just to make things slightly comical instead of giving out pyjamas go qantas they give out cardigans hardly useful as the sweat runs down your forehead

i had not flown jal until this flight every aspect of the trip was first rate the boarding of the plane was orderly and pleasant though the departure was delayed a few minutes ulitmately we arrived early the cleanliness of the aircraft to include the bathrooms was very impressive i am a bit of germ phob so cleanliness is very important to me the crew was extremely friendly and professional they were proficient in their responsibilities the food was good the seating was comfortable and all of the equipment operated i will fly jal any time i have the opportunity
very good customer service the plane was an older plane so the comfort levelof the seats wasnt great they offer a western menu in addition to asian

when i last travelled on jal from melbourne to tokyo return i found the food inedible during the months since the improvement has been enormous when making the same trip in april i found that not only were the vegetarian meals in both directions better they were in fact delightful couple this with comfortable and spacious economy class seats excellent service competitive pricing and on time performance you could not go past jal on close inspection of the premium economy seats i could not justify spending twice the money for the same flight over economy well done jal

good friendly check in shared lounge with qantas is excellent even though busy dreamliner seats are comfortable although the window seat has little headroom and it can be difficult to get out with the leg rest up the extra window size is excellent and the light adjustment works well try the japanese meal its excellent light and just right for a day flight we would fly jal again

japan airlines is renewed for its sophisticated attentive but also nonpushy discreet quality service as well as the quality of its insight meal services i tend to enjoy authentic japanese course but to my delight i tried french fish course from ny to tokyo and it was absolutely impeccable from the start to the finish with full attention to details and quality of cuisine in addition to beautiful presentation of food the quality of french butter japanese seasalt french cheese selection as well as the selection of wines champagnes japanese premium whisky and digestives were the best i have ever experienced in the sky the teamwork of cabin attendants were also flawless not to be overpresent but always there discreetly as the seat cross the aisle was vacant cabin attendant prepared the bed there so that i can switch between work and rest with no hustle and timeloss i have been a fan of japan airlines but this was probably the best experience of all airlines so far

whats the one thing you want when you travel for business to get to your destination on time there is nothing that beats an uneventful flight and thats what you get with japan airlines my flights all of them boarded on time took off on time and landed either early or on time what more can you want on board the service is very good without being overly intrusive the food especially if you like japanese food is very good the selection is not as wide as some airlines but that doesnt matter on board entertainment was the only thing that could improve with a wider variety of western films

overall service was very good especially they were so generous with crystal yummy however the film selection was somewhat disappointing nothing interesting to watch dunkirk sorry i watched it on a emirates flight in december wonder woman watched it during my antarctica cruise again in december also it was rather hot and although cas kept saying that they would deal with it it was quite uncomfortable all the way to tokyo free wifi not easy even a ca was struggling still times better that ba

my wife and i flew business class from melbourne to tokyo the business class experience itself was only very average the seats were narrow and the service was surprisingly inattentive the flight left melbourne after midnight and we were tired after a long day and looking forward to some sleep on lie flat beds this was not to be there was a young couple on our row with an month old child which cried and howled the whole night long precluding any sleep i really cannot understand why people with very young children with a proclivity to howling choose to waste their money flying business class when they have no hope of having a pleasant flight and spoil it for all the other passengers who have paid high fees to fly business class
