from the minute i stepped into the loungei enjoyed a level of care and comfort i hadnt experienced beforemight i point outi dont usually travel business classa friend gifted me the flightbut stillthe variety of food and drinks in the restaurant was mind blowing once i got into my cosy pod as i call iton the planei was in heaveni was so comfortablethe chair tilts to such anglesas to cradle my olderarthritic bonesbeing able to make it into a bed was wonderfulthe service by the hostesses was goodand when they noticed that i enjoy a plum winei kept finding sneaky refills on my traythe food was deliciousand so beautifully presented found the choice of filmsseriesetc was very wideand so up to the momentthe noise cancelling headphones were top of the rangeslept like a baby when the lights were dimmedthough the complimentary bag of goodies also had earplugs and eyeshades if neededtoilets were clean and nearby one last itemthe privacy screen between seatsanother good ideaespecially when travelling by oneselfat a press of a buttonone felt safe and secure

this was an aspirational trip using alaska airlines mileage plan miles in exchange for miles i received a first class ticket worth about what a bargain the trip was lovely but the cabin crew was far superior returning from japan compared with the crew enroutewhich is a shame as i slept a good part of the return journey service was attentive without being over the top i had read blogs of several frequent travelers who touted all the special attention they received extra pjs to take home fas insisting they try every menu item etc i believe they get all these extra services because they are somehow flagged in the reservations system because i got none of that however it was a great flight using miles but there is no way in heck it was worth anywhere close to in terms of service or amenities however personal space was exceptional

jal is rated as having one of the best premium economy cabins and we decided to splurge on a trip to hong kong before catching a cruise this class of service also allowed us to use the jal lounges in dfw and nrt to eat and drink while waiting for flights both flights dfwnrt and nrthkg were on the boeing dreamliner with seating we were on the side and the seats were comfortable with leg rests service was outstanding and entertainment system very good our only small negative comment the food as it was geared to the japanese tastes we would have preferred more western options however there were always snacks and we never went hungry will definitely look to book jal premium economy on future trips

what started out as a stateofthe art business class product is no longer competitive i flew this because of my one world emerald status but never again i usually go to jfk and from now on i would rather take aa to a gateway and change planes instead of taking the jal nonstop you walk onto the plane and it is like walking into a dingy and beatup rabbit warren cabins havent been updated in years the sky suites on the and the are claustrophobic at best window seats are cramped aisle seats are basically on the aisle and offer no privacy and if you are in a middle seat good luck food is good but the meal service itself was horrible on this flight the meal service took just short of hours from the time we took off until the time that the service ended and i was in the first row there were over m waits between courses i have experienced this type of service on previous flights one of the issues was that menus were not offered and orders not taken until about minutes after take off not like other airlines where this is done before takeoff there are only tiny lavs for pax not nearly enough amenities are geared towards smaller people there is one size of flight cardigan its a medium slippers also were undersized i wear a shoe not that big and the slippers were too small it was a problem as you needed them when you went into the lav i cant see how they can continue this level of service when competing with ana
the business class seats are at an angle and when they make a flat bed your legs go into a box in front and its very uncomfortable they also dont serve a welcome drink on this sector

as anticipated the cabin crew were very polite and efficient the legroom in pe was comfortable and the price was comparable with other airlines the seating is hardshell meaning the pax in front cannot recline into your space however the seat slides down and forward for sleeping placing you in an uncomfortable nearfetal position i have slept much better on other airlines spending over hours in flight to and from jfk meant that most of the decent screen entertainment had been exhausted before arrival back in sydney the food especially out of narita was quite ordinary jal is using young innovative chefs to create new dishes just what is burdock anyway at least the delicious japanese beer was freeflowing

it is always a good experience to fly with japan airline from the beginning of check in to in fly service everything is excellent the only area needed to be improved is the customer service telephone answering it took too long of waiting time to speak to a agent

a great trip from sydney to tokyo plenty of space in premium economy friendly and efficient service from the staff on board food was fantastic and plenty of movies to choose from a relaxing flight that seemed to go by quite quickly

my flight from nrt to sin left late due to crosswinds at nrt the cabin was clean i was assigned a seat separate from my wife and couldnt change it to sit with her because the flight was fully booked the in flight service was average i still will fly with jal if it is the best fit for my time table

first impression was great as we were walking towards the economy checkin counter we were greeted like vips and have our luggage placed on the belt then we were shown where to go for a complimentary lounge access as premium economy passengers the food in the lounge was so so but the beverages were very good on the return flight the lounge at haneda was even better there i had a good shower as i was prepared with fresh underwear and sox but once on board we were a bit disappointed with the in flight service especially the breakfast on the return flight as well so fill up first and relax on board the headphones provided were above average and the movie selection have orsca winners the seating was very spacious with plenty of leg room most of all the slippers provided were most welcomed so make sure you can kick off your shoes no smelly feet please and relax

we had heard great things about jal so were excited about our upcoming trip we have visited japan times on different airlines but have to say air canada wins for the best service both the departing and returning jal flights were delayed by and hours respectively jals service on the plane was fine but the menu leaves something to be desired for the north american palate the food was well presented enough to eat for most women but very japanese cuisine with no western food alternatives offered they have a good selection of movies the plane was fairly late model with tinted windows rather than pull down shades and there was the average seat leg and elbow space the staff was friendly and accommodating but the japanese female flight attendants speak very meekly and quietly so we could not understand any of their instructions over the plane intercom on the flight to japan we sat in the boarding area minutes because they announced that the plane was not ready then we boarded and sat on the tarmac in the plane for over an hour because we departed so late the air controllers had to reschedule us into another flight slot on arriving in japan we descended and were a few hundred feet from touchdown when the pilots thrust the engines and we climbed steeply back into the sky and flew back out over the ocean for another minutes we were dismayed that a hour flight became closer to hours anyone can have an off day so were not expecting similar delays on our return flight the pilot then did speed up i suppose because even leaving an hour late he got us back on schedule however we have never encountered these problems when flying air canada our usual airline the flight prices were also almost a third more expensive than ac even though we booked months in advance however this could be because it was christmas season travel

we flew economy the flight attendants food and overall service was great the seats themselves were comfortable however the leg room was really limited and especially if you are in a isle seat with the metal box that is attached to the outer legs of the chairs i understand flying economy means you do have to give up some things but a place to put your legs should not be one of them on long flights it can be a serious health issue if you cant move your legs enough to keep from developing clots in your legs

wow tired of paying for every little thing yes then this airline is for you checked bags nc no charge two great on board meals nc beerwinewater nc blanketpillowheadphones nc entertainment nc great customer service nc i have never had a better experience on a flight and in economy class plenty of leg room

called to see if i can recover my jal reward points and waited minutes on the phone and talked for only minutes and hung up on me after saying my points can not be recovered with bad attitude this made me associated with my flight experience with jal flight attendant pushing food cart and hit my knee while i was sleeping it was so painful and she didnt even say sorry jal the worst airline i have ever experienced i will avoid this airline at all cost

was unable to secure exit row seats in economy so decided to give premium economy a go as i need the legroom pe customers do not get any priority boarding but they do get access to the jal lounge which is very nice was in seat k which is the first row behind the business class bulkhead so it has the most room of all the pe rows which meant i could get in and out without disturbing the passenger next to me all other rows had plent of leg room too but if the person next to you reclined you would probably have difficulty getting past them i say recline but in fact the seats moveslide forward rather than recline backwards so you do intrude on the space behind which i believe is a great way to go you get a small pack of stuff and basic noise cancelling headphones the only let down for me was that the meal options were the same as economy so they were average choices there were a couple of special alcoholic beverages in pe that were over what you could get in economy the in flight service was very good overall believe that jal pe is one of the best i have flown for the extra

even though i travel quite a bit this was my first flight on the boeing dreamliner i booked my flights except for incountry domestic indonesia through american who code shares with pacific cathay and jal for indonesia even though jal is a partner they would not let me get a reserved seat not to worrywhen i got to the jakarta airport early for my flight they gave me a nice window seat in the exit row their service is excellent including meals and liquid refreshments the japanese are extremely clean the flight attendants actually vacuumed up around their galley and the exit row area ive never seen that done on a flight they keep coming at you to ask if you need anything else they keep the toilets immaculate jal is an excellent airlinechoice the dreamliner pressurizes the cabin more like sea level atmosphere so you dont get the ear popping and you feel more relaxed after the flight each seat has its own inflight entertainment screensuite

in my previous review i shared my mixed feelings after experiencing problems with seat selection on my return trip from boston i experienced what another traveler went through waiting on the line for hour before it was picked up however the staff was polite and helpful she could not change my seat to be seated with hubby but she put a note in the system that i have motion sickness and would prefer to sit next to hubby i was advised to check in early at the airport the staff did arrange for me to sit beside hubby on both legs of the flight a specific flight crew was designated to look after me they would introduce themselves and check on me once in a while transiting at narita i exited the plane to find a ground staff holding a paper with my name and asking if i was ok so much attention levied but not at all intrusivefirst class service on board if not for the hassle about not being able to choose seats for n class tickets i would have chosen jal anytime

pleasantly surprised with excellent service onboard by their air stewardess spacious leg room for economy class meals were labelled clearly with the ingredients used in english requests attended to almost immediately it was all smiles by their cabin members didnt have to tolerate unpleasant feeling while onboard unlike with some other airlines that choose to serve you accordingly based on race or type of cabin class
for a domestic flight it had spacious seating even better than the international flights from qatar dublinosaka clean nice service even received a beverage for free will fly jal again

my trip from delhi to tokyo was very comfortable and hassle free everything was moving like a clockwork typical japanese efficiency with warm hospitality their collection of in flight entertainment was varied to suit all tastes food was excellent we were given second meal in advance before they stopped serving great experience

i was on my way home from tokyo to okayama the train takes only a little longer but i like to fly this was a night flight with little to see and most people around me were dosing jal does these short flights as well as anyone and better than ost discreet kindly service interferencefree boarding and deplaning a flight as smooth as the atmospheric conditions allow which is more than i can say about the airport experience at haneda this was as full of hassles as the flight was free of them too many people too many flights long walks through the airport buildings not fun good to board the plane and relax good to be with jal

jl jfk a nrt p was a with four class of service st business premium economy and economy service from the cabin attendants was superb would be nice if inflight service was half as good on us carriers food was ok cabin configuration was not the most modern seats were smaller lacked storage space laid out in older format with seats along window side but the inner seat does not have access to a window and until the screen is raised between the two seats there is lack of privacy lavatories are way too small

excellent flights both ways to and from melbourne food was fantastic especially from narita to melbourne toilets are always clean and i found there is more leg room on these flights the price was average but well worth it

we were really glad we upgraded to premium economy this was a great airline to fly customer service was excellent seats reclined and there was a foot rest very comfortable flight with caring flight attendants

one of the best economy services i have had the economy cabin was well designed seats were super wide and had lots of leg room yet the seats were still comfortable pillow and blanket provided and unlike most airlines the pillow had some support and worked really well on the lower back entertainment system was modern with lots of movie choices with usb seat power to charge your devices food service was good limited options just two choices but lots of extra perks such as actual cutlery a hot towel before dinner and lots of drink options very impressed with the service on board from staff and the aircraft itself would certainly travel again with japan airlines

one of the best crews i have come across great fun and super helpful could not have done more for us and the kids we had travelling with us food was excellent and the plane was very modern and spacious first time flying with jal but would definitely fly again
had to go to tokyo from osaka and was using jal all was so perfect like everything in japan it was a pleasure

better specify your preference in meal when you book they didnt have options for meal in my flight to tokyo they only offer beef rice while im eating beef however their kids meal is the best among all other airlines that i have taken with yummy food and attractive decoration in plane equipment is a bit old but the overall conditions of the plane is neat and tidy

ive never eaten good airline food who has but honestly jal where amazing soba noodles with truffle sauce and fried chicken egg fried rice really simple but really good and the best i have had on a flight by some distance

enjoyed my flight on jal the attendants were very friendly and helpful the premium economy seats were wide and spacious enough nice to be given a checkin baggage allowance of pcs each at max kg each the definite plus factor was that we were offered the use of a service lounge in changi airport that had a good choice of food and drinks

we knew we were in for some typical japanese hospitality as the ground crew bowed deeply in unison on the tarmac as the plane taxied from the skybridge our flight was uneventful leaving and arriving on time and the service was excellent the dreamliner is quiet the windows extra large and there is unusually good leg room for economy class however the seats are surprisingly very hard they lack sufficient padding and become quite uncomfortable on a long journey the food was adequate but nothing special but we were disappointed with the entertainment system which had plenty of choice but poor sound which made the movie soundtracks difficult to hear we were provided with the worlds tiniest blanket which barely covered a moderately sized male passenger no doubt the airline wishes to reduce weight but the blanket was simply inadequate

i have rarely experienced a problemfree flight but this was it left and arrived on time no hassles on boarding smooth flight regulation drink of complementary juice on the way with a smile a view of mt fuji pointed out by the pilot for those on the other side of the plane from myself no bump on landing suitcase rolled off the conveyor belt right on time great lunch with my daughter when i got downtown

excellent on time review of jal took a flight from seoul to tokyo on a hour flight aboard a boeing dreamliner the dreamliner plane made the journey very easy and felt great to fly in a better pressured plane ground crew very efficient and quick to board depart on time flight crew was very professional and kept the plane very clean throughout legroom was a bit shorter than the previous i flew in but not too bad food was great full meal and snackbeverage service choice of western or japanese style real utensils good attentive service and excellent ife entertainment screen arrived ahead of schedule which was very nice will definitely fly jal again
they were simply fantastic their compassion is simply great i have to return home personal matter and i expected them to charge me for change my flight they didnt and put me on their next flight home

hour flights are always a daunting prospect but jal made this flight bearable with their professional service good food and decent in flight entertainment check staff were very helpful and the crew on board were super friendly good leg room nice choice of movies and music pillows blankets and headsets provided i usually do not eat a thing during flights the food is usually inedible but was very happy with dinner snacks and breakfast well done jal

this was by far the best airline we have ever traveled the staff were all very friendly and the trip was truly the experience of a lifetime there was more than enough room in the area and the flight was a total comfort would definitely fly this airline again

jal operated this am flight from hong kong to narita with a b dreamliner equipped with the sky suite ii in business class prior to boarding i used the cathay wing first class lounge instead of the qantas business class lounge that is the jal designated lounge nothing wrong with the qantas lounge as i have used it before but wanted to try the wing for breakfast to compare there was a buffet with standard western breakfast items as well as chinese items such as dim sum and congee in addition there was an a la carte menu with western and chinese items i ordered the glutinous rice chicken which was ok but served in an odd manner with the lotus leaves covering cut open in a rectangular opening on top which made it difficult to get to the food at the edges service in the lounge was generally good and there was no wait for a table boarding at the gate was efficient with different frequent flyer groups separated for priority boarding so that jal diamondone world emerald members boarded first from a separate line right after those needing assistance the sky suite ii is a fully flat seat but when fully reclined it sinks very low to the ground and the space is very narrow so that lying on ones back there is not much room for broader shoulders or much movement nevertheless i did manage some good sleep in the flat bed after meal service there is a tray table under the video screen which when pulled out can be flipped open to a decent sized table there is also a slot under the screen that can fit electronics with an outlet nearby to charge up your phone or other electronic a new addition is a contoured foam cushion pictured which is quite comfortable as a seat back but less useful as a pillow as always service and food on jal was excellent a good short haul flight with a very comfortable seat and great food and service
the best airline ever all the flight attendants are so nice and kind they always smile and thats make me feel good the flight was so comfortable and clean recommend

check in staff were very polite and informative of where we should go after check in the sakura lounge has a very good selection the jal shell flat neo seat was perfectly fine not completely flat in flight service was very good from the meals to the very polite and respectful attentive flight attendants excellent experience

i visit southeast asia every three or four months and use one of the travel discount websites for the best price several times jal has had the best price and most convenient times they are a wonderful airline and the four or five times ive flown with them ive never been disappointed with any aspect of the flight theyre superb
very professional service crew from checkin counter to plane crew nice food and extra legroom really helps especially on long haul flight

wonderful first class loungevery attentive efficient and polite stuff in lounge at boarding and inflight very intelligent seats and very nice japanese inflight food service excellent inflight entertsinment system definitely one of the best sielines in the world

japan airlines jal world review for their website to reservebook air ticket this review is for booking an air ticket on their website it is usually recommended to buy the air ticket directly from the airline and i had a great experience with other aa united delta website before however with japan airline the website keeps showing tickets that are not available for booking or the seats are not available you keep seeing the ticket select it fill in the passengers information and then the website will pop the window say it could not find the fare you selected they should let the website hold the ticket the moment passenger choose the ticket and give time to fill info and pay say mins the funny part is when i am on phone with a customer agent for jl in usa the agent is seeing the ticket in their system seats left at the price for that flight at the same time i am trying to buy that ticket at the same time on my computer when she is on the other side of the phone the same error popped up and would not allow me to book that ticket japan airline really needs to fix and integrate their website better with their ticket system customer service is generally great inflight and through phone if you can wait minshr

very impressed with this airline nice food extremely friendly staff and more leg room than average both flights were on time and everything went very smoothly at haneda airport we were given complimentary access to the sakura lounge which was nice would recommend

i would have given them stars but lost one star because my breakfast had been overlooked after taking my order i eventually press the call button and enquired about my omelette breakfast but because the plane was about to land in hours it would be too late to have the omelette and had to pick one of the japanese dishes which was delivered promptly however i could not fault the service the care and efficiency of the staff the plane was immaculate and the restroom spotless that said i would have no hesitation to fly japan airline again

just before boarding i requested help from the jal staff i was carrying a year old baby and i was in pain from a bad bac the jal staff refused assistance and as i proceeded down the boarding ramp i collapsed with my child the jal staff stood there and watched they refused to help worse they loaded all passengers of the who had to step over me and my child to board it was only after all passengers had boarded before the crew came out to help me with a wheel chair the humiliation i suffered was nothing short of abuse i will never fly jal again never

ive been lucky enough to take this flight a number of times and i marvel at the schedule it leaves sydney at am and arrives in narita at pm its very reliable and these are sociable hours jal uses the qantas business and first lounges which are more than adequate and serve a decent breakfast beforehand i traveled with family including a toddler boarding is efficient with business and first having their own boarding line at the gate business passengers have skysuites which regularly win awards the configuration is but theres the added advantage of all window seat passengers having their own convenient entry hallway i do have a gripe after they turn the seatbelt signs off they start the lunch service which in my opinion is far too early by the time they serve drinks hand out menus and take orders lunch is served around am im convinced that its to fit in with the staffs break schedule because after this many of them disappear my second gripe is that over the years theyve hardly changed the menu there are choices western or japanese western is always appetisers followed by either western beef or some sort of fish dish japanese is a selection of appetizers then a japanese specialty whilst it is very well presented and in some cases colorful the format never changes the childrens meals were very unappealing and were left untouched theres a variety of snacks which they say can be served any time the service is gracious and respectful and in all instances every effort is made to help the standard of english varies from very good to adequate the beds are flat and you are supplied with a mattress and a thin quilt the pillows are a bit inadequate however its possible to get some reasonable sleep the passengerrestroom ratio is positive and theres rarely a need to wait theyre always spotless i always feel very safe on this flight and theyre a stickler for keeping to the schedule their business class fares are more than competitive when compared to other airlines i find them hard to beat all things considered it connects well with onward flights to europe and the us but also arrives at the perfect time for a hotel stopover at narita which i prefer to do however their attention to children is very poor there are no coloring books or amusements offered although there are some childrens movies apart from this the schedule safety procedures and value are good

extremely welcoming and kind flight staff both in terminal and on flight excellent food roomy seats spotless plane lots of amenities etc etc i could go on and on and this was economy jal please dont ever change

i have a bad back and wed still wanted to take our daughter to japan flights in out of haneys offered business class pods everything was super comfortable even for me seats fold entirely flat extra futon cushion is available privacy dividers slide up between pods food service was excellent everything was very clean and well designed plenty of space to put all your stuff gift bag just soso the lounge at haneda was pretty crummy we were totally surprised by the low quality accommodation and food but to feel great after an hour flight is really something special highly recommended if you can afford it we used a combo of miles and money
i enjoyed the flight with jal always unfortunately the japanese diner is not so great but i can take a rest in long flight

its true that you deserve to be among the best top airlines because of your outstanding services from check in to cabin crew services is good for someone to enjoy your flight some of the tips you gives us during the trip eg while across mount fuji is important for us view and enjoy our journey

we recently flew to south korea for the winter olympics and decided to use our miles on japan airlines for business class seats this might have been our most impressive flight in all of our travels from the states includes europe australia and new zealand all in business class first the staff was impeccable they were attentive friendly and regularly checked if we needed anything i realize we were in business class but from what i could tell the entire cabin was treated just as well the seats were plush and had a lot of space my only reservation is the fact that the chair does not lay completely flat not that you couldnt completely stretch out but i am weird and cant sleep well at a slightly angled position it feels as if i am sliding down the tv screens were easy to navigate and the selection of movies new and blockbuster was perfect if you decide to bring your own headphones make sure you have a double jack my one negative of the flight are the windows i like that you can greatly dim them into a deep blue to block the sun but we were on the side where the sun was directly hitting the window and even with the dim selection we were blinded while laying back there should still be an option to black them completely out with a shade finally the food was fantastic an american and japanese selection was available my palette was not advanced enough to try the eel or squid but the soups were amazing i highly recommend this airline

i had never flown on japan airlines before but had always heard great reviews on my last trip to india i flew china eastern needless to say i will never fly this airline again if i can avoid it because of the horrible experience from start to finish japan airlines was fantastic decent meals well organized and a crew that is truly interested in making your flight the best possible

flew jl flt seats hk returned jl flt seats hk we had the premium economy window aisle seats on the right side seats were roomy the service was very good close enough proximity to the bathroom without all the noise food was okay but they made up for it with lots of beverages soups various side dishes a large selection of free movies were available in various languages some with subtitles plus nice headphoneswe were also able to use the lounge at both airports which had an assortment of free food drink especially haneda

everything was wonderful about japan airlines especially the most gentle and wellmannered staff to the quality of the food served onboard clean seats clean toilets punctual flight and good range of latest movies

we cant speak highly enough about jal generally and their business class in particular from the moment we checked in at sydney airport till we walked out of the airport in narita we had an amazing time and a lovely experience the flight attendants were typically gentle beautiful japanese ladies yes only ladies in our section who smiled and made us feel that nothing was too much trouble quite different from some other airlines who will remain nameless where the attendants give the unmistakable impression that they really are above serving the lowly public and that they really dont want to be here not so with jal attendants the seats themselves were brilliant full lay back seats in their own quite substantial pods so much better than business class seating on some other airlines where the seats are just much bigger and more space this we felt was more like a st class experience although we havent traveled st class we can only imagine we chose the japanese menu and it was excellent food set out on a little table cloth with white linen sometimes a bento box and sometimes plated food complimentary french champagne was offered frequently along with glass refills plus other drinks of course the screen was very large and down the end of the pod so the whole experience was perfect sitting with legs stretched right out watching the screen eating lovely japanese food and drinking french champagne ahh bliss shame it is only a hour trip the toilets were clean and immaculate right to the end of the flight fresh flowers in the cubicles were a nice touch we had heard that jal is one of the best and we can agree and say that it was the best flight experience we have ever had the icing on the cake for glorious weeks in beautiful japan can you tell we are fans of japan
a very convenient flight that was dealt with pleasantly and efficiently food was ok addition of some western selections would help

my hubby and i had tickets bought at different times as he was flying on corporate account we could not check in until hrs before departure when we did try we were not allowed to change seats for the first leg of the flight after calling the customer service line the staff could not help either she was polite and apologetic she would put a note in the system to indicate we would like to be seated together she advised us to go to airport hrs before departure at get it done we did arrive at airport plus in the morning the checkin counter staff said she could not change and we would have to wait till another passenger check in upon which the staff would ask if he is agreeable we were told to find out at the departure gate since it is such a long flight we were a bit anxious not to know till boarding thankfully a passenger agreed to change seats the flight experience was good we now have to call again to request for seat change before our return flight i hope we wont have to do the same all over again in short the system was bad but the staff helped to make the experience a little easier to swallow

booked a flight then had to change schedule it is still within hour window so i thought it should be fine since ive done that with chase ultimate rewards and jal website says you can cancel within hours however i called customer service and i waited for hour still no one answered the phone longest wait in vain in my whole life guess thats their way to make it pass hours so you can not return

seats in the economy section are designed for japanese people thus someone my size not much off sumo is almost impossible though the flight was only hours i was in pain for most of my waking moments the passenger next to me was aware of my quandary and did not get in my space there just wasnt enough for those of us larger than an average carrier should always consider a western carrier kansai was a very efficient airport and staff was very pleasant

boeing aircrafts to and from narita international comfortable seating good selection of inflight entertainment efficient and friendly crew food is culture and if you claim you are an airline that respects other cultures the food choices and flavors should be taken care of despite jl has been flying to and from india since many decades their food was bland not filling and not satisfactory i gave feedback and a senior member of the crew was professional and kind enough to come and listen to me apologize and offer me a basket of snacks it helped a bit but the flavors were light years away from any indian palate over hours flight without yummy food is pretty much a torturer but rest of the experience ontime performance checkin landing luggage service etc was great
the food is beautiful the service excellent and in business class there is room to sleep we are frequent fliers and the japan air service is consistently better than the other airlines we fly

i have made the round trip tokyo kyoto tokyo both flights were astoundingly comfortable relaxing and stressfree even when i was slightly late the staff kept their cool and calmed me down it is hard to find flaws in their service i believe it is harder for them to think of ways how to improve their service which is impeccable

not a hitch not a problem my flight was smooth service impeccable on time efficient and almost a pleasure the automatic luggage check in machine in haneda was a trip in itself not quite a robot but it took charge of my luggage and issued a receipt without any human involvement haneda airport is a bit of a maze but i knew enough to allow time to get to my gate okayama much smaler made everything easier i barely slowed down between leaving my seat on the plane and boarding the bus for downtown

i fly a lot and on many airlines and really liked jal much more than most the plane was very clean the staff were friendly and helpful leg room is average the meals were very good and did not leave an after taste what really cought my eye were the staff continually cleaning restocking and organizing their areas i just wish they to more areas highly recommend

impeccable service beautifully presented meals plenty of leg room comfortable multiposition seats that lie flat mattress and pillows available personal monitors plenty of entertainment choice worked perfectly privacy screens between seats outlets to charge electronics i usually dont sleep well on planes slept like a baby on this flight a splurge that was worth every nickel especially for a hour flight

i cannot remember ever having the type of attention i received on this flight gentle attentive softly spoken and willing to make me as comfortable as good be and a small aside they have a bidet on the plane i loved it and they have two different menus one for japanese food and one for americaneuropean style food

we all know that flying from ny to tokyo is a long flight with that being said air japan was excellent all around the staff made sure that all was fine on a regular basis all of our needs were attended to and we never had to search out a staff member instead they were there to ask us what we required first good food for an airline comfy seats they even blocked out the middle seat of three seats so we had more room to relax

flying jal was clearly a better experience than flying with the three major us airlines and i have flown with all to asia the staff of jal provide excellent service and they do so with a genuine smile the customer truly feels they are appreciated by the staff and are responsive to any request the customer has this is the fourth time i have flown with jal and each experience has been consistent and worthy of my highest rating the i flew in was comfortable and i had sufficient leg room also the personal viewing screen worked flawlessly and the sound quality was very good the offerings of movies and tv shows were quite numerous now for the food the two meals we received were tasty and again much better than what i have received in the past from the major us airlines wine and beer were complimentary
flight left and arrived on time excellent service from take off to landing restrooms were clean flight crew did a great job

flights left and arrived on time plenty of leg room and nice wide seatsservice was good plenty of food really didnt eat all of every meal it would be nice if they were a little more english spoken since flying between two english speaking countriesthey would just show you picture and you had to pick less of the airline selling storeone landing was very ruff not sure if we had a new pilot overall i was happy with flight and would fly jal again

hospitality and service is one of the top in the business at every step of the way the service was exceptional from checkin inflight to leaving we also used our miles to upgrade us partway to business class if you are able to this is the way to fly longdistance attentive hospitable pe seats recline partially but with the foot rest it makes a world of a difference to aid support especially for those vertically challenged business seats of course recline all the way down giving you a good rest food was good as usual in between snacks even better d only negative is their max luggage weight is so much lower than other airlines flying the same route
good service and sufficient leg room in economy staff is attentive and provide drinks throughout the flight

our jal flights left and arrived on timethe seats were spacious even for economy class and service was excellent food was also quite goodi especially enjoyed the miso soup and the green tea our little niece even got a free toy their inflight entertainment system is easy to use and had all the latest movies i thoroughly enjoyed our hour flight and would highly recommend this airline

ive flew jal overseas from hawaii but this was and inter island flight in japan to get to another location typical japanese fashion everything is always prompt and orderly the staff was gracious and helpful a bit of a language barrier but yet you still can get around the flight was smooth and was able o get some undisturbed rest japanese flights to me seem so quite compared to us flights no crying babies or people talking loudly wonderful

aboard their i was expecting to have a roomy modern business class but instead the layout was normally i would have been disappointed i had just gotten off of the jal sinnrt flight and the s business class was a layout that featured weird seats in the center where the legs of the two center seat passengers overlap but at different heights making one person uncomfortably low and the other uncomfortably high cramped and claustrophobic so on the nrtsan flight i was looking forward to try something differentand found the seats to be quite comfortable for sleeping seated in the back row of the biz cabin was not a problem until mealtime when they ran out of entrees that my seat mate and i had ordered i pushed back at business class prices i expected to at least get the meal i wanted they made someone else change their mind which i felt bad about but why did they target us for the forced change the amenity kit was a bit lackluster but in general they are a waste so i didnt mind i wouldnt seek out jal for business class travel their product is not at the same level as cathay pacific or singapore airlines but the cabin crew were attentive when you needed something and quick to pickup finished trays

unlike previous flights on jal the business class attendants were a little more forthcoming with alcohol on this flight i know its a minor point especially with all the air rage incidents but they can look at my records and realize im a million miler on their partner seats were comfortable and angled flat business class was not filled to capacity so if youve chosen the wrong seat you should be able to change sadly these were old style seats in a configuration meaning that if you are travelling solo get one of the middle seats so no one is crawling over you to get to the bathroom

on time departure fuss free stewardesses speak more english now better than ever service is excellent always there to please passengers food is a lot better than previous years cristal roderer champagne several compartments for hand carry items and bags movies up to date additional comfortable mattress always welcome lovely clean comforter

flew roundtrip in economy between ny jfk and tokyo haneda on japan airlines jal boeing nonstop good flights economy is cramped as with nearly all airlines but service level is quite high flight attendants are well dressed very polite and always smiling they aim to please throughout the flight food is acceptable including meals and a snack with ice cream for dessert at the first meal definitely a step up from united or american
outstanding service peaceful flight most courteous and efficient service i have received on a flight in a long long time

i never fly to and from japan with any other airlines than this one its nonstop to and from san diego so you can avoid the hasslebustle at lax or sfo and of course youll never miss a connecting flight the service is superb and the food is excellent all my friends in japan use this flight now
one of the best flights i have experienced flight crew was very accomodating and made sure every part of the flight was comfortable kudos for customer service above and beyond

jals premium economy is pricey but worth it your luggage is tagged priority and you have lounge access air france lounge is okay with a very limited selection fruits cheese and crackers and cup of noodles beverage choices from white and red wines coffee juice and water if i may add the gentleman when you check in is by far a person without personality no greeting or smile came from him sakura lounge in narita is far better good selection of food and excellent service there are massage chairs that are very relaxing now the flight premium economy seats are very comfortable and theres at least a good inches of legroom space for a you dont bother the person behind you when you recline the seats would slide and you can release the leg rest and have a good comfortable flight food going to nrt was very good coming back it was okay the flight attendants are very attentive always with a smile on their face

nice flight comfortable seats kind staff clean toilets only one negative aspects food is terrible japanese style boxes meaning tiny servings and mainly salad you just eat salad bring some food from home

i am indebted to the japanese businessman traveling behind us in economy plus for knowing more about the electronics in the cabin and being able to explain them to me in perfect english than any of the flight crew whose english was lacking i wanted to read using my ipad without running out of battery and knew there had to be a way on our boeing jet to get that power the flight attendants were clueless the businessman told me the usb port would not work but that there was an electric plug near the floor on the barrier between seats and so there was and this businessman provided me instantly with the plugs id need although i did have all those converters and plugs in my carry on bag in the overhead bin the flight attendants also had no clue why my ipad was picking up a full five bar wifi signal throughout the flight japan airlines may have wifi with air to ground connectivity on certain parts of the flights but the attendants were unable to either explain it or knew nothing about it

business class on jal is definitely a step up from that offered on ua aa dl and ac however im not certain it was worth the premium price i paid the hard product minisuite was great especially if you have a window seat i slept better on this flight than any others in recent memory primarily due to the amount of privacy the large footwell and the complimentary foam pad i thought the food was just soso and the service was on par with what i have experienced on usbased carriers in a premium class i paid a premium to fly jal but i dont think i would do that again if i could find a jal flight within of us carriers i would pay that premium for the privacy and enhanced sleep experience
this was my first time flying solo especially internationally but jal was so helpful and worked with me to cultivate an enjoyable and smooth experience

after flying to indonesia on singapore airlines and cathay pacific we booked with jal from boston to jakarta through tokyo we were very happily surprised with the organization the beautiful boeing and the food and service the other two aforementioned airlines are also very good however the jal fare was a little cheaper and the premium economy seats were much better room wise and more comfortable plus there were only two flight segments to indonesia rather than or i highly recommend jal for flights from boston to asia or southeast asia

first class is not offered on this flight and the business class seemed to be only a slight level from regular class not worth of air miles typically when we fly business we are offered a glass of champagne before departure and a menu not on this flight they came around with a warm towel before food service and really that was all snacks were rice crackers in a typical snack bag on previous flights our snacks are on plates the group lounge in vancouver is horrible the food was awful and the only drinks they offered were beer we ended up eating before our flight the service on the flight was ok the flight attendants seemed irritated that we didnt understand the menu options the food was awful not one decent thing to eat we tried their japanese menu awful and then their western menu awful on the way to narita the baggage handler destroyed my daughters luggage they let us know our luggage would be bagged in plastic on arrival to japan we had to find the jal damaged luggage and even though this was inconvenient they were fantastic about replacing which is why i gave them stars whenever we fly long distance we fly business and this is by far the worst business class we have ever had the seats do not lay down like a bed the feet actually go under the seat in front very low so if you have swelling issues like i do you have to sit up the entire time so your feet arent at floor level

took the family to japan and wanted to use miles jal was a participant in the milage program we use we flew economy and expected very little as far as comfort and food goes we were all pleasantly surprised i am ft tall and thought the legroom more than adequate the food was nonfrills but good enough for my picky family the snack of a hagen das cup of ice cream was a real treat the attendants were all very friendly and eager to help boarding and exiting was straight forward and the entertainment system had all of us occupied as expected the only drawback for me was the seat itself for long hauls like this i would have liked something a bit more comfortable i am not talking about the size but shape and or the cushioning passengers are expected to be in their seats for extended periods of time and this seat left me sore by the time we landed

convenient connections in japan the service is good meals are decent compared to others but the temperature during flight is always an issue just about every flight i take i have to ask the cabin attendants to decrease the temperature checkin service at the terminals in japan seem extremely time consuming and lines tend to be long compared to the us operations dont know why so its good to give yourself some extra time to avoid the panic

we selected premium economy seats a and c bulkhead front row service was excellent seats were roomy with good layback plenty of room on the floor to throw stuff highly recommend jal off on time and arrived on time

very nice and friendly services to customers at checking in all flight attendants were also nice and provided good service as well i would recommended to flight with jal rather than others i love to fly with them again
the best customer service i ever hadasian hospitality is the bestwhat a different culturethe staff is so friendly

we traveled coach and were still relatively comfortable there was sufficient leg room the entertainment was varied and there was lots of it to last the hour flight three and hour flight back bathrooms were clean throughout the trip pillows blankets tooth brushes meals all good and one was really tasty free wine etc made a very long rip in coach very pleasantthe flight attendants are polite and solicitous they dont simply disappear you can carry on two bags and check two bags for free in other wrds once you pay for your ticket they dont nickel and dime you another great thing i thoe majority of the customers are japanese so the flight is quiet no drama and everyone is polite how wonderful on a very long flight i love jal
i was flying in economy but the service made me feel like it was first class the flight attendants are the best makes a long flight more tolerable

the departure lounge is lufthansa based its nice but nothing spectacular the service on board is impeccable the food was delicious and varied unfortunatelyi found the bed uncomfortable and difficult to sleep in on a hour flight thats rough

despite the fact that two hours into our hour flight we had to turn back to lax sit on the tarmac for several hours while the problem with the plane was fixed i was highly satisfied with the service we were updated frequently on the status of the flight and arriving at narita we were put on buses at no expense to us to tokyo station and other places then after submitting additional transportation expense receipts we were later reimbursed for that the return flight had no surprises and the flight attendants were just as thoughtful and efficient

booked through ba who neglected to tell us that with jal you can check in hours in advance so by the time we checkedin there were only single seats available explained this at the gate and a member of the jal team took us on to the plane and negotiated with other passengers and got us seated together we were so impressed not only was she incredibly helpful and efficient but she negotiated in english japanese and french

i booked this flight using alaska airline miles and initially booked a business class seat but a week later i was able to locate availability for first class seats checkin at jfk terminal was a breeze and it took maybe minutes in the dedicated first class line since jal does not participate in tsa precheck we used the standard tsa line and that process took way longer than it needed to because tsa doesnt know how to get their act together luckily for us jal added the lufthansa senator lounge at jfk as of january so we were lucky to get to use this lounge instead of the air france one still available and you can switch between both the lounge was nice and the views of the runway were great for making the time pass by we left the lounge minutes before boarding and had no problem boarding with the priority section of travelers the jal first class cabin is really nice and with only suites it feels both spacious and private everyone we interacted with during our hour flight was super friendly and i greatly enjoyed myself the food was incredible and i would recommend that you try the japanese menu as everything was so yummy my single complain about this flight was the temperature at which the cabin was kept i tried falling asleep but couldnt very well because the cabin felt so hot for the entire flight the seat is very spacious and when youre ready to sleep a mattress pad and pjs are provided along with a heavier blanket you are unlikely to need it since its so hot on the plane overall i look forward to earning more alaska miles to redeem them for another chance to fly on jal first

this service is a cut above the rest the flight crew were incredibly attentive and the cabin was incredibly calm its quite a way to feel as though youre in japan well before you arrive ive flown other asian carriers and id say one of the real perks here is the experienced cabin crew those on other carriers are ok but many of these flight attendants have been doing this for years which means they know service and omotenashi look it up you wont regret springing for this

travel in a dreamliner and experience amazing staff and a throwback to when flying was a big part of the thirill and overall experience we simply loved this airline their staff and the larger seats in economy made it all so memorable

i always enjoy dying jal first class but this particular flight was the best of them all i had the entire front cabin to myself which included three jal stewardess the service is usually a bit robotic but this time the staff was energetic and full of personality they were proactive in anything i might have wanted and offered extra caviar i had them dancing in the galley to american music and just had an overall great time with them the bed is always wide and comfortable and the food was excellent i do miss have salon as the champagne i look forward to the next trip with jal

the most courteous flight attendants that i have ever had on any flight the uniforms were very neat and they all wore the same uniform on board they bowed each time when they were giving the safety talk very attentive and accommodating
i flew from boston to thailand on jal business class it it was such an incredible experience compared to my return on aa in first class

i flew flight aa and japan airlines from narita to bangkok it was around a hour flight and the seat i had was a coach aisle seat and there was very little room for my legs i was in seat h and the plane was a the flight attendants were great but the seat room left a lot to be desired the food on japan air was excellent the flight was super except for the abbreviated room to stretch out on

flew japan airlines boeing b from jfk to tokyo narita boarding was on time and orderly the aircraft looked like it was only a few month old from boeing factory cabin crews are super friendly and courteous quality of in flight meals and snacks were also pretty decent they ran water and juice service literally every mins throughout the entire flight arrival in tokyo was on time and really enjoyed this long haul flight with japan airlines

after a trip to japan in with japan airlines we were just as happy to fly with them again this year the staff are very attentive and helpful and the food and drink service was very good not sure if its standard size but there seemed to be plenty of leg room staff were always around even during the night offering a snack when you went to the bathroom which was kept very clean and regularly walking through offering water would be very happy to fly jal again

i chose a nonstop jal flight for our family trip despite the increased pricemy families prior flights on jal had been fine dinner was not served until i was falling asleep and i declined it only an asian breakfast that i could not eat was available

wow i never thought flying could be this comfortable hour flight from boston to tokyo was a breeze we also had access to the airport lounge which had great food snacks and drinks seats in premium economy were comfortable and spacious staff was very friendly and helpful service was fast and the meals were good highly recommended i will be using japan airlines again

we had seats in premium economy that were not adjacent so we asked the woman at checkin if it would be possible to switch with someone she typed for entirely too long an then very apologetically said that premium economy was overbooked and asked if we would be okay flying in business class she was so apologetic that my wife thought we were being downgraded after hours in business class with lieflat seats in a brand new dreamliner snacking on wagyu my wife suggested that we just keep going to europe not the typical sentiment after a long flight aside from the upgrade it was a great flight

the staff were very friendly we asked if we could seat together as there were and they accommodated us well with plenty of leg room and seats were great and comfy and the food was hot and tasty would not hesitate to fly with them again even if the price to fly was a bit high but well worth the money

we have flown with jal many times the service has always been stellar the employees on the ground and in the air have always been wonderful however this trip was horrible and unscrupulous we connected in chicago and were on our way to narita international airport in tokyo once we would land we knew we had a hour and minute layover surely that would be enough to land taxi to the gate deplane go through immigration get to the next terminal for departure go through security and check in to the departure gate when we landed a jal employee met us at the airplane door and asked if we were going to fukuoka we said yes and she said simply late we didnt know what she meant upon arriving at the jal connecting gate for fukuoka we were told that the flight had already departed we were minutes early but for some unexplained reason they said we were late since we were totally exhausted from the hour flight we were in shock we started asking why what to do where to get info for next flight why our flight had departed earlyetc we were shocked that few people spoke fluent english over the next minutes to an hour we were sent from place to place within the airport finally i almost fainted from overheating and exhaustion my wife was standing in yet another jal line trying to get information the line was extremely long i shouted to her that i needed to get somewhere to lay down or i would faint jal was of no help whatsoever no one inside narita could speak english well enough to see that we were in extreme distress nor could they direct us to help we ended up taking a chance and boarding a bus that was for the crown plaza hotel the police did not help us the taxi drivers were useless only this bus driver would help we were taken to this hotel where we told the manager of our problems and they accommodated us with superb compassion we called the ana airlines and made new reservations to continue to our final destination two days later at our new hotel we called our booking agent american express to tell her of our plight they called jal to reconfirm our original plans and tickets jal told amex that since we did not report our missed flight connection to the right party our tickets home were invalidated further to get home jal wanted us to pay for one way tickets back to the us in other words our tickets which we had paid for months prior were now invalid and it would cost us more to get home they told us this at am we were totally incensed and outraged we argued for two hours with jal who refused to change their position they said it was our fault my wife was on the verge of a nervous breakdown i was about to have my fourth heart attack our amex representative decided to get the jal rep to get her supervisor on the phone our amex rep told us she would handle it and would call us back two hours passed and at am she called us back she was able to get our tickets revalidated and get us back on track can you imagine how infuriated we were with jal they would have left us stranded in japan unless we paid them an additional they told us to read the fine print on our contracts we will never use them again we will never use them for our company business trips again either what a disgrace to do business in such a fashion we are consulting our attorneys

i always enjoys jal flights comfortable seats good films and fantastic food plus they generally carry or very good daiginsho sake one caution were flying blue klm members we thought wed be earning level miles with jal but you only get milespoints nothing towards your level
fabulous service from check in to landing clean comfortable seats excellent entertainment selection so refreshing to have such polite well presented staff on an airplane

jal economy beats the comfort and service of deltaaa and ual upgrade class any day the seats have what used to be called normal leg room before the cram more rows in craze service is what one would expect in first class politeness is standard highly recommend them

much superior to jal which was from sfo to haneda to be honest the japanese meal to japan was mediocre to poor whereas the food prepared at narita was simply outstanding one of the better meals i had in some time and easily the single best airline meal i have ever had in well over a million miles flown in all classes from st on lufthansa to ryan air in europe fine service from start to finish

i was in awe of the number of attendants and the great service they provided always coming by seat with drinks of varying kinds ie kiwi juice plus all the normal juices coffee pots were brewing fresh coffee and being served constantly meals were much better than us airlinesattendants were friendly kind they made a hr flight go by rapidly i hope management will read this and compliment the ladies that were on this flight seats were larger with ample leg room boarding onoff were both organized and accomplished wo difficultyplane was clean and organized i am trying to determine why the us airlines have not gotten the msg i have a lot of advantage miles with aa and never got this service and i am seriously considering moving to another airline i will fly jal when they service my area of travel when ever possible very impressed

our first time with jal to from tokyo for business class we thought the level of service was below par when compared to emirates or air new zealand on our outward bound flight they could not tuck us up soon enough and service was minimal on the return had to go for the rd main course option as they had runout while the staff are pleasant and courteous enough the environs are very bland

i have great impression with jal during my first japan trip their cabin crew shows politeness and deserved various food and beverage on flight you will receive blanket pillow and headphones for your entertainment service i would like to fly with jal again for another japan trip
loved the dinner dessert free alcohol drinkssnacks a variety of new movies plenty of leg room

having flown with japan airlines before and remembering earlier flights i was disappointed with this particular flight experience the service as always was excellent but the aircraft a boeing looked old and tired the interior was drab compared to the american airlines that i flew from the us to tokyo the flight was on time and comfortable but for an almost hour flight entertainment options were limited

staff is very friendly and supportive meals was tasty space between sets was very comfortable but when we returned on march it was newer plane and it was not so comfortable as an old one especially spas between sets was very narrow
love flying jal the service is always impeccable and the food and drinks are excellent the lounge at the airport is also very nice and comfortable

the food was better than other airlines but the hospitality of the flight crew was superb very attentive and always on a lookout to see if you need something it was a very long flight but the crew made everyone at ease

super efficient boarding is organized flights right on time airline attendants some of the most friendly and helpful you will ever encounter jal was flying an upgraded plane with more comfortable seats tinted windows and other amenities food was the best i have ever encountered on an airline why cant us based airlines figure this out

i have to say i have fallen in love with jals business class the service is calm serene and efficient and the chairs were spotless and condusive for good sleeping the food was a standout i had the japanese selections with matching saki and it was like eating in a fine japanese restaurant the flight attendant spoke of the history of the particular place the saki i was drinking was from which was delightful the ammenities kit was one of the best ive recieved in business class and i loved the slippers this is such a great idea you dont have to put your shoes back on to wander around the plane and you can simply leave the slippers on board if you choose i am now taking these kinds of slippers on board all long haul flights i arrived refreshed and ready to go which is what you want from business class i will definately fly jal again

i flew on jl domestic economy from hnd to ita in february hnd is the main domestic airport in tokyo and its a lot closer than nrt from downtown tokyo shuttle bus and train options are available from downtown or you may take taxi less than one way from the most of the hotels in downtown at hnd airport jl has a separate security line for elite members and my emerald status qualified for it almost no one in the line and it was very quick to go through the security used jl domestic business lounge prior to boarding fooddrink options for early in the morning am were limited so if you plan to have breakfast in the lounge you may want to consider a plan b coffee was very good and many power outlets for laptop be sure to bring japanese power outlet adopter flight was short about one hour and comfortable on b jl offers a discounted fare if you buy at least a few days prior to departure on board free wifi was also available to keep working for the duration or to upload to sns if youd like departurearrival were both on time check in at kiosk boarding at gate were both smooth ca offered blankets before departure a few beverage options in flight despite the short flight duration overall a great experience

with most japanese products and design their is attention to detail and polite and efficient service i found all of the above on my flight to tokyo haneda airport from singapore the flight is around six hours so its not overly long but it was a red eye flight so its never easy trying to sleep but not long enough to be uncomfortable for too long the seats were comfortable and i found adequate leg room the inflight service was modern and up to date so it was easy to use and the content was good the food was light and simple and surprisingly tasty consisting of a starter some noodles and a yoghurt overall i had a pleasant flight although it wasnt of the highest quality it was adequate and reasonably priced so in my opinion value for money

this was my first time on japan airlines i got a very good deal on a flight rt from nyc to singapore with a layover in tokyo it was my first time to asia too and having inch leg room really helped in flying for hours for flights i took with japan airlines i love that the flight attendants cared about my food restrictions they gave me a ticket for each meal and asked questions they never made me feel bad for having medical food restrictions i love that i got a pillow a blanket even in economy they had good films selection and i listened to u and other music through both of the hour flights this was the best economy which is the only class of ticket i can afford i have ever been on i was treated and respected unlike certain airlines here in the us where i have felt and been treated like cattle wish i could take japan airlines again i know they are in the oneworld alliance

i flew jl from sfo to hnd in january prior to boarding i used ba first class lounge it was an okay lounge but nothing special with limited food option i may try jl lounge at sfo next time sfo is a bit tricky airport i flew from sea to sfo to catch jl due to the fog in the morning my flight from sea got cancelled and as rerouted us to oak then shuttled in to sfo its a good thing that i had over four hours to make the connection i only had about minutes before boarding jl at sfo the aircraft was b as always seat was comfortable tv screen was large headphone sounded clear amenities were good jl provided really thick mattress that made sleeping even more comfortable i got extra blanket without any issue jl supplied a light jacket to wear during the flight instead of pajamas that was no problem as i dressed casualcomfortable for the flight meal was very tasty and i was able to eat whenever i wanted up to hours before arrival overall imho one of the best business classes

straight to the point there were only things that made it not as enjoyable as it can be first is the luggage weight theres of us so that means were allowed suitcases of kilos each we only had luggage but was kilos others were k and k even when were way under the limit they made us move the items around the luggage to make the kilos on the heavier one its a hassle when your in the check in counter and opening your luggage in the open secondly the flight we had has a special red menu which means your only choice or starve its a dinner flight and just over hours so yeah food is good unfortunately the shrimp curry main dish jello like dessert spicy potato salad just didnt blend right the butter pecan br ice cream helped but not as much the flight going to narita had excellent food and taste hopefully not all red menus will be like this

good flight checkin very professional haneda is a charm in flight good comfort excellent service however no meal choices even when seating in front of the economy class wife cannot eat certain food which meant going hungry until hk

jal offered great food and services on this hour flight the facilities were squeaky clean and the food offered was both healthful and more than adequate they were on time and offered a geat value for what was offered
i am highly satisfied flying with jal from osakalas angelesosaka flight for its fleet service cleanliness enough space for leg rest entertainment and delicious foods want to fly again with it
very good service very good staff good food very pleasant travel booked for special food special care

i recently travelled on japan airlines premium economy class to the united kingdom this is the first time i have travelled on jal i have to say i was very pleasantly surprised the seat i had in their premium economy cabin was very comfortable indeed the pitch of the seat was inches compared to other asian airlines premium economy seats which for the most part have a seat pitch of inches those few extra inches jal provide make a big difference when it comes to stretching out and sleeping jals premium economy class passengers have a separate cabin as well however unlike other airlines which have the same class of travel jal do not allow their premium economy passengers the use of their lounges anywhere not even at a cost that i would say was the only disappointment in my journey as i had been told whilst checking in at melbourne that i would have use of their lounge in tokyo whilst in transit that does help on long haul flights when one has a few hours to wait for the next flight however it was the service of the staff on board all my jal flights who went out of their way to make a very long flight as comfortable as possible
good seats decent service albeit the announcements were difficult to hear in english meals were slightly bad hard to eat them especially compared to ana where the food were excellent
newer touch screen entertainment better food slightly more leg room and good service if not better service plus lower fare jal poses a strong challenge to the aging sq with deteriorating quality

i had a great flight with jal last week in premium economy the seats were comfortable and the service was attentive ive flown their business class previously and got pe seats for a decent price at the last minute i was not disappointed

this airline carrier is exquisite and features great on board meal service drink service and the entertainment is great they provide excellent service with exceptional leg room this airline is truly above most others and comes with outstanding crew members

i flew jal many times international and domestic flights the latest was last february clean good food and good in flight service lounges are good too with nice variety of food and drinks they deal well with short delays butbut is there is a weather related cancellation they are the worst airline dealing with it i was about to start my second trip to japan this year when the fourth noreaster of march landed and jal sent an email hours before the flight telling us our flight was canceled giving us a phone number to call after more than three hours being on hold with no answer we try calling with different phones four of them and always on hold until pm eastern time when they closed their office in california leaving us without an answer calling directly the japanese office they werent much help either at least they answered the phone and all that was offered was a two stops flight more than hours next tuesday all other airlines flying the same plane rebooked their passengers jal got us grounded and being unable to have the dreamed vacation and the impossibility to cancel hotels before they became nonrefundable wonderful airline when everything goes as it should be but if there are cancellation due to bad weather or any other problem good luck we are still waiting for a notice of refund when hotelscom already credited our credit card for the hotels we were able to cancel

i have found there to be nothing special for their relatively expensive economy and business class service after all the good things i had heard i was quite disappointed i was able to find a flight with first class this week what a difference large comfortable leather seats same excellent service but this time with something behind it they served a typical japanese breakfast and even had a wine list to go with it the food was very delicious and beautiful first time on a plane all the fruit was actually perfectly ripe too they have free wifi but no other entertainment but that is just fine they offer slippers and also have a charging batter for usb port items purchasing first also allows use of the first class lounge which is well appointed and comfortable and has some nice food and drink selections

flight from singapore to haneda and haneda to obihiro domestic airport is very smooth not having to rush leg space was surprising out of my expectation which enable me to stretch my leg fully the crew is helpful and friendly and having japanese meal on board is a good thing for easy digestion especially for overnight flight i would recommend anyone who has the intention to visit japan to fly with jal i will not hesitate to fly with jal again in the near future

by far the best economy experience ever jals sky wider economy seat was arated and award winning and after my flight i can see why seat was an inch or two away from the premium economy offering of another airline and the entertainment center was very complete for coach service was impeccable and food selection was great beverage service was consistent from pre meal alcohol to post meal coffee or ocha definitely worth the extra coin

this was my first experience on japan airlines and it was a good one the airplane was a new and so comfortable even in coach it was not full so i was able to move and have two seats which helped of course on such a long flight the service was excellent and kind and of course we were on time or early i will fly this airline as much as possible in the future

were glad we flew with jal this time to osaka the flight left on time at h and arrived minutes ahead of the arrival time at kix the boarding was smooth and efficient the best part was the courteous service even the way flight attendants asked some passengers to switched off their cell phones before the plane did a takeoff it was one of the best flights
