easy check in with priority through immigration lounge experience was fantastic great food beverage very good lounge comfort lot of charging for devices boarding was a short walk from lounge to gate boarding was easy hot towel drink on seating after take off another drink meal service i had the japanese set it was absolutely delicious with some bubbles heaps of entertainment to keep you occupied the seats were very comfortable i would fly jal anytime to anywhere the whole experience was exceptional

i thought the seat configuration is good because it is more seater for couple and if you are a family you can have be together too one thing good about japanese airlines is the japanese meal they offered they are pretty and tasty for us the crew is also friendly and helpful i do not mind flying with jal again

the title of this review is something of a serious question would it be possible just to live on a japan airlines jal flight i can say very definitively that i thoroughly enjoyed my hour flight from jfk to narita and the subsequent hour flight from narita to changi in singapore i was actually looking forward to the return flights and i was in economy the flight attendants were the most attentive and courteous ive ever had the pleasure of meeting its silly of me to have liked this so much but it was also completely thrilling that they all bowed to the travellers at the start of the flight you are almost constantly offered food and drink and really good food and drink the maindinner meals i was offered were tasty nutritious and filling snacks and drinks came at perfect intervals and if you feel peckish in between meals and snacks theres an area where you can pick up a snack on your own for me the seats were very comfortable and the entertainment offerings varied for example theres digital manga available and satisfying it does help if you understand a little japanese but almost all flight attendants know some english because i generally travel budget airlines im pretty happy if i get offered a pillow and blanket at no cost which jal did as well when ive travelled on nonbudget flights ive always been made aware that i was travelling in economy but not with jal the excellent treatment jal offered was above and beyond what i have ever experienced on any flight and i look forward to travelling with them again

all the airline staff are so professional from their service all the way to how they dress which is very classic the flight itself is extremely long but the airline does a great job of breaking it up between meal service total to drink service numerous there is individual inflight entertainment with a ton of movies televisions shows and music what could have been a long and boring trip turned out to be very nice

japan air is by far the best airline on the face of the planet the customer service is extraordinary in every sense you will feel taken care of like you matter like youre someone of value and importance and will be delighted the food was excellent the service unparalleled and the amenities were fantastic cant wait to fly with them again

this is the second time i flew with jal from europe to tokyo first chosen simply on timetable and price second i was explicitly looking to fly with jal the food on the second flight was not excellent as on the st flight but it was ok above average legroom and above average service simply japanese that says it all

flew jal due to cosharing with malaysia airlines mas despite being in an economy class the seat was comfortable dont mind the long journey the flight attendances were also helpful and very hospitable food was also good had rice with shrimp curry and it was awesome lucky for me since i cant take chicken or meat due to religious reason they serve hagendaz icecream for the desert cool

japan airline omg other airlines have a look and take a bow more seat spaceim talking economy class the passenger in front of you does not have his head on your lap one of the toilets are big i mean double the size of other airlines no kidding its clean and the attendants even made sure you have toothbrush to use when you wake up taps are automatic there are even the water spouts as in other normal japanese toilets its really a breath of fresh air for us poor economy folks they care about their passengersnot maximizing profits the flight is full thoughwords must get around a big congrats you bring some sense to air travel the flight attendants are polite and does not look like master herdsman controlling his cattle a bit of advicecoffee should be on the breakfast cart but the attendant was willing to run back to the kitchen to get it just for youwith a smile wifi is available but too expensive to usecharges hourly rates

very pleasant return flights to haneda from london during the daytime flight the crew regularly pass through the cabin with icedhot green teacoffee and hot facecloths along with the regular snacks and meals for dinner i had the chicken and potato gratin which came with a small salad a side dish of dressed noodles fruit salad a bread roll pickles and deli meat and a yoghurt with ice cream for dessert for breakfast i had the cheese and ham omelette which also came with a selection of little side dishes because our return flight was at night instead of serving dinner on the flight we were granted access to the jal sky lounge where we were able to eat from the buffet before boarding im guessing this was to allow passengers to try and sleep undisturbed for as long as possible the cabin crew were terrific at one point i felt slightly travel sick and the air hostess attending me made sure i was as comfortable as possible and checked in on me to see how i was doing
this is the second time i have flown jal i fly all the time and this airlines stands out they have excellent service and the flight attendants are great well done

the flight was in one of their latest dreamliners with suite style business class seats which provides good deal of privacy great service from professional and friendly staff good selection of entertainment and food and drink choices

i need to call japan airlines to rebooked my ticket i need to wait for more than an hour before i spoked to an agent it happened times the last time i called i was asking for the confirmation of my reservation as i cant checked my reservation online and the agent i spoked with is a rude guy he was mad and almost screaming on the phone what a bad customer service they have i hope jal will make something on this issue my flight was okay though only had a bad experience on their customer service

this was just one of the legs of my journey to south east asia but it was the best one i was early for my flight so i had time to ask for a free upgrade but no such luck how ever they moved me to the emergency exit at the bulkhead massive leg room plus the view was really nice on to the food ive always liked japanese food but what ive had in the states was cra p compared to this airlines food and the amount was amazing plus in a hour flight they fed us four times with miso soup at every course soooo goood you cant get people to act and be respectful on a flight it just wont happen and yes im talking about westerners so other than that best flight of the trip

havent use jal for almost years their services to passengers are still excellent with good courtesy food are not as good as before and with less choices but they are keeping their metal utensils rather than providing the passengers with plastic knives and spoons clean blankets and pillows had been offered to each passengers legroom and seats are widen than others asian airlines therefore it would be very comfortable for long haul flights although jals tickets are a little higher than other japanese airlines but i think they are worth in these the entertainment centre has a wide selection of movies too but most important their flights always leave on time and touch down punctually

with jal its very obviously all about their passengers the organization and each individual team member are very obviously focused on their passengers and that makes all the difference in any flight their equipment is well maintained extremely clean and to my experience they operate on time that said its about the team at jal they pay attention to you as an individual passenger looking to meet your expectations and anticipating your needs if you fly frequently you know what the inside of a or a or a or an a is going to feel like what makes any flight comfortable even enjoyable is the flight crews ability to meet needs jal has this down to a science when you an fly them

its just perfect from the brand new to the sky suite iii seat with extra width and pitch the screen the food the servicejust perfect there is just design error i spotted that is the switch for the reading light and service call is on the led screen itself very often passengers will accidentally press it it happens very often in the flight and more thing is the temperature in the plane is a little warm and i am just wearing summer shirt there is no individual vent for each seat other then these design flaws its just perfect singaopre airlines now has a very strong competitor

was pleasantly surprised by the generous leg room for my first ever jal flight jl from singapore to narita the entertainment console was also big and nice with touch screen capability movies selection was pretty good and recent the music selection was a little bit below expectation though food amd drinks were pretty decent and acceptable

this plane had the most legroom for a standard economy seat of any plane we have ever been on also had really comfortable seats with lots of cool well thought out features such as little cubbies for glasses phone etc excellent service good food and extremely clean throughout the flight if it werent for the screaming kids it would have been one of the best flights ever

travelling to sydney via tokyo on the way back from canada was a great move the aircraft leaves after lunch and arrives in tokyo late afternoon for a early evening connection to sydney this allowed me to stay awake until the overnight flight to sydney so i arrived early morning after a good sleep made the jet lag almost none existent the aircraft are both s although the canada sectors looked like an older interior with shell seats compared to the sydney sectors which were enclosed i must say though the enclosed seats felt somewhat cosier than the flat shell seats from vancouver jal service was very good nothing was too much trouble and the meal selections were great i also like the service starting not too long after take off as it allows you to get the meals out of the way in case you need to work my only issue the the repeated announcements after take off they can be annoying when you have just started a movie
excellent service excellent food and great attentionplane and restroomnvery clean business class is the way to go

on arrival at the airport the notice boards were saying that because of heavy snow my flight along with others to other parts of japan may be canceled or diverted back to tokyo we did take off in a very new plane which was comfortable and roomy but the pilot did warn to expect rough weather and a possible return to tokyo the rough weather did not eventuate service was polite and efficient and the pilot showed great skill in landing our plane during heavy snow on a runway that was white

my flight was from seoul to memanbetsu in hokkaido japan and i changed flight at haneda airport flight was excellent with good service and on schedule from seoul to haneda the aircraft was b which was comfortable its service was nice and want to travel with jal again tokyo haneda airport is very convenient for transit travelers from intl to domestic flight also can easily access to central tokyo thru mororail

remember the first time you learned how to respond to the greeting how are you and how selfconscious you were answering i am fine thank you well thats how the jal local ground crew did their obligatory bowandgreet as they opened the checkin counters selfconscioulsy but that was the only selfconscious episode during the whole jal flight from manila to jfk because everything else was done smoothly and efficiently and with an eye to real passenger service the checkin counters readily accomodated my request for an aisle seat their online checkin was not working that day and even gave us the seat with the biggest legroom at no cost i could only guess that maybe the long life expectancy common to japanese made their society more caring to their elderly and attentive to their needs the english language skills of the cabin crew are passable and one can request and get the usual amenities for a long flight of course the filipino cabin crews in pal can engage in better small talk and can even give you tips on getting around metro manila with their greater english proficiency but i digress what was a pleasant surprise to us however was the quality of the food although i readily confess they had me at haagen dazs ice cream standard dessert even in economy the appetizer and the mains were no slouch either they were tasty or as foodie blogs always say the flavors of their offerings are like a party in the palate i finished everything maybe i am really just a man of simple tastes that a simple serving of haagen dazs vanilla ice cream was enough to leave me wondering if this is just economy class i wonder what first class has on offer the layover was five hours in narita airport more than enough time to walk around the shops and have a snack or a drink at the good restaurants all over souvenir shops include wine stores selling the now trending japanese singlemalts and candy stores selling kit kats in various flavors found only in japan by and large flying with jal was a thoroughly pleasant experience and it starts with that selfconscious bow by the nonjapanese checkin staff

my outbound flight encountered a h delay after we had already boarded as can sometimes happen during this time we were updated every minutes as to the nature status and eta of the solution in both english and japanese and were offered refreshments throughout the process the professionalism of the staff during this time meant that nobody had any issue taking it all completely in their stride partway through the flight the head of the cabin crew went to literally every single one of the hundreds of passengers on the flight and with a gracious smile offered her personal and sincere apology again in both english and japanese and asked if there was anything they could do to make the flight more comfortable truly above and beyond the food was also excellent i had never tried tokyo soup stock before but i wish i had while i was still in japan this soup was served inflight and it blew my mind shattering my preconceptions about what is possible in airline food i will absolutely fly jal when i return to japan thank you for an unforgettable experience

i am a special needs traveller and jal pays high attention to make your travel comfortable they arranged for preseating as well as tagged my baggage as priority traveller service onboard was exceptional this isnt my first time flying with jal and i highly recommend taking this airline

in early march i took my first flight on the relatively new jal dreamliner from melbourne to tokyo boarding was on time and well organised the plane was in good order and service was excellent food quality seemed reasonably good although i didnt eat much as it was a very early morning flight just after midnight the shell style seats in premium economy are good but not great leg room appears excellent but there was two problems first i was in seat c aisle and a support from the seat in front divides the legfoot space in front of you there doesnt seem to be any reason why the support could not have been moved to the edge of the seat in front but then again im not an aircraft engineer i noted that the above was the case in all c and h seats other than the bulkhead row second the seat bottom moves forward and the back slides down when you recline the seat this takes up some of the otherwise generous legroom and seemed a less comfortable position than the usual recline back mode of aircraft seats on my return flight on the to sydney from tokyo i was in the bulkhead row seat k the legroom here is certainly impressive i was able to prop my feet on my cabin bag that i placed against the bulkhead after takeoff of course and get into a good position for a sleep one last thing was that the toilet just behind pe on the ac side of the cabin was especially large a good spot to change into sleepwear if that is what you do on long overnight flights overall good value for money return on a top class airline

we chose this flight due to the distance for the positive commentsseat width and seat amenities that we read about have to say i am glad we picked this airline everything was great except for their japanese meal offerings that were a little off for the typical american traveler on our return we worked hard to get an alternative meal choice i say hard because we were on a code share flight and the ball kept being passed back and forth between airlines lesson learned the meal choice lies with the ticketed airline regardless of who flies the plane with attentive flight attendants who bow each time they encounter you to the airport ramp staff who wave as a group when you push backyou cant get mad at them our premium economy gave us a small private plane section and a feeling we were somewhat special over the masses in economy our recliner seat with footrest deferred any guilt we might have by hampering the passenger behind would we fly them again as long as the price is not crazyyes

it was my first experience onboard japan airlines and i really like it the crew are very welcoming and theor do their utmost to serve the customer legroom in economy vlass was huge and food are tasty for sure will travel with tis airlines again

the first time using jal to fly from jakarta to itami osaka the meal is really good the flight attendant keep on serving you with snack and drinks for drinks you can choose many kind of japanese speciality drinks such as japan beer red wine white wine juice green tea coffee and miso soup one thing that i really like is the space for your legs in my opinion the class that i ride economy class was so cozy and lots of spare room for your leg

this was our first trip on jal and what a pleasant surprise if my memory serves me right they never used to have great reviews years agoboy have they turned it around our flights from singapore were flawlesseasy friendly check ins great modern clean and comfortable planesgood food by airline standards but the crowning glory is the cabin crewsthey are fantastic in every areawe usually fly qantas and emirates jal made them look second rate in most areas

i flew from haneda to hong kong on japan airlines top level business class suite sky suite iii on a b sky suites have direct aisle access from every seat and in the sky suite iii iteration seats are angled out towards the window on the sides and in the center section the two seats are angled away from each other the same configuration as cathay pacific uses on its long haul business class the seat has a flat platform at the far end of the seat that forms the foot of the bed when the seat is reclined to a fully flat bed and below that platform is an angled foot rest that is used when the seat is reclined as an angled seat rather than as a fully flat bed the seat has a good size video screen and flip down table that swings out toward the passenger there is also storage under the armrest but it cannot be used on takeoff or landing when the armrest must be pushed down to be flushed with the seat the recline is a bit awkward as there are not presets that can quickly recline to several seat positions such as upright for eating slight recline for watching entertainment and zposition for resting other than sleeping on a fully flat bed instead you have to press the recline button which then reclines that whole seat in a preset path ie you cannot separately operate the seat back and leg portion of the seat for a short haul flight from haneda to hong kong this was not an issue and the seat is very comfortable for such a flight for a longer haul flight the lack of options might be more bothersome to be fair though the fully flat seat offering is much superior to competitors such as cathay pacific which offers only regular slightly wider reclining seats for business class on the route entertainment movies selection was good wifi is available on the flight lunch was a choice between japanese and a couple of western choices and as usual for japan airlines was very good i had the japanese meal with a starter box of a half dozen or so different appetizers and then two hot items with rice i also tried one of two sakes on offer and it turned out to be a small full glass bottle served chill and was good dessert was hagen daz ice cream jal serves a special coffee in business class which is only available on board and i always order it because it is very good strong and smooth with low acidity just the way i like it service as always is superb the toilets are always clean because the flight attendants never stop going in to clean them prior to the flight i used the jal first class lounge at haneda airport and had breakfast there was a good selection of food though less variety than at lunch or dinner that i tried when in the lounge for other flights there was a chef on duty who made galettes crepes folded around melted cheese and ham to order and he was very popular with the guests in the lounge with a constant line of customers for his services an oddity of the lounge is that the wifi seems to be confined to certain areas whereas other areas do not seem to have wifi coverage and may be intended as quiet areas

a modern airdcraft with one of the best spaces seats in economy i have experienced the service is excellent the inflight entertainment is not the best in terms of selection but the system works well one major ciriticsm is that the food on this overnight flight was pretty bad a lot worse than normal be prepared that youre not going to get much food at all because the airline works on the premise that people will sleep which is not that easy in economy class so after takeoff all you get is a tiny snack and the next meal is a really bad breakfast before arrival to be fair the meals on the daytime return flight were better also youre not given an amenities kit which is fine as long as you are prepared and bring your own there were some toothbrushes in limited supply in the toiltet though if service reliability and a comfy seat are your priority then japan airlines is certainly a great choice

the day we were flying to manila the flight was cancelled due to snow storm in narita no plane was available in san diego due to no flight is taking off from narita the jal staff in san diego did a good job for rerouting us so we can arrived the second day in the morning the service in the plane is aone and the rest rooms are always clean the convenience flying from san diego is outstanding one stop and a hrs waiting for a flight to manila

my first time experience with jal quite good i had smooth checked in until boarded the flights take off and landing was nice the entertainment good with updated new movie and the food service is also good with plenty variation of the food i love the soup
jal is the best airline with good cabin crew good food great entertainment the only minor negative is i cannot online checkin from dfw to busan

i go to thailand a few times in order to meet sweetheart for year in that time i always use jal formerly i used ana however ana and trouble occurred twice personally and i have changed to jal since then jal after breakdown greatly changed compared with formerly of course it is in good direction i change into jal and think that i was correct answer reason i use japanese airline is clear because there is heart of hospitality when i use jal i can be spending traffic with thailand comfortably i use business class of usually business class of was renewed and became more comfortable i like jal as my private impressions i will love jal and will use jal from now on also

i often use nonjapanese airlines because japanese airlines are usually expensive but i used japan air lines this time for business trip i was impressed by great meal on the plane such as soba black wheat noodle and soup stock cabin attendants were always kind and polite to passengers i want to use jal next time if price was affordable

we arrived to japan airlines and was promptly treated as if royalty the same could be said for all the passengers we were with including in economy class the seats lay almost flat in business class food was exceptional and the anytime menu really helped curb late night cravings during this hour flight i cannot say enough positive comments about jal and hope that many who read this review will consider to fly them to japan from the usa as well

fantastic experience in premium economy at ft in tall even room to spare in terms of legroom for me seats were fantastic as they were the fixed shell type so if the passenger in front adjusted their seat no problem you didnt get their seatback in your face great choice of films on the touchscreen monitor film choice changes every month cabin crew were so attentive drinks when you wanted jal is my carrier of choice flying this route
i fly jal busoness class internationally on a regular basis their flight crews are very attentive and the food is quite good ive also found jal fares to be very competitive
have been using this airline for over years friendly flight attendants excellent menu will only fly on this airline to japan
airplane cleanexcellent serviceaverage foodtwo luggages availableinstead of on air france

i usually fly ana or sq for my tpac flights out of lax but i decided to try jal out after hearing positive reviews shortly after booking i realized i made a terrible mistake unlike the other airlines i usually fly jal did not allow me to select my seats in advance not even for an additional fee i was forced to wait until check in hours before the flight this is definitely not ideal for hour long flights further compounding that they do not even have a function english language app their app just contains hyperlinks to the website this makes checking in while traveling very difficult especially when you cannot get to a computer hours before your flight i was able to get an aisle seat at checkin but i do not care for suspense and drama when it comes to travel another issue i had was regarding their baggage policy my return flight from sin to lax was booked as a single leg but it contained layovers in hnd and kix the ground staff at sin tagged my bags through to lax informing me that i would only need to collect them once at hnd to clear customs since the following flight was a domestic flight i was supposed to be able to recheck them at hnd to lax unfortunately after being ran around three different areas in two different terminals by the jal ground staff at hnd they insisted on ripping off the hndkixlax tag and insisted on making me retrieve my bag at kix since my flight was late at night i did not have the option to recheck the bag or leave at lost luggage for my morning flight to lax the actual service on the airplane was fine the food was ok and the entertainment options were acceptable the service was slightly better than na or eu airlines offer but not on par with their asian rivals the older planes had decent room in economy but the newer planes were as cramped as any other airline all the hassle and stress from the trip will ensure that i will return to ana and sq for my annual tpac needs moving forward

return flight booked directly online via jal portal check or i thought it was itinerary emailed out a little ambiguous given departure was am missed my flight due to itinerary ambiguity partially my fault now the real test of customer service or lack of surfaces log into jal portal entire booking deleted hastily make contact with jal to confirm and salavage booking language differences and lack of empathy prove to be challenging advised a no show penalty will apply however no ref of a no show fee in terms and conditions customer service approach pay fee to secure flights unable secure return flight as cancelled by their system lose return flight needed to be rerouted to sydney pay a higher fee book local flights customer service delegation authority lacking care factor zero customer service approach to solving customer concern low or non existent language challenges

comfortable seats for long flight there are free chips nuts and water in the galley area that you can take as you like good to walk around a bit there to stretch the legs and have some chips entertainment was quite standard for long flight with movies and games

bought the air tickets months before the date most of the economy class tickets are pretty pricey by then the premium economy tickets are just cost usd more took a red eye flight to tokyo from singapore premium economy tickets allow passengers to use the airport lounge before departure at both airports singapore changi airport tokyo haneda airport leg room is plenty most passengers seems to be resting okay i am someone who is unable to sleep on flight checkin counter is fast service from the air crews is good no complaints will choose jal again if i when i am flying to japan from singapore

our flight was delayed and that was a little frustrating our checking process took longer than needed also they cant check a bag when you have more than segments in your reservation and we had four so that delayed us a bit as they tried to figure it out and eventually just checked our bags to narita japan the lounge that jal uses in guam is absolutely terrible its gone down hill drastically in the last years that said once we got on the airplane things went well the crew was so friendly and caring they seemed to genuinely want to be helpful food was pretty good quality nice champagne and even better sake flying them long haul today and looking forward to it

im a frequent international traveler base out of shanghai and flying to japan in particular to times a year and this is my second bad experience with them in a row and i will no longer fly jal again if you dont fly much and are not fussy about where you sit fly them they provide good service on board as well as good food with great entertainment i however always asks for certain seats when i fly and with most airlines would give me these seats when they are available but with jal i just always seem to get lies after lies about the availability of these seats i would rather have them just tell me a reason why they cant have these seats than to have them lie about them over and over again about how they have been reserved and after boarding seeing obvious non frequent travelers many chinse where i fly out of have never even been on a plane would not even care where they sit let alone preselect these siting in these seats that i specifically show up early to get well no more jal is never the cheapest i fly them hoping to get a little better service than others if i dont even get the normal service i get from other cheaper airlines why fly them

the seat room was larger than a few of the other airlines and the inflight movie selection was fine the attendants were very polite and accommodating our dinner was nice and we were offered both a western and traditional japanese meal choice but breakfast was very traditional and i couldnt come at mushroom soup for breakfast

was rather vary when my flight booked for ba was confirmed to be on a code share partner jal as previous experiences with baa code share from usa have been more than disappointing jal was absolutely brilliant service comfort and attitude of staff would now consider jal for this sector o my next trip

boarding was efficient and departure on timeseats had extra leg room spaceseat could recline a little and was comfortable for a short haul flight lounge near the departure gate was very convenientlounge food was excellent with wide choices and for alcohol drinkers a fantastic variety to pick from on a self serve basismany plug points for laptops and cell phones cabin service was excellent and flight entertainment channels very goodcabin was clean and had ample luggage spacetoilets were sufficient and very clean food provided was ok nothing greati would have preferred less fried food and more of their pickles insteadi love the plum winehaagen das ice cream was a welcome choice though i would have preferred japanese green tea ice creams captain spoke good english and we arrived ahead of time
attendants were thoughtful and careful to passengers would recommend to fly again i thought to food on board coming home was better than the food going there somehow

the staff on jal are amazingly helpful polite immaculately presented always professional the seats are comfortable lie flat with added foam mattress available the food drink choices are varied substantial

i fly to the philippines once or twice each year and i always fly on japan air atleast three quarters of my flight the service of the crew is always very professional and to me stars japan air is by far miles above all usa carriers hands down the take great pride in serving you making sure no matter what fare you bought you are comfortable if you fly to asia and have the chance try japan air jal you will have a great experience and a good flight
great flight and service from staff there is always something very unique and special about flying with jal love it so much and highly recommend it
decent flight took off and landed on schedule bags arrived quickly nothing to complain about all good

aside from emirates i rate this as one of my other favorite airlines and why impeccable service love the boeing dreamliner seat configuration and yes the bags allowance kgs each good for shopaholic like me in terms of food always order the jap style to try different small dishes only thing which is lacking amenity bag which is made of a small string pouch with some moisture mask and socks ya perhaps its not really a long haul about hours but still if it is an overnight flight should consider a better kit other than that always a pleasure to fly with jal

if flying internationally buy your domestic segments from out of country for best prices then get to the airport early and buy an upgradeonly yen for business and yen for first first is a dream separate security use of great lounges fabulous meal onboard for less than usd a segment well worth it just the meal and drinks are worth the price but the comfort and ease of priority checking loading etc make it the best way to pretend you are always a front of bus type

japan airlines has the worst customer service period they never answer their customer service lines im tired of calling and waiting over minutes for a response their online website is down and their land building will be out of power this weekend hope their flight is better because everything else is pretty embarrassing for an airline that touts itself as being one of the best so sad

i traveled extensively internationally before retirement and this trip rates as the absolute worst travel experience of my life our flight to tokyo connecting city to bangkok left with an initial hour delay this was ok as they contacted us and forewarned although this put our tokyo connection in jeopardy we arrived in tokyo with enough time to make our connection as everything was delayed due to a snow storm this is where things began to go south btw it was a total of we boarded the plane and then sat onboard hours while it was deiced x at the hour mark we were informed that all flights were cancelled and the airport was closing we were not allowed to disembark for another hours approx am i realize an airline is not responsible for weather but this is when jal really failed upon disembarking we were given a sheet of paper with phone numbers to rebook ourselves in the morning we along with thousands of others slept on the floor not jal issue however in the morning we all discovered the phone numbers given did not work more so when jal opened their ticketing windows they flatly refused to service anyone on a cancelled flight and informed us that they were taking care of the passengers booked for that day first they would not help anyone hundreds of people they realized the self rebooking numbers werent working and still would not assist we were informed that perhaps that evening or the next day they would be able to assist cancelled passengers in the end we booked a flight with thai airways for latter morning to bangkok at a cost of for a one way from tokyo to bangkok needless to say i will never fly jal again and will urge anyone who hears of our nightmare to do the same

we used avios british airways frequent flyer points to redeem for a jal one world partner flight on the tokyo haneda to sapporo new chitoise sector of our japan itinerary for the rest of our trip we used the ana tourist travel pass highly recommended jpy per sector jal also do a tourist pass but they dont fly the ishigaki leg we required but there were no travel pass tickets on the date we required on jal or ana i remembered that you can redeem avios on jal and there were reward flights available for the bargain avios and tax yes you read that right tax you can check reward availability on the ba website when logged in to your executive club account we couldnt check in online as it was a reward booking and there was a moment of anxiety at checkin when the agent was concerned that miss as a prefix in japan means child and this was not a valid adult ticket but this was resolved largely to our ignorance as we dont speak japanese the had seats across and was full there is a camera on the inflight screens so you can watch takeoff and landing live from the nose using avios made our itinerary and our budget possible

amenities on the airplane and food is always great this trip it felt like the crew catered more to the japanese speaking travelers dont know if its because they have trouble speaking english upon arriving to narita they did not offer us a disembarkation card to fill out although we saw them give to others we just thought it was a form only for non foreigners on our way back to hawaii wish they were more knowledgeable about the custom declaration form when asked a questions she had to go find out and came back with i thnik so i think maybe next time we want to go to japan we will try another airlines

after many flights using lowest price as a bench mark tried jal and what a difference service a plus nice food drinks includedheadphone too good selection of free entertainmentnew dream liners very quiet good leg room larger washrooms checking even in long line ups super fast and stress free will use them in future as the price was very similar to chinese line with zero service on same trip last year

flight for this destination with a stop over in narita airport tokyo the flight was well priced and the service was friendly and professional the first leg was a hour flight leaving after midnight and it was pleasing to not be given a full meal after take off a snack packwith treats and water was issued and coffee and tea etc the breakfast was a large spread with a main course along with fruit yogurt salad and a croissant and coffee etc in all a comfortable flight with a good range of tv and movies and a pillow and blanket

upon entering the aircraft my impression was that the crew was not enthusiastic about service before departure we in business class got a tiny plastic cup of champagne or sparkling wine then we got a towel that was wet and cold after takeoff it took minutes before we were asked what we would like to drink twenty minutes later i had to call and ask then another ten minutes i had asked to get dinner served quick but it took more than three hours before i could finish the main course skipping dessert in order to sleep the contrary to my request i was called three hours before arrival in order to have breakfast upon my complaint the answer was that the cabin had to be cleared before arrival on a ten and a half hour night flight i could sleep for four hours
excellent from start to finish very efficient check in business lounge boarding friendly staff only hic cup food average

bkk checkin handling by tg thai airways and supervised by jl staff the checkin was smooth and fast bkk sakura lounge spacious lots of seats with power point to recharge battery food and drinks were pretty good beef curry stirfried chicken with holy basil leaves gapao were very popular they tasted very nice there were also restrooms in the lounge inflight ber sky wider economy class bulkhead seat was spacious with lots of leg room meal servicesupper had fried rice with grilled salmon a bit dried and light taste soba noodles were very nice service from cabin crew were excellent overall very very good

this was our first time on jal we fly regularly to australia and wanted to have a change of stopover rather than singapore or dubai so stopped in tokyo for three nights i cannot recommend this enough tokyo was fantastic jal business class was actually quite a bit cheaper than ba or emirates so we were nervous of what to expect we were delighted with everything staff are delightful the flights departed and arrived exactly on time business class seats were far better than both ba and emirates the food was fabulous especially from tokyo to sydney jal is definitely our preferred airline for london to sydney and we cannot wait to experience kyoto on the way back

travelled business class tokyo narita to australia sydney good business lounge check apart from the australian slob in shorts thongs excellent onboard service amenities food check so why not the seats comfortable but surprisingly narrow im cm kg sufficiently so as to make it difficult to sleep in my preferred position no not transversely not a problem in a daylight flight but this was an overnight flight

ca checked my name before offering a more relaxed seat mr so and so would you like to have more room by moving from f to say b it helped not only me but also other people to enjoy more leg room and space i was able to sleep almost flat using seats

i used the jal to fly back to vietnam twice last month in january the first time was good and without any hicup the second time was not so well when we reached tokyo japan there was a snow that covered about less than inches both the airport and the airline did not know what to do and decided to cancel out more than flight include the one i was on i had to seat inside the plane from pm to am next morning there were more than people stranded at the airport and the jal did not provide any information any rebooking information and any accommodations to those people lots of them missed meetings family emergency business meetings and even charity groups missed charity works i was willing to purchase another ticket but unfortunately it was on saturday and no tickets available all other airlines also ran into same situation there was not much communication between customers and the airline counters either we were literally begging for information communication and tried to get on another flight by standing by options it was a nightmare and was not a good experience at all

i was startled with the food they served us i had to spit them out so grossed i love japanese food but boy what they served us presentation wise was really good the taste was awful i had to asked the fa a bowl of udon noodles that also wasnt good i starved myself on that flight my hubby didnt even eat at all after he saw me making faces when i tried them food no offense jal just didnt like what you served us

i usually use jal if i have flight after jal bankruptcy it will be better for example how to communicate with passengers some information and any service for passengers airplane is kept in clean id like to recommend anybody to use jal if you need to have flights

i was recommeded to fly jal and it did not disappoint me at all infact it set new standards for both in air and on ground service it would great to have better movie selection as most movies english were quite popular once only and it would be nice they can put some japanese movies with subtitles

you always get your moneys worth with jal my recent flight to singapore was no exception premium economy is a very attractive proposition comfortable enough to work and relax good quality headphones to enjoy the wide selection of movies tasty food miso beefand of course pleasant service my only gripe would be with online checking this is supposed to save time so why do we need to go to the check in counter to get a stamp on our boarding pass

i have flown jal many times before and have always found them a great airline the economy seats are very roomy and comfortable the selection of things to watch on your personal screen is excellent the staff are very friendly and welcoming which all helps making your flight pleasurable my airline of choice for flying to japan would be jal

this flight comes with only one meal breakfast so you can go straight to sleep after takeoff its quite comfortable seats are arranged from left to right on the b staff noted my birthday and prepared a small treat

this is my first time taking jal to japan and simply love it until this trip my previous trips had always been on singapore airline due to the timing and also the use of my krisflyer points of late using points to redeem a trip is not worth as much as it should be and decided to try some other airlines instead to my surprise jal is not only cheaper but still offers great timing and great economy class seat timing i like to fly in late at night and reach the destination early morning so that i dont have to waste a day of my precious holiday there similarly i like to fly out late at night to save you guessed it a day of my precious holiday jal has that great economy class seat great leg room great recliner seat inflight entertainment screen is huge i suspect that im going to be a jal fan for a long while whenever i fly to japan

when i pay times the cost of economy i expect a little more a larger seat first boarding some nice refreshment or a meal allowance for heavier luggage or more luggage etc the staff members at jal on the ground and in the air were all very nice but oddly business boards in the last zone with general boarding fist zone was special needs and anyone with children so that was already ‚Öì or more of the plane then zone is those with recognized status i forgot what zone is but after that is general boarding so already you dont get any special treatment the seats were slightly larger than economy and my lb suitcase was permitted there was a lot of activity with the attendants so i figured they were preparing some food for the hours in the air but the only thing they did was give everyone on the plane tiny paper cup of juice coffee or tea there was nothing else re entertainment there is none but wifi was free that was nice cost of flight was about rt and length of flight about hours each way ill have to try a different airline next time it was disappointing

we were treated royally from checkin to arrival in tokyo and then bangkok there was great food service and comfort throughout the almost hours of travel we look forward to the return flight back to san diego

beautiful new boeing crew were amazing super friendly prompt and efficient aircraft was spacious and nice atmosphere mimicking a night flight during the day with the window tint and dimmed lights it meant pax could sleepmakes the flight go much faster

friendly helpful ground and cabin staff centre bulkhead seats with lots of legroom clean boeing with pleasant cabin layout ontime departure but minute arrival delay owing to changi airport airspace overcrowding

our first experience of japan was on our japan airline flight to kushiro and it exceeded our expectations the staff welcomed us in english and constantly checked if we needed assistance thankfully they also announced all the inflight messages in english for us which we deeply respect since we were the only english speaking passengers on board i highly recommend jal domestic and will be flying again very soon

we have been a fan of japan airlines for a long time almost thirty years in economy class the service is professional the food is good and the seats are comfortable because of our gold status on american they have provided upgrades to us in the past that even american has not this was our second experience with their business class we had flown from dallas to narita in business class as well on both the flights the main meal was superb and the rest of the options for food and drinks were tasty and nicely served i was surprised though that for such a long flight they only have one scheduled meal and rest is whenever you wish you almost wish they had another lighter scheduled meal the sky suite gives a fully flat seat with extra cushion bed provided if needed the planes are relatively new models and are fairly quite compared to our business class experience in other airlines this is still far better

we cant fault jal the checkin was effortless the staff are very friendly and attentive and the food is probably the best inflight food we have had love the warm face towels they hand out so you can freshen up the plane was very clean and the seats were comfortable would definitely fly with jal again
comfortable seat for an hour or so long flight j class cabin a drinks service was offered and was offered a refill on a no ife available
a lot of other airlines could learn from jal we travel a lot and when it comes to long haul flights we fly business jal definitely has the best service and kindest people
wonderful flight in business class individual suite seats first class lounge at the airport great service this was the first time flying jal and we were very impressed

flew japan airlines from seoul gimpo airport to tokyo haneda on economy simple efficient flight on a saturday took hours to reach tokyo from seoul gimpo polite service with a simple japanese dinner nicely served only drawback about jal is check in is only allowed hours before flight which means you have to store my luggage somewhere if you arrived in gimpo early

ontime flight efficient and friendly service business class flight included service to the sakura lounge sakura lounge offered charging stations at each seat food offerings were heavily japanese as opposed to international offerings

from start to finish i cant fault this airline the staff are always helpful the food is good and the plane is clean we have now traveled with them several times and i would highly recommend spending a bit extra and go premium economy i take an ipad with movies etc on it as the movies are mainly catered to japanese people which you would expect there is always plenty of food and drink during the flight i will always use them

although a short flight of minutes there is time for a free hot or cold drink as always with jal the flight was on time the plane is a flying west from tokyo to osaka if the weather is clear you get a fantastic view of mount fuji from the plane for the best view get a window seat on the right side of the plane if flying from osaka to tokyo the best to get a window seat on the left

the flight was on time the economy seats on jal are very good with enough legroom only a short flight but enough time for a drink of tea coffee or juice no charge landing at narita was on time and smooth this flight now uses one of the new gates at narita terminal so it is a long walk to get out

having not flown to japan in economy before i was a little worried about leg room as i am over ft tall i was pleasantly surprised upon sitting down and was even more pleased when no one was occupying the middle seat in flight entertainment was pretty good with a nice selection of films good quality audio and screen worked well food on the flight out was good and bad on the way back staff where polite and the plane was clean certainly better a flight than i thought and would use it again for future trips to japan

remember the days when airlines actually catered to their customers some years ago well neither do i because i was only then and as much as i though those days were long gone and they pretty much are its so refreshing to actually come off a hr flight and honestly say it was enjoyable i have to admit i find it hard to sleep on any plane but the middle seats in business are the ultimate in isolation from anything around you just put up the adjacent partitions and voila also jals meal service is great offer choice of either western or japanese menu and after the initial service you can order anything a la carte anytime up until hrs before landing directly from ur personal communication device the movie selections could be better and more numerous but not a problem on this overnight the service from the extremely friendly and accommodating flight attendants could not have been better see my separate review of aa flight over to japan for a harshly contrasting experience

this was the return flight with jl and we found premium economy to be a good experience im a larger build guy and did find the bottom of the seat could be uncomfortable after a few hours however the food and service was of a high standard and as good as any other airline in this class also there was good space for personal articles and inflight baggage though the entertainment service was a little limited other then movies english shows were limited
would fly again great first class service and excellent flight friendly stewardesses good entertainment an enjoyable long flight

excellent service after traveling on delta from the us to india flying with jal in economy felt like first class the staff is great they really made us feel welcomed the food was delicious the seats were comfortable spacious and clean definitely helped on a hour flight this was my first time flying with jal but i look forward to flying with jal again

i have visited japan many times for last years this is the first time to fly with jal from chicago to narita in tokyo i get used to the service of other flight companies i was so pleased and happy by kind and pleasant services by all of attendants even though it took over hours i felt the flight was so quick definitely i will choose jal next time

have flown jal many times and always been happy with this airline however this time i found the dreamliner premium economy seats uncomfortable and the foot rest was awkward to adjust my husbands would not lower at all the worst aspect though was the awful food which was served as an initiative to give young chefs an entree into the world of commercial cooking i could not eat the thick vegetable soup accompanied by a hard roll which was served for breakfast the dinner was luke warm and tasteless it seems they were trying to serve western food instead of sticking to their own specialities of noodles delicate sauces and small dishes i would think hard about using this airline next time on this route the problem is the opposition has two night time flights and this only has one would consider for flights to uk via japan as service is usually excellent planes on time clean and reasonably priced
it was very convenience for us to go to tokyo from our town nanki shirahama airport was small but very clean and easy to move around they have a good restaurant onsite

my wife and son and i recently returned from our skiing vacation from hokkaido with jal we did not get seats together although it could have been arranged by the flight crew if they wanted to the premium economy seats are very uncomfortable they also land from syndney in narita and you connection is from haneda which is an hour away by bus i dont recommend flying jal if you can avoid it

from leg room to food choices to cabin service this is simply the best economy flight we have flown did a recent trip to asia and returned hong kong to tokyo to boston via jal the food was particularly good the closest to restaurant quality we have had and the stop at the amazing international terminal at narita airport was a real experience the only way to go from tokyo to boston

we just came back from bangkok via tokyo to the us what an experience flying with japan airlines i had forgotten the feeling of respect confort and proper manners while traveling on a flight everything was perfect actually more than perfect the sense of being treated special as if you were the only passenger in the plane every employee dedicated their entire time to make you feel confutable made the trip a pleasure absolutely amazing japan airlines looking forward flying again with jal

i caught jal flight from singapore to tokyo hours duration and me and my family loved it the service was great especially i have a yrs old boys with me and they were considerate in very detail the crew reminded me to take my boy to bathroom as the plane is going to land this showed they put customer in their priority the airplane food were good seats were wider and had more legroom than other airlines can offer we were in economy class the plane is b i do recommend to catch jal if you intend to go to japan you wont disapoint

the service and flight attendants a cleanliness of the plane immaculate food was very good with a japanese touch in flight entertainment excellent best part were the seats plenty of room and lots of legroom

out of the two japanese airlines ana and jal i still find that jal offered good inflight service for a decent pricefor sgd for two way flight it a bargain the legroom for the economy class is spacious enough food is good in my opinion and the inflight entertainment especially movies were good a mix of s movies and to the latest the flight attendants were friendly and go out of their way to make sure your flight are comfortable the only gripe i have with the airline is their customer service it seems like no one manned their call center
flight sydnrtsyd economy classexcellent customer service comfortable seatsgood selection quality of food and drinks

we flew round trip to tokyo on japan airlines and we had excellent service and a great flight our flight attendants went out of their way to make us feel comfortable and to offer us samples of japanese food and wine

tokyo to manila economy class b all staff were amazing very accommodating and hospitable the seats were great and there was a good amount of legroom the inflight entertainment had good movies selection although theres always room for improvement especially with those monitors nevertheless it was always great flying with them and my number one go to airline

i book tickets for a family trip april via expediacom website before the flight i had to cancel trip after conversation with an expedia customer representative japan airlines agreed to give me credit for next trip and this information has been posted on my expedia account because of this japan airline credit i missed many chances to buy cheap tickets from other airlines few days ago i called expedia to book tickets using my credit after waiting hours of conversation between expedia and jal customer representatives i was told that i have zero credit

checkin at first class counter was excellent as was separate security counter for first class and emerald one world customers lounge was small very clean with comfortable seats limited food salmon sushi curry puff or miso soup with tea coffee soft drinks or whiskey and beer one english language newspaper single copy was there on the day boarding was pretty crowded with no priority queue for f and j class seating was standard domestic j class with no av only service offered was coffeeteacold soft drink with not even a biscuit for less a meal this is really a bus service with no frills in the air

i travelled to south korea and japan weeks ago and i have to say jal was excellent the flight attendants were so professional and kindthe food was great and the leg room spacious considering it was economy sectioni look forward to flying japan airlines in the future

absolute worst customer service and experience with this airline on my honeymoon and paid for an upgrade on the way to my destination and halfway was downgraded they blamed jfk for not properly communicating the upgrade was only halfway why would i pay for an upgrade to only receive half of it and even the half that i did have had no wifi on the flight and it was a hour flight either way we got the runaround with a few different people at the haneda airport most notably was an incredibly rude manager masami ohashi i was shocked when she said she was a manager because the way she spoke and handled this was incredibly unprofessional so rude and i felt extremely disrespected i was interrupted nonstop by no no no no solution unless you pay more we spoke with other staff members at haneda and bangkok and they promised to accommodate us on our returning flight but then when that time came they said oh sorry we cant the flight is full for those seats meanwhile we saw open seats on the plane just terrible lying to customers to save the money we paid and avoid refunding it very cheap horrible experience i will never ever fly with this airline again dont use them if you want to avoid the worst headache and rude customer service i would give zero stars if i could

i took the direct over the night flight leaving haneda at night and arrive san francisco early afternoon business class cabin including the sakura lounge in haneda is fabulous the only disappointment is the sakura lounge in san francisco airport this has not changed for decades but the facility and the service they provide is far from the satisfactory level of that of other leading airlines Âá∫Âºµ„ÅßÁæΩÁî∞Â§úÁô∫„Çµ„É≥„Éï„É©„É≥„Ç∑„Çπ„Ç≥ÊòºÈ†ÉÂà∞ÁùÄÁõ¥Ë°å‰æø„Çí„Éì„Ç∏„Éç„Çπ„ÇØ„É©„Çπ„ÅßÊê≠‰πó„Åó„ÅüÊê≠‰πó„Ç≠„É£„Éì„É≥ÁæΩÁî∞„Åß„ÅÆ„Çµ„ÇØ„É©„É©„Ç¶„É≥„Ç∏„ÅØÊúüÂæÖÈÄö„Çä„ÅÆÊ∫ÄË∂≥„ÇíÂæó„Çâ„Çå„ÅüÈ£ü‰∫ãÁù°Áú†‰ªï‰∫ãÁí∞Â¢É„Å©„Çå„Å®„Å£„Å¶„ÇÇÈÅúËâ≤ÁÑ°„ÅÑ ‰∫àÊÉ≥ÈÄö„Çä„Å†„ÅåÂîØ‰∏Ä„ÅÆ‰∏çÊ∫Ä„ÅØ„Çµ„É≥„Éï„É©„É≥„Ç∑„Çπ„Ç≥ÂõΩÈöõÁ©∫Ê∏Ø„ÅÆ„Çµ„ÇØ„É©„É©„Ç¶„É≥„Ç∏„ÅÆ„Ç∑„Éß„Éú„ÅïÁ±≥ÂõΩÂÖ®‰Ωì„Å´Ë®Ä„Åà„Çã„ÅÆ„Åã„ÇÇÁü•„Çå„Å™„ÅÑ„Åå‰ªñÂõΩ‰ªñÂº∑Ë±™„ÅÆ„É©„Ç¶„É≥„Ç∏„ÅÆ„É¨„Éô„É´„Å´ÊØî„Åπ„Å¶„Å®„Å¶„ÇÇ„Åò„ÇÉ„Å™„ÅÑ„Åå„Éì„Ç∏„Éç„Çπ„ÇØ„É©„ÇπÂêë„Åë„Å®„ÅØË®Ä„ÅÑ„Åå„Åü„ÅÑ„É¨„Éô„É´„Åß„ÅÇ„Çã

on december i booked and paid online for a roundtrip ticket for my mom outbound from hochiminh city vietnam to san diego ca on feb and return on may unfortunately for some personal reasons a few weeks later i had to call them for rescheduling our flights onto feb and april after at least hours waiting on the line an operator answered my phone and told me that i had to pay extra for rescheduling including changing fee and the rest for difference in fare i agreed with that cost because i know the ticket price was no longer the same logically the price must raise up day by day however i checked the current price of my mom flights on their website a few days ago i was shocked knowing that the price at that moment is only which is lower than my actual payment and even cheaper than our first booking pricethey really know how to disappointing their customers i booked months earlier and accepted the possibility that i may have to pay more for rescheduling because i didnt want to buy tickets when the price are already raise up however it turned out to be my silly decision that really doesnt make any sense to me jal has really brought me into the feeling that my family was tricked by the brand that we has been supporting for years

on th jan me and my brother were supposed to take flight from fukuoka am from singapore through transit at haneda am around considering we bought our ticket through jal main site we didnt think much of the transit time as we had done so multiple times in the past though this time we noticed there was staff waiting for us to gave us a monorail ticket to domestic terminal we managed to get out of immigration and luggage at am around which is min slower than my previous trip and would proceed to interchange counter to drop my bag usually however this time they want us to take monorail to domestic with our luggage we got to station at am and board the train on am we approached the reception counter at around and after some phone by the staff we were asked to push our checked in baggage through security to go on plane as cabin luggage however as we got to security our swiss army knife that usually accompany our checked in baggage were not allowed to go through and we were asked to abandon them which we are not willing due to the price of them and hence we do not board the am flight to add insult to injury we were told we could only be put on stand by without any promise of when or if we could get on to any plane we decided to find other way to get to fukuoka after another attempt at their ticketing office which result in no ticket so we wasted more money and lots of time on our first day to japan where jal effectively left us in lurch at haneda airport the final blow by jal was on rd day of the trip the same day im writing this where i went online to check my reservation and noticed it cannot be selected and my brother reservation just disappeared im with their jal mileage club which makes me think our tickets have been cancelled and effectively not only leaving us at lurch in haneda but also in japan with no ticket to get back to singapore there were of course no email about cancellation of our return ticket or any form of notifications at this moment we are stuck in japan with no ticket to get back given that all fukuoka seats were full that day my gut says its jal elaborated way to seat bump passengers for their more prestigious members unlike david dao incident if we were allowed to check in our baggage we would be on plane if swiss knife army an issue the staff could keep hold of them till we alight and we could board the plane im currently reaching our to jal on my rd day to check on my flight status before i escalate the situation accordingly my advice is avoid jal at all cost the slight edge of their company recently over ana due to ana silly baggage policy few years ago which they have since fixed had made them complacent avoid avoid avoid

in the second leg from saigon to tokyo to vancouver with jal excellent service with reasonable leg room food in second leg muncher better than first but the barbque wasnt working will certainly fly with them again by the way they ran out of ice cream on second leg of trip not thats bad

flight staff were extremely helpful and welcoming and all spoke english flight leaves early and arrives early with a long night for those who have trouble sleeping the two stages are of equal length unlike the alternatives through the middle east and south east asia which involve one particularly long leg we arrived refreshed and ready to start the day with no sign of jet lag unlike previous trips there is a long stopover in tokyo where you are required to collect your luggage and transfer by road between airports however when you arrive at haneda staff are ready to take your luggage straight away so you are not required to hang on to it till checkin opens haneda has a hotel adjacent to the departure lounge where you can have a meal and catch a few hours sleep after airline checkin this means you can sleep until minutes before departure we left sydney on the sunday a week before christmas and were very pleased to discover that the monday morning flight is not popular with travellers the plane was only about a quarter full particularly in economyevery set of four seats was occupied by just one person sleeping across all four how often do you see that on a flight to europe

it started hours late with no notifications and they have hours to call email or text then after getting in flight tokyo to bangkok with inches of snow sat on ground hours at which time they cancelled and made us wait hrs more to deplane with very lame excuses after that no customer service and thank sue from american for rebooking when we finally boarded new flight they were hours late loading cargo or whatever thats the short version ill spare you the other nasty smelly parts

during the recent tokyo heavy snow on january i was flying home on a jal flight jal loaded up our plane and then several hours later unloaded us at midnight with minimal explanation the captain was almost unintelligible and then washed their hands of us at narita airport once we were hustled back to the check in part of narita there were literally no jal staff there to offer and advice or assistance to the thousands of their customers who they had unceremoniously tossed off their planes the only help we received was the advice that there were no hotel rooms and a poorly worded piece of paper which gave a range of phone numbers for us to call none of which worked because they were closed for the night apart from sleeping on the floor of the airport which i get the bit i dont get why the next morning should have been bedlam and chaos the few jal staff who turned up after their refreshing nights sleep had no idea they were clueless about what we should do next they kept referring us to a reservations number which wouldnt answer it was a farce and everyone was openly laughing at the incredibly poor service that jal provided i am convinced that jal lost many many thousands of future customers that night i finally got through to that jal number almost hours later and was offered a flight back a week later via singapore i just laughed and asked whether it was an early april fools day joke by that stage i had given up on jal my experience with qantas was the complete opposite they were at pains to help and got us on a flight the next day home in short they were fantastic the complete opposite to jal still havent heard a peep from jaland if course never will it makes you wonder about the culture at jal that they literally abandoned their passengers at their home base for half a day without any help points to the fact that the airline and its leadership have severe problems the reason i am writing this is in the hope that someone from jal reads this and understands that their performance that night was completely unacceptable for my part i will never ever fly on jal again

its impossible to get through the phone with jal i have been on a call for more than an hour calling from north american line unbelievable if theres any issue on line its impossible to get through so tiring so exhausting kal picks up the phone at least within min this jal airline is terrible on customer service centre

i cannot say enough good things about japan airlines for the wonderful customer service i received on a december flight near the end of a hour layover in toyko my husbands name was called from the gate while he was away taking a walk when i grabbed all of our bags to run over to find out why i mistakenly left my brand new ipad on the chair black cover on a black chair i didnt see it while rushing i only realized it was missing right before the plane took off i told a flight attendant who was very kind and helpful throughout the flight to work on helping me find it i cannot thank her enough another airline person met me when i got off the plane to get my information and i soon received a follow up email and several after that to follow up we arranged for the item to be flown to ho chi minh city where i was able to pick it up a couple of weeks later again with the help of a very nice employee i hope we get to fly japan airlines again between that and providing my husband with a very nice glutenfree meal he has celiac disease it was an exceptional experience

fly singaporehanedachitosehanedanaritasingapore had to transfer at haneda before continuing to chitose on domestic flight clear signs were given had to clear immigration and claim baggage when at haneda onwards to chitose staff were courteous and attentive they will bow before flight commences will definitely consider fly on jal besides other flights

our family of adults and children flew premium economy from sydney to paris via tokyo excellent service by onboard crew great access to airport lounges limited movie options ordinary food but quite comfortable inconvenient transfer from sydney to paris via tokyo as overnight stay required and hour bus to change airports which we had to arrange ourselves our last flight from tokyo to sydney was cancelled due to the snowstorm on promised hotel and food vouchers when disembarking after hours on the plane instead all hotels were full understandably with flights cancelled left with a sleeping bag water and crackers to spend the night in narita airport i wasnt too concerned and was willing to put up with a sleepless night to avoid unsafe conditions i assumed we would fly out in the morning on the same plane it seemed logical atrocious communication and followup service nobody to speak to for hours we were told that our flight was cancelled obviously and wed have to call a number to book another flighton the public phone or use for those without international roaming hours of waiting no answer on the number given no ground staff to talk to we were fortunate that we booked through flight centre who were excellent and got us on a qantas economy flight days after our original flight which jal covered they wouldnt however cover our accommodation or other expenses we also had to get from narita to haneda another saga of train changes with kg of luggage due to more delays and cancellations others at the airport who booked online directly with jal were left with no assistance and hours of waiting without information or food i am unaware of how they managed after we left the queue of hundreds of people with no one attending the desks weather issues are an understandable force of nature being dropped by an airline like a dirty dish rag is disappointing and unacceptable this airline is excellent when all runs smoothly but terrible when things go wrong ill never fly with jal again

fantastic service staff amazing especially c who i fell in love with usually travel business class but had to sit with the riffraff this time lol however the experience in economy with jal wasnt too far off

if you want to enter the plane with all the flight crew courteously bowing to greet and welcome you on the flight take jal if you like bento meals take jal if you love love love green tea and kiwi juice take jal if your flight to be on time fly jal

i have take this particular flight a number of times if you can get to the airport early and take advantage of the sakura lounge flight left largely on time and after about mins drinks were served food was pretty good and plentiful drinks were served quickly the seat is a full flat bed which is most comfortable for this kind of over night flight i slept after dinner and woke up a couple of hours before landing when i go back to sfo i will most certainly be flying with jal

so i paid extra to upgrade from economy to premium economy because i have leg condition and cant really sit long and during the layover i was called upon and the flight attendant asked me if i can give up my seat and swap seats with a family with a baby and i said sure but i paid extra money to get this seat because i have leg issue is it possible to give me a bump up and the attendant looked at me very surprised and replied sorry not possible but if you want you can pay another extra money to upgrade to business class and that is another each person i was like seriously what kind of japanese logic is this i dont get it i ended up saying i will think about it and later i convinced my wife to give up the seats and take the swap with the other family but jal told me it has been taken care of so i dont have to okay i was shocked and embarrassed again by their sarcastic smile what the hell was it wowimpressed never jal again

the us airlines american and united in particular would do well to take a long hard look at jals approach to service and passenger wellbeing not just on the flight but before and after as well bottom line didnt want to leave the plane
great airline with a good business class layout from ny to tokyo go for the window seats good food helpful service

every jal flight for me is pleasant because of the courteous staff service is one of the best ive experienced this particular flight used a b and the seats were very comfortable inflight entertainment was beyond my expectation truly pleasant hour flight

we knew this flight was going to be long but what we didnt know was that it was also going to be uncomfortably warm for of the flight what i do not understand about these enormous planes is why you no longer get an air vent above your seat at one point i was fanning myself with the emergency card and the flight attendant came over and assured me that they had turned on the ac if they did it was off again within the hour the service was friendly the food was very mediocre in flight entertainment options were nice being on a hot sweaty plane for plus hours was awful

first and foremost nothing beats leavings from haneda rather than narita it is close to the city centre and is less busy when travelling international if you are flying to bkk this particular flight is excellent leaves at midnight and arrives during the early morning therefore you have the whole day to enjoy the aircraft was a b with new economy seats therefore you have a bigger entertainment screen and more leg room the only downside is the food its not very tasty hope this review helps

jal premium economy experience is excellent starting with access to jal lounge were you can quietly sit and enjoy food and drinks prior to flight staff advise when boarding commences so you can go directly from lounge to the plane premium economy seats and surrounding space is spacious and comfortable cabin service is friendly and efficient food and drinks plentiful would definitely recommend jal flight to tokyo

a simple error in name cannot be corrected after hours on the phone and delays it seems that i will have to cancel and book another ticket due to the delay it will undoubtedly be more expensive and they will charge me around cancellation fees most reputable airlines give you h to make corrections but not this airline they will screw you over while make things as inconvenient and vague as possible
good inflight service and entertainment flight meals were impressive loved the themed breakfast set it was too cute

my son won a free return ticket to japan and the whole family bought a ticket to travel together with him from penang we took mas and the arrangement was very good where our luggage were check in direct to narita even the airlines were different our flight to japan we smooth there was no delay in departure the stewards were very helpful and friendly we requested for muslim food and they complied child food also served for my years old and she also got a gift from jan our agent arranged for special upgrade to premium economy on our return flight the leg room was better extra accessoriesgoodies were given and we were boarded first before the economy class passenger all in all good travel experience
