this flight was operated by a boeing jaj with latest sky suite i business class cabin equipped we took off from hong kong international airport runway r at local time and arrived narita international airport runway r at local time i was sitting in seat a the bulkhead business class seat located in the first row of the second compartment no welcome drink was provided prior departure it was standard procedure in hkg nrt route lunch was served at around minutes after take off overall the service is just average it is definitely not up to par the flight was smooth however the cabin of boeing was relatively noisy when comparing with airbus a or boeing

caught plane from sydney going to japan hostesses were very friendly and helpful lots of leg room between seats good food it was hot and very tasty very attentive staff would definitely fly with japan airlines

we traveled on an aa ticket and were able to get window and aisle seats in row on a my son needs a lot of leg room so we were quite happy with the seats it was easy to get in and out of the aisle so we did not disturb the person sitting in the aisle seat the food was very good i did order vegan meals service was timely and friendly and the plane and restrooms were really clean we enjoyed the hour flight

absolutely first class from start to finish impeccably dressed professional smiling eye contact accomodating they open on time they show respect planes are clean food is good plenty of leg room all the screens work highly recommend

jal surpassed my expectations great seats with loads of legroom it almost felt like business class the seats are contained within their own pod so the person in front can recline as much as they want without any impact on your space food was good and staff were excellent new boeing aircraft completed an excellent experience premium economy also gets you access to the qantas lounge in sydney if there is a negative jal flies into narita which is much farther from tokyo and the queues in narita on our arrival lasted over an hour however i am guessing that this is not a regular occurrence jal is the best airline i have flown in a long time highly recommend japan airlines

jal started nonstart flights again between kona and narita one of few affordable options to fly into narita at a more convenient time noon departure with pm arrival wearing a boot for a heel fracture and flight attendants allowed me to move to a front row in the cabin section entire row was empty so had lots of room to spread out and stretch out my leg dinner food was good and a full meal

the adjustment of the light after taking off was very nice it put me into sleep sometimes it is difficult to sleep but it was easy with this considerate way of controlling the light in the aircraft their service is always nice

after a less than stellar jal flight from canada to narita we hoped for a better flight and got it overall the veggie meal this time was indeed vegetarian and tasty i was content with the meals quality and quantity in addition the crew were professional yet warm check in boarding and the flight itself were all flawless we arrived to bangkok without incident

first time on japan airlines and wasnt expecting much since i had a very difficult time getting a seat and checking in online they wouldnt allow it because it was part of an american airline booking thats their policy but i tried one more time the day of the flight and bingo i was suddenly allowed to check in and pick my seat that flight had together near the window so right away i was happy the seat seemed more comfortable than most economy and the food was excellent served with proper cutlery then the best part the toilets very clean and attractive and they had some gizmo that sprayed your private parts with warm water and i think it also dried it i made sure my husband went to use this awesome toilet i know they have them in japan but i didnt expect to see it in economy i would fly anywhere they would go unfortunately not that many places from where i live

from the take off to landing everything was very smooth i traveled with a puppy so i was hoping for a calm flight the puppy was well when she got to the airport food was very very good it is way better than air canada the most important part is i got haagen dazs ice cream for dessert the flight attendants were very welcoming and they even thanked us individually before the landing as long as its not too overpriced id consider flying jal for sure

we took this flight as a family of on the dreamliner fitted out with a shell neo product as far as i am concerned this is the best hard product for nonovernight flights the seats are comfy and spacious along with a wide screen for watching a pretty decent selection on the ife the thing that really sets jal apart is the service even though the cabin was full the staff were really attentive and made you feel valued the food was another high point am pretty sure this is as good as plane food gets

very friendly and helpful service i found both meals to be above average in quality and portion size than i feel is typical they also brought as all fresh washclothes beforehand the flight had been delayed due to a mechanical issue they replaced a gauge so we missed our connection in tokyo but they had booked us on a new flight and provided us with yen for food snacks upon disembarking the plane so it was a relatively painless inconvenience

my first leg from beijing to narita was a good experience and then on to honolulu was among my best flight experiences ever my second leg was a fivehour flight at night so i knew the crew would have some downtime as most passengers would be asleep during the twohour layover at narita i purchased a box of chocolates for the flight attendants to share and gave it to them when boarding they at first thought i wanted them to store the bag for me and i said no it was for them to share with each other now i often do this because i am usually traveling as a backpacker and i am not especially well dressed after weeksmonths on the road on this occasion it was jeans and a great wall tourist teeshirt foremost i like to do it because i know how hard they work and i want to express my gratitude for their efforts that it also removes me from the category of just another person in cattle class in their eyes is a nice bonus i am not sure if bringing a gift hit a japanese cultural button but the reaction was like nothing i had ever experienced before at different points of the flight each attendant stopped by my seat to personally thank me and chat a bit asking if i was a pilot or at least an airline employee i literally could not pay for a drink the champagne flowed all through the night even when i insisted i had not done it for any kind of reward and would like to pay after the second one their response to this was to give me a diecast b in jal livery and more champagne when you fly your three biggest tools are dont be a jerk show appreciation and empathy to the cabin crew express your gratitude before that moment at the door when deplaning
having flown jal several times their service is very good and the comfort levels ok they tend to have their cabin temperature quite high

one of the best parts of flying with jal are the flight attendants and their professional demeanor i was on a recent flight where some of the passengers were sick and they still kept their composure and smile they are excellent in working with children and infants to make sure they are comfortable and safe my only itch was with a flight attendant that took issues with one person standing up for a few seconds or two people heading to the restroom in what seemed like an emergency hopefully she had a glass of wine or two to decompress and calm her nerves the economy seats from sfo to haneda were the most comfortable but the economy seat that was assigned from narita to lax would have been tight on my knees had it been a middle or window seat i traveled with my much shorter spouse which made the trip a lot more bearable i highly recommend the premium economy seats if traveling from japan to the us since they often make offers to upgrade to premium economy at a reasonable price im not sure what happened to jals inflight dinning i made sure to eat a full meal before entering the plane on my way back to the states inflight dining was much better years ago when i flew jal what they served recently even my kids refused to eat they preferred lunch food than jal inflight dinning they couldnt stand the smell of the soup that they served the only thing that saved the day was the little cartons of haagendazs to make up for the terrible inflight meals i miss the days when flights to japan served bento box style japanese food and my kids actually ate the airplane food and never complained another negative about flying with jal is that if the flight is operated by japan airlines you wont be eligible for tsapre for that flight jal is not a tsa pre participating airline i didnt mind since my children were of the age that allowed us to go through metal detectors instead in the future we would have to book through a participating airline in spite of the negative jal offers some really good international flight deals if you want to fly with jal i do recommend premium economy seating and flying one stop to and from haneda if youre going to tokyo flying through sfo makes for much smoother traveling than flying multiple stops to lax from my experience flying with japan airlines really depends on how you customize your traveling experience it could be a star or star flying experience flying through jal was much better overall than delta or american airlines in my opinion however jal needs to work on their horrible inflight dinning selections and participate in tsa pre i would give my flight experience with jal a overall
easy checkin excellent flight attendants wide selection of free movies okay seats with good leg room very good meals very good flight to japan

i have flown jal many times for international flights and the stewardesses are topnotch with their service the service is always the best things about the japanese carriers food is always pretty good for airlines food the planes themselves are okay not wow their luggage policy is standard for international carriers decent selection of recent movie releases on the entertainment center they are codeshare with american airlines one can earn some points jal is the only airline that flies direct to san diego from japan nrt

it was a red eye flight from singapore to sapporo via tokyo haneda airport the crew of japanese stewardess were most helpful and polite in japanese tradition the flight from singapore to tokyo was shorter than normal probably due to strong tail wind and before we knew it we were awaken by the crew as the plane prepared to descend their food especially japanese menu is quite good for economy class though i would rate ana a shade better jal is still one of my preferred airlines

the jal premium economy seats are some of the most spacious available with plenty of space between seats although the recline is only slightly more than economy the seats have hard shells so you never bothered by the seat behind the staff and inflight services are very good and probably represents some of the best value in the oneworld network

im used to expecting perhaps wrongly that flying economy on an international flight will be a step above flying domestic economy this is the first time i have felt that this was not the case there were many substandard moments once we got on the plane service prior to boarding was quite good but i will highlight that the saag paneer that i was eating turned out not to be paneer at all but chicken ive ordered countless hindu meals in the past and theyve always been vegetarian but when i brought this to the attention to the head flight attendant she wasnt at all concerned when i asked about the next meal coming up she said mysteriously well talk then well there was no talk she simply gave me the next meal saying that she feared it also had meat in it when i tried to give it back to her she said i could eat the fruit and the zucchinitomato so i left a ten hour flight not only hungry but also will my digestive track acting up i had not eaten meat in about years and my system was reacting to it doing some research online it turns out that japan air offers a vegetarian hindu and a regular hindu but no such distinction was clear to us when we placed our special meals in general though i found the onboard service quite mediocre and will think twice about flying japan airlines again once this whole trip is over the woman who checked us in today onto another japan airlines flight was much more understanding i made an attempt to change todays meals whether she succeeds or not for us the important thing is she made an effort no such effort was made by the prior flight attendants they had a tired and removed attitude to their jobs on a positive note the inflight entertainment was varied and engaging

my wife and i have been traveling by japan airlines and certainly enjoy every flight for the excellent skill of the captain and his team landing is just like feather touch down very smooth catering service is a learning of japanese cooking art japanese and western meals are provided for choice however in order to get japanese meal it would be better to contact the airline hours in advance to reserve otherwise you may end up to eat the western food that is not very tasty in flight services are always top quality and attendants are always ready to serve the cabin is spotless clean including toilet that is maintained all the time the only problem is that english language needs improvement as very often it is hard to understand the announcement comfortable enjoyable and always like to travel with this top quality airline
the service was exceptional the attendants were very helpful and properly attired in very nice uniforms the food served was very good i would definitely fly this airline whenever i have the chance

we never actually took the flight contacting them prior to the flight at their request because their reservation booking codes had changed left us on hold for hours before we were disconnected another minutes and i managed to speak to someone on the day of the flight the flight was cancelled but the email did not come in until we were on the way to the airport when we arrived there there was a sign listing all the flights that were cancelled and to call their customer service department hours later i am still trying to get through for a world class airline the service is the worst i have ever experienced i have managed to book a flight through another airline and i am hoping to get a refund from jal their website is not user friendly and their telephone support is nonexistent
my first time take japan airline with my family we very happy with the service from ground staff to flight staff all very good service good job japan airline staff u the best

i dislike flying no matter what class this boarding of this flight was interesting in that premium economy passengers got on last this was so they didnt block the passageways of the economy passengers not a bad idea the flight was overnight breakfast had a japanese touch to it as you might expect there was a mug of rich broth with some pasta pickles fruit in separate little bowls a few people including me didnt eat the pasta it looked italian there was no sauce the plane was a boeing those aircraft are quite nice quieter than previous boeing i have flown in the business class seats looked unsatisfactory because they were all in little cells i was glad i wasnt in them if you were travelling with a partner it would have been difficult to converse i never use the in flight entertainment dont even turn it on i bring my own

the seats was spacious however the inflight entertainment was not so great movies was mainly in japanese which i think they should catered for foreigners as not all the flight are taken by japanese inflight meals wasnt that great too

as my first review flying jal from melbourne to tokyo jal do it again on our return leg back to australia jal really are a sensational airline to fly premium economy is really worth the extra cost it really is great food options again amazingly generous room great seating with full reclining option food service and even little things like the window tinting technology as opposed to the traditional shades as they say do yourself a favour

after a slight mess with ticketing once on the plane everything was very comfortable and smooth even in economy there was more legroom than the outward flight on the british airways flight to the uk the seating of is great if you are a couple traveling the plane is a newer plane and so very clean and you dont get the grubby feeling you experience on some older planes the food was actually very good the touch screen was of a good size and very responsive with a wide film selection service was excellent having gotten engaged over the winter period we mentioned it to the staff just during conversation on the plane towards the end of the flight two cabin attendants came over with a model plane and a signed postcard wishing us a happy future a small but very thoughtful touch all in all a very good flight and hours passed relatively quickly

this was actually two flights hawaii to tokyo hour stop then on to shanghai makes for a long trip but jal made it bearable the seats and service on both legs were good great quality food served by friendly and courteous staff the change in tokyo was efficient with a good lounge to wait it
food is exceptional and airplane is new with lots of feature to choose for tv music games and much more will definitely fly with jal again and again

what would you expect from a japanese company or airline in this case no nonsense standard of quality and consistent service thats exactly what they delivered boeing well maintained clean all in order good entertainment system and impeccable service food for inbound to tokyo was ok melbourne supplied but outbound from tokyo was impressive showcasing local chefs variety etc well done jal looking forward to another flight to tokyo hopefully haneda airport this time

great service friendly staff nice layflat bed on from tokyo to jkt we flew on the the seats also lie flat but i found the seats on the narrower compare to the which is interesting because they were able to put seats in the middle aisle in the yet the seats are wider the japanese food selection were too exotic for me half of the food on the plate i dont even know what they are business class lounge in lax was very nice breakfast was really good unfortunately the staff were not friendly at all at the lax lounge and they remove breakfast food before they put out lunch and the food selection for lunch was like dorm food overall it was a great experience flying with jal sakura lounge in tokyo was also very nice much nicer than lax lounge overall jal is rated up there with ana and eva air in terms of service food and seats

i was lured by business class fare that was about cheaper that its rivals you get what you pay for first off the from vancouver to tokyo did not have full flat bed only old fashioned pod type recliners to make matters worse they ran out of salmon dinner both ways and the only other option was unpalatable for me wine selection was modest they lay over was long hrs but the flight gets in at about pm in japan therefore not much time to go to tokyo and enjoy the city may be an ok flight if you were traveling to vancouver to tokyo and dont mid the seats good option from tokyo to delhi with full flat beds overall not worth it if you are traveling to india

we were taking a day cruise departing from singapore on we booked a flight from lax to nrt with a connection to singapore while at lax the captain announced that the flight would be delayed by an hour in order to facilitate a cargo transfer unfortunately they were unable to make up the loss time during the flight so towards the end of the flight a stewardess came to my wife and i and informed us that they were going to hold our connecting flight to singapore flt so that we need not worry when we disembarked in tokyo we observed a display board with the names of approximately a dozen passengers of which our names was amongst them a very polite young female jal employee handed us an envelope she didnt speak fluent english but she was able to communicate to us that there were boarding passes and bus vouchers inside the envelope she further explained that we would need to claim our bags and catch a bus for haneda airport by using our cellphone we found that there was another flight leaving from nrt to singapore in less than hours she then informed us that this flight was already filled we then attempted to explain that the delay of our flight was not the result of a mechanical or weather issue and that it was actually caused by a decision of the airline to wait for delayed cargo it had now been hours since we left las vegas and we were quite exhausted were we now expected to retrieve our bags go thru customs somehow locate where to trade the vouchers for bus tickets then find the correct bus stop wait in line for the bus to load our luggage and wait for the bus to make other stops before arriving at the haneda international terminal we explained to the young lady that we were very tired and that we held executive platinum status with one world and that we were currently traveling in business class we pleaded could you please arrange for a taxi or airport limo to make things easier for us apologetically she said there was nothing she could do to help us at this point we insisted to speak with a manager when the manager arrived he was very polite professional and spoke excellent english he also informed us that he was unable to arrange for private transportation to the haneda airport but that he would personally escort us thru baggage claim and would obtain the bus tickets and show us where to catch the bus this was a huge help and we truly appreciated his efforts just out of curiosity i asked him if we had been flying st class instead of business would they have arranged for private transportation he replied im sorry to say no this is actually very good to know my wife makes several st class trips per year to asia as does her employees there are always going to be occasional issues when taking long trips this fact is entirely unavoidable however it all comes down to how well the issues are handled frankly we believe this situation could have been handled far better than it was it just seems to me that its counterproductive and ultimately selfdefeating for jal to treat their vip travelers in this manner jal made the decision to wait for a late cargo transfer which caused us to miss our connection jal also made the decision not to pay the it would of cost to minimize our inconvenience which was also their fault on the way back we flew on cathay pacific i found their business class to be superior to jal the cathays seats are larger because the rows are as opposed to jal which were cathay also has a significantly larger library of movies and tv shows however the inflight service on both airlines was truly outstanding

this was a hr morning flight from singapore to tokyo narita the business section of the aircraft is in the form of configuration is good for easy access and privacy the crew serviced lunch pretty early before am singapore time before dimming the light for passengers who would like to sleep surprisingly slippers disposable were provided for a relatively short day flight light snacks were provided about an hour or so before landing the seats were clean could be flattened completely to sleep the entertaining choices including some japanese and asian movies were adequate overall this was a solid business flight passengers flying business on this flight should note that the jal lounge was not opened before the flight and they have to use a commercially contracted lounge where the coffee was good but not the food

japan airlines knows how to make their customers feel valued the plane was new and spotlessly clean everything worked the seats had the the little hygienic paper things on the headrest the pillows were decent and had cloth covers there was more leg room than we have experienced on american flights the flight attendants were well groomed and most respectful and accommodating real cloth towels were provided before meals i did not find the food palatable but that doesnt mean it was bad i just dont have a taste for japanese food jal compares more favorably than aa

this flight had the nice sky suite seats i was quite relived when i saw them i was somewhat expecting the old angled seats this was a boeing the service and the seat was great but the food was pretty disappointing i ordered the japanese menu i guess that was a bad idea to order the japanese menu on a flight originating from bangkok i barely ate anything

i had a whirlwind threeweek trip to seoul then to jeju island then to busan back to seoul gimpo overnight then from gimpo to haneda haneda back to gimpo then incheon back to honolulu lots of flights lots of time spent in airport lounges i have to say that the business class experience on the japan airlines flight from seoul gimpo to tokyo haneda was amazing excellent service and the food was completely edible which is not something you can say for most flights nowadays even in first class seats i have to add that i think there was only two classes of service on this flightbusiness first and economy my seat was g

the level of service with jal is unmatched the attendants come around to get to know you and then address you for the remainder of the fight with respect and kindness the overall flight was comfortable and without issue food was excellent and they give eastern and western options depending on your preference overall excellent flight and service
i tried the japanese lunch meal which was lovely each of the wines was served properly and care even the luggage came off by class which is a welcome change a pleasure to fly

had a chance to try japan airlines fleet last month a codesharing system with malaysia airlines and it was fantastic starting from great lounge to the food and punctuality i couldnt ask for more loved the seats too seems bigger than air asia or mas moml were okay and ife seems to have a lot of latest movies too its a good hrs flying and cant wait to be board again next time
lots of overhead space but i think that also is because few japanese travelers bring carry on food was delicious very impressed
lots of overhead space agents extremely helpful english speaking made sure my connections tofrom a usa carrier went smoothly unlike usa agent

love the plane its cozy what i found thats lacking is that the ammenities are not enough i have a sensitive skin but they dont provide any moisturizer but overall the food is great and the staff are wonderfull

stars for convenience it is nice to be able to leave from san diego without having to go thru lax service is good with helpful and gentle staff members enjoyed the cultural bow to passengers by the staff when arriving to the gate in japan seats not as comfortable or spacious as emirates but better than others good entertainment choices and movies thru the flight have to pay for wifi my party of was interested in upgrading to business class but recent upgrades to their computer systems only gave us a choice to do so at the airport upon checking in their systems were down so it took some time to find out how much more for the upgrade once price was obtained and we were going to proceed with the upgrade we were told if we did there would not be any food for us k per person and no food the staff said they didnt have any extra available for the upgraded seats we stayed in economy and food was just ok so i suggest for you to bring snacks or food for the long flight rice crackers and chocolate offered as snacks japanese beer wine and drinks made up for it but we were starving by the time we arrived at our destination on our way back we were better prepared so we loaded up on snacks and food overall convenience a plus service a plus but food just ok
seat is excellent because spacious leg room free wifi throughout the flight free beverages courteous flight attendants

flight was fully booked so it took a bit long to board inflight entertainment was really great one of the best i had ever experienced cabin crew was attentive and quick in responding to passengers main meal however was a bit awful to me particularly the icecream more ice than cream more than hours on sky and only meal was served i think it should be

from check in on halloween complete with costumed agents to lounge availability for premium economy the experience was wonderful we had booked the flight in february and sometime between them and the end of september my traveling companion and seating had changed and we were no longer sitting together on a two leg flight to bangkok when boarding was about to begin our names were called by the gate agent long story short the agent replaced our premium economy tickets with business class ones we were close to tears and so grateful to have the fourteen hour leg of our flights upgraded our return flights werent upgraded but premium economy was a very good experience too
have experienced almost no delays recently food and wines are the best amongst competing airline services between the uk and japan
they are on time customer service is amazing and foods are good also the price was quite reasonable after the bankruptcy they really improved the quality of the service

flew jfknrtcgk in march and i was very pleased with the whole experience excellent service from check in to onboard service tasty food flights were full but planes had ample legroom more than the average you see in economy class local staff at cgk were not good i am afraid the japanese lady there though was exceptional and went out of her way to accommodate and rebook me would recommend them and of course i would fly them again

wasnt sure what to expect when flying to japan with jal for the first time especially with kids however it was a sensation we upgraded to premium economy and i would highly recommend outlaying the extra we got to access in melbourne to the relaxing private lounge jal premium economy give you heaps of leg room generous seating great quality blankets and pillows heaps of food a little toy for the kids and excellent service we had a little complication with our seating and they handled and resolved it superbly for someone like me thats not a great flyer it would have to be the best experience ive had in the air thank you jal

we travel a lot and usually fly united or american so we can get membership points our last international flight on united left us with a bad taste as our seats were even smaller and narrower than ever before and the friendly skies didnt seem as friendly as they used to be so when we compared flights to jakarta we found that jal had a direct flight and was comparable in price and we decided to try them what a breath of fresh air to fly jal the attendants were amazing they were friendly and very helpful they even put an improvised vegetarian meal together for us after they found out that we had not eaten anything because we had not ordered a veg meal on time not only that but during the flight they got in touch with jal ground crew and were able to get us a vegetarian meal for our next leg of the flight that is real service the food is so much better than the stuff that the other airlines offer and instead of plastic utensils they use real flatware another thing that makes jal stand out from the two american airlines they keep the toilets clean in flight when we are on an international flight on the other airlines by the time we are half way to our destination the restroom is filthy and smells like an outhouse in contrast jals restrooms are maintained by the flight crew so they are clean throughout the flight we were were very impressed that even in economy we were treated with respect and like human beings thank you jal and your wonderful flight crew

one of the best airlines i have traveled on i travel quite often to japan and have taken japan airlines before and the food varies depending on whether you get a japanese meal or a western meal i actually never like their japanese meals so much the standard of japan airlines is high and the service they provide is excellent good entertainment system and they dont just service ice cream they serve haagen dazs check in and departure were very easy as i am very familiar with jakarta airport in fact check in was exceptional as the service was so nice

travelled overnight on both legs of the singaporetokyo trip breakfast was unappetising with the main hot dish consisting of only a soggy omelette egg and a sausage on the return flight and some cold side dish one of the criticial issues i encountered was that they changed my preferred seats twice and did not notify via email about the change even though the website stated that they will inform passengers of any change on one of the changes which was due to a change in aircraft from a to a they even separated passengers that had chosen to seat next to each other something which must have been done alogrithmically by backroom staff which showed they lacked service consideration in mind another seat change was made by the airline about weeks before the flight without warning and they rearranged our seating again this time supposedly due to a new reservation system which they were rolling out between november and december had to constantly login to their website to frequently check that our reservation and seats were in order other than that the actual flight was uneventful

if you can spring for it prem econ is definitely the way to go first you get to use the lounge services which helps you with relaxing a little especially before a longhaul flight the sakura lounge in nrt is definitely better than the one in hnd the one in nrt has showers massage chairs and even a masseuse food is also pretty good at the lounges seats inflight dont go all the way down but at least it props up the dangling ankles incline is good too not bad for those with back problems food is also good service is always excellent they even celebrated my birthday enroute thank you hk crew was upgraded to business otw back nothing like attentive service and free flowing of food and drinks the flat seat for sleeping definitely helps

we have been using jal for our trips to japan and we always get premium economy it makes such huge difference for us with the comfort of seats and other benefits that comes with it the seats are wider softer and it comes with some goodies like slippers toothbrush eye mask and several other items the food and drink options are also better and i do think we get treated better than in regular economy well the food is not excellent but it is airplane food they can do but so much from my experience i prefer their food much better than food served on other nonjapanese airlines like united or american one of the greatest benefit for us is the access to airport lounge i call them the oasis at the airports and it is such a nice way relax and enjoy some complimentary food and drinks while we wait for our flight one negative thing is that their website and mobile app are not user friendly it takes so much time and effort to check in compared to any other airlines that i flew with the app only comes in japanese language and it really is completely useless if you are not using it from japan if you dont reside in japan i with if they can change their website and app design so that it is easier for us travelers to process online check in trips to japan is a long flight and with more comfortable seats we can rest better even thought the seats does not become a flat bed like in business or first class it is still comfortable enough to get some sleep and rest i would continue for fly with jal in premium economy for sure read my full review of their food and drink offerings on my food blog foodlovergirl

first time travellers on jal travelled business class for sydney to narita airport japan this is not quite in the same league as emirates or singapore airlines however the cost is less and value for money is better the service is first class and the food is choice of traditional japanese or western style the seats do lie flat but if you a big person this is not for you the movie listing is somewhat limited but is updated at the beginning of each calender month overall we were happy with jal and would definitely use them again

we flew jl an overnight flight from narita to sydney the trip was very pleasant we went premium economy were able to sleep with the extra space the checkin process was very organised hasslefree the staff members were very professional friendly the plane was clean the service was excellent the food our last piece of japan was very good for airline food the plane was delayed leaving narita due to the knockon effect of bad weather in other parts of the country it was friday night we were kept up to date with our place on the runway via announcements the plane made up some time on the trip with the help of a tailwind although we arrived only minutes late after landing the captain made an announcement that they were humbly sorry for the delay of minutes i love japan they are so respectful considerate i would definitely fly jal again
the cushion seat was hard though it has better leg room no option to choose for meal unlike sq flight taking night flight departing at hrs without toiletries provided such as socks and toothbrush

i chose to fly jal from sydney to narita as it was the most direct quickest route i had considered jetstar thro cairns although when i investigated it was more expensive with addons less leg room service etc etc just too hard i had flown jal many years ago at that time it was nothing out of the ordinary in the days when qantas was exceptional the process to book was extremely difficult as it was during the period of the jal major it upgrade i ended up using a rd party for the st time probably last to book the tkts having said that i did phone jal to sort out our seats after the agent had us sitting apart in different rows then gave me the jal ph number after waiting mins the person i spoke to was extremely helpful sorted our seats was very polite patient the plane was clean wellmaintained good leg room good food good inflight entertainment great service we usually fly sia have done so since qantas went downhill however i will look at jal compare for our next trip as i would fly with them again

the trip was a delight the cabin staff were very attentive and respectful the seat was like a lounge at home but better the food was different but enjoyable the boarding and disembarkation was not rushed and the ground staff were also attentive to our needs it was a daytime flight but we had time to relax and sleep before our arrival which made the premium economy seat worth the extra money

the level of service offered was excellent the seat pitch and width offered in economy was great which is important for me as i am cm and the food is the best ive had on any airline i will be my consider option next time im going to asia or eurpoe

leading the way in service flight departures and just great service it was jal who informed us that we arrive tokyo airport and depart from another otherwise we would have lost our way service on board was excellent with such beautiful stewardesses cleanliness is also worth mentioning of course legroom with the seat ahead of you is forward is ok but when back

although jals online services are difficult to navigate and often unreliable in terms of booking your ticket seat selection and checkin the flight attendants onboard are sure to impress although the lack of leg room is typical of most flight today the food is plentiful and tasty my overall impression was greatly improved after having the pleasure of being served by a most gracious and attentive onboard staff i will certainly consider jal again but hope they catchup with much needed changes to online services

i fly to asia several times a year this time i was offered a round trip on jal for the first time in years jal used to be over the top in amenities before the realities of competition forced them to rethink their business model this flight was efficiency itself from boarding to inflight services i flew business class and the design was was different than i have experienced before on my flight you had what might be called an individual cubical where you could raise or lower a divider between yourself and the next seat over this would be nice if you were traveling with a significant other or a colleague the food was good as was the service a nice feature is that you can order from a set menu throughout the flight the seats fold out flat and i arrived more rested than usual one thing i like is that jal is accommodating on stopping over in japan as part of your flight plan something that can be difficult with other airlines in my experience an added bonus is that japan has to have among the worlds best organized airports getting through immigration and into town is made simple and if you get mixed up there are people to get you to the right service i mean it is really quite pleasant for a change if you have dietary needs let them know well in advance

my wife is aa platinum and it was impossible to get seat assignment prior to airport check in on line it was impossible to do it we called jal and was told we could check in online at midnight tokyo time surprise it was not possible we will see what they assign us when we get to the airport tomorrow so much for oneworld stay tuned we will update later

the cabin and seat in the jal is in my opinion better than the business class cabin and seat of ba the service is excellent a great choice of meals and the entertainment system is also superior jal offers a anytime to the seat service for meals that can be ordered using the on board electronic tablet slippers are provided to use on the flight all in all i really enjoyed this flight with jal

this is written more in sorrow than in anger i was not the traveler my son loved the flight the flight attendants and everything about it it is his nd time on jal this year i however am the unfortunate one who made the reservation the earlier trip this year making the reservation was quick and easy nice helpful people but about november th they instituted a new reservation system let me say i did it all on the phone and perhaps the system works better on line but it was a nightmare the usual wait time on the phone was close to an hour they wouldnt book the flight till they sent me a form to fill out and made sure my credit card was accepted and you didnt even know if you had a ticket or not for the departure from bangkok we never did get a printed confirmation and there was a problem with which day the flight left in all my many many years of airplane travel i have never encountered anything like it conclusion great flight but not worth the trouble to make the reservation

highly recommended smooth and quick checkin punctual very small delay must use the word punctual except for the absolute perfectionist good service overall except that the wifi on board doesnt work at least for me the provision of bag covers from the white box in the foreground in photo albeit not useful for me is a demonstration of jals attitude service improvement is a neverending pursuit

thought i could survive economy class on the short hop from tokyo to shanghai and i did with emphasis on the word survive the seats are small and legroom extremely limited the plane was packed solid i had a middle of the plane aisle seat and needed every relaxation tool available to avoid claustrophobia the food was forgettable but the seat did have personalized entertainment with both japanese and english language programming crew did their best but i got the feeling that there were not enough lids to cover all of the pots

if you want to feel like a god in the sky this flight is for you even my shoes got their own charriot as expected flying first comes with royal class treatment this flight has attention to details not just the wide size of seat and but ability to stretch out was very roomy flight came with a five course meal and kitchen was open anytime up till minutes before landing its top of the line treatment and best way to fly long international flights see pictures highly recommend it

that we could move to london via narita flying japan airlines it was only by accident that we came across jal as an option when we were looking to fly another airline to try and use our points and after arguing with other this other airline over something that shouldve been simple we decided to keep searching thanks for the push having seen that it was a reasonable price for of us to be able to fly business class via narita we thought we might give it a whirl admittedly we were moving overseas and the selling point apart from the other good reviews was the offer of a luggage allowance of x kilo suitcases each figuring that all of our belongings could squeeze in to kgs we took the plunge and booked it i have to say we made the right decision whilst the lounge at mel was a little boring we still had access to the qantas lounge so parked ourselves there for a short while the lounge in nrt on the other hand was amazing and we took advantage of it whilst we waited for our next and final flight different airline unfortunately on boarding the flight we were greeted by the staff and took our seats moments later we picked our breakfast choice and were given the option of a polite prod to wake us up gently when it was being served i wish id taken photos of the food because presentation was excellent the service was great and they have the only lie flat seat that i know of that i could stretch out on and im almost the only thing i thought missing was a high armrest but it wasnt really needed all of our very heavy suitcases arrived in perfect condition we dont think that they were dropped or thrown either because there werent any evident scuffs or bumps so id say they care there too all in all we thoroughly enjoyed the flight and cant wait to fly them again
flying with jal was the most comfortable hospitable and feeling home with the service they provide i love this airline and will definitely fky them again on my next trip to asia

the only downsize was the high temperature on the flight we didnt even use the blanket it was too much on paristokyo but ok for the return otherwise the food is really good and the legroom is better than other company i would have liked to see some japanese drama but no subtitles no roblem with the movies and a good choice

i went to tokyo for short business trip at end ocober we go to japan total people we bought the ticket return we go there for visiting tokyo motor show its a nice journey with jal leg room is spacious the food and beverages are very delicious and the staff is very nice and helpfull really enjoy and hopely can fly again with jal

the entire experience with jal and their staff was fantastic friendly attentive and the dreamliner was an amazing plane to fly on no shortage of entertainment and economy felt roomy not sure if thats the staggered seating the dreamliner has but at the end of the flight we got off the plane and felt fine

first time travelling international with a very hyperactive year old boy checkin was fast make sure that you do the web checkin and print your boarding pass or have it readily in your smartphone or tablet plane itself is okay enough leg room for us we are midsize filipinos food is great for both my husband and i but not so for our year old tip for those who have very picky toddlers bring your own food like for us we bought popeyes and brought it with us in the plane totally worth the carryon then the same thing from manila to the usjollibee entertainment was awesome lots of new movies the only thing that i can suggest is maybe more english speakers for the flight attendants other than that overall we enjoyed flying with jal and will fly again with them

we always fly jal when we can equally avoiding us legacy carriers on international flights when we can the biggest reason the sakura lounge at nrt which has the best curry and dumplings anywhere effectively a preflight dinner fit for royalty delicious and fabulous and what do they serve at aas nrt lounge peanuts thats right peanuts

fast efficient check in at the counters from manila to narita then from narita to new chitose and vice versa competent very cordial staff comfortable seats and im in economy great flight attendants and good food

thee attendants were very polite always smiling and very efficient even when we went through severe turbulence their demeanour meant that all of the passengers were calm and nobody seemed to be panicked they also looked after my friend who has ms very well escorting him to the toilet and back to his seat with no fuss also better legroom than ba flights on matching aircraft the food was also great
a businessclass in the normal range not espescially good but neither bad friendly service nothing special at all

i have flown many times with jal i have never been disappointed from checkin to arrival and through baggage claim the staff are attentive helpful and courteous i have been in economy premium economy and business class the staff are always the same no matter which class i traveled there were many little extras such as the provision of toiletries eye masks ear plugs etc the toilet areas are cleaned regularly there is a choice of either japanese or western food all beautifully presented and delicious there is added comfort in the seating with the provision of a pillow and blanket for economy and premium economy business class has semi private pod with fully reclining seat and large pillow and blanket loose fitting jacket and trousers for sleeping are available it also has a larger tv screen when traveling business or first class the qantas lounge was available in sydney and jal lounge in tokyo

one arrival to nrt went to business class check in counter the counter was not busy and plenty of counter available i tried to go the counter directly but stopped a female ground crew she seemed to be checking the air ticket of a pair customers she just told me to line up in an unfriendly manner when i return to line up at the back then i saw a man spoke with another male crew in japanese without any checking procedure and directly went to check in then i told the male crew about my destination and flying class he allowed me to go the check in counter i felt frustrated and disappointed about the airline for unequal treatment for customers it seems that jal to become a star airline should consider the issue generally all other crews were polite and professional the flight was operated by boeing the jal sky suite was contemporary spacious stateoftheart controller and a large tv mon the entertainment program with plenty of international selections the food and beverage was good as well thought they did not served in separate courses you can be selected wide variety of beverage including choices of sake all fa were polite and professional

most comfortable return flight we have experienced from europe access to air france lounge and showers at cdg and similar access at narita to jal lounge the clincher was that all sectors were in boeing dreamliners excellent pressurisation meant you arrived almost feeling refreshed only minor gripe was that movies were well past use by date will certainly fly with jal again

jal recently introduced new type of economy class seats i wasnt aware that jl was equipped with the new seats i was prepared to endure hours flight i am cm tall as soon as i took a seat i realised a difference i could cross my legs comfortably this new seats worth extra cost if you are taking long haul also foods are good as always punctuality is second to none
the crew members were really helpful as we was travelling with young children got opportunity to board first it was so relaxing our kids enjoyed on board service a they got choose the orders
direct flight very comfortable service good entertainment good food enjoyable i would recommend if looking for direct flight to japan

jal now has a flight from tokyo to san diego using a dreamliner this flight often has rewards miles seats available the service on jal is one of the best in the world they constantly clean the lavatories the food is good snacks and drinks are always available and the legroom in economy is almost as good as business class on other airlines
great flight and great airline the space between my row and the front one was very big very nice entertainment food and cabin crew

i am impressed with the ground check in service of jal the service personnel stands behind their counter and they would come out all the way to your queue point to usher your as their guest the lady is very polite and organized by reaffirming with you number of luggages and other checked in items they would opened up more counters if there is long queue all in all we are being served within ten to fifteen minutes the security and immigration check point was also seamless
they were very helpful with wheelchair assistance when changing airlines in tokyo to their codeshare partner american airlines in general it was a good experience
top notch services and comfortable seats the best flight attendants ever on the thousand of flight i have flown

we are frequent travellers all over the world and found japan airlines which we flew for the first time very comfortable very good service and especially the food japan airlines has invited finalists of the red chefs competition to develop good cuisine for the economy class and some dishes by two of those we could enjoy on this flight flight food does mostly not taste too much but this was delicious the time schedule was well kept
cas omotenashi was so good but dishes were not so good the equipment in the airplane was nice the flight time was punctual i felt good totally
easy flight but prebook some accommodation for arrival as this flight arrives when the melbourne domestic terminal is closed

as always jal offers me feeling as if i was in my home full of smile in cabin and felt warm hospitability all the time i took jals code share flight operated by american it was not so happy for example meal servisse was something as if they feed for animals

what a great experience the service was fantastic and it started from the check in desk all the way to the lounge in tokyo for the connecting flight the midnight departure from melbourne means a good sleep on the plane and waking up on approach to tokyo hopefully the food was fantastic both japanese and western menus i was so impressed i joined the frequent flyer program i will fly with them again for sure there is something about the japanese service just first class no matter where you are sitting the dreamliner was great the plane was clean and the seats were fantastic in premium economy well worth the extra cost as it also includes lounge access

excellent services from checking in boarding at gate and enjoying a pleasant flight the sakura lounge is also great it offers a wide variety of food pastry and beverages alcohol and nonalcohol im impressed the flight itself is good cabin crew are very friendly courteous helpful and really pay attention to passengers requests the seat is private and comfortable though i wish it could be a real degree reclining seat but thats ok it has a decent amount of leg room inflight entertainment is worth also mentioning they are superbly categorised and well organised you cant get bored while flying the headphones are decent with noise cancelling alternative the cabin is on par with typical japanese standards super clean and well maintained the food on this flight is awesome given the late night departure i love the way the airline communicate with passengers about the meal options cabin crew would ask you to choose your breakfast japanese or western style or you could write it down in a form they provided if you follow this option they would politely wake you up when its time and serve you the meal of your choice to sum it up im impressed by services provided by japan airlines i have few things to complain about whats not to love

the thing i liked most about jal is the extra space you get in economy wider seats and more legroom than any other economy seat i have been on the crew were so very friendly and attentive and were still smiling at the end of a hour flight the plane was modern and spotless clean great range of movies and entertainment on a large touch screen only thing i was not keen on was the food but that was probably just a personal taste thing totally recommend jal

hadnt flown jal for many years so it was interesting to reacquaint myself with this airline it was also our first flight on the boeing dreamliner that jal had in service for a number of years we werent quite sure about economy class but neednt have worried as there was plenty of leg room and even though we were against a bulkhead we could recline comfortably the service was very good and the food i thought the best i had been served in economy in quite some time overall a very good and comfortable experience i would recommend to anyone

the us flights from and to narita have been to a high standard until the latest flight from san diego to narita they have reverted to a lower cost amenities pack and reduced significantly the food quality in businessthis is clearly driven by cost reduction but they missed the real opportunity to streamline their boarding and checkin with contract rather than jal staff a total of ten is excessive to board an aircraft and only one flight a daybusiness class should be lucrative but cutting costs will turn people away

it is a nice trip from yamagata to nagoya and vice versa i could enjoy the trip and the beautiful scenery viewed through the window of the airplane cabin attendants behavior is also comfortable for me the crews technical average is in high standard and well acceptable you could choose this airlines with safety and relaxation
as expected japanese always have high standard of service it is very comfortable and food are great

the economy seats were excellent value for the money the difference between economy and premium is not worth the extra money leg room was ample entertainment good the food vegetarian absolutely terrible but you cant have everything the service was very good and we left and arrived on time in both directions the route is provided by a boeing which is quiet and comfortable the experience was so good we have booked to go again in april with jal
excellent flight on time as you can expect from the japanese efficient and friendly service would love to travel more with jal to japan from kl but they dont have direct flight unfortunately

i was on board flight jl last november it was a good flight the seat i was in was comfy enough the entertainment was upto date and recent movies were in the selection the food and the service was totally good

the seats were very comfortable with more than enough leg room the stewardesses always greet you with a smile while attending to your needs pleasantly surprised by the service and the comfort these are the two things that stands out for me will try to fly jal if i fly to japan again

was offered the chance to upgrade the sydneynarita leg of the outbound trip for well worth the expense the premium economy seats are like business class seats of a few years ago and are extremely comfortable enhanced ife leather sound noise cancelling headphones and more food choices made the leg excellent for just under hours the extra expense was worth it
it was a short flight as short as minutes but flight attendants are always helpful and nice to us
the service was very nice however the business class space is not for the big tall guy others were very nice the lavatory is super clean no funny smell at all
great airline with great service good seating good food good service and i have had return flights and always consistent

japan airlines is one of the best airlines in terms of services crew were polite and very approachable seats were comfortable and have good legroom space food was also good for brunch and much more for dinner the red u which were collaborated with young chef finalists inflight movies were up to date too we had smooth flight and jal is ontime

i usually fly business class any time the flight is over hours and so i was a bit disappointed that the convention provide me with premium economy and was i surprised the seats were comfortable and came with a foot rest the food was quite nice and the service excellent

while i havent flown japan airlines in years the flight times for a meeting in tokyo offered the opportunity to fly with jal for a late nighttime early morning am flight the service was remarkable the incredibly polite staff made certain everyone felt comfortable i was impressed with the service both on and off the plane i would highly recommend jal and plan to use again for another meeting next year

the seats were comfortable and floor space was generous seats only beside window the service was extremely friendly however the flight attendant did not speak english either flight as my seat was last row the back of seat could not recline on return to sydney i noted a passengers seat moved forward and back automatically reclined bathrooms very clean my veganvegetarian food option fine i would fly jal again but fly economy as i noted they had very generous leg room and the functionality of the seats was the same as premium economy i flew october just over a year ago

seat configuration with decent seats with good recline comfortable for a hour flight with a snooze good media programmes and decent sized screen very good headphones reasonable food same a starter economy with excellent service on time

i used to have a feeling that the service at jal is square and rather cold while it is true that they are sufficiently polite however the group of cas this time was suitably casual and i could enjoy my flight back to tokyo in a cozy atmosphere the ageexperience mix of the staff was also appropriate i saw

first time flying with japan airline my husband and i can feel beautiful japanese culture we chose roundtrip business class flight bangkok kansai airport after checkingin at suvarnabhumi airport we got a premium lane to go thrugh security checked and immigration formality we had visited miracle lounge and sakura lounge there were lots of foods and drinks staffs were helpful and polite i think its a japanese standard that i heard before the really touching japanese culture it was happened after boarding cabin crews were very polite nice smily and excellent service i tried japanese alcoholic drinking i didnt remember the name and japanese breakfast thats great im very impressive the boeing dreamliner business class seat was angleflat seat so sometimes i slided down for sakura lounge at kansai airport it had relaxing quiet zone but less choices of food no toilets in lounge area we had to use toilets in gate area instead i think it was under renovated

having flown premium economy with a number of airlines i would have to say that the jal flights have in all respects been the best to date priority check in use of the business class lounge service and comefort were excellent rather than those tilt back seats the aircrafts seats moved forward and back within its ridgid shell an excellent feature the whole experience was fairly close to the old style business class i just booked my next long haul flight with them

recently flew with jal on a business trip to japan the service the airline offers is really high quality good food selection between japanese or western meals flight attendants are very quick to respond to your requirements be it a drink or snack
nice and great flying with jal seat distance not so close legroom food combination nice and flight attendants helpful

we received an upgrade on the flight to tokyo which was a great surprise the service was very very good the return flight was premium economy not as good as business class of course but still pretty darn good first time flying with jal no complaints at all

this is my first time flying with jal and it is a great experince the service is very good they are very friendly and helpful the food is good but we just have one choice of meal i will fly again with jal someday

since filing for bankruptcy and recovering i think this airline has done a great job of improving customer satisfaction by providing the firstrate service their crew is excellent friendly and efficient their flights are mostly on time i do hope they keep up their effort even after the memories of hard times fade
it was a night flight staff was attentive and kept walking the aisle to check on the passengers food was japanese and ok for me

we enjoyed our trip and felt no stress over the travel around eight hours from honolulu to narita we got the rest in cozy jal rounge and enjoyed japanese foods and beer when got in the cabin leg space was wide enough where we enjoyed the video entertainments and good sleep for eight hours flight

i used miles to upgrade to business class because i had two long haul flights from san francisco to bangkok while the seating area was roomy it did not compare to other business class flights the food was good but trying to sleep was a chore the seat wasnt comfortable and i couldnt get in a proper position even though the seat reclined my initial flight from san francisco was much better but also lacking especially the airline lounge i flew korean air on the return and it was a much nicer event

on my way back from a trip of south east asia i flew back from tokyo to dallas in coach i chose to fly on japan airlines instead of aa both have a non stop flights on that route picked japan because of two reasons they fly a instead of a the other reason was my expectations of a much better food experience i was terribly disappointed by the food and the whole meal service neither the asian food selection or the western food offered were desirable at allthis also applied to the beverages offered i did not eat anything they offered i ate anything over the hour flight except what i had in my backpack this reminded me the lack of any food on the us domestic airlines if it was not for the airplane i would have give jl an even lower rating very disappointed

the staff at checkin was very friendly the staff was almost ready to let passengers to board the airplane the announcement came out that the flight was delayed due to air control at shanghai pudong airport very quickly staff arranged food voucher for passengers to buy food from designated shops restaurants for lunch after hours delay the flight was okay nothing special i fell asleep as soon as i sat in my seat when i woke up i saw a note in front of me explaining food has been served and they did not want to disturb me this was appreciated comparing with some other airlines maybe because it is economy class i felt the choice of entertainment especially tv drama series are limited

it was my first time flying jal i heard good things about jal and was expecting the high quality service my expectations were met the crew and staff were very courteous and helpful i had to transfer in tokyo and i mentioned that to a staff at the counter in nyc when i landed in tokyo an airport staff was waiting for me to help me with the transfer i had to go through customs get my luggage and then reregister for a domestic flightall within hour the food was nice and seats comfortable i saw the crew leaving notes for passengers who were sleeping during the food service in case they want to eat later a practice apparently common for jal and ana but something ive never seen on any other airlines in us britain spain france considering that flight from ny is hours the comfort of seats and service were very important overall recommend
the service on japan airline makes you feel so warm and comfortable that in the future i would like to use jal as often as possible

we travel to indonesia for a couple of months every year we started with jal several years ago they are terrific right up there with cathay and singapore airlines the flight time from boston to tokyothe first segment is hours they use s which are terrific air planes they comfortable from front to back way more leg room in coach then any other airline we have flown emirates united singapore cathay american southwest garuda indonesia lion air from tokyo to jakarta is about hoursthe food great along with the service by the cabin crew and their attention to detail and to peoples needs they are and have been consistently less money wise than the other comparable carriers from several hundred to sometimes near a thousand less we have booked them them the last three trip to indonesia all very good and on time they are worth a look
excellent in flight services departure n arrival on time checkin counter very efficient seat was very comfortable

admittedly we used american airlines points for this trip and are we ever glad we did we got first class domestic seats and jal business layflat seats internationally no first class on jal flights so we got to use jals excellent hospitality lounges in dallas tokyo osaka our departure airport and los angeles best onboard service ive experience in years of airline travel very gracious flight attendants tvs and unlimited japanese cuisine during the flight ordered online from our seats everything was on time with gracious presentation on the ground and in the air the only way to travel i highly recommend using jal whenever you can and especially the layflat seatsbeds

just returned from bkk flying jal both the outbound flights were a jfktokyo and a tokyo to bkk the was older and showed wear however i had a window sky suite seat which was very private with the divider up and the was much newer without the privacy but still lay flat seats it is the service on jal that was impeccable both flights were on time with boarding done in an orderly fashion and included bowing from the gate agents as we entered the jetway the politeness and eye contact of every employee was impressive the prepared meals were good although a bit too sophisticated for my tastes with a salmon salad and amuse bouche but the quality of the steak and flavor of the sauces was superior there was also an anytime menu with a few options the seats are comfortable and the inflight entertainment system had plenty of options the lavatories while small contained mouthwash and toothbrushtoothpaste get them while they last all business class passengers receive an amenity kit which was adequate but not stellar slippers and wireless headphones apparently there were mattresses that could be placed on seats to make them feel like beds in the overhead bins however i was not aware of them until my return flight all in all this is a great product and what distinguishes it is the service and attentiveness of the staff the price of the ticket was lower than the carriers i priced cathay qatar and i liked the connection through tokyo how many times have you seen ground staff line up and bow toward the aircraft during pushback

just a nice airline who keeps their aircraft spotless typically polite japanese crew wonderful legroom food good and even entertainment screens even at the airport they couldnt do enough to help what a shame about comparing them to qantas which we flew from singapore to perth in there was nothing to compare the first half to the second qantas suggest you send some of your board members and crew to experience a legacy airline who does it right you dont need to squeeze folk into your seats you dont need to throw a cardboard box at your paying customers i didnt even experience that on us airlines truly an australian tradition food in takeaway containers well done jal ill fly you again happily
non stop service on boeing very comfortable even when flying economy absolutely the best way to fly from san diego to narita

jal not a bad experience except its warm on the flight why dont they shoot in some outside air or whatever it is they do to cool the interior not the first flight with them so its not an outlier prior flights were warm also i guess its better than having to wrap up head to toe butso to get some fresh air midway through the flight i went to the bathroom and at least the vent in there is blowing out some air also the flight crew station area seemed to provide a little relief i guess the one good thing was we flew way up passed midway which was pretty cool to see also flew right by mt fuji as close as one can get i guess that was a pretty awesome sight to see check in at hnl a little long but thats almost everywhere other than that it was ok just cool the jets

this was one of the smoothest and most comfortable flights i flew between japan and chicago my flight from chubu international airport to narita was cancelled in the morning luckily i was at the airport before am for my am jal flight to narita the ground staff switched me to an ana flight and i could board jl for chicago right on time the flight attendants were all very nice and attentive they have class elegance and good manners as well as respect for their passengers who keep them employed i enjoyed both the dinner and breakfast which was gyudon made by yoshinoya the gyudon was quite a surprise and it tasted really good in the cabin where the air is circulated and very dry a cabin attendance came to my seat and she apologized about the cancellation of my flight from chubu to narita earlier that day she said she wanted to make sure that everything else went fine with my transfer at narita it was very nice of her to do that i enjoyed watching a few movies and listening to music on board overall i enjoyed flying with japan airlines again

both on the ground and in the air jal service was excellent check in both on the la side and the osaka side was brief and efficient i was not able to check on line for the return part of the trip due to computer software conversion in the us the check in at kix went very smoothly the staff were uniformly friendly and helpful the lounge access at lax was also very good the seat is not quite as tony as the dreamliner but was comfortable both sitting and flat the quality of food available both western and japanese was very good for an airline coming back on there was a special wine the just released beaujolais nouveau i very much like the dimming mechanism of the windows

this was my first time flying in probably about years im glad i picked jal to fly with the flight attendants were all very pleasant and helpful and the flight itself was comfortable for such a long flight the legroom was far better than i had hoped for and the food was always good jal feeds you often too which i wasnt expecting so for anyone contemplating flying with them know youll be in good hands

this was our first international flight experience with jal and was based on the best business class fare for the period that my wife and i were going to japan on business and pleasure it turned out to be one of best business class international flight experiences in the past years flight was on time seating was very comfortable and folded flat for sleeping attendants were great and food and drink service was excellent we returned on jal with the same results will definitively strongly consider them for our next flight to asia

the flight is nonstop from narita to san diego service is quite good food given that it is on a airplane is quite good food service in addition to regular meals is available most of the flight seats almost but not quite fully recline i recognize this is not the cheapest way to fly but for petes sake why cant american airlines figure out that some people will pay for more than being shoved into an aluminium tube like sausage into a casing us airlines feature only the lowest common denominator of service jal still does it right

we used this airline for our trip to and from vietnam we flew on american airlines until we changed planes in dallasfort worth it was all arranged thru japan airlines japan airlines treated us as first class passengers their flights were always on time every employee was very polite we really appreciated the free toothbrushes and warm towelettes we will always use this airline whenever we can

service was exceptional from checkin boarding and during the long flight the meals western or japanese were good and food and drink was available during the entire flight we were disappointed that the business class seats had absolutely no more privacy than the economy section there was no separation between seats or the rest of the cabin the seats didnt recline flat and made it more difficult to sleep the recliner position caused me to constantly slide forward as the seat material was slick the headphones provided were not noisecancelling or provided very little as it was difficult to clearly hear movie entertainment also cabin announcements could not be understood at all due to the engine noise in hindsight we should have saved a lot of money and flown economy

flew japan airline from chicago to tokyo and osaka to los angeles november and th we were very impressed by the fight captain s skill that made flights very smooth the crew were very courteous and helpful especially the flight from chicago to tokyo the meal were very good making note of the passengers who slept through the meal and making sure bring food later when they wake up definitely will fly the air line again in near future

great flight awesome service flight attendants are very attentive to the passengers needs i have flown other airlines and none have been as good as jal airlines i would highly recommend this airline to anyone traveling to narita japan

the best thing about jal is the service first of all unlike a lot of other airlines they really take the spirit of honoring oneworld status i have status on american check in was easy and we were able to get our seats changed to sit together the flight was comfortable with decent food never expect great food in economy on any airline and a lot of good entertainment options in terms of a movie selection what really set these guys apart was on the way back i didnt realize that i needed an eta electronic travel authorization to fly back into canada its a form that you fill out that normally gets approved within hours note non us passport holders now need this while flying to canada the staff at jal went into a helpful overdrive showing me how to get to the website and apply and then bringing chairs etc for us to wait while it got approved and the supervisor came in and called some special number that airlines have to contact canadian immigration to accelerate the approval this is the most polite and helpful ground staff and flight staff i have ever seen across any airline definitely added them as an option for me anytime i fly to asia heads and shoulders above the service you get on any domestic north american airline
