japan airlines takes care of its passengers from check in to landing in the chaotic lax with many rude airport staff japan airlines made sure the check in process in quick painless organized due to their own staff organizing the process in kix we are able to check in our luggage several hours before flight time and spend the rest of the time further exploring and shopping in the airport the food is much better than other airlines and their flight attendants are much more professional

we flew from fukuoka airport to yakushima island for our week hiking trip the counter staff was very nice and helpful in checking us in the exceptional thing was only after we landed in yakushima collected our luggage did we find a nice note clipped to our luggage tag see picture attached exceptional experience with a nice warm and friendly touch
our second business class flight with this airline and they do an excellent job if we are flying overseas we do not take any us airlines as their service has been deplorable in comparison
superb service extremely polite staffgood food by far the level of service was the finest we have ever experienced

japan airlines flight from bangkok to tokyo on their dreamliner was one of the best economy flights i have ever been on everyone on board truly took care of you with such grace and kindness the plane was beautiful and comfortable and the food was very good i loved the teriyaki burger for breakfast very yummy i was definitely taken care of on this route thanks
the seating was very comfortable the service was great and the selection of entertainment was good

japan airlines is the best they cater to your every need the food is excellent and abundant the only thing was the seat on this flight it reclined to a flat position while it tilted down so much you would slide down the seat very uncomfortable i just put my seat up and curled and a slept upright

jal have a partnership with delta airlines and i booked on this airline since they booked my luggage all the way to austin however food and comfort level did not come up to expectations menu had limited choice of warm food

i actually loved the experience of flying this was my first experience with jal and it was comfortable and enjoyable the crew was as expected excellent and attentive the airplane was new clean and comfortable the kind with electronic shading of windowsimportant on a hour flight video equipment was easy to use and informative particularly the flight information and mapping food was fine and extra snacks were available and abundant legroom was fine for the class of seat if i go to japan again this was my th trip i will definitely seek out jal availability
as expected service was outstanding very courteous professional flight attendants always catering to every need of its passengers comfortable seats good inflight meal very clean cabin
jal is obviously one of the best airline on the world the service is totally satisfied both in check in and boarding and they always took care each of passengers best flight ive had

we were excited about our flight to japan with jal as we recall the wonderful experience some years ago best service food meals and snacks refreshmentsjust the whole experience what a disappointment when we were served tv dinner like meals both flights going and returning home both meals were western type meals the first being a tomato based pork dish served with rice veggie salad yogurt etc it was not appetizing red and white wines were good beer and sake too but not like how i remembered with a refreshment service cart being strolled down the aisle return trip meal was a hamburger wegg rice etc i took a tiny bite of the hamburgeryahk salad was just lettuce with tiny slivers of bell peppers yogurt was warm but i enjoyed the sweet roll after dinner snack was good cupcake with nuts water in a nice pouch

wow very comfortable product the window seat is the best option with jal business class sky suites i sat in a it was at the back of business class with windows i used the premium economy bathroom for convenience it was clean and just a little smaller than business but only feet away the only caveat about a window seat is that if you are a larger person the little alley to get to your seat is quite narrow that is the only negative i have to say about this airline product the service was impeccable the food delicious the seatbed was wide long and comfortable the tv huge the partition screen moved up completely and provided me total privacy jal has the superior product across the pacific in business class
they are really nice and amazing hospitality they really want you to feel as comfortable as possible best flight ive had
short flight from seoul icn to tokyo nrt the staffs were nice and polite the plane has good legs room there was inflight complimentary food and drinks

my wife and i took the domestic flight from osaka itami airport to tokyo haneda airport we booked and paid a few months in advance to get cheaper air fares it was cheaper and faster to fly than to catch the train the flight was full which meant that plenty of other passengers thought the same

flying business class across the pacific ocean is a big deal to myself as it doesnt happen often i had booked my flight from lax to osaka with business class and unfortunately i had done all my research assuming that jal had the same kind of seat in their lax to osaka run as lax to tokyo sky suites definitely not the case which had me somewhat wishing i had just booked lax to tokyo the shell flat neo seats do not lay flat they are at a downward angle so you slowly slide out of your seat and it just feels odd the shell flat neo seats are also not as comfortable as the sky suites on lots of other jal flights you also will not have as much privacy with shell flat neo seats as they are much more open i had a middle seat which in this case unless you know the person next to you is better than a window seat simply because if the person is sleeping or relaxing in the aisle seat and you have the window and you cannot get out of your seat without asking them to situp or reposition their bed every time you wish to use the restroom or move a bit not great still far better than coach of course but not a great choice by jal to put these in one other note about comfort and i had read this before about jal flights the cabin is kept extremely warm for westerners so be ready as for the service and food the service was great i will not say excellent because my travel companion and i many times felt like we were a bit overlooked vs japanese passengers likely just because of our lack of speaking japanese so they tended to get more service but extremely friendly service and helpful whenever they could be finally the food as i skipped most of the japanese meals since i do not love eel and other delicacies was not bad as i choose a western meal in this case steak the steak on the way to osaka was wonderful but that is about all i cared for if you are a foodie that likes fancy food then this menu is for you if you are more simple in your taste well best of luck given that i went on other jal flights after this all business class if its a choice i would go lax to nrt just to get the more comfortable seats and privacy

one the best experience in flight even though it was economy class the flight crew never stop treating the passenger any less i have no words to describe my experience best customer service ever in flight both way to and from i was one happy customer and when i fly to japan next time chances i would choose jal over any other airline

today my husband and i flew back to vancouver by japan airlines during the eight hour flight they served us two meals dinner and breakfast the dinner was designed by six red seal chefs and showed something creative and different we completed the full meal the breakfast was a japanese gyuudon meat and rice package by a famous chain restaurant yoshinoya i brought it home to share this comic like meal with our kid better than the good food service was the attentiveness of a flight attendant my husband by mistake left his i pad under his seat the professional and friendly ms inoue brought it to us personally while we were picking up our checkedin luggage i was awed by her service way beyond her duty it would not have happened if we had flown with any other airlines i possibly flew with airlines in the past but japan airlines service quality is incomparable

the whole flying experience with jal was great the staff were friendly courtious the planes were well kept clean tidy the meals were of a good quality best of all check in at narita was as soon as we arrived at the airport early off a cruise we didnt have to wait the desk was manned and our luggage was processed straight away

japan airlines is the one of nicely customer service by its ground and flight crews the flight crew is very good to its passengers unlike other us and european based airline the japanese culture is ingrained into its daily routine which is extended to all passengers food is also very good

i was flying on monday and returning thursday this week when checking in i handed my oneworld card and i was upgraded without asking the whole travel experience began when a young man meet me before i checked in and ended when i arrived back in shanghai this is service quality at its very best

travelled in their b back to sin flight was delayed for mins due to busy runaway at narita gate was located at the other end of the terminal hence a min walk after passing immigration meals were beautifully presented especially the potato salad of the adult meal leg room was good the best in y class younger daughter was given a child gift air con of this flight sector was warm i was given a ice pack to cool myself after the cabin crew saw me fanning myself in the midst of the flight cabin crew unable to regulate the temperature of the flight senior cabin crew walked through cabin and thanked all for choosing jal towards the end of the flight
from the check in to boarding was well arranged and timed the gate staff was very courteous and accommodating the cabin was clean and crew attended to all our needs

this was a charter jal flight to bangkok and tokyo but we stopped for passengers in cairo jeddah kuwait to refuel and karachi took forever and since we were on a low cost tour excursion we couldnt say much this was quite awhile ago while i was stationed on crete we actually started in chania the night before jal is a great airline with friendly and efficient staff and crew

from boarding to arrival it was excellent the service was always with a smile the cabin crew were very nice and polite the food was a little bit disappointing but ok great flat bed seats and entertainment system see you soon hopefully

travelled from itm to nrt in their b this pm unable to upgrade to their j class as flight was full many international passengers today foc wifi available mins after departure air vents and inflight map were available in this one hr flight one round of drinks were made toilets were clean legroom was good recline was minimal a comfortable flight compared to budget airlines in asia
always excellent service dedicated to the comfort of the passenger the lounge in tokyo is also excellent with food drinks computer stations etc at the passengers beck and call

we were on cheap tickets at the back of a crowded flight not usually my favorite spot however as a tall man i appreciate leg room and seat width jal had both the attendants were a mix of thai and japanese were attentive and courteous it was a night flight so food was minimal still it left on time and arrived okthat was the main thing

little did i know that i was being upgraded on the dreamliner from narita to jakarta japan airlines has to be one of asias best from the aircraft to the flight attendants this was a great experience the customer service level is really really good it was an hour flight after a hour flight from dfw so having a comfortable seat on the final leg of the trip was great i will certainly look to fly jal again soon
very nice airlines great food nice staff smooth boarding it was a short flight and everything went well

first experience in traveling in e on jl cabin crew made one round of drinks in this one hr flight cabin crew did not enforce to open window shades for this sector many window shades were closed due to sunny weather y class seats were comfortable

jal step up their service and the quality of the food service on the tokyo san diego rioute which is more competitive than some others such as the flights to australia the aircraft was a spotless boeing and the service as expected from jal the flight was over quite late departing with no explanation which was a negative

japan airlines has recently introduced a direct flight from melbourne to tokyo which is positive in most regards as it avoids the stop over in sydney it is a smart move as it will bring japanese tourists to melbourne but the issue is the timing of the flight from melbourne it leaves at am which is not a good time it also arrives into melbourne late in the evening also inconvenient the flight was a boeing and comfortable and the service is whay you expect on jal food service at night was zero as everyone slept

we started our vacation from jfk and flew to tokyo after three hour of layover we flew to singapore service was excellent seats were comfortable air hostesses were very pleasant courteous and helpful all this made the long journey not so tiresome i highly recommend this airline

unable to check in bags all the way to itm we managed to cut q as its the peak time at nrt airport at pm check in at the domestic counter at the arrival hall was a breeze jal managed to check in all bags and the upgrades within mins only one small shop selling food stuff newspapers near to the gate charging points available j class seats were extremely comfortable ptv and charging points were available at each seats cabin crew made one round of drinks in the one hr flight it wa worth the yen upgrade

travelled in their refurbished y class in their bit was capacity seat was comfortable with best seat pitch in y class ptv with usb ports were available in each seat seat had several pockets to hold small items electrical ports were available for every seats meals were served hrs into the flight with icecream metal cutlery provided light meal was provided hrs before arrival flight arrived mins after scheduled arrival time due to heavy traffic at changi airport it was the best y class i have travelled no wonder jal is one of the best y class in the world just wondering why jal is not a star airline like cx sq

jal is the best airline that i have flown with recently the staff are freindly and helpful with a very pleasant manner the aircraft has the best economy seats with plenty of leg room even if the person in the front reclines their seat it does not impact on you if you have the chance to fly jal take it

boeing business class accommodations excellent spacious comfortable with incredible toilets service friendly and attentive food selections seemed repetitive and a bit tired more humdrum than spectacular when i want a special meal though its not inside an airplane

flew their red eye flight on b as part of my connecting flight from toronto to hong kong boarding was on time and we were bused to the aircraft and used air stair to board the flight even though the aircraft had old style interior it was immaculately clean and well maintained leg room was pretty decent and i had the whole row to myself for this relatively long flight cabin crews were all pretty friendly and polite they served one hot meal and some snacks along the way landed in hong kong about minutes ahead of the schedule all in all you just cant seem to go wrong with all japanese carriers they are top notch in terms of safety comfort and quality of cabin crews

premium economy is an excellent value on japan air lines prior to the flight i was provided access to the sakura lounge at narita a large and comfortable waiting area with massage chairs and showers available prior to flight there are some light snacks and a meals available on the upper level as well a good start to a long day i had a bulkhead seat which offered spacious legroom search for this option on seatguru when booking while the seats do not lie flat there is a decent enough recline with footrest that will enable you to get some need shuteye the is the way to go on long haul flights with better air quality and dimming windows i ordered a kosher meal for the flight which was ok but there are snacks soft drinks and tea available throughout the flight bathrooms were clean and service was generally very good the only weaknesses were the inflight entertianment and wifi the inflight entertainment is a little thin on interesting material in english better to download and bring your own wifi service is spotty on the flight over it did not work north of the arctic circle overall excellent service and a very comfortable plane the price difference between premium economy and business class is significant but you are mostly paying for the lie flat seats this makes premium economy and good value

i am very disappointed that jal offers such generous baggage allowance of kgs but insists on a size limit for skis i have cross country skis which ways kgs for two pairs but jal charges each way for oversized bags jetstar is horrible to fly with as you feel like a stingy mongrel and here is now no price benefit with flying with them as jal and qantas are now as cheap but offering a full service jal are shooting themselves in the foot by not aggregating the total size as they do with weight i was told it would cost us each way for my skis i can buy a pair for that very excellent otherwise but this is a stupid policy and will put many skiers off using jal this will put many australian skiers off travelling to japan to ski on their air line

flew from shanghai to narita then again from haneda to shanghai days apart in october the first trip from pvg to nrt was pretty good used the lounge in shanghai which was ok but nothing special and shared with other airlines service onboard was good and seat was ok for the two hour flight good entertainment the flight back from haneda to shanghai was much better starting with the lounge in haneda which was amazing great food and drink selections and nice views of the planes out of the window the seat on board was much bigger than on the way out and the service was great food onboard was good and great inflight entertainment

lie flat seats are the way to go we used to fly coach when we were younger then the time before this we went premium economy the lie flat seats are infinitely better we had a connecting flight from haneda to okinawa the next morning so took a limo bus to haneda and stayed at an airport hotel i thought iid be more restful to break the trip into two segments with an overnight in tokyo it ended up being too much hassle from now on well take a same day flight to okinawa the lie flat seats made the intercontinental segment quite restful and stress free

first time with jal and delighted at check in we were escorted to the desk instead of being beckoned which was nice touch the flight was great and the service was exceptional i would go as far as to say this was the best service ever experienced on a flight i have a bony backside so never really comfortable for long haul
it was a pleasure flying japan airlines with friendly service and good food and clean airline they helped me with mobility assistance and were so nice

everyone was all smile and friendly enjoyed the bento set and haagen dazs ice cream after the main meal i asked for whiskey and the portion was generous and came with an additional cup of water plenty of leg space very comfy seat big and clear screen will book jal again when i next visit japan
the sakura lounge in tokyo was fabulous we spent hours there and had draft sapporbeer and food the flight was on time service was nice food was goodseats could be betterpetty uncomfortable
hour flight very nice experience a lot leg space amazing staff definitely will travel with jal again loved it

i took the am flight from tokyo haneda airport to bangkok and found the schedule to be very efficient and effective the flight departs late at night and arrives very early in the morning lessening the risk of delays due to airport congestion also by arriving so early in bangkok traffic time into the city is substantially reduced i normally allot to hour to get from the airport to my bangkok city hotel in the silom area but was told by the hotel car driver that before am in the morning travel time from airport to hotel is only hour since there is little traffic the flight is also well designed for sleep onboard the seats are older shell flat angledflat seats without direct aisle access for window seats but as i had booked the first row aisle seat my seatmate in the window seat could easily step over my seat even if it is in the bed position as there is plenty of room between the seat and the bulkhead in front the plane used is an older b with a seat configuration in business class so if you are in the middle seat in the center section access would be more of an issue as the flight departs past midnight meal service is breakfast hr min before landing rather than shortly after takeoff on boarding each business class customer is asked to fill in a form indicating whether he or she wanted to be woken up for breakfast and whether the western or japanese breakfast is chosen as a result lights are kept dimmed from takeoff until about hours before arrival i and most other passengers in business class immediately switched to bed position after takeoff as soon as the seatbelt sign was turned off and managed a bit over hours of sleep on a less than hour flight also because it is such a late departure pretty much everyone on board goes to sleep after takeoff so it is quiet in the cabin and there is little to disturb your sleep the western breakfast served prior to landing was impressively full in offering there was a duck salad and a mushroom omelette really good bun andcroissant fruit and greek yoghourt as always jal services its special brand of coffee in business class which is among the best coffees i have had on a plane my only criticism is that the coffee is not available for purchase and only served in flight on landing getting through customs and immigration was very quick as there were not many other flights arriving that early in the morning so the usual long lines at thai immigration was nonexistent and luggage delivery was quick from landing to getting into the car arranged through my hotel to arriving at my bangkok hotel it took only about an hour which is incredibly quick for bangkok overall this flight is a good choice for an efficient arrival and to get full use of your first day in bangkok on arrival prior to departure i used the haneda jal first class lounge as i have oneworld emerald status the lounge is truly superb lots of room in the lounge outlets at all seats good view of the planes docked at the gates and a great dining area with plentiful food options there was even a cook to order section where a chef made grilled special japanese cut of beef with either a japanese sauce of a truffle sauce there were two soup offering including a lobster bisque a western hot food offering of multimushroom pasta two kinds of dim sum japanese udon and curry and a selection of bite size cold appetizers including foie gras on toast i arrived very early on a connecting flight that had landed in narita airport and took the limousine bus between the two airports arriving more than hours before my flight the lounge actually is very quiet until about or pm when it suddenly fills up as haneda airport has a number of longhaul international flights that depart late at night for an early arrival at their destinations

jal continues to use an angle flat bed seat in business class on its b dreamliner flights from vancouver to tokyo in a configuration with the window seats not having direct access to the aisle normally this is not a problem as i always select the aisle seat next to the window seat and the typical jal business class customer is a japanese man who is not very large and can get in and out of the window seat by stepping over the aisle seat without too much problems this flight though i had a caucasian larger gentleman in the window seat next to me and he was not familiar with the jal seat configuration he had to ask the flight attendants to help and to wake me to fully convert my seat to upright before he could access his window seat as he was not used to the step over concept and as he was probably not too coordinated having consumed at least or whiskeys within the first couple of hours of the flight this need to convert my seat from bed to seat position each time he had to exit or return to his seat made sleep difficult so really given this is an overnight longhaul flight it is time for jal to upgrade this route to a plane featuring one of its more recent business class seats with a horizontal flat bed and direct aisle access from each seat difficulties with my neighbour aside the flight was fine and featured jals trademark superb service the flight attendants were most polite in asking me to adjust my seat to accommodate the ingress and egress of my seatmate were constantly cleaning the toilet after each use by a customer and even paid attention to really small details like always turning the water glass each time they brought me water so that the jal logo on the glass exactly faced the customer i had the japanese meal for both the lunch and the prior to arrival snack and both were very good featuring numerous little small bites with interesting seasonal flavours one relative weak point is the entertainment system which has a much smaller selection of movies than for example cathay pacific has on its vancouver to hk route also many of the nonwestern movies from japan korea hong kong india etc were only available in their native language and then maybe japanese so that an english only speaker actually cannot take advantage of much of the movie and tv programs lists the plane is new and the service is superb but the angled flat bed and lack of direct aisle access from each seat makes this business class offering a bit behind the times for an overnight flight where undisturbed and good quality sleep is a prime measure of success

booked my flight with japan airlines seats actually have room on the hour flight from melbourne i never felt like i was crammed into my seat cabin crew was real friendly and the price of the ticket was reasonably priced will fly this airline again

flew from heathrow told at the airport i had not checked in online even though i had confirmed seats online and had also been advised i had checked in after a very frustrating time trying to fathom the worst website i have ever come across we had a flight from london to helsinki via ba then joined jal who immediately informed us they had changed our seats premium economy too i was astounded and complained but was not fully understood i did not want to cause a scene as the flight attendants looked suitably embarrassed and did not really appear to know what i was going on about i have checked in again for the home journey and i will not be changing my seat again be warned jal i am so angry about the situation but know that complaining will i imagine fall on deaf non understanding ears

we went from the usa to the philippines round trip with japan air the flight itself was a good price and the movie selection and food were decent the seats werent the most comfortable but they were also fairly decent and the flight attendants were friendly what really bothered us is the mobile checkin we had hours in lax before our flight so we tried checking in online to get our seats reserved the mobile site would not allow it so we decided to wait at the gate until an attendant arrived so we could check in hour before the flight started boarding the attendant arrived and when we checked in they put us on opposite ends of the plane it was our honeymoon so we were not pleased to spend hours apart for the start to our vacation luckily the airline was able to make some changes and put us together moments before the airline began boarding which we greatly appreciated at the end of our vacation we didnt want this happening again so hours before our flight we attempted the mobile check in again this time it let me put my information into the check in services but could not locate my name or reservation number highly displeased that we are having so many issues with our checkin with this airline hope it gets resolved

jal overnight to australia served wagyu beef sirloin which was absolutely the best airline meal ive ever enjoyed appetiser of salmon gravlax was also exceptional great to see that some airlines still do value business class travellers and arent cutting costs to the bone instead focusing on higher quality and good service lieflat beds were good for the age f the plane hard to beat the a lieflat experience on other airlines and the entertainment package was very good i will certainly fly jal again after this experience

i flew sydnrt return recently on jal and was utterly amazed at the level of service provided by all staff the sydney ground staff were outstanding they were genuinely lovely people who ensured that i felt special from check in to boarding on board the cabin crew seemed so much more attentive and professional than any other cabin crew i have ever seen they just paid so much attention to detail the aircraft a b on both flights was new clean and extremely comfortable the meals were delicious and they provided a selection of western and japanese choices i have flown a lot over the years and on many airlines but jal was without any doubt the best i have ever experienced i have never recommended any airline on social media before but i had never flown jal before either

i have flow the sydney vancouver route on japan airlines a few times i find their business class fares competitive and their service is great but there are some caveats and that probably explains the competitive pricing on the vancouver narita route jal flies the b dreamliner business class is a layout theres no staggering on the window side so it presents access issues for anyone on the window seat you need to jump over your neighbor to go to the washroom aside from the layout the other big letdown is the angled flat bed seriously what was jal thinking why put angled flat bed they have a much better sky suite version which flies on the narita sydney route among others the service is very good organized punctual always with a smile menu is limited for business class pretty much a choice of japanese or western food wine selection is okay this flight is a decent one for a daytime journey but not ideal for a nighttime flight

i booked tickets for my sister inlaw niece and nephew for oct departure through pricelinecom from manila to portland or they arrived early at the airport to checkin and when they were being checkedin they found out my nephew was missing a document an ecc document emigration clearance certification by all means this is our fault in our part and we dont blame the airline whats so ever this caused a delay on their flight i called jal customer service directly the man that i talked to didnt sound friendly all but i told him the situation i am in he reviewed my confirmation and told me that he couldnt help me out because i bought my ticket through a third partylike a person that doesnt want to deal with you kind a way i called pricelinecom a person by the name tris was such a great help i told her the situation and exchanged information to jal represented i wanted to rebook the tickets but jal was asking tris advice just to purchase new tickets i asked how much to cancel the tickets according to jal its pertickets for noshow they dont have proof that it was a noshow i told that my sister inlaw nephewniece did show and were on time which and we have proof i was supposed to be charged pertickets because they did show during departure but just couldnt leaves due to documentation the conversation wasnt getting nowhere i was already late to work i told tris to just cancel all reservations and i cant deal with this airline any longer jal charged me with a refund of this was my first and will be my last to book for jal according to their fares rules and restriction penalties fare rules text unless otherwise specified note rule ps in iprg applies general rules text fromto philippines cancellations before departure charge usd for cancelrefund note in case of no show cancellation charge usd applies

the friendliness of staff is exceptional the seats are super comfortable and very private good food with a choice of western and traditional japanese cuisine on board entertainment could have been better the choice of movies was limited a business lounge at narita airport was absolutely fantastic offering an excellent refreshment facilities a free min back massage as well as super modern and effective massage chairs to use at any time heaven after a long flight

great airline the service was beyond great long story but it was a codeshare for work so i switched from aa to jal i was having some luggage issues and was getting help from aa of course so i went to jal and asked and they said aa should do that and i explained how that went she took me to the customer service area from the ticket counter it was unbelievable how awesome she was i was also trying to upgrade by cash to business class without going deep into it she found my bag and said i can go in through security once i was at the gate waiting on boarding she came into the waiting area with my bag to confirm it was the right one i was amazed i said yes and she walked me down the concourse to the plane and said i will personally put it on the plane i was like great and she apologized since she was unable to upgrade me due to aa rules of course on code share i said oh well we tried after i boarded she came to my seat and said how is it i said if i knew it was going to be roomy and nice like this i wouldnt have worried about the upgrade haha she smiled and said thank you and thank you for flying with us truly first class service even in couch

i flew in the last days of sep gate at helsinki airport is in a lower ground farfar away and with no facilitieshad to walk upstairs to a jumbo and that was no fun a bus takes you to the helsinki airport on arrival plane to tokyo was late for hrno information given for a long timeconnecting flight to melbourne had less and less time remaining plane was circulating over tokyo several times i think people should know what is going on particularly now no gate numbers given with min left to boarding timeit was a run the info board only in japanese runningno knowing the gate number we made it with others only to wait min again on the plane that was never explained the closest area to boarding does not have coffee shopand not having time does not allow you to have a look for one not good time between long flights are essential for a walkmealrelaxation and coffee for menot to be stressed and underinformed

service is great the size of the economy seat is normal food is pretty good especially when the food is reload at japan in my previous trips they serve mos burger as a snack i like the dreamliner the fleet is still new and clean the only thing i do not like is the in flight entertainment which does not have many variety compare to other airlines they have a lot of japanese programs for the local

not a bad experience plane was on time and clean crew were courteous unlike other airlines jal does not sell seats but i was able to get good seats by calling them some hours before the flight the check in staff were accommodating they wrapped in plastic one of our bags to provide additional support jal was in partnership with aa in these flights

that was an amazing experience the flight attendants were friendly and cute they always said konnichiwa or arigatou in japanese and i love it one more special thing was about the meal on the plane i had breakfast and it was delicious it was delicate and was one of the most delicious meal i had ever had i will fly with jal again soon

i cannot say enough good things about jal over the years ive flown both business and economy many times utter professionalism and courtesy at every turn i think very highly of some competitors like korean air and cathay pacific but _no one_ does it with the percent commitment of jal the planes are absolutely pristine the passengers seem particularly well behaved and i believe that is because of the sense of absolute dignity and kindness imparted by the crew the food even in economy is excellent and immaculately presented the wifi service is bombproof and there is no restriction as to how its used as there is on most airlines what i dont get is why some of these asian air carriers are so so so much better than our domestic airlines in the usa what are we missing
japan airlines have the friendliest and most helpful staff on the ground and in the air their aircraft are the cleanest in the sky and the business class suite is spacious and very comfortable
i had high expectation from the business class of jal on a boeing aircraft but seats in the business class though reclineable to about inches but not ideal for sleeping

first of all i am travelling with my wife a years old kid and an infant and i am flying economy check in is smooth as we had been japan for so many times these japanese staff are constantly at it if we got any hiccup then it possible language barrier causing it going into the cabin to my surprise the economy seat wider than all flight i have taken with any other airline i feel like we are flying the so call premium economy of course the overall flight experience is very nice the stewardess gave my kids some toy and souvenir which they love it so much the food is one of the best meal i had in modern flying days and they do take effort to prep kids meal for my daughter and baby meal for my baby boy and everyone meals ends with a cup of delicious ice cream in flight entertainment yes they have bigger screen too and ipad like touch sensitivity hahaha often time people fly with only designated airline for some reason but i think as traveler we all should sometime step out of the sand box and give other reputable airline a go they might cost little more but the experience i have with jal is so pleasant this trip we had flight with jal from osaka to okinawa okinawa to tokyo and tokyo to kuala lumpur so i am here to give a big thumb up on all three flight with jal did i mention on the domestic flight they give free in flight wifi too my very first experience delightful we will definitely fly again with jal
early flight from paris to bangkok and the jal staff was wonderful the plane was clean and the staff was attentive

excellent service and seating took premium economy from jfk to hnd the seats and the legroom were amazing the menu and complimentary slippers were a nice touch as well also being able to use the air france lounge at jfk which i feel like should be advertised more and the sakura lounge at hnd were added bonuses all worth the extra money from regular economy on a hr flight
we flew japan air for the first time for a business trip to tokyo the service was superb the plane was new and very clean

this flight left me feeling very impressed with japan airlines apart from the friendly efficient service i received jal was honest and sensitive in a way that i have not seen on other airlines soon after i boarded the airplane an announcement was made that our meal would be served early because the pilots were expecting serious turbulence later in the flight as it turned out i didnt eat anything when the meal was served because i didnt feel hungry much later a flight attendant asked me again if i wanted a meal by that time i was hungry and accepted the offer the flight landed a little later than expected because the pilots had to take a detour to avoid a storm this however was explained to us in a very gracious professional manner i was so impressed with jal

i dont normally review airlines but yesterday we flew from tokyo to okinawa in a typhoon and honestly the service was impeccable to say it was a typhoon all of the staff from check in the constantly smiling air stewardesses and the pilot were calm happy and helpful there was a bit of turbulence but i slept through almost the whole thing fantastic also on top of this they gave us this postcard as we left thank you to everyone on flight we look forward to flying with you next week

i travel about time a year i board at least planes a year i travelled from bkk to japan via this airline the services is superb and flight attendants are courteous and polite the meals were okay but the drinks and speed of service makes this airline a winner
jal is a great airline to fly with the staff from counter staff to hostesses were all professional and friendly the aircraft was clean and comfortable and the food was tasty and well presented

we had the best flight to japan this summer aboard jal it was our first flight with this airline and we were very impressed we couldnt believe how much leg room there was in economy class and what great service there was too the meals were delicious there were options western and japanese we chose the japanese meals and they were scrumptious during the entire trip the stewardesses were constantly serving beverages and there was unlimited snacks after dinner the flight was very quiet and the stewardesses were very friendly we will definitely be flying with jal in the future
i always look forward to flying with jal and i only had the chance if i an going to japan the food and service are great and they have an excellent customer service orientation typically japanese

flew economy class hkgnrt on a dreamliner recently the employee at checkin at the hong kong airport express location in central was the best airline employee ive ever come acrossi had some ticketing issues that he had to call in and resolve for me and then come find me at the nearby starbucks to tell me he did so what a guy so for the goodattentive and classy personnel good food quality for a plane wine great entertainment options cleanliness on time and the was quiet and has large windows that dim electronically the downside is the legroomi would rate this flight much higher maybe stars if the legroom was decent because everything else was great unfortunately jal has not resisted the urge to cram as many seats onto a plane as possible at i notice more than others the difference in legroom i came into hkg on a garuda indonesia flight on an airbus a similar sized plane and they are massively more gracious with the amount of space given in economy class also the fact that you cannot reserve your seat easily during ticket purchase or prior to the flight departure is another downside for economy class would i fly them again maybebut only if there werent similarly priced options available on more spacious carriers cathay pacific garuda singapore etc

i traveled jal airlines first time when i am traveling back to haneda from kushiro airport although due to some technical fault flight was delayed more than one hour still first experience of flight interior seat quality impressed me coffee served insider plan was totally different taste and i loved it apart from it there staffs were very supportive and humble i want to travel again with jal

i have had international and domistic flights with jal in the past years and always found the food and service on board very good flights have always been on time with check in smooth and friendly baggage allowance is around kg plus hand luggage i found in economy class the leg room and seating on the domistic flights is even better all meals and movies on international economy flights are included in the price unlike some of our australian international airlines jal is my choice for my next flight to japan
very kind staff always willing to help japan attitude comfort everywhere really clean boarding officer offered freely extra legroom as im quite tall in comparison to japanese people i suppose
i cant speak too highly of the service and the comfort on the flight the food was excellent and i will certainly fly with jal again

i flew premium economy from jfk to narita continuing on to manila in economy checkin was fast and easy as i had arrived early to the airport and as a one world sapphire member was able to use the business class counter jal uses the air france lounge which is fine but the food was not replaced on a regular basis i got the feeling the lounge was doing the bare minimum as there were not any af flights departing at the time lounge access for all premium economy is a nice perk not provided by other airlines the seating was great and the configuration of the premium economy section works well there are two toilets in the front that appeared to be for business class but were also used by the premium economy section too this layout is much better than the cathay pacific layout that results in passengers walking over people in the bulkhead row or going to the back of the plane while i prefer a seat that reclines vs sliding down the combination of a larger than normal pitch and the fact that the person in front is not reclining into your space makes the hard shell seat a winner the food was fine nothing great and the service was very good throughout the flight some people may find the english language entertainment sections to be a bit limited

due to weather our flight was delayed i have a tendency to fall asleep anywhere and i did just that before we took off when i woke up hours later i thought my eyes were playing tricks on me i still saw tarmac and grass turns out we have been waiting for the weather to turn for the better and havent budged while we were in the air i realized i might not make my connecting flight to akita i asked the flight attendant about it and she did her best to give me updates even she didnt have more information she came back to tell me she is waiting for an answer turns out i only had hour to get past customs collect my luggage which i was planning to ship because they were large and awkward i was carrying instruments and get to the other terminal and board when i got off the plane a jal employee met me and helped carry my luggage all the way to the other terminal unfortunately the carts were not allowed so he carried them by hand i felt very badly for him but was so grateful thanks to all the staff i was able to make my flight and see my parents the same day i was so concerned i would have to wait until the next day i couldnt be more happy my reason for not giving stars is because the food really could be better there is fruit on top of somen and other odd combinations i usually bring my own food despite the food i will continue to fly jal because of the amazing service
excellent flight from sydney the seating arrangement was private and sleeping arrangements good the food and wine was really good and the service excellent but not intrusive

the business class seats for jal are the best i have ever experienced i was in a which is by the window and the design means you are essentially in your own private seat with a small passage to get into the aisle this is more like first class suites row is also in its own private cabin between first class and the galley so not many people and much more private than the main business cabin with their mattress it was very comfortable for this very long flight service was very attentive with frequent and generous refills of wine a big disappointment for me was the food a choice of japanese of western menu i opted for the western as some of the japanese options were too adventurous for me the squid for the starter has very little flavour and was very tough beef fillet was ok and cooked well considering but on small side i had better luck with the japanese beef curry which is on the snacks menu you can order anytime tasty although a little cold if the food was better this would have been best business class flight i have ever taken
average service for the first few hours we were not served food which i thought was not a good practice

our tickets were booked with japan airlines the tokyo to london return flights were with british airways premium economy i cant say it was worth the price as there was not much extra leg room i am only five foot three but my husband is six foot three so it is very important for him to have the extra leg room when the seats in front of us were put back it was almost impossible to get out of the seat the flight from sydney to tokyo was very comfortable with more keg room and decent seat recline we are sitting at the airport now waiting for our flight back to sydney it is an evening flight so it will be interesting to see how comfortable an overnight flight will be the photographs are of british airways premium economy i will update my status on japan airlines in a few days
great friendly service hot cloths plenty of drinks good food nothing was a problem to the staff free motel on route very lenient on cabin luggage weights

first before taxiing i noticed four airline staff outside the airplane lined up and started to wave goodbye the passengers and bow down as japanese do then i loved the toilet which was equipped with electronic bidet which is very clean and hygienic then noticed the windows can be tinted electronically and you can choose how dark the window you want to be as opposed to most aircrafts where you can only block the window and lastly the space between seats are decent compare to other airlines

jal is the model of superb customer service by its ground and flight crews the flight crew is very attentive to its passengers unlike other us and european based airline the japanese culture is ingrained into its daily routine which is extended to all passengers food is also very good with traditional nonplastic utensils

jal offer a premium business class service with a modern setup that feels a decade ahead of anything ba qantas united or similar midtier airlines offer jal are one of the best their inair service is friendly and attentive you feel like your service is personalized and that they are genuinely interested in making sure you have the best possible experience on top of that on my last outbound flight one of the cabin attendants accidentally returned to me the wrong suit jacket i didnt notice until i arrived at my hotel jal ground service and lost and found were amazing sending me multiple emails checking with cabin crew and genuinely trying to track down my jacket on my departure at the narita checkin desk one of the lost and found staff met me in person to sincerely apologize for this error i was left with the impression that they had gone above and beyond what youd expect from an average airline

travelling with a big group of family a and c only toddler and elderly were given the priority boarding kids unfortunately are not given this priority in overall i like their service and the choice for meal serving was big for toddler they served the rice cracker and banana immediately after boarding which was a good surprise that ensure the toddler wont go crying because of hunger the proper meal served was mainly assorted blended vegetable like mashed pumpkin spinach etc not to my toddler liking though but still very good effort for kids meal very nicely done up with lots of choice big serving seat was comfortable flight was punctual the only complaint that i had was the aircond the only flight that i felt warm in the plane compared to all the other airlines its probably good for fuel consumption and energy friendly but slightly too warm for passenger as we ended sweating in the plane

my whole family had the best experience ever with japan airlines the flight crew was so polite and pleasant we have flown will all the usa based airlines and a few international carriers like cathay pacific and klm jal has exceeded all are expectations united airlines staff should take some lessons from the jal staff loved the attention to passengers even if they are economy class we traveled with family members who have food allergies they were so attentive and careful with the meals we will fly again with japan airlines thank you for the most flight experience ever

ive had the privilege to experience different j classes of various carriers and i have to say jal tops the cake from the gracious helpful staff sumptuous meal and comfy seat jal has really created a high bar when it comes to business class i originally started my trip from seoul to narita on a but my review is about the flight from tokyo to los angeles on board the transiting at nrt was pretty painless just had to go through security make sure laptops are out and no liquids more than ml once past security i made my way to the tranquil sakura lounge definitely try their curry with rice i prefer the design of haneda with its open floor and plenty of natural lighting narita is a bit of a dungeon compared to haneda but i digress after some rr i made my way to the gate jl boards families with tots and those that need assistance afterwards first class fc and diamond members are welcomed on board then business and economy i soon settled into seat k window in the primary business section theres a forward biz section just behind fc a flight attendant came by to introduce herself and served champagne and offered reading material the skysuite is exemplary once the partition goes up its like youre in your own cubicle in a good way although there is a seat next to you you still have aisle access for comparisons sake british airways has a similar layout but youre not afforded your own aisle access and gasp have to hurdle over your facing neighbor the screen is quite large and there is also a handheld remote to control content the seat is upholstered comfortable and has a massage feature the seat also changes to a fullflat bed and an airwave mattress topper is provided the inflight entertainment ife is quite extensive and contains new releases as well as classic movies once airborne the smiling fa s quickly commenced service unlike us carriers i feel like fa s on most asian carriers like their jobs and want to provide utmost service i describe it as a white glove touch they never seem hurried and pay attention to the detail like ensuring the jal logo on the wine glass is facing you if youre keen at all definitely go for the multicourse japanese menu our menu started with tofu and a dish of tuna followed by a bento of japanese appetizers then the main course followed beef tongue and cod along with rice and miso soup my fa kept offering wine i had to politely decline once dinner wrapped up the fa advised me i could order anything off the handheld device i think its really great you can order anytime and not have to flag an fa or ring the call attendant button the snack menu is quite extensive as well go for the ramen and pork cutlet sandwich sadly before i knew it i could see the california coastline and we began our descent into los angeles overall i was quite impressed with the whole flight from the crew food bed and ife i will certainly consider jal for my next trip to asia

my first experience flying jal international more than hours of flight delay in japan we had to take the last connected flight instead of arriving at pm i arrived home at am the next day although they gave a food voucher of yen that is hardly compensating domestic osaka to new chitose and new chitose to tokyo they served you cup juice or plain water thats how the service i will never fly jal again

i transferred from ba to jal in hong kong it was relatively short flight compared to ba but its service was far superior to that of ba only the problem is that seat pitch is small so bigger people jal is not comfortable as it should be

fly with boeing dreamliner for the food and service i gotta say jal never let me down Êó•Ëà™Â§¢ÂπªÂÆ¢Ê©üÂïÜÂãôËâôÂ∫ßÊ§ÖËàíÈÅ©Â∫¶‰∏çÂú®Ë©±‰∏ãÂèØ‰ª•Ë™øËâ≤ÁöÑÁ™óÊà∂Â±ïÁèæÁßëÊäÄÂØ¶Âäõ‰ΩÜÊúÄÊÑõÁöÑÈÇÑÊòØË≤ºÂøÉË¶™ÂàáÁöÑÊúçÂãô‰ª•ÂèäÂ•ΩÁúãÂèàÂ•ΩÂêÉÁöÑÈ§êÈªû Á≤æÁ∑ªÊñôÁêÜÊê≠ÈÖçÊ∏ÖÈÖíÁ¥ÖÁôΩÈÖíÂï§ÈÖíÈÉΩÂÆåÁæé

seat size is acceptable meal serve only one prior to arrival early morning as it was a midnight flight for those who fly jal midnight flight should have taken dinner before boarding otherwise you could have felt hungry throughout the flight

this is my first time taking japan airlines even though it is the short distance from taipei to tokyo i still enjoy the good flight experience because the comfortable seats in economy class and homelike space and the flight ticket is not as expensive as i thought now that makes me rethink to treat myself well to relish quality as well as good price even if most people prefer to fly by cheap airlines

chose a day flight to avoid jetlag did not expect to sit for hours with all the blinds down and the lights off only had my reading light spent time at the back looking out of the tiny window as we flew over northern russia as the inflight entertainment was rubbish

flight was on time checkin slick cabin crew friendly comfort soso food not bad we chose a day flight depart am tokyo arrive lhr pm especially to avoid jet lag a technique that has always worked in the past however the airline insisted of keeping the blinds closed and the cabin lights off for pretty well the full twelve hours of the flight sitting in aisle seats we could do nothing about this apart from spending much time at the back where there were a couple of tiny windows the point of choosing a day flight is to have a normal nights sleep before have a very long day travelling then go to bed at the destination resulting in minimal disruption to the body clock passengers do not need to sleep for hours during the day westerly flight to the usa do not adopt this procedure why on earth does the airline act in this ridiculous way my cynical guess is that it keeps passengers from making too many demands on the cabin crew also the inflight entertainment consisted of a few childrens films and some awful science fiction dreadful
good flight good service of course few space for legs but better than many other companies food acceptable good entertainement

jal is the best airlines i have ever flown the level of service surpasses every single us based airline the cabin crewwas so attentive to our special diet needs as well as to my yr old daughter the only downside is that they partner with american airlines so when the international leg of the flight is over and you transfer to domestic the level of service basically goes away

our first trip to japan we flew jal im so glad we did checkin was seamless easy our japanese experience commenced as soon as we boarded the plane being greeted in japanese quickly given a lovely warm hand towel on the way over we got bulkhead seats allowing lots of leg room but even on the return in a normal seat the seats were still comfy with good leg room offered the meals were tasty filling often having choices between japanese or western food snacks personally i was happy to dive straight into japanese flavours cuisine service was fantastic with nothing being a problem for the extremely professional staff i found the choices of movies entertainment good as well the dimming of the cabins after our meals was great allowing a peaceful rest if so desired staff assisted me in learning some key japanese phrases pronunciation which i was really grateful for we look forward to travelling to japan again in the future will not hesitate to go with jal great flight great service great food very friendly staff thankyou
excellent service at the airport and in flight kind attention even in small details free wifi is another plus

stewardess speaks english with the director of cabin attendants division but the young ladies except the director was very afraid to answer important sensitive questions regarding food ingredients i must say service is fine but the quality of ingredients for food served are not made in japan what meaning does this kind of choices means for jal not promoting own countrys products or just saving cost or simply blind to the fact that passengers have no say

the legroom was actually better than the american airlines we took on the return trip to the usa from narita we felt the cabin overall was clean especially the bathroom was very clean on a very long flight kudos to the flight attendants for constantly maintaining cleanliness of the bathrooms i dont think any other airlines flight crew do this and it is really appreciated i wish other us carriers could be more attentive to such details as well overall flight attendants were very kind patient and pleasant as a customer it made us feel we could reciprocate to be respectful as well

i flew tokyo from bc several times by jal and appreciated the excellent service food entertainment and cleanliness on this international route i tried the domestic route from narita to fukuoka and found their services standard as good as international route specifically tsuchiya the stewardess

have flown many airlines in years but never one that will not let y pre book your seats if youre coach ticket does not have a certain designator not allowed to choose a seat nor even allowed to seek out a seat from jal reservations in the us they should note that at the time of your acceptance of a booking as well as all internet companies selling a jl ticket that you cannot reserve a seat until day of boarding if your ticket designator blocks y from a pre reserved seat designation because of price buyer beware

great service comfortable seats meals plus snacks free entertainment movies and games free luggage check in for each passenger lbs each crew so pleasant hot towels foods was served with real utensils all our needs were taken care of including tooth brush socks and tooth paste

the japanese know how to treat well their customers it was a long flight and usually we get tired and bored during so many hours inside an airplane but the jals crew didnt want us to get bored and they were coming all the time to offer something to drink or to eat even during the night they would pass in the aisles very silently with a tray with water or juice just in case you were awaken and wanted to drink something the meals were very tasty and very fulfilling even if i was flying economy the crew was very solicitous and always smiling it was a great flight

have been flying with them all the time never been disappointed with their attentive services their services are getting better considering their competition with ana sushi served at their first class lounge in nrt is one of the best lounge foods
very polite good service clean and not too expensive cost will choice again if have a chance narita airport are nice to look around but business waiting room are poor

this is my preferred airline and i am also jal mileage collector so i always chose this airline over others where they fly if not my preference will be one of the one world members airline usually good ontime departurearrive to the destination easy check in unlike others very generous baggage allowance too and usually connect well for domestic flights or other international connection flights in flight service great selection of movies games music from personal screen in front of your seats good selection of complimentary beverages are always helpful for long flight business class seat is exceptional and personalized attention to detail service is fantastic they even come to your seat and make a bed with real good quality pillow and comforter not to mention food drink selection quality quantity are perfect economy class functional well designed seats usb charger bottled water holder etc good polite service not like many of nothing american airlinesthere are no bad attitude to the guests however i feel quality of service and quantity of food has gone done slightly compare to previous years i use this airline yrs for last yrs there were few incidents that encounter over the years with them but at the end they usually make it right for the guests and overall still consider good flight experience i have no hesitation recommending this airline

we have flown this route actually its flights with a stopover in nikita hotel accommodation included in ticket times over the last decade and have found it a perfect way to make such a long trip from australia the flight from sydney to tokyo is under hours and a business class or premium economy ticket gets you into the qantas lounge in sydney and the sakura lounge in nikita tokyo after a good nights sleep in one of the airport hotels and a leisurely start to the next day the nikitaparis flight is hours flying with the sun so you arrive in the afternoon paris time and if you can force yourself to stay awake for a few more hours usually you can get another good nights sleep and wake early to start your holiday jal offer both western and japanese meals and the food is excellent portion sizes are just right not too big and you can eat as much or as little as you want as they do a set meal and then have an anytime menu the staff are all lovely so polite and charming the seating pods are comfortable and if youre lucky enough to score a window seat they are completely private when you raise the screen between seats in business class they stretch out completely flat and there are mattress pads blankets cardigans etc available they usually have a good range of movies and games

youve seen those headlines passengers bribed coerced beaten and dragged off of planes people sitting on the runway for hours on endless delays kids and babies booted off seats that were paid for etc this type of thing would be unimaginable for a serviceoriented country and culture like japan theyd probably commit seppuku before being portrayed in the media in any of the above incidents i kid you not just look walk into a starbucks mcdonalds or any store supermarket in tokyo excellent service is common in japan from the low to high end japan airlines comparatively is more than competent boarding and exiting is well organized in a low key manner the staff greet and thank you as you embark and disembark the seats are not squeezed in to maximize profits as it cuts off circulation for people over ft food is awesome with some local flavor dishes minus the third meal on long flights that is a more a snack c hotdogs for me the attendants are all smiles and attentive asking if you need blankets pillows extra snacks drinks long periods cooped up in a confined space is much more bearable with good movies tv selection or just play games on your own ipad or nintendo switch overall japan airlines is a rare beacon of light in todays airline industry one that still treats its customers well coupled with the japanese propensity for service its a win

as good as it gets in economy class flight crew maintained a constant smile and was very helpful unfortunately after i got to jfk i had to fly jetblue to jacksonville they were terrible they made the cabin freezing cold and then wanted to charge for a blanket and they make you watch advertising the whole flight unless you rent headphones to watch movies

great flight great food and able to catch up on movies i have missed would fly again cabin was very comfortable and first time i have experienced the windows that dont have blinds but have the tint adjust surprisingly this was very effective and i was able to catch some zzzzs as well love technological advances

i have a theory always fly the airline of the country i flew japan airlines from jfk to tokyo on the beautiful the interior was stunning with low lighting tinted windows that dimmed as to adjust time zones replaced by the standard shades the super comfortable sky seat was like a cubicle with flat beds and a big tv monitor partitions went up automatically i never saw my neighbor the entire flight it was like a private little room i ordered the japanese dinner which was superb and the highest end sake the fight attendants were young and impeccable my one complaint was the bar which only had half a bottle of wine a bottle water and some crackers the entertainment system should add more english movies over all excellent i almost didnt want to get off the hour flight

this was our first trip to hawaii from bangkok and we were thankful that jal made the trip pleasurable and with very reasonable and competitive fares business class check in was smooth and the lounge in bangkok was excellent unlike the lounge for the national airline which is always over crowded the first leg to narita took about hours with a hour transit which was perfect to get down and stretch our legs and it was another hours to honolulu narita airport is a fun place to walk around do some shopping for snacks and have a delicious meal but the food in the plane was high quality as well and offered japanese of course as a choice most importantly i found the service by the air hostesses to be excellent there were no male stewards im not complaining and im thinking perhaps its a japanese culture reason inflight entertainment was good with decent choices of new movies no problems at all checking thru our bags to our final destination and upon arrival our bags arrived at the baggage claim without issue overall i would definitely fly jal again
even if economy class a seat of ss was very comfortable a seat size of cm pitch long and cm wide is larger than other airlines before and during boarding i was satisfied with staffs service

the plane was very clean and fresh smelling stewardesses were professional polite and friendly inflight entertainment was good in one of our domestic flights there was free wifi the food was very tasty and they catered to my partners dietary needs well they did rounds to make sure we were well hydrated toilets were quite clean too the seats were comfortable and the legroom was sufficient on both international and domestic flights only thing i dont understand is why our luggage did not go straight to sapporo we had to remove our luggage at haneda and check it in again for sapporo

very comfortable flight with attentive cabin crew the breakfast was appalling breakfast i could see what they were trying to do with a different type of breakfast burger but by the time it had been heated and served it was just horrible to look at and to eat as a general rule just dont eat airline food
made this flight last october this was a very comfortable flight ample space and service was excellent food outstanding and you could choose different courses in short a pleasurable experience

as a frequent traveller on the paristokyo route i favor jal over ana and af mostly for the consistency of their service quality which i have experienced in business premium and economy class it is not flawless but dependably satisfactory meeting expectations in each class of service seating is comfortable food and beverages are tasty and servings are just right drink refills and tray removal can be slow at times but staff is usually courteous and gracious the size and quality of audio selections are a plus even though english descriptions are scarce videomoviesspecial programs are abundant and wideranging

i have flown jal to canada and back several times now and am never disappointed the new dreamliner is comfortable as are the other planes flying this route boarding procedures are efficient well organised and on time cleanliness of public areas is superb i am especially happy that the toilets are kept in really good condition for the duration of the flights staff are consistently helpful and friendy the meals are very good and the japanese menu offers a lighter but filling meal suited to time spent in a seat my only minor gripe is that the entertainment available is limited compared to some other airlines i have used but this is not a reason not to choose jal i thoroughly recommend this airline

we flew bc from bnehkgnrtnrtsydbne in may and i have to say it was me of my favourite flights yet attention to detail is great we slept well and arrived refreshed in both destinations my husband has flown bc from bne thru to bos via japan on many occasions also and cant fault them

hadnt flown with jal in a while and i finally flew with them again during my recent trip and i wasnt disappointed the flight attendants were polite and service was good airplane food usually isnt something to be raved about but i thought the food onboard was quite good

its my first time to fly jal and it was very good all in all seat was comfortable with good space the entertainment tv has plenty of channels and movies to choose from food was great the flight attendant was okay didnt encounter any rude or unfriendly ones minor negative factors were the rough touchdown when we arrived at tokyo narita i am not sure if weather played a role with it and another one was that my miles asiamiles werent credited for the flights after checking the ticket type it should have earn miles i didnt report it via missing miles anymore because the process was a bit tedious overall i would definitely consider booking with this airline again especially for flights going to japan

everything about this airline is meticulously superior to any us flagged carrierthe customer service at the gate the service during the flight the number of flight attendants the food quality the attention to details that focus on passenger comfort one prime example there were disposable toothbrushes and toothpaste available in the lavatories on a flight that lasts hours that is a very welcome amenity

in the usual japanese style the flight boarded on time the boarding process was calm easy and efficient we departed exactly on time and the flight was the most comfortable short haul domestic economy flight that i think i have ever had in years of flying leg room was excellent even for a cm plus passenger the seats were comfortable and the plane was clean and even the floor was spotless we even had free wifi unfortunately the flight was too short to enjoy all the luxuries of the flight i normally hate flying but i really enjoyed this flight
i booked my flight by my mileage account from website of jalbut wrong name is on my ticket that i received before boardingits so dangerous
the service was great and the plane itself felt bigger than most i have been on before will for sure fly japan airlines again bathrooms were really clean

this is jal youre talking about so imo youre almost never going to have any serious qualms about the level of attention and care in their service the movies were up to date i managed to snag an exit row seat and the food was good but not very filling for me one minor quip i watched the english version of the minions movie inspanish something was wrong with the system there finally they were pretty strict about the dimensions of my bike box just a smidge over the cm and i wound up paying jpy i usually get away with it but these people play by the rules

overnight flight to sydney boarded last together with other economy class passengers premium economy seats are slightly wider than economy seats are in a shell so can slide forward but not completely just a little bit more and it would have been a comfortable flight couldnt get any sleep as we got seats next to the restrooms that flushes noisily food was same as economy premium economy gets champagne choice of entertainment was ok flight attendants very attentive
its quite a pleasant trip with jal from checkin boarding cabin cleanness crew curtesy to food flavor the only thing annoying is high frequency of flight announcement in or languages

my wife i flew from boston to tokyo and then on the next day to sydney the service on both flights was excellent the staff were so courteous and looked after us well i had flown on the dreamliners before and never cease to be impressed by their smooth flying and fast service between destinations certainly would not hesitate to fly with them again

seat was good and the space was reasonably wide tv screen was large ans i could enjoy the movies food was also good far better than jl fly to san francisco a pair of mules was also equipped which was not for jl to sfo since it was high season the ticket price was extremely expensive

have flown premium eco with a number of airlines the whole experience from ease of booking to pre flight and in flight service was the best by far the only minor gripe was that the seat was a little firm but with the seat capsules you werent disturbed by the person in front or behind reclining their seat as it all happened within their capsule it more than made up for the firmness of the seat changing flights we were only charged a each but this was our choice so considering what some of the low cost airlines charge it wasnt too bad ticket price was very competitive in fact cheapest at the time for us flying this way to europe is the best when you consider the time spent in the air to get to your destination as compared other routes efficiency of cabin staff and cleanliness of plane and japan in general is very good

happy with japan airlines although were not impressed with the mandatory stop over in tokyo the flight itself was good with comfortable seats good service the food was a bit hit and miss what we were not happy about was the hotel we were taken to on the way to europeit was very ordinary on purchasing our tickets we were advised the stopover included dinner bed breakfast plus transfers upon arrival at the hotel we were advised no meals were includedreception staff were helpful phoned the airline to no avail i eventually had to speak to the airline and after much discussion they reluctantly agreed to cover meal costs all this took around an hour to sort out was quite annoying we still have had no reply from japan airlines as to why this happened
i could reserve exit row seats for my wife and me where we did really enjoy our stay in the flight smile of cabin attendants added our stay more comfortable
you can feel that everything is crafted with japanese zen style service is very good i will take jal into priority when fly to japan
the stewardess are very friendly with a lot of complimentary offerings to make your flight the most enjoyable

the overall flight experience is above average especially in premium economy is it that much better than other international flights that is debatable my upcoming trip to japan is going to be on delta airline package price became a consideration premium economy is my choice
the flight attendants provided personal business class service to their economy class customers the food was also better than i have experienced on some business class flights

the cabin crew were reliably helpful and spoke excellent english their service was efficient and quick the food quality was medium to good depending on what was ordered i had the asian vegetarian meals which were fine but not good enough to look forward to the regular meals seemed more appetizing the selection of films was excellent the flight departed and arrived on time i would definitely recommend this airline
