jal was one of the very few airlines that provided metal cutlery and serviette that was large enough to cover the thighs the food was well prepared with salad hot main and dessert the service was good and the seat had sufficient leg room the rest rooms were cleaned regularly with supplies refilled as comparison cathay pacific gave me a pie that passed the expiry date qantas cutlery worked like toys that could not cut anything and the serviette was just slightly larger than a tissue paper for air canada i became hungry hours after the main meal luckily i got a lot of snacks with me but you need to be careful about one thing with jal do not choose the flight with connecting domestic flight provided by jetstar not only you need to pay for everything drinks snacks on board of jetstar the choices were limited and the service was below satisfaction

japan airlines make details count from boarding the plane finding your seat with eye mask sandals noise cancelling headphones i am talking about economy seat the flight departed on time if you fall asleep while the serve the food you will find a sticker in front of you telling you to call the attendants when you wake up so you can get your food lavatory had tooth brushes available and cotton swaps so next time i have an intercontinental flight i will make sure i look for japan airlines or anything else rather than airlines in us

we flew on the new dream liner series the seats were standard business seats but very comfortable we chose the japanese food option it was great the service offered by cabin crew was excellent i can highly recommend this airline to any travelers

outbound to narita was dreamliner and inbound on although the dreamliner is a much newer plane i much preferred the as it is definitely more spacious and comfortable i didnt quite like the way the seat reclines in comparison to the conventional seats on the apart from the wider seats on the much have been said in forums about the less dry cabin conditions but on this approx hr flight it would not have been an issue however i have to say the dreamliner is a much quieter plane and more high tech although the is obviously older the condition is still good in terms of person to person contact experience i would say jal is very good from the word go checking in was pleasant enough on both ends cabin service was also very good

took a flight from sin to jfk with a hr stop over in hnd was initially concerned that i could not make the flight if the gates were far apart on that day we just had to go up the escalator and the new gate was there whew on the flight staff left snacks at the galley along with bottles of water during the overnight portion snacks were nicer than the meals they served too dry

while it is clear that the airline had upgraded its seats in economy to provide more space the lumbar was permanently fixed in a position that i could not bear for the long flight then i needed to fly from tokyo to singapore this was a very uncomfortable round trip journey on the same style of aircraft all other aspects of the flight were perfectly fine

i chose jal simply because of its schedule we had not travelled on jal before as we are usually quite faithful to qatar or sia therefore we did not have high expectations for jal economy class imagine our delight when the service was excellent the staff were pleasant and efficient best of all the food was of exceptionally high quality the servings were large the menu was varied and the salads were fresh better than most other airlines in economy class we will definitely fly jal again

from the moment you board the flight you are greeted by warm and attentive crew in typical japanese style the proffessional manner in which you are greeted and taken care of is simply the best that i have experienced on any airline the business class seat is private and comfortable try to avoid the middle seat as my partner found it rather boxed in your ability to order using your personal seat device makes it much easier and your meal is prepared and served prompty i would fly jal long haul when ever i can

we flew bostontokyo narita on a and tokyosingapore on a both flights on business class were excellent with the famed japanese hospitality in evidence a comfortable mattress was provided for sleeping on the flat bed but no pajamas i was in the window seat with complete privacybut the space lacks storage surfaces vegetarian cuisine was average and inflight entertainment was not as good as some other carriers
jals business class is always better than the average of all airlines especially fb attendants attitude seat comfort as well as cleanness
the service from the time we checked in until we arrived at narita was excellent really enjoy flying with jal

jal has great staff from check in to baggage pickup flight attendants are great service conscious and always super courteous airplane is a great plane to fly with comfortable seating seats are fixedreclining is within the shell flight has on board wifi as well as adjustable table trays only nuisance is difficulty with internet check in and seat selection however check in clerks were great in making adjustment since i wanted seats side by side another issue might be heavy use of japanese language with more englishkorean might be considered however i would use jal again

from start to finish we were very happy customers in sydney we were able to take full use of the business lounge at qantas as part of our ticket price which was excellent and full use of the business lounge in tokyo before our flight home as is typical with japanese people we were shown kindness and care during our flight i love the warm moist towels to clean your hands before meals and the attention of the flight stewards was really appreciated nothing is too much trouble the food was good for airline meals and the plane was very clean we loved our flight and japan so much we re booked to go back there again two weeks after arriving home

i actually had two other flights with jal during the course of my trip and they were all excellent the only issue was the internationaldomestic connection aa at bostons logan airport where it was unclear that we were to drop off our bags after clearing customs at this side counter that seemingly was marked for airlines other than aa and jl it seems logan does international to domestic connections differently than other airports other airports have an obvious baggage recheck place they did have a list of people making connections and their baggage though so presumably they were looking out for people

excellent flight and services i am frequent flyer with japan airline and have enjoyed travelling with them several times a year i would definitely recommend them without any hesitation food beverages drinks hospitality and flight checkin are excellent
flight was delayed flying with american airline from lax but attendants are very helpful in transiting and gave airport restaurants voucher due to the delay feeling welcome and appreciated

excellent flight excellent service by attendants good food warm and fresh they are on time or landing early passengers are treated with the highest regard fares are reasonable and overall jal is comparable to cathaypacific and singapore airlines and much much better than emirates for food and service we go to indonesia every year this has become our airline of choice after flying emirates singapore cathaypacific and united
its well worth the extra money to fly this route in pe the seats are great the service is fantastic and you get lounge access

very pleased with jal easy checking in and lounge available for business class passengers flight personnel very attentive food very good and both asian and western menus available seats can be adjusted to lie flat so comfortable for hour flight

myself and family always fly with japan airlines between vancouver and japan after several subpar experiences with air canada years ago since then we are nothing but pleased with the level of customer service from bookinginquiries to the staff on board japan airlines makes flying long haul economy bearable and often times enjoyable meals offered are often more than adequate in taste and portion size would highly recommend this airline

not to generalize but ive noticed that many of the asian airlines tend to be a little skimpy on their cocktail service small pours and its quicker to go back to the galley and ask that said the seats were comfortable but not true lieflat beds angle flat the great food with a lovely presentation decent inflightentertainment system with enough english language titles to keep me amused

when i first purchased the ticket through the aa website i didnt realize it was a codeshare with jal until a few days before my trip when i was reviewing my travel paperwork having flown through narita in the past i expected the long flight to be an ordeal to forget about and nothing more instead i was quite pleasantly surprised by the excellent service and equipment there was more than enough leg room which i often have trouble with the food was great and the inflight entertainment offerings made the trip much more enjoyable than i could have anticipated i would definitely recommend flying jal
nice service udon noodles are delicious champagne is wonderful super friendly fa i do really like their angel smiles spacious seat for average person

my first time flying with them on this route as expected their service amenities and food are solid but not to the point where impressed considering them usually getting rated higher than many others i expected more their seating arrangements the type of jet all normal but not a flight attendants werent as attentive as they used to be

my wife and i veteran travelers nations decided to tour vietnam viet nam the real name and a bit of cambodia siem reap angkor wat we looked at options including using our ff miles on american the price to fill in to mile each on american was stunning so we picked jal we also know that asian airlines are noted for better service and it proved true again we had a codeshare flight elplax a sixhour layover its good we had united club coupons from our son and his wife hours to tko hours in tko and hours to han all the reservations checkins and flights went very well in tko we took a break to make block prints of hiroshiges famous wave picture on the way home ee retraced our route this time with a hour layover in tko oof again we had united club coupons we had one interesting episode trying to get from what i recall was terminal in tko to terminal to get to the united club for about hours before returning to terminal were we officially in transit on the interterminal bus and not entering japan it took about officials of various levels to figure out that it was okand it was the shuttlebus driver who made the decision again the flights were all fine

tokyo to boston is a hour flight i am i flew economy this is a recipe for disaster fortunately japan airlines makes this flight eminently tolerable the is a great plane to fly the legroom was sufficient the food was plentiful and tasty the entertainment options were varied most of all the flight attendants are extremely accommodating why cant us airlines provide the same level of comfort that foreign airlines provide
the flight with united was smooth very attentive flight attendants beds were comfortable and food was superb ditto for jal i would fly with both airlines again and again

this is something that really put me off from travelling back to japan especially via haneda the flight was unmemorable with that cabin crew simply looking at your face as if saying maybe if i go away you will stop asking me something and i could not wait from leaving that kind of environment worse as i was flying business class on an almost empty flight which was delayed i could not believe when reaching haneda airport although being the first to leave the flight and reach security i witnessed lots of people could not understand if they were japanese or from nearby countries who were joining the security queues together with friends thus coming in front of me from what was originally an empty queue i moved queues times as this kept occurring and i did not want to travel at midnight in a new city which i did not know the security guys kept asking people to open their suitcases as if expecting to find diamond rocks and asked me the same then kept patting my kg suitcase as i tend to travel very minimalistic everywhere and only stopping when he reached my underwear bag i could not believe these people are so intrusive and worse the security guy a very tall slim guy in his s asked a tiny japanese girl to check my body i said that i do not mind to check my there in front of everybody so she decided to pat my body absolutely everywhere i was shocked as this did not happen to me in any other part of the world worse than security people in third world countries i told this story to so many people and not one single person told me of a similar experience clearly this show that important security guy wanted to warm himself up by telling this kind of story and what he is capable of doing at work this was truly shocking and sickening to me no wonder it put me off from ever returning to japan should this airline move their hub to a different location i might consider visiting tokyo again as no woman would want to encounter such rude uncivilised and primitive people with such huge issues at work affecting people who simply travel the world thus contributing to the economy of that country

flew for the first time in jal business class although it was just a short flight of little more than hours the experience was very very good the flight attendants are as in typical japanese service very attentive to details and very courteous to the passengers the food was one of the best business class meals i have had in a while although the seat was not the newest layflat type but it didnt matter for our short flight in all a very memorable experience and will surely fly jal again in the near future

having flown economy in various other international airlines on transcontinental flights leg space and seat wdth in jal seems to be bestinclass food choices could have been better and their code share with aa doesnt translate to the same levels of comfort in aa economy overall a good flying experience

the title says it all this is the first time for me flying with japan airlines and definetely will not be the last their stewardess are courteus and so keen on serving its passangers i never had a flight where the steward go round and round offering different kinds of drinks each hour during the flight i think japanese culture is essential in jal and we can see it directly on how we are served their economy class is on of the moat spacious for boeing it was like flying with airbuss great experience and very reasonable price

even in economy class jal offers more leg rooms than any other airlines i was surprised by how comfortable the seats were and very attentive service flight crews provided food is nice and unique they offered some local delicacy on our flight i would certainly fly with jal again and highly recommend to others
great service again from jal very attentive staff food selection is great flight was great toilets are spacious seat in premium economy is great plenty of room would fly jal again

dreamliner is a great place plenty room service is great movie selection was good food was great loved the mos burger for breakfast a little strange but still nice great airline with great service wouldnt hesitate to fly again on jal

great direct flight from cdg to haneda clean airplane cost me only euros not expensive if you compare with the prize of ana and af in this routethe food was good personal cabin very nice i watched great recent moviesthe seat was confortable im only m so i didnt have any problem concerning the legroom i will fly again with this airlines

on an extremely long flight it is important that you feel comfortable and on our hour flight from chicago to narita we felt just that the flight attendants were very accommodating and spoke excellent english the seats in the economy class were comfortable and spacious it was nice that jal gives their passengers free pillows blankets headphones and complimentary meals considering most other airlines make you pay for such things the in flight movie selections were excellent they had wonderful vegan meals provided to my boyfriend and i at no extra charge overall a very positive experience i look forward to flying with jal on my return to japan next year

one of the best airlines i have travelled with their flight attendants are one of the most friendliest around we were well looked after on our flights nothing was too much for them and they went out of their way for my daughter my daughter wasnt too keen on her kids meal the attendant noticed this and made another meal especially for her the food was tasty and beautifully presented the seat was very comfy would definitely fly with them again

no no no said the flight attendant in the galleybacking away from me with her arms crossed meaning no i actually said dont panic because of her actions and the look on her face her backward steps took her to the end of the galley where another female attendant appearedthey spoke in their native tongue with the initial attendant voice being high pitched and indicating by arm and hand gestures a person injecting themselves into the arm joint i was distressed what had i done here am i a year old bald short man who has a history of blood clots and i had just injected myself with clexane a blood thinner in accordance with medical advice on long distance flights i recapped the needle in the toilet stepped out and asked the flight attendant whether they have a needle disposal container with the capped needle lying in the palm of my hand i couldnt believe itanother flight attendant also in the galley then looked up at the fuss responded very politely that they cannot take needles would i like a plastic bag i declined but told him i am a long term recreational traveller and am really distressed at how the attendant responded i put a comment on jal face book page but they have deleted it this could be a safety issue the attendants training or the attendant needs to be reviewed how would she react in a real crisis when i said i would report the matter and wished to left alone for the last hours of the flight this was not complied with i was approached in my seat whilst in the aisle waiting to disembarki said leave me alone but another attendant approached me dispite my protests walking up the air bridge with me when i ignored her and again said leave me alone she approached my travelling companion who is japanese about my concerns shocking this is both a possible safety issue as well as the manner a passenger was treated and thereafter in my opinion harassed when i said i would report the matter really really disappointing and distressing at the timei went to jal comments complaints section they say in effect they may not reply they may reply after a short period if they do reply the reply is copyrighted to jal so here is my experience of jal business class

i have flown on and off with japan airlines for many years staff is always courteous and professional the planes are new and clean food and entertainment are usually what you expect from a good international airline snacks are laid out for customers to help themselves what im most impress is the amount of legroom that you get even if you are in economy class this says a lot when the rest of the industry is trying to get by with as little space as they could always a pleasant experience with them

this was my first experience of both jal and premium economy it covers sectors sydnrt nrtjfk and return checkin priority bag drop for online checkin but pe has priority itself the aircraft sectors one sector nrtjfk overall the was quieter and more comfortable than the the dimming windows on the didnt block light fully a problem on the south facing side of the aircraft transpacific on the i understand pe is meant to share toilets with economy but pe travelers used the business class toilets immediately in front of pe jal has switched to for sydnrt since march the seats legroom is good although still not quite stretch out and sleep for my plenty of adjustment large tray table although this is reduced for bulkhead seats due to the seat arm storage of both it and the video screen is seats across economy is and respectively lounge access a real selling point for jal pe access to quality lounges in sydney qantas narita sakura lounge and jfk air france in order of preference food and drink interesting and tasty if you enjoy japanese food certainly a cut above most economy offerings even though pe is only a couple of addons champagne and shochu are pe specific wine offerings average good range of soft drinks and beer normal barely drinkable economy and black tea as hot drinks but also green tea and miso service overall polite and attentive personal welcome by name as head of our family my wife and i chose to sleep from boarding our final sector and awoke to handwritten notes that our main meals were still available if wanted entertainment jal moove new sky entertainment is the musical sting at the beginning of everynewentertainmentepisode aaargh the selection is quite reasonable for adults and teens less so for younger not extensive but reasonable quality summary a very enjoyable experience ive already booked jal pe for sydnrtbos and return later this year

we had a good experience in the air france lounge at cdg with good quality food and beverage my husband had a nice shower prior boarding to freshen up after the ordeal of returning the car hire btw please check the exact return location at cdg before driving there as its in terminal and all international flights depart from terminal which requires a train transfer an interesting observation of the flight was that all cabin crew were female on both legs they were very polite sweet and carried out their duties with charm and grace ive fallen in love with the dreamliner the first time i flew them on royal brunei a few years ago the seats are so spacious and takes up the length of windows the monitor is large and the noise cancelling headphones are effective the entertainment options were somewhat quite poor comparing to what qantas and cathay pacific offer the pa also is another area where they can improve on im used to listening to qantas cx etc cockpit crew more comprehensive announcement and to struggle to hear a minimum need to know basis announcement was inadequate for me having said that the food really made up for the shortcomings this was by far the best business class food weve had and we have been flying bc on a few different airlines every year for the past years the japanese menu offer which i took came in a beautifully presented bento box and everything was delicious i would not normally eat twice when i fly but i made an exception for this one after having read the menu i was happy to wake up to the second offering again from the japanese menu we also suffered minimal jet lag coming home and i would attribute that to the dreamliner environment with extra amount of oxygen soft lighting and the light japanese food will look forward to flying them again perhaps on the direct route to and from melbourne

a short and very pleasant trip my wife mother and i travelled from busan to tokyo earlier this year and it was our first flight on jal what a pleasant and easy surprise i must admit that everything from the boarding to the staff and even the fellow passengers were so considerate and helpful my wife was pregnant at the time and everybody made a great fuss over her the meals was basic but palatable the flight was smooth and the landing too just a great overall experience for todays economy options i highly recommend the airline

i have flown with jal a few times now the seats in economy are very roomy and there is plenty leg room and i am a cuddly sort the food is very good and there is plenty of it the flight attendants leave out snacks and juice when they are having rests the entertainment variety is not as good as other carriers but is adequate i watched films on the way out to japan and on the way back i watched films plus some short features about japan i had almost exhausted the film selection by then the flight ran out of diet coke and they only gave a small plastic cup of drink at a time so make sure you take plenty of water on board the crew are very friendly and helpful on board but the bag drop was very slow despite checking in online one of the best airlines i have used but doesnt top or others

my first time taking jal and i loved it i must say that it is the best medium haul economy class experience for me not only are the seats comfy there is much more leg space compared to other airlines i wished they had direct flights to hokkaido instead of connecting flights was a bit of a hasdle having to pick up our luggages clear immigration before heading to the domestic terminal and i wish that the airlines website could be more user friendly the look and feel seems a bit dated for a reputable airline fare was affordable and i managed to get a good price even though i booked my tickets quite last minute no doubt jal is the best economy class airlines

i only have limited time to bag drop and there was no specific counter to bag drop for me running with rushing travelling is really not comfortable connecting flight without check through is the problem due to rushing from international airport to domestic flight i dont even have a meal and the flight only serving the drink without a snack

night flight to tokyo for next morning taking the domestic flight to hokkaido the leg room and space between the seat are big enough the food is ok and miso soup only available from sg to tkyo and not available in return trip the screen is high resolution and big the service is good but not outstanding things as i expected before taking jal

overall experiencejust average check in process was clumsy on line didnt work due to tech issues airport check in was complicated and had to provide ticket number even with confirmed flight i sat on the business seat was comfortable but old side of my seat was taped up very shabby ordered japanese meal even i was on the bulk head and ordered meal early minute later flight attendant told me they ran of japanese meal i guess japanese guests have priority over nonjapanese very discriminatory but not surprising entertainment system is average but big screen wifi connection was good other carriers had better headphones no usb changing option tentative service throughout the flight on demand meal was ok flight crew was friendly but seems very routine and decent selection of drinks i am not sure if i would fly jal again since so many other carriers fly to japan now overall good flight with good service but nothing that stands out against other asian carriers

we travelled direct lhr tokyo haneda with children superb service from the start with excellent food round the clock see below with drinks and snacks and much more as and when required the hr flight felt like a few hours no jet lag both ways excellent cabin crew standards flight smooth no issues with taking off or landing etc excellent entertainment system check in very quick and efficient haneda airport excellent clean and organised would recommend this airline and will use it again before others hope this info is passed on to all staff who work for jal as they should be very proud of the customer service delivered only criticism is the vegetarian food on the return flight and the confusion between what is suitable for vegetarians eg rice crackers h√§agen dazs also the gluten free and vegetarian meals were identical and the puddings were not as nice as the meat meals
flight was delayed and they informed us straight away provided vouchers good boarding schedule very clean aircraft very good entertainment and staff were great food was great will fly with them again

i travel often between usa and the asia region and have had a few opportunities to take flight with jal member of the oneworld alliance i purposely chose jal over other air carriers serving between tokyonarita airport and taipei taoyuan intl airport due to the positive experiences i had onboard its flights from the time i was at the checkin counter to the time i waited at the gate for boarding and the use of its airport lounge i observed that everything was carried out in orderly fashions by its highly trained professional and courteous staff there was hardly any rush or chaotic moments observed at the jal boarding gate area in one occasion i observed in icn seoul the jal staff workers were waiting behind the checkin counter for the clock to strike noon the scheduled time to open immediately after the clock reached they all stood up bowed to the queued passengers first and then started serving them i was very impressed how much staff workers take their jobs seriously my experiences with their services onboard have been extremely pleasant as well for each flight i had taken whether i was sitting in the main cabin or in the business class cabin i was treated like a vip flight attendants always use both hands to offer their service items and then bow and thank you before they move on to their next tasks in some occasions the flight attendants even got down from their standing positions to talk to me while i was sitting for paying attention to the details they kept themselves very busy offered service items and checked frequently for the comforts of each passenger onboard they checked and cleaned up the lavatory after each passenger has used it they folded and shaped beginning roll of toilet paper to pointed down triangle and prepared the facility for the next user the choices of the foods served are always at the high standards and presentations are elegant and artful in my own opinion the levels of the customer services the professionalism and the attention to details by jal are almost flawless there are many ways to run a good business jal certainly knows the most important element is not about how to make profits but rather about how to provide utmost services to the travelers who choose and trust the company tripadvisors reviewers picked jal as the travelers choice award for many good reasons but most of all is its commitment to serve at the highest satisfaction level it has earned customers loyalty and reputations by ways of perfecting its services i salute to jal for earning tripadvisors prestigious award and felt honored to have been served by its flight crew and ground crew several times in the past months

ive travelled this route many times with jal but noticed that the service and hospitality has slipped they now employ thai cabin crew who are not as well trained gracious nor are they as attentive as the japanese many times i wished theyd pick up my meal tray so i could readsleep or just move about they did not make any special arrangements for our child no childs meals were offered you have to prebook them nor was there anything given to the child to make her journey more interesting no colouring book and pencils on this flight our entertainment system didnt work and my husbands tray wouldnt fold away as the flight was full he could not change seats poor maintenance having travelled this route many times ive been looking forward to a menu change its always japanese or western but with very little choice in either style i crave a change nevertheless their flight schedule saved the day ive never known an airline to leave late yet manage to arrive early every time
i have flown japan airlines for more than times and never had a bad experience professional and courteous i would prefer japan airlines every time i fly to south east asia

after flying jal from manila to tokyo then tokyo to dallas the next day all i can say is outstanding coach is as good as first class on some other airlines good food leg room and friendly flight attendants i will always check with jal before choosing a flight again they can be a bit more expensive but it might be is worth it if it isnt too much more

from the preflight bow by the crew before they boarded the plane till the final thank you jal manages to provide a level of service that is incomparable in the contemporary world so many airlines could learn lessons from this organization the level of courtesy professionalism and polish of the cabin crew is simply beyond par

i was very impressed with japan airlines knowing i had at long flight ahead of me i did a lot of research and was very pleased with my choice the counter staff both in the us and japan were extremely courteous and friendly actually i can say that for all the jal staff i encountered at the end of the flight the flightstaff came and thanled each passenger for choosing jal two meals and a handful of snacks were very adequate and filling the meals were served warm and fresh with a good assortment of dishes the flight entertainment system had recently been upgraded a good selection of videos both new and classics games tv radio there was a usb plug for charging and a few pockets to hold charging items the seats were comfortable enough good leg room and cushion

i flew in economy while my wife and young daughter flew in business class the airline staff were not attentive at all as compared to cathay or ba service when my wife asked for milk for our child she was given a quarter cup of milk when she requested more she as it wasnt nearly enough she was told there was a shortage of milk which i found quite unbelievable although the majority of flight attendants were smiling and very helpful the senior attendants noted by their brown jackets seemed jaded and completely disinterested and provided the bare basics when it came to customer service i must add that the check in was smooth and efficient also the boarding procedure was just as smooth and efficient the best part of the experience was the new dream liner its a fine plane and the journey was quick and smooth the return flight was the most disappointing aspect of our three week trip to japan where we had amazng experiences in tokyo kyoto and osaka amazing sights and sounds and great customer service next time we will fly air nippon

this airline is doing so many things right but for someone with a decidedly western palate like myself and my kids the food is just inedible we had an overnight stopover in narita en route to helsinki checkin on both outbound and return flights was very good staff were polite and efficient again on the plane staff very friendly and efficient i do wish they would have considered walking the isles offering coffee more than once on all flights the coffee was almost impossible to getother times it was only offered down one isle and not the other plenty of green tea on all flights though so again i am maybe a bit out of step with expectations as for the food the first regular meal out of australia was ok the others on all the flights were almost impossible to eat my kids have eaten the food on thai but they refused this food they were almost without food for the duration of two hour flight and the same happened on the way back please drop the rice burger it does not even sound like a good idea and surprisethe vegetarian meal was also refused and when i tasted it i must admit it was quite inedibly awful i admit i didnt dare to taste everything on the vegetarian meal because it either looked or smelt foul i tried to pick up some snack for the kids from the free basket they have on offer how wrong can you go with potato chips right well they tasted dried fish entertainment system is reasonable and quite standard better than finnair but not as good as emirates i was once told my a professional in the airline industry to never expect anything from the entertainment system so to plan on something else and to bring my own food best advise ever jal does a good job of getting you from a to b and they have nice staff the overnight stop over worked out well staff ask you at checkin whether you require your bags for the stopover bus transfer is easy to find hotel checkin is quick the only draw back is that all the three restaurants in the marroad hotel have very japanese food surprise and not of the kind easily identifiable by naive westerners it maybe would have been ok if they could explain the menu but as nice and demonstrably helpful as they were they did not speak a word of english between them i was looking for japanese ramennoodlemiso soups japanese rice bowls of some kind gyoza sushi sashimi this left it very hard to satisfy three kids for dinner i did still appreciate the stopover and the chance to sleep in a bed needless to say we skipped breakfast my nerves were just not ready to find out what we would get i would fly jal again but would then take some sandwiches the overnight stopover and the full day return flight stopover makes it worth it japan is really such a nice place with the loveliest most helpful people and they actually have very nice food as long as you can avoid anything that is not to your taste of course the airport has a wonderful free stopover program with guides that will help you our guide really went over and above and made the stopover a really nice experience

i hadnt used jal for years i am star alliance kind of person however there is no ana flight from chitose to hanamaki so no choice they have comfortable leather seats and free inflight movie i actually enjoyed it

this was my second time flying with jal to japan awesome as always arrival time and departure time are super accurate the airliner was great and there was wide leg room even in economy class the seat was comfortable inflight entertainments food and services are great too the domestic flight from handea tokyo to kansia osaka has free wifi the crews are very friendly and they are always ready to help you the price are very reasonable for full services airlines

amazing service at counter at the haneda airport had requested a wheelchair in advance but didnt expect one while just checking insuch fast and courteous service they even upgraded us to their lounge which in haneda is a real treat thank you jal for the amazing service

bottom line this is another example of an airline company caring more about making money than making happyrepeat customers long story short i work in south east asia and travel back and forth from the states often on my last trip back to america my family and i used jal japan airlines for our round trip tickets they seem to have good reviews and ok prices so my family gave them a shot everything went well on the trip to the states but on the return flight we had a family emergency that cause us to move our flight back one month when i called jal to see what the fee would be to move my flight i was told that because of their policy we would be charged almost the same amount as our round trip tickets of course our family didnt have the budget for that so i spent the week on the phone with their slow customer service team after speaking to multiple managers it became clear my bestcheapest option was to cancel our jal tickets and only get our taxes back from the thousands we spent on the round trip i was forced to book new one way tickets for my whole family with a new airline company just to get back to my job i wont be using jal again

it was very pleasure flight with jal new dreamliner with high quality sistems on board such as windows automatic curtains movie ans sound system light control our seats were in economy class but they were as in normal business class wide and comfortable all inside is very clean we had food and beverages on board and always it is possible to ask about drinks or food more if you need service and staff are perfect they helped us with all our questions i was with my son yo and he could choose presents from jal company i recommend jal for everyone

seats were very comfortable almost simple but functional you can lay completely flat for sleeping pillows are very big and comfortable and very nice blankets amenity kit is a case designed by zero hali burton with the basics inside you also get a por of slippers screen is large a good however the movie tv selection was very limited service was very polite and informative menu delicately crafted seafood options were very good vegetarian meal was also great they have a special international coffee program and the wine and liquor selection was outstanding japan airlines in my opinion is still not as good as singapore air or cathay pacific but still better than most other asian airlines and way superior to american airlines

excellent service from checkin to deboarding the cabin crew were not only beautiful but were polite friendly and professional the food was standard fare for an airline seats were comfortable premium economy is equal to what used to be business class foot rests slippers eye masks noise reduction headsets etc makes a hour flight bareable jal does all the little things that add comfort as much as possible food and drink service are almost constant even complementary toothbrushes in the lavatories i will never fly on any international flight that is not an asian carrier

this was a very comfortable flight and the service was very good the flight crew were very attentive and helpful the meal service was good as was the beverage service in flight entertainment was excellent warm towels were a nice touch

just flew in from jfk to nrt on jal i was very impressed with the professional and caring flight attendants the fight was very comfortable in the suites and tge service was great the attendants had a very busy flight and always maintained a comforting smile and a welcoming attitude i highly recommend this airline

we booked coach premium for a little more leg room but we couldnt select seats on outbound until we arrived at the airport this may have been because we booked thru american airlines the alliance partner aa gave us the run around and we couldnt get thru to jal to speak to a person directly and and reserve seats we did both end up with aisle seats which we needed for hour flight but we were in the back of the plane other than that snafu would highly recommend jal the service was great

flew japan airline jal from tokyos haneda airport to kagoshima airport the flight was very clean and looked new as a south african i am so used to getting snacks on board but only juice was offered during the h mins flight the crew were friendly my destination was tanegashima island we connected via japan airline commuter air for a minute flight to tanegashima

being a cm i always have legroom issue and first time traveling on japan airlines i was surprise to experience my knees not touching the back of the seat in front of me service and fb lived up to japanese standard which is always excellent highly appreciated is mini bottled wine which prevent spill having limited space rather than on a cup little wasteage is better than required intensive cleaning plus time constraint on air plane definitely will fly with japan airlines again

the toughest part about the flight was getting seat assignments they dont open up the option until to hours prior to the flight cant remember exact timing my son and i were flying to the usa on american through narita american code shares with jal we got all our seat assignments months in advance when we booked our tickets but jal doesnt allow it they dont have an office in singapore i call their toll free number and told must wait very s onboard it was a great flight and good staff

checkin was a breeze handled very quickly and efficiently they were offering an upgrade from economy to premium economy for an extra a which we took them up on we werent disappointed generous luggage allowance for checked luggage bagssuitcases kilograms each service was great very friendly and professional excellent food drink comfortable and roomy seats noise cancelling headphones a big bonus bathrooms very wellmaintained and clean no request was too little or too great air hostesses walked and checked the aisles and passengers on a regular basis
having flown business class on several airlines jal is a solid choice the service is good and their s are incredibly comfortable the meals are enjoyable and visually appealing

omg friends have told me to pay the extra and fly jal i did and dont regret it at all having flown nearly every major domestic airline i can confidently say that they are all a joke first the food the food they served me in economy is better than first class meals ive had flying domestically the food that was served on jal was tasty and fresh it also looked good which is something that is hard to do second the service attentive and pleasant third the flight attendants were all dressed impeccably and anyone that has flown on international airlines knows what im talking about us airlines cant compare fourth the seats are more comfortable and even have footrests what the heck when was the last time domestic airlines thought about a small thing like that oh i forgot they dont give a crap about their customers because theyve got a captured market fifth no fees yup domestic airlines continue to rip customers off with fees but not jal i think domestic airlines dont charge either for international flights but thats only because they probably wouldnt be able to complete if they did sixth i cant confirm but i swear they handle baggage with care not a single ding on my suitcase seventh cost about the same as it would have cost me to fly to the west coast or vegas id rather go to japan no tipping save food in general cheaper and you wont find crappy food in japan eighth clean the entire plane was clean even the bathrooms this was my first time to japan but not my last ill definitely consider jal again or ana or korean air or pretty much any airline that isnt us based

i fly to japan often and this trip was the roomiest most comfortable and best served of any level of economy it probably helped that it was a a fantastic plane to fly in i was in k first row bulkhead of premium economy the leg room is enormous i could get out without disturbing the aisle passenger plenty of overhead bin space is available this is important when sitting at the bulkhead the seat was wide and comfortable the service was precise polite and attentive what you would expect in japan the food is good and nicely but efficiently presented teas and all other manner of drinks are offered throughout the flight overall a great travel experience and introduction to japan the flight departed almost an hour late due to late arriving plane we ended up landing within minutes of schedule so there effectively was no delay i received an email and message a few hours before the flight informing me of the delay and apologizing when i checked in for the flight entered the sakura lounge to wait was waiting at the gate lounge and upon boarding announcement apologies were given for the late departure once seated the flight attendant addressed me by name to apologize for the delay yes the service is that good

i love this flight the seat and the crew was spotless although i am reviewing based on a business class seat i have tried enough business class seats to know that this was one of the best i have flied on before flying they give you these eye masks and earplugs and they also have slippers on the seats which you can take home leg room perfect it even has a little area off to the end of your foot for those like me who dont want to put their bags on the carry on over head space this plane has a lot of space from little nooks to stick your phone while charging to the little side cabinet youll have where you can stick your bulky headphone case or sleeping masks or whatever it is as long as its within kg youre good food food is good all through out i ate the japanese style and my only problem there is that i did not know that the wrapped cube was my rice i thought it was dessert or something and i was finished with my food before i knew that the wrapped thing was my rice drinks they were very generous with drinks i have been on flights where they dont give you a bottle of water so you dont have to feel bad calling for them whenever youre in the middle of the flight they were abundant with coffee and tea as well staff these ladies were super helpful my uncles cane got stuck under the seat and these ladies were very helpful to the point that they had to remove all of the seats padding just to be able to reach under it restroom toothbrushes and mouthwash i love these since i forget to bring my own when i go to the restroom my only problem flight home from our layover tokyo manila for some reason the air condition was really hot and i mean sweaty hot but overall would recommend again i am reviewing based on business class seats do not take my word if you are flying economy

i have had some very difficult asiaus flights as far as jet lag often taking over two weeks to recover but finally found one that had minimal impact on me jals nonstop flight from tokyo to boston which leaves at p japan time and also lands at p eastern time what solves the problem is the departure and landing times it leaves at p and a good meal is served not too long after takeoff which makes it easy to fall asleep by p or so tokyo time which is a boston time this allows for a good hours of sleep by which time a breakfast meal is served which is around p boston time that leaves just a little more flight time before landing at p in boston this is absolutely perfect as youre then tired by p boston time so that you can go to bed at a regular time though i definitely was a bit tired over the next few days i never had the annoying issue of incessantly waking up at strange times once i was back i highly recommend this flight jal has solved the jet lag problem as far as im concerned

the business class on this flight was fairly empty but with the design of the all isle access cabin full flatbed and kind of suite design one of best business class seats i ever had the service was nice and friendly

this was the st time we use japan airline we were couple one child years old a kind of disappointed there was only one kind of meal which you have no choice st time ever compare to many others airline in our years travel poor meal in order the taste the quality the worst meal ever in the plane of us only eat of the meal we force ourself to eat more as the flight was hours from singapore to tokyo then transit to memanbetsu hokkaido even the snack also no good my son always like snack he dont want to eat the snack after one bite we try to find a restaurant in tokyo when return trip back to singapore as i know that we will get hungry in the plane the smaller blanket ever in the plane which only can cover upper body we try not to take japan airline in future even the service was good but the meal was important for long flight thanks for the vote if you found this helpful d
absolutely without a doubt the best airline to flight to japan super clean cosy great food responsive and attentive flight attendants definitely recommend

it was our first flight on jal for long haul route from los angeles to tokyo check in and boarding were fast and agents were very courteous the cabin was very clean seats were wider than others and leg room was good for my long legs food was decent and the crew offers a lot of drinks during the flight the passengers were very quiet i have never had a flight so quiet all in all it was a great trip definitely will fly with them again
bad mistake by jal staff meant that we had to change to earlier flight to catch connecting flight staff at chitose airport was a helpful but language was a struggle

our first trip to japan to visit our son stationed in yokosuka naval base we tried consistently to find a good fare looking at alot of flights we finally found a decent fare on jal we flew economy over and got the chance to upgrade to premium economy for the return for a minimal charge the flight over was very nice with a fair amount of room for economy the premium was really nice plenty of room and with the reclining seats and leg extension it was really nice the attendants were courteous attentive and very helpful definitely plan to fly with them again

the seats for the flight from singapore to tokyo was hard uncomfortable with limited decline they only serve one meal without any choice the flight from tokyo to new york was much better with soft and bigger seats there were more meal choice on this flight too ive been around and i must applaud japanese for their neat laundry usage and quietness they did the right thing to include lots of travel and food shows introducing their country this is good marketing strategy to entice and educate their foreign passengers

flew with them for ultra long haul route from new york to hong kong via narita check in was smooth with friendly and courteous check in agent boarding process was calm and very orderly our b was almost brand new and immaculate seats were comfy and had lots of leg rooms meals and snacks were pretty decent and crews make water and juice runs every min or so to keep the passengers hydrated all in all excellent trip i think they are almost same level as ana but ana seems to have cabin crews that are a bit more cheery and enthusiastic north american carriers have a lot to learn from these high quality asian airlines

its a relief to be treated courteously and even pampered a little on a long flight the other guys occasionally rise to the occasion but sometimes live up to their what do you want mac hostile reputations never on jal too bad they dont fly everywhere

my flight today took minutes with jal its not just the flight is the greeting at checkin the genuine feel that you are really either the only person on the plane or someone special today was my third jal flight since by far one of the best j class experience hard to beat jal

we flew economy from sydney to tokyo and had quite a pleasant journey it seemed like a new plane and everything was clean and in working order there also seemed to be more than usual leg room the ability to darken the tint of the window rather than having to pull the shade up or down also gave greater options the food was decent

jal dont have their own lounge at heathrow so use british airways which is a fairly standard issue business class lounge so nothing to write home about and a fairly ordinary start to a first class flight if you have one world emerald then id advise using cathay pacific first lounge which is very good and you can get a good sit down meal at boarding was a bit of a scrum with everyone diving at the gate once an announcement was made so no real separation for firstbusiness on board the cabin was very nice and secluded it felt like we were the only ones on the plane which was great and the seat had a phenomenal amount of space service was very attentive throughout however only one of the cabin crew spoke english well enough to understand any questions which caused issues with the food for my wife the bed was very comfortable as was the seat with lots of space and the tv screen was massive despite being quite a way from you the bose full noise cancelling headphones were also excellent the mattress was very comfortable but with the pyjamas made it quite hot as the cabin temperature was high on this flight so i didnt sleep that well due to being uncomfortable food and drinks offering for me were superb and i had the japanese menu which was great as well as a couple of the wines sake and suntory year old which i tried my wife had issues with the food as we had call in advance to book her meal due to dietary requirements which had been noted as the fa came and check with her at the start of the flight about them but not taken into account for example she cant eat fish which they acknowledged but then they brought out the starter of lobster subsequently she didnt each much at all which was a shame they also didnt have any flexibility to find food from another cabin that she could eat so we were disappointed with that part of the service she had the same issues with breakfast i tried the al a carte and had a couple of things which were nice and brought very quickly the attentiveness of the staff is indeed good but their flexibility or ability to deal with anything non standard is not i felt that like other airlines they should have more of the senior staff in this cabin rather than junior member all senior were serving business on our flight the arrival was very good and the flight overall was comfortable and the nice surroundings made the long flight time fly by the pyjamas and amenity set by porsche were very good the snack bar well i say bar every time you got up to get anything from it the attendants dived up and got it for you was good the best bit about the cabin is the exclusive part of it on this flight it had seats full but i felt as if i barely saw another passenger the whole flight it was very quiet and nice and relaxing downside was the food for my wife who had fairly simple not overly fussy dietary requirements which for the cost of the ticket id expect jal to cater for especially as we called in advance to let them know

outstanding customer care polite efficient flight attendants they found out it was our wedding anniversary and came up with a gift in flight we travel a lot and these were the most uncomfortable plane seats of my life cramped my knees touched the seat in front of me i am of average height very narrow seats

one of the most pleasant flights i have ever taken was japan airlines great plane with good seating and the crew was absolutely the nicest and most professional i have had the pleasure to observe best flight ever
amazing experience super good excellent service and very luxurious best business class i have traveled by far

i often dread a longhaul flight in any other class than business but then i traveled to japan with jal i cashed in my avios points to experience the premium economy service to tokyo and the whole experience was just a few minor points off being excellent so ill focus on what those minor points was because everything else really was excellent check in at jfk despite checking in online the check in at jfk seemed a little chaotic with the line snaking all the way back to the entrance when i arrived there was no clear signage or staff on hand to ask for assistance in determining where the bag drop line was so i stood in line for at least minutes before deciding to break out of the line at the risk of losing my place as i was traveling alone to find a member of staff the bag drop line was then pointed out to me it was totally clear the signage had been blocked by fellow passengers standing in orderly single file i guess my first exposure to the japanese queueing my bag was checked in and marked with a priority label the lounges this for me was the big benefit of traveling premium economy with jal you get full access to the lounge air frances lounge at jfk and the jal flagship lounge at narita at narita i took a shower before boarding the hour flight back ny which felt really decadent seat the jal sky premium seat is excellent this is a very well designed product fully adjustable footrest power holder for a full bottle of water great seat slide privacy screen great width and lots of legroom comfortable enough for me to sleep both on the way to and from tokyo and the best thing about it is that the seat in front does not recline into your space i couldnt offer an improvement here service including fb the incabin service was flawless with ample food and beverage being served or being made available throughout the flight all of a very good standard where a minor point gets deducted is in that some passengers with totally western palates may feel as though the options are limited entertainment this was the only average thing about the flight for me and is the only area that i felt was lacking but the plus side was that a lack of great entertainment meant that i had no option but to sleep and sleep in that great seat was easily forthcoming i intend to travel back to japan and this airline will definitely be my first choice for my return trip
everything was just perfectbest flight attendants i have ever seen great food new airplane good entertainment ecc

deciding which airline to take when going to japan or asia jal is the airline of choice yes we are seating coach class but the service tho is excellent or star whatever you ask they will provide it for you and the flight attendants walk the aisles every min to make everyone are comfortable when booking jal flight please make sure its not an american airline codeshare flight please dont fly american the service is not as good as jal american airline flight attendants just plain lazy and not very accommodating to everyone its just my opinion hope this help when deciding airline to fly to asia safe travels

our first time travelling with this airline and it will be my first choice next time we head to japan again long queues at haneda due to many travelers checking in various airlines from one set of counter plane had surprisingly enough leg room for my tall husband and seats were comfortable in flight staff were beautifully groomed friendly and very gracious food was very tasty and had my favourite sake to drink food and drinks kept coming throughout the flight in flight entertainment was great and all inclusive overall this has to be my favourite airline to fly with and would definitely recommend japan airline
jal is one of my top choice airline attendants are attentive and food is good moreover economy seat has more leg space you can check in up to kgs of luggage this time highly recommended

japan airlines has one of the widest seats and longest leg rooms in economy class their economy class may be even better than some premium economy class of other airlines the service was great and really fast the food although not up to par with business class quality made up for it in quantity entree salad rice crackers appetizer fruits ice cream for dessert miso soup their inflight meal was very filling as for entertainment their screens were fairly big and the choices were sufficient for the trip as a bonus japan airlines offers kg baggage allowance vs kg baggage allowance for others overall japan airlines is one of the most comfortable flights and i would highly recommend its economy class for short or even long haul flights

the seats were very comfortable plenty of room to stretch out and places to put things i preordered the japanese meal and it was delicious service was efficient and friendly movie selection was moderate the music selection for a baby boomer s and s fan was awful nothing i could find to listen to

we flew on the first flight of the day to tokyo from manila the staff were very polite and accommodating throughout the flight process and made us feel very welcoming the food was surprisingly good with a good selection of dishes and a welcome break from the usual fare on flights the flight was on time and very smooth throughout definitely on the preferred list of airlines from now on
my friend passed the immigration very smoothly but it took me to get out more than an hour we cannot find any reason to divide us

absolutely fabulous booked business class with my aa miles and the service food flat bed seat and entertainment were one of the best he flight attendants are very friendly and accommodating we also flew economy with jal and the service is excellent

all i can say is wow the ladies are the most amazing ladies you would never know that we were on a hour flight always a smile always helpful and always caring the head stewardess her name began with a t touched my heart she was so kind i can see why the other ladies are good the pilots were smooth flying again if going to japan fly japan air we were returning home from japan on the rd flight jl at pm

i really enjoy going jal now to europe when i was younger i just wanted to get there but now cant wait to get out at narita and sleep in a bed and coming back four hours at the airport is great to get out have a shower and something to eat the staff are always friendly and helpful i had to rearrange my flight dates and it wasnt a problem to do that for me the food is okay normal airline food but got upstairs seating last time which was great

i am frequent flier with history of over a million miles flown jal was excellent i brought along my elderly mother which they accommodated with wheelchair service when we arrived to await the jal check in counter to open the agents and their manager formally greeted the passengers in line announced they were open and thanked us for flying jal with a bow was so humbling and grateful once checked in we were taken to the jal lounge and the lounge was well set up with shower facilities sandwiches pastries soups salad curry rice etc in the back of the lounge they offered asian foods dumplings noodles veggies rice great assortment and choices drinks included juices coffee wine beer soft drinks variety of multiple language newspapers with a nice window view of the airplanes when it was time to depart the jal agent came and drove us on the little golf cart to the gate jal had already reserved special seats in front of gate for wheelchair passengers ive not seen this with other airlines once we preboarded the plane was and spacious offered slippers warm cloth first class kit casual jacket to change into newspapermagazines two meal services snacks movieaudio and headsets when your plane pulls from the gate to takeoff the ground crew are lined up and all bow to the plane and wave choice of western or japanese meals on menu japanese meals were excellent presentation and deliciousmy husband gave the staff several boxes of hawaiian chocolate macadamia candy each of the flight attendants walked over and personally thanked us and in return a gift bag of japanese snacks and personalize written thank you card we were so relaxed and enjoyed our long flight the restroom was spacious and provided toothbrushes and mouth wash jal really know how to provide customer service and we will definitely be flying again

this was a great airline especially if you are travelling to india the service is always so friendly and kind the staff always have a smile of their face and always address to any issues you may have flights from yvr to delhi usually have a overnight stay complimentary from jal i stayed in nikko narita and it was a fairly good hotel with a full breakfast in the morning when we reached delhi we were fresh and werent as tired as we usually are when we take different airlines

japan airlines is professional their employees treat customers with the utmost respect the old mantra the customer is always right rings true with them customer service is excellent from predeparture to inflight service to arrival you even get little house slippers for the long flight food was very good flight attendants very attentive and pleasant

for many years i had heard of japan airlines exemplar service but our experience fell short i would describe the service as inconsistent and the onboard cuisine was average a hour flight should give the flight attendants enough time to offer you more than glass of wine during dinner service we received significantly better service and cuisine on our south african airlines flight from johannesburg to washington dc

my wife and i flew to and from narita airport from jfk recently our carrier japan air was excellent the flight both to and from japan were ontime the air crew were friendly very professional and available throughout our flights even though our flights were long hours each way our time onboard went by rather quickly meals drinks and snacks were provided throughout we were even able to get some sleep each way to ease the jetlag we both experienced the plans were clean and comfortable i would recommend japan air to anyone requiring travel to and from japan

i flew to japan quite often recently and most of the time i flew with japan airline the flight timing is perfect the service is exceptional and the seat is comfortable one of the plus is that there are thai flight attendants on board every time highly recommended

in my opinion the best first class overall checkin and lounge were both wonderful service seat and foodbeverage are all topnotch other than some language barrier flight attendants are extremely friendly and helpful only things that were average would be the inflight entertainment options and sometimes the cabin temperature too warm

clean orderly fast if youre flying for the first time in japan please note that they board the plane very very quickly dont break the rules and come up and board when it is not your time they simply scan bar codes nobody checks your tickets they sit down quickly no fussing minutes to board a big seat plane

jal remain my first choice of airline especially if i travel to japan in flight service is good and food was great recently they also made some some enhancement to their food menu which bring the in flight food to a greater quality the last recent flight i was travelling with my year old son this is my first time travelling with baby with jal everything is good and bassinet is comfy for baby

spacious seat and comfortable enough for flying longhaul superfriendly and agile flight attendants tasty food and beverages clean lavatory various inflight entertainments and newspapers overall service is very good value for money i would definitely recommend jal

extremely clean cabin and free beverages are good jal boeing has perhaps the best available legroom for economy classes and meals were definitely superior over korean air both ground and flight crews were very kind and responsive and landing was one of the smoothest ive experienced seat comfort was actually better in older jal planes where recaro seats were fitted in another drawback jal does not have its own appat least in english and self checkin must be done through jal website only also boarding passes cannot be downloaded to wallet app in iphone
my family and i really had a nice experience flying with jal from jakarta to narita and returned to jakarta on the th day of our holiday trip onboard meals were good accompanied with wine

economy pitch is never great but this was of the inch type so tolerable our check in was quick and some care was taken to meet our requests we managed to have a three to our own flight was on time both ways and food was tolerable only real choice for nonstops and we needed to be in narita for starting our vacation

spur of the moment trip could not have been happier some economy seats were on the upper deck we asked if it was possible to have seats with better legroom they were so accommodating unlike others who fob you off with excuses which turn out to be untrue included was an overnight stop in japan we were able to check in and get our boarding passes at the hotel they gave us snacks to nibble on whilst in the hotel lovely experience this trip was taken in i couldnt put that in below wish they went to more places from australia
very roomy and comfortable inside of cabin very polite hostes meal was excellent i had best flight i ever had

we fly back and forth from san diego to narita once a year as we live there part of the time flying direct from san diego to narita saves us about hours in total as our only other option is to fly via los angeles for anyone who has had the most unpleasant experience of flying via lax you can appreciate why we would not want to do that and put up with the abuse that you experience at that airport rude surly hostile tsa customs and immigration staff there by contrast san diego is a breeze you are treated with respect and courtesy and the time to get through is a quantum less than lax jals food is better than average for an airline and while not as plush as it was a few years back the buffet at narita in the premium section is still good
good service good meal the general one great movie selection with translation to different languages was no wifi on this plane very comfortable time pm the seats are just ok

i had the chance to fly with japan airlines last april and i would say it has been one of my best economy class experiences ever first of all i dont think i ever saw of one the cabin crew members without a smile they were amazingly nice during the whole flight the cabin was clean the legroom was larger than what you can usually find and the on board meals were very good they even offered miso soup before every mealtime i would definitely fly with them again

we had wonderful flights back from bangkok to toronto with japan airlines all their seats have really great legroom the plane was not too cold and all our electronics worked tv sound etc the bathrooms were all kept clean and they took our trash regularly the staff were all very polite and was able to speak english and japanese perfectly food on this airline was amazing compared to north american airlines that weve traveled with there was enough of each option for everyone and the food was delicious thank you for a lovely experience jal

even in economy class service is just fantastic attendants work nonstop offering beverages snacks etc and are extremely pleasant plane is immaculate with surprisingly a lot of space for economy class decent international movie selection overall a wonderful experience for a very interesting price american carriers should send mystery shoppers to learn

our first time on japan airlines impressive easy and attentive checkin and boarding was fairly organized cabins were clean and kept clean throughout the flight flight attendants were helpful and pleasant seats in premium economy are far better than the same level of service on other airlines with almost pitch instead of a dinner and snack prior to arrival they served two full meals both of which were tasty remember this is airline food at and filling and plenty of alcohol was available we departed on time and landed on time what more could you ask for these days in flight entertainment was meh and the lounge at sfo was less than stellar although the lounge at haneda was excellent would not hesitate to flight japan airlines again

service standards impeccable but the vegetarian food offered was indifferent to put it mildly perhaps the japanese cant understand why anyone except monks would opt for vegetarian food when there are so many western and japanese meat options while the usual business class trappings are amply provided the storage in the window seat is minimal much better in the aisle seat furthermore my entertainment system didnt work

i fly to ho chi minh city for work periodically and the ultimate route is jal and on the way back jal flying premium economy the numbers refer to the loooooooooong flight hours between boston and tokyo premium economy seats are not much more than regular economy if you upgrade at the airport and well worth it though even the economy seats are pretty good since this route uses the gigantic dreamliner planes on this trip you leave boston at about pm eat a big meal a couple of ours after takeoff and either sleep or watch movies or work for the next hours then they feed you again then you land in tokyo a comfortable hour layover and then on to ho chi minh city you land at about pm hcmc time by which time your system is mixed up enough and traveling has been tiring enough that going to bed when you get to your destination is just right jal service is terrific the flight crew is lovely i like the food a lot especially the ice cream the wifi is the best ever i always use it for work and its never failed me totally unlike the lame gogo inflight nonsense on us domestic flights

this was a pleasant surprise as we didnt expect too much from an economy class flight the food was excellent service very pleasant polite frankly we couldnt fault anythingwe took off and arrived exactly as scheduled boardng and seating was smooth and efficient highly recommend this airline

after eating some rice that i was served special vegan meal i noticed it had a chemical like smell taste it was supposed to be plain white rice with a little saffron although it had no hot spices in it my mouth tongue throat started feeling hot i notified the flight attendant about it she suggested that i drink a lot of liquids to flush out what i had been served but the symptoms got worse after they returned my plane ticket which they requested the head of the flight attendant spoke to me i was told to stay after the plane landed they had me talk to a man who took me aside said this could not have happened the man acted arrogant i assured him that this was the last thing i needed or wanted but he just walked away acted like business as usual he said i would hear from them thru email surprise surprise i have not heard a word from them

as i was eating my rice which had no hot pepper for my special vegan meal i noticed a funny smell taste like some chemical disinfectant it was supposed to be plain white rice with supposedly a little saffron even after just a few mouthfuls of just the rice my mouth and tongue and throat started feeling hot and after a few minutes it felt like it was on fire i told the flight attendant after drinking an entire bottle of water when the burning feeling didnt go away she told me that i should keep on drinking liquids to try to flush this out of my systemi could not drink any hot tea because it made my mouth and throat feel worse so i drank another bottle of water my eyes started feeling irritated as well i was told to wait after the plane landed at sfo and a male im assuming a jal employee took me aside as i was walking on the ramp he immediately told me that this incident couldnt have happened but that he would have the rice tested that i would get an email from them i have not heard one word from them i could tell by his attitude that they would just deny what had happened i told the man that i didnt need or want this to happen but he just acted like he really did not care he just walked away acted like business as usual
japan airlines has good service and nice comfort for the business seats offering windows for one seat the food especially the bento box and the mattress you get to sleep on is nice as well

the business sets are arranged in an offset configuration with privacy screens that effectively give you a private suite each seat has access to the aisle so no stepping over people very ingenious layout the service was excellent the food was good and there is an ala carte menu that operates for the whole flight seat turns into a bed and they like air new zealand provide comforter mattresses which when laid on the flat seat make a very comfortable bed as opposed to the gaps and lumps of a flattened seat unlike a lot of airlines united polaris being the most uncomfortable the entertainment content was however somewhat limited a few new movies and not much else though there was an excellent large screen and great noise cancelling phones i will certainly fly them again
