since so many airline reviews are negativeincluding some of my own i wanted to write a positive one for an airline which is exemplary i flew on the dreamliner from yvr to nrt in october roundtrip the sign that jal actually cares about their passengers is they are one of only a handful of airlines that followed the recommended seating arrangement in the plane most airlines greedily have shoved in making the cabin and aisles very cramped with the its really a nice inairplane economy environment especially combined with other dreamliner features my only real complaint with this craft is that the space in front of you was quite small and cramped especially if the person reclined i know jal has retrofit a lot of their planes with a larger economy seat and legroom so look to see if you can snag a route that has it if you fly them this plane wasnt updated just yet at the time so personal space was a bit tight the food was really solid for airline food as they basically prepared you a little bento meal with real silverware and little plastic boxes for each food service was good lots of extra teawatersoup if you wanted throughout the flight anyway if youre going to asia would absolutely recommend jal one of the few airlines left that actually cares about their passengers from top to bottom

i took a flight from hong kong to tokyo everyone i met was very nice everyone was polite everyone was smiling the flight was good seats were roomy and food was good i will try to fly them on longer trips from dallas to tokyo

after arriving at haneda airport last april we cleared customs and immigration and rechecked our bags with jal at the ground floor desk and were directed to another security checkpoint and then down to the ground where we caught an airport shuttle bus to the domestic terminal we then had to get to the farthest gate away from the bus station go figure and the plane to misawa japan eventually arrived and were boarded in less than minutes jal does not fool around when boarding folks everyone gets on and sits down right away with a minimum or folks trying to put bags in the overhead compartments in just a few minutes we were being pushed aaway from the gate and i watched the ground crew stand at attention and salute the pilots then wave at the passengers on the plane wow we were in the air in no time arriving at misawa was fun came in over the ocean to a one gate terminal on the air force base misaawa everyone deplaned in an orderly manner and in just a couple of minutes were were off of the plane talk about efficient our bags came in to the carousel in less than minutes and we were on our way to visit with family returning was even better we checked in at the desk where there were ladies working and our agent was able to give us boarding passes for the next flight but because of an equipment change in tokyo she could not do the boarding passes for that flight we went to the second floor and thru security in a breeze and sat down to wait about minutes later that same desk agent came up to me and said that she could now give us boarding passes for our remaining flights wow she had come upstairs past security to find us at the gate and then took our passports and paperwork with her back down to her desk and returned about minutes later with everything including the boarding passes holy cow thats just amazing we boarded again in less than minutes and as usual everyone sits down right away and buckles up and in no time were being pushed back from the gate again the ground crew stood at attention in the rain i might add and saluted the pilots and waved at the passengers i believe that the employees of jal are really happy people and they must really love their jobs their smiles and attitude is infectious we took off quickly and landed at haneda in tokyo after gathering our bags we took the airport shuttle to the international terminal and had to pass thru security and immigration again and then we sat down to wait for our flight this was a good time to get a bite to eat there were lots of places to get food there the airplane that had been scheduled to fly to la had a problem and they substituted an older model plane and it was just ok but not great every seat had a pillow and a blanket and headphones on it as we boarded this flight was full it was a red eye and i dont sleep on airplanes oh well service was excellent the food seemed to be never ending it was hot and tasty and the beverages free were easy to get when you asked for one there were toothbrushes available in the bathroom in cellophane so you could brush after eating ive never seen that on any other flight ive ever taken and again as usual all of the crew were smiling and seemed to be very happy so other than the less than super airplane on the flight from tokyo to la jal was tops id fly with them again in a heartbeat i actually booked my entire flight thru jal and they code shared with american airlines for portions of it phx to lax and then lax to tokyo and then from san francisco to phoenix everything else was on jal

from the moment we sat down we had been treated like we were in business class staff were very attentive and did their best to make us feel comfortable when my year old son cried due to the air pressure the staff came over couple of times making sure he was alright thank you for that we dont feel neglected moslem food were not that great but it was ok to keep us full

in total we took flights via jal in this trip the planes were all very clean there is always this natural smiles politeness from all the cabin crew food was good too fares reasonable too hallmarks of the beautiful japanese culture we have taken many airlines over the years in our opinion jal is one of the best

japan airlines used to be the first class airline with excellent meal and services but after they restructured they cut the flights and service became the rd class their service is getting worse and worse i would not recommend jal anymore for oneworld alliance i recommend american or cathy unless you take a business class which ok but aacx business are better overall jal needs to improve their profile the above flight was the worst sitting in the noisy cthey should not sell this seat when there are babies on board because both passengers with baby and without are suffering they should use exclusively for passengers with baby i asked purser to change my seat to give more room for baby and peace for me but she refused she doesnt care about the passengers wellbeingit is shame she as a senior crew she doesnt care about the passengers

we flew on japan airlines code shared with american airlaines from bangkok to tokyo in june the airplane was new the services were wonderful the staff were friendly the foods were delicious the entertainment system was excellent

regularly using jal for years and always fully satisfied with quality price and more than anywhere else japanese service since new dreamliner started operations on route moscowtokyo it became even better thanks to moscow office stuff i got connection to flight of another air company in tokyo cathay pacific but jal helped me to chek in luggage to final destination

jals quality of service has never diminished in any way i first flew with jal back in today their service is still exemplary they always go beyond and give that extra mile our flight was only hours but all kinds of drinks were provided food represents what japanese food is all about fas were always courteous and accommodating splendid indeed

it was our first time flying jal and the service was the best weve ever received on any airline the attendants are courteous and professional flights are ontime and the meals and extras are very nice on a long flight they make sure the bathrooms stay clean and fresh they regularly walk up and down the aisle with coffee tea juice or water all of it with a smile we will definitely fly jal again

id already done the hour dallas to narita flight and now was on the six hours narita to suvarnabhumi leg back to thailand i was stiff and my legs and back were aching so as the seat belt sign was off i got up and walked up and down the aisle a few times between all my sleeping fellow travellers a delightful thai flight attendant saw me doing leg stretches and asked me if i wanted a bamboo foot massage i had no idea what this was but went along with it it turned out to be a very simple device a piece of thick bamboo split horizontally to form a flat surface that was placed on the floor the flight attendant told me to step on the rounded surface with my toes then slowly move forward to the balls of my feet the soles then the heels and to keep repeating this for a few minutes holding onto the counter in the galley to steady myself it was amazingly effective almost like having an hourlong thai traditional foot massage many thanks to the thai flight attendant for making my trip so much more comfortable

i have flown jal twice so far on this trip tokyo hnd to nagoya and sapporo cts to tokyo hnd this time i chose j class the aircraft hndngo and ctshnd were impeccably clean the crew were very caring and helpful both flights departed on time and landed and arrived at the terminals on time i did have a choice of airlines on this trip but chose jl because i was curious about their service i was not disappointed well done jl thanks for looking after me

jal has a renovated lounge at bkk airport with much improved menu and it is also more spacious than the old one as always jal flight boarding and inflight services are courteous and customer focused the drinks and food menu is much better than other carriers on this route i am an american airlines executive platinum member however always look forward to flying on jal

this was our first and long overdue really longhaul flight so we wanted to have the best chance for comfort hence we used awards to get two f class seats and we are glad that we did thus our experience is only with the first class experience but we expect to use business class in the future one very special touch was that the flight attendants appeared to clean the restroom after every use in one case one of us went to use the toilet and someone else had just left and a flight attendant hurried over and asked that we wait a moment while she cleaned up needless to say this was the cleanest airline bathroom ever it was probably the cleanest bathroom weve ever encountered in a publicsemipublic space and airline bathroomstoilets are generally not known for their ongoing uh cleanliness as the flight continues yes f class has a lot of advantages but we wouldnt fly f without using awards given the cash price we had read that the shared f lounge at jfk left much to be desired and that was definitely true we havent flown jal outbound from japan we used cx so we cant speak for any f lounge in japan the food was quite good the flight attendants kindly arranged for us to share using the companion seat a noodle tasting with the types of noodles they also spent a bit of time helping to teach dh how to use chopsticks a bit better nice extra the f seatsbeds were great and that was a huge reason we chose f class in an attempt to get some sleep on such a long flight when we were younger we could have slept almost anywhere but no more we flew out of japan via hong kong on cathay as we wanted to compare the two f class products cx definitely has the more comfortable seatsbeds especially with the nice width otherwise both f classes provided a remarkably nice way to travel long haul and without awards the price would have been commensurately high well continue to save our awards for f class

this was a very expensive flight when i got on board i found out why a big plane almost empty of course we were well looked after this was jal after all and there was no real excuse for not doing it well with so few people on board left and arrived on time luggage turned up soon it actually took longer to get to akita airport on the airport bus than to fly to osaka

i took the first flight in the morning because it was the least expensive it still cost an enormous amount of money for a flight that took only about minutes jals service is legendary and on the basis of this flight its reputation is well deserved very pleasant check in smooth boarding nuts and juice elegantly presented not easy on such a small plane luggage deliverdd promptly the pilot woke us to tell us about the mountains we could see below and the flight attendant distributed panoramic views with the mountains named nice touch

flew nrtkul jun on transit from sapporo cts on jl as a frequent traveller this was my first time on japan airlines from the ground staff at the check in counter in cts to the gate managements staff and right through the cabin crew the service was nothing short of excellent they staff and crew member were all courteous polite helpful and so respectful a special mention to the crew of jljun from the moment i stepped in there was not a moment that the crew did not smile every passenger was treated equally regardless of your nationality or class of travel throughout the hour flight the crew were always visible vigilant and ready to attend to your requests the one thing that makes the jl crew stand out from the rest was the fact that their service was genuine and it definitely came from the heart they actually loved doing their job this i must say is a very rare sight on any airline the crew represented their nation their culture and their airline very well it represents a truly warm japanese hospitality the seats on the were comfortable food choice was also far better than any other economy class selection the inflight entertainment was awesome the crew also spoke english well enough for anyone to understand i have no complaints but instead i have nothing but praises for this airline its my first time on jl and will definitely not be my last this airline is highly recommended especially if you are travelling with children and elderly passengers its the small details that makes a huge difference
wow service is so much better than any of the us based airlines kudos jal food was average for an asian based airline
excellent flight and service seats are very nice the staff are the most helpful and friendly of all the aircraft ive been on bonus is that they offer free wifi on their plans too

flying is never exactly a comfortable experience but the jal plane seemed to have a little more space than some other airlines i have flown i think maybe the seats were very slightly wider or perhaps just a better design but very comfortable in any case the service is good and professional and the generous allowance for checked baggage allowed me to bring home plenty of souvenirs in general i find it best to pack light for japan but bring a suitcase to take home your holiday purchases

when booking online site doesnt tellalert you that connecting flight before return to la is to a domestic airport itami instead of international kansai you are responsible for schlepping your baggage and self for the transfer takes hours by bus costs approx yenpp just under we learned of this at checkin in haneda and tried in vain to be flown directly to kansai after minutes of discussion with supervisor of supervisor they finally said we could change to a direct flight to la from haneda at a cost of pp we said no and requested reimbursement of bus transfer costs but they refused will be writing to company if their website had made it clear that we were being sent to a domestic airport and would have to transfer ourselves to international one we wouldnt have booked that flight or that airline has anyone else had this experience with other airlines is this standard practice

to the seasoned traveler this will not be news but to the rookie it could be a life saver from san francisco sfo to tokyo haneda japan air lines jal flies a er that er means there is extra leg room the flight is hours and that extra inches soon becomes a blessing plus they have nice food and stewardess see also jal take it the rugged path on the hit seat popeye needed

i booked this and other legs of my flight to the usa on line many months ago and when i did so i paid extra for seating in the exit rows to give me extra leg room when i arrived at suvanabhumi international airport jal check in the ground crew had no record of me having made this payment and unfortunately i had only bought my eticket with me not the itemized receipt the check in operator refused to do anything about it and said i would have to take the matter up with american airlines which was the coshare ticketing issuer that was a fatuous suggestion at oclock in the morning with all american airlines offices closed for the night however once on board i explained the situation to a flight attendant who quickly fixed the situation and moved me to a vacant exit aisle seat i then sat back and enjoyed my flight from bangkok to narita with the smiling courteous flight attendants service good quality meals and refreshments and good in flight entertainment i am awarding this flight five stars but if it was up to the totally disinterested ground crew member or american airlines itself i would award a big fat zero

i flew from portland oregon to ho chi minh city in may i was on japan airlines for the legs from vancouver ca to narita japan and then on to ho chi minh service on the planes was amazing on the tarmac in narita takeoff was delayed by a thunderstorm the attendants were reassuring and very present in the business cabin reading materials and water was offered to everyone the actual flight was great with wonderful food and comfortable sleeping conditions the problem i had was with gate agents in narita before boarding a gate agent approached me and told me she was checking my bag i only had a small carry on bag my handbag and computer were inside of my carry on i asked her why she was checking my bag she kept asking me if i agreed with her checking it i said i would comply if it was required but i just wanted to know why i looked over at the people lined up in the business class line and they all had between and bags with them yes guy had including a laptop bag portfolio suitcase over the shoulder bag and shopping bag why was i being asked to check another gate agent came over and asked to see my ticket she then told the gate agent who had been trying to check my bag that i was in business class the original agent replied that she had already asked for my bag the other woman walked away so i took my bag laid it on the floor opened it and took out my handbag and medicine she put the checked ticket on the bag and reassured me it would be prioritized to come out first in vietnam she then took the bag away i lined up to get on the plane clutching my med bag and handbag like a character from the beverly hillbillies on the plane business class was less than full i was in a row of seats with only people in the row there were no bags in the bins over my head after i was seated another woman boarded she was in the row behind me and had no bags i asked her about it and she said the gate agents took her bag we were the only women in business class that night i dont know if that was the reason our bags were taken but i did think it when i got to ho chi minh my bag came out last despite the agent telling me it would be priortized to come out first i was thankful that i got my bag and for the wonderful in flight service

we travelled on jal in april from london heathrow to tokyo haneda and back i booked tickets via expedia as there were some problems with the jal website in july we called jal to choose seats and special meals which were all confirmed by telephone and documented by myself i tried to call jal several times before we were due to depart but i could not get through on the phone upon check in at heathrow it became apparent that our seats were not those we had been promised and our special meals had not been prepared we were not pleased with this additional stress on a hour flight the staff member at heathrow was very apologetic and wasnt sure why the problem had occurred in the end our seats travellers were still together so this was not a problem but our meals would be standard which we did not want we were given cash to spend in duty free for meal replacements to take on the plane they were very apologetic about the error the lady who helped us made sure that our meals halal for our return flight were booked correctly boarding was straight forward we could board with priority due to having children with us which helped a lot we were sat in rows and a b and c which were reasonably close to the toilets without being too close that we would be disturbed we also seemed to have an extra overhead storage compartment due to the way the seats were in that section of cabin leg room is generous in economy class on jal with their sky wider seats i am so was comfortable with leg room the seats are reasonably comfortable perhaps slightly on the hard side for a hour flight entertainment selection was very good in terms of international films and language options meals were served in good portions in my opinion plus i had the benefit of eating my childrens left overs haha on the way out luckily the regular meals had a fish option that we could eat which was very fortunate as i was not looking forward to cold sandwiches the whole flight we packed plenty of snacks too so we didnt ever feel too hungry i found it very hard to sleep on the flight as i simply couldnt get comfortable with having little legs strewn across my lap and not wanting to move for fear of waking the little one all our fellow passengers were well mannered and there were no disruptions upon arriving at haneda we were greeted by a member of staff with my husbands name on a placard she wanted to apologise for the problems with our meals we thought this was a wonderful touch from jal and it was much appreciated the return flight was pretty much the same as the journey out except this time we had our halal meals as promised we would certainly fly with jal again

i went to tokyo japan for a short vacation from april may japan is the best country ive ever been so far their food is fresh and delicious and the people are very disciplined and organized i like the cleanliness of their public toilet but of course jal is the best airline so far when it comes of their amenities and service thank you to okuda ayaka shes very nice and helpful during i dropped off my luggage going back to manila

as always jal never ceased to amaze me their crew at the airport is always friendly polite and helpful the onflight staff is even more amazing throughout the flight they offered water tea and juices to keep us travelers hydrated there were snacks and drinks available for your choosing by the flight attendant station which my children loved and i appreciated greatly if you have young children i highly recommend contacting jal prior to your flight to request childrens meals because they were pretty amazing my yo loved all her food as it was presented beautifully there was so much food she gave her food to her yo brother who preferred the childrens meals go figure our meals were not first class but it was delicious nonetheless and there was a lot of food i was actually surprised to see there was a good amount of leg room in the economy cabin we love to fly jal and we will continue to fly jal
as per usual had an excellent experience start to finish great checkin left on time plenty of room excellent entertainment and food and superb service cannot recommend enough

i visited japan in march flying japan airlines in premium economy class i traveled in a boeing on the way to japan and left that country on bord of a jal i have tried premium economy class of other airlines but the product offered by japan airlines in this class was beyond comparison so good the personal space in both aircrafts was excelent the features of the seats and the seize of the in seat monitor really good food was delicious and many snacks served aditionally to the main meals the attention of the flight attendants reflecting the unique japaneses philosophy of service towards the clients you get even access to the japan airlines business class lounges in japan flying in premium economy class i would fly jal again for sure as the pricequality relation is absolutly worth flying in premium economy

traveled with my husband and year old kid from mnl to calgary it was my sons first long haul flight and i was prepared for the worse luckily he slept almost throughout the trip they had give aways for the kids to keep them entertained my son got the utensils case and a jal toy the only downside was that my son was not fond of the food that they served he just ate bread with butter and the ice cream that was served as dessert good thing that i didnt choose a direct flight knowing that my son might get bored in the plane during our lay over that was the time that he ate what i loved about their service was how concerned the flight attendants were when they see that my son wouldnt eat they would always check on him our plane from mnl to jap had a bigger leg room which unfortunately wasnt the same from jap to can going back we were lucky that we were seated right behind the business class area since it had a bigger legroom i also noticed that their lavatories i forgot what route it was were more spacious
my husband and i went to japan last year for a week and loved the experience japan is a great place to go and we chose a japanese airline really recommended

i flew on boeing for the first time i had requested seat b but c was allocated for me as i bought this ticket as a qantas frequent flyer as it was right behind the kitchen it was quite noisy they didnt provide a glass of drink before taking off and no bottled water was given to us so i asked my small bottle from qantas to be refilled japanese flight attendants were very polite and cordial but i wasnt sure about their safety standard it was very bumpy between beijing and tokyo but the seatbelt sign was not on and flight attendants kept on serving qantas would have stopped im sure when taking off and landing some of the chinese passengers took off their seat belts and moving around but there was no warning announcement

first time on jal i was on a late flight past midnight but was hungry since dinner was some time ago but there was not meal service as i think the airline feels that everyone would want to sleep at such a time ok i tried to sleep toodrinks were served on a tray before they turn the lights off come time for breakfast it was dismalthere was no choice you either take the rice breakfast or nothing at alli was looking forward to a good japanese breakfast but the food is just not good as i was famished by that time i ate everything except for the products the cabin crew were very accommodating and service comes with a smile my return trip was much better there was meal choices and food tasted much better i would say it is probably the catering services in singapore that contributed to the bad breakfast in both cases jl and jl the flights were delayed jl was delayed because the incoming flight was late in arriving the return flight jl was delayed initially by an entertainment system issue we waited mins then it got further delayed with some other technical issue another mins wait finally got to board and was then informed that there is some other issuesso we waited on board for another odd minsand was informed that now they need to replace some partsonly took off hours lateri am surprised that most people were quiet and took the delay in quite well we all just watched movies or slept while we waited it out not too great an experience for a first with jal

i received a free upgrade to business class it was really nice the seat is comfy i recommend ordering the japanese meals the bed is an angledflat bed but i was still able to sleep the tv programs are limited though for english speakers i recommend bringing an ipad with your own movies

the smiles on the faces of the flight attendants cannot hide the contempt they have for their customers id rather just be treated badly than to have someone fake like they care about my comfort during the meal service i was giving the wrong meal i pointed this out to my flight attendant seat k she smiled at me walked away and never came back to correct the situation upon collecting the meal you think she would have inquired as to why i had not touched it nope she took my plate and walked away yes i know im one passenger in a full plane and in economy class no less even still this one employee of jal made my entire flight a miserable situation more than likely i will never fly jal again service your customers with a smile and just an once of compassion

in typical japanese fashion the service and interaction with all jal employees was without flaw the flights to and from tokyo departed ontime the flight arriving in nrt was deplaned onto the tarmac which is a rare these days and a bit of a pleasure for those that enjoy aircraft as i do the only complaints that i really have with this trip is the comfort of the seat while the legroom is great the actual seat is a human rights violation in terms of comfort and the crew kept the cabin temperature far too hot if you are a little cold you can put on clothing or use a blanket but if you are too hot there is no escape and it was miserable all of the people in our group had the same gripes one other small complaint was that they served soup for breakfast i actually found it odd but tasty but the other couple didnt care for it and lastly departing from terminal that jal uses at narita is not nearly as nice as terminal which offers much better and more choices for shopping and eating and the observation deck is also much more enjoyable on that side

great simple check in no hassles about cabin bags when they xray your bag before checking in security check staff will help with lifting on and off planes clean and comfortable and both boarding and getting off are super fast wonderful polite and helpful staff and even the ground crews bow when you depart and arrive good manner still exist here one of the last places on earth jal leave on time tell you how long to departure and are very clear about boarding procedures all too often a sharp contrast to australian airlines one of my favourite airlines

jal leaves nothing to be desired they have covered every inch to enjoy a long flight my husband and i live in the us and visited japan for my husbands first time the trip was very enjoyable and a large part was due to the wonderful treatment from jal they have slipperseye maskstoothbrushesblanketspillowsgamingdelicious foodeye refreshenerhot towelsalcoholhot tea and on and on and on the attendants are top notch and very helpful in every way the plane is so very clean there is a plethora of showsmoviesgames and etc to view while on a long flight the lounges are fantastic as well filled with delicious food drinks and alcohol they were so great with our luggage the restrooms were always clean the staff for jal is so helpful that even when they are not on the plane they assisted us it is completely service oriented any chance i get i will take jal and i will certainly recommend jal to anyone

very happy to recommend jal in view of our current flight from sydney to narita the version of we flew on had a seating configuration which seems to give heaps more room than the configuration the food was good if a little too much too regularly staff were friendly helpful and attentive and the new touch screen entertainment system is great although some newer movies would be nice maybe new releases

you can expect good swervice on jal and this flight was no exception the aircraft was a new boeing so it was as comfortable as they getthe food service fro and tow sydney is not up to the standard you can expect if you are flying from narita to europe or the us where competition is tougher qantas does not better and perhaps worse and this is something jal might look at overall a good flight

flew jal return sydnrt for the first time last week great experience yes website etc is a little outdated but service onboard was amazing i had over and return both had the roomiest economy seat i have ever sat in so relaxing cabins very clean and bathrooms cleaned regularly by crew food was good and service was very attentive it seemed like the crew genuinely wanted to be there always smiling etc neither flight was full and crew were attentively moving passengers once boarded to ensure everyone had a spare seat next to them that wanted very thoughtful

this is our third time we have travelled japan airlines because their service is consistently excellent the cabin crew offer every comfort consistently looking to make your trip a great experience and the selection of food is wonderful i think the highlight of travelling with japanese airlines is their staff they are they epitome of wonderful japanese hospitality and service

could not have asked for more us airlines need to learn from their foreign competition on how to treat their passengers jals excellent service started before we even boarded the flight premium economy passengers have access to one of their lounges nice touch on board the service was nonstop and attentive the seats were comfortable and the selection of amenities extensive food was excellent with numerous choices well prepared and nicely presented a delightful treat was their udon in the sky the best tasting cup of udon on the market just prior to landing each of the flight attendants assigned to our area came by and personally thanked each of us for flying jal a real thank you
i had a remarkable experience with the airline both ground and cabin crew are hospitable transit in narita was smooth would highly recommend jal for a smooth travel experience

the seats are ancient degree uncomfortable worn out to the point you can feel where the previous passengers cheeks wore out the seat and impossible in which to sleep jal is woefully behind in its business class seating on this route and should not be able to charge business class prices for this seat it should be premium economy
my first flight with jal was a very nice experience plenty of room even in the economy class excellent service and very attentive personnel

i usually fly ba first but i thought i would give jal first class a try because the japanese normally do things particularly well the jal cabin is a pleasant enough place to be although im not overly keen on their frequent use of brown for the decor its not an offensive colour but it does make the cabin look a tad dated i didnt find the seat anything like as comfortable as bas equivalent which i find to be one of the best its not awful but i found towards the end of the flight it felt a little firm im also not a fan of the vinyl material they use for the seat covering dont get me wrong i wouldnt have liked to see leather seats but i think a fabric covered seat is better for a long flight thes a lot of space around the seat and loads of cubby holes to keep your stuff in they also give you very nice amenities which are much better than on other airlines additionally you can relax in a the porsche design pjs they give you sleep comfort was good and the cabin temperature was ok but perhaps verging on the side of being too warm a choice of mattress topper is offered firm or soft which is a nice touch although i found the pillows to be much too soft food was average wine excellent im vegan so im used to being disappointed by airline food and this was no different i dont know why the fancy chefs these airlines hire for their premium cabins cant come up with some more creative vegan offerings best part was the service which was simply outstanding the crew were very friendly always immediately on hand to helpthey really couldnt do enough and anticipated my every whim i think it was probably the best service ive experienced in the air rivalling even cx who i rate pretty highly overall a very pleasant flight if the seat was a little better it would be up there with the very best
it was my first time flying with japan airlines the service is really very attentive and the plane is really very clean us carriers have a lot to learn

super flight and lovely staff food was fantastic entertainment was better than i expected it to be a really great start to our holiday in japan i would absolutely book again and recommend this airline our flight home was with ba which was poor in comparison

we booked jal flight to japan and we flew in to osaka and depart from narita airport the flight was in the wee hours and transit at haneda airport the legroom is spacious and comfortable service crew are friendly and the food is superb from singapore to japan it served miso soup which was surprisingly good the not so good was there were no announcement when we boarded the plane and just switched off the lights assuming passengers will be sleeping due to the timing am flight the inflight entertainment was not working for few hours and only got it rectified when we were waken up for breakfast improvement needed in the communication so that passengers are aware of whats going on overall not bad experience and will list them in my preferred airlines record

i have maybe flights with different airlines but never i got such a fantastic service the crew is so polite and so friendly they always check if everything is ok and dont just lazy around food was excellent i dont remember having icecream with any other company baggage delivery was quick boarding excellent

my wife i flew from honolulu hi to nagoya japan this was our first time flying with jal we found the service excellentthe ticketing agents were very professional and went out of their way to help travelers the stewardess on board our flight were very friendly all of them had a smile on their facesthe food service was excellentwe flew economy but the leg space on our plane was great lots of amenities on board personal slippers for your comfort free movies with free head sets free snacks drinks including wine or sake for dinner love it

we flew round trip from sfo to hnd then to tsa to visit tokyo and taipei weve been to these cities many times this is the first time we flew with jal and we certainly were not disappointed as with many of the asian airlines you will feel that you are really welcomed by all of the airline staff unlink the united airlines which makes you feel that they are doing you a big favor the seats in the economy section are very comfortable and have plenty of legroom a large tv screen in the seat back offers many entertainment choices including recent hollywood movies etc the food was delicious too although i feel they couldve put less rice and more food in the main dish but i understand that rice is the main dish for japanese so thats how it goes the restrooms are kept very clean throughout the flight they also provide disposable tooth brush for you convenience i think on jal flights most of the passengers are japanese and they tend to be more polite and quieter so you will enjoy the flights even better i will definitely fly jal again

excellent service i bought roundtrip tix cgknaritacgk is totally worth it but music collection from ife not good enough meal from narita to cgk is one of the best but not from cgk narita is little bit tasteless seafood fried rice

we had one passenger traveling with us that required a wheelchair at every layover a jal representative was at the gate ready to transfer my mom between the gates or terminals everyone was courteous and helpful one customer representative even pushed my mom from haneda international to the domestic terminal wow i was expecting him to say this is where you catch the bus to the other terminal he brought us to the domestic jal smile service center who then took over dont expect the rude treatment of delta airlines toward passengers on this carrier not expecting they would drag people of the plane here ever quite the opposite we also had a child with us and had requested a kids meal for the flight this was honored without even having to ask the attendants as we boarded the attendants had my sons information and had confirmed the request he was served his meal before the general distribution really helpful when traveling with a young child the adult meals served were good had a selection of two meat options bonus was the haggen dazs ice cream served after one of meals passengers are able to go to the mid or rear of plane to get snacks if the choose assortment of chocolate cookies and crackers available entertainment available on the flight was great a great mix of current and relatively recent movies also had option to customize audio monitor flight plan maps play games and purchase merchandise restroom facilities were clean assuming the attendants perform a sweep through every so often as the toilet rolls were always full and folded in a point also didnt smell bad from over usage with a hour flight the planes arrived and left on time throughout our various legs to final destination now im spoilt and will be expecting this level of service from us carriers

cant imagine jal can have a very good leg room on the plane and with very good and advanced technology entertainment system thats is really impress me that jal provide a nice plane for passengers service is really good and fast food is good also overall is stars in stead of stars

jal provides a good customer experience flying directly to haneda from sfo be sure to check into your flight at the first available time otherwise you might not get seats where you want thankfully when checking our baggage in the clerk was able to get my wife and i two seats together staff was attentive and friendly food was good in flight entertainment had lots of movies available in english

pros leg room is good enough flight attendant are corteous inflight movie is updated the st class and business class looks good cons we travel during th spring time and i understand that the weather outside is rather cold so they use the heater but heater for the whole hrs travel was uncomfortable i had to fan myself and it was hard to sleep when its too warm probably use heater on the first few minutes but do cool down the temperature after i had a migraine after my ride

disappointed that japan airlines has not responded after weeks of management is researching the simple facts my original post can be seen one wek ago here on atravel advisor hmm they would not sell me an available seat in business clas after requesting this at the time of reservation then check in then at the gate and on the plane when i found an available business class seat i have given them till noon cebu city time on may st to respond notification was to customer service by phone last week and here onfb linkedin and travel advisor that if i dont get a response in this reasonable amount of time i will be taking further legal action why dont they just take care of this so i can close this chapter and move forward hmm

very desapointed with my first flight on jal i have booked a flight from nagoya to helsinki for my family on jalpeoples i was not able to registered online i arrived at the airport more than two hours between take off at the moment to registered the steward told us that it is not possible to have seat nearb but it will tried to solve this he said the flight is full he couldnt and he propose an other solution where seat are not a nearby at all we noticed that the seats are at the middle of the plane instead in the first rank when we arrived in the plane we observed that there first places which were planed where much more comfortable that the places we have more space and when you are tall as im its important if the steward told us that we will have choose the more solutions the same we have on the flight from helsinki to nagoya overbooking so we are very desapointed with the first experience with jal and no email to contact

cant say enough good about the entire experience on jal nozomi bullet train drops you off a terminal for easy access to jal checkin was efficient easy and staff were very polite the sakura cherry blossom lounge for premium economy was delightful with full salad bar and delicious main courses plus desserts and free wines and a full array of adult beverages airplane seats were spacious and offered many sleeping comforts food on board was excellent they provided headphones that actually allowed you to hear the inflight entertainment but most terrific part of this flight was the amazing courteousness of the flight crew couldnt have acted more pleasantly or been more friendly or more helpful

top service standard crew was very friendly and professional and very helpful seats were spacious and comfortable with good legroom food was lovely and delicious and very well laid out and plated checkin was very warm and friendly and boarding was done japanese style with great precision using announcements to board in groups by seat rows punctuality was tops my favourite airline

as typical of japanese service checkin and boarding was efficient and courteous the skywider seats in economy were the best of any airline i have ever experienced with more leg room than needed and a wider seat also loved the folding headrests to nestle my head with neckstyled pillow although i used the pillow and blanket as lumbar and bottom rests as the seats can be deemed a bit thin on cushioning after plus hours the inflight entertainment was on one largest screens i have ever experienced including premium economy on other airlines with a nice selection of movies from hollywood and beyond meal service was pleasant with a snack of rice crackers and drink of your choice of beverage sodas juices beer and liquor dinner was served about hours into the flight with choice of fish or chicken minimally westernized japanese entrees it came with sides of a soba salad seaweed salad and a fruit mix all very high quality and crafted with care unlike those of american based airlines this was on par with meals of ba and af from europe choice of beverage including wine was served with dinner as usual with transpacific asian airlines haagen daz was provided shortly after dinner after lights out was self serve snacks and drinks by the galley this included juiceswater various crackers cookies chocolates and candies toothbrushes are available in the restrooms midway through the flight for those wanting to freshen up before breakfast the last meal consisted of a warm pasta salad yogurt and fruit overall the flight was very well serviced including flight attendants walking throughout the duration of the flight checking on any customer needs what happened next was extraordinary and confirmed what i believe to be outstanding of japanese serviceculture while deplaning in hnd we had left a small cloth satchel containing cosmetics chocolate and a toothbrush we did not realize this until we were settled in our hotel a few hours later we naturally assumed it would be disposed of along with all the other things that people leave on board airplanes so they could get it turned around for the next flight fast forward days during our checkin from hnd sfo after we were handed our boarding passes we asked by chance if they found our satchel on the plane from a flight a week ago after a brief description and confirmation of our previous flight information the agent said someone would be out with it in minutes wow and in minutes while waiting i walked by the money changer and notice a jal employee burst our a door running by with the satchel we misplaced earlier much to my wifes delight she go her bag back this is very japanese where honor and customer service are of the upmost importance executed with respect efficiency and grace domo arigatou gozaimasu

from my facebook post poor customer service alert on japan airlines jal i tried to buy this seat times during reservation at check in and on the plane and was told it was not available on the plane it clearly is available and with my back injury demonstrated to the flight crew with photographs and my obviously swollen feet was told so sorry by chief cabin attendant kyoko ono after my offer to purchase this on the plane not sure is this is stupidity racism japans history or insensitivity to handicapped people i have requested a call from their management twice now and have got nothing back so far if not today this gets posted in my linkedin profile with ove contacts that travel extensivelygood service from jal over the years are erased by this blunder his flight commemorated my th miles actually flown for business on their partner american airlines this is a good chunk of my actual flown miles with various carriers over my year career span still awaiting a call from jal or american airlines its now been over weeks and im still waiting to hear back from jal management yesterday i sent a message to management through their customer service contacts very weak trained that said i must wait without any commitment on a due date for their response this is to be considered my official notice that the due date is may st aka mayday universalr term for distress by noon cebu city philippines time or before for appropriate apologies and financial consideration if someone has contact info on the firm handling the united airlines fiasco please share this in case i need to take action i sincerely do not want to take my preference is to update and remove my facebook post yet they drag their feet and show further disrespect towards white people and handicapped americansthis will now go on linkedin with the same sincere request for professional resolution all the best dave kilian

the service standard was high in japan similarly compared to the airlines in many other countries japan airlines is a lot better the seats were comfortable the leg space was the most generous among all the airlines i have flown the service was amazing the flight attendants were very friendly and always smiling they remember the simple requests the meal was much better than most of other airlines in terms of both the portion and the taste there was also japanese beer sake and plum wine to choose from on top of regular drinks i strongly recommend jal

quite possibly as good as it gets in economy class all of the flight attendants were polite and provided great service the seat itself was great for economy class because jal only has seats across on the each seat was a nice inches wide with inches of pitch compare that to the inch wide seats on the same plane on american airlines with only inches of pitch the food was also very tasty and dessert was haagen dazs ice cream in terms of inflight entertainment each economy seat had a pretty big screen on the back of the seat containing a good selection of movies and tv shows in both japanese and english there probably could have been more hollywood blockbusters included by thats just nitpicking on details overall it was a great flight

we flew from dub to tokyo via helsinki and on the way back flew from osaka itami to dublin via hnd i thought that the transfers would be complicated in helsinki and tokyo but they were seamless the worst was heathrow so poor in regards to the service and their standards i cannot fault japan airlines they made our honeymoon special and made us feel like family they know how to be a full service airline and they are proud of their job fantastic all around and i can verify that they are one of the best in the world thank you jal

just experienced jal after a lapse of many years had to go to osaka to via haneda the transit experiences were efficient but lacked the expectations transit information english was incorrect suspect the company never reviewed the english version i thought the planes were old the entertainment panel and the programmes were behind the the newer competitors fundamentally old another old positive is the japanese service which was good but the linguistic skill of the announcers were similarly like before english pronunciation remains old japanese standard but this is throughout japan standard of spoken english remains archaic one great positive was the breakfast hours before landing at changi it was superb the plane landed at am minutes behind the schedule the pilot apologised what great courtesy thats japanese these make me going back there imagine when the japan tourist board wakes up
i fly jal every months they are my first choice wish they did hnl to bkk highly recommended they go out of there waywith classic japanese stylegreat serviceand amazing fooddrinks very comfortable

i flew with a of people to japan and without a doubt the flight to tokyo and the return flight was one of the best air travel experiences of our lives for me personally i can confidently state that this was the best flying experience in coach class i have ever had and i have flown a lot including many international trips the seats are compared to for domestic flights wide and have an extra of legroom due to increase pitch and a slimmer seat design one of the things which stands out is that when we were about to land in tokyo the flight attendants took the time to walk through the entire aircraft look each and every passenger in the eye and personally thank us individually for flying with them
excellent food comfy seats free wine excellent inflight entertainment with lots of choices of new movies easy checkin and efficient and friendly flight staff

best airline experience ive ever had the seats are very comfortable if you arent able to upgrade to business class with mileage we werent i highly suggest premium economy we found out about it for our return flight and the seats were roomier and the foot position was movable up and down very important on a hour flight the food is also terrific by far the best coach food ive ever had an extremely pleasant staff

superb customer service polite gracious and friendly fas excellent meals a choice of japanese and western food i opted for japanese cuisine which was sublime the passengers were predominately japanese who exhibited utmost respect for fellow passangers by not reclining the seat and the toilets remained clean from takeoff to landing the flight with jal set the tone for my holiday as it was a wonderful relaxing experience i highly recommend this airline to everyone

flown with jal many times japan hospitality is the best compared to australian airlines on top of great service you can check in twice as much as most airlines at narita airport i had a connecting flight to osaka however the staff realised for me that i actually needed to be at haneda airport quite a shock for me but the check in lady took me to the correct bus counter in the airport to get to haneda she even knew when the bus was leaving good luck getting that service from australian airlines small tip if you plan to buy a data sim card in japan for your photo you can do buy it from the flight attendants during your flight check the onflight shopping section on the entertainment system its cheaper than buying at the airport flying domestic from tokyo to osaka is also a pleasure i was really worried i might miss my flight as i had to bus it between the two tokyo airports but in japan you can check in with less than minutes from flight departure again good luck checking in on an aussie airline with less than minutes before the flight if you are flying to japan jal should be your top choice
flew jal home from thailand it was a wonderful flight including having to be bused from narita to haneda staff were exceedingly nice and made the flight ever so enjoyable
best flying experience ive had we flew economy and the seats were very comfortable and we did have good leg space the crew was so nice and attentive to our comfort the food was super good

on mar th i took flt out of ohare on apr th i took flt back from narita airport impressive the economy seats cloth comfortable nice tv with new cleaned headphones the selections were very good for everything except music choices bathrooms seemed very clean as well as the entire plane above average food with nice hot wash clothes offered a couple times ea flight blankets and pillows for everyone even in economy very friendly always smiling flight attendants very patient and diligent workers at counters and baggage areas i am a first time flyer on a foreign airline it beat every domestic airline i have been on in the us i see they made the top ten airlines in the world on tripadvisor after my flight i did not see ana like i read other reviews for i did like row in front of the bathrooms behind us was a crew storage i believe i could put my seat back without feeling offensive no extra noise or smell it fact most foreign travelers did not get up but usually once on the hour flight i got up or times im not a well sitting person smooth flight and landings were without any bump on the runway that impressed me i liked the crew before boarding looking at the travelers and bowing and smiling at them then turning to man the aircraft i felt comfortable as i am usually stressed before any flight anywhere i would recommend this airline to a friend and take it again myself

this was the second leg of a flight from lax to singapore a code share united flight i boarded in narita and thought i might want to sleep part of this leg as i was exhausted but id see how the flight went i generally wouldnt have but the first leg of the flight from lax to nrt was brutal in business class but the seats in front of me had passengers who insisted on talking to each other across the aisle the person behind me insisted on using my backrest as a leaning device every time he got up and there was a screaming child three rows over i couldnt sleep but a half hour all the way across the pacific i wasnt sure i wanted a middle seat on this flight but i was assured i was the only one in the middle seat when i boarded the plane and saw that seat oh my little tables on both sides of me the lay flat seat in the middle fully featured set up in front of me power outlet pull out drawers and ledges screen etc i settled in and i think i was asleep before we were even minutes into the flight i missed meal service but didnt really miss it i think i woke up once and headed to the lavatory and when i got back to my seat the flight angels had fluffed my pillow reset my duvet rearranged my slippers and vanished i never heard a single sound the entire flight but the light whisper of the flight attendants skirts and they whisked past down the aisle the other passengers the most polite passengers ive ever seen on any flight anywhere and remember this was just coming off of a flight with some of the loudest and rudest passengers so oh my gosh heaven a full seven hours of utter silence i didnt even really know there was anyone there unless i pulled a gopher and popped my head up over my little seating area absolutely the best service anywhere bottles of water were replaced before they were empty and i had two bottles put into my hands before i left the plane most polite flight attendants anywhere and the bit of food i ate was truly lovely i felt like i was in first class i think the only thing missing was a shower and bathrobe
seats are nice with noticeably more room than any american airline service was excellent entertainment was first class i will fly with them every chance that i get

superb customer service fas are friendly in flight meal is okay with in flight entertainment and can charge phone but why is the doraemon movie has no english subtitle overall had a good flight experience
food is great they serve some traditional japanese food and western food the flight is on time and smooth

this flight was full and left on time and arrived on time the aircraft was a new boering with the benefits that aircraft supplies food service was good and better than mostthe staff were as usual friendly and courteous they do need to do a better job in providing customers with arrival documents as none were supplied baggage collection in narita is always fast

its my second time to fly japan airlines on business class the flight is very nice and very smooth we had a comfortable and fussfree flight on both ways what i like the flatbed seats in business class is superb plus the pillow is very comfortable nice and smooth plane ride flight attendants are very nice and accommodating entertainment selections are good movies are current the sakura business lounge in narita is superb they have a relaxation room where you can get free massages food selection needs improvement though what i dont like the headsets are stored in a tacky plastic bag the menu can be improved they are good but i had better business class food selections in the past inflight wifi was wonky on our flight back

i have flown with jal twice to go to japan the cost is comparable to other direct flights the in flight service is amazing i have flown many north american airlines and there is no airline that even comes close to jal my next trip to japan will definitely be with japan airlines without a doubt
the service of jal is star it had the best food including japanese noodles yummy fruits etc the lavatories are clean crew are very professional if you are a oneword frequent flyer it is star

i was really surprised to find that the economy class seat of jal is spacious with enough leg room the vegetarian meal was also a surprise and the haagendazs ice cream was just wow the cabin was quiet and i really appreciate the plug where i could charge my phone to get me ready upon landing
took jal business class round trip from vancouver to hong kong and have to say the service was amazing jal has us based airlines beat on service it is a shame that they dont fly from the us to europe

i flew from copenhagen to tokyo for a meeting with jal however from copenhagen to paris was flown by air france under code share the flight from paris to tokyo was the best for me have been flying since the warm towel provided on board is fantastic that is only provided in business class on other airlines food and drinks quality is great i would recommend it

not the best in business class travel but very comfortable and efficient offered a turn down service as well speedy check in fast track immigration and priority boarding everything youd expect in sydney on the way back we had a stopover in tokyo and i guess jal would have a lot of business class passengers and didnt offer the fast track service plane was a bit worn and not the new planes theyve been operating eith previously was expecting the japanese food offering to be better and although the presentation was good overall quite bland and was slightly disappointed on the quality steak on the way back was wonderful though not enough in my opinion wife didnt even want to share her steak as i had the japanese option
the services of jal is very good they give cuatomers a good care they are very professional when in task their food looks small but delicous and high quality

caution i purchased tickets for me and girlfriend to fly from new york to tokyo on one of their dreamliners we were extremely excited about flying on a dreamliner it was a big reason why we chose to fly on jal we elected to stick with economy seating because the configuration allowed us to have a section to ourselves with no middle seat before our trip however the airline made two unilateral changes delayed the flight to tokyo by hours which impacted our plans upon arrival they called to tell us this yet made no mention of a plane change or moving our seats and with zero notice the airplane swapped out the advertised dreamliner to an older model with economy seating additionally they separated the two of us on the hour flight and we no longer are seated next to each other the flight is fully booked so we were stuck overall we are extremely disappointed and frustrated with jal and would advise caution when booking with them jal advertised a certain plane and seating chart plus specific flight times then after they received our money switched us to a worse plane moved our seats apart and shortened our vacation as others have noted jals customer service is awful they dont even pretend to care and make no effort to address travel issues they have created we made phone calls and emailed customer service the only option they offered us was to cancel our flight just weeks before we were scheduled to depart when other airlines are booked or super expensive anyways if you are going to purchase tickets on jal be prepared for disappointment

i flew this flight on march th the first meal was fine and then after hours or so they passed out a bunch of mush wow how disappointing when hungry it looked good but there was not much to it but my main beef is that upon arriva after nearly hours we were dumped onto a remote tarma in the rain to walk to buses for ja ostling ride to the terminal it was worse than a lufthansa intraeuro shuttle beyond that there were plenty of available spots with jetways it was a cost saving stupid decision

japan airlines is always good and the staff are friendly and courteous the aircraft was clean and the flight left and arrived essentially on time baggage arrived promptly as it always does in naritathe food service is definitelynot to the standard you get on other more competitive japan airlines flights such as those to london and lax where there is much more competition the food out of japan is usually better than into japan where jal rely on other suppliers overall good but business class food service could be better

i flew to tokyo from new york stopping in lax briefly this was a code share with american airlines the return trip was with japan airlines the trip going to tokyo was comfortable and what i really liked about it was that since i do not sleep at all on planes i read the entire time the aa plane going from lax to tokyo had an actual plug so i could plug my kindle in not a usb port but they had that as well so i was able to read up until the time we landed the return trip jal had the usb port but i had about hours left and my kindle ran out otherwise the food was good and the staff extremely accommodating i would fly jal again but it is difficult to reach them on the telephone and their website is not the easiest to navigate

very clean airline humble staff got an upgrade to premium economy food was really good way better than any international airline i have tasted also soft drinks and water and tea was offered all over the flight tooth brush offered too hostess were very very friendly

jal does a good job on this very competitive leg between narita and lax the aircraft is a standard but the food quality was a signiricant improvement over some other jal international flights when there is not as much competition service is always friendly and good the flight departed on time and arrived on time so overall a very good experience

i flew business class japan airlines from san diego if first impressions count the lounge they share is beyond sad and bare i should have known then we were in for a bumpy ride the seat is very small in comparison to most other major airlines their seats do not go into a flat bed and the front of the seat is lower that rest of seat so you keep feeing like you slipping down hours of this was agony on my back i just could not get comfortable the food fell below standard too if you want to order from their anytime menu you have to wait an hour after meal service which i passed on hanea airport is faaaar out from anywhere in tokyo and took us hours in a car to sinjuku i am not looking forward to flight back home being cramped on a limp seat for hours is no fun

jal changed the aircraft of their tokyokl route to boeing dreamliner instead of boeing in september we used our enrich miles to redeem a single trip back from narita to kl the aircraft was fitted with jal skysuite which is spacious and have a lot of privacy however as a travelling couples we were unable to sit side by side as per conventional seats as the seating arrangement is in staggering form jals bedd business class meal is always our favourite and its wasnt disappointed jal is also one of the very few airlines providing pyjamas for a hour dayflight it was a nice touch however compared to few months ago they didnt provide the face masks and eye masks for the passengers this round the monitor is of hd quality and the earphone is great the level of service is as usual top norch and the flight was smooth and pleasant its certainly much better than the malaysia airlines new a business class

i am writing to you to express my ultimate appreciation for the service and absolute professionalism to the entire staff at jal narita airport coming from boston on a non stop flight to tokyo i was initially worried about the flight experience not having been on a flight nearly that long hours i was amazed at the food comfort and best of all service through out the flight my economy class seat felt like first class now to the staff at narita on my return trip to boston because of delays and traffic conditions we were arriving extremely late to the airport we called ahead and informed jal of our situation and they told us they would do everything possible to get us on the plane when arriving i was sure there was no possible way i would make the flight arriving at the desk with two large bags to check in the staff quickly sprang into action checking the bags and expediting my way through security to the plane where i made my flight i salute the employees at narita airport and throughout the company for being the pinnacle of airline service and professionalism jal will be my first choice wherever i go thank you

the economy class in this airline is top notch good old fashion service the flight attendants were very attentive i left my back pack in one of the terminals but i wasnt sure which one i only learned of this when i was boarding the airplane i told the ladies at the gate they made some calls and within minutes my back pack was found the employees at jal told me the flight had to depart however they would get the name of my hotel and make sure it arrives at my hotel on the next flight sure enough it did great service great food excellent leg room

again poor connection within japan disappoints with jal the domestic flight from cts arrives in haneda one has to take luggage from this to a bus transfer for hour to narita then check in again at narita im sure its not beyond the realms of possibility to provide a smoother service for premium paying customers in addition at check in at cts the jal staff directed us to the economy check in despite explaining we were travelling in j class domestically and x internationally this caused a misunderstanding later overcome about usage of the business class lounge at cts and no application of priority labels for luggage that we had to pick up and transfer to the bus for narita the answer is one should check in at jal global counter as there is no business class counter at cts for domestic flights staff should have known this in flight service on both sectors was excellent

jal provides an excellent service only let down by the inability to through book luggage from international to domestic despite connection at the same airport haneda luggage has to be taken off at haneda cleared through customs then taken by hand to be dropped for the domestic flight

the seat is quiet wider for economy class and also the pitch between seat relatively more room the quality of food is good but the taste relatively plain for indonesian passenger overall is ok cabin attendants professional helpful and keep japanese culture traditionally polite the fleet itself quiet new and maintained well inflight entertaiment actually good but we cant tilt the display to adjust viewing

it has been years since my last flight with the japan airlines service is still top among other competitors comfort of seats in the economy cabin seemed to have been improved limited choices of meals but of above average quality
excellent service more leg room than in the past and decent food and drinks seat did get a big uncomfortable towards the end of the flight

i traveled on flights jl jl jl jl flight attendants were amazingprofessional charismatic and friendly made my traveling experience amazing the quality of service you get from jl is unmatched w any airlines i have ever flown on in my life one word awesomeness

the service and professionalism on jal is unsurpassed i flew from chicago to tokyo and was lucky enough to be on board the star wars themed bb airliner and it was phenomenal the first class seatcubby was wonderful seat folded flat into a comfy bed with an additional pad available and a fluffy comforter the flight attendants were impeccably dressed neat and extremely polite they were very attentive without being intrusive whenserving they even wore aprons with the bb robot on themit was so cool the food and snacks were varied very plentiful and delicious breakfast choices included either a traditional japanese breakfast or a traditional american breakfast will fly them again

was on a family trip with my wife and young kids short checkin queue in singapore and got seats in the middle in the bassinet row so lots of space there was wifi on board but we didnt try it the inflight entertainment equipment touch screen could use my kids headphones instead was good but did not have enough international options nonetheless it kept me occupied as i could not sleep there was only regular dinner option that was bad as was my wifes gluten free meal we landed on time got our luggage soon all was ok except the food and the inflight entertainment options

no long haul return home flight is ever primo to this i will say i did not feel good the entire trip home however i will say the seats were comfortable the leg room for me was great entertainment was great food was very japan which is to be expected just not my taste at allthe planes were very comfy but the take off and landings were very fast to the point my ears hurt i would def fly again for the service and comfort

the staff at boarding noticed that we had booked our family in different parts of the airplane and proposed to move us together with the added bonus of having more leg room for me at the front the breakfast was really good except maybe the croissant and we all managed to sleep during the redeye flight boarding was a breeze from start to finish transfer at haneda could be explained proactively you have to take a free bus from domestic to international airport
i have flown a lot of different airlines around the world and jal is now my favorite from the amazing staff to the fabulous food couldnt ask for a better experience

my son and i flew from hanoi to tokyo in june our seats were initially unassigned as we ticketed through american airlines but at check in we were upgrated to premium economy i have flown first class several times on domestic airlines in the united states but this was the most pleasant flight i have ever had the flight attendants were incredibly gracious warm and calm the seats were incredibly comfortable the food and drinks were outstanding and the in flight music and movie selection was first rate i will look for every possible opportunity to fly jals premium economy class in the future
very pleasant flight on a nice new bw food was fantastic the cabin is nice and clean me and my friend were sitting at the very back of the fight and without a question it was very comfortable
japan airlines has the best service available in flying courteous and caring flight attendants make you feel comfortable the whole time i wish to fly jal everytime i fly to asia

a wonderful and enjoyable flight home after our honeymoon in tokyo the flight was comfortable service was excellent and lunch was tasty i actually watched movies during my flight and took a short nap in between it was amazing experience to fly with jal

we flew from kul to nrt for a overnight flight and it was a very pleasant and enjoyable flight its our first time taking jal and we were so surprised to be upgraded from economy to premium economy we enjoyed the comfortable seats tasty breakfast and good inflight entertainment also worth mentioning their service is impeccable such a great start for our honeymoon
i was fortunate to fly on points in business class on dream liner seating was incredibly comfortable and food and service were excellent staff are very friendly and courteous

the two flights it took from chicago to hcmc vietnam was through tokyo service on both flights was very cordial and thorough the inflight movies documentaries music and flight information was extensive and spoton entertaining ground staff i encountered were also quick to respond to my requests

when flying between the us and japan id highly recommend japan air lines clean spacious and comfortable food is good with plenty of entertainment to make the long flight go by very fast check in attendants at narita were extremely helpful i was traveling with ski equipment sitting in economy i was only allowed checked bags skis my suitcase when i showed them my small ski boot bag they checked it free of charge wonderful customer service and i would definitely fly them again

flight was great business class seat private and very comfortable i do like japanese food but not for all meals was unhappy that there were not more choices being offered have been to asia on other airlines and the food choices were much better for westerners flight attendants could not have been more attentive due to food probably will not fly them again

this review pertains to both outward sydnrt and return nrtsyd flights jal first class was truly delightful this was our first international flight in first as opposed to business class and the difference was very noticeable both in terms of service and seat quality the privacy afforded by the seats on the er we were fortunate enough to occupy was lovely most of the time one could relax and imagine there was noone else nearby until that is one wanted a drink refill or something to eat when the staff would immediately appear i was mildly annoyed by the fact that our party of including young children were not seated together on the return flight instead seated at the four corners of the seat cabin i was concerned that our children would not be able to remain quiet without a parent seated next to them something the airline had been helpful in arranging on the initial flight and that i would need to apologise to other passengers for noise or crying fortunately as the flight was a night one they slept nearly the whole flight a testament to the comfort of the beds but i was rather surprised that the airline would not have grouped us together given that our booking was made moths in advance and the ages of the children clearly noted
