wow our american flights were changed around because of weather and we were placed on japan airlines on our way home from the philippines i cannot even begin to tell you how much better this airline was to fly first off their coach seats are as roomy as extended leg room upgrades on americanmaybe bigger and you dont have to pay more that alone makes me respect them because they treat people like human beings instead of sardines the video screens were on then back of the seats and they were a nice size more like an ipad rather than a large phone like on american plus there are little stretchy pockets on the back of the seat where you can put your glasses or a water bottle or whatever you want to easily keep within reach super convenient and smartly planned the food was amazing i was stunned actually they kept us well fed throughout the flight and the flight attendants are incredibly sweet and attentive i actually enjoyed our super long flight we are going to indonesia in october and planned our trip in such a manner that we will be flying with japan airlines the whole way even though we are american airlines mileage members we got lucky that we could use japan airlines for the whole trip im actually excited to fly because of this great airline american and united could take some lessons from this airline company on every level sorry i cant remember what kind of plane it was

i actually booked this flight as an american airlines codeshare and didnt know it until american wouldnt assign me any seats months before the flight the seats in economy were the roomiest compared to all us airlines im and i had in front of my knees in regular economy i didnt get this much room paying extra on aa and i never did on united because the upgrade to economy plus price is ridiculous each seat in economy had its own power port and usb port to keep you electronic device going there was a larger than average screen to watch movies that you could start or resume at any time the food was good and beer and wine were free jal has made the hour economy flight bearable ill shop with jal right from the start next time and forego any of my aa miles because they only gave me half on a codeshare anyway

as with every flight i have taken with jal this was a very comfortable relaxing and enjoyable flight they were very efficient at boarding and getting the flight away on time the seat was very comfortable and spacious for a regional business class staff were very friendly and helpful and were willing to offer advice and recommendation on our destination the food and drink was of a high quality and of a good quantity for flight of a reasonably short distance it was definitely good value for money every time i have flown business with jal domestically regionally and between europe and japan i have found them to be of a very high level and would always recommend flying with jal

as this would be a very long flight from chicago i researched both jal and ana thoroughly i talked with coworkers and family i flew to japan for business and leisure travel in octobernovember i chose jal since they were offering a promotion with the premium economy seats jals staff was exceptionally friendly and helpful at all times seating was comfortable and excellent choice food was excellent and i was introduced to a new snack natto i saved a bag so i could purchase this product in the usa yet it wasnt available here yet so i will consider ordering this thru ebay or amazon since it is only offered overseas jals airplane was clean comfortable and thoroughly enjoyable jal also included slippers at no extra chargei would rate them outstanding
excellent legroom very good service and movie selection not too sure about its boast of being the most punctual but i might prefer it to other options for a flight to japan in future

this is my first time travelling to other country and the very first country that i travel is japan for your information im malaysian and it is just like wow impression that very first travel is go to japan there a lot of country in asean that have so much attractio but japan is my choice to start my travel agenda so in order for going to japan japan airline is one from flight that i take main thing that i reaally love of japan airline is they can serve a really great muslem meal for muslim passenger
food is great and never stop coming started with light refreshment and the main meal was great and later serve ice cream for desert within hours they serve around of cake and refreshment

pleasant enough flightand the flight attendants are outstanding there is a discernable different between how these flight attendants treat passengers in coach versus what most other and especially us based airlines flight attendants do lots of smiles very polite very respectful a breath of fresh air however there are some distinct drawbacks to jal in certain lower cost fare classes you cannot secure a seat assignment until generally hours before departure this is annoying then to secure the seat assignment online you need to know the jal booking reference code therefore if you book a jal segment through a travel agent or through another partner airlines call that provider and get the jal booking code and it will be different from the partner airlines code the legroom is significantly less im guessing inches less than say aas economy extra for short hauls okay for long hauls it would be torture no frequent flyer miles for example for most economy fares in the aa frequent flyer program even though jal is a partner airline finally announcements are nonending and say the same thing time and time again very hard to watch a movie in jal with all there interruptions having said that their selection of entertainment options is quite good

our short flight was delayed by about hours mainly due to tpes inept traffic controller that couldnt handle the traffic like towers from other parts of civilized world the seats were similar to us domestic business classes with probably a little more leg room and more reclining i actually slept for about an hour during the flight so that was good the executive lounge at hnd was far from our gate but with the long delay we had no problem getting to and back to the gate but unfortunately there was no first class lounge so the choices of food and drinks were quite basic as noted above nothing special about the flight or the lounge though the service was decent

my wife and i decided to try jal instead of our regular airlines aa for the flight to taiwan with a change of plane in haneda we had really good memories of the last few times that we flew jal on pacific crossing flights this time around it wasnt as good the service was good but the food has fallen a little from our previous flights though they still serve hot udon soup which i enjoyed the seats however were not layflat it was my fault for not checking the plane before booking as i expected all pacific crossing flights on the other hand the angleflat seats were still better than aas angle flat seats on those flights from lax to pvg we dont recommend this flight unless jal changes the configuration on its planes alternatively you should look into flights from lax to narita instead one good thing about flying jal instead of aa out of lax is that as executive platinum member of aa we have access to the qantas first class lounge which is probably the best lounge that i have ever used had we flew aa then we will be out of terminal and only have access to aas admiral flagship lounge which is not nearly as good as the qantas lounge

this was the first time i flew in the boeing dreamlinerand i was impressed with the overall spacious cabin and hightech feel of the plane i was slightly disappointed with the seat arrangement in business classbut found the seat to be rather comfortable nonetheless jal has two versions of the boeing the larger one has the jal suite in business class that comes with a more private fully lieflat seat flies to narita tokyo from lax i flew on the smaller version from lax to kansai airport in osaka the seat appears to be the older type business class seat in arrangement and has an angle lie flat seat as expected of any japanese airlines the service was spectacular the stewardess are very attentive and courteous prior to takeoff the chief stewardess goes to each passenger and introduces herself she does the same at the end of the flight asking for any suggestions or comments they are always cheerful and seem to really enjoy their job the food is spectacular they offer both japanese style and western style food i cant say anything about the western style as i ordered japanese style on both trips food is tasty and they give you ample amount of it the seats were comfortable but as most airlines now offer lieflat seats in business class i was surprised that jal didnt do that for all their airplanes but the seat was comfortable enough good thing was that the flight was not full so the stewardess changed my seat to a row all to myself hence i got a window seat and i didnt have to jump over another person to get to the aisle

my husband and i recently flew premium economy from boston to tokyo narita on jals new nonstop boeing dreamliner we were pleased not to have to make a connection on the west coast and based on jals excellent reputation were looking forward to a great flight checkin was straightforward and the flight boarded and departed on time the seats were comfortable personal entertainment options plentiful and many amenities provided the flight attendants provided professional yet friendly service for the duration of the flight since neither of us eats meat we ordered a vegetarian meal normally of good to excellent quality on every international flight weve ever flown in this case however the food quality ranged from poor to positively inedible on our flight to tokyo our main meal consisted of curly egg noodles with a tablespoon of thin tomato sauce while on the return flight we were served rice a tvp burger with a speck of ketchup that was as rubbery and tasteless as it appeared it was returned uneaten overall the flight was very good and while we had no complaints except for the food we were quite surprised at just how bad it was if we fly jal again well remember to bring along a plentiful supply of our own food

jal have this pretty much to themselves but they did a good job as expected flying an older boeing which was full service was as expected as was the food it was clean and left and arrived on time which is what you can expect with jal which is one of the better airlines

this is possibly the most efficient professional and comfortable airline i have ever traveled with they left on time boarded on time landed on time the crew were exceptional it was the fastest boarding i have ever seen check in was smooth and helpful with a great grasp of english highly recommend

it was a perfect experience to fly jals domestic flight all the time so just to share my most recent trip here i was travelling with my husband from tokyo haneda to okayama last weekend the flight time was about hours half of the travel time by bullet train shinkansen while the price is almost the same since both of us have joined jals mileage program we used the touch go boarding flow by just tapping the membership cards on the security checkpoint and boarding gate everything was smooth it is so amazing and convenient that you dont need to check in or get a boarding pass when boarding jals domestic flights when we entered the cabin i found jal was providing the cover bags for passengers to wrap their carryon baggage it is such great japanese hospitality every time when i fly with other airlines i try not to put my bag on the floor to avoid getting dirty our seats were at the economy class section all seats are leather seats and clean the legroom is wide enough even i put my bag under the front seat during the flight free drink was offered we liked to try something special so i chose cosome soup while my husband picked their original juice skytime not bad choices as the flight time was quite short we didnt try to sleep my husband read the inflight magazine i was excited to try their free inflight wifi on the day before i found on jals website that they are offering wifi for free on domestic flights i registered the gogo account before the flight as the website suggests it was so easy to get connected than i imagined the speed was fine i just browsed some recommendations on restaurants in okayama the flight landed smoothly and on time the weather in okayama was nice it was really an enjoyable trip with jal

this was the first leg of our trip to hanoi and the longest the airplane was brand new and the seats were nice and wide everything was spotlessly clean on the flight even when we landed service was great too

i bought my jal ticket from a third party vendor and it was cheap however on the day of the flight i decided to pay one way to upgrade my seat to premium economy it was expensive for a one way upgrade i thought i made the wrong decision but it was not a bad decision as soon as i saw my premium economy seat i thought i was in a business class my seat has a leg rest and it reclines leather seat my own lamp a couple of chargers and outlet the seat is spacious and i still have the space to place my jacket headphone and neckrest the temperature inside the plane was warm no blanket needed bathroom is relatively wider than the other airlines that i had taken the airline offers toothbrush toothpaste and slippers this is the cleanest airline bathroom that i had seen even though it was used by a lot of passengers the food was okay but i wish the airline would offer ramen and tofu ha for a premium seat i was offered wine before and during meal it was a good wine though the only thing that i did not like was the plane that flew us from manila to lax was an american airlines i know that they are partner airlines but i wish it will be jal again tickets are not cheap though but i wish the airline will offer a one day tour of japan i will take jal to my future asian trips

it was my first flight with jal ive heard about japanese airlines and i can confirm the service is very friendly the aircraft is super clean organized and new and the highlight beside the service was the food theyve served it was delicious for a economic class i strongly recommend it

while the service is wonderful what you come to expect out of a several thousand dollar ticket in business class on a doesnt happen the seats dont lie flat and are horribly uncomfortable for sleeping in your hour min flight window seats are seated next to someone else and are quite narrow tip a is a great seat bulk head so extra leg room but you will have to climb over the person next to you seats are in the sun side of the plane from lax and get quite hot see the pic i posted ask for the window stickers to black out the windows they do exist there arent any actual pull down window shades otherwise only window dimmers food wonderful watch out for shellfish if you have an allergy scallops and lobster in several meals in both the japanese and american meals the japanese noodles with seaweed are pretty good a bit salty from the seaweed but if you want to try your st noodles nows the time and juts push the seaweed to the side if you arent up for the green slime the chocolates are divine

i have travelled overseas many a time but to date had never flown jal this time i had the opportunity to fly on jals new dreamliner plane on my own from ny to tokyo business class the plane was magnificent in its internal set up in that despite the seating arrangement in business class in pairs the arrangement was such that the seats were set with a slide up screen between each pair of seats thus providing you with your own private area initially you were provided with a pillow larger than the standard pillow provided and a light weight cotton doing the seats lay completely flat and you were provided with a mattress to put over the seating once you were at a particular height so you could go to sleep each individual unit had all of the standard business class goodies remote control tv with a multiplicity of channels comfortable headphones your own personal lighting system so as not to disturb others the menu provided was amazing allowing you to provide from japanese or western style menu you could order when and what you wanted from the menu at any time during the flight at no particular time were you required to eat but at the mere press of the attendant button you could order food or drinks which were extensive at will the staff right from the moment you joined the check in queue to those who farewelled you at the other end were amazing nothing was too much trouble for them and you were never left to feel like your request was too much to ask for or unnecessary and were answered promptly and graciously all in all the airline and its staff were absolutely wonderful
i sat in the middle of persons in a row economy class the guy next to me had to stand up approximately hours due to poor leg room and space between us yet i only weighed lbs

this was a very average service that we experienced food was below average service was very slow only thing good was the aircraft was a new dreamlinerthe in flight entertainment had limited choices this is no comparision to ana

i have flown on many airlines all over the world and have experienced business and premium classes on some of the finest but jal has eclipsed all of them the cabin restrooms and personal space were all immaculate and restful with attention to such details as to make a very long flight feel relaxed and brief a supplemental mattress for sleep and earphones that actually cancelled out noise and allowed me to hear the films clearly were just two of the welcome appointments the meals were of gourmet quality i chose the japanese menu and found it varied delicious and completely satiating almost a part of the entertainment system as i explored the diverse offerings the two brands of sake offered were both of top quality and nicely complemented the repast but by far the best part of the trip was the hospitality offered by the gracious flight attendants from the moment i boarded to the time i almost reluctantly disembarked though all were faultless i must single out one okubo was absolutely splendid and went above and beyond any expectations i had of gracuoius hosting on an airline it is one thing for an attendant to smile and exercise politeness but for that hospitality to be utterly genuine and emanate from a truly warm person is quite something else while all of my interactions with this caring young woman were highlights of an already exemplary trip i was really touched when she brought me a little package of gifts for my year old step daughter okubo learned i was visiting i wish i could travel everywhere on this airline with this attendant im afraid that jal and okubo have left me quite spoiled i would not hesitate to recommend any of jals international flights particularly for any who might be reluctant to travel so far oh and lest i forget the flight was among the smoothed ever encountered even when we hit a bit of turbulence that would have gone unnoticed had the pilot not told us and lest i forget part the checkin woman in boston was also topnotch

jal did everything they could to ensure our holiday was as good as it could be the over and above came as a result of our flights from calgary being overly delayed thanks air canada not sure why hrs late leaving and westjet missing pilot but the jal staff picked up both parties in golf carts and rushed us to the plane which they held as long as they coould the collected our luggage from ac and wj and forwarded it to our hotel in bangkok the next day when we left ko samui bangkok airlines flights were suspended due to rain so we were hours late leaving barely made the jal flight home and they located our luggage from bangkok airways for us and arranged for it to come to calgarysomething they were not responsible for as i wasnt their fault or responsibility they did help they earned my respect for sure the flight itself was amazing staff were terrific service phenomnenal and the food outstanding will definately fly jal again overseas cannot say enough great things about them

terrible customer service and experience through the chinese jal service their website offered alipay as a payment and i went through purchase however it took my money and never issued ticket so i called in and rep confirmed that there was a website bug that was not really operational but could not do anything about refund or issue ticket she had all my reservation information but said that it was out of her hands and that i needed to take up the issue of refund directly with alipay she was terribly unhelpful and felt no responsibility to resolve their website blunder

im a big fan of jal i fly them frequently and always enjoy their inflight service their ground staff is also very helpful and courteous meals are good and the planes clean and comfortable one of the reasons i love to fly on them is that i feel like im already in japan from the moment i board the plane they are very customer focused and attentive to their guests although the cabin temperature can be warm at times if you mention it to the flight attendants they will make some adjustments to add cooler air to the cabin the only thing that i wished is that they participated in the tsa precheck program fly jal you wont be sorry
one word awesome felt like i am at home superb service staff food very good leg space appropriate seats quality very good comfort very good
i flied with this airline last year and i really love this company the air crews and ground crews are very friendly and nice the food is very yummy as well

the standard on jal was a lovely surprise generous legroom good service and really imaginative food they have clearly given this some time effort involving food stylist nami iijima to create the menus which are tasty fresh salads with tasty dressing wide range of fruit in fruit salads etc other airlines take note

the attendants on this flight were so nice and friendly even with a slight language barrier they made sure to ask me like everyone else about drinks food ect they are by far the friendliest airline i have flown i used them in oct as well and service was wonderful then as well

this flight was the best we had among other flights we had had from the boarding experience at narita airport to on board service esp flight attendantswas absolutely wonderful while we were boarding there was an attendant who held the sign and guided the business class group so that the line went smotthly the best among the attendants during our flight was mami ito she was very polite and made us feel like customers are kings queens indeed there was another customer who was next to us who was not feeling well and mami treated him very nicely i could tell that the whole staff flight attendants worked non stop to assure the customers were well served we were definitely satisfied with this service and would book ticket from air japan again on the flight back from tokyo to san francisco on united airlines the service was not comparable even though we were on the same business class

codeshare flight business travel and the flight was listed as another carrier had a very good meal entertainment options were sound years since my last trip to japan so it was nice to return on this carrier

from we used jal usually once a year from australia to europe until we found more competitive airfares on this recent trip melsydtyo overall we found the journey again pleasant the food sydtyo was the best airline meal we have had for years however the return leg main meal was the worst we have had for some time on any airline staff were attentive after lights out continuing to walk the aircraft with liquids for those still awake unlike an australian carrier whose staff have a tendency to disappear after lights out the airline lounge at narita was busy however a pleasant experience for us for older persons a little comfort is appreciated we have not previously used airline lounges

purchased business class on sale roundtrip from lax to nrt we live in san jose but the business class prices from sfo were more expensive so used reward points to fly free to lax to take advantage of the business class sale from there amazing service and amenities were a great way to start and finish our trip to japan flew a er roundtrip individual pods with lie flat seats and large privacy partitions between seats excellent space for storing items that you want at hand as well as overhead storage large screen for movies videos etc with great earphones blankets slippers and amenity kits were waiting in our seats when we boarded and cardigans were distributed shortly after takeoff we reserved western and japanese meals ahead of time but my husband and son easily switched to japanese meals for the flight home once boarded also an amazing array of dishes such as sandwiches udon bento box even ice cream available on demand during the flight up to two hours before landing the bathroom was kept spotless with toothbrush kits and mouthwash available at all times what really made the flights stand out was the serviceattentive friendly calm and well organizedwith flight attendants coming to our seats to personally thank each of us for flying arigato jal will definitely fly this airline again

very comfortable seat with inch pitch leg roomrated as one of the best airline in economy class service is excellent with all smiling face from air stewardess food and beverage are superb quality of touch screen lcd is very good finally the air ticket price is couple hundred higher than low cost carrier i will continue fly jal

this was a good service and the lounge was very good the only down side i thought was that the service was a little lax i think that was mainly due to the hostesss lack of proactivity and being a little shy on arrival in helsinki we received our bags promptly this was a long haul flight and we arrived at the other end feeling fresh and ready to go the main reason to fly business class

flown the jal international business class before and was pampered from start to finish got this domestic business ticket for around a yens extra and honestly could not see much difference from an economy seat except that i was asked if i wanted to wrap my check in luggage in a plastic bag when we retrieved our luggage on arrival a ground staff came rushing to help dispose of the plastic bag lounge pass was not included which was a bit disappointed but everything on the light was done in grace and perfection the japanese way

super comfortable seat in i have ever got for economy class and the staff is very kind and very goodfoods are very tasty and have nice smell as wellyou can enjoy the world entertainment as well with jal flights from the beginning flight crew trying to give comfortable journey to us highly recommendedcheers

when boeings dreamliners first arrived jal jumped at the opportunity to fly directly from tokyo to san diego which has a small airport incapable of handling the big passenger birds of yesterday but jal really screwed up the interior they chose places entertainment equipment boxes under as far as i can tell of the economyclass seats in other words jal went out of its way to cause its passengers on this route hours of pain for tall people it is impossible to sit behind a seat with an entertainment equipment box under it without pinning one foot behind the knee this causes me pain that lasts for days there are other problems the seats themselves are the most uncomfortable seats of any kind i have ever sat in they are worse than bar stools they cause me hamstring and back pain that also lasts for days also the jets interior is beginning to age and look dirty while these flights are an absolutely miserable hours they are still convenient they save time in two ways you do not have to make a stop at another airport and wait around for a connecting flight and san diegos airport gets few international flights so customs and immigration is a breeze plus its san diego the airport is right along the harbor its a beautiful place to step off a plane and the customs and immigration people are san diegans friendly helpful and genuinely happy that you are visiting their city while i cant recommend san diego enough as an international destination for anyone living in tokyo jal really needs to remodel the interior of its nrtsan dreamliner and make it not so painful one more note since jal has a monopoly on this route its super expensive if you have the time youre much better off taking united and transferring in sfo

like most japanese companies jal tries really hard to give good service to its customers jal tries too hard on its overnight flights from tokyo to bangkok this is about a sevenhour flight that leaves haneda airport at just after midnight the airplanes interior is brand new seat pockets fit more stuff inside them there seems to be more leg room i saw no entertainment equipment boxes under seats these hard metallic immovable boxes can ruin a flight by pinning your foot behind your knee if you are tall you will feel the pain for days after disembarking so cheers for jal getting rid of these damn boxes on its midnight hndbkk route but why ruin the effort and all that added comfort by turning up the lights two hours before arrival to feed us a meal of flapdoodle airline food let your customers sleep on overnight flights jal dont force us to eat unneeded carbs at oclock in the morning tokyo time and cause all kinds of commotion on a previously quiet flight one more note the new seats are mostly great but the bottoms curve up in the back and jab your tailbone the seats also seem to angle downward which keeps passengers sliding forward this runs from being unpleasant to annoying to painful

this was my first flight experience with japan airlines jal one of the reasons i chose this airlines because they landed in tokyo international airport haneda instead of narita the inflight services were nice i remembered we were served a cute japanese bento for inflight meal they also provided various alcoholic and nonalcholic beverages during the flight imo the most useful benefit when traveling with jal was the free wifi connection in japan provided by ntteast and wi wifi to use this service you need to register on jal website and provide your ticket information the wifi connection can be accessed easily by using the travel japan wifi app
the entire experience was a pleasure a great advertisement for japan courtesy and service all the way the best airline i have ever flown with ba and us airlines should take note

a very pleasant day flight check in and security were very polite and calm the seating was comfortable and the entertainment varied a worked faultlessly the cabin crew were the picture or cheerful caring polite as and the menu options wide to cater for most tastes the asian option hovered on gourmet standard well worth it and we will use the airline again

fly jal it might be worth it to depart from a city that has the jal boeing dreamliner if your city doesnt great food lots of seat room even in regular class seating high ceilings lots of air circulation lots of free movies lots of carryon luggage space neck pillow you wont need to bring one and blanket complimentary toothbrush toothpaste in the clean and fresh smelling washrooms quiet super friendly i could live on there for a month with no complaints seriously if possible fly jal i wrote some tips for travelling in japan

their is no way on earth we would have been able to afford such luxury without using miles a year ago i booked flights from cvg to ord on american airlines first class and then on to nrt first from ord jal and then on to bangkok jal biz the leg from chicago to tokyo was one of the high points of my flying experiences there are suites on the and only four including my wife and i were occupied since it was new years eve the whole plane was only about half full the fas were fantastically attentive the food especially the japanese items was over the top great you could order what you wanted when you wanted each passenger got one of the other suites made up into a bed so there was no inconvenience of having to transition between bed and chair i know i know fwp we did have to spend a hour layover at haneda at the excel airport hotel after a minute shuttle bus ride but what the heck today we flew from haneda to bkk biz on a the service was also great just not as luxurious and over the top as the hrs in first the food was very good salmon and pasta with one of the best deserts i ever had a green tea custard with white chocolate hollow balls filled with some kind of green tea syrup wow knock your socks off good the whole trip was booked with aa miles each before the aa devaluation early we used mile value booking service for each and worth every penny

flew jal vancouver to narita round trip jl jl both were on the b dreamliner which is a very nice newish plane with mood lighting larger windows very quiet generous overhead bins and toilets with the sprayer function common in japan unfortunately jal opted for angle flat seats on these overnight flights so sleep is not as comfortable as most other major international airline business class i find i do tend to slide down the angle flat bed but width and comfort of the seat was generally good entertainment is ok but there is slightly less selection of movies and programs than for example on cathay pacific the real strength of jal however is in the service the flight attendants are constantly working go about their duties quietly and with elegance and make you feel truly well cared for during the flight they are also constantly cleaning the toilets which on a longhaul flight makes a big difference to the comfort of using the washrooms food is also very good on jal i tried both the japanese meal and the western meal both are very strong the japanese meal typically starts with a box containing different little appetizers always intriguing and interesting but difficult to remember which is which after reading the detailed descriptions in the menu the western meal that i remember was shortribs and it was succulent and tender japan airlines also serves a special coffee in business class and in its lounges which is really delicious probably the best coffee i have had on any airline but unfortunately is exclusive to their flights and lounges and not sold i asked and it is not available as part of their in flight sales i also used the lounges in vancouver it is unfortunately just the plaza premium lounge which is open to membership subscriptions or drop ins and is crowded and not very nice however in narita i used the first class lounge as i have one world alliance status and it is a superb lounge elegant and understated as is the japanese way with two sushi chefs making sushi to order a buffet area with western and japanesechinese food massage chairs and also massage therapists for quick minute massage treatments the lounge also served high quality suntory whiskeys which are very enjoyable when one flies japan airlines whether on the ground or in the air the one thing that you can rely on is superb attentive and elegant service at a level head and shoulder above western airlines

i was surprised to be served hot dogs on japan airline in my flight from chicago to manila with no choice for an asian food option in flying to manila eva air and asiana both had much better food otherwise everything was alright

i booked my flight from tokyo to bangkok in business class and the experience was not a good one no one on business class was offered a drink or towel i had high expectations from this airline and service and i dont justified the ticket cost for their service i should flight economy for the kind of service i did experience

top notch highly efficient boarding process welcome towel beverage meals that would put a lot of restaurants to shame super attentive and friendly staff whom go out of their way for your comfort cabin is nice and quiet the most amount of entertainment ive ever seen on a plane to summarise this airline they took out seats from the cabin to create more leg room and comfort for passengers i cant imagine many other airlines that would sacrifice and do this

great experience with japan airlines jal flight from london to tokyo and return i normally select ba but ive had some poor experiences on different routes so i decided to try jal i was not looking forward to the long flight time travelling in economy however it was a super experience at both airports the staff at the checkin desk were professional and welcoming at haneda they greeted passengers from the queue taking them to the checkin desk onboard the crew were professional polite and attentive economy seats comfortable and more spacious plane and all the facilities were very clean and frequently cleaned meals served efficiently but with a personal service snacks and additional drinks available throughout the flight return flight i bought an upgrade to premium economy at the airport the seats have more space between them and foot rest seats dont recline backwards so you are not being crushed by the passenger in fronts seat also a larger tv screen special thanks to colin and federico for service on return flight both flights great experience i will definitely be choosing jal again

on the way back from japan the flight left about minutes late and we arrived about minutes late apart from that the service was faultless and the enternainment was very good as always on jal the crew were very pleasant and helpful flying them again for sure

flew back from tokyo after a crap trip over from ba contrast could not have been greater wonderful attentive and courteous service good food and a very comfortable seating flight on time well done jal you can have my custom any day

a very good airline check in was efficient although there were many passenger in line cabin crew was top rate and was always friendly and smiling service was incredible and this is one cabin crew that works almost all the time without rest flight was smooth with some turbulence but nothing major in flight food was good from narita to klia but the same cant be said for klia to narita leg most likely due to local caters and not jals fault overall a superb airline

when we boarded we were given a very warm welcome and they helped us put our luggage in the bins and guided us to our seats great take off and breakfast was above average for airline food inflight entertainment was extensive and good showing a good range of movies and tv shows crew were very friendly and cheery when we landed we forgot our passports on the plane and the crew kept hold of them and waited outside of the plane for us to return which we did we are flying with them again in jan and would highly recommend them to anyone
very comfortable flight even economy class and very friendly crew in flightfoods are excellent and tasty

jal was a short one hour flight from shirahama to tokyo on an emraer which was clean and neat and the flight service was very good as expected despite a late incoming flight departed and arrived on time and the luggage appeared within ten minutes which is a feature of jal in tokyo and haneda no food but just a cold drink but that was fine overall jal using one of the subsiduaries j airlines did a very good job

i was fly from kul to nrt by brand new aircraft b then transit to osaka itami by domestic aircraft b overall the journey was great and no complain at all becuase i can see how they treatserve with smile as you can see from the heart i can see quality of service here in everything from checkin until arrive at osaka my son also can choose his own like toy with is complementary from airline good job to japan airline

my girlfriend was very rudely refused boarding on a flight to japan a mean faced attendant stopped her at the gate and demanded she show proof of onward travel we only had way tickets since we were staying abroad for months and did not have solid plans on when we would return i was able to check in fine and had to run back to the gate to see what happened luckily we had data connection on our phones and quickly purchased cheap plane tickets to appease the rude attendant it was all very stressful and we almost missed our international flight seems absurd as we were flying business class and they didnt ask me a male anything about my onward travel plans asian cultures are known for female inequality but this was absurd the plane was comfortable but this whole ordeal ruined our experience i contacted their customer support and received some canned apology which seemed very insincere

the cabin crew hospitality and meals made us comfortable throughout the trip there is ample legroom for you to stretch your leg the kids will even get a selection of toys during the journey even if there is an error during your checking in just let the airline counter knows and they will sort it out for you i had encountered that my seat does not tally with my online booking however the counter is able to rectify it and solve the problem for me

whether its in the air or on the groundyou have to love the way the japanese approach their clients i dont particularly care if its genuine or just a conditioned way of being but i do have to say i enjoy it everyone i encountered during my whole jal flight made my trip a pleasure

it was hours and minutes flight from ckg to narita transit for and minutes then another hours flight from narita to jfk yet cabin crew hospitality and good meals made us comfortable nice experience in our first flight with jal hope well get the same or even better experience on our flight back home next year

was amazing trip also no complain becuase i can see how they treatserve with smile as you can see from the heartrecommended to all passenger traveling anywhere with this airline i can see quality here in everything around
great service best food especially creme brulee icecream comfortable seat nice flight attendants
great service from cabin crews sleep well and enjoy dilicious food especially icecream about the plane is new and wide enough space for long leg

travelled on jl yesterday via b with their new y class seats flight was full in classes ground technical staff bid us farewell while plane was preparing for take off cabin crew did one round of drinks it has more seat pitch i have travelled with their previous y class and felt that there was little padding in their new y class seats inflight camera was not available however foc wifi was available for mins flight arrived on time thumbs up

my family and i miss the am flight to haneda and were placed for standby flights we had a international flight the checkin ladies were nice the senior and other ground staff trying to help one of the ladies personally escorted us to the standby counter at the dep area my elder daughter and i were placed at the am informed at am and managed to check in all bags with priority tags while my wife and younger daughter were placed at the am flight bound for fukuoka the ground staff personally escorted with a smile my elder daughter and i to the gate running together to the gate thumbs up we made it back home thank you

this is the second time my husband and i have flown jal to manila philippines their lounge is exceptional service on the airplane equally so we will keep on flying this airline they make the long trip very comfortable
crew for this flight always give a great smiles to passenger and welcome gift are provided to child stewardess did their job very well they served verity of drinks to passenger all the times
flight was on time seats were comfortable and and food and drinks served were also good nice experience

this was a good flight on a new boeing which left on time and arrived on timeas we were upgraded from economy to business without requesting it there were no complaints and thes service was a good standard as always on jal the staff are very good

this airline does everything right the service is number one of all airlines the food is good and thoughtfully accessible drinks like all top airlines planes comfort and media standardly very good this airline is far superior to american delta united cathay swiss international british and several smaller airlines i have flown each in the last months emirates is better than japan except for service japan is number one in customer service i have not seen anything that comes close

we were unable to upgrade to j class for a fee of as the flight was full we checked in early and was informed flight was delayed for mins due to aircraft change no issues as there were several shops and eatery at haneda terminal for jal travelled in their new y class in b their tables seems to be made of a lighter material better seat pitch however the seats has little padding i like their cabin flights and cherry coloured seat belts instead of the usual black grey one round of drins were served in the min full flight the cabin crew even found my face mist bottle cap for me when i drop it on the floor impressive

compared to european airlines the staff was really friendly and polite the food was quite good the plane was very clean inside including toilets also check in on narita was ok the only disadvantage was rather poor movie choice
i was gooing from yvr to manila phillppines wen i bordede the airplane it was a litle small leg space but the it was a smove ride

great airline plane was comfortable and clean staff as with all japanese people were pleasant and very helpful at check in same with the flight crew no movies for this quick trip but allowed a short time to catch up on much needed sleep will look at flying with jal for my next return trip to japan

this was my first time flying to and from japan on jal and it was a very positive experience the service staff was super friendly and tried to do everything they could to ensure that the customers on the plane had an enjoyable flight they experienced inflight entertainment issues the entire flight home from tokyo but did their best to recover service to the best of their ability unfortunately we had seats next to an arrogant person who was demanding and felt very entitled he couldnt stop yellingcomplaining to every flight attendant on the plane about how the movies didnt work and how he wanted a refund for him and his family felt horrible for the flight attendants to have to deal with a person like this let alone him waking us up every time he would raise his voice to try and get something for free

jal must surely be the worlds best airline its planes are immaculately maintained and its cabins clean and comfortable as comfortable as flying can be staff are professional always helpful and bilingual in japanese and english food is a choice of japanese or european this is high class airline that is a credit to japan

top notch service from jal staff to and fro our international trip so much priority given to us as we were traveling with our yearold sonlove it very attentive and helpful all throughout and most of the flight attendants were super sweet to my son on the st flight from dallas to narita we had chatted with one of the flight attendants annabella about our sons upcoming nd birthday that same weekend later on she surprised him with a little gift bag filled with goodies and small toys and a personalized note wishing him a happy birthday that was sweet beyond words and meant a lot to us thank you oh flying on the magnificent dreamliner is amazing more room in general for the entire cabin and leg room at the seats and not filling like were cramped sardines in a tin can as long as we can get great deals we will definitely be flying this route with jal again

i flew jal business class from tokyo to helsinki the staff were very attentive and friendly the plane felt new and the interior was clean the cabin was kept very clean during the entire flight my seat was an aisle seat in the middle section in seats the layout is such that the window seat has its own little passageway so it would have been just as good as an aisle but with more privacy the access to my seat was wide open on the aisle side too wide so it felt a little too exposed there was a retractable blind blocking the other person next to me so it was private on that side there is also a foam mattress for every seat that the flight attendant will prepare so it is really comfortable to sleep and then you dont feel all the usual cracks and bends characterizing todays business class seats i had preordered a vegetarian meal and i was happy i did that the main course otherwise would have been beef tongue and something more western but the fact that beef tongue was the headline meal was a little shocking for me anyway my meal had the best salad onboard i have ever had both in presentation and quality and the attendant tailored the offering to consider other food sensitivities and preferences i had in addition to the wines fine sake was offered so it was interesting to try those the inflight entertainment is much more limited than other airlines there were not so many films to choose from screen and headphone quality was good when we arrived in helsinki this huge plane was parked out away from the terminal we had to walk down portable stairs and board a bus that would have been really miserable in bad weather i didnt like helsinki airport at all or the connecting finnair flight jal business class passengers had to queue for the security check in line with everyone there was not any express or priority line

after terrible flight to tokyo made by finnair and airbus i experienced great flight from tokyo part of very good experiences were because of the plane boeing which was really comfortable and spacious service was excellent food tasty and online entertainment good as well i think it was my best long haul experience in my life

we originally booked on another airline for this tip but then jal had a special offer of around us for round trip business class which was a rather good deal so we switched service starts at the check in upon seeing a dent on one of our luggages the check in staff offered to wrap our luggage in a plastic bag something that not all airlines will do even for business class we were offered access to the qantas lounge but we used the new cx lounge instead it was busy but staff was efficient service on board was great they dont serve pretake off drink which is a bit odd but no big deal no amenity kits were offered on this regional flight but there was a pair of slippers in each seat and one of the flight attendants came by with a tray offering eye mask and ear plugs lunch order was taken shortly after the seat belt sign went off i opted for the japanese set presentation was great and the taste was even better the seat was an angled lie flat one which is more than enough for a hrs flight ife was nice with a selection of japanese and english movies and tv programs quite surprised that they offer season of er so nice to watch an episode of the classic show jal business product seat ife may not be as good when compared to other airlines on this regional route but what they lack in hardware they make it up with customer services and catering

we were flying from narita airport to jakarta on our th wedding anniversary celebration trip to southeast asia on september in view of the delay of our previous flight we barely made it and our suitcases didnt aside from the good service we received on board from misses katsuyama hirose and krissamon including a nice handwritten card with wine and sweets to celebrate our anniversary they were able during the flight to confirm that our bags would put on the same flight the following day and delivered to our hotel jw marriott hotel jakarta which was the case on arrival in jakarta we were met by jl ground staff headed by miss rheta who kindly escorted us through immigration and customs helped us with the form for our delayed suitcases and provided us with a prepared envelope containing cash to cover minimum expenses toiletries essential clothing etc all of these showed the concern of japan airlines and its staff over the inconvenience

on our th wedding anniversary celebration trip to southeast asia on september our flight from san diego to tokyo jl was delayed at departure leaving little time to make our connecting flight from narita airport to jakarta jl sept aside from the excellent service we received from chief purser takebe ayame assisted by flight attendants koiwai fukunaga and patt takebe including a beautiful handwritten card with wine and chocolates to celebrate our anniversary miss ayame was able to confirm during the flight that we would be personally met on arrival and escorted to our connecting flight to jakarta which was the case
the latest economy class was more comfort than ever with wider leg space usb port wifi and new flight entertainment system etc it is fair to flight up up to hours
boarding was a breeze and on time all loaded up and off we were great flight plenty to do and super meals along the way crew was marvelous and supportive of all my needs
boarding was fast and efficient long flight but a good one great staff service and care very clean plane
amazed the plane was so very very clean and the staff are extremely accommodating great meals and in flight care from the flight crew
this is one of the best flight i have even enjoyed great service plenty of leg room and delicious food the crew was amazing

flew sinnrthnl and back with my husband on the er our seats in business were the jal sky suite ii type throughout service as expected was superb and intuitive the purser and attendants make it a point to address us by name bathrooms were cleaned after every use and toothbrushes packet mouthwash beautifully presented for the next passenger every five minutes or so an attendant would walk through the cabin and look to be of service the us airlines cant compare with this attention to detail dining was served in courses unlike delta business but food western japanese was not exceptional two big gripes were the actual jal sky suite ii bed hard as a rock narrow and no space to turn your feet when in bedmode will never fly with this product ever again the jal sky suite iii which wasnt available for our trip is much much better for comfort other problem was the warm cabin it was probably the warmest cabins ive ever flown in attendants obliged with turning the ac down a notch but it was still uncomfortable that said our next flight is on ana again service superb on the ground and inflight avoid the jal sky suite ii and if they could fix the warm cabins id give the airline five stars jal lounge in narita was fantastic though nap rooms wonderful shower facilities lovely spread of food massage chairs all add up to a great transit experience

very japanese in terms of politeness cleanliness and timeliness and now for the surprise very warm and friendly service at the checkin and inflight i dont do this often but this one i would recommend for sure well done jal

i had very bad experience during web check in terrible experience the web interface is so old fashion not user friendly and has missing data which i keyed in many times earlier my friend and i passengers were allocated in the centre seater by the system in fact there were still availabilities at the seater at the side i had a special meal request on this flight after dinners all passengers were given a tub of ice cream when it was my turn the air stewardess took it back and told the ice cream was not for special meal i was so surprised i then asked if she had extra without further thinking she responded no harsh and hostile the aircraft is an old the seat cushion is so worn that i hardly felt any soft yet firm support food debris was found on the floor at the sides obviously the cleaners didnt do a good job during their regular cleaning the bread served was as hard as a rock also they do not serve butter with the bread you have to ask for it overall my experience with japan airlines is not so appealing

requested an aisle seat on checkin but due to full capacity none was available the checkin counter staff kindly made arrangements to be upgraded to premium economy for free without me requesting to be upgraded the upgrade was a pleasant surprise and made for a very pleasant journey hours the seat has a lot of legroom and at i could stretch out as much as i wanted to without issue the seats dont recline but rather slide down and forward which is great as it doesnt bother the passenger behind there is a leg support that comes up from the bottom of the seat and also a foot rest the foot well had a lot of space so even with my shoes off and stored there i could sit comfortably the seats have a double arm rest each so theres no issues as to who gets to use it allowing for all passengers in this class to sit and move around in the seat without disturbing the person alongside food was okay and inflight entertainment was also fine controlled by either touchscreen or controller cas were very professional courteous helpful and always smiling which really does make for a pleasant atmosphere upgrade to premium economy varies on distance syd to nrt would have been yen which really adds up on a return journey but some shorter flights to asian destinations hk can be had for just yen each way which i wouldnt hesitate to pay for great seat great service and made a hour fight pleasant as opposed to bearable highly recommend flying jal and premium economy i wouldnt even bother with paying for business class if a premium economy seat is available as the extra cost isnt justified considering how comfortable the seating was

flew economy on this flight and as im rather tall i requested an aisle seat to allow me to stretch out as it was an overnight flight on checkin i was informed that the flight was fully booked so no aisle seats were available but should one become available theyd let me know at the departure gate just prior to boarding i didnt expect one to become available and if it did i didnt expect them to go through the trouble of assigning one to me much to my pleasant surprise i was informed at boarding one was available and was assigned it thats an example of great service by staff who are already very busy it made the flight much more comfortable the seat was a sky wider seat and one of the most spacious for an economy class ive flown on long distance at i had no issues with leg room and the usb charger was very convenient food was okay but the cas were very friendlycourteous and professional i hadnt much considered flying jal before but theyre now the first airline ill look to fly with

jal operate their boeing dreamliner on this flight to san diego and back and it is a good service and the best way to enter the us and avoid the lines in us immigration in lax the officers in san diego are quite civil the flight leaves at pm and gets in around pm along with all other inbound flights from the us the service on jal is at their top level and food is good although the aircraft has the older style business class seats

when do you know you got best deal when you are in trouble and airlines help you that is what happened to me on nov when i missed my flight cause hotel did not do wake up call i explained to jal counter staff what happened and they knew there it was nothing on my side i could do more to be on time i was given new flightbut it was explained to me that is it special case which i understand and am grateful thanks to jal i could get back home my friends missed flight as well but they were with singapore airlines but no luck since singapore airlines did not help them at all so as you can see it does make a difference which airlines you fly i fly japan airlines on top of that you get two pieces of luggage plenty leg room new planes flight attendants with smile

i flew japan airlines flight from chicago ohare direct to tokyo narita and then continued on jal to osaka itami i paid extra for premium economy for the hour ord nar flight the extra expense was definitely worth the price you get a little more seat width massive amount of leg room and slightly better fooddrink choices the staff on this flight were very very nice ive also flown this route on united while there staff were also pleasant they never seemed as gracious as the japan airlines ladies at the end of the flight my flight attendant stopped by every passenger and personally thanked them for flying their airline she also asked if they needed anything right before landing entertainment options were decent i thought there would be more but the options were fine several recent english language movies several music channels although most seemed to be japanese there was also a daily minute news program focused on international news im not sure if regular economy people get them but our seats included complementary noise cancelling headphones nothing extravagant sony brand but a nice amenity nonetheless i think i had unreasonably high expectations for this airline i heard that its such a great option from usa to japan i sort of built it up to be this amazing experience it is certainly a nice airline but im not sure its any better than ana i just dont know what i can say is that this airline and this flight was really nice premium economy made the flight more bearable lets me real though the trip is not enjoyable unless you have a lieflat bed in business or first class which is very expensive but by looking at the people in regular coach i think i would have been in hell had i not paid the extra money for premium economy i recommend this to anyone who is tall or overweight or who just doesnt enjoy very long flights

good service smooth checkin comfortable seat nice aircraft most like the service and japanese hospitality but not many kind of beverages no foodit would be nice if they could serve a sandwich or cakemuffin for the price of the ticket

i was originally booked on jclass japan airlines domestic business class but for roughly usd i was able to upgrade to a firstclass seat on the day of departure you are entitled to a use of their diamond premier lounge and you can enter through their first class checkin room which is connected to their own security screening area the lounge has private seating areas where you can rest or catch up on your work with minimal interruption they also provide a selection of beverages food and snacks but dont dont go overboard and fill yourself up because the first class service provides warm meals upon departure the only class of service that provides meals on domestic flights as a first class passenger i was invited to board first along with their status holders there were total first class seats all with beige leather seating and a lot of leg room the food was very beautifully presented and they were of high quality the cabin attendants were very professional and welcoming and made the short flight a very memorable one

the jal airfare was a couple hundred dollars higher than united and other airlines but worth it our economy seats were extremely comfortable we are short people so we had no issues with legroom overall jals economy seats were much better than premium economy on united we had two full meals service was attentive and though the flight was over hours it did not seem that long
pampered luxury even in business class not worth the extra expense suffer for ten hours save eight grand
great service seat are comfortable food is ok very good help when needed to change ticket even though we had to pay extra still very happy

whenever possible i try to fly topquality national airlines flew jal jl this week superb service from checkin to first class lounge to business class travel amenities are superb staff is incredibly warm friendly and attentive new aircraft too few restrooms which was very comfortable any needs could be addressed by a new handheld pad duty free entertainment meals and snacks i really enjoyed the flexibility of the service the japanese and western meal options are very nice i always prefer the japanese meal seats incredibly firm and comfortable for a restful sleep a truly grand experience and lovely trip to the us following nearly two weeks of travel

think about everything you like when youre on a long flight you like good food check nice customer service check inflight entertainment check theres not a bad thing to say about jal youll have the smoothest and most comfortable flight ever

i always enjoy flying with japanese airlines great service and very helpful staff the only drawback is difficulties with their internet pages when you do not read japanese it might also be a inconvinient to travel from narita to the hotels i tokyo

customer service was amazing attendants were so attentive throughout the entire flight i asked for a little taste of two types of saki the attendant brought and left me the two entire bottles seat and ife controls were extremely easy to use great flight
excellent service very friendly staff on board cceptable leg room for hrs jal my favorite airline

probably one of the best airlines nowadays much improvement since last time i flew with them years ago impeccably clean cabin great comfortable seats they even give ergonomic pillows which allows you to sleep comfortably when seated without a problem the most fantastic food selection ive ever seen fresh tasty food and great selection of drinks which they serve during an entire flight the stewardess was constantly walking with a teapot even when most passengers were asleep checking in case somebody wants fresh tea and they do not economize on food they served premium h√§agendazs ice cream great movie selection as well overall the best the most attentive and friendly service onboard ive ever seen

this flight uses a with across seating in coach american airlines uses across seating the difference on a to hour flight like this is significant i have experienced the difference personally in august i flew americans from tokyo haneda to lax and in may i flew americans between dfw and santiago chile also the flight attendants were all excellent as expected with jal if you can avoid american airlines on this route my return to dfw the following week was on this aircraft with their new across seating in the main cabin the aisles are so small that the larger flight attendants have to move at an angle down the aisles plus the usual so so service avoid aa and fly japan airlines

weve flown on many airlines but this one might very well be the very best we ever flown the service is phenomenal from the way they check you in it is extremely respectful and formalized it is so refreshing to have a passport returned to you with both hands and a verbal thank you the service onboard is fantastic you can see that everything the flight attendants do is to make your flight a positive memorable one the beverages are nonstop so you wont have to worry about staying hydrated legroom is not an issue you can get out of the window seat without having to ask the person on the aisle to get up because of all the legroom in premium economy even the small things are noticeable in japan the checkin agent comes out from the counter to the line and asks you to come to their numbered location and on departure the ground crew came out and formed a three person line and waived and bowed while the plane taxied out they do it right if you ever have a need to fly to the far east i would definitely say i look forward to flying on jal when we go back to china next year

first time flying with jal and i cannot fault them this is the most leg room i have ever had in any economy seat the food was plentiful with small dishes as well as a main course service was impeccable the flight home via frankfurt was just as good although the plane was a different set up

my wife and i took our nd trip to indonesia flying with an asian airline this time it was with jal we booked our trip months in advance and got an awesome rate less than round trip for both of us jal had great service entertainment and food the american airlines could learn a few things from jal my only concern was jal has a day prior to take off policy to select your seats better mark your calendar or you could forget to select your seats and get something that is not desirable on our leg from tokyo to jakarta we were asked if we wanted seats closer to the front so we said yes the plane was not full and we sat in the row right behind first class wonderful service we will fly with jal in the future

really enjoyed this flight lots of space and legroom drinks served regularly both alcoholic and soft food the best ive ever eaten on a plane cabin crew courteous and attentive inflight entertainment great infact i cannot fault this airline

wow wow wow what a surprise i have flown many airlines over airlines for the past decades in asia us europe australia nz the best domestic airline in the us virgin america was an instant winner for me when i first flew within them yrs ago in the us in asia i am loyal to qantas naturally as i am from australia you heard a lot of publicity about the singapore airlines for its sevive quality but cant be compared to jal today i flew with them about yrs ago and the service was bad really bad as bad as us domestic airlines but what surprised me is that jal has reinvent itself totally from the time we checkin i was with my parents on wheelchair to leading us into our seats incredibly nice polite service that i cannot find in any other airlines the attention to details cannot exist in todays cut throat industry wow if u find similar services level in the us or in any country i would love to know

this was our first flight ever on jal so far we had flown mostly on western airlines european and north american it exceeded our expectation with excellent timeliness very kind and helpful personnel food was superb with choice between japanese and western anytime we return to japan jap will be our first option

after a horrible experience with china airlines flying japan airlines has been a breath of fresh air they really know how to do customer service right i am pregnant and had shown a letter stating that i am safe to fly when checking in other than that i never mentioned it to anyone they gave me priority boarding when my husband and i were seated we had two middle seats with a disabled lady on one side so a bit difficult to get out of we never complained at all but after takeoff the flight attendant came and asked us to move we couldnt quite catch everything she said due to the noise but two employees switched seats with us so that we could move to two seats on one side together with more room and easier access amazing she later gave us an extra bag of snacks and repeatedly checked that we were alright at the end of the flight she even came by with a gift for your baby a little fork and spoon set in a cute japan airlines carrying case so considerate we flew back again and we were just treated so considerately by all personnel we will now go out if our way to fly jal every chance we get in the future thank you

it was our first trip travelling in japan airlines business class and the experience was extremely good it started from the sakura lounge the food was good and we love the curry rice and cold green tea the aircraft during that time was still the old jal has since september changed to dreamliner was was fitted with their new business class sky suite seats the seat was comfortable and fully flat even though jal didnt give any pouch but their have distributed very comfortable pyjama and toiletries like eye and facial masks the all new meal menu and alcohol selections were excellent and i would like to specially mentioned that even though it was a hour journal the air stewardess didnt stop patrolling around and attended to any request from the customers it was indeed a very pleasant flight

ive flown many of the airlines in the world including most middleeastern airlines and jal is the best jal is the one airline i feel cares about its passengers the service is outstanding the food is actually delicious and the seats are comfortable with tons of space in fact on the they removed a seat so its a configuration instead of on all other airlines so there is much more space all around cant wait to fly with them again
not only is this the only airline flying direct from bos to nrt it has the best service and equipment of the reasonable possibilities for this route the service and food is impeccable

what a fantastic experience comfort level was exemplary with lieflat beds and superb privacy access to the aisle is easy from any seat unlike ba the food service and inflight entertainment were superb with good levels of choice and quality the dineanytime option was a touch of class and every member of staff were friendly courteous and efficient jal jclass rocks also the sakura lounge in tokyo was superb with amazing shower and relaxation facilities

premium economy seat is roughly equivalent to first class seat on or md the seat does not lie flat a recline that is close to degrees leg room is very good i ordered a kosher meal for both flights and i must say the meal was very good bbq chicken and rice for dinner and omelette for lunchbreakfast salmon on the way back was very good noise cancelling headphones were a nice touch the movie inventory wasnt very good and not everything is in english probably my biggest complaint dimming windows worked well generally the service was very good probably not far off of singapore air or swiss two of my favorites the better air quality on the was much more comfortable than other planes i highly recommend the for long haul for this reason alone on departure i got a comp invite to airline lounge which was a nice touch

ac was totally inoperative seats are narrower than any other airline i have ever been on seat was broke whenever i leaned back it would fall back all the way the staff could not fix it after hours of this they made me move before landing because my seat was unsafe

ive been flying jal executive class since the service is in keeping with the same high standard one experiences throughout japan the sky suites are thoughtfully designed we all know that the japanese are experts at maximising space huge tv screens that dont need to be flipped out and replaced space for putting items where they can be reached magazine holders and somewhere to put rubbish are all very welcome on a long flight compared to most of the other business class cabins ive tried on other airlines they are far superior except for their food the menu is designed by someone who is attempting to be creative and innovative and is failing miserably there are a few nice items but most is inedible my sixteen year old son who us usually ravenous refuses to eat anything other than the rice the other problem is that they dont serve breakfast at the end of an overnight flight they serve food but i wish theyd learn from ither airlines and iffer breakfast foods at breakfast time they need to replace their caterers then theyll be perfect

our flight left almost an hour late am so we were not even offered a meal the service level was indifferent and prior to our arrival the european breakfast offered was very poor the flat beds are okay but nothing special the return flight from narita also left an hour late once again the service level was indifferent and i had to wait half an hour after my wife was served to get my meal even though our orders were taken at the same time i will give jal a miss for a while or until their standards have improved

very pleasant flight from jfk to nrt despite the long duration ontime departure slightly early arrival very friendly service good choices of japanese and western food and a nice feature after the main dinner one could order diverse food items as one wished and pretty much at any time there was some period where this service was not available the business class seats offered decent comfort and privacy and the flight attendants where thrilled by my attempts to speak japanese overall a very nice travel experience

the seating was old and so was the aircraft boeing and the service and food did not match the aircraft or the service from wither europe or us jal appear to set the food standard to match competition and although the food was very well presented i have had a lot better the staff are always friendly and courteous

japan airlines has always been famous for its good service and this flight does not disappoint even with a nearly full cabin the service is still attentive and warm food is as usual quite good for breakfast since i wasnt particularly hungry i was going to choose the western option but the flight attendant talked me into going japanese the grilled pacific saury she told me is a particular seasonal specialty it was delicious and i was glad she took the time to inform me of it the only item that could make this flight better is if jal changes the business class to their sky suite configuration nevertheless i was able to sleep a couple hours on this flight

after our super stay at club med hokkaido we were flying to tokyo to spend days there after a smooth checkin we had some very good food at the airport restaurant the flight was on time short smooth and comfortable my kids complained about no inflight tv but managed to keep them occupied nonetheless

after reaching tokyo on an overnight jal flight from singapore we took this domestic flight to hokkaido though we had checked in our luggage straight through to hokkaido we still had to do it again in tokyo that was strange it was a long journey in haneda airport to the domestic section we stopped at the lounge which was spacious but the food was average the flight was short and quick obihiro airport is small quaint seeing the snow was exciting getting us ready for our ski holiday at club med
it was our first time to fly jal the service was great and staffs were friendly the food and beverage was better than other airlines i will use this their service very soon

we were on a family holiday with friends to club med hokkaido to ski jal leaves from t in changi singapore though we went to the lounge our kids saw the play area nearby and after a quick bite we went there it was an overnight flight and though the food was tempting we all slept the service was good and the seats comfortable we landed fresh the next morning in tokyo for our domestic connection to hokkaido

this trip was on a jal has removed a seat to allow for wider bodies in the seats that made the hour flight bearable the service from the flight crew was amazing they were super professional i did bring a cpap machine along so i could sleep on the flight my machine caused them considerable concern and they woke me up a few times asking to look at it they finally decided it was something i could use on the plane and left me alone i did show them the sticker saying it was approved by the faa for use on aircraft but i am not sure they understood that the interface for games and movies was a bit more modern than i am used to they had a great selection i think this must have been a newer plane
an excellent flight with a pleasant staff at all points in the trip it was a fairly crowded aircraft but still pleasant none the less ground crew were courteous and helpful
