i picked jal based on youtube videos i saw where their economy class seats had plenty of legroom imagine my surprise when i got on the plane los angeles to osaka and saw how cramped and small the seats were i used to be one of those people who didnt understand why passengers fought over reclining seats after flying jal i see why the woman in the seat in front of me extended her seat all the way back which took up all my personal space i literally wanted to push her and the seat out of frustration with her seat fully extended i couldnt get out of my seat to use the restroom so i had to hold on to her seat in order to get up which im sure it annoyed her but oh well also while trying to stretch i accidentally kicked the feet of the woman sitting in front of me theres not even enough room to stretch while seated unless youre a really short person i for the record am the seats were on this flight my friend and i sat in the row with seats the food was quite tasty the flight attendants were very friendly the ones who werent fluent in english tended hand me things and run away the flight attendants who are fluent in english took their time explaining things to me i really loved the fact that jal darken out the windows so that people can sleep after they serve the first meal this was my first international flight so ive never seen that done before on my flight from osaka to tokyo the seats were way more comfortable there were no individual tvs on the seats though the man seated in the row ahead of me asked if it was ok for him to extend his seat which i thought was extremely courteous there was plenty of legroom and i could extend my legs without accidentally kicking the feet of the person sitting in front of me i loved everything about jal except for the small and cramped seats on my hour flight from los angeles to osaka

nothing went right on our return trip from japan japan air allowed my year old daughter to bring a tripod on the plan to present at a summit in japan with no problem during our trip back not only would they not allow her to bring it on the plane not one representative of the airline understood english and we almost missed our flight because of this i repeatedly told them we were happy to leave the tripod and they could dispose it as they saw fit but they then told me i could not get on the plane unless i picked up the tripod from security either way they were not allowing me to get on the plane they separated my daughter and me and made me run through the airport not once but twice insisting i was going to miss my flight if i didnt run at full speed with my carry on luggage in tow after running for minutes straight i get to the gate to be informed there is an hour delay no one could have told the airline representative that as she was insisting i run at full speed back and forth through the airport

was very pleasantly surprised when we stepped into the aircraft a boeing first up it was maybe half business class and the other half economy with a small premium economy section secondly the economy configuration which was of the configuration was great it meant more width in the seat also this flight has the biggest legroom i have ever seen was just on an emirates boeing a couple of weeks before this flight and although quite good emirates does this jal was heaps better food was good too with great service do try their sky time kiwi juice its kinda weird but nice in a good way only thing i had a slight issue with is temperature usually when flying there are aircon vents above you which you can adjust on this flight though there werent any which made the aircraft a little on the warm side for me me and my dad were using the safety information card to fan ourselves during decent as it got warmer maybe flying a night flight might mitigate this

japan airline best airline from the rest of airline i had travelled to seoul via japan narita airport and return same the service was fully excellent i would suggest if you flying to canada seoul some part of usa must go with it

i love flying japan airlines service is excellent very polite and helpful seat arrangement was good didnt seem cramped personal enter monitor snacks mid flight they even arranged delivery if my cell phone when i list it at narita airport

i was dreading this flight after a cramped jal experience years ago but i was pleasantly surprised the leg room was comfortable the flight staff were very accommodating and the special meal request was quite edible my only complaint would be the aircon the cabin was very warm and there was no personal air vent the in flight entertainment wasnt huge but sufficient connecting flight to osaka actually left from haneda airport not narita so read the fine print in the itinerary and leave plenty of connecting time for a long bus trip

the very first time i flew with japan airlines jl was since then i have travelled many times with this carrier on several different sectors over the years i have found jl to be consistent in their service delivery from the moment you enter check in to completion of your flight you are dealing with smiling and service minded personnel and crew within reason nothing seem too much for jls staff and crew to ensure your experience is the best possible before i continue i just like to point out that over the last years i have travelled with more airlines than i care to remember some strand out as very good few come up to a standard similar to that of jl i have travelled in all classes with jl irrespective of class of travel their service level is high food even in economy class is of high standard i once travelled jl sector tokyo helsinki with a friend of mine we had just being served our first meal accompanied by a small bottle of sake at our request my friend said if this is what we are eating in economy class what on earth are they enjoying in business class i always find the cabin spotless the same goes for the toilettes the crew are constantly cleaning lavatories throughout the duration of the flight making sure everything is a only negative the inflight announcements are hard to hear and understand this due to low volume and sometimes poor english pronunciation the later depending on the crew member of cause i would like to see jl introducing english prerecorded inflight announcements i am fully aware that sometimes the operating crew has to make announcements in the cabin for various reasons summary of the above i mainly had economy class in mind here as majority of passengers travel in economy class jls premium economy is of very good standard entering business and first class we are talking excelent legroom is ample im cm i am very comfortable when in economy class including onboard their dreamliner seat comfort i feel is good no complains there catering as mentioned above of high standard the amount of food is just right snacks are available throughout the flight drinks are complementary on jl however the crew rightfully so reserves the right to refuse serving alcoholic beverage to any passenger who may be intoxicated as far as fares are concerned jl are matching other airlines there is not a great deal of fare difference from any other carrier as far as i have found i can highly recommend japan airlines if you are in japan flying jl try to see if you can obtain a special stop over package through jl

i traveled to the philippines to pick up my fianc√© and her son i was impressed with the fantastic food service and service overall they were very kind and gave my future son a choice of coloring book or model airplane to play with the seats were set wider apart and were very comfortable i will fly with this airline again

this was my first time traveling with jal gotta say that i love space on the airplane and in flight entertainments the service of cabin crews were smooth and nice however the only problem i had was the communication with jal ground staff they couldnt communicate in english which made the connections i had slower than expected but overall i will travel with this airline again but next time i will try to book a flight without any connecting flights

always a pleasure to fly jal entertainment is a little lacking by asian standards so on a hour daytime flight can get a little sparse super fast and affordable inflight internet on my flight love to fly on their s

this was my first time on jal the flight from jfk is long hrs so comfort and service are key i had originally booked economy seating but found out that you can upgrade to premium economy at the airport for dollars so decided to do that the extra room was worth it but the seat was a bit strange you could not actually recline the seat instead it slid forward which i did not care for i stayed in economy on the way back but found the seat a bit hard so put a few blankets down and was fine the service is wonderful and food acceptable the in flight entertainment was just okthe movies did not change from one month to the next all in all a good experience

checkin at the singapore airport was fast and smooth except that there is no bagdrop counter for people who do online checkin which defeats the whole purpose of doing online checkin however the checkin process at the osaka itami airport was terribly slow once again there is no separate queue for those who have done online checkin jal just added on an extra cm to the legroom and yes it means a lot the seats are much more spacious even though you are in economy meals on board are of good quality and i would say this is the most tasty airline meal i have ever tried drinks service are regular and the cabin crew are very friendly however i have only complain the cabin temperature is very warm

always a pleasure and a pleasant time attentive as always efficient wat more can ask for typical japanese efficiency also fly with them for all my international routes closing in on a million miles with them if they can come back with some services and awards to their most frequent fliers which were taken away with their bailouts would be a huge

i have now flown with jal over twenty times and rate them so highly i have to tell as many as possible firstly i get access to the business lounge on a premium economy ticket less than half price but can still upgrade to business for a few hundred dollars if there are spare seats when i check in they have never been delayed the plane is always a boeing you never get a really fat guy seating next to you sumo fly first class the service is excellent the toilets are always clean the food is great and the japanese beer is better i can not recommend them highly enough

jal is simply great airlines with very nice and comfortable planes and great cabin leg room is very nice and seats are very much comfortable food quality is very nice lovely and cabin crew overall great service

my st experience flying with jal to narita airport tokyo was satisfactory and enjoyable great service with friendly stewardesses though we had language barrier however the airconditioned on board was quite warm that night economy seat but comfortable

great service by all the attendants on the plane they were the most hospitable attendants i have ever flown with i wish i would have been in business class for this leg of my trip hours to bangkok but i was at the bulkhead and had some stretch roomoverall a good experience

after being told several years ago by friends about their positive experience with jal flying from sydney to london my wife and i decided to fly jal on our recent february trip to france and italy we decided to fly premium economy as on a cost basis it was certainly cheaper than going via the uae plus it also included overnight accommodation at narita airport before the on flight to paris we flew the entire outward bound sector on a boeing jals aircraft are modern clean reasonably quiet comfortable and bright the seating in premium economy is first rate there is plenty of leg room and the seats have generous width a big big plus is that the seat in front does not recline into your personal space and likewise neither does your seat encroach on your fellow passenger you are also supplied with sony noise cancelling headphones and a great selection of movies and to make the trip even more comfortable slippers and a blankets the presentation of all these extra as one expects from japan was impressive another feature about jal premium economy which we did not realise when booking is that jal give you access to their business class lounge as part of the fare on our return leg to australia and without going into great detail as a result of the impact of the terrorists attack in paris in late we were changed to a qantas premium economy flight not out of narita but out of haneda we thought that this would be an equally wonderful experience needless to stay what a disgrace old extremely noisey uncomfortable cramped i cannot describe how disgusted we both were with the qantas experience when the passenger in front reclined their seat the only way out to the single toilet also shared with business class was to do a chubby checker twist to get out of the row the so called crappy noise cancelling headphone were served up in a reused plastic bag making me think that the headphones from the previous user had just had the cord rewound and shoved back into a plastic bag i did even want to put them on the food so so ordinary we didnt eat it also with qantas you dont have access to the business class lounge when we fly again it will definitely be with jal a great airline

timely courteous efficient great service they were always checking to make sure i was comfortable and that everything was fine no complaints from me other than i could have used a bit more leg room everything else i was fully satisfied even the food was delicious sukiyaki type meat over rice fresh salad fruits that were sweet noodles ice cream and a drink i would definitely recommend jal also took the flight jl from shanghai pudong to haneda japan another great flight

our first time fling jal and we were most impressed from early checkin to completion of our journey whilst their grasp of english was limited the air hostesses were able to provide an in flight service second to none the planes were spotless although on one flight leg the plane was rather noisy which required ear plugs to sleep the inflight entertainment could also do with some improvement overall however a very good experience

in the last four years japan airlines has improve their airline considerably modern aircrafts with probably the best economy seats that you will find in an airline really good service at the airport and much better on board easy boarding and an excellent average of punctuality makes japan airlines one of the best options to travel today by plane good choice

we traveled in september for tourism purpose with this company repeatedly to make connections between okinawa and small islands miyako ishigaki yonaguni it was a difficult period because of the typhoons but we were warned every time at time and when canceled we had no worries for repayment at the service level everything was impeccable i even ordered indian vegetarian on board and really for the first time it has been a pleasure to eat in flight a really nice compagny

japan airlines is definitely one of the best for your flights to japan ive been using jal for my japan vacations since and i have not looked at another carrier since i currently use your jfk to narita flight jl and jl on return and will be using it again in two more weeks on october th in the morning the flight attendants are welcoming very friendly respectful and definitely make sure those long hours on the plane will be as comfortable as possible from checkin to getting on the plane was the most simple procedure checking in online is recommended but even if you do it at the airport its not a big deal both are fairly simple processes on the plane you have a large variety of movies music games and maps to keep you occupied they have multiple languages so again its not usually a problem you can also read manga and watch anime both of which i enjoy the planes are always in top shape very clean and ready for the next customers to come aboard the flight attendants also speak good english and there is plenty of leg room even in the economy seats overall its a very comfortable flight economy provides you with a very nice meal on the jfk to nrt route and then back to jfk last year they had beef bowls from yoshinoya on the route back to jfk that was great overall i love japan airlines for my flights to japan and will continue using them as long as i go to japan out of stars for me a very happy customer with jal thank you for all you do to keep the flight comfortable and keep us happy keep up the good work over there at jal

nice to be on a brand new with its comfort and features great overall service including food and entertainment the crew was exceptional buzzing around calmly and efficiently taking care of everyone impressive for economy class

jal sydnrt uses the qantas business class lounge so im not commenting on that the b was good and every seat had direct isle access even with the layout they have the sky suite mk ii and it was like a cocoon style suite i tried the japanese dishes and was delicious the lounge at narita was busy but roomy they have an upstairs dining room which is well catered for and serves modern and traditional meals as per usual they have ample seating free wifi and food and beverages they have an automated beer serving machine a must to see it in action the flight from nrtcdg was with a b every seat has direct isle access layout and has the mk ii sky suite installed however it has marked improvements to it then on their b the suite is more digitalised and automated the meals were again outstanding i had the japanese meals again i also ordered the snack food from the seat pda and it was delivered promptly the aircraft and crew were faultless the check in at both locations overnight stay in tokyo was seamless i checked my bags all the way through so i avoided waiting for them in nrt the japanese staff at nrt didnt speak english to well but we managed to communicate pretty well cant wait for my return journey
overall very good polite check in service minus one jerk polite flight attendants and a clean airplane but a bit expensive
a very friendly flight attendant abroad made or flight much comfortably they come handy and always tried to give the best service they can for us
from check in to baggage pick up everything went smoothly staff very friendly and helpful seats comfortable great movies and other channels to choose from food was really tasty too

jal was best airline i have flown to beijing and the airport experience in china was so much better than some of the chinese carriers who had one single line for all check in do leave time for security and immigration though it can be slow

we were very happy with this flight as the premium economy seats were really spacious particularly important for my tall husband they were capsules and thus one was never bothered by the person in front moving their seat back there were lots of spaces for storage too the flight attendants were there when needed drinks were available throughout and the food was fine we were also pleased that we could use the qantas lounge while waiting for the flight

solid performance attentive service mostly japanese clientele which to whom they properly cater correspondingly their selection of movies is quite limited almost no european movies and not many korean indian or chinese ontime performance and easy one terminal hasslefree transfer in narita

this is a long haul over hours of constant flying we actually started with a connecting flight from hong kong also on jal so the total flying time was close to hours checkin was smooth and our bags were transferred without problems there were plenty of food and beverage options both japanese and western the quality of the fixed menus and the alacarte choices was excellent the number of flight attendants was sufficient to provide efficient and friendly service the aircraft from narita to boston was a with comfortable seats in the upright relaxed and bed positions entertainment choices were plentiful and the electronics were in good working order i bought an expensive fullfare business ticket for myself and combined it with a lowcost companion ticket for my wife though one of our creditcard programs which made the cost for two competitive with other business fare options on other airlines i highly recommend jal for flights from the us east coast to east asia

after awful transocean trips on american airlines and british air traveling on jal was reminded me of what flying once was until the airlines decided they could make more money by packing customers tight enough to provoke some poor souls to airrage on jal the seats were wide enough and the leg room ample enough so that we didnt feel cramped even the bathrooms were large highly recommended for anyone with mobility issues there were enough bathrooms too the food was excellent our breakfast a rice bowl with condiments came with a card identifying the food and instructions on how to enjoy it i ate every bit if i have a choice i will always choose jal for transocean flights

flights were pretty much on time and it made so much more sense to board from back to front after the first classelderlychildren were boarded because it made getting on the plane and checking your carryon luggage in the bins that much more efficient and fast stewardess were all very friendly polite and professional would definitely fly jal again in the future

spacious ergonomical seats which are quite roomy and comfortable the back is shaped in such a way that it moulds to your back and you dont have to put it on recline to be comfy generous amenities full water bottle to last you throughout the flight in flight comfort kit and of course fun kid packs for the little ones shows how thoughtful they are in trying to make your flight as comfortable as possible easily my favorite airline and my year old daughters too yes she always bencmark other airlines to japan airlines due to excellent experience she had on board

having flown premium economy with another carrier this year we decided to upgrade for this flight also it is very much worth paying the extra on a long haul flight and jal were worth the upgrade but i have to say that the other carrier we used this year was slightly betternot much the seat comfort and inflight entertainment were better although they did not have wifi as jal did all in all jal was a comfortable flight and the cabin crew were very attentive and everything was kept absolutely spotless would have no hesitation in recommending jal at all please see my other reviews on airlines

the extra money is worth it with more space and better amenities for long haul trips i would heartily recommend it my husband is a little overweight lbs so long flying times in cramped seats dont appeal to him premium economy let him recline comfortably with a footrest so he actually slept which he normally cant do on airplanes we did china awhile ago so i know additionally with bose noise cancelling headphones to watch movies and great meals and snacks we were stuffed getting off the plane both going to and returning from tokyo these were very pleasant overseas flights and the attendants were all so attentive and friendly it made the trip all the better

good old aircraft that has great layout in economy typical domestic service with soft drinks only and attentive staff punctual i have one world sapphire card so enjoying the perk like a airline lounge and priority check in and boarding are an advantage

they actually hold a banner from the side of the runway and wave you off with a banner that says see you again soon besides this they are attentive to your needs especially with the call button they answer all your immigration questions they serve with a smile and not like someone who hates their job

not a good organised airline in sydney but that was the best part approaching tokyo the plane was diverted to the other side of japan because of a storm over tokyo having been delayed for hours i missed my connection to new york when we arrived back in tokyo their booking office was closed and we spent the night on the floor with no blankets food or water no one came to apologize and we had to make our own arrangements for onward travel this caused missing a day that was already paid for in new york i wont recommend this airline to anyone

have to wait more than hours before we can check in just because of the taifun have to rush for boarding after check in i agree with safety first policy and do not mind the wait luckily the airport facility in the area before check in is quite good so we are not too uncomfortable because no waiting lounge in this area flight was good service were perfect from my experience japan airline stewardesses are well informed and always make note about arrival time number of passengers etc the business class seats are a bit narrow and i wish the cabin temperature can be lowered to about degrees c so we can enjoy sleeping under the blanket not sweating when standing at the galleys area the temperature is nice and cool but the cabin is too warm for me the availability of toilet showers are one of the best comfort look forward to fly again on jal the food is always good and by making a transit stay for one or more nights in japan we will not suffer from jet lag when travelling from and to the us by allowing no extra charge for transit in japan one or two nights following the transit visa shore pass regulation i am sure more traveler will take jal when travelling to the us and it will be good for tourism in chiba and japan

always impressed with jal the service is just solid i wouldnt go far as to say friendly but it is efficient and quality the seats in premium economy were good certainly on par with the offerings from cathay and qantas and better than american or ba the flight might take longer but its great way to get to nyc watch out for passport control in nyc hour line up i want be so upset about early morning arrival in la again at least its only ever taken mins there

we flew the sydneynarita and naritafrankfurt legs and return with jal the canberrasydneycanberra legs were with qantaslink the jal ticket was by far the cheapest business class ticket other than koreanair and the chinese airlines that require a long layover in a chinese airport and included hotel overnights in sydney and narita on the outward journey the jal route to europe has two advantages over other australiaeurope routes it divides the flight into more even legs the total time is not longer than with say singapore airlines because it flies almost over the north pole it avoids war zones the service on board was excellent and there is a choice of japanese or european menus the only small downside is that even with the mattress provided the beds are a bit hard

very good service very comfortable seats good room leg the inflight entertainment offered good choice of movies and entertainment there is also moslem food choice for muslim travel we enjoyed our hours journey from changi to haneda tq jal

jal is an example of japanese service friendliness and efficiency i had upgraded to pe for a reasonable price and the seat and extra space were worth the cost meals are the same as in economy with some added extras like champagne and noodle cups staff very courteous and with a quick response to a call meals were tasty and unlike other companies there was no western option regular drink and snack rounds the entertainment programme offered enough variation to keep one from getting bored regular information announcements from the staff and pilots

if you like japanese mangascomics and plan to go to japan take japan airlines many manga are available for you to read for the or hours spent in the airplane you wont get bored at all also their food was great i had udon noodles and rice with salmon instead of the chicken or beef dishes served in other airlines on the way to japan on the return trip i had the yoshinoya beef bowl and hagendaz icecream i enjoyed flying round trip to japan for the first time

jal were wonderful to fly with we had our four children with us and they were very attentive to ensure that they were comfortable and happy the meals were lovely and larger than other airline meals the entertainment system was very up to date and modern the plane itself was roomy and economy did not feel squashy at all we would definitely fly jal again in the future

i dont normally leave reviews for airlines flights are normally pretty similar maybe slightly better food or facilities but you pretty much know what youre getting however jal surpassed any airline ive ever flown on and the customer service and food was outstanding we flew economy but this was even better than any premium economy either the staff went out of their way for you without you asking for it jesus who was in the back cabin of ba on th september noticed i was hot when i was getting on the plane and came with cold water and sorted out the air con he was lovely to chat to and offered to bring my dinner later and heat it up as i was asleep when it was brought round im not a great traveller despite flying several times a year so he made the experience much more pleasant the food was such a delight such good quality and i actually ate it all which i dont normally do on a flight it felt like flying was back in the s great service great food with some thought put into it and the experience made you feel a bit special

jal offers the best economy class product across the pacific hands down with inches if seat pitch and wide seats the ride is very comfortable crew is truly professional and extremely courteous and polite meals are good and flights almost always on time in my opinion services to san francisco are from haneda airport which is very convenient to all points in central tokyo highly recommended

ouch it all began with the officious crew in western uniform i remember jal staff in traditional dress giving us a taste of their country as soon as you step on board seats are narrow and hard and at cms i could not stretch out completely in a flat bed food so so

i had a flight to tokyo from cgk and i had a good time during the flight i remember the cabin crew gave us a disposable towel for cleaning the face the leg room is long enough the seat is comfortable the entertainment is good as well one thing that i dislike is the food i didnt like the raw dish that they served to me tasted awful to me but with the good service i would say that my experience was fair enough

this is a little gem and a nice experience although this is only my second first class flight i think im happy to declare its probably not worth the extra dollarspoints up from business class maybe singapore suites may change this opinion you get into the qantas first class lounge in sydney where the neil perry dining means there isnt much point eating on the plane too much when you are on the plane the service is terrific as expected and the pours of alcohol generous the japanese appreciate someone who can handle their scotch and are respectful and nonjudgmental the hibiki yr old and chivas royal salute went down very well they are obviously proud of their menu which is very good the wifi didnt work that well but why be on the phone when on a flight like this on the return the jal sakura lounge is good too with a sushi bar and sake bar its the best thing about the otherwise uninspiring and long way out narita airport

whilst jal had most of the perks that usually come with business class its seats and your personal space could do with a a little face lift seats go into full bed mode i even had a mattress in my overhead cabin to make my flight more comfy remote control was within reach without any effort to control my seat which had a very gentle massager did nothing for me really and my tvhello my husband got the window seat and i got the aisle so even though i couldnt get a proper view of outside at least i couldve slide my privacy window upautomatically so i can hide my jealously i had access to all the latest american movies and even japanese and indian films with caption i also had enough space to store all my knickknacks extra bags and books food was awesome i had course options japanese western and i cant remember the other i chose the japanese it had so many different items from prawn lotus root egg roll eel duck pufferfish and more some items in this course came in a tray looked like food samples but nevertheless was fulling the meal was the most interesting it was like a food feast in the air i even got to make my own origami my fight attendant offered to wake me up for breakfast a first ive encountered on a flight which i truly appreciated

we were dreading a long flight but it was so comfortable excellent food very good wine and the hostesses were attentive and beautiful we had such a good time with our friends when the plain landed we did not want to get off

as we have someone on wheelchair travelling with us we were assisted at every sector of the flights first we were told to check in early to get the needed seats near to the toilets we were able to sit together upon arrival at tokyo for the transfer to the domestic terminal there was a ground staff who assisted us accompany all the way for the transfer i m quite sure we wong make it without his help and company there was a free transfer n the re checking in of luggage etc and he was a great and comforting presence i m so pleased as it was excellent service i have no hesitation flying jal on the future by the way the seats and keg room on both planes were much spacious compared to many other airlines o have flew in kudos to jal

the service on the narita to honolulu flight is different to other jal services such as to europe and usa where there is more competitionthe food selection was very limited and the food good but not to the standard you might see on other flights there was no amenities packthe staff however compensate and are always very good and pleasant the aircraft was an older and not to other business class standards

we flew from los angeles to hong kong with a hour stopover at narita in tokyo on september la to japan via boeing and japan to hong kong via both new planes were very comfortable i especially like the touch screen monitors and bathrooms the cabin services were excellent throughout the trip the pilot landed the in foul weather at narita very smoothly however i was disappointed with the food served this entire trip i had expected better tasting food from jal it may be just me but i found the packaging of meals especially annoying and difficult for someone with arthritic fingers i did like the miso soup served hot from a pitcher my mochi ice cream was frozen passengers with connecting flights had to go through another security check because narita had only one machine operating there was a long queue the bottleneck made us nervous about missing out flight turned out our flight was delayed by half an hour before takeoff anyway

very efficient and friendly checkin premium economy seats have plenty of leg room when the person in front reclines the back of their seat does not move so you always have plenty of space this is the type of seat you got in business class a few years ago food was excellent onboard service was excellent well worth the extra money above economy fare this is the best premium economy flight i have ever taken

as platinum frequent aa flyer i can tell you that from the checkin until luggage claim everything was perfectly organized and well orchestrated amazing good food and service hostesses very helpful and polite a very but very good experience western airlines can still learn from them
a very nice trip with jal on our first trip with them great service and some very nice japanese food to sample overall an enjoyable trip

everything worked perfectly from checkin to baggage claim the seats were pretty comfortable and little bigger than usual so there was atleast few cms more space to spend the hr flight in flight attendants were all nice and really polite and always willing to help also there were lots of movies and series to watch from your own screen food was also pretty good and the flight landed in narita a few minutes earlier than expected the must useful thing is that the price includes xkg of checked baggage you can take with you since nowadays some companies charge extra even for one kg luggage so im definitely using jal when im going to japan next timw

first leg is codeshare flight with qantas to aussie which was cancelled jal came to the party and booked us on another airline whch got us to tokyo earlier than our scheduled flight full marks for fixing what could have been a very sad day and whne finally on an actual jal flight service very good

i have flown many airlines but jal is by far the classiest i cant really put it into words but there is absolutely no question that i have felt appreciated as a customer while flying jal ive made the trip between tokyo and manila maybe times now and have yet to be disappointed it doesnt hurt that a nice cold can of beer is free just as the typical sodas i have taken advantage fo this a time or two especially since this hour flight is usually immediately following my hour chicago to tokyo flight anything to take the edge off is fine by me

jal has recently upgraded many of its planes to the they are roomy relatively and comfortable compared to previous jal airplanes and much better than any usbased airline meals are good for airplane food and service is very good talk to the staff if you have any questions or comments japanese people are not likely to upgrade anyone for trivial reasons but they will do their best to accommodate any requests

ive flown tokyohonolulu tokyoparis tokyolondon tokyola tokyobangkok and ive never been disappointed their premium economy is my choice if cant be on business class plenty of leg room the reclining seats are amazing and the meals are actually good they usually have jal brand cup noodles if youre not up for a whole meal or still hungry and their selection of wines etc are quite nice and plenty of newspapers and magazines too if youre flying from nrt must try the japanese style beef curry served in the jal lounge

our hour flight was on a newer plane the legroom was tight in economy but the seat were comfortable with adequate cushioning the lavatories were spacious and clean they even had toothbrushes in the lavatory the flight attendants served meals on the flight neither was really tasty but at least it was something to eat there was a box of snacks available between meals the flight attendants were polite and gracious as you would expect of the japanese check in security customs and boarding were a breeze at the osaka airport

we contacted jal directly as we needed a bassinet for our son so were able to select our seats at the time of booking once on board the legroom and seating was good for an economy seat the service for infants is also good with staff providing meals hot water and also washing bottles the food and drink service for adults is also better than some airlines of a similar grade jal has improved considerably in recent years

i love japan airlines this is my first choice i been flying with them for many yrs i traveled to japan i like how they treated me they give excellent customer service everyone from the checkin to the stewardess are so friendly i never had any problems the staff are so professional too they deliver service with a smile all the time i know most people who choose airlines would usually go for the cheapest price first but not me i always look for how well the staff treats the customer i really do not mind paying the price to ride this airlineto me it is well worth it i would give this airline a star i also would recommend japan airlines to everyone out there the food is also so good so when i exit the planei always bow to the staff because i appreciate them japan airlines is the safest to ride in my opinion

we decided to travel with jal due to the advertised extra cm leg rooms it did not disappoint us however the seat design is quite strange and i had to put pillows to support my lower back the check in in the airport is smooth although the flight is full we have no problem storing our hand carry in the overhead compartment unlike some other airlines it may be lucky that you find room to store your hand carry as other passengers seem to have so many hand carry luggage and the airline is not stopping them the jal air hostesses are very polite and attentive the meals are decent and jal is generous with their drinks and you can help yourselves to snacks during the flight

i love japanese cuisine and i would always fly with any airline that serves japanese food of course japan airlines being japans national carrier would make a tremendous job in serving the best japanese airline food onboard i also find their flight crew one of the most courteous crew among all airlines there is something different on how japanese talk and give service they speak almost in whispers and they move very gracefully the flight crew were all japanese except there was one time we flew to bangkok also using jal and our flight crew were of different nationalities and they stayed in the same hotel we stayed in we got to talk to some of them and the japan airline crew was being trained in bangkok i guess the training of jal flight crew is very different and its very exceptional i dont mind flying with jal again the seats are ok food is good and crew is exceptional

normally wed pull an economy flight but there were none left i must admit it was great having extra legroom and comfy recliner seats also you get a little qantas lounge at the start the best bit is that the seats dont move back when you recline so noone gets in your face and you dont piss anyone off ever my first meal was excellent but my partner says never choose the fish the staff are superb really good staff one of the gentlest landings ever there were some slight delays sydney airports fault and you could tell they really cared about not being on schedule they made up the time on the way and we arrived bang on if you are flush with funds go for it for the space but if moneys too tight to mention their economy is pretty good too
lovely experience but then i had never really experienced going to japan before their meals are a lot of fun if you like japanese style otherwise play it safe and request your meal before the flight

night flight meal are excellent as food was from japan catering furthermore with hagen daz icecream as dessert cheese bread as late snack i requested for hot water and it was served real hot so pleased service
i and my family are the big fan of jal due to many reasons that you could get best services bestnew aircraft good food however the ticket price is quit high compared with those of others

japan airline is one of the best airlines ive flown with everything from the time you checkin till the time you leave the airport at your destination is excellent all the staff are extremely helpful delightful and extremely approachable the seating on the plane as well as the meal was fantastic

excellent flight on one of jals dreamliners crew was so graceful it was a pleasure loved the japanese whiskey they gave out helped me sleep through hours of travel time i did like anas seating more comfortable though but their plane was better
it was great first impression lasts experience for us to try a different airline to far east the service food inflight entertainment is excellent comfortable flight free layover hotel too

jal are the best from the moment i checkedin to the time in the diamond lounge to the boarding and the flight i was impressed but then that is what i take for granted as i have flown with jal many times and know that i am always in the best hands all the staff treat me like a king and spoil me rotten i love to have a casual joke with them and they are always very pleasing to talk to i wont fly with any other airline in japan as i believe that jal is number

my st time to fly japan airlines happened because our original departure flight from beijing back to the usa got cancelled and we were rerouted from pek to tokyo and then the us the experience was very good with a very friendly staff that spoke very well in english the food service was great and the in seat entertainment options were friendly towards an english speaking customer if another opportunity happens would consider flying japan airlines again

dont get the bulkhead seat in economy there is no seat pocket to store things in and the tv is small and cannot be used until after takeoff crew were busy and took min before we could figure out how to select the english instructions on the tv food was ok comfy flight angle flat seats so it would be awful to sleep on but good for daytime flight

what an excellent service jal provides the seats are the best i have sat in in either economy or indeed business class leather and full on soft staff totally attentive without being over the top and check in was seamless without barely a word of english

this was one of the best long haul travel experiences ive ever had the customer service was incredible the efficiency was unbeatable the award winning seats menu and service made my trip unforgettable

jal was the best airline i have flown in years i loved the dreamliner a quiet and spacious aircraft i very much appreciated the roomy seats jal gave even in economy the service was attentive and friendly and the crew was very considerate of the time passengers needed to sleep i dont know how economy class can get any better than this

the good thing about jal is that you know what you will get never excellent never bad just the same regular service the airplanes seem to be a bit nicer lately service is always helpful and the lounges are consistent

this is my first time trying japan airlines and i never experienced such service from the other airlines before everything in the plane is just so comfortable that you would want to extend the hours of your flight all the crews were so friendly as well

fantastic in every way i had traveled on jal several years ago and the experience was ok wow have things changed now excellent service on time arrival and the food was a step above typical airline cuisine i highly recommend jal
the food was great and the flight attendants were very nice the aircraft was very clean would definitely like to travel jal again

your experience on a flight is always defined by the class of service in this case premium economy but it felt almost as good as business class the seats are wider and have more dedicated legroom than any other prem economy ive flown the in flight service was excellent and the staff pretty good too if im flying jal again id find it hard to justify the extra expense for business unlike other airlines

seat and legs room were wider than most of the big airline adult food was average but the kid meal was amazing entertainment system was average in comparison but enough to kill time during the hrs of flight all kid will get to choose a toy gift once they on board and keep them accompanied while waiting for boarding the domestic connection the captain actually reach out every kid and say hi and give them stickers this kind of service which i used to see years ago but hardly see these days jal really give you a feeling of being a customer rather than a passenger jal was my first flight years ago and after years later they did let me down strongly recommended if you are travelling with young kids
on the long haul flight the choice of food and drinks was very big local and international entertainment was good with a big choice
standard services from the crews the foods need to have some improvements i expect higher from the aircraft but it looks like budget airline
comfortable relax very good service an excellent opportunity to take some photos of fuji mountain feel lucky

i always have excellent flight experiences flying with jal and this was no exception the flight stewards are willing to share a laugh with you and are always willing to help from the checkin to the lounge to the boarding to the flight i know im in good hands with jal

i love jal they are one of my favourite airlines service and comfort is their speciality nothing is too difficult for jal the ladies on the flight are always prepared to engage with the traveller giving you that warm friendly feeling

i flew jal because an open jaw ticket from tokyo to kl and from singapore to tokyo was available only on jal the air fare was quite reasonable for flying in a busy summer season the seats on the outbound flight b were spacious for the economy class but the seat cover was a bit slippery and not comfortable the seats on the inbound flight b were quite tight it was an overnight flight and i couldnt sleep very well the meals were mediocre at the most jal used to provide top notch inflight services but i didnt feel that way this time at all the general attitudes of the cabin crew were just okay which may reflect some inadequacy of their current job training it just wasnt like that before

i flew this route early august and jal has started using new s on the route its a two class version business and coach the business cabin has lie flat seats in a configuration on the way to taipei i had the japanese meal and it was actually good on the way back i had the western meal and it was passable service was standard jal which has improved over the years
no earplugs and slippers provided on the plane flight meals also not good as before feel disappointed

i try to fly jal whenever i fly to japan be it for business or for vacation living in taiwan and working in asia means i am in the air a lot the flight is almost always on time if not early the cabin crew are very well trained and offer very good service regardless of seating class be it economy or business class you are treated with great service and respect i will definately fly japan airlines within asia as much as possible

i live in japan so i traveled with jal a lot of times to a lot of places and i always have mixed feelings about it the price of the ticket was not too expensive but jal usually is they are a very prestigious airline famed for always being on time and their very high standards i agree just like pretty much everything in japan they live up to their standards specially in safety and service however on this particular flight i was not happy at all the flight going to bangkok the aircraft was much older and the way back had a very new very nice aircraft one good thing was there was more space even my very tall husband was happy that the leg space on economy class was bigger and on both the older and newer plane the entertainment system was much better on the newer airplane but the movie selection was very good and similar in both now the bad i never flew with jal that i actually liked their food this time was no exception it was a midnight flight and they did not serve dinner just a pastry that i couldnt figure what it tasted like and some nuts i didnt eat at the airport cause haneda does not have lots of options either so i was hungry until morning well morning breakfast wasnt great either on the flight back was the same thing a dinner but no choice at all usually every airline has a western choice this did not thou the food wasnt as terrible this time after flying hours there was nothing at breakfast only coffee well still they turn the lights on hours before landing so you basically cut on the very little extra sleep you could have had it seemed as they are trying to cut on costs also surprisingly the service was not the best some of the flight attendants did not speak english well it was a little hard to communicate and also a bit rude not likely to japan at all i was disappointed specially since my next flight was with bangkok airways and they won so much with me with service and super tasty food in a very short flight i could definitely tell the difference i was never a big fan o jal for long flights and besides de extra space im not sure i would choose them again

there is no direct flight from toronto to tokyo we need to take aa to dallas first and then connected the jal to tokyo onboard flight crew were attentive and met any requests with a smile and a bow we loved the space that we had even though we just in economy class so much more legroom and actual space the food was moderate but their service was good

although i had booked my flights on another company issues made me travel with jal instead and it was a very pleasent surprise to flight with this company excellent quality at every level nice staff very good selection of programs to watch good quality meal all this made this long journey to japan very enjoyable and the start of very good vacations i would absolutly flight with them again for another visit in japan

japan airlines is one of my favorite airlines with very friendly and smiling flight attendants the moment you are seated a hot towel japanese snacks and drink will be served every seat has direct access to the aisle even the seat configuration is all window seats have a direct access without having to pass over your next neighbors legs whenever you want to get out even most of the flight attendants are japanese but their knowledge in the english language is totally sufficient to answer passengers question and request seats are very comfortable although not very wide but they are fully flat which is very important for a long haul flight meal is served two hours after take off and everyone can request light meals anytime during the flight and hours before landing meals are created by renowned culinary chefs in japan i always ordered japanese meals but western ones look appetizing as well i once had lamb chop on the flight from nrt to lax and it was surprisingly good movies on board have many choices including the newest released screen is very good size sakura lounge at narita airport for business class is very decent you just can go to the one nearest to your boarding gate if someone is fortunate enough to get into the first class lounge made to order sushi may be the best choice at the sakura lounge you can also have rice noodles hot soupbesides all kinds of beverages the airport and lounges are sparkling clean one more hint is that reservation should be made as soon as possible if you plan to travel during the peak seasons which are usually spring and autumn

what was a lovely trip to japan sapporo tokyo was spoilt at the final leg of the trip from tokyo to singapore the checking in was a long process there were of us with singapore passports and with malaysian passports all prs my son had a tube with a fishing rod to check in after issuing the boarding passes came the surprises first they asked for proof of residence in singapore for the my passport holders of us carried our sg ics with us and had no issue my daughter just had her sg driving licence to them that was not good enough and we had to wait for a good mins while they checked they came back with the most ridiculous reason from their counterpart in singaporesometimes the immigration in sg stops people who cannot provide residence status if only they checked the ica site they would have realised no visa is required if that is what they were after we settled that by signing an indemnity of some sort a cya for their comfort then came the next surprisethe tube with the fishing rod exceeds dimensions cm instead of max cm and my son had to pay s to get it loaded never had he ever experienced such an instance even on budget airlines where he carted his fishing tube eg tiger scoot and air asia so people with fishing gear esp tubes be careful and opt for other airlines for prs just carry your sg ic with you jal behaved worst than a low cost airline and this is the first and last time we fly jal

if you ever have enough money or points to fly first class then i highly recommend japan airlines only first class seats on my flight with wonderful ladies to attend to us it was an experience second to none i chose the japanese menu over the western menu and the food kept coming in small portions the entire flight it was wonderful the seat went to a fully flat huge bed much bigger than that of british airways

flying on jal was a very great step up from flying on american to tokyo the plane was much newer or at least refurbished there seemed to be a little more legroom and the seats were comfortable the entertainment system was definitely an upgrade from the american flight the food was quite nice and there was plenty to eat we got two meals on this hour flight beverage service was pretty normal and you could get alcohol if you paid for it the flight attendants were helpful and courteous jal is now an alaska airlines partner so there is one more reason to fly with them in the future i had left an item on the aircraft and it was difficult to get in touch with a jal representative at the jakarta airport never did get the item back but that was not their fault

first buying direct from jal website was only more per flight than expedia but you got to chose your seat and types of meal at time of booking on both the flight out and the return so i could book the same seats both ways i wont say which seats we had i dont wont everybody booking thembut seatguru listed them as bad they were the best seats weve ever had all economy seats have extra width and pitch compared with any other economy seat ive ever sat in usb socket power supply below seat and nifty drink holders cubbies and folding tables the films were up to date the food was very good and self service snacks and drinks were available throughout the flight the toilets were clean and were cleaned during the flight and a few toothbrushes were put out near the end of the flight the cabin crew were excellent and were so charming and attentive both the japenese crew and the englishirish crew would i fly jal again you bet i would

my first flight with jal was in the year i was impressed with the courtesy and efficiency of the crew ive flown many times since in a mixture of business and economy class whilst it may not be up to the standards of other airlines like emirates jal is in a class of its own and is now my preferred carrier depending on destination

japan airlines are great to travel with there is plenty of leg room the staff provide great and attentive service the food is ok by airline standards it was a pity that the entertainment server crashed making a hour daytime flight seem much longer the staff were apologetic in typically japanese style i intent to join the frequent flyer programme

this airline offers really the best value for money for the franrt connection at euros it is only a fraction of what the lufthansa flight would have costed service on board was extremely friendly and the food was very good having said that the service in nrt was not really great as many of the ground personnel were very complicated and took ages to check in nevertheless it is such a good deal i would always choose this airline over lufthansa to fly to nrt

‰ªñÁ§æÂêåÊßò„Å´Êó•Êú¨Ëà™Á©∫„Å´„ÅØ„Éó„É¨„Éü„Ç¢„É†„Ç®„Ç≥„Éé„Éü„Éº„ÅÆ„Çµ„Éº„Éì„Çπ„Åå„ÅÇ„Çã„ÅåÂõΩÂÜÖÁ∑ö„Åß„ÅÆ„Ç≥„Çπ„Éà„Éë„Éï„Ç©„Éº„Éû„É≥„Çπ„ÅØÊ•µ„ÇÅ„Å¶È´ò„ÅÑÂçÉÂÜÜ„ÅßÂæó„Çâ„Çå„Çã„ÇÜ„Å®„Çä„ÅÆÁ©∫ÈñìÁ©∫Â∏≠„ÅÇ„Çä„ÅÆÂ†¥Âêà„ÅØÊòØÈùûÂà©Áî®„Åó„Åü„ÅÑ as the other airline company jal also has the premium economy class which also is available for most other domestic line this class for domestic lines is absolutely affordable and i believe its worth to spend spacious comfortable and you may get early check in for upgraded customers you may not want to miss when its available

we normally fly this leg business class but were utilising points and first class only was available we tried the first class sakura lounge at narita airport which we didnt like as it was super dark and occupied by businessmen it felt unfriendly and we reverted to what we knew the sakura business lounge much more spacious with great views of the airport there are only first class suites on each aircraft in the configuration of if you like to sit together you are better to choose the middle two suites we decided to have window seats behind each other and the space is very good as is the lie flat bed the entertainment on offer isnt really extensive enough there were a few recent movies but generally the choice is poor the dinner was very similar to that offered in business class but the breakfast is more hard core japanese style not an egg in sight and we found the choice completely undesirable we just had coffee and fruit i would not travel or pay to go first class again the new business class seats all have aisle access and the breakfast choices are far better they provide everything a traveller would want privacy space decent seats a lie flat bed decent food choices and a reasonable price

i traveled with japan airlines once before but this time i traveled back with my husband from the check in our luggage until getting to the gate everything was good we loved the space that we had even though we just in economy class the food was moderate but their service was good i dont mind to travel again with japan airlines next time

checked out seat options of different airlines for this premium economy trip jal had easily the largest seat and leg space configuration the most amazing courteous check in procedure ive ever experienced in any class of business travel great entertainment system and food my new favourite airline

we use jal often due to their favorable business class prices and seating configuration which allows window seat passengers clear aisle access on jl there are now flat beds after takeoff at a drinks service is offered followed by lunch the timing of lunch is questionable as most passengers have just enjoyed breakfast in the qantas lounge in sydney there is no jal lounge japanese and western cuisines are offered the western choices always include fish beef and chicken but not a vegetarian option the presentation and level of service is excellent each meal is delivered individually not on a trolley however this all happens between and and im never ready for lunch at this time the entertainment is reasonable but latest movies are limited before landing at narita a snack is offered although a snack menu is available all day consisting of three types of japanese noodles and other offerings what sells this service to me is the timing of the service the reliability of the schedule and the graciousness of the service leaving first thing in the morning and arriving just after makes for a comfortable journey or stopover if youre travelling onwards id give it another star if they moved lunch back hours

the space for your legs is so spacious makes it very comfortable for a long haul flight thanks to the newly designed seats the food was tasty and wrapped nicely which made it interesting flight attendants were nice and they did speak english well

first flight ever on japan airlines jal it was a long flight but service from the crew members helped make the journey much more pleasant we received slippers to wear on the flight over to japan that was a nice surprise

jal is my preference of travel whilst im in japan you are treated like royalty from the moment you walk up to the checkin counter until the moment you disembark their warm friendly professional service is what brings me back to their airline every time you are kept well informed by the captain during your flight and nothing is too difficult for the flight stewards i was even asked if i needed the safety demonstration to be explained in english

when traveling for hours charlotte nc to mnl philippines ones level of patience as well as frustration does get thin it become more true when youre traveling with a year old grandson the last flight to mnl was with japan airlines so every minute counted with regards to keeping my sanity the flight attendants did their best to make this a comfortable flight for me and everyone else for some unusual reason i was severely parched throughout the trip i kept on asking for gallons of water and not once did i sense any level of impatience from any one of the flight attendants i say this because i actually experienced bad service on one of my other flights quite recently and this was even on a local flight food was even better in this airline when given a choice i would look with japan airlines for a connecting flight to get to my international destinations
from check in to departure at destination the staff could not have been more helpful good selection of western and japanese cuisine

this is the first time i flew with japan airlines and the layover from manilatokyochicago was overnight i did get to stay in a unique hotel in the airport but my flight wasnt exactly enjoyable i did not like the food that they served in the flight i do like japanese food but the one they served in both flights wasnt really a good one even the breakfast wasnt good enough compared to other airlines ive taken to make things worse i found out in tokyo airport that the airline charged me twice on my booking i found out when i was purchasing something that my card was declined and so i wondered why and my bank told me i had tickets from manilatokyochicagoatlanta charged to me as a result i had to pay the hotel cash and i couldnt use uber while in atlanta they have inconvenienced me big time so i dont think i will ever fly again with japan airlines the only saving grace they had was the coflight with american airlines the food was good and their service was better it took them more than a week to return my moneyand it was almost

i had not flown jal since i was a kid living in japan and so i was really small and space was never an issue many years later im a bigger guy with much longer legs so i was a little worried when i was flying from malaysia to japan i was very surprised at how spacious the economy section was with plenty of leg room the airline attendants were excellent which was not surprising very consistently attentive and courteous and genuinely pleasant i definitely will fly with them again in the future when i am in asia on connecting flights from tokyo to the us jal was partnered with american airlines and despite their limitations in assisting me with american airlines flight changes they were very apologetic and tried everything they could to assist me i found it so amusing that jal employees were more concerned about helping me than any of the american airlines employees for me it reinforces the belief that japanese companies truly put the customer first in theory and practice unlike many us companies i own the bias in this and i am open to continue being open to us companies proving me wrong

jal is one of the best airlines that i have had the experience of the level of service warm and friendly greetings comfort and cleanliness is why i always fly with jal whilst i am in japan they really know how to make you feel special
jal is an excellent airline great service comfortable and clean aircraft a real pleasure to fly with had not flown with jal in many years but their level of service is still up there

this is my favourite airline when travelling from manila to japan and vice versa i little bit expensive compared to the rest but you wont regret it always on time or even ahead of time very few delays experienced here crew and staff are friendly food is great check in is always a breeze

this was our first trip to japan the service food and luxury set the tone for our entire trip while it is a long flight everything about the airplane food and service when they saw my husband has some difficulty with his handicap they moved him so he would be more comfortable we couldnt believe the attendants changed clothes for food service and back for boarding and exiting we cant wait to go to tokyo again and we will used japanese airlines for sure

i used jal times mostly to travel to europe check in is usualiy easy and quick only once there was drama created as the check in personal aus woman at the sydney airport deemed photo on my passport with not much definition one hour of stress and running around the airport for finally being approved to get on the flight with a warning i might have problems elsewhere i did not passed through countries with no problem aus passport have electronic chip my passport was in its th year of usage and it had its wear and tear now i have a new passport tickets are good value for money japanese stile food nz wine is mostly amazing in business class staff is very polite re food i say mostly as on my last return flight from tokyo to sydney flight dinner served had too much of hot stuff in it it is funny that this happened on my way to europe i was giving compliments to the chefs food was simply divine seats and space in dreamliner are great i would not choose seat close to food prep area it is a bit noisy there are or lounges to choose at the narita airport one of them near gate is large on levels have showers space for smokers non smokers beds to sleep rest and more they prepare cooked food as well as snacks one of the best lounges if you have plenty of time between flights
i have a pleasant journey to arrive my destination the seat pocket looks clean the magazine is new and fun to read

we travelled to japan on japan airlines in january we are a family of five and we were all very happy with the service staff and flight the food was fine but the breakfast on the return flight was quite traditional and came with instructions and i wasnt really up to it at that late stage of the flight and wouldve preferred a more simple option on the other hand the airline handled my daughters peanut allergy extremely well and we were very happy with their care and her variety of food japan airlines seems to have more legroom than other airlines i have flown with which was great bathrooms were well maintained the flight attendants are so pleasant and helpful and really do make the flight a more enjoyable experience i would fly japan airlines whenever possible and highly recommend them

customer service cannot be faulted i did not check my bags through to my final destination correctly not jal fault jal ground staff sorted it all out with amazing efficiency before i had passed through customs in tokyo i had been reassured on separate occasions that my luggage had been sorted out the premium economy seats were comfortable with ample legroom the flight staff were efficient friendly and professional food top quality bathrooms always clean even after an hour flight airport lounges superb would recommend jal very highly will definitely fly with them again
very good inflight experience one of the best the meals are pretty good and the kids meals are so cute

i flew jal to manilla after arriving on american airlines at narita the seats were comfortable the staff and service were amazing the food was excellent and the inflight entertainment selections were top notch i have flown many airlines and this by far was my favorite

last december me and my family went on a trip to japan we flew with japan airlines as it was a redemption booking we simply loved the attention and care given by the cabjn crew to ensure our utmost comfort and pleasure we will surely fly with them again given the chance

my wife and i flew jal to japan for the first time recently flying originally from manchester to helsinki on a codeshare serviced by finnair the main helsinkinarita leg was on a flown by jal in their premium economy product the was quieter smoother and more comfortable than legacy aircraft and the actual route was much shorter than other european hubs instead of the usual hours it took just which was a huge help jal were professional courteous and the flight was superb highly recommended

this airline know how to provide first class service in economy amazing leg room compared to other international airlines staff are extremely polite and caring inflight service was excellent on our return flight we were upgraded to premium economy which felt like business class to me service was immaculate and the food excellent wish this airline flew everywhere come and teach our aussie airlines a thing or two

jal made it better after arriving at narita from sydney on a newly fitted out boing with much better business suite was disappointed on a number of counts transiting cost me my sealed booze even though staying flightside reloading to vancouver jal kept me waiting as their systems had not been adapted to accept details concerning the new electronic travel authorization eta that said canada customs were not ready for it yet either however standing and waiting in the heat at narita when as in business you things would move smoothly was a bummer then to get to a pretty dated business fit out in the capsule style seats was a disappointment as well however a representative from jal did meat me at vancouver and apologised for the stuff up and even reimbursed me form the booze that i lost when transiting the service of those few both onboard and at destination recovered the experience for me

the flight was almost hours long the stewardess were all very helpful and polite ride was smooth we had a red eye flight so we slept most of the flight everything was perfect the carryon compartments were more than adequate and the leg space was terrific never banged my knee once i am tall we were fed two meals and it tasted pretty good for an airline meal the eggs almost tasted like they were just freshly made off the grill my only wish is that my seat cushion recline more toward the backrest my wife and daughter were right next to me and all of us enjoyed the long flight definitely would try japan airlines again everyone provided service with a smile

long flights can be the source of anxiety and trepidation flying vancouver singapore and back at least every year is no short haul however knowing i have my jal flight reserved and having every faith in their staff means i can look forward to relaxing catching up with my reading and getting great sleep the lounge in tokyo is great in terms of the meals showers etc connections are convenient i also feel that should there be a delay they would look after my wife and myself which is reassuring also find jal a great way to go to hong kong and saving myself a hour journey

we are a family with two people who have long legs this flight was just a dream in terms of space the jal seats are i think the best seats in economy of we had space for our legs and could sleep really well the attendants are really nice in the japanese style of courtesy i want to add the fact that the boarding is wonderfully organised however i will say that the food isnt very good even if they do make an effort continue in this direction we had a problem with the checkin too the website needs to improve quickly

jal is a throwback to what the us airlines were like in the s and s impeccable treatment crew bows to the passengers before the plane takes off good food orderly boarding you name it jal does it right

we were fortunate enough to fly business class which on jal is amazing however second leg from narita to heathrow was code shared with british airlines their business class is not a patch on jal and was very disapointing
very nice flight to japan with good service good food and a wide choice for inflight entertainment refreshments were offered regularily

our second trip with jal to london we found jal provides an excellent way to fly to europe if you are not in a hurry to get there a daylight flight to tokyo followed by another daylight flight to london after a nights sleepover and an afternoon arrival makes it much easier to cope with jet lag whilst the pe service in flight is normal jal provides express customs and lounge access we also like the fact that for about a ea we can fly back in business with their excellent lie flat beds for the londontokyo leg sadly only angled flat for nrtsyd for the night flights

wheh researching flights to tokyo we looked at flying qantas or jal prem econ and found qantas didnt give you business lounge access whereas jal did access to the qantas business lounge and express customs passes to get you through the lines quicker all that and qantas was k more expensive as well so we went with jal prem ecom and it was so worth it the extra leg room was well worth the additonal cost as well as wider seats you cant beat the japanese for their hospitality friendliness and cleanliness on board as well as their ontime persona it was all great

oh my god this is the airline business class on the was absolutely mindblowing the level of service that only the japanese can provide great quality food with a wide variety absolutely tasty cabin crew was just wonderfully welcoming it is sooo clean so comfortable and very very spacious way to go

actually travelled may great airline great attentive inflight staff airport staff also excellent courteous efficient food was pretty good for prepackaged airline food with a choice of japanese or english menus we were very lucky to be able to fly business classwell worth the extra moneyso had access to business class lounges at all airports which also were very good would definitely travelled jal again we picked them as they have a good name had a sale on when we booked

when returning from tokyo to helsinki we had a very short stopover in nagoya it was a very pleasant experience with jal even though it was only a hour flight the crew served drinks and snacks and gave a toy plane to my daughter the inflight entertainment was working during our journey good company polite staff

it take off about am in winter and am in summer from sydney minute would be the least time to check in and board checkin is self or desk the line is always a minimum wait checkin staff and air crew have very good english x kg cases is standard and a standard carry on case the flight is hours with comfortable seating seating is in middle and i very much dislike sitting next to drinkers i am very happy that flying with jal for over years on this flight i never have very pleasant staff from checkin to disembarking at narita price is very reasonable compare with other discount airline on this route
