there is no direct flight from singapore to shikoku yet my own preference is jal as it has always been known to be prompt i book directly on the jal singapore website jal or ana offers many flights to shikoku but usually the transit in tokyo is from narita to haneda or viceversa however whichever airline you choose there is a major consideration when transiting in tokyo i never like to have to transit from tokyo haneda to tokyo narita airportor viceversa just for the domestic flight its quite troublesome there are unfortunately very few jal or ana flights whose transit airport is the same for the outbound flight the transit at haneda is a bit more problematic you have to pick up your luggage and proceed quickly to the domestic counter to drop them off here i find that the domestic counter staff is pretty slow in handling the queue then you have to take a bus at the bus shuttle area to the domestic terminal the bus leaves every minutes the interval is a bit long then once at the domestic terminal you may have to take a long walk to the gate our transit time was less than hrs so it was a bit rushed we were the last to board the flight for the inbound flight our luggage is automatically transferred to the international flight but we had to ask where to take the bus to the international terminal at the bus stop area there is a big automated machine screen telling you the destination of the incoming bus take only the bus for the international terminal the bus leaves every minutes so thats good our transit time was h minutes but we had plenty of time to shop at the airport dutyfree area all in all a smooth flight the flight meals are average and note that there are no meals onboard the domestic flight the jal counter staff are very friendly and helpful

first time flying with jal i have to say that i was very impressed the aircraft was very clean seats comfortable plenty of room the crew were very polite lots of bowing very helpful attentive we flew during daylight hours the flight seemed very peaceful the food was good with some interesting japanese choices as well as western food apart from juices the choice of cold nonalcoholic drinks was limited to the coke range i found that to be a bit irksome not a coke fan a very pleasant experience overall would definitely recommend
the seat space and screens are excellent beats the european and american competition by far only problem is that there is flight to mid japan only the southwest part connections to europe are missing

couldnt fault this flight the service was excellent the food was delicious and the staff were friendly yet professional checkin was a breeze no problems at all the seats were spacious and comfortable lovely fluffy pillows and large warm blanket well worth the extra money for premium economy for those long haul flights

took a round trip flight on japan airlines and it was excellent gracious service from the checkin counter and throughout the flight delicious meals and refreshments to keep you happy and comfortable the flight attendants are very courteous and work hard they take good care of their customers wish all airlines could be the same well be flying jal again in the near future

i was not all that well to take this long haul flight but japanese hospitality and care outsmart the health constraints extremely attentive courteous and professional i was really happy to have travelled in jal though i used several times aeroflot in this sector food was just ok and the seat configuration was good but entertainment was not international

a slim mattress is supplied to help you sleep on a flat bed a choice is offered between asian and western type food jal takes pride in being on time and pay a lot of attention to detail adding to the comfort of long trips

flew from san diego to narita japan first leg second leg from narita to manila no layover to speak of literally from one plane to the next the flight from san diego to narita was virtually empty i took an entire mid seat section in economy folded up the armrests and had a bed the flight attendants were extremely attentive constantly there to serve but of course they didnt have much else to do since there were probably passengers but even on full flights jal always satisfies ive been a frequent flyer with them for years the plane was a dreamliner and it was either brand new or had been kept to that level plus avoiding los angeles i live in san diego the flight only cost total roundtrip and was fast i had large check on and carry on bags and was not charged anything extra for an economy flight this was truly hard to beat

the reasons why very comfortable seats that easily converted to equally comfortable flat beds remarkably large individual televisions with a good entertainment selectionincluding classical music too often slighted as well as informative and enjoyable programs on japan great foodcomparable to that served in first rate restaurants on the islands and excellent service on the part of the pleasant and helpful staff i so thoroughly enjoyed my jal flights and was so wellrested that i was almost sorry to land perfect introduction to japan perfect ending

flying internationally from boston usually means a stop over somewhere it is such a nice surprise to get a direct flight so i started out happy right there the price was decent for business travel in premium economy and with a premium economy ticket you get access to the lounge at the airport the flight attendants were super nice there was plenty of food and drinks and the entertainment was fine it was also really easy to get in to tokyo city though id say do your research first so you know what you are looking for once you land
excellent service from all airline staff all very helpful and polite we needed wheelchair assistance and we were very impressed with the service and care provided

relative to other airlines their economy class was great the seats are a bit more comfortable and spacious all the ground staff and flight crew were unfailingly polite and helpful the food was good by airline standards the plane was properly maintained and the price was really good in fact it was so much cheaper than the flights to seattle which was my actual destination that it made sense to fly to vancouver and take the train down that was a delight in itself i think ill make a habit of flying this way oh and since there was a long layover they provided a free room in a decent hotel near the airport highly recommended
what i like most is having japanese food and green tea in flight i love jal very much flying to japan with jal is a pleasure

flew with jal from japan to sri lanka with a transit in bangkok this was my first time to take this airline and i was really impressed by their service comfort and hospitality the seats were so comfortable and had plenty of legroom the inflight staff was so friendly helpful and offered some delicious food which i chose to have in japanese style most amazing thing which i saw was they treated every passenger specially as if they were personally known to them as ive experienced by living in japan everything inside the flight was so clean and neat i have only traveled in their business class for couple of times and the experience i had was top in its class i recommend jal to anyone without a second thought and would love to travel with them again

japan airline is a very good to fly there planes are uptodate although i wish they had more of there planes as three class cabins with a first class cabin there food is excellent along with there service and care i recommend them to fly

the best service from checkin at the airport all through the way to my destination the sakura lounge was very good the meal on board was well selected with good choices that you wished to have them all though the recently change in japanese appetizers were a little disappointed flight attendants were attentive and cared for all your needs

their service and comfort level really knocks spots of qantas their one world partner with whom i flew the year before this boing flight was a very comfortable and private suite in a herring bone formation with fully flat beds a french champagne led winelist with terrific food list to accompany was like a tapas plate for lunch with individual tastes super service and wide screen tv with wide choice of recent releases a la carte menu on demand really a fine way to travel on par with etihad and virgin pacific beware though if you are transiting through narita even staying flightside the japanese security will confiscate your alcohol even if receipted and sealed in a duty free bag

before we even boarded the hospitality lounge was great then the plane excellent service and smiling all the way the food was sensational and they did not try to over provide we ordered as we went the hostess service is the best i have ever had on a plane nothing was a problem and any concerns were quickly overcome many thanks for a safe return to australia

we were lucky enough to try the new dreamliner and its amazing that on top of the awesome food and service its probably the best economy class out there ive tried delta korean philippine airlines and none of them comes close cabin lighting it does change like mood lighting its not bothersome at all windows it darkens when its sunny and clear when its dark my comment as well as what ive heard from others is that it doesnt get dark enough that its still bright sometimes hard to sleep food they filled up the tray and lots of food flight attendants going around with ice cream coffe and tea snacks every hours or so seat the seat pitch width and legroom is comparable to what delta sells as economy plus i have nothing bad to say

received a very pleasant check in from a lovely young japanese lady her manners and attitude were impeccable flight and service was a little better than average we also were seated in an exit row which i really appreciated they also made sure my wife and i were seated next to each other even though we had booked seperately
prompt and accommodating service checkin was a breeze gives off an aura of refinement or elegance limited english options in their inflight entertainment

we secured very good prices for our return sydneyparis flights but not having flown jal for many years we were surprised how comfortable and up to date this airline is we had lieflat beds with good matresses large pillows and very nice blankets the food was just amazing we had the japanese menu on the way over and the western menu on the return included in the western menu were lobster tails lots of choise and all dishes were delicious the staff were very attentive and the bathrooms were kept impeccably clean at all times the entertainment system had a reasonable offering of the latest movies but not as good as emirates or etihad this was one of the best flights we have had and we are happy to fly with jal anytime

i selected jal for this trip firstly because it was the least expensive premium economy on offer at the time i was flying and secondly because the hour layover would give me a tiny taste of japan which i had not yet visited my ultimate destination was london the premium economy cabin was quiet and the seats were just greatvery comfortableand there was plenty of room for me to stretch my legs out one of the reasons i avoid travelling in economy is that at the age of my knees are not what they were and sitting with them flexed for hours is intolerable i believe the food was the same as economy but i had no complaints on that score i liked the japanesestyle snacks that came with drinksyummy soy beans for example service was impeccable from smiling flight attendants i cant comment about the entertainment because i was reading something engrossing all i watched was the little aeroplane on the flight path display my overall impression of jal was very favourable and i shall certainly consider flying with them again

though it was early morning flight it was fully booked since the reservation was done at the advance purchase the cost was less than yen even of j class seat if the strip chedule has been determined early purchase is desirable

i was traveling cathay to singapore then jal to tokyo my bags went all the way through food was a choice of japanese or other i opted for japanese and it was lovely the majority of the jal passengers were japanese and the younger passengers opted for a change of food and went for the other i have travelled jal before and i love the friendly polite staff i only had one hour changeover on the return flight my bag and myself got onto the cathay flight note no dawdling head straight for the next gate it is a long walk but you usually need a bit of exercise between longish flights

one of the best airways that i have been on flight crew were fantastic aircraft was kept very clean meals served was really great the seats had their own tv screen which was perfect good selection of movies to watch and had video games on it

pricing options led us to fly jal on our recent trip to vietnam we flew through narita to hanoi and from ho chi minh city again through narita and back to vancouver check in was a breeze staff exceptionally friendly polite lounge in vancouver does not belong to jal and its pretty basic crowded plaza premium lounge seating in jal business class on the dreamliner is versus most other carriers at the extra two seats come at the expense of seat width legroom is all you need the seats flatten but when fully reclined are at a very slight downward angle toward feet not a big deal but not flat flat either service was very good although the food not close to other carriers offerings again ultra polite staff and very responsive the lounge in narita was excellent we had a two and a half hour layover which was plenty of time to grab a quick shower to wash off the airplane stink from narita to hanoi we were on a series which has these little compartments true lay flat seats and you could exit from the window seat without climbing over the aisle seat again the seating made for tighter quarters but if you were a big person in circumference you might want to stick with an aisle seat jal uses another private lounge in hcm city which was adequate quiet overall we got great value and have booked them for two more upcoming trips to se asia in the next months

jal have stepped up their service a notch on flights from sydney to narita the food service is superior to qantas by quite a margin and the staff are always friendly and courteous the flight leaves around am so connecting flights from melbourne can be an issue but jal will provide overnight accommodation at sydney airport free of charge the flight arrives around pm in narita which is peak hour which can be an issue if you are flying out on jal within hours they will also provide accommodation in narita

we flew jal in business class between tokyonarita and bangkok both flights were almost full but ground and onboard services were well organized and orderly the ground people handled crowds fairly well with courtesy jal lounge in narita is comfortable the lounge in bangkok was small and crowded

we travelled with jal because of a very competitive price generally they are cheaper than competitors on that route it used to be that it was cheaper because of lesser cabin fit out but now they have comfortable lie flat beds and a nicer fit out compared to qantas the real clinchers for jal are service nothing is too much trouble ever cleanliness my husband thinks they clean the toilets after every visitor never water or litter in their toilets and food the food is fabulous but mainly the japanese food my daughter was taking photos of the food all the time the do regular meal times will hold food over for you or theres all flight snacks an absolute must is the miso ramen small niggle is that they want the cabin organised for landing a bit early which was a bit of a pest on the return overnight flight one thing you must do is wear lightweight clothing as they tend to run the air conditioning a bit on the warm side
as expected the service on board is excellent friendly courteous service by the flight attendants clean interior comfortable accommodations to make a long flight enjoyable definitely recommend
i usually fly business class internationally but this trip was with a group going to a martial arts seminar in okinawa i was impressed with the seating and the service

after decades of being in coach jal have been by far the best for me not packed in like sardinesso much more legroom and actual space i could cross my legs now and then and almost sleepreal coffee great japanese inflight food artisticly presentedin economy i was with a little performance tour and had to present every day and travelling on jal made it a lot easier professional friendly but most of all it was more spacious and relaxing definitely trying them again next time

this is a great way to travel to asia from san diego without having to go through los angeles the type of aircraft used a boeing is awesome even though we were seated in economy we felt like we had a lot of room because the airplane ceiling height is so high we were served two meals the flight was on time our luggage arrived safely the movie selection and in seat flight entertainment was pretty good the next time i go to japan i will definitely take this flight again
excellent service not absolutely certain about the premium economy seats loads of leg room is no good if you cant get comfy the staff were nearly as good as the food

never having used this class of ticket i was anxious to see if it were worth the extra charges we make this trip every months and have used many different airlines and have found jal to be the best for our purposes besides it gives us mileage with american airlines having been fed up with the cramped conditions in economy we decided to give the premium a try the cost was a little less than double that of regular economy i dont know how the other companies do it but the extra seating space made what was a hour torture session almost enjoyable besides that the little extras in the snack and beverage departments were very good as usual the jal flight crew was outstanding and extremely accommodating another advantage was that this ticket gains you entrance to the airport clubs normally used by first and business class passengersi know this has been more about the ticket than the airline but jal really needs no superlatives from me
truly the best service in the sky great food attentive service and some of the best planes and seats out there i will do my best to always fly jal when i visit japan

jal has amazing customer service incredibly friendly staff delicious food and drinks and a good movie selection the planes are comfortable and the ride was smooth they show you menus for food options and offer you amazing things liek kiwi juice and warm or cold green tea when we missed a connection in jakarta on our way home we had to rebook through american airlines they are partners and we booked through them despite not really being able to help and despite the service desk being closed they took us up to the command center and let us use the phone once we rebooked they even checked the records to make sure we had actual tickets they were so nice and i would fly jal all the time if i could

the flight attendants were beautiful charming helpfuland a pleasure to be around i wish jal flew to more destinations from lax flying home we got to airport about minutes before they opened and at am all the ticket agents stood and bowed to all of us in linethe flight attendants did the same before we took off on each leg of the trip food and drinks were fabuloustoo much of everything seats and entertainment were perfect

this flight from sydney to narita was absolutely seamless after enjoying a delicious breakfast at the qantas first class lounge boarding was a breeze the jal suite seat k was roomy with lots of storage space and a huge viewing screen there are two menu choices western or japanese i chose the japanese which was largely sea food some which was a bit dryover cooked however the salon champagne and sake were top notch would also recommend trying queen of the blue tea a rare treat the english movie selection was very limited just enough for a hour flight however the view out the window of the great barrier reef and other islands made up for this the highlight of the trip was the lovely flight attendants they were attentive and friendly but never too intrusive bravo jal

even prior to the economy seat upgrade jal always provided a good experience the flight attendants are wonderful post seat improvements the economy seats are as good as most other airlines economy premium or business seats the food for an airlines is good an enjoyable albeit long flight
wow if only the us airlines could learn this very attentive cabin staff entire plane was boarded very quickly and very organized no extra charges for any baggage food was very good

service was great even in the economy flight attendants are walking around all the time making sure passengers are comfortable food was great drinksalsowine is complimentary stop over was quick and haneda airport has wifi i will fly jal going to japan definitely
smaller seats space kind cramped but not as bad as v ka was much better value i was just not impressed with jal they were presented as a premier airline and they just are not

from check in to exiting we had two great flights with jal plenty of check in desks and they didnt care that one bag was a few kgs overweight on board the first thing we noticed is the seats seem to have more space in front than i have recently experienced the service is typical of that we found throughout japan high quailty efficient very polite meals were nice with asian and western choices personal in flight entertainment was excellent id have no hesitation in flying with jal again

this airline would have been closer to the top of my list but the food is not even suitable for a zombie attack pros the plane was nice clean and well kept the attendants were pleasant helpful and always had a smile the premium economy is well worth the extra money spent especially for a hour flight no complaints about comfort at all i was also very pleased that i was able to book a seat assignment at the time of purchase of my ticket unlike another asian airline i took to thailand no one wants to get stuck with a seat that doesnt suit their needs when traveling for nearly hours in total that would be a complete nightmare cons the food omg the food face palm lets just start with that it was totally inedible it all looked and tasted like it was made of plastic and came out of a mold im also vegetarian but that doesnt stop me from picking pieces out here and there in between the food that i cant eat especially when i have no control over my environment there is no vegetarian option anywhere for you to choose from either when booking the flight or while in flight it simply does not exist so people with any food restrictions are completely screwed you get what they have which is two meat options and that is it if you are a celiac your screwed diabetic your screwed vegetarian your screwed i tried to eat the fruit cup but it had a weird taste like rubbery gelatin plastic so that wasnt an option either for the nearly hours it took to get to hanoi from sand diego all i ate was bread and butter which i dont normally eat but i was starving why didnt i bring snacks you ask i did and over hours they went quickly my second complaint the in flight movie options are at least years old that totally sucks on really really long flights would i fly them again probably with hesitation i would look to find other available flights first and if i had no other choice i would fly jal again but bring with me a full backpack full of food items

very comfortable seating on boeing er good legroom and good onboard entertainment system the flight crew was very hospitable and we had our special meals as booked on time departure and on time arrival the flight was direct and long but their food and refreshment breaks made it easier very satisfied with the overall service on board this flight and return flight as well

we had booked a cruise around japan with noble caledonia so the best way to get there was via beijing to tokyo we flew with jal from beijing to tokyo return what a service the seats were large food service outstanding and the best sake i had ever tasted well done all at jal for great service and culture

the flight itself was very smooth the pilot was very descriptive when telling passengers about the flight he explained what turbulence was why we go the speed we do etc etc my partner is terrified of flying and this helped sooth her a little bit the flight attendants were extremely polite and caring and considering it was such a large plane it was very spacious the entertainment was excellent as there was a good selection of movies music shows and games the windows of the plan have a dimming feature so you can choose to have the window open without all the sunlight blinding you that was great the food was very good for plane food they fed me so much almost too much but thats not a complaint ever blankets pillows and headphones were all provided the flight itself didnt have much turbulence at all and the landing was smooth highly recommended airline

i think we ended up in first class for the jfk to tokyo leg which was awesome we had individual cubbies with fully reclining beds large flat screen tvs and lots of storage room food was great choice of japanese or american and you could order anytime you wanted service was outstanding

quite a nice flight clean cabin accomplished attendants not as lavishly appointed as some others and the bed did not fold totally flat good in flight service good media cabin was overall a bit minimalist as i expected flights were timely lounge was very nice overall an a rating

the service was excellent for starters it was a fairly large plane so i am assuming there werent that many rows of seats in the economy section because there was so much space between each row its so out of the ordinary that an airline gives you that much space and being ft in i instantly took notice i was seating towards the back of the plane since the upgrade was bucks anyway it was a welcomed surprised the food was not too bad and the flight attendants were great the return flight though was more like the usual pack them like sardines type i am assuming the nice spacious flights are only going to japan and not returning either way the service was something that stood out no complaints there jal checkin service sucks and lacks behind other major airlines the portal is antiquated and it can be confusing even having all your information its hard to maneuver around the site the translation of the japanese site to the english site is definitely the culprit this part of the service definitely needs to improve ten fold i had a transfer in osaka on my return but the first flight wasnt available to check in at the site and no further information on the flight was provided i had to go to terminal at narita and figure out which airline was handling the national flight for jal as that information wasnt provided by jals portal

just got off this flight days ago so when i say spacious i mean that there is more space than other economy flights i read that where some airlines have seats on this type of plane jal only had so thats where the extra room comes from its not a dramatic difference but on a long flight you can tell the food is yummy its a nice eclectic japanese fair there is a lot of it too i counted different items for one meal their rice crackers are good too i really just cant say enough about how great jal is this is my nd time to fly with them and both times have been great

we had a nice experience on the flight from paris to tokyo even if it was a long flight hours the seat were confortable and wide for the economy class they provided some cushion and cover that we could use to sleep or be confortable overnight the food was very good with a japanese style meal or european style the stewardess came often with different drinks during all the fligth the entertainement was good with a large variety of films in different langages

excellent experience in economy it was a dreamliner plane and the flight was very comfortableeven though it was long haul in economy the food quality is excellent and the customer service is wonderful it was also more cost effective than comparable flights on delta china airlines and eva

we flew from dfw to toyko and onto hanoi jal has the best service from checkin to landing its obvious that customer service is of utmost concern the business class flatbed seats are comfortable i was disappointed based on my other experiences in business class from various airlines that we werent offered a sleep suit especially on a hour flight followed by a hour layover and another hour flight additionally there is only one toilet per section of business class that was at times inconvenient food selection was of high quality yet offers limited selection overall my experience on jal was a positive one i would definitely consider flying with them again

the service was good the food was fine but not memorable the bathrooms were clean the choice of movies was uninspiring but the leg room was excellent even in plain old economy i was amazed by how much space i had

my wife and i booked this flight with american airlines miles the first leg bangkok to haneda airport in tokyo was on a regional as such the business class seat was not lie flat although as a daytime flight this wasnt critical the seat was comfortable and the food was quite good as we both had the japanese meal i should also note that business class passengers in bangkok get to use a separate entrance into the immigration and security check one that is much less hectic than that used by economy passengers it was a nice respite from the chaos that is bangkoks departure area from midmorning to midafternoon when we have been in a line an hour long the entire process in the business class line was about minutes transit at haneda was very simple just an escalator up one floor and the gate was right there our layover was about hours arrived around pm well ahead of schedule and departed at just after midnight there was probably time for us to sneak into tokyo for dinner but as this was our first time at haneda we decided not to risk it we found a good sushi stand inside the airport reviewed separately and had a very nice meal there at not too high a price given that it was in the airport the sakura lounge at haneda was quite comfortable and had good wifi service so the time there went by quite quickly the flight from haneda to sfo was on a er the elite bird of jal business class is set up in a configuration however the seats are very private my wife and i had two of the middle seats with her seat being in the exact center and mine being on the aisle the seats were in the small minicabin directly behind first class so there is only a single row there meaning there was a lot of privacy my wife who can be claustrophobic at times had no such complaints even in the middle seat the seats were fully lie flat and i would have to say were about the most comfortable seats ive ever been in ive only had one other business class experience and that was on eva in a configuration the seat there was nice but this was great im tall and had plenty of legroom i also had sufficient body room and didnt have to contort myself into any strange positions in order to lay flat it was about a nine hour flight and we both slept for at least six hours a first for both of us i have read some complaints that jal keeps their cabins too hot but we didnt experience that we didnt need the blanket but neither did we find it too warm being a redeye flight that left at midnight there is only one formal meal and thats about two hours before landing in sfo we each selected the traditional japanese breakfast and i found it very good the only demerit i can give jal is the inflight entertainment on both flights it was pretty blah with not very many selections but at least on the hansfo leg of the flight i didnt care because i slept so soundly we will be taking a repeat trip on jal in december when we return from singapore to sfo also on an aa business class award ticket the main difference will be that jal has changed the schedule so instead of a midnight flight we leave in the early evening unfortunately we had to change our flight going to singapore to cathay pacific because the new flight times meant we would either arrive in singapore very very late or that we would have to have an overnight at the airport neither of which was palatable in summary id highly recommend jal particularly for its transpacific flight
realy a pleasant flight very good service smiling and helpful staff the food was typical japanese and very good more than enough space few people

i flew jal nonstop from tokyo haneda to san francisco the service i received on the flight was fantastic the flight attendants were consciousness helpful and kind the seats were the perfect size and i actually was able to sleep normally i cant sleep on flights the entertainment was varied and seemed to offer something for everyone in the future i will definitely look to fly jal again

my family tries to fly jal whenever we can because we love how kind the onboard attendants are and how helpful they can be everyone but especially to families with very small children we traveled with them when our youngest child was an infant and again when he was a toddler and on both instances we felt supported by the airline staff both on the ground and in the air we had the same experience when traveling years ago when our eldest was an infant and toddler as well too often you hear of stories where airline staff look at travelers with small kids as a source of potential discomfort during the flight we did not get that vibe at all from jal staff throughout any of our trips with them i love how they put effort into little touches to make a hour flight comfortable for kids such as allowing them to pick between a coloring pack or a small plastic model jetliner at the beginning of the flight and having kidspecific meals on the menu to kidfriendly content on their inflight entertainment program street fighter and cartoons always work the food on the jal flights into narita and from there to manila is always good especially for folks who travel on economy like we do theres always a small salad a protein and carb typically japanese themed some miso soup if so desired some green tea or coffee and some haagendazs ice cream for dessert our kids definitely enjoy the ice cream needless to say were fans of jal both from a price perspective and an inflight experience angle we highly recommend them

our flight on japan airlines in may was simply amazing the round trip nonstop flight was included in our smartours amazing japan package we were concerned with a hour flight but the service was gr the food was very good and we had plenty of movies for entertainment the hours literally flew by we would definitely fly them again
helpful and friendly cabin crew foods and beverages well served with all sort of varieties crew members was helpful in helping to fill in immigration form

as ba executive member one world sapphire i booked this short flights from my miles unfortunately with the ba booking code one is unable to manage his flight on the jl website i had to investigate to figure out the jl resevation code once i had it i was shocked to realise that the two of us in spite of both of us being sapphire were seated separately when i tried to change the seats it was impossibel i have never seen such a bad and unfriendly website shame on japan airlines we were also unable to checkin online so we had to go to teh airport early at the airport we were checked in swiftly and got an invitation to the lounge what shall i say appart from the view the lounge was so poor and the design was afwul no food and very limited selection of drinks well below the average of the other oneworld airlines lounges to my great surprise when we entered the plane there were many seats empty even at the windows and i can npt understand why these seats were not shown on the websites when i say plenty i mean at least seats the flight was short and fine nothing extra the staff was nice but not very friendly very average

we had booked to fly from kagoshima to the island of yakushima for a couple of days and then from yakushima on to osaka unfortunately our flight from kagoshima was delayed due to weather which would require we overnight catch a flight later the next day technically we could have done this but one day on the island was not very appealing we worried the bad weather could continue our tickets were totally non refundable the agents at japan airlines in kagoshima were amazing they agreed to refund our ticket to yakushima in full then rebook us to osaka that evening at no additional cost and they called our hotel in yakushima our car rental to cancel they turned a big disappointment into a very positive experience thank you

have not use jal for some time and it was a pleasure to be back the planes are older than say cx or sq but food and in flight service is still excellent in flight entertainment system is defective and programme can be better another unusal practice plenty of empty seats on c class but check in counter put me next to someone it was easy to arrange a seat without any passenger sitting next to me
one of the best airlines ever good food great hosts comfortable seats i do recommend this airline to anyone

flew jal for the first time after finding a decent price so jal can offer reasonable fairs i lousily tick wrong flight my bad and end up with wrong timing help desk was appreciable and did their job help took a red eye flight maybe the quietest for the last years well not much too say because all went smooth i am just not fan of their coffee served from transparent plastic container and food can be slightly better a little too much rations to open for me i do love japanese food but the dressing in a kawai plastic bag to rip was not a good idea gentleman seating next to me can confirm rip to his shirt try to preferably land take off in haneda than narita it is more accessible and closer overall quite happy with all the smiley staff

checkin was speedy and efficient i liked the soothing dark brown decor of the business class cabin i was offered the use of a jal sweater for sleeping they ran out of the japanese bento box meal optionwhich was a disappointment lounge at narita airport was very crowded had to go to three stores in the airport before i found my favorite white chocolatecovered potato chips

love this airline excellent service and excellent food very clean have flown jal many times the only thing you need to know is if you are flying from sfo to bangkok you have to change planes and airports we learned this the hard way two years ago when we had to get a bus and travel across tokyo to the other airport in the wee hours of the morning after flying for hours did not have to change airports in the past lesson learned will not be using jal again to get from sfo to bangkok that said i highly recommend this airline for other destinations

excellent company service in the plane and outside in the airports were truly impeccable and courteous a rarity these days the planes were clean and the toilets were regularly rearranged in a hours flight that really matters

after much problems dealing with fair depot on our flight changes the lady at jal was absolutely the best at fixing the proble very calm courteous and went out of her way note get your deal from those booking sites then phone the airline directly most will match the price and you get better change and cancellation options and costs the jal flight was comfortable the food was okay prefer business class who wouldnt but for economy i would do it again jal also had free baggage where other airlines was only one

ive flown all over the world with many different airlines including air madagascar air france united cathay pacific air canada etc and i have to say that japan airlines has the best economy seats of all of them the jal economy seat is superior to many premium economy seats on other airlines plenty of leg room im and could still see my toes with my leg stretch straight service was great as always like many other asian airlines food and entertainment system was on par or better than other airlines after flying with jal economy i have decided to continue to fly on economy in the future and put my savings elsewhere if jal can offer such great product theres no reason for other airlines not to do so i guess theres a reason why jal economy is ranked in the top on skytrax the only complaint i have is the onboard temperature jal likes to set its ac temperature slightly higher than other airlines so i strongly suggest passengers to wear short sleeves on the flight however jal has not updated all their planes with these wider economy seats so make sure to verify when booking

the bigger the plane the better the story but thats pretty common plane flights are not the most fun of experiences hours in the air are rather wearing being able to walk around a bit andor stretch is nice on earlier ana flights and qatar many years ago they were kind enough to allow a few of us to quietly stand near the back looking out the rear window went a long way to relieving strainpain guess jal does not believe it allowing that however what i noticed the most was the difference between how this was communicated by japanese i assume crew and the crews that seemed to be manned by more western folk like me this difference carried throughout all interactions the difference in politeness was frightening sobering and until i steeled myself to it on the return aggravating had forgotten all of this until i just got the notice that tripadvisor was adding airlines happy to share this they didnt seem to mind how they treated me and i am happy to return the favor contrast this with my almost nauseating string of positivism for almost everything else i have ever reviewed d

we flew economy on a smaller jet to tokyo it sat across with good leg room a surprise so there wasnt that much inconvenience with having to move out for people in the center snacks were available throughout the flight the meals were delicious ginger pork or steamed fish miso soup ice cream and the service impeccable the flight was smooth with slight turbulence as expected a great way to start our day trip in japan weve always loved jal

so much better than the european alternatives over the last years ive tried almost every imaginable airline to take me the miles from the uk to japan some were good the now defunct virgin upper class some were grim klm some airports are fine birmingham some just awful heathrow and some just too far from anywhere narita so i think the best compromise is jal from t yuck to haneda yeah the new jal economy seats are ok the service is fine and the food is mixed their uk based caterers are poor and their japan based caters very good so you might want to take some sardines with you for the outbound flight however for a fee you can upgrade to premium economy and get some extra legroom extra elbow room and access to a washlet toilet with a bidet the pe area seemed quieter than back in economy so youve got more of a chance of a pillfree sleep and at haneda you can escape from the masses by using their premium economy checkin queue and retreat to their sakura lounge which was ok not great just ok but it did have those fancy washlets

i had read good reviews of this airline and booked our round trip flight to tokyo i am so sorry that i did not upgrade the seats were terribly uncomfortable and hard as rocks there were three of us traveling and each of us was in pain when we reached our destination the service was good and the meals were somewhat better than domestic international flights having a usb port at each seat was also helpful for a long flight

positively surprised of the professionalism and service of jal on the way to japan we took a finnair flight to fukuoka and had a stopover there due to the amount of people lining up for passport check in fukuoka we missed our connecting flight to tokyo we contacted the jal staff at the airport and they quickly got us new tickets and sent us a away only one hour after the flight we were supposed to take on the way back we took jal again but due to mechanical issues the departure was delayed for over an hour we were to miss our connecting flight from paris to helsinki and the flight attendant apologized profusely whilst explaining this she told us to contact the jal ground staff in paris about this which we did the staff in paris was very helpful and arranged everything for us we didnt have to be worried at all and felt well taken care off

we were treated like royalty the courtesy shown to us was unbelievable from all jal staff both here and in japan we had to change airports to continue on to hokkaido a first for us but it went so smoothly totally due to the staff and their helpfulness would only ever fly with them again to japan

the inflight meal was the best among all the carriers that serve the route they had japanese style cold noodles haagen daz and even miso soup for economy class passengers i was so impressed the seat was a bit old and tight but it was ok for a hours flight there was inflight personal tv service was excellent and the cabin staff regularly checked on the passengers to see if they have any needs they always service with great smile and attitude
one of the best flights i have ever experienced check in was speedy the lounge was great the crew were amazing and overall the flight was as good as any i have ever had

a flew with jal codesharing from budapest to london it was british airways from london to tokyo it was japanese airlines it was the third flight in my life and first with japanese airlines i and my girlfriend already had experience with british airways alitalia lufthansa klm and airfrance jal is so far the best ever the legroom is big enough the chairs are also big too im not a small men cm kg so it was a miracle to have enough place ive never felt it before the cabin attendants were extremly kind and they were smiling all the time whatever i asked they answered kindly not like at the other air companies above the plane was really clean and the service was amazing this is what i was expecting from a japanese company even the foreign cabin attendants treated us and and worked like the japanese staff the food was brilliant the amount was enough we got several meals like in japan and everything was high quality and unbeleivable tasty we could choose western and japanese style meal both we asked for japanese style it was the tastiest meal what i have ever eaten on board the dessert was also amazing we got h√§agendazs icecream twice and japanese puding jelly seasonal fruits and sweets other good points variation of drinks and snacks western and japanese snacks x times more kinds than in the other air companies umeshu japanese plum wine many kinds of tea true green tea barley tea etc fast checkin free foreign magazines and books in the lobby no delay even minute very interesting games and films even brend new films high tech remote controller price in my opinion jal beats all of the european air companies easily the only air company which is close to jal is lufthansa but if you buy a ticket in a good time it can as cheap as alitalia or finnair

once again we see the difference between us and international especially asian airlines for my trip i flew outbound with american but returned on jal a oneworld partner airline the aa seat wasnt even a full lie flat for a flight all the way from chicago to tokyo the jal was completely lie flat and included an ergonomic mattress in the overhead bin that you could use at your discretion it also included a special ergonomic pillow the aa seat included a low def seat back screen perhaps inches in size the jal included a or inch i dont remember which high def screen at each seat the food options were better and could be ordered at any time during the flight via a small touch screen remote at your seat theres all kinds of little differences its the attention to detail that makes you realize how much better other airlines are

we took a flight to heathrow to narita via helsinki transit we compared two type of carrier ie jl from helsinki to narita has wider sheet boeing with two row at the economy class while ba has a normal sheet with three row at the economy jl has a electric power plug v it was very convenient for me to go to a bathroom

once again the jal website showed itself to be the only weak spot in an otherwise outstanding operation even the cross keys concierge at the mandarin oriental could not check my husband in and print his boarding pass although she did so for me without any problem so we arrived at the airport a little bit early the counter clerk was able to check my husband in efficiently another employee actually escorted us to the first class lounge although it wasnt hard to find and we dont need any assistance the lounge itself has both a sushi bar and a saki bar two of my favorite things on multiple trips to each i realized i was the only woman in the lounge who was not a jal employee that changed slightly as our flight time neared but clearly most jal first class passengers are male our flight left a little bit late but made up the time before arrival first class was so comfortable but then so was the business class we flew going over in fact had i known how good the business class was i would have saved some ffms and flown business class back i have a new favorite airline im not rating the inflight entertainment because i read my kindle ate their wonderful food and slept for hours

dont let jals difficult website prevent you from flying this great airline we chose jal because we are in the one world alliance and our primary carrier american does not have a nonstop flight to osaka where our tour was starting jal knew several hours before that our flight would be delayed because of a problem on the incoming flight they sent us two emails and phoned us to let us know so that we could avoid arriving at the airport too early the flight itself was lovely although the business class seats were not marketed as flatbed with a little fiddling with the controls i was able to make the seat into a flatbed that and the quiet atmosphere along with what i assume is a good air circulation system allowed me to get several hours of sleep something i find difficult to do on most flights the food was very tasty with choices of western or japanese for all meals i hope to travel to japan again and if i do i hope i can fly jal

i fly often overseas from the us ive come to love japan airlines for their level of service and attention to detail the flight attendance are always nice and polite and youll always feel special on their planes the economy seats have more room than any other airline ive flown and the bathroom are well maintained throughout the flights as welli will always fly on this airline when possible
fabulous and courteous service newly maintained aircraft comfortable skysuite with large monitors and very good food and wine is what make jal a great airline
truly exceptional cabin crew service and attention to detail flew united airlines the other direction awful by comparison

i was worried about traveling overseas with a yearold but the staff on jal were fantastic on all legs of our trip they went out of their way to make our ride pleasant such as holding meals until after my son woke from his nap and bringing fresh milk without my asking they were always ready with a smile making it a fun experience for both of us on the return flight i asked a question at the checkin counter about my ticket for a different leg and they not only answered it but later two different supervisors followed up to make sure that there were no problems i certainly would recommend jal

i sometimes use jal between japan and bkk or vice versa normally they are night flights and i find it always strange that there is no dinner served but only a breakfast they have a choice between japanese and western breakfast but to be honest there is not much of a difference they use a b for this leg which is super the staff is overly attentive and friendly and keeps on bowing in the japanese way even if they are thais they are all you can wish for but if you are not japanese or not accustomed to their culture you might find the experience somewhat strange still prefer jal over the tg flight on the same route though tg uses an a

following considerable research we settled on flying jal for our return flight from frankfurt we had flown on other airlines on the outward journey so were amazed at the quality of comfort and service on the jal flights compared to the business class of the other airlines

we often fly japan airlines on our way to and from europe this flight was as good as always the staff are wonderful the food is excellent and the business class seats are very good and one of the best aspects is that we can stop over in fabulous and safe japan both going over and coming back

quite frankly i was disappointed in this airline i have flown many asian carriers including a few japanese i found the service to be on par with american standards but not up to the japanese standard that i have grown accustomed to on the trip to bangkok from haneda we flew a newer that was a nice aircraft with good leg space and new entertainment screens on the return trip we flew an older that was very cramp with small and barely visible small video screens while the attendants are nice and always have a smile they dont provide the service that ive experienced or the feeling of being wowed as i do on the other japanese carriers food quality was poor but beverage service was often

jal is such a brilliant airline with great service and high quality meals it was quite memorable because the flight delayed for more than hours and we were stuck on the plan with no aircon due to heavy snow i was very impressed with one of the fa she was very patient to take care with the passenger who sit next to me he was very ill and he found difficult to breath she was very kind to keep an eye on this passenger for the whole journey however the planes jal uses for hong kong route are quite old especially the entertaining facilities and the seats

exactly what you want from a business class trip a great lounge good food good liquor a comfortable bed wifi and a bit of entertainment all politely and professionally executed we love the due to its higher cabin pressure and humidity the new lieflat seat is a huge improvement over the original angleflat seats jal installed on these planes everyone has their own little cubicle and their own direct aisle access theres a sliding partition between the seats that you can lower if youd like to chat with your neighbor the food looks a bit like an ekiben train station bento when it comes out but its several notches tastier i appreciated that you could eat more quickly than if theyd brought all of those little things out one at a time everything was delicious and served with care the video system was great it has a smartphonelike remote control that was easy to use there was more than enough programming to keep us both busy for the duration of the flight they also have inflight wifi provided by tmobile for the whole flight for hours or for one hour they have turndown service with mattress pads and duvets they dont offer full pajamas unfortunately just a cardigan top love the selfserve bar and the midnight snack menu would happily take this flight again

we were pleasantly surprised by flying jal on an aa codeshare flight from kuala lumpur back to usa the staff was extremely friendly and attentive i have to stress again how happy we were with the staff they genuinely appeared to enjoy their job and were in great spirits this was a hour flight so there were meals and a snack served the food was still airplane food so not that great but it was far better than any other weve experienced the breakfast was extremely edible featuring yogurt fruit and an omelette i cant recall the other meal but it was edible too the snack was raw smoked salmon on croissant gross but i got some rice crackers instead there was a blanket and pillow standard on long flights but they were much nicer than other airlines with a decent pillow case and a thick big blanket i took mine home for my next aa flight i had a couple of beers no charge nice as well all in all it was a great flight the airplane was very clean and the inflight entertainment had a great variety screens were big also to note the pitch and seat size are bigger than those junk aa flights boarding was great as well unlike other airlines jal boards from the rear of the plane making it much easier to get in and there arent people constantly walking over you to get to their seats

the inflight experience was simply excellent from the time i walked into the cabin until i deplaned the flight attendants were very courteous friendly and attentive the seat pods were spacious and very comfortable the beverage and meal selections were also very meticulously prepared its as if i was dining in a michelin starred restaurant the only down side to my trip was the customer service on the ground i had a flight cancellation due to weather massive snow storm in new york city my original destination per the rules they dont have to reaccommodate me on another airline anas flight to jfk was not cancelled and had availability in first class but jal refused to put me on that flight which is well within the rules jals next flight with availability was days later they offered to fly me to lax and then asked that i work with american airlines once i get to lax for an onward flight to jfk when i got to lax american airlines informed me that jal has not endorsed my ticket over to them when i went back to jal to explain this they informed that they have seeing that the fullybooked jfk flight was leaving soon i opted to purchase the ticket instead of waiting on jal and american airlines to figure out the error jal was well within their rights to follow the rules however this is what sets apart the very good carriers from the excellent ones ive had similar situations with singapore airlines and cathay pacific and they have yet to follow the rules during those situations they understood readily that they want to make things right if it was at all possible

we had very pleasant flight with jal seating was very spacious even in economy the new sky suite interior works perfectly staff was very helpful and friendly especially when my son got stomach problems ife inflight entertainment had big selection of latest movies food was one of the best ive ever eaten in flights small minus is the seat it was bit hard and the actual seat very short so for guys sized as me cm my legs got numb because i didnt had decent leg support from the seat other negative thing was pricing of the onboard wifi with those prices person only person using the wifi is the guy whom employer pays it but all in all i can recommend flying with jal

when flying with japanese carriers you can be assured of polite and good service at least in most cases this time jal has proven as a very good value to me with advance purchase you get low fare not much more then lcc with two pieces of luggage yes two pieces lots of legroom space good audio and video selection but captain and staff kept talking so much for so long that almost half of the flight we were not able to listen or view anything still best value for money to me

great food a bit behind the best of what singapore airlines offers but still delicious and better than the vast majority of international flights great service stewardesses were very friendly and proactive for negatives for me personally i enjoy anime greatly and i dont think i am alone in that i would like the inflight entertainment system to have multiple anime options but this flight did not offer anime at all i do have anime on my laptop so i watched it there instead so not a big issue but would be nice for this not to be necessary

your comfort is their utmost concern given that in business class i have flown with jal using economy and i can compare that service is top notch i can never get enough of the japanese food served onboard

have flown cattle class with jal a few times and have always been impressed by the quality of service and cleanliness of the aircraft was nice to fly business class and they really do look after you checkin was easy and the lounge was a really nice place to sit oh and putting us up in a transit hotel was no fuss and wellorganised

cabin crew service is the best and food is so tasty seat is comfortable and clean lot of variety on entertainment selection you will never get bored comparing aa with jal is like a motel vs a star hotel i cant find anything to complain about

cabin crew speak cantonese japanese and english food its aways tasty even in economy class i flight once a month and i am always amazed by the service quality schedule is always on time and staff are very helpful if you are traveling with kids cabin crew always make sure you assist inland or on air

what a great airline of years of air travel i would rate jal amount the top the services were great from ground staff to the flight crew you can tell from their body language that theyre genuinely happy to serve the of us occupied rows of seats on both trips i felt there was more leg room than the other airline one thing that impressed me most was the cleanliness of the toilets at the end of the flight after hrs they remained spotless each passenger was allowed x kg of luggage however you have to pay for wifi highly recommended

they are at the time of my flight the only one to fly the b with layout abreast in economy as it was designed initially by boeing while today all airlines have configured it bravo jal for that the service is a bit cold but impeccable i would pay extra to fly with their without hesitation
excellent flight awesome cabin crew and nice food seats are comfortable as far as airline seats go and there was lots of overhead storage room love to travel again

when i fly back to japan i fly with the carrier that i know that i can trust and the trust that i have that i get a quality service on board the service offered is based on the concept of omotenashi a very inportant cultural concept in japanese society to lookafter visitors and eachother both cabin crew and ground staff for jal always make sure you feel welcome when you fly with them
from the checkin counter to the boarding to the welcome aboard to the food and service by far the best on time airline in the world

the honolulu service is considered mainly for leisure so jl does not offer their best on its hawaii services and there is no amenity bag but lots of stuff given including a lovely pair of slippers and a shoe horn yet the service the food and the whole experience was very very good as good as my experience on sq the aircraft was spotless the flight attendans were excellent the wine was good as a comparison i took ba from london to boston couple of weeks beforehand and would rate the service much lower than what i received from jl and am a gold card for life with ba only negative issue is their entertainment system which is not that good

four experiences on jal service is consistently outstanding but the overall experience varies considerably w sky wider excellent inches of pitch seat width and a configuration make this one of the best economy seatingcabin experiences out there clean refurbished interior the small seatback cubbin is perfect for charging an iphone the usb port being right below it seat cushion gets uncomfortably hard after hours however remember some of these flights are hours nice clear large seatback video monitor avod maps function was useful but moviegameinfo choices are monotonous and poor quality it is especially pleasant that these seats have very limited recline there is little noticeable intrusion into ones personal space from a surprise recline by the person sitting in front plenty of overhead bin space in this aircraft too service was outstanding hot towel services full meals another snack meal and at least beverage services on the way over was plenty from a service standpoint flight crew professional courteous and responsive peculiarly the captain does little communicating with passengers compared to american carriers at least meal quality was okaytogood on two occasions almost tasteless on the third snacks are bland insubstantial and probably will upset your stomach over a long haul flight non sky wider good the seat configuration on this aircraft makes for a comfortable cabin feeling seats have just enough pitch for comfort but are made uncomfortable when the person in front reclines the recline is such it restricts access to your tray table and makes it very difficult to get up and go the lavatory avod okay overall but not great in terms of quality options screen clarity or easeofnavigation annoying power box restricts leg comfort at least in the window seats service outstanding again and one meal service plus two beverage services is plenty for a four hour flight but the food was pretty much tasteless or tasteless with vinegar added snacks not very tasty and will probably upset your stomach non sky wider okay the dreamliner has larger windows and a window tint adjustment that is helpful the latter takes some getting used to as the controls are on a delayed response and operate somewhat counterintuitively i wonder if the control function will eventually break or fall into disuse the circulated cabin air does seem to be fresher in the and the lavatories are larger and more pleasant than typical the seat pitch is not quite enough with deep seat reclines by the person in front it will knock food off your tray table when the person suddenly reclines in front of you avod screen quality okay movie game info selections seemed of low quality or canned though food okay but not really tasty snacks dry and salty will probably upset your stomach cabin was clean but i noticed seat upholstery coming apart on the seat in front of me sky wider good comfortable cabin seat configuration dreamliner advantages of bigger windows fresher air nicer lavatories adequate seat pitch of inches and adequate seat width but annoying intrusion by seat recline in this aircraft seat cushion is inadequate and slightly less good than in sky wider in this aircraft it becomes uncomfortable in hours so bring your own pillow also the seat placement posts in this version of sky wider do not maximize leg room as does the version in this version the seat post to the floor does not allow you to comfortably stretch out your legs on both sides of the seat post as does the avod okay but map function on this version difficult to navigate and use great screen image quality but again seems like low quality choices of video one tasty meal one bland tasteless meal poor quality and insubstantial snacks again likely to upset your stomach on a long haul flight of sitting service outstanding as always summary the sky wider is the design that needs to be copied to the other versions very limited seat recline preserves the personal space of the passenger and allows him to get out to go to the lavatory without incident maximized leg room by careful placement of the seat anchor posts and elimination of power boxes makes the seating experience comfortable on a long haul flight as is upgrade the snacks and beverages and restrict seat recline to inches on all versions and the overall score a composite of four flights moves from to stars pure mango juice would be a great option on routes like these add chocolate varieties of ice cream rather than only simple vanilla etc apply the version of sky wider to maximize legroom and it goes to stars add a comfortable seat cushion for a long haul flight and japan airlines is stars even without consistently good meals

the review includes my experience in booking their tickets i made a mistake when i bought their tickets in january hence i decided to search for their local number only to realise they have a number meant for all english and mandarin speakers and it is not a local number called in and asked for help the customer representative was help and offered to assist in making the amendment after i have sent in a copy of my passport i promptly did it but there was no news for a working day called them subsequently and mistake was remedied this was not the standard for a japanese company the flight from singapore to tokyo was great with good entertainment system the flight from tokyo to singapore showed dated entertainment system and seat overall a decent flight but i prefer ana having tried it in
the flight was on time services were good stewardess were helpful and i got basinette seat for my baby need more improvement on food and the entertainment

telephone service i waited to minutes before speaking to anyone i have food allergies i read the menus online before leaving and realized that i was allergic to almost everything i spent about minutes on the phone with an agent he was able to recommend a hindu vegetarian meal as my best alternative although i am in no way vegetarian it ended up being one of the best meals that i have ever had on a flight i also explained that i had a foot injury that made long flights difficult i was placed in a bulk head seat i could not have been happier as i was able to get up stretch and even use a tens machine during my flight this was a minutes well spent with a calm professional agent boarding agents our flight from toronto to chicago was about an hour and minuted delayed i had a two hour connection i hustled over the jal counter at my gate the boarding agent was welcoming friendly and did her best to calm everyone on my flight that had sped walked she ensured that i had the seat that i had requested actually gave me a better seat and even checked to make sure that my luggage made it onto the jal flight she told me exactly how much time i had before boarding before boarding i was assured that my luggage had made the flight i will say that in japan at nrt they were very strict on the weight limit i was about a kilo over and had to repack i thought that was a bit harsh after repacking stuff into my carryon i was then somehow kilos over with my carryon which they actually weighed i complained that this was unreasonable it took up about minutes of my time and they let it goi think it is because i made the boarding agent lift my suitcaseit was almost her height and i thought that she was going to tip over flight attendants i have never seen flight attendants that keep the same level of professionalism attention to detail and courtesy throughout an entire flight they never looked jaded and looked genuinely happy to be working in their jobs i loved the safety presentation it was graceful and introduced me to the bowing culture every flight attendant made it a point to say goodbye to everyone as they were leaving deplaining as my foot condition was listed in the passenger information list they checked on me almost every two hours to make sure that i was ok and did not require help they were also very efficient in terms of getting drinks or snacks to you a wait of no more than minutes tops i was incredibly impressed with the calmness they demonstrated with my grumpy elderly neighbour that did not want to stow her bags in the overhead compartment they managed to calm her down without grabbing her bags or raising their voices seats the seats in economy are ergonomic there is a great neck pillowlumbar support pillow that supports your neck and back very well i sat at the bulkhead so i cannot comment on the spacing in a normal seat but the bulkhead is fabulous and on my flight no one bothered to walk across in front of our row food if you have any sort of allergy to seafood or fish make sure that you order a special meal on the way down i had the hindu vegetarian meal it actually did not taste like plain food and was completely satisfying the only thing that was not is the fact that i was not allowed to have a haggen dazs ice cream because i ordered a nondairy meal i tried to explain that i was not hindu and was not allergic to dairy but that was lost in translation on the way back from tokyonarita to boston i did not order a special meal as hamburg steak was listed as the meal hamburg steak is actually not beef but a chicken patty sort of with pieces of seafood in it served with rice that also has seafood in it luckily i ate in narita hours before boarding as i could not eat any of that meal even the salad had bonito flakes and shrimp i think the snack was a beef noodle box which only had a packet of seafood something to add if desired my other gripe is that the sake brand on jal is awful and the coffee is borderline nonconsumable stick to the green tea or juice on jal inflight entertainment this was the only thing that was not good the english movies are limited on the way down the movies were from years ago the music was also fairly dated on the way back from nrt to boston there was a much better selection of recent movies and slightly better music i found that strange as the plane from ohare to nrt was actually newer the system is not that intuitive to use it took me about minutes to get to english movies i pressed a whole bunch of buttons and eventually found it if you have a dvd or ipad and any sort of ipod or walkman i recommend bringing it for jal flights baggage claim this was also surprisingly efficient i dont recall waiting more than minutes connecting flights i connected from nrt to a itm osaka the boarding agents realized that i could make the early flight advised me of this and bumped me up so instead of having to endure a hour layover i was out of tokyo an hour later the plane from tokyo to osakaitm was an old school boeing plane out of the s if was clean but definitely looked shabby drinks were served as was some wonderfully delicious candy on the way out i was so tired that i did not observe anything else on that flight checkin and jal points you can check in to days before your flight if you sign up for a jal points card the check in is a lot faster

the configuration of business class is great very much like a first class seat the food is very good and the service is right up there with korean airlines for politeness the first class lounge at narita is also very good they have a fresh sushi bar the only limitation is if you are not japanese and you travel the airline a lot youll run out of decent entertainment on the flight highly recommended

wed been to europe twice before with other carriers flying economy class this time we decided to use jal business class and we are so pleased that we did so the skysuite cubiclestyle seats used on the s on the sydneytokyo route and on the s and s on the tokyoparisfrankfurt routes give you comfort you might expect of st class in many airlines the ability to fully recline the seat into a completely flat bed with a comfortable mattress pillow and blanket in the semiprivacy of a cubicle means that you can get a really good sleep and arrive feeling refreshed on our return from our final destination london we did the entire trip to sydney via frankfurt and tokyo with no stopovers except for the few hours between flights and yet we were still in reasonably good shape when we finally stepped off the plane you couldnt do that with economy class the skysuite is a great concept with its tv monitor and numerous storage compartments and large stowable table my wife who normally hates flying because of the cramped conditions and inability to sleep was full of praise for jals business class and said she would be very happy to fly to internationally with them again we loved the food too when does anyone say that about an airline the meals we ate aboard were of wonderful quality and imagination we generally ordered the japanese choices and were treated to imaginative cuisine better than you would eat in most japanese restaurants food service was sensibly timed too a large and leisurely main meal about hour after takeoff then you could order a wide range of other foods during the flight on a casual basis the cabin staff were just wonderful they were incredibly attentive always ready with a smile and very caring nothing was ever too much trouble for them jal can be congratulated on the standards of service their staff deliver which i would rate as being of the highest order the ground staff and lounge staff were all superb too we watched baggage being loaded into jal aircraft and were really impressed at the deliberation and care shown in the way it was handled the aviation of the flight too was perfect the aircraft was well flown and landings were very smooth wed rate the as being marginally better than the s as the seems quieter inside we had seats h and k on all four jal flights so a direct comparison is possible negatives the pa announcements in english are sometimes hard to understand it is unfortunate that the individual air vent nozzles provided for most seats are not available with the skysuites the cabin was rather hot c and it would have been nice to have been able to direct cool air onto ones face at times it is a pity that the aisle seats could not have been spaced so that the storage alcoves near the passengers head had a window at the end of them window seat passengers have no less than windows available to them and when belted in it is impossible for the aisle seat passenger to lean forward enough to look out the window adjacent to the partition between the seats minor issues though given the excellence of the skysuite concept overall i would rate jal as an outstanding airline and from now on it will be our choice whenever we go overseas

excellent flight brand new dreamliner plane with state of the art infotainment system awesome cabin crew and decent food seats are comfortable as far as airline seats go and there was lots of overhead storage room it beat the pants of their partner airline aa on the flight home

i take a flight from bangkok to japan and transit to take another flight to dfw usa i was impressed by new airplane dreamliner food amazing they serve hagendas not nestle or walls i love that you even can find toothbrush in the wc for economy

booking in was very easy did it at the airport the aircraft was a dream liner and even in economy there was a ton of legroom i fell asleep and when i woke up the stewardess had left a not to contact her if i wanted some dinner or a drink dont that sort of service often flight left on time and arrived on time take note lufthansa
