one of the biggest mysteries in commercial aviation is why this airline is not ranked up there with the best in many major international rankings from my experience jal is one of the best airlines in the world the service on both my flights with jal was extremely friendly and warm the cabin crew greeted me warmly and were helpful with small requests i had some of the most delicious meals on board and the portions are also generous the seats on the refurbished b aircraft operating the singaporetokyo route are the best ive flown on inches seat pitch inches seat width you cant get that on some major airlines these days in terms of inflight entertainment systems passengers can get to their movie after one or two ads and not five or six on the gulf carriers drink service is also very regular on a seven hour flight checkin is certainly very friendly and processional bags are on the belt within minutes after disembarking in tokyo and singapore id put jal down as my first choice to japan in future

my family of four adults child and oneyearold baby travelled on japan airlines for the first time ever international and domestic flight and we were impressed i would definitely fly again with them the service food seat comfort entertainment and flight punctuality were on par with singapore airlines my usual preferred airline for international flights and in some ways better the child meals were generally healthier but still very tasty and beautifully presented the types of toyschildrens souvenirs offered were more useful i ended up collecting several of childrens cutlery sets and i particularly liked their collection of wooden toys sadly i didnt manage to collect all of them but the best thing of all was the complimentary carseat provided for the baby we had booked a seat for him as he is much too big to fit into a bassinet and is too fidgety to stay on a lap as he was under japan airlines provided a carseat for him on all three flights i just had to submit a request about a week before our first flight and provide a couple of measurements so they could set it up for him he was so comfortable and settled in the carseat that it made those three flights so much more pleasant for all of us the domestic flights with qantas between adelaide and sydney were a nightmare in comparison if only other airlines would provide a similar service we were also impressed with their landside service and their awesome loan strollers at the airports in japan which had ample storage space for hand luggage and steered like a dream the loan strollers provided by the airports themselves were just ordinary umbrella strollers the only mildly annoying point was the language barrier which resulted in some confusion when we asked whether passengers with travelling with young children had priority boarding a sign showed that this was meant to be the case but they werent letting other families through a fellow passenger kindly translated our request into japanese and we were allowed to board first

love the new jal logo and the new planes these days they have great leg room and the seat are good best of all the meal serve is good and we like it the server is a litle rush some time maybe due to language or timing but all in all we love the meal and drinks you get alcohol water juice then miso soup thats lots for a lunch meal ent set was good too have lots of new movie and brand new though there is still old planes and we got one on the way back but the food makes up for it

ladies gentlemen i wish tripadvisor would already have this flight review function earliier there are so many flights that could have been reviewed but overall in the past years months days airlines trying to always seek room for improvement and japan airlines has improved dramatically comparing my last jl flight to this one you can clearly see the improvement but still they are a little picky about how many icecreams are being passed onto their business class passengers or they need to check if there is still bread available which is unacceptable if a passenger wants an icecream or a bread especially in business class so give him a piece of bread or an icecream also i tink you headsets belong to an economy class but you do offer slippers which is fine mouthwash in your lavaotories but no actual towels as a man with a bit of beart you will see that you are having difficulties in drying your face there will be paper fragments all over your face and you have to wash your face again and again save is waste member of staff extremely friendly but i dont think that you need to reject offering icecream or more bread to a passenger if you dont want to offer whiskey to a passenger simply dont write in on your menu please make your passengers happy and let them have a pleasant journey small details can make a big difference your airline lounges are pretty nice your food and beverages very well prepared you even have a locker for baggages which is great the passengers dont have to carry their items all around the lounge but simply lock their belongnings which is wonderful and extremely convenient will fly again great airport great airline but there is better worse etihad emirates and qatar are setting standards and exceed expecations of passengers but those are your rivals

this onehour flight was with boeing yes it was an old plane yet the cabin looked clean and well maintained no snacks offered only coffee tea or soft drinks given the service was good and efficient no ptv onboard and the inflight magazine is in japanese language as this was a connecting flight from garuda the transfer service was a breeze and all i did was took my luggage from the belt and after custom i went to the transfer check in desks for jals domestic flight and leave my luggage there

the flight is good the service is good the meal ok wifi onboard are available hours hours or a day but not available when in above china territory and alaskan area flight to america depends on satellite but you could use roaming partner of your mobile phone account too but my cabin luggage could not put above my seat because some of passenger cabin luggage put on my area by the stewardess she is know i got cabin luggage but she dont care i complained and they just saying sorry about that

we had ever flown japan airlines before decided to give it a go and do premium economy in a nutshell while the service was good the seats were pretty average we had exit row but felt that seats could have been better bit wider but no real advantage reclining biggest bug bear was poor leg support and table tray far too small also acute lack of storage space on a later flight with another carrier i booked standard economy exit row seat and space much better so premium economy with this carrier for me no way wont do that again not worth the extra money

great flight to nagoya international airport and then to okinawa good service great meal and movie entertainment lots of included drinks both non and alcohol as part of the trip able to communicate in english and helpful in providing tickets at one airport for the entire trip it is a long flight but it went very well

the er economy is the most spacious economy around at in pitch it was more than adequate for my ft solid frame i was very impressed with every aspect of the flight but cabin service has declined as jal follow the lead of other carriers in utilising nonjapanese staff who do not uphold the once impeccable jal service

paid more for the business class and was not disappointed a very pleasant flight the staff were so helpful although the seating was a bit tight to get into i am not your average asian size the comfort was excellent i liked the idea of having your main meal then if you required follow up service you asked so nice not having food pushed upon you great meals i wanted to take the air hostess home to australia we have so much to learn about good service and being nice
i would book anytime with this airline especially when travelling with my family a very comfortable flight very accomodating and modern

we upgraded to premium economy and it was well worth it because of the length of flight we then were able to use the the jal lounge during our hour layover where there are beds and showers i was able to get a solid hr sleep lying down one of the best airlines weve ever flown sorry to say it really puts us airlines to shame

travelled from frankfurt on brand new dreamliner and it was a pleasure plenty of legroom comfortable seats large video in seat with loads of movies etc chargers available in seat food and service excellent thoroughly recommended
the aircraft is nice and comfortable japanese food served was delicious i could have eat more the flight was smooth

old aircraft you can feel that japanese management is always greedy and controls even how many icecream you are allowed to eat and this is not how a business class should be the food was fine their aircraft had black cotton seats which is fine but i didnt feel very comfortable their business class headsets are plastic and extremely cheap they should get better ones those remind me on economy class however i always take my own tools i use bose or sennheiser and have my own plug

my wife recently flew to my homeland japan with my year old son i chose jal bc i believed they would deliver the best service but that couldnt be further from the truth my son ingested too much ice cream and vomited during the flight the airline followed procedure and interviewed my wife about my sons health held them until the plane was empty and then detained them further at the airport we understand the protocol when there is a sickness on board but they treated my family with a cold insensitive disrespect that left my family in tears the treatment jal delivered was completely unacceptable and we will never fly jal nor will be recommend that anyone especially families take this uncaring airlines weve traveled around the world and this flight was the worst experience for us

as an one world emerald member i regularly travel with japan airlines this is one of the countless flights i am delighted to have looked after by the jal team the jal business seats are comfortable and provides good rest for long haul flights with all the connectivity you need this is a seat you can sleep in comfortably with a true full flat bed configuration complimentary amenities especially the comfortable cardigan is a nice touch to ensure you are well dressed for your night flights i truly appreciate given a cardigan to which is exceptionally soft and comfortable to help me settle into sleep compared with other leading airlines which do not provide this onboard no disappointment and no unexpected surprises from jal sit back enjoy and relax the warmth and hospitality of jal team

ive flown on most of the major carriers jal crew was by far in my top very friendly courteous flight crew check in staff pretty much any employee i talked to regardless of which airport i was at i flew from vancouver narita japan then to hong kong was more than willing to assist very polite id fly jal again for sure the only minor gripe i had would be theres was not wifi in the business class section

our group of ages and traveled from boston to ho chi minh city vietnam with a connection in tokyo japan airlines jal was fabulous the monitor in the seat back in front of each passenger was a fabulous option particularly since there were an enormous number of english language choices these included numerous new hollywood movies star wars vii the revenant the big short the hateful eight many others as well as old standby films the original star wars series all men in black films many others there were extensive options for kids as well such as kids tv and movies and video games with a controlled in the armrest the cabin attendants were incredibly pleasant they were available and polite one woman went out of her way to bring me my travel pillow i left it in my seat and she tracked me down all the way in the baggage area about hour after we had departed the plane the food was good the kids meals had an asian focus and were not to our kids tastes but were fine meals we got the vegetarian options which i enjoyed though my wife liked the regular meals my parents had more pasta with meat sauce was one that was really good overall the food was decent i will definitely look to fly jal if we head to asia again or anywhere else jal flies as all six of us had a really positive experience especially given that we were on the plane for hours each way between the two flights

confortable seat and lot of place for legs nice flights good food good service and a very comfortable made the journey to paris a pleasure friendly flight attendants generous meals the inflight entertainment definitely has than enough to choose from i watched movies

i flew roundtrip singapore to tokyo with experiences to both extremes from singapore to narita tokyo we started off just fine new aircraft with nice seats and good electronic systems the flight attendants were very nice and the food was better than average for an airline all was well until we were diverted to haneda due high winds at narita they made us sit on the runway at haneda for hrs before flying us to narita they had no food and very limited beverage service for the hour delay turning our hr scheduled flight into a hr fiasco upon landing narikta was not prepared for us and all public transportation stops during the night japan airlines did nothing to accommodate their customers even first class customers were stranded at the airport finally at am they handed out a bottle of water and some crackers the trip from haneda tokyo back to singapore was fine in terms of timing but the aircraft was old the seats were worn thin and extremely uncomfortable the electronics were substandard as was the quality of the food drink service was terribly slow and climate control was uncomfortable all in all not a good experience

i want readers to fully appreciate this review so i will do my best to pithily and concisely summarize my experience simply put jal is awesome flight attendants are wonderfully attentive helpful and friendly food is decent to tasty and overall experience is quite nice ive flown multiple economy flights and business class flights with jal from the amicable service varies little from business to economy class except economy receives more individualized serviceluxury seat reclines food drink ondemand larger tv screen privacy window etc flying from lax to nrt is not terrible in economy of course business was better but economy was remarkably better than the longhaul with asiana from lax to icn i digress ive flown with jal to japan and to thailand from japan my experience was always pleasant and i wish i flew with jal instead of trying to save money and flying with asiana if it gets down to simply pinching pennies i would still choose jal over other airlines

i was surprised on so many levels with jal the staff are extremely polite and courteous and managed to cobble together a meal on an out bound flight when my choice was not available seats are really comfortable entertainment great and punctualin fact i have never been on a flight that boards before the stated time i had flightstwo international and two internal and this applied to all flights the aircraft for the internal flights were brand new and high level service on both flights taken food is good standard and snacks available throughout long haul
both ways the flight was perfect the plane is clean the bathrooms are kept immaculate the food is tasty and varied the flight attendants are superbly trained

the stewardesses here went out of their way to find me some vegetarian food when they found out that my preorder somehow hadnt gone through i felt it really mattered to them that i had a decent meal and they brought me compensatory bonbons

jal offers comfortable flights with good inflight entertainment however jal did not get it right for indian food if you pre book indian meal they offer a very bland sort of thing and i guess their cook has not got it right at all they need to improve a lot on their food front which lacks variety and taste on this front they should learn from emirates or air india
ground staff is very niceplanes are super clean the crew is amazing with a good attention to detail super polite and always attentive the food experience is super nice even on this short flight

japan airlines might not have fancy suites or showers onboard but their first class product can match any airline firstly the sushi bar at the lounge is really fun and a great way to start the trip i couldnt book a massage though because it was busy and it was a hour wait the food offering in the sakura first class lounge was also fantastic and plentiful for breakfast onboard the semi private suites was very roomy and the seats really comfortable i had the japanese meal from michelin chef seiji yamamoto and it was amazing one course after another each meal tasting like what you would find at a top restaurant in tokyo the crew on my flight were one of the best crews ive ever had on a flight they were so attentive in the middle of the night i was watching a movie and a crew alerted me when the captain spotted the northern lights it is one of the most experiences of my life to see the northern lights feet in the sky just mind blowing wow
the flight is comfortable and overnight which makes it even better in flight entertainment is diverse and latest aircraft is well equipped and service top notch

round trip flight yvr to mnl via nrt in the air ir was a great flight in business class i was told in yvr my luggage may take a different flight but i will have it the morning after landing next day no contact and after i initiated contact luggage would be delivered later in the day days passed until i saw my belongings again frustrating knowing japanese efficiency i blame the mnl part of jal incompetence for this

excellent service friendly and unobtrusively attentive comfortable seats with good legroom im nearly m tall and a wide choice of inflight entertainment options nice choices of food and drinks a more than adequate baggage allowance of two pieces probably the best flight experience ive had in many years will definitely fly with jal whenever possible
efficient and good service from the checkin up to arrival great costumer service even to the domestic flights superb inflight meal

good service ground staff and flight attendant are very polite helpful and hospitable the aircraft is new and provides good legroom seats are comfortable as well since i dont really enjoy any inflight meals foods served is not bad but the desert ice cream is the best as for the inflight entertainment movies selection is not bad as well but i wish they could add more i hope there are english subtitle to other foreign movies korean movie etc too

check in was very efficient had no line to wait in and conducted with gracious service not found with most americanbased airlines as business class passengers we were permitted access to the oneworld lounge in lax which was decently nice the seatpod was more than roomy for me as a petite thin person a very large person might not be very comfortable there was plenty of storage area within the pod and in the overhead bin everything looked clean and sanitary the bathrooms on board were always clean and as a person who absolutely hates these tiny bathrooms and tries not to use them i had no problems using them frequently throughout the flight the amenities were typical and nice eye mask toothbrush slippers etc and the movievideo selections were fairly up to date and varied the dinner service our flight was before noon began within an hour after take off so dont eat too much in the lounge there are both japanese and western selections i chose the western selection which was a filet the two courses that preceded that were delicious but the filet was amazing tender and seasoned nicely wine selections were pretty nice food is unlimited on this flight so after dinner is served one can eat as much as one can tolerate there were snacks of sandwiches pasta ramen tempura and fruitdesserts there was a fantastic coffee mousse dessert that i absolutely loved and asked for a second helping passengers are able to order up until about an hour before landing so one can get a lot of eating in those hours it was hours to tokyo and hours returning to lax the service was impeccable they were very gracious and helpful they never made you feel that you were inconveniencing them or ordering too much food or alcohol they made up our bed when we wanted to sleep and removed them as we prepared to land once everyone had a chance to eat and relax they dimmed the cabin lights and made sleeping very easy with hushed voices and quiet service i cant say enough about the quality of service from all the attendants they try to fulfill your requests and provide items not on the menu or in the amenity bag i had a sore throat and asked for a hard candy the attendant returned with a whole cup of various flavored hard candy and let me know i could get as much as i wanted i have no reservations about recommending this outstanding airline

i was pleasantly surprised to find that jal had an updated that had a good interior and ample size ife behind each seat back as a westerner the food was a challenge but nevertheless it was fresh i would recommend flying jal again in the future

jal and american express have a companion fare deal that makes it worthwhile to travel in business class at a reasonable price my wife and i flew from ny to bangkok and for hours business was the way to go on this trip service was terrific and the meals were excellent i wouldnt want to travel this route on another airline
patient polite comfortable etc etc ontime enjoyed flying this long haul trip saw how they treated some old age passengers and was impressed

i needed to fly to beijing at short notice decided to fly jal almost on a whim based on this experience i will fly them again their customer service is nothing short of astounding due to a delay out of honolulu my transit in narita became very short their customer service people escorted me personally and rapidly thru the terminal and security to make sure i made the flight with a minimum of fuss and stress both legs of the flight were really comfortable great service i will fly them again
nice flight to tokyo good service at checkin and on the flight it was a smooth flight and a good way to start the trip

plane was new seat was great but service is terribly slow on a hour night flight dinner started to be served only two hours after take off and took another hours to finish all this in glaring cabin light which you had to endure regardless whether you gave up eating or not very unflexible crew which was not able to arrang paid upgrades for three collegues

my family and i were flying from hong kong to tokyo on jl the first leg of our flight home to vancouver from the moment we walked up to the checkin counter we were greeted with friendly smiles and made to feel very taken care of the flight jl was fantastic our inflight crew was absolutely the best i must however mention i was seated in k and the young lady her name started with a m and is based out of japan who took care of us was positively wonderful with her big smile she constantly made sure we were comfortable and had everything we needed we thank you ms m and truly hope to be served by you in the future we cannot wait to fly jal again

i just returned from japan today and i had to write about the excellent service we received on japan airlines my husband and i were traveling with our two grown daughters one soninlaw and our three young grandchildren a granddaughter of three and oneandahalfyearold twin boysyikes i was so dreading the long flights but every step of the way from buying tickets to picking up our bags when we got home was a very positive experience they made sure our checkin was as easy as could be we are a tall family but legroom even in economy was fine the seats were comfortable and the food delicious they had very nice meals for the children and a special meal for a vegetarian in our group both flights were right on time and the entertainment offered was great everything is great but the star of the airline is the staff i have never received such pleasant and efficient service while flying even when i have upgraded my seats i am not sure how the flight attendants remain so cheerful on such a long flight they even cleaned the bathrooms during the trip i will certainly put this airline at the top of my list and i will definitely book jal when i am going anywhere they fly

japan airlines was great polite attentive flight staff food was good we flew a which seemed brand new it was a good experience

i flew japan airlines from kulnrt the nrtord i was amazed even in economy i felt special the flight attendants were very personable it is my favorite airline by far ive traveled on a lot of large airlines and this is the best better than cathay and emirates way to go jal im not easily impresed

i am pleased to say i had a relatively pleasant flight journey from london to narita un like most other airlines i had used in the past what pleased me most with this jal flight was the fact that there were enough leg room and seat space for someone like me being over cm who would often be troubled with lack of such space thanks to some fellow passengers in front of me who would decide to recline their seat to a great extent without due care hence i always get nervous for the first quarter of the flight journey in to find out if the passenger in front of me is going to be a mindless moron who would recline the seat straightaway once the seat belt sign is switched off in this flight there was no exception to this however despite the reclined seat in front of me i was not troubled by the lack of space in this flight possibly due to the good seat design devised by jal i still had enough space in front of me and leg room to move about during the whole journey another good thing was i could get some sleep and wake up to the time of destination without much interference from the sun glare or some curious passengers itching to opening up window blinds to peak outside every so often towards the end of the journey in to japan its a good idea that once you had your main meal all the lights were out driving the passengers to believe that its time to take some nap maybe i was fortunate enough to be surrounded by passengers with good common sense and decent social etiquette in this flight alone i managed to have some sleep during a long flight to narita there was a good selection of inflight entertainment programmes and the seat was comfortable enough the only issue i had was to do with the touch screen of the entertainment system its a great idea to have a touch screen panel embedded to the seat but i still prefer the one with remote controller with the touch panel depending on what kind of passenger you get behind your seat if the person happens to be a mindless baboon type who keeps bashing the touch screen not tapping with fingers fists or whatever every time heshe wants to change the channel that would create a nightmareish situation for the poor passenger who is occupying the seat in front of them and it happened to me in this flight i felt my seat was tapped each time this guy behind me kept changing the channel luckily it was just for awhile and most of the passengers were asleep after some hours later i do appreciate jal is trying to keep up with the modern technology and trends however in my view having the latest gadget does not mean its the best for the passengers anyway i would fly with jal again possibly in less busy season

because this is a code share with aa jal customers i booked jal specifically do not have the same status as aa passengers and cannot book aisle or window seats online this is a bad deal for jal and as a result makes the flight horrible for jal customers who then will have to sit center seatsmaybe because thier customers do not normally complain this treats jal customers as second class citizens and results in them getting worst seats on the flight i guess this is the last time i will ever fly jal again because you just dont know at time of booking that you will be stuck with middle seats i fly often and just cant deal with center seats so now looking at booking a new ticket on another airline so i do not have to sit middle seathorrible performance jalno wonder you have profitability problems

wonderful airline i think they should be rated foodwise very good service is always very polite seats are fairly comfortable and the airplane very clean inflight magazine is aboveaverage i must consider tokyo as my transit destinations and flying japan airlines more often
excellent service excellent people we flew with our kids and all staff at the airport and the airplane took very good care of us whatever we requested they were there to help big thank to all of you

we had a very uneventful flight which is great it left on time the crew is so friendly bathrooms were clean the entire flight we had lay flat seats with the biggest tv screens ive seen on a business class seat the plane was very very warm during the night flight

i flew nyc to tokyo then onto singapore jal definitely made the hours traveling lot easier and then we flew back with them two months later from singapore to nyc and guess what their service did not change way to go jal in staying constant with your exquisite customer service and comfort

food was very good and the flight attendants were very courteous and hospitable the seats were very comfortable with lots of legroom the inflight entertainment was up to date and working unlike the broken wifi problems united has been having would definitely recommend this airline

jal st double decker airline amazed by the customer service requested for vegan food and window seat at the time of check in and booking airlines called up twice did a followup to check if vegan with tofu is fine

fantastic service with helpful classy onboard crew great food served so nicely typical of japanese hospitality very clean aircraft for the whole hour trip even toilets have to say we had a wonderful boeing topnotch it made a very long trip more comfortable

jal will always take care of you their flight attendants are amongst the most attentive in the world and their first class cabin is one of the best the seat turns into a true bed with a mattress fantastic only thing is that i wish they had a better snacksmall meal selection since full meals are pretty meaningless on this overnight flight

talk about an amazing airline we flew from los angeles to osaka last year and the experience was great the seats were comfortable the food was tasty and the entertainment was topnotch all the recent movies that we hadnt seen in theaters was available on this airline they also gave us plenty of free beer will definitely be flying with them again

ultra polite and helpful cabin crew tasty food on board as well as the quick snacks which are available at any time throughout the flight udon cake etc the jal sakura lounge at haneda airport is also exceptional comfortable an excellent selection of alcoholic and nonalcoholic beverages hot and cold foods and other helpful amenities such as showers and lockers
seat was about as comfortable as it gets in economy and the incredible service made the flight fly by like a pleasure the freeflowing plum wine definitely helps too

very disappointed in their confusion about a code share flight with cathay pacific impossible to resolve with cathay on return could not reach jal after their working hours but cathay has hour phone number but could not handle change of return flight date because the code share was only outbound from japan this is the third time i have used jal in the past months and i used to think it was a superb airline but now i am quite inconvenienced and do not want to do business with them or cathay if i can avoid doing so

we flew japan airline from jfk to kaohsiung taiwan and back and had a really good experience with the airline we booked economy flights and at first did not realize we would not be able to select seats until hours before the flight we were really nervous about not being able to sit togetherwe are a family of but had no problem on all flights getting seats together the service on the flight was exceptional the food was really good and the entertainment was good too the seats were comfortable our only complaint was the heatall four flights were extremely hotso just dress in layers so you can take off layers when the heat rises we were extremely happy with japan airlines and would not hesitate to fly with them again

it was service with a smile from the moment we checked in at the airport the cabin crew warmly welcomed us and helped us with our hand carry luggage being a tall person even the leg space in the economy seat was spacious enough to accommodate me i checked in my wheelchair at the boarding gate and transferred to a cabin chair it was waiting for me the moment i got out from the aircraft in the hour flight i had to go to the toilet at least once i informed a cabin of this and he said to call them when i needed to go two cabin crew attended to me one to push the cabin chair and the other to make sure we didnt roll over another passengers foot in the semidarkness and narrow aisle the toilet at the tail end of the aircraft was rather small but i just needed some privacy to perform intermittent catheterisation without having to sit on the toilet bowl the space outside the toilet leading to the passenger cabin could be locked while the cabin crew pulled the curtains at the other end this created a rather spacious area or me to empty my bladder the overall experience for flying with this airline as a wheelchair user was positive the service on the return flight was similarly helpful and courteous

recently went to japan to visit family upon the death of a relative going to tokyo the plane was a bit older but clean and the food was edible the staff was very friendly and came around constantly to check if anyone needed something however coming back the staff was friendly but it seemed forced the food was horrendous the first meal we had a choice but neither was edible the second meal there was no choice it was some supposedly special noodles with sauce this had no taste at all fortunately i was exhausted and slept a lot my one plus to this return trip was how the stewardesses took care of a family with a crying baby i have done that before and it is very stressful they were kind and helpful to the parents

very nice airline clean everything was sealed before use food were very good healthy and you can choose japanese entree or american food haagendazs ice cream generous beverages green tea juice winesaki most of all we love our own small but individual tv screen so we can watch different movie or channel we wanted flight attendants were also very sweet i saw one of them holding the baby for a mother on board one of bathroom is also larger than american or united that we have flew before
the flight attendants are nice and polite they smile all the timethe cabin is a little old and lousy though

this was a comfortable flight the business class has individual cubicles so no one is crawling over you to use the bathroom the crew is first class friendly and helpful the plane leaves around am and the meal is a light evening snack if i am awake at i am still hungry you can order sandwiches at any time which i did every two hours when i woke up they were very good i enjoyed the flight and slept most of the way
extraordinary service airline staff from checkin to staff to flight crew the flight crew had smiles from beginning to end of my flight i say japan airlines is one of the best airlines to fly on

being meters tall i asked jal call center to assign me a seat with leg space even the supervisor was not able to assist with this simple request other airlines have no problem with doing this the supervisor was not flexible at all this left me very frustrated and stressed about my long flight to india however the staff and the supervisor at the airports both in japan and in india were far more accommodating they were kind they listened and they were able to help me with my request for a seat with leg space the actual flight the service on board inflight entertainment and the food were all good i would fly with them again if the call center staff were a little more flexible and caring and understanding

i was lucky enough to find people working for japan airline when i go lost into the airport in chicago trying to find my flight customer service is amazing it was a very nice flying experience it was my first trip oversea and i didnt regret it if you have to take a flight to asia going with japan airline is the best way to go

the crew is cheerful polite and keeps smile the food is so standard for muslim snack but the meal is ok the cabin is moderate with configuration for economic class have bigger restroom at left behind aircraft free flow of water orange juice etc

a somewhat disappointing inflight experience with jal on this overnight service to sydney cabin lights were left on at full brightness for well over hours sure the dinner service needed to be completed but the harshness intensity of the lighting was about as comfortable as a hospital emergency waiting room i asked if the lighting could be dimmed even slightly to no avail little surprise the foot rests were troublesome locking in a half way down position unless forcibly reset by hand to the max up position cabin crew were courteous helpful as ever

jal is my goto air line i always loved jal for their professional attitude im not just talking about their cabin crew but their ground crew have great customer service skills also last year when i needed assistance with reservation for trip to japan from dfw for my fathers funeral they helped me through it despite the international part of the whole trip was not jals flight they treated me with very kind and caring words and helped me with each steps to ensure ill be there for my fathers service jal will be always my first choice and ill recommend jal to everybody

this was my first time flying with japan airlines and i must say it did not disappoint the attendants were attentive kind and made sure that you were comfortable and taken care of i have never seen such attention to detail on any other flight when they noticed my wine bottle was empty the attendant quickly replaced it with no questions asked the food was interesting there was one dish with ham a sweet sauce and walnuts that tasted odd but apart from that everything else was delicious

jal has always fantastic reviews by many people from different cultures i like jal overall except for premium economy class i chosen from los angeles to narita japan get to the point issue was reclining seat seat does not recline at all instead seat roll down toward forward despite of you get more leg room than economy class when seat roll down forward you loose leg room tremendously i did not like that when seat roll down forward you dont recline your back your entire body roll down forward just like seat it was very uncomfortable premium economy seat cost me near us believe in me if your budget is around us and need more comfort on your seat and around you take singapore air premium economy their seats actually recline comfortably you also get choose meal from selections when you purchase a ticket their entertainment program is far better than jal so for near hours flight go for singapore air you wont regret it

very efficient and comfortable delightful service and generally good food business class seats were comfortable although did not go flat on the outward journey the code share flight with american airlines was not as good as jal

i began using jal a couple of years ago when they started offering a flight into hnd arriving and departing at very convenient times their business class product is of very high quality all seats offer good privacy and most important aisle access without the need to climb over someones legs furthermore this allows staff to serve you directly ie if you have an aisle seat they do not need to lean over you this makes the whole service a very smooth and pleasant experience talking of service very friendly and swift amongst the better ones you experience when travelling in c the seats offer a full flatbed and an aircushion is provided for additional comfort i always have had very good sleep in these seats lavatories are up to japanese standards which is pretty unique in air travel western food options are a bit of a mixed bag but still good the wash bags look very impressive tumi but the contents are spartanic eg no moisturizer and socks but a sweater is on offer if you want to get out of your shirt large movie screens i think it was the largest in c when launched i noticed there are more crew announcements than on other airlines which can be a bit annoying as the entertainment system stops nevertheless when given a choice i prefer jal over other carriers on most occasions and the jal lounges are very impressive too

truly one of the best airlines the seats in economy class are really spaciius the aircraft though old is well maintained the avod screen is huge the selections are really entertaining the service by the crew is really impeccable

i traveled from new delhi to tokyo and back after my first experience they have reached to the top spot in my preferred airlines the flight crew is very service oriented they take very good care of the passengers food and drinks are good and many options are available in flight entertainment is excellent most importantly they have a very good sense of time for business travellers this is one of the most important factor highly recommended

very nice drink the meal came with a hot soup rice crackers and a haagen daaz ice cream for dessert for my beverage i selected jal skytime which is a yuzu citrus flavored drink im a sky time fanatic and its pretty much the only beverage i order when im on a jl flight other than green tea

everything about the flight was impressive the food the service and the comfort of the cabin but perhaps the most impressive was the cabin staff regrettably we were forced to disembark from our plain before it had taken off due to some technical problem the staff were so apologetic that they seemed close to tears of humiliation to make up for the inconvenience while we waited for another plane to be made available the staff handed out food vouchers of yen so that everyone could have a meal in the airport while we waited it was a very generous and welcome gesture and by the time we had eaten the plane was ready to board there is much that airlines in other parts of the world could learn from this great example of customer service this could have been a customer complaint nightmare for them instead it became a plus point

the service is good with some air hostesses the experience was quite good they were quite hospitable food quality is good cleanliness is also upto the mark the seating comfort however needs improvement for long flights it becomes taxing

very good leg room i know this matters most for many crew is very hospitable and friendly as i arrived early they put me on a earlier flight for free from tokyo to osaka my final destination wo a request
perhaps i have high expectation with the jl inflight meal i had a beef pattie with rice and it was just soso the kiwi juice was good though

i had ordered the low sodium meal and the flight attendant confirmed this before the flight even closed the door the toilet was spacious i was amazed at how much extra room there was at one point one passenger told me one of the stalls was dirty and let a flight attendant know the flight attendant told her it will be cleaned and immediately started to do so dinner and breakfast was served and in between there was a h√§agendazs vanilla ice cream offered as a snack the overhead bins are small its not one long bin shared by a couple of rows but for one row only i had a poster which didnt fit so my boss had the cabin crew stow it elsewhere

this was the first time i flow with first class way beyond my expectation serve the delicate oolong tea champagne after seated then hand over the right size of pajama then my star japanese style meal started for the hour flight i enjoy every minute in the air did not even want to go to sleep i watched movies and drank unlimited high quality tea and numerous star chief unforgettable dishes it was a flawless flight from the beginning to the end would like to fly again even have to fly from vegas to chicago in order to take this flight thats how much i love this airline and this route to japan

i was flown from manila to narita round trip on november the flight time is hours they served us one meal that has only one menu for everybody the food was just fine mixed japanese and western food the seat is ok good space between front and back row they have not much movies in the entertainment system and the personal tv is so small overall service is good
pleasant service on this flight the snacks were not as good as you would expect on a japanese flight but still a comfortable flight

customer service was simply elegant and genuine the flight attendants were in constant motion there was always one flight attendant walking around to ensure safety and to provide service this is my second time on jal and i must say i am truly impress the delivery of customer service was consistent throughout the entire hr flight from the moment you embark on the plane you are greeted and welcomed by a courteous smile all the flight attendants ensured that if assistance was needed they were prompt in addressing the request and smiled the entire time this is the kind of service that would make a return customer and loyal frequent flyer

we were very impress with the level service of this air line from the time we checked in to on board their personel always have the smile on their face their professonialism is second to none we can feel how serious and how proud they are to provide service for their customers we all agreed that the way they handle themself seem like they appriciate the job they have the plane is clean both international and domestic the seats are comfortable and the food is pretty good their entertainment system is outstanding a lot of movies also include some new release we all agreed this is the best airline we have been traveled thank you for made our fly enjoyable

jal can be highly recommended service was excellent from start of flight to the finish the stewardess were professional and warm food on board was excellent i chose the japanese option delicious and fresh ingredients were used flat bed was comfortable and the equipment on board user friendly i would definitely fly jal again

my family were all impressed with the quality comfort food entertainment and service on japan airlines we flew from tokyo to london on dec and were fortunate to have a quiet flight with a fair nnumber of empty seats however the flight from vancouver to tokyo was full and it was equally as good having been on a round the world ticket with one world on number of airlines this airline was the top performer the seats were slightly more roomy and longer the service was far superior ie how quickly drinks were offered hot towels etc and the bathrooms were very clean throughout the flighti would most definately fly with japan airlines again in the future

travelled on this airline for the first time recently and was very pleased i did the seats were very comfortable for a long haul flight the inflight service was very attentive and courteous without being over the top food was average and i have had much better on other premium airlines the flights departed and arrived on time the in flight entertainment was ok although i have had better on other airlines the inch tv screen was excellent though the noise cancelling headphones were very good as was the ability to charge my phone and tablet in flight this enabled me to play games on my own device without running down the battery would definitely travel with them again

we have flown this airline many times to different places there arent many ways airlines can differentiate themselves but jal really tried hard their flights are usually on time and when they are late it usually isnt by more than a few minutes their inflight staff is the most courteous we have experienced they know when to check in and when to leave you alone their bathrooms are larger than most airlines their legroom tends to be larger their seats are quite comfortable only caveat here is that lumbar support isnt great they have more inflight meal selections than any other airline we have experienced but to take full advantage of that definitely call a few days before your flight their inflight entertainment system is the best weve seen with a wide selection of movies and shows which you can watch on demand

i really enjoy myself with this airline the food served was really delicious besides i was impressed with the service and cleanliness of the airplane highly recommended for those who wants to go to japan

was pleasantly surprised by the economy class experience by jal from seoul to tokyo the leg space was comfortable service efficient and good inflight entertainment i did not expect such an experience for a cheap ticket bought through a travel website

i accidentally got a great ticket deal from expedia and it was an impressive experience i was impressed by the cleanliness and service there were always smiles on the fight attendants faces and they never hesitated to help they served tasty food and drinks the on board entertainment was great with old and new movies and music the plane itself was very clean and i didnt feel uncomfortable at all even though i was in economy class highly recommended

it was my first time with this airline and my first flight was great and the second one the hour one was even better they give meals plus snacks as well as several snacks at the back of the plane that you can get yourself it mentions wifi when i fill out this review but i was not aware if there was or not the flight attendants were very friendly and very patient the japanese are so zen and made the flights easier they were always available the longer flight had blankets and u shaped pillows which actually are comfy to sleep

after a long layover while i tried to sleep in kennedy airport japan airlines opened its ticketing area for boarding passes around with a welcome and a bow to us it was uphill from there because the service was great they had about six stewards in economy they were all polite and helpful we had two full meals on the hour flight plus two snacks one meal was dinner and the other was lunch dinner included pork with vegetables and rice miso soup salmon over potato salad green salad fruit and picked vegetables i certainly did not lack for food oh and the beer was free that helped me sleep the was comfortable with a usb plug large screen tv in the seat back and they even provided slippers and neck pillows the u kind for your comfort three seats next to me were empty so i lazily stretched out to sleep when i got up and was thirsty i walked to the back and found a steward eating i apologized for interrupting him and he graciously offered me apple juice instead of water which was great
the best airline and service ive seen in a long time really nice seat and lots of place best food and service the staff is so attentive to your demand wow

service on board was fantastic flight attendants never showed any impatience or rude behavior they were always polite i get the sense that some of the flight attendants dont have a great grasp of english so i wasnt sure if they really understood what i said but it was never an issue the first part of my flight from yvr to nrt was on business class the plane did not have st class which i think is nicer because there were more business seat options this flight used shell flat neo which is not completely flat but at an angle this leg was a longer flight about hours so we had additional meal as compared ot leg i had thought the seat would not be as good as leg but actually this seat was very comfortable i give it a out of minus for not fully flat and minus because it never seemed to give me an ideal length for my legs and im not that tall leg was sky suites ii which gave you a lot more storage areas but felt smaller even though it really wasnt overall great food choices and snacks and the anytime food selection is a great idea movie options i thought was just ok the fact that it was the same options on my return flight was a bummer as i had already watched everything i wanted to see most movies were not really recent i think my biggest negative would have to be the lounge in vancouver you use a shared lounge with other airlines premium plaza lounge it got very crowded i think some of the folks in that lounge hadnt eaten in days because they were rushing the lines and ate plates of stuff before i finished having my cup of tea so trying to get food was a battle i was disappointed in the sakura lounge however as that is their main lounge there is the main sakura lounge and smaller sakura lounge i used both and had issues with both in both cases they made announcements about the lounge being at capacity and it felt like it however in the main lounge there was plenty of room but they separated their dining area to an area where you need to walk up so you had to eat in that dining area which was very small if the food was in the main lounge area there wouldnt be such a sea of humanity clustered together i opted not to have any kind of food in either lounge because of the crowds and because the food didnt look very good the lounge at singapore was also a shared lounge and the food there was also mediocre jals biggest negative for me was their website its not very well done and the check in process is not well thought out they ask for a lot of information including your passport info which i had already previously provided when you are on the road more than likely you are on slow hotel wifi their check in page asked for too much and not user friendly additionally they expect you to check in each segment separately they also dont provide you with electronic boarding pass thats bad if you are connecting to their flight if you were connecting without a boarding pass you likely will have to go to the main departure terminal and redo security because inside a terminal youre not likely to find someone who can print the boarding pass for you this will vary from airport to airport
